neighborhood: Diagonal Mar i el Front Marítim del Poblenou
description: Apartment for sale with spectacular views of the sea and the city with parking in Diagonal Mar, Barcelona Magnificent 114.59m² built apartment with incredible panoramic views of both the sea and the city, located in the exclusive area of Diagonal Mar.  The property is distributed in a spacious and bright living-dining room with large windows that allow plenty of natural light to enter, a fully equipped independent kitchen with integrated appliances and access to a pleasant balcony that also connects with the living room.  The night area consists of 3 double rooms; 1 of them en-suite. Another complete bathroom that serves the rest of the rooms.  Orientation to the east and northwest.  It has marble floors, gas heating and air conditioning with heat pump.  It is located on the top floor of a building with an elevator built in 2002.  The price includes 1 large parking space and storage room in the same building.  In an unbeatable location, close to the sea, green areas, the Diagonal Mar shopping center, services and leisure areas, and very well connected to public transport.  Do not miss the opportunity to live in front of the sea!

description: Brand new apartment with terrace and pool in Paseo de Gracia, Barcelona Exclusive property of 218sqm built and 28sqm of terrace distributed in a spacious and bright living room with access to 2 balconies, a pleasant and sunny dining room, independent kitchen with double access and breakfast bar. It can be left open for greater comfort thanks to its sliding doors and comes fully equipped with top of the range appliances (including a Liebherr wine fridge). Separate utility room. A large hallway leads to the sleeping area, where you will find the master bedroom en suite with access to the spectacular 30m2 terrace. The bathroom is very spacious and has both a shower and a bathtub. Of the other 3 double bedrooms, 1 is en-suite with a shower, and another one has access to the magnificent terrace. All of them with built-in wardrobes and designed with high quality materials. All the rooms have ducted air conditioning and heating, domotics, wooden floors, aluminium carpentry and double glazing. The exclusive and elegant roof terrace offers a unique space, with a large amount of vegetation and a wooden structure surrounding the communal swimming pool. Located in the heart of Barcelona, Paseo de Gracia is the most elegant and stately avenue in the city, and in one of the most sought-after locations for business. A very attractive commercial proposition. It offers a very comfortable life, with all the services at your fingertips. Living on this avenue means enjoying exclusivity in the very centre of the city. Enjoy the exquisite architecture of its modernist buildings such as Casa Batlló, Casa Milá and Casa Lleó Morera, mixed with modern, classical and neoclassical buildings.  Its location enjoys excellent communications, and the unique experience of living in Paseo de Gracia; surrounded by the best fashion shops, hotels, high-class restaurants and the most representative examples of modernism. A luxury within the reach of few.  The refurbishment of this traditional neoclassical building has been carried out to the highest standards and details. It has sought to merge the most distinguished of the past with the most functional of the future. Its design is totally avant-garde and has all the comforts of the most modern constructions.

neighborhood: Diagonal Mar i el Front Marítim del Poblenou
description: This exquisite designer apartment on the seafront in Barcelona's Diagonal Mar leaves no detail of the good life behind. Complete with a large terrace, breathtaking views, private jacuzzi, 24-hour security and its prime location, this gem of a property is sure to impress the most discerning buyers. We look forward to hearing from you for more details. The district of Diagonal mar i el Front Marítim del Poblenou is one of the 10 districts that make up the district of Sant Martí, in the northeast of Barcelona. Its limits are: Avinguda Diagonal, Carrer de Bac de Roda and the Mediterranean Sea. It is one of the newest neighborhoods of Barcelona, projected from the impulse of the Forum of Cultures held in 2004 in Barcelona. It is a luxury urbanization with green spaces and high-rise buildings and skyscrapers in which the houses are spacious and with impressive views of the Mediterranean Sea and the city. The price per square meter of the houses is one of the highest in Barcelona. With green areas, wide streets, building complexes that take care of every detail, a shopping center and the beaches of Mar Bella and Nova Mar Bella, it has become a very attractive neighborhood. The neighborhood can be easily reached by the Ronda Litoral, although there are also good public transport connections The Diagonal Mar neighborhood is ideal if you prefer ultra-modern apartments with luxury features in Barcelona, where proximity to the sea is a plus. The neighborhood has been designed to have everything you need without leaving it.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Diagonal Mar i el Front Marítim del Poblenou, Barcelona

neighborhood: Sant Pere - Santa Caterina i la Ribera
description: Wonderful main floor of 180m2 built with terrace in a quiet street of the Born with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. You enter the property through a large and beautiful hall where there are two double bedrooms with balcony overlooking the street and fitted closets, plus a recently renovated bathroom. Then to the right is a hallway that leads to a first smaller room and then to the large living room facing south-east with open kitchen and 2 exit doors to the large terrace. A space in the living room can be closed with sliding doors and converted into a third guest room and also has a second full bathroom. The property was completely renovated in 2017, rescuing the original elements such as the walls, the high ceilings, the Catalan vault and the wooden doors were restored by hand. The installations and ceilings were fully rehabilitated. The apartment has air conditioning by splits, fitted closets in two bedrooms and equipped kitchen. If there is a trendy place for both tourists and locals, it is the dynamic neighborhood of El Born with its particular market, now turned into a museum, after getting some fantastic Roman ruins during its remodeling. It is home to artists, artisans and bohemians, with a myriad of curious and unique stores. Even more famous are its varied restaurants, so many to discover a new one every day. The Santa Caterina market with its roof inspired by the skin of the dragon of Sant Jordi is in itself a work to admire. The Basilica of Santa Maria del Mar, the Palau de la Música, and the green lung of La Ciutadella are some of the important landmarks of this neighborhood. It is a neighborhood to live and to know. Its buildings continue the irregular pattern of the Gothic Quarter, and its streets, although clearer at times, are also narrow. On the first floor of the buildings you can find bars, art galleries, artisan workshops and a host of small and curious businesses. This neighborhood will interest you if you like the bohemian lifestyle, living with the many artisans, tapas and good food, and live in a neighborhood that surprises you with new stores and corners. It is a good location to invest in a pied-à-terre.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Pere - Santa Caterina i la Ribera, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle dels Sombrerers

address: subdistrict La Vila Olímpica del Poblenou
description: Terraced house with terrace for sale in Villa Olímpica, Barcelona Charming semi-detached house of 155 m2 in a privileged location, just a 10-minute walk from the beach. It is distributed over 2 floors and has an independent exit.  On the ground floor, we enter a hall space and then there is a large 40 m2 living room with direct access to a pleasant 48 m2 garden terrace at the foot of the living room, facing South. Separated by glass we have a modern kitchen with BULTHAUP furniture and SMEG appliances and an attached laundry room. Courtesy toilet.  On the second floor is the rest area consisting of 4 bedrooms, the main one with an en-suite bathroom with a built-in shower and fitted wardrobes. There is a second bathroom that services the other 3 bedrooms.  Parquet floors in all rooms. Gas heating, air conditioning and ducted heat pump. Alarm, safe, mezzanine and fitted wardrobes.  Parking space included in the price of 32.50 m2.  The property is very close to the city's beaches, the center and the Parc de la Ciutadella. Close to the access to the Ronda Litoral and very well connected by public transport, 5 minutes from the metro and 20 minutes on foot from the Estación de França (Renfe). Surrounded by shops, schools, services and recreational areas of the widest variety.

description: Apartment with great profitability in a regal estate building in Eixample. This refurbished flat is located between the Eixample and the heart of Barcelona, bringing together the best of both areas. It's just a few metres from Plaza Catalunya, Paseo Sant Joan, the Gothic Quarter, El Born, Paseo de Gracia and Las Ramblas, a privileged location to enjoy the best of the city and all the services, shops and transport facilities. The entrance hall leads us to the very spacious day area, which allows us to differentiate between two ambiences: the living room and the dining room with open-plan Leicht kitchen equipped with Neff home appliances and Grohe taps. The living room is very bright and quiet and has access to a beautiful glazed gallery facing south-east towards the inner courtyard. The night area features 2 bedrooms: a suite with private bathroom, which also has access to the gallery, and a double bedroom. In addition, there's a second independent full bathroom. The property maintains original elements such as Catalan vault and high ceilings. It is equipped with ducted air conditioning, parquet floors of noble layer and hydraulic flooring of Pinar Miró. Furniture can be purchased optionally. It's on the first floor of a regal estate building with a lift. This property gives a great profitability, as it is being rented for mid-term periods between 3.500 and 4.500 €/month with a 95% occupancy rate, which gives a gross profitability of around 7%.

description: Amazing brand new refurbished property with high quality details in El Born. This property is located in one of the main streets of El Born in Barcelona, in a historical and cultural environment with all the necessary shops and services. It's also very close to the metro, the "Port Vell" marina, the Soho House, the Ciutadella Park and Barceloneta beach. This 130.97 built sqm flat is part of a new housing development in a building that has been completely refurbished. It's located on the 2nd floor and is completely exterior. It welcomes us with a spacious hallway that leads to the large living-dining room of 36 sqm with an open-plan kitchen equipped with home appliances. This is a bright space, thanks to the large windows, where you can place the sofa area, the table and also cook. The night area is distributed in the 2 ends of the property. On one side, we find the double bedroom en suite with its own bathroom. On the other side, there's the other double bedroom, the single bedroom and a separate bathroom. The bedrooms have built-in wardrobes and large windows to receive natural light. The apartment is perfect for a family and stands out for the high quality of its finishings: natural parquet flooring and porcelain tiles in the bathrooms, underfloor heating, aerothermal air conditioning and home automation and fire prevention systems. The building has a lift. Do not hesitate to contact Bcn Advisors to request a visit to this flat.

description: Spectacular refurbished apartment in a modernist building with lift and communal terrace, located next to the historic Universitat de Barcelona, in the heart of the city centre, with the best services and communications, just 3 streets away from Plaza Catalunya and Paseo de Gracia. The flat has 130 built interior sqm, plus common elements and a 2.6 sqm balcony. It's located on the third real floor. The day area consists of a living-dining room with balcony facing the street, independent kitchen with electrical appliances and gallery with laundry room. The night area consists of 2 en-suite bedrooms with their own bathroom: the master bedroom has a dressing room and overlooks the interior block courtyard; and the other one is interior. There is also a guest toilet. The building also has a communal roof terrace to enjoy the outdoors. The property is characterised by a high quality refurbishment and design by the prestigious interior designer Jaime Beriestain. It's equipped with a hybrid aerothermal system by Mintsubishi with integration of Hidrokit, ducted fan coils and underfloor heating (controlled by home automation), natural stone floors, built-in wardrobes and Climalit glass..

description: Located in the elegant Eixample Right, a few meters from the Passeig de Gracia and the Plaza de Cataluña, this 220sqm property has recently been perfectly renovated by an artist, with old elements collected from around the world.  It consists of 1 double suite, 1 single suite, 2 double rooms and 1 medium siza room, 2 full bath rooms and 1 guest toilet. Two of the rooms are on a loft floor. Those facing the street have open to a sunny balcony.  The spacious living room and dining room open onto a gallery and a small balcony, providing plenty of natural light.  The spacious equipped kitchen features vintage mosaics that contrast with the brick walls.  The bathrooms retain their original mosaics as well. The apartment has high 4 meter ceilings with beautiful moldings. The original elements have been preserved, such as the old iron radiators, the carpentry and glass doors, the hydraulic floors.  The property also has a separate service entrance and elevator, and an alarm.  This magnificent property receives lots of natural light and provides an elegant and peaceful atmosphere.

description: Superb refurbished apartment with original features in the best area of Eixample. This recently refurbished property is in a perfect state of conservation, so it's practically brand new. It's located in "Quadrat d'Or" ("Golden Square"), in the lower part of the right side of the Eixample, the most sought-after and quietest area, with the most representative Modernista buildings. The property has 140,75 built interior sqm. The day area is a wonderful 54 sqm living-dining-kitchen area, all open in one space, which makes it perfect to enjoy its amplitude. The two-ambiances living room has access to a 5 sqm balcony facing the street. The kitchen with island is high quality design. Next to it, we find a separate laundry room with washing machine, tumble dryer and water heater. A hallway full of wardrobes, which offers plenty of storage space, leads to the night area. There are 3 bedrooms: an en-suite bedroom with wardrobe opening onto a small 5 sqm terrace, a double bedroom and a medium sized bedroom. It also has a separate bathroom. The flat preserves all the original elements, such as the 3,5 m high ceilings with mouldings, Catalan vault and wooden beams, restored Nolla mosaic floors combined with a beautiful wooden parquet, recovered and treated brick wall, and restored original woodwork, stripped and with double glazing. The whole apartment is equipped with ducted air conditioning with heat pump. There's also the possibility of purchasing the furniture. This property is located on a building with lift and communal terrace that can be used for sunbathing, relaxing, reading.. . The area, very close to Paseo Sant Joan, offers a wide range of services, restaurants, cultural attractions and proximity to the city centre, Plaza Catalunya, Paseo de Gracia and the Born district. Do not hesitate to arrange a viewing with us.

description: Stunning and beautiful modernist property with terrace in Paseo Sant Joan. This outstanding property is located in one of the best modernist buildings in Barcelona, in Paseo Sant Joan and at the foot of the Arc de Triomf. It occupies the entire "Princpal" floor (1st) of the building and is made up of 2 joined registered entities: one facing the street, with a tourist licence, and the other facing the inner courtyard of the block, which is currently an office, although the entire property is for residential use. The property has a total area of 264 built sqm and a 15 sqm terrace facing the inner courtyard. In the half of the property with a tourist licence, there's currently an independent apartment of 50 sqm, but the whole area of 132 sqm could be recovered for tourist purposes. The interior of the property is spectacular: it has the highest ceilings in the building, the highest quality of coffered ceilings and a great beauty and variety of hydraulic floors in its rooms. It's equipped with gas heating by beautiful antique radiators and ducted air conditioning. The flat has a lot of layout options, due to its large surface and the fact that it occupies the whole floor of the building. The main living room is impressive from the floor to the ceiling, with the classic modernist building tribune, facing the street, decorated with beautiful stained glass windows. The kitchen is separate and has a water and boiler area next to it. In addition to the main living room, there are 7 more rooms: one facing the street, 3 facing the courtyard with access to the terrace and 3 interior rooms. There are also 3 bathrooms. On the other hand, the tourist apartment has a living-dining room with open kitchen, which gives access to a balcony, a double bedroom and a bathroom. The building, with a lift, stands out for the use of stucco on the first floors and exposed brick on the upper floors, the use of stone in the grandstand, the wonderful decoration of the façade and the forceful volumes. It's located close to the city centre and the Ciutadella park, with plenty of services, shops and public transport options in the surrounding area.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Dreta de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Paseo de Sant Joan

description: Excellent refurbished upscale apartment in a regal estate building in Eixample. This pristine property is located between Paseo de Gracia and Paseo Sant Joan, one of the best areas of Eixample's right side, just a few steps away from the city centre. It's located on the first floor of a regal estate building and has been refurbished brand new, with elegant finishings and high quality materials that combine the best of the traditional and the contemporary. This property has 156,79 built interior sqm, a 9,36 sqm patio, a 9,72 sqm balcony and 15 sqm of common elements according to the Cadastre. A spacious entrance hall distributes to the left the day area and to the front the night area. The living-dining room with open plan kitchen is a large and diaphanous space of 55 sqm in which natural light fills the whole space thanks to 3 double glass doors with access to a long balcony facing the street, southeast. The kitchen is fully equipped with home appliances, is modern and elegantly designed, highlighting beautiful dark worktops and well-hidden storage areas. In addition, an alcove in the living room is used as a laundry area. The night area features 2 double en-suite bedrooms with private bathrooms and access to an uncovered courtyard in which to create a relaxed and relaxed atmosphere. In addition, the master bedroom has a dressing room. Finally, next to the entrance hall there's a room that used to be a patio, which receives light thanks to a skylight, which could be used as a single bedroom, guest bedroom or office, and a guest toilet. The apartment has high ceilings, light coloured wooden floors and radiator heating. The entrance hall has a beautifully restored original floor and built-in wardrobes. This property will allow you to enjoy the advantages of the centre of Barcelona, with a wide range of services, shops, shopping malls in Plaza Catalunya, luxury boutiques and public transport options. Do not hesitate to contact Bcn Advisors to visit this apartment.

This beautiful brand new renovated apartment is located in the heart of El Born, very close to the Basilica of Santa Maria del Mar and Via Laietana. The area is one of the most eclectic in Barcelona with a great mix of history, culture and leisure. The surrounding area has a wide variety of services, shops, restaurants and the Jaume I metro station. The property is located on the third floor of a charming historic building from the end of the 19th century that has been recently refurbished, with a new lift in its interior courtyard. The property has 86 m2 built according to plan and the refurbishment has managed to combine high quality materials and finishings, a modern and functional design, and beautiful original features such as the Catalan vaulted ceiling and exposed stone and brick walls. The entrance hall leads to a spacious living-dining room with an open plan kitchen equipped with electrical appliances and access to a balcony facing the street. On both sides of the living room we access the two double bedrooms en suite with private bathroom, one of which has a dressing room and balcony, and the other has built-in wardrobes. All 3 rooms of the flat are exterior, making it very bright. The apartment is equipped with natural oak parquet flooring, ducted hot/cold air conditioning and wooden exterior carpentry with double glazing. The following works have been carried out in the building: refurbishment of common areas, renovation of façades, roofs and patios, new electricity, telecommunications, plumbing and gas installations, and pre-installation of aerothermal energy. Do not hesitate to contact Bcn Advisors for a showing of this apartment.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Pere - Santa Caterina i la Ribera, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle Gíriti

description: This splendid apartment is located in the heart of the old town, in the Gothic quarter, a stone's throw from La Rambla. Located on the actual second floor of a spectacular historic building built in 1876 and equipped with an elevator, there are many well-preserved period features and soaring ceilings. The apartment has been completely refurbished with attention to detail and high quality materials and is incredibly immaculate. The moldings and the original woodwork of the windows are splendid. It is a modern and very comfortable apartment with the charm of the old. The property has 5 double bedrooms and four bathrooms, two of which are en suite. The master bedroom is very complete as it has fitted closets, a full bathroom and a view of the terrace. All the bedrooms have fitted closets and are very spacious. Then we have the kitchen/dining room with its balcony that communicates with the terrace. Located in an interior courtyard, this pleasant and quiet outdoor space is sunny during part of the day. The apartment is equipped with gas heating by radiators, air conditioning and alarm. The tranquility, light and volumes are the protagonists of this exceptional home. It is ideally located near La Rambla and the famous covered market "La Boqueria", as well as the Plaza de Catalunya, which is the nerve center of the city of Barcelona. The Gothic Quarter is the oldest and most interesting part of the city. It is bounded by Las Ramblas, Via Laietana, Paseo Colón and Plaza de Catalunya, each of these points alone has its own importance and history. With its narrow streets and irregular structure, several of its buildings have been built on the Romanesque remains of the city, so you can get an apartment with at least one wall dating back to Roman times. It is the tourist district par excellence so it represents an assured investment, especially if you are near one of its attractions such as the Cathedral, the Plaza Sant Jaume with the City Hall and the Palace of the Generalitat, the Plaza Real, the famous Rambas, and the Museum of History of the city. The Gothic Quarter could be your neighborhood if you are looking to make a profitable investment or acquire an excellent pied-à-terre in an iconic and storied neighborhood with great history, private buildings, tourism and with all kinds of businesses at hand such as bars, restaurants, libraries, and many magical corners to discover and tour.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Gòtic, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle d'Avinyó

neighborhood: Sant Pere - Santa Caterina i la Ribera
description: The direct impact o this exceptional apartment makes it stand out from others on the market from the very first moment you step through the door. You will encounter high ceilings, five large and original balcony doors from three orientations that offers immense natural light, and views of the private terrace with a green vertical garden. The high-end and fully equipped open kitchen in the living area has been tailor made from Italy and gives a pleasant elegance to the apartment with its dark colours. The carpentry has equally been tailor made from Italy for the apartment and balances well an open office space with the first en-suite bedroom. There is also a guest bathroom available right next to the second bedroom. The floor is of natural parquet wood and the apartment offers radiators for heating. However, the gem of the property is without doubt the 28 m2 terrace that connects with the living room and the second bedroom. It offers a beautiful vertical garden and the luxury of tranquility in the heart of El Born. Hidden in the vertical garden is an access to a storage room which is also used as the laundry room. The micro location of the apartment is another important selling point of the property as you are surrounded by some of the very best squares and restaurants in the area.Furthermore, few minutes walk away is also the Ciutadella Park, the Port-Vell harbour and the Barceloneta beach. In short, we are talking about an authentic opportunity in one of the most popular neighbourhoods in Barcelona. If there is a trendy place for both tourists and locals, it is the dynamic neighborhood of El Born with its particular market, now turned into a museum, after getting some fantastic Roman ruins during its remodeling. It is home to artists, artisans and bohemians, with a myriad of curious and unique stores. Even more famous are its varied restaurants, so many to discover a new one every day. The Santa Caterina market with its roof inspired by the skin of the dragon of Sant Jordi is in itself a work to admire. The Basilica of Santa Maria del Mar, the Palau de la Música, and the green lung of La Ciutadella are some of the important landmarks of this neighborhood. It is a neighborhood to live and to know. Its buildings continue the irregular pattern of the Gothic Quarter, and its streets, although clearer at times, are also narrow. On the first floor of the buildings you can find bars, art galleries, artisan workshops and a host of small and curious businesses. This neighborhood will interest you if you like the bohemian lifestyle, living with the many artisans, tapas and good food, and live in a neighborhood that surprises you with new stores and corners. It is a good location to invest in a pied-à-terre.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Pere - Santa Caterina i la Ribera, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de la Ribera

description: One of a kind 146m2 brand new high floor apartment with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms is located in Eixample in a perfectly maintained building with concierge service, an elevator, and underground parking with a storage room. The splendid property has been completely renovated recently with the highest quality finishes and is a perfect example of a family residence that offers all modern luxuries while being in the heart of Eixample Right district, right next to Passeig de Sant Joan. The apartment has an excellent layout which creates two separate areas. The Sun-flooded day area is particularly pleasant and consists of an open plan tailor-made kitchen with a large island, dining area, and lounge area with direct access through floor-to-ceiling windows, to a private south-facing terrace. The night area is composed of a spacious master suite with an excellent walk-in closet and a beautiful en-suite bathroom, another double bedroom, a single bedroom, and another family bathroom. There is an organized separate laundry room with a washer, dryer, and storage space. The sale of the apartment is linked to the sale of the 2 parking places and the storage unit located right next to it, for an additional price of 65.000€. The home features all new utilities: plumbing, gas, electricity, ventilation, ducted air conditioning and heating, an alarm system, and a custom-made kitchen with an impressive kitchen island.  This key-ready property is a perfect home for your family to enjoy the best of life that Barcelona has to offer and SothebyŽs Barcelona team will be happy to arrange a visit for you. La Dreta de L’Eixample begins in Plaça de Catalunya and its central axis revolves around the Passeig de Gràcia and the Cuadrat d’Or. It is delimited from the busy Calle Balmes to the renovated Passeig de Sant Joan and from the commercial Ronda Sant Pere to the convenient Avinguda Diagonal. It is one of the most expensive and exclusive neighborhoods in Barcelona, along with Pedralbes and Sarrià-Sant Gervasi. It is impossible not to make reference to the luxury of Passeig de Gràcia, with the boutiques of the most exclusive brands in the world, or to the stores on La Rambla de Catalunya. However, the rest of its streets are as or more interesting. In them resided part of the Catalan textile bourgeoisie of the early twentieth century, which has left its mark on the spectacular royal estates and modernist houses designed by the most famous architects of the time, as the Pedrera or Casa Batlló of the great Antoni Gaudí. As a result, the characteristic homes of this neighborhood are spacious apartments with high ceilings, moldings, elaborate flooring and balconies. Many buildings and apartments preserve this original architectural heritage and it is possible to find recently remodeled apartments, penthouses, lofts and even studios, which revive these elements, as well as apartments with a lot of potential to be reformed. This side of L’Eixample is equipped with all kinds of services and stores, as well as educational centers, mainly state-subsidized and private schools. You will find it very easy to move around on foot or through the public transport connections to the most expensive stores and restaurants in the city. The Eixample Dreta is the best neighborhood if you want to admire and live in the noble zone of the fascinating Catalan modernism, to reside in one of its characteristic regal estates, and to coexist in perfect balance with the vibrant and luxurious commercial life. It is ideal if you want to walk every day through its wide and tidy streets, with easy transport connections, have all kinds of services and facilities available, including arranged or private schools, and enjoy the most chic, cultural and cosmopolitan atmosphere in Barcelona.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Dreta de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de Bailèn

description: Excellent opportunity to live in an extraordinary apartment with original historical elements. This apartment is located in one of the most beautiful areas of the Gothic Quarter, just a few minutes from Plaça de Sant Jaume. The property is located on the main floor of a listed building from 1900, completely renovated. This 173 m² flat consists of a generous entrance hall, a large living room with fireplace and access to the balcony. It has three double bedrooms and three complete bathrooms. The large inner courtyard is oriented to 3 central spaces: the master bedroom with dressing area and private bathroom with whirlpool tub, a double bedroom, and a large kitchen with central island fully equipped. All these rooms have large windows overlooking the courtyard. Thanks to the more than 4 meters high ceilings it has been possible to create two comfortable lofts, one in the living room area dedicated to an office and another above the dining area used as a multipurpose area and also has a bathroom. It should be noted that the building retains original period features such as wooden beams, exposed brick walls with their old scars. It also maintains the original carpentry. An excellent and unique property for lovers of architecture and history in the heart of Barcelona. It is the oldest district, number 1, the embryo of the city, where all its history begins from the original Barcino, where Roman ruins and medieval Gothic coexist. This district is made up of four neighborhoods, the Gothic, Sant Pere, Santa Caterina, El Born and La Ribera, and Barceloneta, each one more interesting than the other for tourists, since it is the most touristic area of the city, as well as residents. Despite its name, it is one of the most dynamic areas, full of history, art and culture, diversity and very cosmopolitan. Its two markets are especially interesting, La Boquería and Santa Caterina have everything you need from anywhere in the world. The buildings are quite old and many are very well preserved. The floors are generally medium to small, and fantastic historical jewels can be found, such as floors with medieval or Roman walls. So if you are a lover of the city's millenary history, culture, heritage, the most varied gastronomy, the beach, and entertainment, and you want to make a good investment, in this district you can find your ideal neighborhood.

suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle dels Lledó

description: This newly renovated and high-quality exclusive 158m2 apartment is located on the real 3rd floor in the heart of the city in a classical and perfectly maintained Eixample building with a historic elevator and community roof terrace. This splendid property has been completely renovated with the highest quality finishes and is a perfect example of a residence that offers all modern luxuries while maintaining its heritage. The south-oriented spacious day area consists of an impressive living room with a dining and lounge area and a large balcony that can host table and chairs. The living area opens towards a designer kitchen fully equipped with appliances from renowned brands. The night area is versatile and consists of 3 bedrooms and an additional guest bedroom, 2 complete bathrooms, and a guest toilet. There is a private terrace on the same level and a laundry room. The elegance of the spaces is accentuated by high ceilings with original stucco both masterfully restored and renewed, authentic hydraulic Barcelona tiles in the day area, combined with super-resistant wooden floors. This excellent family home features all-new utilities and installations: plumbing, gas, electricity, ventilation, ducted air conditioning and separate heating, several built-in cabinets, and a custom-made kitchen with an impressive kitchen island. The property has a lockable private storage space next to the large communal terrace. Located in a classical building with beautiful entry and a historic elevator in the highly sought-after prestigious Eixample area Quadrat d'Or at a traffic-reduced one-lane street 5 minutes' walk from Passeig de Gracia. Many restaurants and shopping facilities including a large supermarket are close by. description: Completely refurbished penthouse with two bedrooms, one in suite style, in the historic heart of Barcelona. The property, which has a private roof terrace of 46 m2, is located in El Gótico, the heart of the historical soul of Barcelona. A short walk from the beach and Port Vell is an area full of charming corners that transport you back to Roman times. The apartment integrates original elements such as high ceilings with wooden beams and antique paintings with the modernity of high resistance solid oak parquet, lacquered furniture and built-in wardrobes and chrome finishes in the kitchen office. The unit also has soundproof windows with double insulation, sanitary porcelain in the bathrooms, heating and air conditioning for your comfort. It is the oldest district, number 1, the embryo of the city, where all its history begins from the original Barcino, where Roman ruins and medieval Gothic coexist. description: High apartment full of light with privileged views of Casa Batlló and Casa Ametller. It consists of living room with terrace of 5 m2, facing south. Equipped kitchen, living room and a bathroom. The night area consists of 3 rooms, one of them with its own bathroom and another full bathroom for the rest of the rooms. The building has a concierge service. The Eixample district is the most emblematic of Barcelona since the nineteenth century. Of a renowned model urban planning devised by the engineer Ildefons Cerdá, Eixample marks the epicenter of the city from its main streets: The luxurious Passeig de Gràcia, the commercial Rambla de Catalunya and the updated Passeig de Sant Joan, housing the majority of the modernist architectural icons, such as La Sagrada Familia, La Pedrera or La Casa Batlló of the great Antoni Gaudí. It is a large, quiet but exciting  residential area with extremely convenient commercial activity, designed to respect the privacy of the homes. The Catalan modernist architecture so characteristic of stately airs, but with great cosmopolitan touches, extends throughout the neighborhood to the delight of those who wish to live modernism from within, since it is possible to acquire homes within regal estates with valuable original architectural elements, period pieces and even historical and protected. Schools, squares, wadis, parks, stores and restaurants give dynamism to the area that differentiates the Right from the Left, both with wide uniform streets, octagonal islands and wide island interiors that mark the internal distribution of buildings and homes. You will mostly find buildings of strong bricks, floors of generally wide dimensions, medium or high ceilings, with balconies that give to the wide streets or the inner patios of the Cerdá Plan. Keep in mind this living in the Eixample district, if you are looking for a neighborhood where you can have everything within walking distance or very well connected to public transport, both basic and luxury stores, trendy restaurants or even your workplace among the many offices and stores, this could be your neighborhood. If you want to walk among the iconic monuments of the city, with the comfort of equal distance to any other point or neighborhood in the city. Consider Eixample if you are a lover of modernist, stately and typical Catalan architecture and a high street feeling. If you want to live in the vital and cultural epicenter of Barcelona, where everything happens.

suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Paseo de Gràcia

description: Capturing Barcelona's past and becoming its future, ten unique new built apartments make up this impressive project, a heritage building with historical features and fa?ades, boasting both centrality and peace. Watch the dazzle of city life in Eixample or enjoy a privileged outlook over Pasaje Mendez Vigo, one of the city's old tree-lined pedestrian walkways, home to the Italian consulate and gated residences. You will live in Barcelona's luxury downtown, just a block from the majestic Passeig de Gracia Boulevard, the very main Avenue of the city and home to the most luxurious boutiques available. This new development is an outstanding architectural project, recovering this heritage building its former glory and original residential use. It highlights original Art Nouveau building elements while creating a modern urban oasis of peace in the most sought after neighborhood of Barcelona. There are 10 different apartments catering to varying lifestyle requirements. Two grand duplex apartments on the ground floor have their own patio garden, a rare luxury in Barcelona. The next three levels each have two apartments facing front street, or back onto Mendez Vigo and on top, two duplex penthouses with roof terraces offering sweeping panoramic views make up this exclusive residential development. Two grand duplex apartments of three bedrooms span the ground and mezzanine floors of the building, from front to back. These are the most characteristic in terms of modernist restoration, with wooden beams and views on the painted fresco. A stunning lounge five meters in height opens out onto each idyllic patio garden, allowing perspective outlook thanks to the low-rise pedestrian street beyond. The spectacular double height front entrance, modernist tiled floors and époque frescoes in the foyer, along with the staircase and the light patio have all been expertly restored to their historical beauty. Inside the apartments, the roof arches and beams, huge height windows and Venetian shutters lend to the original Barcelona style, contrasting with modern fittings to today's luxury standard. The Eixample district is the most emblematic of Barcelona since the nineteenth century. Of a renowned model urban planning devised by the engineer Ildefons Cerdá, Eixample marks the epicenter of the city from its main streets: The luxurious Passeig de Gràcia, the commercial Rambla de Catalunya and the updated Passeig de Sant Joan, housing the majority of the modernist architectural icons, such as La Sagrada Familia, La Pedrera or La Casa Batlló of the great Antoni Gaudí. description: A beautiful and newly renovated apartment in the heart of the Gothic Quarter, just next to the famous Plaza Real where the famous architect Gaudí presented one of his first ever projects to the city of Barcelona. The apartment offers two spacious bedrooms, one bathroom and a fully equipped kitchen that is separate from the living area. The balcony from the living area offers views towards Plaza Real on one side, and the seaside on the other. The strategic and central location of the apartment offers a unique possibility to be a walking distance from some of the most attractive monuments and areas of the city including the harbour, seaside, Las Ramblas and the Eixample neighbourhood. description: This beautiful and bright apartment is encountered on one of the most privileged locations of Right Eixample. Its extraordinary refurbishment offers modern comfort in one of the most historical areas of Barcelona. The natural light is an immediate impact upon entering the apartment, where you will find the modern Modulnova kitchen face the open South facing living area, which offers great open views. The kitchen appliences are from Miele, including a wine fridge with capacity for 70 bottles, and the lightning within the apartment can also be controlled through a mobile app. The flooring is natural oak parquet floor throughout the apartment and the double isolation in the walls, ceilings and double glazed balcony doors offer the luxury of tranquility in the very center of the city. There are three bedrooms and three bathrooms in the apartment, where the two main master bedrooms enjoy morning sun and have blinds which are controlled by remote control. The potential fourth bedroom is currently set up as an office area. The apartment has a calcifier, a centrilized A/C conduct system from Mutsibishi and both the A/C and hot water system are provided by an aerothermal system. The refurbishment of the apartment has been executed with utmost attention to a standard that the location represents. Few steps away from the apartment is Paseo de Gracia, the main avenue of the city, including some of the most important landmarks of Barcelona. address: subdistrict La Nova Esquerra de l'Eixample
description: Renovated apartment for sale in l'Eixample Esquerra, Barcelona Magnificent fully renovated 82m² apartment built according to cadastre, located in Eixample Esquerra.  Distributed in a bright living-dining room with access to a pleasant closed balcony with unobstructed views and large windows that allow plenty of natural light to enter.  Open kitchen fully equipped with integrated appliances.  The property consists of 3 rooms; The main one is en-suite with a magnificent full bathroom with a shower, and two other single rooms. Another full bathroom that serves the rest of the house.  The rooms of the house have high ceilings with original Catalan volta, exposed brick walls, wooden doors, parquet floors, aluminum carpentry and heating.  The balcony has floating wood floors and a convenient built-in closet for added storage.  Located in one of the most popular areas of Barcelona, close to all services, leisure and restaurant areas, parks and gardens, and very well connected to public transport.

description: Bright renovated apartment for sale in Paseo de Gracia, Barcelona Exclusive fully renovated 109m2 apartment built according to cadastre on the emblematic Paseo de Gracia.  The day area is distributed in a bright living-dining room with large windows that allow natural light to enter and a semi-open independent kitchen fully equipped with brand new high-end appliances. The combination of lighting, led and design, manage to generate a very cozy atmosphere.  It has a double room with fitted wardrobes and a full bathroom with a shower.  At the entrance, we find a double door that separates the hall spaces and the rest of the house. All rooms have Iroko tropical wood floors, air conditioning and heating, woodwork and double glazing. Property details come carefully custom designed with high quality materials.  Located in the heart of Barcelona, Paseo de Gracia is the most elegant and stately avenue in the city, and in one of the most sought after locations for business. A very attractive business proposition. It offers a very comfortable life, with all the services at your fingertips. Living on this avenue means enjoying exclusivity in the very center of the city. Enjoy the exquisite architecture of its modernist buildings such as Casa Batlló, Casa Milá or Casa Lleó Morera, mixed with modern, classical and neoclassical buildings.  Its situation enjoys excellent communication, and the unique experience of living in Paseo de Gracia; surrounded by the best fashion stores, hotels, high-class restaurants and the most representative examples of modernism. A luxury within the reach of few.

description: Fantastic renovated apartment in El Born, Barcelona We present this fantastic property of 128m2 built, completely renovated with high quality materials and design, with a modern style, but maintaining original elements of a royal estate from 1930.  The house is delivered turnkey, fully furnished and equipped with high-end appliances.  The building has a nice entrance and the flat is located on a real 1st floor. It has a large space of 36m2 with 2 large balconies facing the street, where we find the living-dining room open to the kitchen, with 3.30 meter high ceilings, arches and wooden beams. The hydraulic floors are new.  The 2 double bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms have oak wooden floors. Both bedrooms have access to a private patio of 13m2, with a table and chairs for 6 people, lighting and an awning.  Guests are welcome as there is a sofa bed in the living room and the toilet is also equipped with a shower. There are plenty of bespoke fitted wardrobes and additional storage areas.  All interior and exterior carpentry is new. All facilities (electricity and water) are also new. The apartment has air conditioning.  It is located in one of the most emblematic pedestrian streets of El Born, famous for its market and its Roman ruins, next to Ciutadella Park and the Arc de Triomf. It is a highly demanded area with a bohemian atmosphere and a great commercial and gastronomic offer.  Close to all services, restaurants and leisure areas. Well connected by public transport.

The night area features 2 bedrooms with built-in wardrobes: an en-suite bedroom with its own bathroom and fantastic views, and a medium-sized bedroom. In addition, there's a separate bathroom. The penthouse is equipped with ducted hot/cold air conditioning, parquet floors, folding windows and high quality finishings. The building, with concierge and lift, has beautiful details such as stained glass windows from the beginning of the 20th century, hand-restored stuccoes, wrought iron railings and a wooden staircase. address: Gran Via de les Corts Catalanes
description: Wonderful penthouse of 172 m2 and 73m2 distributed in 3 terraces in the "Quadrat d'Or" of the Eixample, 2 blocks from Plaza Catalunya. The property was completely renovated in 2011 and has 4 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms. Entering through the front door of the property there is a hall with a space that could be an excellent office. To the right of the hall there is a first double bedroom with window to the inner courtyard of the property, and then a sliding door that leads to the living - dining room with fireplace and exit to a large terrace of 51 m2 overlooking the Tibidabo and courtyard. The terrace has a storage room and bathroom with shower, and you can enjoy the warmth of the fireplace in winter. Next to the living room, there is a complete kitchen with high end appliances and plenty of storage space and very close to this a fabulous laundry area with sink and fitted closets. Also, in the kitchen is the service door where there is a second elevator that used to be a freight elevator and here are some stairs that lead to a very bright room with its own bathroom and terrace of 11 m2 that could be a fabulous guest bedroom, as it is very independent. To the left side of the hall there is a corridor that leads to the night area with a full bathroom, a large dressing room with window to the patio of the property, a second double bedroom with window to the terrace and the bright master bedroom with en suite bathroom with two sinks and access to the terrace of 11 m2 with fabulous views of the majestic estates of the Eixample in one of the main arteries of the "Ciutat Comtal". The property is located in a beautiful estate of 1940 with high ceilings, murals, decorated ceilings and 2 elevators. The property enjoys heating by radiators and ducted air, Catalan vault and fitted closets in the rooms and plenty of storage space. La Dreta de L'Eixample begins in Plaça de Catalunya and its central axis revolves around the Passeig de Gràcia and the Cuadrat d'Or. It is delimited from the busy Calle Balmes to the renovated Passeig de Sant Joan and from the commercial Ronda Sant Pere to the convenient Avinguda Diagonal. It is one of the most expensive and exclusive neighborhoods in Barcelona, along with Pedralbes and Sarrià-Sant Gervasi. It is impossible not to make reference to the luxury of Passeig de Gràcia, with the boutiques of the most exclusive brands in the world, or to the stores on La Rambla de Catalunya. However, the rest of its streets are as or more interesting. In them resided part of the Catalan textile bourgeoisie of the early twentieth century, which has left its mark on the spectacular royal estates and modernist houses designed by the most famous architects of the time, as the Pedrera or Casa Batlló of the great Antoni Gaudí. As a result, the characteristic homes of this neighborhood are spacious apartments with high ceilings, moldings, elaborate flooring and balconies. Many buildings and apartments preserve this original architectural heritage and it is possible to find recently remodeled apartments, penthouses, lofts and even studios, which revive these elements, as well as apartments with a lot of potential to be reformed. This side of L'Eixample is equipped with all kinds of services and stores, as well as educational centers, mainly state-subsidized and private schools. You will find it very easy to move around on foot or through the public transport connections to the most expensive stores and restaurants in the city.

description: Excellent and refurbished luxury apartment with original features in Eixample. This recently refurbished apartment is located very close to Paseo Sant Joan, one of the most sought-after areas of Barcelona's Eixample and just a few metres from the Arc de Triomf and the Parc de la Ciutadella. The flat is located on the third real floor of a carefully maintained building, with only 2 apartments per floor. The restoration has been carried out by the architectural studio Vilablanch, which has been awarded numerous exclusive refurbishment works. The rich details of the Catalan architecture have been preserved, while at the same time seeking to provide comfort. The original Nolla and hydraulic floorings have been carefully restored and fitted to match the original high ceilings. The carpentry has been restored to improve the acoustic-thermal capabilities. A large amount of natural light enters the property through the large balcony windows. The rear of the property also benefits from a large bay window providing light and warmth to the bedrooms. A large entrance hall with natural light and fitted wardrobes provides access to the flat. From here, you come into a beautiful and spacious living/dining room with open plan kitchen. The Bulthaup B3 kitchen island with high-end home appliances, Bulthaup black granite worktop and wine cabinet make this a unique space for relaxing or entertaining guests. Next to it, we reach a bedroom that can also be used as an office, with a balcony, high ceilings and a separate bathroom. In the hallway we also find a guest toilet with fitted wardrobes equipped for washing machine/dryer. On the other hand, at the end of the corridor we find 3 large master suites with their respective bathrooms: one facing the street and two facing the pleasant inner courtyard. One of them has a very special gallery with a large bathtub by Antonio Lupi, which creates a relaxing spa session. Carefully selected wooden elements matching the colour palette of the flat make the fully equipped bathrooms a welcoming space: washbasins, showers and furniture are integrated. The rooms are bright, have high ceilings and windows and the new wooden spaces integrating the bathrooms and wardrobes give each room a sense of space and intimacy.

description: In one of the most sought after locations in Barcelona we find this charming renovated apartment ready to move into. The main area of this property consists of living room, dining room and open kitchen. This space is characterized by being extremely diaphanous thanks to its large windows overlooking the lung of the block from where abundant natural light enters, especially in the afternoon. The apartment has two double bedrooms, one of them en suite. Both bedrooms have fitted closets. A small terrace, a laundry room and a guest toilet complete the property. Its unbeatable location and its charming style make this property a unique opportunity. Do not hesitate to contact us in case you would like to make a visit. The Eixample district is the most emblematic of Barcelona since the nineteenth century. Of a renowned model urban planning devised by the engineer Ildefons Cerdá, Eixample marks the epicenter of the city from its main streets: The luxurious Passeig de Gràcia, the commercial Rambla de Catalunya and the updated Passeig de Sant Joan, housing the majority of the modernist architectural icons, such as La Sagrada Familia, La Pedrera or La Casa Batlló of the great Antoni Gaudí. It is a large, quiet but exciting  residential area with extremely convenient commercial activity, designed to respect the privacy of the homes. The Catalan modernist architecture so characteristic of stately airs, but with great cosmopolitan touches, extends throughout the neighborhood to the delight of those who wish to live modernism from within, since it is possible to acquire homes within regal estates with valuable original architectural elements, period pieces and even historical and protected. Schools, squares, wadis, parks, stores and restaurants give dynamism to the area that differentiates the Right from the Left, both with wide uniform streets, octagonal islands and wide island interiors that mark the internal distribution of buildings and homes. You will mostly find buildings of strong bricks, floors of generally wide dimensions, medium or high ceilings, with balconies that give to the wide streets or the inner patios of the Cerdá Plan. Keep in mind this living in the Eixample district, if you are looking for a neighborhood where you can have everything within walking distance or very well connected to public transport, both basic and luxury stores, trendy restaurants or even your workplace among the many offices and stores, this could be your neighborhood. If you want to walk among the iconic monuments of the city, with the comfort of equal distance to any other point or neighborhood in the city. Consider Eixample if you are a lover of modernist, stately and typical Catalan architecture and a high street feeling. If you want to live in the vital and cultural epicenter of Barcelona, where everything happens.

description: A complete renovation located in a listed modernist building in a magnificent location, surrounded by a wide selection of boutiques, restaurants and a wide range of tourist attractions. The apartment of 132 square meters includes a social area where we find the entrance hall, a kitchen, living room and a laundry room where all the facilities of the apartment are centralized. The night area includes three bedrooms, two of them with full en suite bathrooms. All of them are equipped with large built-in closets. The kitchen space has been equipped with the Eucalyptus laminate finish model MH6 Rovere, by MODULNOVA. Fully equipped with microwave, refrigerator, dishwasher and extractor hood, all from NEFF. Full induction hob. Black brushed steel taps. The house has a convenient laundry room with Mièle washing machine and dryer placed vertically, one on top of the other. Here are also centralized all the faucets of the different bathrooms and the kitchen. The bedrooms are equipped with bedside furniture, bedside table, overhead lighting and carpeting as appropriate. This magnificent apartment is for sale now for all inquiries and to schedule a viewing please contact us directly. The old Esquerra de l'Eixample is, together with La Dreta de L'Eixample, one of the first areas of the city to be urbanized. It is located in the heart of the city, between Avinguda Diagonal, Balmes street, Gran Via de les Corts Catalanes and Comte d'Urgell street. This neighborhood with a long history is home to some of the most important facilities since the beginning of the urbanization of the city, such as the University of Barcelona, the Hospital Clínic and the emblematic Mercat del Ninot. The numerous regal, classical and modernist estates that fill streets like Aribau, Muntaner, the pedestrian Enric Granados among others, are an example of the Eixample designed by Cerdà. You can find apartments that are beautiful modernist jewels of medium or large size and buildings that have been completely renovated. A good part of the life of the neighborhood happens in the island interiors and the premises of first floors that occupy small new and traditional stores, many restaurants, places of leisure and night clubs. As the nerve center of Barcelona, its communication with the rest of the neighborhoods is excellent by public transport, and if you have a car you should know that it is very desirable to locate one of the few parking spaces with the purchase of your home. You should have Antiga Esquerra de l'Eixample on your list if you want to live in the neighborhood with one of the widest gastronomic offers in the city, with the most emblematic facilities, with a lot of nightlife and if you want to feel the cosmopolitan spirit of the Barcelona neighborhood par excellence.
