description: Magnificent apartment in one of the best residential complexes in the city (L'illa del Cel). The complex is located in the best residential area of Poblenou and is just 2 minutes walk from the beach (a few meters from the beach of La Marbella and Diagonal Mar shopping center). It should not be forgotten that the area is perfectly served by public transport and has a large parking space for car and motorcycle in the same building. The apartment consists of a spacious living-dining room with direct access to a terrace of 12 m2 so it is an area perfectly illuminated by natural light. The living room also connects with an office kitchen perfectly integrated to the living room. In the night area we find the bedroom en suite with fitted closets and a bathroom. It also connects directly to the terrace. Do not forget that the apartment also has central heating and air conditioning already installed fully functional. The residential complex has 24 hour security, outdoor swimming pool of 180 m2, solarium, children's area, green areas, a gym and chillout area on the roof terrace. The district of Diagonal mar i el Front Marítim del Poblenou is one of the 10 districts that make up the district of Sant Martí, in the northeast of Barcelona. Its limits are: Avinguda Diagonal, Carrer de Bac de Roda and the Mediterranean Sea. It is one of the newest neighborhoods of Barcelona, projected from the impulse of the Forum of Cultures held in 2004 in Barcelona. It is a luxury urbanization with green spaces and high-rise buildings and skyscrapers in which the houses are spacious and with impressive views of the Mediterranean Sea and the city. The price per square meter of the houses is one of the highest in Barcelona. With green areas, wide streets, building complexes that take care of every detail, a shopping center and the beaches of Mar Bella and Nova Mar Bella, it has become a very attractive neighborhood. The neighborhood can be easily reached by the Ronda Litoral, although there are also good public transport connections The Diagonal Mar neighborhood is ideal if you prefer ultra-modern apartments with luxury features in Barcelona, where proximity to the sea is a plus. The neighborhood has been designed to have everything you need without leaving it.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Poblenou, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de Llull

description: In one of the most sought after locations in Barcelona we find this charming renovated apartment ready to move into. The main area of this property consists of living room, dining room and open kitchen. This space is characterized by being extremely diaphanous thanks to its large windows overlooking the lung of the block from where abundant natural light enters, especially in the afternoon. The apartment has two double bedrooms, one of them en suite. Both bedrooms have fitted closets. A small terrace, a laundry room and a guest toilet complete the property. Its unbeatable location and its charming style make this property a unique opportunity. Do not hesitate to contact us in case you would like to make a visit. The Eixample district is the most emblematic of Barcelona since the nineteenth century. Of a renowned model urban planning devised by the engineer Ildefons Cerdá, Eixample marks the epicenter of the city from its main streets: The luxurious Passeig de Gràcia, the commercial Rambla de Catalunya and the updated Passeig de Sant Joan, housing the majority of the modernist architectural icons, such as La Sagrada Familia, La Pedrera or La Casa Batlló of the great Antoni Gaudí. It is a large, quiet but exciting  residential area with extremely convenient commercial activity, designed to respect the privacy of the homes. The Catalan modernist architecture so characteristic of stately airs, but with great cosmopolitan touches, extends throughout the neighborhood to the delight of those who wish to live modernism from within, since it is possible to acquire homes within regal estates with valuable original architectural elements, period pieces and even historical and protected. Schools, squares, wadis, parks, stores and restaurants give dynamism to the area that differentiates the Right from the Left, both with wide uniform streets, octagonal islands and wide island interiors that mark the internal distribution of buildings and homes. You will mostly find buildings of strong bricks, floors of generally wide dimensions, medium or high ceilings, with balconies that give to the wide streets or the inner patios of the Cerdá Plan. Keep in mind this living in the Eixample district, if you are looking for a neighborhood where you can have everything within walking distance or very well connected to public transport, both basic and luxury stores, trendy restaurants or even your workplace among the many offices and stores, this could be your neighborhood. If you want to walk among the iconic monuments of the city, with the comfort of equal distance to any other point or neighborhood in the city. Consider Eixample if you are a lover of modernist, stately and typical Catalan architecture and a high street feeling. If you want to live in the vital and cultural epicenter of Barcelona, where everything happens.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Dreta de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Rambla de Catalunya

neighborhood: Sant Pere - Santa Caterina i la Ribera
description: Unlike any other apartment in El Born neighborhood, this brand new and key-ready property with high ceilings is nestled on a high floor of a historic building with an elevator, completely renovated in 2021, and has 6 balconies facing the brightest street in the Old Town. This excellent property was renovated and upgraded a year ago and offers a master suite with a balcony and large fitted closet and full bathroom, another double bedroom with a balcony and fitted wardrobe, and a third guest bedroom with sofa bed and cozy working, both sharing a family bathroom. The Sun-flooded day area is particularly pleasant and consists of an open plan tailor-made kitchen with a large island, dining area with a dining table that sits six people and spacious lounge area with a big sofa. The penthouse is notable for its impeccable design, high Volta Catalana ceilings, natural light wood parquet flooring, and high-quality finishes, which create a perfect blend of traditional architectural features and a modern lifestyle. The home features all new utilities: plumbing, gas, electricity, ventilation, ducted air conditioning and heating, an alarm system, and a custom-made kitchen with an impressive kitchen island. This key-ready and luxury property is a perfect home for your family to enjoy the best of life that Barcelona has to offer and SothebyŽs Barcelona team will be happy to arrange a visit for you. If there is a trendy place for both tourists and locals, it is the dynamic neighborhood of El Born with its particular market, now turned into a museum, after getting some fantastic Roman ruins during its remodeling. It is home to artists, artisans and bohemians, with a myriad of curious and unique stores. Even more famous are its varied restaurants, so many to discover a new one every day. The Santa Caterina market with its roof inspired by the skin of the dragon of Sant Jordi is in itself a work to admire. The Basilica of Santa Maria del Mar, the Palau de la Música, and the green lung of La Ciutadella are some of the important landmarks of this neighborhood. It is a neighborhood to live and to know. Its buildings continue the irregular pattern of the Gothic Quarter, and its streets, although clearer at times, are also narrow. On the first floor of the buildings you can find bars, art galleries, artisan workshops and a host of small and curious businesses. This neighborhood will interest you if you like the bohemian lifestyle, living with the many artisans, tapas and good food, and live in a neighborhood that surprises you with new stores and corners. It is a good location to invest in a pied-à-terre.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Pere - Santa Caterina i la Ribera, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de la Princesa

address: Plaza de la Vila de Madrid
description: Central and high apartment with period details in the Gothic Quarter. Corner apartments are usually the most demanded in the center of Barcelona. This beautiful building with elevator in the Gothic Quarter, is 15 minutes walk from Paseo de Gracia, making route through the Portal de Angel. A magnificent walk along the historic district of the city. It stands out in this property the integral reform carried out in 2021 preserving the modernist character seen in its hydraulic floors, high ceilings and the detail of giving new life to the original wall of the estate of the year 1900. The apartment is distributed in two double bedrooms and two bathrooms. One of the bedrooms has a walking closet that in case of need could be used as a third bedroom. Spacious and bright living room and open kitchen with four balconies. Excellent materials and finishes. Only available with Sotheby's International Realty. The Gothic Quarter is the oldest and most interesting part of the city. It is bounded by Las Ramblas, Via Laietana, Paseo Colón and Plaza de Catalunya, each of these points alone has its own importance and history. With its narrow streets and irregular structure, several of its buildings have been built on the Romanesque remains of the city, so you can get an apartment with at least one wall dating back to Roman times. It is the tourist district par excellence so it represents an assured investment, especially if you are near one of its attractions such as the Cathedral, the Plaza Sant Jaume with the City Hall and the Palace of the Generalitat, the Plaza Real, the famous Rambas, and the Museum of History of the city. The Gothic Quarter could be your neighborhood if you are looking to make a profitable investment or acquire an excellent pied-à-terre in an iconic and storied neighborhood with great history, private buildings, tourism and with all kinds of businesses at hand such as bars, restaurants, libraries, and many magical corners to discover and tour.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Gòtic, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Plaza de la Vila de Madrid

description: This extraordinary south facing penthouse is located on one of the very best micro locations in Eixample, a half-pedestrians treet between Paseo de Gracia and Rambla de Catalunya - two of the most sought after streets in Barcelona. The duplex penthouse consists of two floors. The first floor offers bathroom, kitchen and living area with direct access to a spacious 49 m2 terrace with impressive city views and views of some of the most emblematic buildings of Barcelona. The second floor upstairs offers three bedrooms and another bathroom. There are radiators for heating and A/C conduct for both cooling and heating. The building is a heritage property in Barcelona and offers a very beautiful entrance with character and details from the 19th Century architecture. Combined with the truly unique location, this penthouse is an opportunity not to miss out on! La Dreta de L’Eixample begins in Plaça de Catalunya and its central axis revolves around the Passeig de Gràcia and the Cuadrat d’Or. It is delimited from the busy Calle Balmes to the renovated Passeig de Sant Joan and from the commercial Ronda Sant Pere to the convenient Avinguda Diagonal. It is one of the most expensive and exclusive neighborhoods in Barcelona, along with Pedralbes and Sarrià-Sant Gervasi. It is impossible not to make reference to the luxury of Passeig de Gràcia, with the boutiques of the most exclusive brands in the world, or to the stores on La Rambla de Catalunya. However, the rest of its streets are as or more interesting. In them resided part of the Catalan textile bourgeoisie of the early twentieth century, which has left its mark on the spectacular royal estates and modernist houses designed by the most famous architects of the time, as the Pedrera or Casa Batlló of the great Antoni Gaudí. As a result, the characteristic homes of this neighborhood are spacious apartments with high ceilings, moldings, elaborate flooring and balconies. Many buildings and apartments preserve this original architectural heritage and it is possible to find recently remodeled apartments, penthouses, lofts and even studios, which revive these elements, as well as apartments with a lot of potential to be reformed. This side of L’Eixample is equipped with all kinds of services and stores, as well as educational centers, mainly state-subsidized and private schools. You will find it very easy to move around on foot or through the public transport connections to the most expensive stores and restaurants in the city. The Eixample Dreta is the best neighborhood if you want to admire and live in the noble zone of the fascinating Catalan modernism, to reside in one of its characteristic regal estates, and to coexist in perfect balance with the vibrant and luxurious commercial life. It is ideal if you want to walk every day through its wide and tidy streets, with easy transport connections, have all kinds of services and facilities available, including arranged or private schools, and enjoy the most chic, cultural and cosmopolitan atmosphere in Barcelona.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Dreta de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle de la Diputació

description: Wonderful apartment located in a beautiful building right in front of the Basilica de la Merce, in the noblest area of the Gothic Quarter of Barcelona, very close to the port of Barcelona, a few minutes walk from the Rambla and also close to the beach of Barceloneta, besides being next to fantastic restaurants and stores that characterize this neighborhood. The apartment was completely renovated about 4 years ago, but it has hardly been used, so the condition is perfect, in addition to the fact that very good quality materials have been used and the distribution has been greatly improved over the previous state. The apartment has a living room with open kitchen and a balcony overlooking the Basilica de la Merce, an exterior double bedroom also with balcony with the same southeast orientation and its own bathroom with shower. Further inside the apartment, there is a double bedroom facing the interior of the block, a single bedroom, a bathroom with shower and a toilet. The price of the apartment includes all the furniture such as tables, chairs, beds, as well as the kitchen appliances such as the coffee machine and various utensils such as crockery, cutlery, etc., but does not include personal effects such as paintings and art. The building does not have an elevator, but the apartment is a first floor, so you can access the apartment comfortably. The entrance of the property is also beautiful, as it has the original elements characteristic of the 1900s. The Gothic Quarter is the oldest and most interesting part of the city. It is bounded by Las Ramblas, Via Laietana, Paseo Colón and Plaza de Catalunya, each of these points alone has its own importance and history. With its narrow streets and irregular structure, several of its buildings have been built on the Romanesque remains of the city, so you can get an apartment with at least one wall dating back to Roman times. It is the tourist district par excellence so it represents an assured investment, especially if you are near one of its attractions such as the Cathedral, the Plaza Sant Jaume with the City Hall and the Palace of the Generalitat, the Plaza Real, the famous Rambas, and the Museum of History of the city. The Gothic Quarter could be your neighborhood if you are looking to make a profitable investment or acquire an excellent pied-à-terre in an iconic and storied neighborhood with great history, private buildings, tourism and with all kinds of businesses at hand such as bars, restaurants, libraries, and many magical corners to discover and tour.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Gòtic, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle dels Còdols

description: We find this property in one of the city's most important areas, surrounded by leisure options, such as restaurants and bars, and with easy access to any part of the city thanks to its proximity to the most important public transport stops in the city, such as Provenza station, Paseo de Gracia or Plaza Cataluña. The apartment is characterized by its spaciousness and large spaces. Its almost one hundred and eighty meters of surface allow you to have access to both the street and the lung of the block with balconies on both sides. It consists of three bedrooms, two of them single and one double; two bathrooms; a laundry room; a study / office space; the open kitchen and the spacious living-dining room. The apartment has been renovated a few years ago and has had very little use, managing to maintain an almost brand new look. It has special features, such as double glazing in the windows, allowing to completely soundproof the rooms overlooking the street, and its central air conditioning system hot and cold, ensuring maximum comfort for the future owner. If you wish to have a property in the heart of Barcelona with unique features, do not hesitate to contact us to arrange a visit. The old Esquerra de l'Eixample is, together with La Dreta de L'Eixample, one of the first areas of the city to be urbanized. It is located in the heart of the city, between Avinguda Diagonal, Balmes street, Gran Via de les Corts Catalanes and Comte d'Urgell street. This neighborhood with a long history is home to some of the most important facilities since the beginning of the urbanization of the city, such as the University of Barcelona, the Hospital Clínic and the emblematic Mercat del Ninot. The numerous regal, classical and modernist estates that fill streets like Aribau, Muntaner, the pedestrian Enric Granados among others, are an example of the Eixample designed by Cerdà. You can find apartments that are beautiful modernist jewels of medium or large size and buildings that have been completely renovated. A good part of the life of the neighborhood happens in the island interiors and the premises of first floors that occupy small new and traditional stores, many restaurants, places of leisure and night clubs. As the nerve center of Barcelona, its communication with the rest of the neighborhoods is excellent by public transport, and if you have a car you should know that it is very desirable to locate one of the few parking spaces with the purchase of your home. You should have Antiga Esquerra de l'Eixample on your list if you want to live in the neighborhood with one of the widest gastronomic offers in the city, with the most emblematic facilities, with a lot of nightlife and if you want to feel the cosmopolitan spirit of the Barcelona neighborhood par excellence.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: L'Antiga Esquerra de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de Balmes

description: Unique property of 77 m2 and 40 m2 of terrace for private use on the seafront in Barceloneta. The property has a private entrance from the street with video intercom and keypad, which allows you to enjoy a day at the beach without having to carry your house keys with you. To enter you go up some stairs that lead to the second floor where you will find the spectacular and cozy corner apartment of 77 m2 with 2 large balconies and two double bedrooms, and with the possibility of having a third single room in a space that is currently unified to the beautiful living - dining room with pine wood floors with white brossé finish and open kitchen integrated to the living room made of natural wood and Neff appliances. Both the bedrooms and the living room enjoy fabulous natural light and incomparable views of the sea and the promenade of the Ciutat Comtal, and have been decorated in a fresh and warm beach style of white and natural wood. Next to the living room is a large bathroom completely renovated with nice finishes and window facing the street. By the same stairs that lead us to the house we go up to the magnificent private terrace of 40 m2 with panoramic views that take our breath away and finely decorated with comfortable bamboo furniture, fabulous stainless steel bathtub and beautifully illuminated to enjoy the warm summer nights. The property has ducted air, fiber optics, and parking space for motorcycle and car at the front door when registering as a resident of the neighborhood. A beach house in the city to enjoy an eternal vacation.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Barceloneta, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Moll de Pescadors

description: Stunning property in a townhouse built in 1900 that belongs to only two owners, each with their own separate entrance and no common areas to share. The house is located in a beautiful and quiet passage just around the corner from the imposing Sagrada Familia, the masterpiece of the imaginative Antoni Gaudi. In fact, the houses in this passage were among the first to be built during the period when work on the famous monument was beginning. The house has a direct entrance from the passage, and is accessed by a beautiful interior staircase. On the first level is the large living-dining room and the beautiful open kitchen that leads to a spectacular interior patio of 18 m² with abundant vegetation, which one could say is like an oasis in the middle of the bustle of Barcelona. In addition, on this same floor there is a beautiful full bathroom with hydro-massage bathtub with aromatherapy, and a full laundry room for the washer and dryer. Because the owners did not need more than 1 bedroom, they opened up the main floor spaces to house a large office area and located the master bedroom on the second floor. In the event that new interested parties would like to have 1 bedroom, or even 2 bedrooms on this floor, the current owner offers to do the work and include it in the price, as it is very easy and quick to do. Following the stairs, you access the second floor, where you will find the master bedroom with a large private bathroom and fitted closets, as well as having another private living room overlooking the courtyard below that we described. But it does not end here, if you follow the stairs, on the roof of the house, you will find the magnificent terrace of 44 m² with direct views over the towers of the Sagrada Familia simply unique in its kind. An ideal place to escape from the outside world and enjoy total tranquility. The renovation of the house was done only a few years ago, and was carried out in great detail using only quality materials, also the property is delivered fully furnished with high-end furniture, decorative elements and all appliances to enter to live from day one. The Sagrada Familia district is located in the north of the Eixample district, from Passeig de Sant Joan to Encants and from Avinguda Diagonal to the gates of the historic Modernist complex of the Hospital de Sant Pau. It was formerly the Poblet of rural houses in which Ildefons Cerdá's grid was imposed, The character of this residential neighborhood is strongly marked by its basilica-monument; living around this jewel of Antoni Gaudí revalues any property, makes it very attractive for tourists and investors, and makes it the pride of its quiet local residents. The streets surrounding the basilica receive visitors at specific times, so in general terms, it is a very dynamic neighborhood by day and very quiet at night. Its architecture mixes buildings of more recent construction with respect to l'Eixample and other royal estates from whose attics, terraces and higher floors the work of Gaudí is contemplated. The floors are of medium size, with standard height ceilings in those of new construction and higher ceilings in the old solid brick estates. Walking along Gaudi Avenue, which connects La Sagrada Familia with the Hospital de Sant Pau, allows you to admire the booming commerce around tourism without forgetting the complete facilities for residents. Hospitals, civic centers, libraries, parks, public schools and efficient public transport connections, give service and life to this neighborhood of tourist interest but also family.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Sagrada Família, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Avenida de Gaudí

description: It is a stately royal estate from 1900, in a good state of preservation, located just two blocks from Plaça Catalunya and Passeig de Gràcia. This cozy renovated apartment, partly retains the style of the time, as are its high ceilings recovered with Catalan twist that give it a very cozy and Barcelona air. It is located on a fifth floor with a very functional distribution, making the most of all the spaces, giving it a lot of comfort and convenience. Upon entering we find a large hall from which you access a room that could be double with window to the hallway. From the hall, to one side, we find a double door leading to a hallway that distributes to one side, a small bathroom with shower. Next to this, another large bathroom with bathtub and window to the inner courtyard. In front, we find a large open space where is the living room with large window, with outside exit through a balcony and overlooking a quiet inner courtyard typical of the Eixample, facing northeast. Adjoining this room, there is a large semi-open fully equipped kitchen with dining area and access to the balcony. Outside there is a small machine room for washing machine, dryer and heating boiler. On the other side of the hall we find the night area which consists of a large double bedroom with access to the balcony overlooking the street, facing southwest, which provides plenty of light for much of the day. Next to this, we find another large double bedroom also with access to the balcony and overlooking the Plaza Urquinaona. Ideal for those looking for a home in the heart of the city or a pied a terre, in an unbeatable location. It is located in one of the best areas of the Eixample where the Catalan bourgeoisie used to live. It is currently a booming area where entire buildings have been rehabilitated to transform them into apartments and luxury hotels, which has returned to the neighborhood its former splendor. Close to Plaça Urquinaona, Plaça Catalunya and Passeig de Gràcia, one of the most prestigious streets in the city. A few minutes from the Born district and the Palau de la Música. Provided with all the necessary services; public transport, supermarkets, gyms, schools, etc. La Dreta de L'Eixample begins in Plaça de Catalunya and its central axis revolves around the Passeig de Gràcia and the Cuadrat d'Or. It is delimited from the busy Calle Balmes to the renovated Passeig de Sant Joan and from the commercial Ronda Sant Pere to the convenient Avinguda Diagonal. It is one of the most expensive and exclusive neighborhoods in Barcelona, along with Pedralbes and Sarrià-Sant Gervasi. It is impossible not to make reference to the luxury of Passeig de Gràcia, with the boutiques of the most exclusive brands in the world, or to the stores on La Rambla de Catalunya. However, the rest of its streets are as or more interesting. In them resided part of the Catalan textile bourgeoisie of the early twentieth century, which has left its mark on the spectacular royal estates and modernist houses designed by the most famous architects of the time, as the Pedrera or Casa Batlló of the great Antoni Gaudí. As a result, the characteristic homes of this neighborhood are spacious apartments with high ceilings, moldings, elaborate flooring and balconies. Many buildings and apartments preserve this original architectural heritage and it is possible to find recently remodeled apartments, penthouses, lofts and even studios, which revive these elements, as well as apartments with a lot of potential to be reformed.

suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de Roger de Llúria

description: La Bonanova, located in the upper area of Barcelona, stands out for offering one of the best city lifestyles. It is a residential area, perfect for those looking to live close to the city centre but in a distinguished, familiar and quiet environment. In a Mediterranean-style building, we find this wonderful design apartment that was recently refurbished with exquisite taste by one of the most renowned studios in Barcelona. The property has a built area of 200m2 and has plenty of natural light in all its rooms, as it is a semi-detached apartment. It is distributed in a 11m2 entrance hall with three accesses. On the right side there is a guest toilet, followed by a large 23m2 office kitchen which can also be directly accessed from the parking. Two double bedrooms share a full bathroom on the left side of the room. One of them, the 14m2 bedroom, has access to a lovely and large balcony. The other one of 24m2, can be used as a professional office, as it has an independent access from the staircase. Straight from the entrance hall, we access what is currently the 7m2 library (although the area is easily adaptable for another use), and from here, there is a very large and bright 31m2 living-dining room that leads out to a splendid terrace of 21m2. The 19m2 corner master suite with a full bathroom and dressing room adjoins the living room. It is worth mentioning that the apartment has high-end finishes, such as parquet flooring, double glazing, painted wooden exterior carpentry, hardwood interior carpentry and security front door. It also comes with central heating, fibre optics, and telephone installation. The property has only four neighbours and a concierge service. The price includes two parking spaces in the same building. Luxury furniture, natural light and tranquillity. AREA: Sarrià - Sant Gervasi - Sant Gervasi - La Bonanova. PUBLIC TRANSPORT: Railways (La Bonanova), Bus and Bicing.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Gervasi - Galvany, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de Freixa

description: This luxurious apartment with an area of 183 m² is located one street away from Paseo de Gracia and the famous Pedrera (Casa Mila), surrounded by all the necessary services to live. It is a high floor in a modernist building from 1897, has three bedrooms, an office and two bathrooms. The house is divided into a day area and a night area. Upon entering the house, we access the day area to the right of the entrance. We find a spacious living-dining room, which leads to a beautiful gallery that gives the house a lot of light thanks to the height of the windows. From the gallery you can appreciate the views to the Pedrera. The kitchen, large, fully equipped and adjacent to the dining room. Also next to it is the bathroom and a single bedroom. In the night area we find a double bedroom and the majestic master suite. This suite consists of the sleeping area, separate dressing room and bathroom. Both the bedroom and the dressing room have double balcony doors through which we access the balcony of Pau Claris street and that perfectly insulate from noise. The house was completely renovated around 2004 and we can appreciate how original elements have been preserved and restored, such as moldings, doors, frames, windows and balcony doors, in addition to the Catalan volta that could be recovered. The whole house has natural wood parquet flooring, except for the kitchen and bathrooms. The heating and air conditioning are distributed by ducts. It has an elevator. La Dreta de L’Eixample begins in Plaça de Catalunya and its central axis revolves around the Passeig de Gràcia and the Cuadrat d’Or. As a result, the characteristic homes of this neighborhood are spacious apartments with high ceilings, moldings, elaborate flooring and balconies. Many buildings and apartments preserve this original architectural heritage and it is possible to find recently remodeled apartments, penthouses, lofts and even studios, which revive these elements, as well as apartments with a lot of potential to be reformed. This side of L’Eixample is equipped with all kinds of services and stores, as well as educational centers, mainly state-subsidized and private schools. You will find it very easy to move around on foot or through the public transport connections to the most expensive stores and restaurants in the city. The Eixample Dreta is the best neighborhood if you want to admire and live in the noble zone of the fascinating Catalan modernism, to reside in one of its characteristic regal estates, and to coexist in perfect balance with the vibrant and luxurious commercial life. suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de Roger de Llúria

description: This beautiful apartment is a modernist jewel located on a typical street in the Old Town in Barcelona, surrounded by medieval architecture and charm while having all the amenities you could wish for just a short walk away. The apartment has been completely rehabilitated and offers also plenty of functionality. Upon entering you have a storage and wardrobe room that is a very important element, together with an additional storage room where the wine is stored. The open kitchen and living area is a true beauty of a space that combines modern touch with original features like the moldings in the ceilings and the unique hydraulic floor tiles which are extremely sought after elements in Barcelona. Both bedroom spaces are relatively big where the master bedroom enjoys a private bathroom and a decent sized balcony to enjoy outdoor space in the quiet courtyard. There is also a second bathroom available. The building does not offer elevator but is in process of a complete rehabilitation with utmost attention to detail and heritage elements that the Town Hall requires to be restored and respected. Location wise the property is very strategic where Las Ramblas, the Boqueria market and the seaside are a short walking distance away. El Raval has been one of the neighborhoods that has turned in a more spectacular way its composition from having a bad reputation, perhaps because of its origins outside the walls in the beginnings of the city, to a bohemian neighborhood with a multicultural atmosphere. A lot of terraces, bars and restaurants, as well as fashion stores have opened space in the neighborhood along with craftsmen and artists who want to keep their galleries near the Museum of Contemporary Art of Barcelona and the Center of Contemporary Culture accessible by walking along the famous Ramblas of Barcelona. The Palau Güell and the Boqueria are guaranteed tourist attractions. This neighborhood of contrasts still has a lot of room for improvement, but it is possible that the current boom and push will give it an image similar to that of El Born in the not too distant future, opening up an investment opportunity with great possibilities for revaluation. El Raval can be the right neighborhood if you want to buy an apartment as a medium term investment, since even being in the center of the city, its price per square meter is still economical and with great potential for revaluation due to the urban improvements projected for the future of this neighborhood.

description: Exclusive apartment for sale in Eixample Dreta, Barcelona Exclusive house in a royal building with elevator in the ''Quadrat d'Or'', in the heart of l'Eixample Dret, the neighborhood known for its Catalan modernist buildings, including World Heritage buildings such as La Pedrera or Casa Batlló. On the farm you can breathe a calm and enveloping atmosphere, cozy and pleasant.  This property has a built area of 139m², distributed in a spacious and bright living-dining room with large windows that allow plenty of natural light to enter and with access to the pleasant balcony overlooking Pau Claris street.  The kitchen is independent, fully equipped with high quality appliances. It has sliding doors that allow you to leave it semi-open for greater comfort.  The night area consists of 3 rooms; the main one en-suite with a bathtub and with access to a nice private balcony. A double room and a single room and another bathroom that serves the rest of the house.  It comes decorated with quality designer furniture and retains original architectural elements of the time such as the high 3.40m ceilings with moldings. SMEG appliances, gas heating by radiators, air conditioning, parquet floors and climalit aluminum windows. North and south orientation.  Located on a street parallel to the emblematic Paseo de Gracia street, surrounded by exclusive brand boutiques and restaurants, leisure areas, parks and gardens and very well connected to public transport.

description: Exclusive house with terrace and private pool in Sant Gervasi- La Bonanova, Barcelona We present this exclusive property, located a short distance from Plaza Kennedy, in a quiet street with few neighbors, in one of the best areas of Barcelona, the La Bonanova Sant Gervasi neighborhood.  It has an area of 200m2 built on one floor, and a very good distribution with double orientation. East orientation, to enjoy the morning sun from the large outdoor area of almost 70m2 with its private pool and views of gardens and green areas, and to the West with afternoon sun in the bedroom area, with also access to another terrace.  It has a large hall, to the right the day area: large living room that allows various rooms with access to the garden terrace with pool, a spacious and practical equipped kitchen-office, water area and a toilet.  On the left, a distributor of the night area with the 4 bedrooms: the junior suite, with its bathroom, 2 double bedrooms, and a complete bathroom for both, and then the master suite, with large closets and its complete bathroom. All bedrooms have fitted wardrobes and access to the 12m2 rear terrace  It has top quality finishes and many exclusive decorative details, parquet floors, central heating and air through ducts, marble in the bathrooms.. .  The farm is from 1997, and has a 24-hour concierge service, and 2 elevators, which offers maximum privacy and exclusivity. The price offers parking on the farm for 4 cars and motorcycles, and a spacious storage room. The property is very well preserved, so it allows you to move into.  Apart from being one of the most appreciated residential neighbourhoods, it is very well connected through quick access through the Ronda de Dalt, 20 minutes from El Prat airport, and also by bus and railways to other areas of the city. Here we find the best private schools and international universities, as well as renowned clinics and sports centers.  An exclusive property in a privileged location.

description: Wonderful 110 m² apartment with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms on the top floor of a stately building with concierge service on Rambla de Catalunya, in the heart of the city.  Upon entering the apartment, an exposed brick hall leads to a bright bedroom with a built-in wardrobe to the left and access to a small terrace. In front, there is a bathroom with a shower and a window. Next, we find the perfectly equipped kitchen with Bosch appliances, an induction hob and a dining room for 6 people. The apartment also has a utility room with a Miele washer and dryer, plus a large built-in linen cupboard.  In the living room we find a sofa, a large Samsung TV and two large windows with views of a beautiful Eixample patio. The second bedroom is the main one, facing outwards and has two built-in wardrobes and a private bathroom with microcement flooring, two sinks, storage space, a shower and a hydromassage bathtub.  Additional features of this apartment include a water softening system in the kitchen, heating, air conditioning, parquet flooring and Gradhermetic shutters.  Contact us today to make an appointment.

The building has all the details of classic Barcelona architecture, with a wooden gate, a classic façade and iron balconies.  The apartment for sale is located on the main floor of the building, the main floor at the time of construction, so it has the highest ceilings.  The property is newly renovated and decorated, ready to move into. It has a fully functional layout, with a spacious living room - dining room with exterior views and connected to a fully equipped high-quality kitchen.  In addition, it has a guest toilet next to the day area.  In the night area, we find an interior en-suite room and two rooms with views of the block patio. One of them is a master suite with a bathroom in the gallery, which gives it a charming touch.  From the third room, there is access to a spectacular 30 m 2 terrace facing the courtyard of the block.  In short, it is an opportunity that you should not hesitate to visit.

description: Ideally located on the edge of the Parc de la Ciutat and without vis-a-vis, we find this charming apartment with hydraulic floors and moldings, in a recently renovated Finca Regia. To the left of the entrance we find the day area with a very bright living room that formerly consisted of three bedrooms that have been opened to gain volume and luminosity. We also find an open kitchen with all the necessary equipment as well as a wine cellar. Note that this kitchen can be completely discreet thanks to the sliding doors if necessary. There is also a bathroom and a separate toilet. To the right of the entrance is the sleeping area with 3 bedrooms, two of them double and one single, a bathroom and storage cupboards. The bedrooms are located at the back of the building, calm reigns there. If there is a trendy place for both tourists and locals, it is the dynamic neighborhood of El Born with its particular market, now turned into a museum, after getting some fantastic Roman ruins during its remodeling. It is home to artists, artisans and bohemians, with a myriad of curious and unique stores. Even more famous are its varied restaurants, so many to discover a new one every day. The Santa Caterina market with its roof inspired by the skin of the dragon of Sant Jordi is in itself a work to admire. The Basilica of Santa Maria del Mar, the Palau de la Música, and the green lung of La Ciutadella are some of the important landmarks of this neighborhood. It is a neighborhood to live and to know. Its buildings continue the irregular pattern of the Gothic Quarter, and its streets, although clearer at times, are also narrow. On the first floor of the buildings you can find bars, art galleries, artisan workshops and a host of small and curious businesses. This neighborhood will interest you if you like the bohemian lifestyle, living with the many artisans, tapas and good food, and live in a neighborhood that surprises you with new stores and corners. It is a good location to invest in a pied-à-terre.

description: Spectacular three-storey bohemian style loft of 241 sqm with access to garden is located in an old factory (without certificate of occupancy) in the best area of Poble Sec, so it is perfectly connected to public transport. Its unbeatable location allows you to enjoy the best leisure and commercial offers of the city at the same time of what nature and tranquility can offer. The loft is accessed through a quiet and peaceful passageway. Once inside the house, its 5-meter high ceilings and large windows that bathe the entire apartment in natural light catch the eye. At the level of distribution we have three open floors composed of five rooms of which two bedrooms are doubles (one en suite) and a bathroom per floor. The main floor is completed by a large living room and an open kitchen. In addition, the house has underfloor heating and gas radiators. The property does not have its own parking, but there are numerous private parking lots nearby to park the vehicle. Contact us to visit this fantastic loft with garden access in the heart of one of the most vibrant neighborhoods of Barcelona. In the district of Sants – Montjuïc you will find the Poble Sec district, at the foot of the Montjuïc mountain, one of the most traditional, cultural districts, with a quiet, village-like atmosphere, but also with a very particular leisure offer. It is delimited by the Av. del Paral. lel, carrer de Lleida and Passeig de Josep Carner. It is a central and well connected neighborhood. A popular neighborhood, surrounded by green areas and sports areas in Montjuïc. The neighborhood is formed by narrow streets in slopes, of moderate commercial activity. In this neighborhood is the largest theater in Barcelona that takes place in the Avinguda Paral. lel, the most important of Poble Sec. We find the Teatro Apolo, Teatro Victoria, El Molino or the Teatro Condal. The characteristics of housing in the neighborhood are very different. You can find small houses, buildings of one, two, three or more floors, with elevator, without elevator, reformed and without reforming. The prices per square meter are average for Barcelona. Poble Sec can be an excellent option for investing in rental apartments, since it is an area that attracts many young people because of its dynamism.

description: Excellent renovated and impeccable apartment, in exclusive, in Drassanes, close to the statue of Columbus and the port of Maremagnum, completely renovated in an impeccable, charismatic, quiet and above all very well maintained property. It consists of a complete bathroom, a private terrace of 45m2, 2 bedrooms of which one is single, and a complete, integrated and open kitchen. Ideal to live with tranquility and its wonderful terrace or as an investment with a return of 5.30%. El Raval has been one of the neighborhoods that has turned in a more spectacular way its composition from having a bad reputation, perhaps because of its origins outside the walls in the beginnings of the city, to a bohemian neighborhood with a multicultural atmosphere. A lot of terraces, bars and restaurants, as well as fashion stores have opened space in the neighborhood along with craftsmen and artists who want to keep their galleries near the Museum of Contemporary Art of Barcelona and the Center of Contemporary Culture accessible by walking along the famous Ramblas of Barcelona. The Palau Güell and the Boqueria are guaranteed tourist attractions. This neighborhood of contrasts still has a lot of room for improvement, but it is possible that the current boom and push will give it an image similar to that of El Born in the not too distant future, opening up an investment opportunity with great possibilities for revaluation. El Raval can be the right neighborhood if you want to buy an apartment as a medium term investment, since even being in the center of the city, its price per square meter is still economical and with great potential for revaluation due to the urban improvements projected for the future of this neighborhood.

description: This apartment is located in one of the best areas of the Eixample, surrounded by historical monuments and some of the most beautiful buildings in Barcelona. It consists of 157 m2 built. Upon entering, you notice an authentic and restored marble floor from 1926, which creates a unique character of this newly renovated property. The reception area is filled with built-in wardrobes and has access to a guest toilet. Furthermore, the entrance area perfectly divides the spaces between the bedrooms and the large living room. The apartment offers a modern and open plan fully equipped kitchen with oven, dishwasher, fridge and freezer. The kitchen is connected to the large living room with three large panoramic windows and the entrance to the balconies. Thanks to the large space, the apartment enjoys plenty of natural light and beautiful views of the street and the facade. Furthermore, there is even the possibility to add an additional bedroom in the spacious living room if necessary. The other side of the apartment consists of two spacious bedrooms, both with en-suite bathrooms and exit to the lovely interior terrace. In addition, the master bedroom enjoys a walk-in wardrobe. The location of this recently renovated property is paramount considering its distance to Plaza Catalunya, Paseo de Gracia, Parc Ciutadella, Arc de Triomf and the old town. The area also offers the best gastronomy of the Eixample and high-end fashion shops. The Eixample district is the most emblematic of Barcelona since the nineteenth century. Of a renowned model urban planning devised by the engineer Ildefons Cerdá, Eixample marks the epicenter of the city from its main streets: The luxurious Passeig de Gràcia, the commercial Rambla de Catalunya and the updated Passeig de Sant Joan, housing the majority of the modernist architectural icons, such as La Sagrada Familia, La Pedrera or La Casa Batlló of the great Antoni Gaudí. It is a large, quiet but exciting  residential area with extremely convenient commercial activity, designed to respect the privacy of the homes. The Catalan modernist architecture so characteristic of stately airs, but with great cosmopolitan touches, extends throughout the neighborhood to the delight of those who wish to live modernism from within, since it is possible to acquire homes within regal estates with valuable original architectural elements, period pieces and even historical and protected. Schools, squares, wadis, parks, stores and restaurants give dynamism to the area that differentiates the Right from the Left, both with wide uniform streets, octagonal islands and wide island interiors that mark the internal distribution of buildings and homes. You will mostly find buildings of strong bricks, floors of generally wide dimensions, medium or high ceilings, with balconies that give to the wide streets or the inner patios of the Cerdá Plan. Keep in mind this living in the Eixample district, if you are looking for a neighborhood where you can have everything within walking distance or very well connected to public transport, both basic and luxury stores, trendy restaurants or even your workplace among the many offices and stores, this could be your neighborhood. If you want to walk among the iconic monuments of the city, with the comfort of equal distance to any other point or neighborhood in the city. Consider Eixample if you are a lover of modernist, stately and typical Catalan architecture and a high street feeling. If you want to live in the vital and cultural epicenter of Barcelona, where everything happens.

description: Fantastic house in one of the most exclusive area of Bonanova, close to international schools.  Property of 265m2 built with a sensational garden of 103m2 with jacuzzi, chill out area and table to gather all the family and friends.  This 4-storey house with elevator offers 4 double bedrooms, a total of 3 bathrooms and a guest toilet. We also find a basement with a large storage room, with the possibility of making the laundry room in that area and direct access to the garage with space for 3 cars.  The second floor is distributed by a large living-dining room with access to the terrace, perfect to enjoy the best meetings and activities. Next to the dining room is an open kitchen equipped with high quality equipment, plenty of storage space and a large countertop. On this floor there is also a guest toilet.  The second floor has 2 double bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The 2 bedrooms are spacious with large windows that provide great natural light throughout the day. Both bedrooms are connected by a shared bathroom with shower. In the distributor of the floor we will see another bathroom with bathtub. The third floor offers a large bedroom with large windows that receives great entry of light, with full bathroom and a dressing room. Connected to the bedroom and bathroom we find a second room that could be used as an office or bedroom.  The fourth floor has a terrace of 54m2 with wonderful views of the city and the sea.  All floors, from the basement to the fourth floor, are interconnected through an elevator. Located in a location that provides direct connection to the Ronda de Dalt, it is perfect for active people who also want to enjoy their home and free time. A unique opportunity to live in a comfortable and modern home in one of the best areas of our city.

description: This magnificent penthouse is located on the eighth floor of a building in perfect condition, with an elevator and with the ITE in force. The property is completely renovated and has a large garden terrace, furnished, with a wooden deck and unobstructed views of much of the city.    The penthouse consists of a living room and an open kitchen that takes center stage thanks to the natural stone bar from Brazil, which serves as a countertop and dining table. The living room area has a large custom-made sofa and direct access to the terrace. Likewise, we also find a double room with a hidden bed, which can be considered a multifunctional space or bedroom.    At the other end of the house, we find the master bedroom suite, with a dressing room and a complete bathroom with access to the outside water area of the house. Next to this bedroom, we find another full bathroom that serves the rest of the property.    The reform, with high qualities, respects some traditional elements (such as the exposed beams in the kitchen area) and adds contemporary touches, such as the large terrace as the cornerstone of the attic.

description: Excellent high floor apartment to renovate with potential in Paseo de Gracia. Excellent opportunity in the heart of Paseo de Gracia and "Quadrat d'Or" ("Golden Square", in the best block of the area. This 81 built sqm flat offers spectacular views of Casa Batlló and Paseo de Gracia, one of the most sought-after avenues in Europe for its emblematic architecture, including Gaudí's La Pedrera, and its boutiques and prestigious institutions such as consulates and the Barcelona Stock Exchange. The property is in a state to be modernised and offers many possibilities for refurbishment to adapt it to the buyer's liking. It's very bright and quiet, as it's on the 5th floor and enjoys a south orientation. The living-dining room allows to differentiate the two ambiences and has a large window in which to enjoy the wonderful views of Paseo de Gracia. The kitchen is separate but could be opened to the living room. The night area features 2 double bedrooms: the main one en suite with dressing room and the other one is interior. Currently, the flat has a large bathroom with bathtub, but it's very easy to take advantage of the renovation that the property requires to create a second bathroom. This property is equipped with parquet flooring, double glazed exterior carpentry and ducted hot/cold air conditioning. It's located in a corner building with 24 hour concierge service and lift. This is a unique opportunity to live in one of the best areas of Barcelona, just a few steps from the city centre and with the best services, restaurants, shops, boutiques, shopping centres and offices in the surrounding area. The connection by public transport is perfect, with the rest of the city, the towns of the metropolitan area, the airport and the AVE (high speed train) at Sants station. Do not hesitate to contact Bcn Advisors to visit this apartment.

description: The beautifully restored facade of this medieval building, located in the very heart of the Born district, hides 400 years of history full of countless stories and events. Today the story continues, thanks to the complete restoration of its entrails, to offer 10 apartments with modern finishes wrapped in the essence of the Born neighborhood, where you can enjoy memorable days in the future. The apartment, located on the third floor with plenty of natural light, has a living room, a dining room and an open kitchen, plus a master double bedroom with fitted closets, another double bedroom also with fitted closets and a bathroom with shower to share. The apartment has been renovated with quality materials, such as white oak parquet floors, Santos brand kitchens, NEFF brand appliances, although the real protagonists are the recovered hydraulic floors, the centenary wooden beams, as well as its beautiful exposed brick walls. The apartments are delivered with furniture and a storage room can be purchased for 10.000€. The amenities of this building also stand out, since an elevator has been installed at the main entrance level for good access to the apartments, the roof has become a cozy communal terrace, and has enabled a community room where each owner has its own wine cellar to keep their best wines and enjoy them in the company of neighbors. If there is a trendy place for both tourists and locals, it is the dynamic neighborhood of El Born with its particular market, now converted into a museum, after getting some fantastic Roman ruins during its remodeling. It is home to artists, craftsmen and bohemians, with an infinite number of curious and unique stores, which we probably wouldn't have enough time to get to know all of them in years. Even more famous are its restaurants with so much variety to discover a new one every day. The Santa Caterina market with its ceiling inspired by the dragon skin of Sant Jordi is in itself a work of art to be admired. The Basilica of Santa Maria del Mar, the Palau de la Música, and the green lung of La Ciutadella are some of the important landmarks of this neighborhood. It is a neighborhood to live in and to know. Its buildings continue the irregular pattern of the Gothic Quarter, and its streets, although at times more uncluttered, are also narrow. In the basement of the buildings you can find bars of author, art galleries, workshops of craftsmen and stop counting. Sant Pere, Santa Catarina and the Born are interesting neighborhoods for you if you like the bohemian lifestyle, living with multiple artisans, the tapas and good food, living in a neighborhood that surprises you with new stores and corners to discover every time, and an excellent location to invest in a pied-à-terre.

It is located in a historic building from 1890 which has been recently refurbished with a glazed lift in its inner courtyard. The property, of 86m2 built based on the floor map, has been completely refurbished using top quality materials and finishes. It has a modern and functional design in perfect harmony with its original elements such as the Catalan vaulted ceilings with wooden beams and the perfectly recovered stone and brick walls. It stands out for its great luminosity, being all its rooms exterior. The flat consists of an entrance hall, a spacious living-dining room with access to a balcony, an open plan kitchen with marble worktop, induction hob and top brand appliances. There are two exterior double bedrooms en suite with dressing room, one of which has access to a balcony. The two bathrooms have large format porcelain tiled walls, black taps and wall-mounted radiator. It has natural oak parquet floors, a complete lighting system with spotlights in all rooms and has heating, air conditioning and hot water by aerothermal system. A great opportunity to acquire a beautiful property in one of the most sought-after areas of El Born.  .

description: Flat with community pool in the Eixample, Barcelona In a privileged location in the Eixample Dret of Barcelona, we find this wonderful home in a stately modernist building completely renovated in 2016 with the utmost sensitivity to maintain the air of the early twentieth century, with the practicality and modernity of today's needs. The flat has 96 sqm, and from a wide corridor you can access a large living-dining room and an open kitchen with a large and comfortable island that separates the rooms, two bedrooms, one of them en-suite, and two complete bathrooms. The property has magnificent high ceilings with Catalan vaulting, high quality finishes and appliances, and has gas heating and air conditioning by duct. The property also has an exclusive community area with a swimming pool and solarium on the roof of the building and a large gymnasium in the basement.

description: Magnificent Modernist Apartment for sale located on the Rambla de Catalunya in Barcelona Located in a listed modernist building that was designed by one of the most famous architects of Barcelona's architecture, Enric Sagnier. We highlight its façade with central grandstands, on all floors, with wavy lines, stone ornamentation that surrounds the door, in the entrance hall, there is the white marble staircase and wrought iron railing with floral motifs. Being located on a high floor, this spacious home enjoys tranquility and abundant natural light, as well as beautiful visits to the Rambla Catalunya with double orientation East and West. It has two front doors, so it would be ideal for home use and a private office. The apartment has currently as an office, but it is for residential use, so it can very easily become a fantàstic home with very large spaces. Consists of 383 sqm built approx. plus 11 sqm of balcony, retains all the floors of “Mosaic de Noia”, coffered ceilings and original moldings on ceilings of 3.85 m and original exterior and interior woodwork. It has a double orientation, east and west. We receive a large distributor very well lit thanks to a huge window, on the left hand side and overlooking the Rambla de Catalunya, there are 3 large rooms that are currently used as a main office and two meeting rooms, with exit on the balcony two of them, and the central grandstand. A wonderful space to place for example the living room, library and dining room. Continuing to the right and through a wide corridor are distributed 4 large bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and an offfice kitchen. Finally we enter a large living room with gallery facing to the typical courtyard, from where two rooms are distributed, one on each side, one double with balcony and the second with a gallery. A very good property, without a doubt it is a truly elegant apartment with luxurious finishes and very sophisticated interiors, in one of the most emblematic streets of Barcelona, next to Passeig de Gràcia, Casa Batlló and La Pedrera de Gaudí, galleries, designer shops, all services, amenities and public transport.  .

description: Property divided into two floors for sale in the Gothic Quarter of Barcelona. Located in a typical modernist building of 1910 in the famous Avinyó street, a very central street in the old town of Barcelona, we find this property of 140 m² which is divided into two floors, although in the registry it appears as a single dwelling. The apartment facing the street has 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, as well as a living-dining room and kitchen. Both the living room and the master bedroom are exterior and have two balconies. The apartment facing the inner courtyard has a separate kitchen, living room, a bedroom with dressing room and bathroom. The houses stand out for their well-preserved modernist details, such as their beautiful hydraulic floors. Both properties have tenants. This property is in a perfect location in the center of the city and for its current distribution is an excellent opportunity for investors who are looking for immediate rental returns. Do not hesitate to contact us!

description: Refurbished flat with lots of light for sale in La Barceloneta With an unbeatable location, in the heart of Barceloneta, in the same Market Square and a few meters from the beach and the metro station, we find this beautiful renovated flat on the 5th floor of a building in good condition with lift. The property stands out for its luminosity thanks to its large windows and its south orientation and to its very well used distribution. It consists of 69sq m built based on the floor plan and is distributed in a bright living-dining room with access to a big balcony facing an interior courtyard of neighbours, very quiet and with lots of light and a semi-open fully equipped kitchen. It also has 2 exterior bedrooms, the main double bedroom with dressing room that could be used as a third bedroom and a complete bathroom. The flat is equipped with parquet flooring, windows with electric blinds, heating by radiators, air conditioning for the day area. Don't miss the opportunity to visit this fantastic flat in the Barceloneta neighbourhood!

neighborhood: Sant Pere - Santa Caterina i la Ribera
description: This exclusive property offers authentic characteristics which are rare to find in Barcelona. Its medieval history offers a unique combination of original features such as the extraordinary wooden beams, combined with luxury and comfort through finest Italian tailor made carpentry. The entire building recently went through a rehabilitation and restored the original and attractive materials from the 12th Century medieval Barcelona, with elements such as walls of revoked stone and high wooden ceilings with beautiful artisanal moldings. The apartment offers one master bedroom with private bathroom, a guest bathroom and a loft bedroom upstairs. The elegant and fully equipped kitchen is open to the living area and imposes a spacious feeling due to the very high ceilings. The property is located in the old town, El Born more exactly, and few meters from the iconic basilica Santa Maria del Mar. Its attractive location makes the apartment overlook a delightful square with green trees, medieval buildings and open space which offers a lot of natural light. The attractive location also offers short distance to the Barceloneta beach, the Gothic quarter, Santa Catarina market, the Cathedral, Plaza Catalunya and the Eixample district. This makes the property a truly unique combination of modern comfort with piece of Barcelona’s history. If there is a trendy place for both tourists and locals, it is the dynamic neighborhood of El Born with its particular market, now turned into a museum, after getting some fantastic Roman ruins during its remodeling. It is home to artists, artisans and bohemians, with a myriad of curious and unique stores. Even more famous are its varied restaurants, so many to discover a new one every day. The Santa Caterina market with its roof inspired by the skin of the dragon of Sant Jordi is in itself a work to admire. The Basilica of Santa Maria del Mar, the Palau de la Música, and the green lung of La Ciutadella are some of the important landmarks of this neighborhood. It is a neighborhood to live and to know. Its buildings continue the irregular pattern of the Gothic Quarter, and its streets, although clearer at times, are also narrow. On the first floor of the buildings you can find bars, art galleries, artisan workshops and a host of small and curious businesses. This neighborhood will interest you if you like the bohemian lifestyle, living with the many artisans, tapas and good food, and live in a neighborhood that surprises you with new stores and corners. It is a good location to invest in a pied-à-terre.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Pere - Santa Caterina i la Ribera, Barcelona

description: Brand new flat with Pool and Terrace in Paseo de Gracia, Barcelona Exclusive property of 124sqm built and 18sqm of terrace, distributed in a bright living-dining room with access to two pleasant balconies. The kitchen is open plan and comes fully equipped with top of the range appliances (including a Liebherr wine fridge). Through the hall we access the night area, where we find the master bedroom en suite with access to the spectacular terrace, this bedroom has a complete bathroom with shower. The second bedroom is also double and has a bathroom with bathtub just in front of it. Both bedrooms have built-in wardrobes and are designed with high quality materials. All rooms have ducted air conditioning and heating, home automation, parquet floors, aluminium carpentry and double glazing. The elegant and unique roof terrace offers a unique space, with lots of vegetation and a wooden structure surrounding the incredible swimming pool, ideal for cooling off in the hotter months. Located in the heart of Barcelona, Paseo de Gracia is the most elegant and stately avenue in the city, and in one of the most sought after locations for business. A very attractive commercial proposition. It offers a very comfortable life, with all the services at your fingertips. Living on this avenue means enjoying exclusivity in the very centre of the city. Enjoy the exquisite architecture of its modernist buildings such as Casa Batlló, Casa Milá and Casa Lleó Morera, mixed with modern, classical and neoclassical buildings.  Its location enjoys excellent communications, and the unique experience of living in Paseo de Gracia; surrounded by the best fashion shops, hotels, high-class restaurants and the most representative examples of modernism. A luxury within the reach of few.  The refurbishment of this traditional neoclassical building has been carried out to the highest standards and details. It has sought to merge the most distinguished of the past with the most functional of the future. Its design is totally avant-garde and has all the comforts of the most modern constructions.

description: Magnificent apartment for sale in Illa del Mar, Barcelona Luxurious 143m² built home, with views of the sea and the city, located on one of the top floors of the exclusive building of the Illa del Mar residential complex.  This magnificent apartment is distributed in a spacious and bright living-dining room with large windows that allow plenty of natural light to enter the entire room. It has access to an incredible 32m² perimeter terrace, which enjoys panoramic views of both the sea and the city. Fully equipped open kitchen, with a nice and comfortable breakfast bar.  The night area consists of 3 rooms; The main one is en-suite with built-in wardrobes and a wonderful bathroom with a shower and bathtub, two other single rooms, all of them with access to the terrace. Another full bathroom. Southwest orientation.  The reform of this house was carried out studying every detail of both distribution and finishes.  It has an independent water area, parquet floors, air conditioning and heating ducts and the terrace has laminated flooring.  Illa del Mar, an exclusive residential complex that has 24-hour security, a communal area with an outdoor pool, gym, paddle tennis court and a children's area. Excellent location due to its proximity to the sea, very well connected with public transport networks such as metro, buses and tram. Very close to one of the largest shopping centers in the city, Diagonal Mar.

description: PentHouse for sale with Terrace in Avda Diagonal/ Turo Park Located in Avinguda Diagonal, in a modern building built in 1958 with a surface of 386 m2 in two floors and 225 m2 of terraces between the two floors plus a third one with panoramic views, few metres away from Turo Park, surrounded by services and shops, it stands out for its high standing reform, spaciousness and great luminosity thanks to its double orientation SE / NW. On the first floor we find a large and beautiful hall as the central axis of the house, on the right hand side we find two spacious and bright rooms that could perfectly be a living room and office, one of them with a beautiful fireplace with views of the city and access to a terrace of about 16m2, on the left hand side we find a 2nd living room of about 50m2 next to the spectacular fully equipped kitchen with the adjoining water area. Opposite the kitchen, we find a guest toilet and the first suite of the house facing south and with access to a terrace of about 10m2, a double bedroom with fitted wardrobes. In the central part there is a beautiful wooden panelling with fitted wardrobes and behind a semi-hidden door there is the maid's room with en-suite bathroom, On the second floor, on the right hand side there are two spacious suites with a complete dressing room, which enjoy a lot of light, on the left hand side, we find the master suite with all luxury of details whose dressing room has the singularity of having a perfectly integrated bathtub, this room enjoys a lot of light thanks to its panoramic windows and for having access to a terrace of about 46m2. Finally, the third floor has a private terrace of 132m2 with panoramic views of the entire city, but which is also equipped with a summer kitchen, shower and a semi-pergola with all electric, ideal to enjoy with the family. With access from the first floor, there is a guest toilet serving the terrace. Gas heating and ducted air conditioning in all rooms, top of the range Miele and Liebherr appliances, Azul Acosta kitchen furniture, gas hob + vitro and grill with Steel double oven, wine cellar, Buster+Punch handles throughout the house, electric blinds and curtains, Crotizo windows and sliding doors, herringbone natural park flooring, fitted wardrobes throughout the house, alarm, teak flooring on the panoramic terrace and master suite, armoured door and a long etcetera of details that make this a unique property in the area. This exclusive property is located in a classic building in a perfect state of conservation and has a concierge service and two lifts, one of which is a freight/service lift.

description: Flat for sale near George Orwell Square Bright rustic flat for sale near George Orwell Square in the Gothic Quarter, we find this flat refurbished in 2003, with a living area of 110sqm according to the habitability certificate. It is located in a classic property built in 1910, with period details. The flat is south-east facing and has light coming in from 3 fronts of the property (2 inner yards and 2 balconies), which guarantees good light all day long. It is composed of a spacious and bright living room integrated with the fully equipped kitchen, 3 double bedrooms, 2 complete bathrooms. It has split air conditioning and gas heating by radiators. We highlight of this property its high ceilings with wooden beams, volta catalana, spacious rooms with rustic design, and with possibilities to update design by means of specific reforms. Tiled floor throughout the flat. The building has no lift and the flat is on a second floor, no parking.
