description: This spectacular penthouse is located in one of the most emblematic buildings in Barcelona's Eixample Derecho, designed by the renowned architect Enric Sagnier. The apartment is presented with a reform of excellent qualities and with the presence of two terraces at the same level that take advantage of the morning sun and the afternoon sun to be each on both sides of the penthouse. This wonderful penthouse consists of three bedrooms (all with access to the terrace of the courtyard), one of them master suite, with dressing room and bathroom. The other two bedrooms share a large bathroom. In the large living room we also find perfectly integrated kitchen and a small office that is perfectly concealed with the closure of a sliding door. All this living room also has direct access to the terrace. Properties like these are some of the most exclusive that currently exist in Barcelona, as it is very difficult to find a renovated penthouse with more than 100m2 of terrace in the heart of Barcelona. Undoubtedly, one of the best penthouses in the city. La Dreta de L’Eixample begins in Plaça de Catalunya and its central axis revolves around the Passeig de Gràcia and the Cuadrat d’Or. It is delimited from the busy Calle Balmes to the renovated Passeig de Sant Joan and from the commercial Ronda Sant Pere to the convenient Avinguda Diagonal. It is one of the most expensive and exclusive neighborhoods in Barcelona, along with Pedralbes and Sarrià-Sant Gervasi. It is impossible not to make reference to the luxury of Passeig de Gràcia, with the boutiques of the most exclusive brands in the world, or to the stores on La Rambla de Catalunya. However, the rest of its streets are as or more interesting. In them resided part of the Catalan textile bourgeoisie of the early twentieth century, which has left its mark on the spectacular royal estates and modernist houses designed by the most famous architects of the time, as the Pedrera or Casa Batlló of the great Antoni Gaudí. As a result, the characteristic homes of this neighborhood are spacious apartments with high ceilings, moldings, elaborate flooring and balconies. Many buildings and apartments preserve this original architectural heritage and it is possible to find recently remodeled apartments, penthouses, lofts and even studios, which revive these elements, as well as apartments with a lot of potential to be reformed. This side of L’Eixample is equipped with all kinds of services and stores, as well as educational centers, mainly state-subsidized and private schools. You will find it very easy to move around on foot or through the public transport connections to the most expensive stores and restaurants in the city. The Eixample Dreta is the best neighborhood if you want to admire and live in the noble zone of the fascinating Catalan modernism, to reside in one of its characteristic regal estates, and to coexist in perfect balance with the vibrant and luxurious commercial life. It is ideal if you want to walk every day through its wide and tidy streets, with easy transport connections, have all kinds of services and facilities available, including arranged or private schools, and enjoy the most chic, cultural and cosmopolitan atmosphere in Barcelona.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Dreta de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle d'Ausiàs Marc

description: Completely refurbished property with high quality finishes located in a regal building with elevator next to Rambla Catalunya and Paseo de Gracia. The property merges two concepts, on the one hand it offers an elegant and modern design, and on the other hand, it maintains its modernist essence, as can be seen in its magnificent coffered ceilings. The flat has a total surface area of 179m2. It has a total of three bedrooms, two of them share a bathroom and the other one is a suite with a private bathroom and dressing room. There is a large living room overlooking the gallery and the spacious terrace, a dining room and a fully equipped kitchen. An excellent property with high quality finishes of the best Italian brands. The Eixample district is the most emblematic of Barcelona since the nineteenth century. Of a renowned model urban planning devised by the engineer Ildefons Cerdá, Eixample marks the epicenter of the city from its main streets: The luxurious Passeig de Gràcia, the commercial Rambla de Catalunya and the updated Passeig de Sant Joan, housing the majority of the modernist architectural icons, such as La Sagrada Familia, La Pedrera or La Casa Batlló of the great Antoni Gaudí. It is a large, quiet but exciting  residential area with extremely convenient commercial activity, designed to respect the privacy of the homes. The Catalan modernist architecture so characteristic of stately airs, but with great cosmopolitan touches, extends throughout the neighborhood to the delight of those who wish to live modernism from within, since it is possible to acquire homes within regal estates with valuable original architectural elements, period pieces and even historical and protected. Schools, squares, wadis, parks, stores and restaurants give dynamism to the area that differentiates the Right from the Left, both with wide uniform streets, octagonal islands and wide island interiors that mark the internal distribution of buildings and homes. You will mostly find buildings of strong bricks, floors of generally wide dimensions, medium or high ceilings, with balconies that give to the wide streets or the inner patios of the Cerdá Plan. Keep in mind this living in the Eixample district, if you are looking for a neighborhood where you can have everything within walking distance or very well connected to public transport, both basic and luxury stores, trendy restaurants or even your workplace among the many offices and stores, this could be your neighborhood. If you want to walk among the iconic monuments of the city, with the comfort of equal distance to any other point or neighborhood in the city. Consider Eixample if you are a lover of modernist, stately and typical Catalan architecture and a high street feeling. If you want to live in the vital and cultural epicenter of Barcelona, where everything happens.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Dreta de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de Roger de Llúria

description: This spacious and bright family apartment in a perfectly maintained classic building with elevator is located on a high floor on one of the main streets in the center of Barcelona and is surrounded by services, restaurants, shops and entertainment establishments. The apartment was refurbished in 2018 and consists of the following spaces: spacious entrance hallway with office space, impressive living room with chill out area, fireplace, open and equipped kitchen with dining area and a guest toilet. The living room has access to the balcony with beautiful views. In the night area we find the master bedroom with ensuite bathroom, fitted wardrobe with access to the terrace overlooking the inner courtyard, another double bedroom with gallery, and a single bedroom with access to a small patio, both bedrooms share another large family bathroom. The apartment is totally exterior with double orientation to the street and to the inner courtyard. On the communal roof terrace, the apartment has its own storage room. Our team will be pleased to arrange a viewing for you. The old Esquerra de l'Eixample is, together with La Dreta de L'Eixample, one of the first areas of the city to be urbanized. It is located in the heart of the city, between Avinguda Diagonal, Balmes street, Gran Via de les Corts Catalanes and Comte d'Urgell street. This neighborhood with a long history is home to some of the most important facilities since the beginning of the urbanization of the city, such as the University of Barcelona, the Hospital Clínic and the emblematic Mercat del Ninot. The numerous regal, classical and modernist estates that fill streets like Aribau, Muntaner, the pedestrian Enric Granados among others, are an example of the Eixample designed by Cerdà. You can find apartments that are beautiful modernist jewels of medium or large size and buildings that have been completely renovated. A good part of the life of the neighborhood happens in the island interiors and the premises of first floors that occupy small new and traditional stores, many restaurants, places of leisure and night clubs. As the nerve center of Barcelona, its communication with the rest of the neighborhoods is excellent by public transport, and if you have a car you should know that it is very desirable to locate one of the few parking spaces with the purchase of your home. You should have Antiga Esquerra de l'Eixample on your list if you want to live in the neighborhood with one of the widest gastronomic offers in the city, with the most emblematic facilities, with a lot of nightlife and if you want to feel the cosmopolitan spirit of the Barcelona neighborhood par excellence.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Dreta de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de Balmes

description: This penthouse is located on a very strategic and central location in Barcelona, basically in the heart of the city right next to Plaza Catalunya. Its location in the Gothic Quarter is possibly the most interesting because its architecture symbolises an elegant mix of both Eixample and the Old Town. The apartment is fully refurbished and consists of around 64 m2 and comes with a stunning private terrace on the rooftop of around 30 m2 that offers sun throughout the entire day, a unique element of luxury in a city like Barcelona. The building dates back to 1885 and has elevator installed. Right outside the doorstep is some of the best dining and shopping that Barcelona has to offer, while the harbour and beachside is also a short walking distance away. The Gothic Quarter is the oldest and most interesting part of the city. It is bounded by Las Ramblas, Via Laietana, Paseo Colón and Plaza de Catalunya, each of these points alone has its own importance and history. With its narrow streets and irregular structure, several of its buildings have been built on the Romanesque remains of the city, so you can get an apartment with at least one wall dating back to Roman times. It is the tourist district par excellence so it represents an assured investment, especially if you are near one of its attractions such as the Cathedral, the Plaza Sant Jaume with the City Hall and the Palace of the Generalitat, the Plaza Real, the famous Rambas, and the Museum of History of the city. The Gothic Quarter could be your neighborhood if you are looking to make a profitable investment or acquire an excellent pied-à-terre in an iconic and storied neighborhood with great history, private buildings, tourism and with all kinds of businesses at hand such as bars, restaurants, libraries, and many magical corners to discover and tour.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Gòtic, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle de la Canuda

description: The property consists of 220 m2 built plus a magnificent terrace of 210 m2 that surrounds the entire property. From the kitchen dining room living room, we access the largest area of the terrace, where we find several independent areas, such as a barbecue-summer dining room area and several chillout areas that surround its private heated pool with spectacular views.    An lift provides direct access to the property, where we find a spacious entrance hall with cupboards to leave belongings. Once we cross the front door, on the right we have a spacious dining room living room with direct access to the large terrace. To the left of the entrance, we find a spacious fully equipped and exterior kitchen-office, with direct access to the same terrace.    The night area consists of four double bedrooms with large windows and mountain views. Two of the rooms are en-suite and three with direct access to the terrace that surrounds the property.    The building has a 24-hour concierge and surveillance service, as well as six parking spaces and a 55 m 2 storage room with a full bathroom.

description: This wonderful villa on a 2269 sqm plot is located in the upper area of Sarrià, close to the fantastic surroundings of Vallvidrera and the Collserola Park. It has all the amenities you can imagine: garden, swimming pool, huge car park and service area, as well as offering breathtaking views of the city, the sea and the mountains. It has 707 sqm and 201 sqm paddle in the basement, 552 sqm on the main floor with a 154 sqm porch and 68 sqm plus 49 sqm service area on the upper floor. The main floor features a living room, a dining room and sa emi-open kitchen, all with excellent views over Barcelona and access to the porch and the garden. We also find the master bedroom en suite with dressing room and office area. From the kitchen, there's access to an ironing room and, from there, to the upper floor with 2 bedrooms and a bathroom for the house servants. The upper floor has 3 bedrooms (one en suite and two double ones) and 1 independent bathroom. Going downstairs, we find another area with a kitchen, a space that can be used as a living room or a bedroom and 2 more suites. It's perfect as a guest apartment, as it has its own independent access. The lower floor has a parking area with capacity for more than 10 cars, 2 storage rooms (one of them is very large), a laundry area and a room for the chauffeur. The pool area has changing rooms, a paddle court and a small kitchen. There's also a very large enclosure for dogs. This property is incredibly bright and the main rooms overlook the porch and garden. This villa is a real luxury in immaculate condition, as it was built only 20 years ago, and allows you to enjoy the utmost tranquillity with all the comforts of the city within easy reach.

The urbanization has 24 hour security, excellent community areas such as swimming pool, garden, gym or paddle tennis courts.  The penthouse has 153 sqm and a terrace with a private swimming pool and stunning panoramic views of Barcelona and the sea of 70 sqm. On the ground floor there is the open and bright living room with double height. From here we have access to the terrace that surrounds the apartment, with several zones and a fantastic swimming pool to relax overlooking the sea. Separate kitchen with entrance from the dining room or hallway, and its own exit to the terrace. Finally we find a master suite with dressing room and access to the outside, and a toilet for visitors.  On the upper floor there are two more bright double bedrooms and a bathroom with shower. There is also the laundry room. The apartment has top quality finishes. Air conditioning and heating. Reinforced door. The price includes a parking space and storage room in the same building.  Diagonal Mar is one of the youngest areas of Barcelona, a new neighborhood, dynamic, entrepreneurial, with all services, with the Diagonal Mar shopping center where one can access all kinds of products, a few meters from the sea and with an excellent communication with public transport that allows us to get closer to the center in a few minutes, is the perfect destination for any family where to find the tranquility and have all services available. address: Gran Via de les Corts Catalanes
description: We find an exclusive refurbished penthouse of 167 square meters with 2 terraces, with spectacular views of the city, in a regal estate in the heart of l'Eixample Esquerra. The property enjoys an unbeatable location, just minutes from Plaça Universitat, Passeig de Gràcia and Plaça Catalunya, and enjoys a wide range of leisure and culture. In addition to being a few meters from the Universitat metro station and several bus lines. Upon entering we find the day area on the right hand side. We are greeted by a spectacular Bulthaup design open kitchen made to measure and equipped with Gaggenau and Bora appliances, Teppanyaki grill, wine fridge, ice cube maker, water filtering system for sparkling and still water, Occhio lighting and a wonderful island. It communicates with the dining room and the living room, equipped with exquisite luxury furnishings. The day area accesses directly to the first terrace of the penthouse, with two environments, one dining and one chill-out, equipped with Kettal outdoor furniture, Weber outdoor kitchen, lighting, automatic awnings and shower. The other terrace, located above, is accessed independently, with the option of creating direct access between them and is prepared to have a jacuzzi. The living room communicates with an area enabled as an office and from here you access the master bedroom suite with dressing room. We continue with a double bedroom and a full bathroom. The house also has two patios, one of them with water area. Washing machine and dryer. It comes with smart home installation and Sonos sound system (indoor and outdoor) with Alexa voice control, Ultra HD TV in bedroom and living room, air conditioning and security system. In short, we present a beautiful penthouse with terrace in an ideal location with wonderful views of the city. Spacious, bright, and design. AREA: Eixample - L'Antiga Esquerra de l'Eixample. PUBLIC TRANSPORT: Metro (L1 - Urgell and L1, L2 - Universitat), Bus, Bicing.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: L'Antiga Esquerra de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Gran Via de les Corts Catalanes

description: The property enjoys an unbeatable location on Carrer Ausiàs March, on the corner of Passeig de Sant Joan and very close to emblematic buildings such as Casa Burés. The area enjoys all services and is close to both the city centre, Passeig de Gràcia and Plaça Catalunya, as well as the historic centre with El Born, Arc de Triomf or Ciutadella Park.  The property is located in a stately building from 1900 in perfect condition, with a lift and communal terrace, and with many of the period features that are so typical of Barcelona's architecture.  The 215 m² property is made up of 3 double bedrooms with private bathrooms and a living-dining room with an open kitchen of almost 60 m². In addition, it offers an office area at the beginning of the home that could also be used as a bedroom, since it has a nearby bathroom, and a guest toilet that serves the living room area and also offers a utility area. All rooms on the floor are exterior facing. The office, one of the bedrooms and the living-dining room have balconies overlooking Carrer Ausias March, while the other 2 bedrooms overlook the beautiful and quiet courtyard of the block.  The master bedroom has a bathroom with a shower and an elegant bathtub on the gallery that remains totally private thanks to the automatic curtains.  The property was fully renovated renovation during the year 2022, with the highest quality finishes, while preserving the features and the original spirit of the home. Among its details, we can highlight the original mosaic floors and in perfect condition, original wood carpentry, air conditioning and heating ducts and a fully equipped Bulthaup brand kitchen, among others.  Please get in touch for more information.

address: subdistrict Sant Pere - Santa Caterina i la Ribera
neighborhood: Sant Pere - Santa Caterina i la Ribera
description: Located on the 10th floor of the Fábregas Building, we find this completely renovated property with exceptional design and quality. The building where it is located, which dates from 1944 and has a lift and concierge service, was the first skyscraper in the city of Barcelona, a work by the architect Gutierrez Soto, with beautiful curved lines and heir to Art Deco.    The property, of almost 200m2, consists of a large living room dining room with an open kitchen of 100m2, with a large number of windows through which a lot of light enters, and a small balcony on one of its sides. In addition, we have three double bedrooms, one of them with an en-suite bathroom and another complete bathroom that serves the rest of the property.    The renovation carried out in this property is being of a high quality, preserving original elements in sight such as the columns and metal beams, which give an Industry touch to the apartment. In addition, the original natural wood floors are also preserved, with a very original pattern that adds a touch of class to the property.    Other details to assess regarding the renovation is that it has ducted air conditioning, aluminum windows with double glazing, a fully equipped designer kitchen, etc.    The building, with access from Jonqueres street, a recently pedestrianized street, has a porter service and there would be the possibility of renting a parking space on the same building.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Pere - Santa Caterina i la Ribera, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Located in one of the best residential areas of Gavà Mar, where luxury and high standing predominate, a quiet area a few minutes from the beach, with all kinds of services and establishments and where the most prestigious schools of the municipality are located, the Bon Soleil and the British School, we find this excellent corner 473sq m property built on a 836sq m plot. There we find its wonderful back garden with more than 500sq m that has a private swimming pool with waterfall, barbecue area and the porch with summer dining room with capacity for 10 people. An avant-garde and timeless design that combines large outdoor spaces, an unbeatable layout and excellent quality finishes such as exposed brickwork and travertine marble. The property has two floors and a basement connected by lift and stairs.  We access to the main floor where we find the day area that houses the large living-dining room, full of natural light thanks to its large windows and with direct access to the garden, fully equipped independent kitchen, with a comfortable work area and direct access to the summer dining room, two exterior double bedrooms and a complete bathroom for general use. Next, the first floor reveals the night area with the master suite with access to an incredible private terrace, a complete bathroom and armoured door, a suite with private bathroom, two double bedrooms and a complete bathroom for general use. Finally, there is a fully accessible roof terrace and a 200sq m basement floor that houses the parking area with capacity for 4 vehicles, the machinery room, a large laundry area and a beautiful wine cellar. The property has a selection of excellent quality finishes such as parquet flooring, Climalit glazing, among others. It is also equipped with ducted cool/warm climate system and natural gas heating in all rooms to guarantee maximum comfort. It has excellent public transport and road connections with both the centre of Barcelona and El Prat Airport. A great opportunity to enjoy the tranquillity and high standing of Gavà. Views of the garden. South facing. Excellent, very bright and ideal for families. AREA: Gavà Mar. PUBLIC TRANSPORT: RENFE and Bus.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Gavà Mar, Gavà
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle de Cunit

description: We find this exquisite 160 m² property on the principal floor of an elegant building on the wide, leafy avenue, Ronda de Sant Pere, in the popular and central Eixample Right district of Barcelona city center. The location is central and residents here can enjoy a wide range of shops, restaurants, and other services on their doorstep.  This newly renovated home is presented today in impeccable brand-new condition, with elegant finishes and the highest quality materials used throughout the home.    On entering the property, we find ourselves in a wide entrance hall with a convenient place to leave keys, etc. Straight ahead, we find the magnificent living room - dining room. This spacious room is wonderfully bright thanks to the three sets of glass double doors that open onto the elongated balcony that runs along the façade of the building, overlooking the attractive tree-lined street below, which is always gently buzzing with city life but not noisy. The light-colored wooden flooring and smooth walls with radiators and high ceilings provide a classic and luxurious feel to the space.    Connected to the dining area, we find the semi-open kitchen, which is both modern and tastefully designed with beautiful dark worktops and well-concealed storage solutions.  If we return to the hall, we find two ensuite double bedrooms on one side, one of which also benefits from its own fantastic dressing room with shelves and wardrobes, and both rooms enjoy access to a cozy little private terrace with space for a table and chairs; the ideal place to enjoy your morning coffee.  On the other side of the hall, we find another bedroom with a separate bathroom.  This well-located, pristine new apartment would make an enviable home in Barcelona and is particularly suited to a buyer seeking a home that can be moved into and enjoyed immediately.  Please feel free to contact us for further information or to arrange a viewing.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Dreta de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

address: subdistrict Sant Pere - Santa Caterina i la Ribera
neighborhood: Sant Pere - Santa Caterina i la Ribera
description: Residential complex of 15 luxury apartments where the classical architecture of its historic facade is combined with comfort and contemporary interior design. We are looking at a completely rehabilitated four-floor building with a spectacular entrance that is located on one of the most significant streets of the city. The building, with its magnificent facade, is a corner property which is surrounded by exterior space and natural light. Inside, there is a set of fifteen apartments of versatile design to give its authentic personal touch for future owners. The units are presented with a distribution of 2 and 3 bedrooms in dimensions between 90 and 130 m2, and offers different orientation and views depending on the unit. The open living room connects with integrated and fully equipped kitchen, that offers Subzero electro domestics. The apartment also offers conducted Air-conditions and smart technology throughout the home. The central location of the property allows you to enjoy the best Barcelona can offer. Apart from being in the heart of the old town between the Gothic quarter and El Born, few steps away is the famous Port Vell harbor, Barceloneta beach, Parc Ciutadella, Plaza Catalunya and the Eixample neighborhood. An investment that combines comfortable lifestyle and luxurious living within a prime area of Barcelona. If there is a trendy place for both tourists and locals, it is the dynamic neighborhood of El Born with its particular market, now converted into a museum, after getting some fantastic Roman ruins during its remodeling. It is home to artists, craftsmen and bohemians, with an infinite number of curious and unique stores, which we probably wouldn't have enough time to get to know all of them in years. Even more famous are its restaurants with so much variety to discover a new one every day. The Santa Caterina market with its ceiling inspired by the dragon skin of Sant Jordi is in itself a work of art to be admired. The Basilica of Santa Maria del Mar, the Palau de la Música, and the green lung of La Ciutadella are some of the important landmarks of this neighborhood. It is a neighborhood to live in and to know. Its buildings continue the irregular pattern of the Gothic Quarter, and its streets, although at times more uncluttered, are also narrow. In the basement of the buildings you can find bars of author, art galleries, workshops of craftsmen and stop counting. Sant Pere, Santa Catarina and the Born are interesting neighborhoods for you if you like the bohemian lifestyle, living with multiple artisans, the tapas and good food, living in a neighborhood that surprises you with new stores and corners to discover every time, and an excellent location to invest in a pied-à-terre.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Pere - Santa Caterina i la Ribera, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Impressive apartment for sale with a 163m2 terrace, located in the heart of the old historic neighborhood of the right Eixample, where some of the most interesting architectural projects of the beginning of the last century were carried out. This luxurious first floor apartment, oriented towards the interior of the block and with 4-meter high ceilings, is located in the building of the 1900s with an elevator. It is next to the Urquinaona square and a few minutes’ walk from the Paseo de Gracia and Plaza Catalunya. It has been thoroughly refurbished with high quality materials and finishes, such as the hardwood parquet, the modern design kitchen with NEFF appliances and the materials used in the enclosures. In addition, the apartment has some of the old architectural details, such as the restored stained glass windows that overlook the inner courtyard, the original iron pillars and some of the recovered hydraulic floors. The apartment has a spacious living room, open kitchen, typical gallery of the Eixample, where the dining room is located. An exterior double bedroom with private bathroom complete with shower, an interior double bedroom, an interior single bedroom, another bathroom with shower to share, and a huge terrace with a shed for an additional living room or to store furniture. It also has gas heating through radiators and air conditioning through integrated ducts. The Eixample district is the most emblematic of Barcelona since the nineteenth century. Of a renowned model urban planning devised by the engineer Ildefons Cerdá, Eixample marks the epicenter of the city from its main streets: The luxurious Passeig de Gràcia, the commercial Rambla de Catalunya and the updated Passeig de Sant Joan, housing the majority of the modernist architectural icons, such as La Sagrada Familia, La Pedrera or La Casa Batlló of the great Antoni Gaudí. It is a large, quiet but exciting  residential area with extremely convenient commercial activity, designed to respect the privacy of the homes. The Catalan modernist architecture so characteristic of stately airs, but with great cosmopolitan touches, extends throughout the neighborhood to the delight of those who wish to live modernism from within, since it is possible to acquire homes within regal estates with valuable original architectural elements, period pieces and even historical and protected. Schools, squares, wadis, parks, stores and restaurants give dynamism to the area that differentiates the Right from the Left, both with wide uniform streets, octagonal islands and wide island interiors that mark the internal distribution of buildings and homes. You will mostly find buildings of strong bricks, floors of generally wide dimensions, medium or high ceilings, with balconies that give to the wide streets or the inner patios of the Cerdá Plan. Keep in mind this living in the Eixample district, if you are looking for a neighborhood where you can have everything within walking distance or very well connected to public transport, both basic and luxury stores, trendy restaurants or even your workplace among the many offices and stores, this could be your neighborhood. If you want to walk among the iconic monuments of the city, with the comfort of equal distance to any other point or neighborhood in the city. Consider Eixample if you are a lover of modernist, stately and typical Catalan architecture and a high street feeling. If you want to live in the vital and cultural epicenter of Barcelona, where everything happens.

description: Flat for sale with Terrace in Sant Gervasi - Galvany (Barcelona) Located in the neighborhood of Sant Gervasi, high, south facing, surrounded by stores, very well connected with all kinds of public transport, near the area of national and international schools and with easy access to both the center and the main exits of the city, we find this fantastic apartment of an area of 180 m2 approximately with a terrace of 20 m2. It is a high floor and practically all exterior. It is accessed through a large hall that leads to the night area and the day area. In the day area we find the living room with exit to the spectacular terrace of about 20 m2 approximately, the kitchen with service door and water area / outdoor laundry. In the night area there are four bedrooms and two bathrooms. Two are doubles and have access to the terrace, one single, they share a bathroom and the master bedroom with dressing room and bathroom. The property has a storage room in the same building, concierge service and there is the possibility of acquiring a parking space in a nearby building. Be sure to visit it, it is an opportunity to acquire a good apartment in an unbeatable area with sun and terrace.  .

neighborhood: El Camp d'En Grassot i Gràcia Nova
description: Spacious house renovated in 2004 in excellent condition of 341m2, a unique opportunity close to the city center in the heart of Barrio de Gracia. On the first floor, the house has a large private garage of 100 m2 (space for approximately 9 cars) with access to Sant Lluis street. To reach the second floor, you go up some side stairs that start at the front door of the house. Upon entering this floor, to the left is the master bedroom with ensuite bathroom, large dressing room and closed balcony facing the street. Continuing down the hallway to the right is the kitchen and to the front of it a second bathroom with shower. At the end of the hallway is the living - dining room with fireplace and access to the spectacular private terrace of 35 m2 with barbecue area and sun loungers for sunbathing. Down a staircase there is a second large terrace that could be converted into a beautiful garden with two small rooms for laundry area. Going up the interior stairs of the house you reach the second floor where we have a first room that is used as an office, very bright with access to a third terrace of 26 m2, spectacular to have a gym and solarium. On the same floor there are two single bedrooms with private bathroom and one of them has access to a terrace of 12 m2. The house has parquet floors, gas heating and air conditioning ducts. There are very few spaces as intimate and cozy as this in Barcelona. With an exceptional location in front of the sea, this neighborhood is one of the best valued among Barcelona’s people to live in. It is relatively new, a product of the project carried out for the Barcelona ’92 Olympics. Later, the Olympic Village was conditioned to be a residential neighborhood. Despite being young, it has its own personality, with spaces for nightlife and leisure in the Olympic Port, well differentiated from residential spaces. The neighborhood is very close to the center and also well connected by bus, streetcar and subway. It is ideal for families as it has all the services and equipment. The type of housing you can get are diverse: blocks of apartments of various formats, open blocks and two-storey houses with terrace. The constructions are of recent construction and medium-high quality. The most valued points are the location in front of the sea, the tranquility of the residential area, the proximity to the Parc de la Citadella, its facilities and connections with the rest of the city. The Vila Olímpica can be a very interesting option if you are looking to acquire a property, either as a regular residence or as an investment for rent, since rental prices in this area are quite high.

description: Apartment with terrace for sale in Plaça Ga-la Placídia On the second floor of a listed mansion, located in Plaza Gal-la Placídia, we find this beautiful house of 140m2 approximately, plus two terraces of 10 m2 each, facing west. Just entering, you breathe a cozy and very bright air, as the whole house is exterior. The floors are natural parquet and ceilings with vaulted moldings that give an original charm. It consists of a living room with two large windows that access the attractive terrace, with unobstructed views and very sunny. The kitchen is fully equipped with Smeg and Miele appliances, through which you access a complete water area. All this area with windows to the outside. A full bathroom combined with dressing area gives service to the two double bedrooms, one of them with access to the second terrace and the other with a large window to the same terrace. Last but not least, we find the suite with a very original bathroom and dressing area. From the suite we also have access to the second terrace, very cozy for relaxing moments. The whole house has a ducted air conditioning system with return air. It is unique, it is like having a little house in one of the most sought after areas of Barcelona. With all the amenities in terms of trade proximity with the Mercat de la Llibertat a minute away and all kinds of public transport within reach. If you are looking for something unique and exclusive, without a doubt, this is your home, do not miss it and ask for a visit with one of our professional advisors!

description: House for sale with Terrace in Sant Gervasi - La Bonanova (Barcelona) Fantastic house for sale of 815m2, with interior lift, distributed over 4 floors; a semi-basement with an office with independent access and a small loft flat; and a basement with gymnasium, sauna, jacuzzi and access to the car park. The property has a garden with chill-out area and private swimming pool, as well as several terraces with impressive views of the sea, the city and Gaudí's Bell Resguard house. The living area has, on the ground floor, a spacious living-dining room with three rooms that gives access to the terrace, garden and swimming pool, and a fully equipped eat-in kitchen. A guest toilet completes the space. On the first floor there are 4 double bedrooms, one of them en suite, and two bathrooms, all of them with very good orientation and clear views of the city. On the first floor, a master suite with fireplace presides over the space. In addition, on the same floor there is another suite with a complete bathroom and a living room between the two rooms. The third upper floor is a large, bright living area with sloping wooden ceilings and fantastic views. The semi-basement floor houses an independent office with several rooms and a bathroom and a lotf flat. This floor also has direct access from the street. Finally, in the basement of the property is the water area, a bright gym, sauna, jacuzzi, 2 large storage rooms and access to the parking for 4/5 cars. This is a fantastic property with an excellent location, as it is located in the residential area of Sant Gervasi-La Bonanova, very well communicated and with the best restaurants and services. It is also close to well-known shops and international schools, with easy and convenient access to the airport.    .

The property has an area of 132sqm plus a nice and pleasant terrace overlooking a fantastic and characteristic courtyard. We access the house through a large hall that leads to a pleasant living-dining room with bio-ethanol fireplace with balcony and fully equipped open kitchen to make life in the house more dynamic and social. The night area consists of two very large double bedrooms that lead to the pleasant terrace with SE orientation, both with dressing room, one of them with en suite bathroom. And a second bathroom, which can also be a courtesy bathroom. Gas heating, ducted air conditioning cold-car in all rooms, high ceilings, fitted closets, parquet floors and a long etcetera of small details that make this a very special property. It is a property of 250sqm, totally outside to street or apple courtyard, with lots of natural light throughout the day. description: Flat for sale with Terrace in Eixample Esquerra (Barcelona) PENTHOUSE FOR SALE WITH 4 BEDROOMS WITH TERRACE AND PARKING SPACE IN EIXAMPLE ESQUERRA Located on Carrer Provença in a modern building built in 1982 with lift and a constructed area of 149m2 plus 40m2 of terrace, a 7th floor flat, a few metres from the Hospital Clínic and the Mercat del Ninot, surrounded by services and shops, it stands out for its spaciousness and brightness thanks to its double orientation SE/NO. We enter the property and find a practical hallway on the left hand side we find a large living room with 4 doors that provide great luminosity with access to the 40m2 terrace, next is a practical kitchen with access to the terrace, followed by an individual bedroom with wall cupboards that leads to the interior patio. On the left hand side there is a single bedroom with wall wardrobes, a complete bathroom, a large double bedroom with wall wardrobes, very bright and quiet, with 2 large back walls that lead to the typical interior courtyard of the Eixample, next to it we find the master suite, which enjoys a lot of light and also has a nice mini living room. Heating and air-conditioning by conducts, fireplace, natural stone terrace, armoured door and a long etcetera of small details that make this an unequalled property in the area. Parking space included in the same building. Can you imagine living here?  .

description: At number 658 of Gran Via de les Corts Catalanes and in the heart of Barcelona's Quadrat d'Or, is located this magnificent residential building, the most significant work of the modernist architect Pau Salvat i Espasa (Barcelona 1872-1923). Built at the end of the 19th century and with a later intervention in 1900, the Casa Oller stands out for its rich ornamentation. Virtuous plant motifs in wrought iron, coloured stained glass, carved wood, sgraffito and abundant decorated ceramics make it worthy of protection as a cultural heritage site. The floor still boasts the original ceilings with their restored sinuous floral engravings in the Modernist style which are unique in their class and also has the original hydraulic mosaic floors from the old Nolla company, as well as the beautiful balconies with decorative tiles. The living-dining room on the floor, upholstered with hydraulic floors, faces the street and the bedrooms face the inside of the block, bathed in the colours of the stained glass windows of the rear gallery and the balconies of the main façade. All the details of modernism combine perfectly with the modern kitchen of minimalist lines, laundry area and high quality bathrooms, as well as a distribution adapted to today's needs, with an exterior double bedroom "en suite" type, another exterior double bedroom and an interior bedroom that looks out onto the beautiful central area of the building. The building will also have exceptional amenities such as a gymnasium, a sauna, a spa, a storage area and a wonderful outdoor swimming pool on the top floor solarium, which will make it an iconic building in Barcelona. The approximate delivery of the houses will be during the third quarter of 2020. "The areas and plans shown are for information purposes only, and are not of a contractual nature, and may be modified for technical, legal or commercial reasons. The original finishes of the building may undergo modifications and changes in their finishes due to technical needs. The final plans and surfaces will be those resulting from the execution of the work. The furniture and vegetation are merely decorative, not forming part of the project or the quality report". The Eixample district is the most emblematic of Barcelona since the nineteenth century. Of a renowned model urban planning devised by the engineer Ildefons Cerdá, Eixample marks the epicenter of the city from its main streets: The luxurious Passeig de Gràcia, the commercial Rambla de Catalunya and the updated Passeig de Sant Joan, housing the majority of the modernist architectural icons, such as La Sagrada Familia, La Pedrera or La Casa Batlló of the great Antoni Gaudí. It is a large, quiet but exciting  residential area with extremely convenient commercial activity, designed to respect the privacy of the homes. The Catalan modernist architecture so characteristic of stately airs, but with great cosmopolitan touches, extends throughout the neighborhood to the delight of those who wish to live modernism from within, since it is possible to acquire homes within regal estates with valuable original architectural elements, period pieces and even historical and protected. Schools, squares, wadis, parks, stores and restaurants give dynamism to the area that differentiates the Right from the Left, both with wide uniform streets, octagonal islands and wide island interiors that mark the internal distribution of buildings and homes. You will mostly find buildings of strong bricks, floors of generally wide dimensions, medium or high ceilings, with balconies that give to the wide streets or the inner patios of the Cerdá Plan. Keep in mind this living in the Eixample district, if you are looking for a neighborhood where you can have everything within walking distance or very well connected to public transport, both basic and luxury stores, trendy restaurants or even your workplace among the many offices and stores, this could be your.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Dreta de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de la Diputació

description: Spectacular duplex penthouse of 286 m2 with 2 terraces and roof terrace recently renovated in the Gothic Quarter of Barcelona. The property is entered through a hall and corridor next to the large partition that leads to the first terrace of 75 m2, equipped with stainless steel gas stove, tap, fridge, storage space, dining area and led lighting, with spectacular views of a square in the Gothic Quarter. Through the partition you enter the kitchen open to the living room, equipped with high-end appliances and an island equipped with a hidden cooking system and induction "Cooking Rack" of a highly resistant material to stains and high temperatures. The kitchen faucet incorporates an advanced, high-quality filter, which cools the water and offers two levels of carbonation to provide sparkling water. Next to the kitchen, a few centimeters below is the corner living room and next to it a space that can be used as a dining room or office with access to a second rear terrace of 23m2. Continuing through the dining room, there is a first double bedroom with en suite bathroom and two showers that are located behind the head of the bed and can be closed with sliding glass doors. Then there are stairs that lead to the roof terrace of 77 m2 (3rd terrace), which has a solarium area, bathroom, pool area and a second room inside a polycarbonate igloo with 360º views and heated by heat pump. In the attic there is a second staircase that leads to another floor of 104 m2 which will be the sleeping area with 2 or 3 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, 2 of them en suite and with a dressing room, whose reform is included in the price. Currently this floor has 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms (1 en suite), open kitchen and small living room and enjoys an independent door to the property. The property has home automation system, air conditioning and heating ducts. The Gothic Quarter is the oldest and most interesting part of the city. It is bounded by Las Ramblas, Via Laietana, Paseo Colón and Plaza de Catalunya, each of these points alone has its own importance and history. With its narrow streets and irregular structure, several of its buildings have been built on the Romanesque remains of the city, so you can get an apartment with at least one wall dating back to Roman times. It is the tourist district par excellence so it represents an assured investment, especially if you are near one of its attractions such as the Cathedral, the Plaza Sant Jaume with the City Hall and the Palace of the Generalitat, the Plaza Real, the famous Rambas, and the Museum of History of the city. The Gothic Quarter could be your neighborhood if you are looking to make a profitable investment or acquire an excellent pied-à-terre in an iconic and storied neighborhood with great history, private buildings, tourism and with all kinds of businesses at hand such as bars, restaurants, libraries, and many magical corners to discover and tour.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Gòtic, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de la Canuda

description: In the exclusive neighborhood of Sarrià we find this single-family house with enviable views completely unobstructed to all Barcelona. The property consists of 5 floors; starting from the top floor, where the master suite is located with its closet, bathroom and terrace. The second floor has two double bedrooms, a bathroom and a sector where it is now used as an office, with unbeatable views. The main floor consists of the kitchen, the dining room, a guest toilet, the living room and a large terrace. On the lower floor there is a space that is currently used as a gym, a large laundry area and a double bedroom with bathroom. These four floors have an elevator to move between them. Finally, one level below is the parking area; it has two parking spaces for cars and three for motorcycles, as well as a storage space. The main feature of this property is its unbeatable views of the city; from Badalona to El Prat without any obstruction. Undoubtedly, this feature makes this property a unique opportunity to acquire a property without equal in Barcelona. Do not hesitate to contact us for more information or to arrange a visit. With its narrow streets and summer houses, Sarrià still has a village feel that permeates squares, corners and stores. It is one of the neighbourhoods with more green areas in the city, full of modernist buildings, some desserts to remember and some “patatas bravas” to dream about. Sarrià surprises with the tranquillity of its streets. Stately homes, narrow streets and traditional squares make it one of the most prestigious and affluent neighborhoods in the city. There is no doubt that the Catalan aristocracy chose it as their favorite neighborhood, since its architecture shines by itself. It is considered the most expensive neighborhood in Barcelona if we look at the price per square meter, and it is one of the most desirable neighborhoods to live in. It has a great variety of educational institutions such as the Sagrat Cor School, the French lycée and the Eina University, among others. At present Sarrià is as well connected as any other neighbourhood through the Ferrocarrils de la Generalitat that links Sarrià to the center. Sarrià is your neighborhood indisputably if you want to live in a stately neighborhood, prestigious, with wonderful green areas, quiet and residential spaces and with a family atmosphere near some of the best schools in the city.

description: Sotheby's International Realty is proud to present in exclusivity this exceptional industrial loft conversion of award winning architecture and design, located in the heart of Poblenou. High ceilings, tall windows and modern design are the protagonists of this highly sought after property and location, and with a private parking garage, easy access to the beach and the @22 district, this unique and rare opportunity will not present itself for long. Contact us today for more details, or to organize a visit. The Poblenou neighborhood is one of the most personal neighborhoods in Barcelona. Located in the maritime sector of Sant Martí, still retains its essence of popular neighborhood that formerly also housed factories, especially textiles, which with new times have become home to new technology companies. The charm of its Rambla full of life, commerce and tapas is the nerve center of neighborhood life where you eat very well, and leads the way to the beaches of Bogatell. In the neighborhood one breathes airs of art, culture and creativity in its museums like the Diseny Hub, its galleries, workshops and the Palo Alto Market. Its streets combine cafes and restaurants of all kinds, in a neighborhood that does not lose the soul of a town by the sea where people greet each other as they pass. In the neighborhood you can find apartments to invest, small houses and industrial buildings converted into fantastic lofts. It is an ideal neighborhood for families as well as for friendly and cosmopolitan people. El Poblenou can be the ideal neighborhood to live in if you are willing to be part of a quiet and friendly community to live in. It can also be a profitable neighborhood for a good investment. If your dream is to live in a warehouse converted into lofts with industrial airs, this is your ideal place, but also if you want to live a step away from the beach with a lifestyle attached to it, where you can eat very well and discover a new place every day.

The property has 3 bedrooms and two bathrooms. The dining room is very large and has many possibilities to recreate a wide variety of environments. It has an American kitchen that connects with the dining room giving it a great warmth. This duplex has natural gas heating and air conditioning throughout the property. Finca excellently located, being in the area of Sants has many stores nearby, many public transport connections and next to the Sants station, the most important of Barcelona. If you are looking for a cozy home to move in from now on do not miss this great opportunity in a neighborhood increasingly demanded and quoted. Call us and arrange a visit!  .

description: Impressive luxury penthouse with terraces and pool in Eixample. This excellent penthouse in an unbeatable location in Barcelona is part of an integral renovation project in a regal estate building dating from 1910 with exclusive luxury homes. Specifically, the top floor is a new construction, addition comprised of 2 flats. The building is on the corner of Girona street, which is planned to be converted into a pedestrian street. The penthouse has 227 sqm of interior built surface in which priority has been given to large spaces and brightness, achieving a perfect balance between traditional elements such as high ceilings and the comfort and amenities of a new building. The property has two entries: one directly to the entrance hall inside the house and the other to an uncovered 18 sqm yard, which can be used as a chill-out area. This yard communicates with the maid's room, which has its own bathroom. Therefore, the staff can access it without going inside the house. The huge 39 sqm living room is oriented to a quiet inner courtyard and has access to the wonderful 44 sqm terrace. It has the best orientation, south, to enjoy the sun all day from mid-morning onwards. There's also access to the 151 sqm solarium, which has a swimming pool. The dining room is exterior to the street and has an open kitchen. Next to it there is also a laundry room and a guest toilet. The night area consists of three en suite bedrooms. The 40 sqm master suite is exceptional and exterior to the street. The second suite is also exterior and has access to an uncovered 18 sqm patio, while the third one is interior. The property, scheduled to be completed in the second semester of 2024, will be built with the highest quality materials and finishes, as well as an interior design that will combine the classics of traditional regal estates with the modern. In the initial phase of the project, the buyer will be able to make certain changes and modify the finishes to his/her liking, tailor made. The building will enhance the presence of vegetation and plants to give it a green character and will have an area for charging electric bicycles. It will also have a private gym with a modernist-vintage style. In the heart of Eixample, very close to Paseo de Gracia, the city centre and all the shops and services, you will be able to enjoy the best of Barcelona in a unique setting. * The renderings and square metres in this listing may be subject to change. These images are merely informative and may change depending on the needs of the clients or changes that may be made during the execution process of the refurbishment project and/or project works. * The floorplan and the content of this listing are not a contractual document, it's part of the executive project and may be subject to modifications due to technical requirements, administration or public organisations. description: Sensational and bright apartment in a refurbished building in the heart of Born. Exclusive flat next to the Palau de la Música and the Santa Caterina Market, in the heart of El Born. The location is exceptional, just 10 minutes walking from Plaza Catalunya and in the most eclectic and dynamic neighbourhood of Barcelona, mixing historical and cultural attractions with a lively leisure and restaurant offer. The property has 92 m2 of constructed area and an interior terrace of 5 m2. It is located on the third floor and is practically all exterior, with northeast orientation, a total of 3 balconies and 4 entrances of natural light from the street, making it very bright. It is located in a building that was completely refurbished in 2001 (façade, communal areas, interior patio and lift). From the entrance, we access to the right to the spacious day area, a cosy and bright living-dining room with 2 balconies facing the street. The hallway leads to the independent kitchen, large enough for a breakfast bar or small table, with access to the interior terrace. The night area currently has 2 bedrooms, with the possibility of having a third one. The master bedroom en suite is very large and takes advantage of the space to have a large dressing room area. It is totally exterior to the street and has access to 2 balconies (one shared with the day area), so it could be divided into 2 rooms. The other room is medium sized and there is a second independent bathroom. This apartment stands out for its high ceilings with mouldings and rosettes. Also, the original wooden carpentry has been completely recovered. It is equipped with furniture, electrical appliances, ducted air conditioning and heating by natural gas radiators. The surrounding area has a wide variety of shops, services, bars, restaurants and public transport options. Do not hesitate to contact Bcn Advisors to know more about this property.

description: In one of the urbanizations with the best sea and mountain views in the town of Alella we are pleased to present from Sotheby's this cozy and modern newly built house for sale. On a plot of 1170 m2 was built in 2021 this house of almost 300 m2 on 3 floors facing south - east which makes that we can enjoy wonderful sunrises to enjoy from any room of the house. The house consists of 4 bedrooms of which 1 en suite with bathroom and dressing room, three double bedrooms of which one today is intended to telework. We also have a living room with open kitchen and access to a spectacular terrace with views. On the lower floor we reach a cozy dining room with barbecue from which we can access the outdoor garden area and infinity pool. -2 complete bathrooms plus -Laundry area -Energy rating B -Parking for 2 cars with electric charger installation. -Latest generation security system High quality materials in the construction have just defined this magnificent home as a very good option for those who want to enjoy a functional contemporary property in a charismatic town like Alella, 20 minutes from the center of Barcelona. From Sotheby's International Realty we are at your disposal to help you in the purchase of this magnificent home. Contact us to come and see it! Alella, located only 18 kilometers from Barcelona, is a small millennial town full of life, surrounded by vineyards, flower plantations and the mountains of the Serralada Litoral Park. It offers a unique environment to enjoy the most authentic Mediterranean lifestyle, being one of the most beautiful villages on the coast of El Maresme. It is crossed by two rivers, has dolmens, Iberian remains, hermitages, castles and fountains, and has a long tradition of wine production with the Alella Designation of Origin. Its proximity to the sea and Barcelona, its tranquility and its wonderful natural environment have attracted many Catalan families since the 19th century. Hence, its landscape is dotted with historic farmhouses, modernist manor houses, and luxurious villas. In recent years Alella has grown as a residential center of quiet and private urbanizations, with beautiful and spacious houses to four winds, gardens and swimming pools. Alella can be your ideal location to acquire an excellent house in an extremely charming village surrounded by mountains, vineyards and the Mediterranean, just minutes away and well connected to the center of Barcelona.

description: Exclusive completely exterior penthouse with unique views of all of Barcelona of 220 m2, with two terraces: one of 212 m2 and another of 100 m2. We access with the elevator directly to the floor where there is only a property of 187 m2 useful, through the main entrance we find the spacious living room and dining room with access to the large terrace of 212 m2 with swimming pool, outdoor dining room, barbecue, chill out area and Spectacular views over the city of Barcelona. Fully equipped kitchen with island and office area, four bedrooms, three of them double and one smaller, two of them with dressing room and bathroom en suite. Another bathroom serves the two other bedrooms. The 100 m2 terrace surrounds the entire property and has access from three of the bedrooms and from the living room and kitchen. The house has 6 parking spaces and a 55-meter storage room with its own bathroom. The finishes of the property are of high quality, including hot/cold air conditioning through ducts, heating, electric awnings and blinds, fully equipped kitchen.. . The farm has a concierge service and 24-hour surveillance. A privileged setting, with a 17,438m2 garden area, a sports area equipped with paddle tennis, football and basketball courts, swimming pools for adults and children, and a playground. The resort has the highest level of security, with the presence of surveillance cameras, security personnel 24 hours a day all year round, video intercom and alarms. A luxury home with maximum privacy, lots of light and spectacular views over the city of Barcelona.

description: Dating back to year 1850 this lovely building is still today an architectural masterpiece and a heritage being well protected by the town hall of Barcelona. It is located in one of the most sought after areas of the Gothic quarter and few steps away from the port of Barcelona and Plaça de la Mercé. Its two surrounding streets are well known for their vibrant atmosphere, amenities and connection with the rest of the city. The apartment appreciates 328 m2 on top of a very open distribution which allows good usage of the space available and further opportunity to divide the apartment in three units, for the curious investor. Entering the apartment you will encounter a large hall with a balcony door to the big inner patio of the building. On the left side of the hall is the large and fully equipped aluminum kitchen that also enjoys a small and private inner patio, big enough for a small table with chairs. Further onwards you will encounter the bedrooms where three out of four bedrooms available are double bedrooms, and one of them is en-suite. On the right side of the hall are three enormous living rooms which later connect with the bedrooms and the kitchen. The apartment is privileged with nine original balcony doors and the living rooms are orientated south, resulting in a lot of natural light and afternoon sun. Above all, on the top of the building is a spacious communal rooftop terrace which has lovely views of the city and direct views of the famous La Mercéd church. The apartment is a unique opportunity for the one looking for a spacious, bright and historical apartment in one of the most attractive areas of the Gothic quarter. It is the oldest district, number 1, the embryo of the city, where all its history begins from the original Barcino, where Roman ruins and medieval Gothic coexist. This district is made up of four neighborhoods, the Gothic, Sant Pere, Santa Caterina, El Born and La Ribera, and Barceloneta, each one more interesting than the other for tourists, since it is the most touristic area of the city, as well as residents. Despite its name, it is one of the most dynamic areas, full of history, art and culture, diversity and very cosmopolitan. Its two markets are especially interesting, La Boquería and Santa Caterina have everything you need from anywhere in the world. The buildings are quite old and many are very well preserved. The floors are generally medium to small, and fantastic historical jewels can be found, such as floors with medieval or Roman walls. So if you are a lover of the city's millenary history, culture, heritage, the most varied gastronomy, the beach, and entertainment, and you want to make a good investment, in this district you can find your ideal neighborhood.

description: Semi-detached house for sale in Fort Pienc  Spectacular villa with inner courtyard and outdoor terrace, located next to Paseo Sant Joan, in the area of the Monumental with a lot of personality, in an estate that carefully maintains details of the year 1900. This beautiful property completely renovated, consists of 180m2 built, distributed on 5 floors, with double height ceilings, an original wall view of the year 1900 and with Catalan volta facing southwest and northeast, with two terraces, one inside of approximately 17m2 and another outside of 40m2, with lots of tranquility and beautiful views of the city. Entering the house, at street level we find what would be the main room, the hall-dining room with a large window that lets in natural light throughout the house. If we go into the house, down three steps, on the left we find a guest bathroom. On the right hand side we have a door that gives us access by stairs, to the basement, a perfect space to make a large room, or a private corner for guests, cinema or entertainment room, of 52m2 illuminated by a large skylight. The kitchen, spacious and fully equipped is illuminated thanks to its skylights and a large window that gives access to the first terrace, located in the inner courtyard of 17m2, is very nice and has a small transparent side closet to store any necessary object that may be needed. Returning to the main entrance and going up to the second floor, we have the living room of approximately 15m2 with large windows, which overlook the interior. On the next floor we find the bedrooms, both are double en suite, one overlooking the interior and the other overlooking the promenade, both with security sales and all of them folding. The main one, is very spacious with full bathroom and large dressing room with fitted closets and overlooking the city. The second, with a double bed and a desk, is facing northwest with an interior window that lets in good light, very cozy and comfortable as integrated, we find the second bathroom. On the top floor we have the water area and the boiler and in front, a sliding door that gives access to the terrace of 40m2 perfect for lunches and dinners and fully equipped to enjoy good barbecues. If interested, there is an option to buy a large parking space plus 2 motorcycles and a private storage room a few steps from the house. With a lot of personality and considered a unique piece in this beautiful neighborhood of Fort Pienc and very well connected, it is easily accessible by public and private transport, surrounded by stores and interesting restaurants.  .
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Dreta de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Terraced house

description: Flat for sale in Eixample Dreta (Barcelona) We present an excellent flat of 143m2 on a real second floor. Upon entering the property, its high ornate ceilings and spacious rooms are a pleasant surprise. Refurbished only eight years ago, it enjoys plenty of natural light due to its double SE and NW orientation. The property has a logical and rational layout and consists of three double bedrooms (two of them with access to a balcony) and one single bedroom, as well as a storage space. It combines parquet floors with original hydraulic and marble. Two complete bathrooms serve the bedrooms. The whole property has heating by radiators as well as split heating. The independent kitchen and the spacious living-dining room complete the day area, where there is a large gallery of 11,25m2 that can easily be converted into an open terrace. It includes two storage rooms and there is the possibility of parking in a nearby building. The property is in perfect condition, offering a daytime concierge service during working hours. Very well communicated by all types of public transport. If you are looking for a family home, stately and cosy, do not wait and ask for a visit. AProperties will be delighted to organise it according to your availability.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Dreta de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

address: subdistrict Sant Pere - Santa Caterina i la Ribera
neighborhood: Sant Pere - Santa Caterina i la Ribera
description: Lovely refurbished penthouse with terrace and clear views in El Born. This wonderful penthouse was refurbished in 2020 and is located in the heart of the dynamic El Born neighbourhood, just a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya and Paseo de Gracia. Its location is excellent, as it's next to a large park and has no buildings just in front of it, which gives it a great brightness and feeling of openness. The penthouse has 56 built interior sqm and a 27 sqm private terrace on the roof of the building. The layout makes very good use of the space, clearly dividing the day and night areas at both ends. The cosy living-dining room with open-plan kitchen has a large window that lets in plenty of natural light, with clear views over the park. The night area has a double bedroom with 2 built-in wardrobes and a large storage capacity, which is very quiet and is oriented towards an interior courtyard; a single bedroom and a complete bathroom with shower. Leaving the flat and going up the stairs we reach the private terrace (which is closed with a key), a perfect place to enjoy, have meals or relax in the open air, with panoramic views of the city. The property is in perfect condition due to its recent refurbishment and is equipped with parquet floors, split air conditioning in the living room and electric radiator in the night area. It ' located on the 4th floor of a modern building with only 4 neighbours, in which the lift with key goes directly to each floor and you can also enter through the staircase. This apartment will allow you to enjoy the lively cultural and leisure life of the Born area, with numerous bars, restaurants, all the necessary services for day to day life and public transport options. It is very close to Santa Caterina Market, Plaza Urquinaona and Ciutadella Park. Do not hesitate to contact Bcn Advisors to view this property.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Pere - Santa Caterina i la Ribera, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

neighborhood: Diagonal Mar i el Front Marítim del Poblenou
description: In the exclusive complex of Illa de Mar in Diagonal de Mar, we find this magnificent apartment on the beachfront. It is located in front of Barcelona Beach and has spectacular views. It is an apartment that has 130 m2 to which must be added a glazed terrace of 70 m2. The house has a living-dining room, an independent kitchen, four bedrooms (three of which are doubles and one twin), two complete bathrooms and a laundry room. The master bedroom is equipped with a dressing room and bathroom en suite. All its rooms are very spacious, bright and have access to the terrace. Among its features are natural wood flooring throughout the property, air conditioning, heating, home automation system. The apartment is offered with 1 parking space in the same building included in the price. It is part of a real estate complex that has a swimming pool, gym, sauna, paddle tennis court, social club and 24 hour security. Located in Diagonal Mar, quiet and pleasant, close to the shopping area, sports centers, parks and the beach, with public transport and perfect access to the Ronda Litoral.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Diagonal Mar i el Front Marítim del Poblenou, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Paseo de García Faria, 81

description: This property is one of the most exclusive in our catalogue. Elegance and comfort perfectly combined with a magnificent distribution and dreamy exteriors. This beautiful property is surrounded by a sunny private 1543sq m plot where we find the perfectly maintained garden, the large swimming pool with solarium area, summer dining room, chillout area and barbecue. It has 838m2 distributed over three floors connected by a fantastic staircase and lift. We enter through the distinguished and spacious hall, on the ground floor, and we find the large living room in three spaces, two living rooms (one of them with fireplace) and dining area, and access to the outdoor porch, the fully equipped independent kitchen and a suite with bathroom. In this floor we find a direct access to the parking area which has capacity for 5 vehicles. The first floor houses the sleeping area where we find a suite with private bathroom, dressing room and terrace, two double bedrooms (all rooms have sea views) and a complete bathroom for general use. Finally, we find the attic floor where we find the master suite with bathroom and terrace with panoramic sea views.  The property has excellent quality finishes such as wooden floors, Climalit glazing, large windows, among others. It is equipped with air conditioning and natural gas heating to guarantee maximum comfort. It also has a tourist licence, making it a fantastic investment opportunity thanks to its location just 20km from the centre of Barcelona and 15km from the airport. Sea views. South facing. Exclusive, elegant and of high standing. AREA: Gavà Mar. PUBLIC TRANSPORT: Bus.

description: This amazing apartment located in one of the most prestigious estates in the famous Paseo de Gracia. Overlooking the Casa Batlló, completely refurbished in 2018 with high quality materials and integrated home automation system. The apartment is part of two independent rooms, each with its living room, kitchen, dining room, five bedrooms in total, two of them type suite with its dressing room. Ideal for investors or those looking for housing in emblematic place with the possibility of doing business renting one of the apartments. The Eixample district is the most emblematic of Barcelona since the nineteenth century. Of a renowned model urban planning devised by the engineer Ildefons Cerdá, Eixample marks the epicenter of the city from its main streets: The luxurious Passeig de Gràcia, the commercial Rambla de Catalunya and the updated Passeig de Sant Joan, housing the majority of the modernist architectural icons, such as La Sagrada Familia, La Pedrera or La Casa Batlló of the great Antoni Gaudí. It is a large, quiet but exciting  residential area with extremely convenient commercial activity, designed to respect the privacy of the homes. The Catalan modernist architecture so characteristic of stately airs, but with great cosmopolitan touches, extends throughout the neighborhood to the delight of those who wish to live modernism from within, since it is possible to acquire homes within regal estates with valuable original architectural elements, period pieces and even historical and protected. Schools, squares, wadis, parks, stores and restaurants give dynamism to the area that differentiates the Right from the Left, both with wide uniform streets, octagonal islands and wide island interiors that mark the internal distribution of buildings and homes. You will mostly find buildings of strong bricks, floors of generally wide dimensions, medium or high ceilings, with balconies that give to the wide streets or the inner patios of the Cerdá Plan. Keep in mind this living in the Eixample district, if you are looking for a neighborhood where you can have everything within walking distance or very well connected to public transport, both basic and luxury stores, trendy restaurants or even your workplace among the many offices and stores, this could be your neighborhood. If you want to walk among the iconic monuments of the city, with the comfort of equal distance to any other point or neighborhood in the city. Consider Eixample if you are a lover of modernist, stately and typical Catalan architecture and a high street feeling. If you want to live in the vital and cultural epicenter of Barcelona, where everything happens.
