suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Sotheby's International Realty presents this luxurious home in the upper area of Barcelona. Located a few streets away from Turó Park, this area is characterized by its elegance and exclusivity, as well as its proximity to the best international schools and its easy connection to any point of the city. The property has 426 m2 plus 26 m2 of terrace. It is located in a building with concierge service and security 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. It has two elevators and a third one for the service. The property is accessed through a large hall that leads to the living room with fireplace, the study with closet, which has a toilet with copper sink. The first living room is elevated two steps and leads to the spacious and elegant main living room that receives abundant natural light, thanks to the large floor to ceiling windows that give access to the terrace of 26 m² facing southeast. To the right, there is a living room with sofas and pre-installation for a cinema room, ideal for watching movies with the family in a very cozy atmosphere. To the left of the main living room, we find the elegant formal dining room with its large central table that stands out for its walls decorated in blue tones and its central golden luminaire. Next, we find the modern kitchen with exterior windows, central island and original ceilings with volta catalana and metal beams. The kitchen includes Italian design furniture Elmar and high-end appliances of the brand Wolf. Thus, it offers two cooktops, one gas with two burners and one induction with four, two ovens and a plate warmer, Asko dishwasher, Sub Zero refrigerator, wine cooler and freezer. This spectacular kitchen is completed with an office table. Further on, there is an adjoining laundry area with an Asko washer and dryer, as well as a special dryer for shirts. It also has a gallery for hanging clothes and a service bedroom with bathroom with shower. Parallel to the main entrance hall, there is the service entrance. The day area and the night area are clearly differentiated. The latter consists of a master suite with large closets and two full bathrooms; one of them with elegant designer shower and bathtub, toilet and bidet, and the other bathroom, also complete, consists of shower, toilet and bidet. Next, there is a hallway with closets that leads to two double bedrooms, each with large built-in closets and northeast facing. Both have their own full bathrooms; one of them with shower and the other with bathtub. The night area is completed by a second suite, which also has its own private bathroom. The property is complemented by four large parking spaces and a storage room. The apartment was renovated in 2019 with high quality materials and stands out for its spectacular finishes and excellent natural light. It has natural herringbone solid oak parquet floors throughout the apartment, white lacquered wooden doors, motorized blinds and awnings, Mitsubishi air conditioning with ducted heat pump adjustable by rooms and centralized radiator heating. It also includes vintage switches in copper color with dimmer light intensity control. It has its own accumulator and water softener, apart from the general water softener of the building. An excellent opportunity for families who want a bright, functional and comfortable apartment in the upper area, very well located and with excellent views. Please contact us for more information or to arrange a visit. Sant Gervasi -Galvany, in the northwest of Barcelona, is one of the six neighborhoods that make up the district of Sarrià-Sant Gervasi. Its limits are: La Ronda del General Mitre, Balmes Street, Via Augusta, Avinguda Diagonal and Doctor Fleming Street. It is a neighborhood that has inherited its character of upper class from its beginnings as a residential and summer neighborhood of the Catalan bourgeoisie. This neighborhood is characterized by its green areas and gardens, such as Turó Park, Tibidabo, Can Ferrer gardens or Collsero.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Gervasi - Galvany, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Located in Rambla de Cataluña, one of the most demanded streets of the city, we find this charming apartment of more than 160m2. The house has four bedrooms, which are located in the sleeping area, facing the courtyard, making this area an almost soundproof space. Of the four bedrooms, one of them is arranged in suite mode, with its closet and bathroom. The other three bedrooms are doubles and have a full bathroom. The night area has a living room with unobstructed views of Rambla de Cataluña. Its double glazed airtight windows allow to enjoy a great tranquility to be in this environment. Attached to it is the dining room, which in turn has access to the kitchen. A courtesy toilet completes this area. Being a high floor, it has the characteristic of being quiet and very bright. This, added to its unbeatable location, makes this property a unique opportunity to own a home in the center of Barcelona with unique features. If you would like more information or to arrange a visit, we will be happy to assist you. In this case, do not hesitate to contact us. La Dreta de L’Eixample begins in Plaça de Catalunya and its central axis revolves around the Passeig de Gràcia and the Cuadrat d’Or. It is delimited from the busy Calle Balmes to the renovated Passeig de Sant Joan and from the commercial Ronda Sant Pere to the convenient Avinguda Diagonal. It is one of the most expensive and exclusive neighborhoods in Barcelona, along with Pedralbes and Sarrià-Sant Gervasi. It is impossible not to make reference to the luxury of Passeig de Gràcia, with the boutiques of the most exclusive brands in the world, or to the stores on La Rambla de Catalunya. However, the rest of its streets are as or more interesting. In them resided part of the Catalan textile bourgeoisie of the early twentieth century, which has left its mark on the spectacular royal estates and modernist houses designed by the most famous architects of the time, as the Pedrera or Casa Batlló of the great Antoni Gaudí. As a result, the characteristic homes of this neighborhood are spacious apartments with high ceilings, moldings, elaborate flooring and balconies. Many buildings and apartments preserve this original architectural heritage and it is possible to find recently remodeled apartments, penthouses, lofts and even studios, which revive these elements, as well as apartments with a lot of potential to be reformed. This side of L’Eixample is equipped with all kinds of services and stores, as well as educational centers, mainly state-subsidized and private schools. You will find it very easy to move around on foot or through the public transport connections to the most expensive stores and restaurants in the city. The Eixample Dreta is the best neighborhood if you want to admire and live in the noble zone of the fascinating Catalan modernism, to reside in one of its characteristic regal estates, and to coexist in perfect balance with the vibrant and luxurious commercial life. It is ideal if you want to walk every day through its wide and tidy streets, with easy transport connections, have all kinds of services and facilities available, including arranged or private schools, and enjoy the most chic, cultural and cosmopolitan atmosphere in Barcelona.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Dreta de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: SOTHEBY'S INTERNATIONAL REALTY presents in EXCLUSIVE this unique Villa of clear Mediterranean style in the charming town of Alella recognized among other things for its wine Denomination of Origin ALELLA and for its high quality of life only 15 minutes from the city of Barcelona. The villa is located within one of the most exclusive urbanizations of the town sharing in its private enclosure social club of games, swimming pools, tennis court and sports center, being the only one that can boast of having double plot of approximately 900 m2 of total of which half is the house and the other half a wonderful garden where we will find different corners with a special charm. On the main floor at the foot of the garden we highlight its spacious living room on several levels that converge in a wonderful porch under arcades that shows us the garden in all its splendor. An office kitchen with laundry area and exit also to the summer dining room, 2 bedrooms with en suite bathrooms and 2 bedrooms which share a bathroom. The upper floor is characterized by being the master suite of the house composed of the bedroom, bathroom, dressing room, living room and a south facing terrace where you can enjoy unique evenings at any time of day and with sea views as the main companion. From the main floor of the house and through some wooden steps we will reach the lower floor where we will find a beautiful English style living room from where we can access the villa area, a games room for the youngest, a golf practice room and a genuine and well kept wine cellar where we can enjoy a good wine at its central table. The lower floor consists of a room, the engine room of the house and access to a huge garage for 5 cars, several motorcycles, bicycles and DIY workshop area. The house has heating by gas radiators, air conditioning in the main rooms, the floors are tiled in some areas and the rest of the house has parquet floors, security alarms and direct access to the communal areas of the urbanization. In short, a unique villa 5 minutes walk from the center of Alella that gives it a great personality. Alella, located only 18 kilometers from Barcelona, is a small millennial town full of life, surrounded by vineyards, flower plantations and the mountains of the Serralada Litoral Park. It offers a unique environment to enjoy the most authentic Mediterranean lifestyle, being one of the most beautiful villages on the coast of El Maresme. It is crossed by two rivers, has dolmens, Iberian remains, hermitages, castles and fountains, and has a long tradition of wine production with the Alella Designation of Origin. Its proximity to the sea and Barcelona, its tranquility and its wonderful natural environment have attracted many Catalan families since the 19th century. Hence, its landscape is dotted with historic farmhouses, modernist manor houses, and luxurious villas. In recent years Alella has grown as a residential center of quiet and private urbanizations, with beautiful and spacious houses to four winds, gardens and swimming pools. Alella can be your ideal location to acquire an excellent house in an extremely charming village surrounded by mountains, vineyards and the Mediterranean, just minutes away and well connected to the center of Barcelona.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Centre, Alella
suggestedTexts.title: Terraced house

description: A real treasure for people looking for a penthouse in Barcelona. Floor formed by a large hall that leads to all the rooms. We find kitchen with dining room and access to a terrace to enjoy meals or a quick coffee. A bedroom en suite with access to the terrace of 62 m2 with panoramic views. Thanks to the orientation of the property you can enjoy the sun or shade all year round. A living room of almost 35 m2 and one more double bedroom complete the property. The area of Turo Parc offers many services and leisure facilities to enjoy the property in the best possible way. Sant Gervasi -Galvany, in the northwest of Barcelona, is one of the six neighborhoods that make up the district of Sarrià-Sant Gervasi. Its limits are: La Ronda del General Mitre, Balmes Street, Via Augusta, Avinguda Diagonal and Doctor Fleming Street. It is a neighborhood that has inherited its character of upper class from its beginnings as a residential and summer neighborhood of the Catalan bourgeoisie. This neighborhood is characterized by its green areas and gardens, such as Turó Park, Tibidabo, Can Ferrer gardens or Collserola mountain. It is one of the most exclusive neighborhoods of the city, quiet and safe, where the price of housing is one of the most expensive in Barcelona. This garden neighborhood has one of the most emblematic markets of the city, good educational services with more than 50 schools and well connected to the whole city through public transport. Sant Gervasi – Galvany is your ideal area if you have children or if you are looking for a neighborhood where you can enjoy nature, with many green areas, in one of the most exclusive areas, with excellent educational centers, a remarkable daytime commercial life towards the Av. diagonal and an attractive nightlife, with restaurants, cafes and entertainment venues.

description: We found this unique property in the old Casa Evaristo Arnús, built in 1868 by the architect Rogent i Amat, but completely renovated in 2002 maintaining some original elements, such as the reception where the doorman is located, which served as a small temple. Upon entering the apartment we find an elongated hall which leads to the spacious living room with unobstructed views of Paseo de Gracia. The fact that it is a corner apartment makes these views even more fascinating. At the same time, it has a southwest orientation, which allows the access of natural light with great ease. It has a large kitchen, which is fully equipped and has a practical table. Next to the kitchen there is a utility room that can be used as a maid's room. The sleeping area has three bedrooms; the master suite outside, spacious, with a large dressing room and a bathroom with shower and bathtub. The second bedroom has fitted closets and is completely exterior. The third bedroom is single, which was used as a gym. The apartment has natural gas heating and ducted air conditioning. The large windows are made of DVH -double glazed airtight- which allows a complete soundproofing and thermal insulation. It has a domotic system for its blinds. The building has security and concierge service 365 days a year. The apartment has 6 parking spaces for cars, 4 parking spaces for motorcycles and 2 storage rooms, included in the price. In case you are interested in this unique property, do not hesitate to contact us to share more details and in that case, arrange a visit. description: Located in one of the quietest streets of the Eixample neighborhood, this property is only a 4 minute walk from Plaza Catalunya, the center of Barcelona. This "Premium" location allows the owners to enjoy all the amenities that the city center has to offer such as restaurants, bars, luxury stores, cinemas and theaters. The apartment, located in a regal estate, has a distribution where the day and night part is perfectly divided. The 3 bedrooms, one of which in "suite", are located in the inner part of the block, where there is no noise. The apartment has a large living room that communicates with the kitchen, equipped with high-end appliances of the brand Gaggenau. The apartment also has a small room as a storage room, ideal for washing machine and other equipment. This property stands out for its light, location and the high quality of its finishes, ideal for those looking for the perfect apartment in the center of Barcelona. However, the rest of its streets are as or more interesting. In them resided part of the Catalan textile bourgeoisie of the early twentieth century, which has left its mark on the spectacular royal estates and modernist houses designed by the most famous architects of the time, as the Pedrera or Casa Batlló of the great Antoni Gaudí. As a result, the characteristic homes of this neighborhood are spacious apartments with high ceilings, moldings, elaborate flooring and balconies. Many buildings and apartments preserve this original architectural heritage and it is possible to find recently remodeled apartments, penthouses, lofts and even studios, which revive these elements, as well as apartments with a lot of potential to be reformed. This side of L’Eixample is equipped with all kinds of services and stores, as well as educational centers, mainly state-subsidized and private schools. You will find it very easy to move around on foot or through the public transport connections to the most expensive stores and restaurants in the city. The Eixample Dreta is the best neighborhood if you want to admire and live in the noble zone of the fascinating Catalan modernism, to reside in one of its characteristic regal estates, and to coexist in perfect balance with the vibrant and luxurious commercial life. It is ideal if you want to walk every day through its wide and tidy streets, with easy transport connections, have all kinds of services and facilities available, including arranged or private schools, and enjoy the most chic, cultural and cosmopolitan atmosphere in Barcelona.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Dreta de l'Eixample, Barcelona

description: Magnificent apartment located in the neighborhood of Tres Torres, 600 meters from Turó Parc and close to all services. In a restored building with concierge, parking and a large communal area with rooms for private events. The property measures 260m2 counting the common elements according to the land registry. It enjoys plenty of natural light throughout the day and a large living-dining room with access to a fantastic terrace with panoramic views of the city and Tibidabo. The property has three bedrooms, one of them en suite with dressing room and access to the terrace and two double bedrooms with shared bathroom. It also has a room for the service communicated with the kitchen and independent entrance and exit. Parking in the same building with a large parking space and the possibility of getting one more parking space. Sarrià - Sant Gervasi is the largest district of Barcelona. It is a quiet neighborhood, far from the places most frequented by tourists. It extends to the Tibidabo mountain and on the Collserola mountain, the biggest green space in Barcelona. This neighborhood of Barcelona was born from the union of two old independent towns: Sarrià and San Gervasio de Cassoles. In the last century, the wealthiest families of Barcelona had palaces and mansions built as their second residence in Sarrià- Sant Gervasi to be able to spend their vacations there and benefit from its tranquility. It is composed of 6 different neighborhoods, which are El Putxet i el Farò, Sarrià, Sant Gervasi - La Bonanova, Sant Gervasi - Galvany, Les Tres Torres and Vallvidrera, el Tibidabo i les Planes, and the six are characterized by being residential, being close to the mountain, but being urban and having high standing housing. It is the most expensive district of Barcelona and it is located on Avinguda Tibidabo, one of the most expensive streets in all of Spain. Today, it is considered the "chic" neighborhood of Barcelona. There are private schools, clinics, embassies, many parks and green spaces. It is also a neighborhood that conserves a village aspect, especially in the part of Sarrià, where there are a great number of narrow streets and small squares. If you like nature, Sarrià - Sant Gervasi is your ideal neighborhood because of its many natural and urban parks and the Collserola mountain, you will have plenty to choose from! The Jardin del Turó del Putxet is worth a visit for its views of Barcelona, L'Oreneta, located on the edge of the Collserola Natural Park, the road to Les Aigües that crosses the mountain.

suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: An ideal location, in the Eixample, a few steps from the emblematic Paseo de Gracia, in a perfectly restored building from Barcelona's most beautiful period. This magnificent apartment has a lot to offer. Its 225 useful square meters are more than enough to have a spacious and comfortable home. Its position on the third floor with balconies at one end and two galleries at the other, guarantees the entry of abundant natural light. Renovated with high quality materials and a lot of style, the property perfectly combines the architecture of the beginning of the 20th century with the most exquisite and modern decoration. The wooden floors, the high ceilings with original moldings provide spaciousness and create an elegant and cozy home; while the sliding doors, which combine glass and wood, allow to delimit the spaces. A stately hallway houses elegant decorative doors, which conceal the service elevator, and leads to the different areas. The right wing of the house houses a large suite with sitting area, dressing room and bathroom. To the left of the distributor we find the dining room and the kitchen, totally modern, in which white predominates and is equipped with high-end appliances. Next is an exceptional suite with an elegant living room, a library with glass doors, an office and a dressing room. Another spacious bedroom suite completes the home. Elegant porter's lodge with restored period elevator and concierge service. A luxury in the best area of Barcelona. Possibility to rent parking space on the ground floor of the same building. Sold fully-equipped. The Eixample district is the most emblematic of Barcelona since the nineteenth century. Of a renowned model urban planning devised by the engineer Ildefons Cerdá, Eixample marks the epicenter of the city from its main streets: The luxurious Passeig de Gràcia, the commercial Rambla de Catalunya and the updated Passeig de Sant Joan, housing the majority of the modernist architectural icons, such as La Sagrada Familia, La Pedrera or La Casa Batlló of the great Antoni Gaudí. It is a large, quiet but exciting  residential area with extremely convenient commercial activity, designed to respect the privacy of the homes. The Catalan modernist architecture so characteristic of stately airs, but with great cosmopolitan touches, extends throughout the neighborhood to the delight of those who wish to live modernism from within, since it is possible to acquire homes within regal estates with valuable original architectural elements, period pieces and even historical and protected. Schools, squares, wadis, parks, stores and restaurants give dynamism to the area that differentiates the Right from the Left, both with wide uniform streets, octagonal islands and wide island interiors that mark the internal distribution of buildings and homes. You will mostly find buildings of strong bricks, floors of generally wide dimensions, medium or high ceilings, with balconies that give to the wide streets or the inner patios of the Cerdá Plan. Keep in mind this living in the Eixample district, if you are looking for a neighborhood where you can have everything within walking distance or very well connected to public transport, both basic and luxury stores, trendy restaurants or even your workplace among the many offices and stores, this could be your neighborhood. If you want to walk among the iconic monuments of the city, with the comfort of equal distance to any other point or neighborhood in the city. Consider Eixample if you are a lover of modernist, stately and typical Catalan architecture and a high street feeling. If you want to live in the vital and cultural epicenter of Barcelona, where everything happens.

We present here the plans of a project that has been designed in this way, but the possibilities are really wide since the structure of the house allows multiple distributions and there is plenty of land to create different spaces to enjoy the garden. In short, it is a house that offers privacy in a healthy environment thanks to the large adjoining park and is an ideal place to live with the family, with good access to the city, just 10 minutes walk from the subway, close to schools, nice views of the city and above all very quiet and tranquility. Ask for your visit today! Sarrià - Sant Gervasi is the largest district of Barcelona. It is a quiet neighborhood, far from the places most frequented by tourists. It is composed of 6 different neighborhoods, which are El Putxet i el Farò, Sarrià, Sant Gervasi - La Bonanova, Sant Gervasi - Galvany, Les Tres Torres and Vallvidrera, el Tibidabo i les Planes, and the six are characterized by being residential, being close to the mountain, but being urban and having high standing housing. It is the most expensive district of Barcelona and it is located on Avinguda Tibidabo, one of the most expensive streets in all of Spain. Today, it is considered the "chic" neighborhood of Barcelona. There are private schools, clinics, embassies, many parks and green spaces. It is also a neighborhood that conserves a village aspect, especially in the part of Sarrià, where there are a great number of narrow streets and small squares. If you like nature, Sarrià - Sant Gervasi is your ideal neighborhood because of its many natural and urban parks and the Collserola mountain, you will have plenty to choose from! description: Mezzanine of 60m² with interior terrace of 15m² extremely calm and quiet located in the heart of the city. Its fantastic location makes this property a great opportunity for buyers looking to enjoy all the amenities of the city. It should also be mentioned that it is well served by a wide network of public transport and has numerous private garages nearby so it is also easily accessible for the private vehicle. At the level of distribution it is equipped with 2 bathrooms (one of them complete and the other as a courtesy toilet), a fitted kitchen, 1 bedroom with dressing room and a large living room perfectly tucked by natural light with direct access to the inner courtyard. Therefore, we are in front of an ideal apartment for Pied-à-terre or for people who want to enjoy all the services of the city in the heart of the city. The old Esquerra de l'Eixample is, together with La Dreta de L'Eixample, one of the first areas of the city to be urbanized. It is located in the heart of the city, between Avinguda Diagonal, Balmes street, Gran Via de les Corts Catalanes and Comte d'Urgell street. This neighborhood with a long history is home to some of the most important facilities since the beginning of the urbanization of the city, such as the University of Barcelona, the Hospital Clínic and the emblematic Mercat del Ninot. The numerous regal, classical and modernist estates that fill streets like Aribau, Muntaner, the pedestrian Enric Granados among others, are an example of the Eixample designed by Cerdà. You can find apartments that are beautiful modernist jewels of medium or large size and buildings that have been completely renovated. A good part of the life of the neighborhood happens in the island interiors and the premises of first floors that occupy small new and traditional stores, many restaurants, places of leisure and night clubs. As the nerve center of Barcelona, its communication with the rest of the neighborhoods is excellent by public transport, and if you have a car you should know that it is very desirable to locate one of the few parking spaces with the purchase of your home. You should have Antiga Esquerra de l'Eixample on your list if you want to live in the neighborhood with one of the widest gastronomic offers in the city, with the most emblematic facilities, with a lot of nightlife and if you want to feel the cosmopolitan spirit of the Barcelona neighborhood par excellence.

This property occupies the entire upper floor of the building, it has a constructed area of 120m2 plus 40 m2 of solarium and a large terrace of 10 m2 at the foot of the kitchen and 2 balconies facing the street, an attic totally exterior to the street and a block patio with visibility and with double orientation (east-west). description: In the center of Barcelona, between Rambla Catalunya and Paseo de Gracia, with views of La Pedrera, we find this modern and functional apartment, located in the recently built Montecarlo Building.Of 102m² distributed in a spacious living room with large windows and unobstructed views, a fully equipped kitchen with high-end appliances, an exterior suite, with a full bathroom and a hydromassage bath, a generous single bedroom and a second bathroom with a shower.Observations; furnished apartment, fitted wardrobes, parquet floors, heat and air pump and parking space. At the foot of all the leading brand shops, in Rambla Catalunya and the Majestic Paseo de Gracia with its fantastic restaurants, an area with all services at all levels. Modern Barcelona was born in L’Eixample, devised by the engineer and urban planner to whom it owes its magical and unique drawing: Ildefonso Cerdá.With his urban plan, Cerdà designed an egalitarian city, where some neighborhoods are not differentiated from others and public services are distributed evenly in all corners. The district is the result of one of the most splendid moments in the history of the city, when it is definitively configured as the engine of contemporary Catalonia and breaks with the medieval past by tearing down the walls.L’Eixample was built in the years of the industrialization of Catalonia, at the end of the 19th century and the beginning of the 20th.The central part, the Dreta de l’Eixample, was the neighborhood of the bourgeoisie that introduced its own style to its house, modernism. Modernism Lluís Domènech i Montaner, Josep Puig i Cadafalch, Josep Maria Jujol, Antoni Gaudí and many other architects created, little by little, the new district.Thus began a new style that moved away from the monotony of the dominant eclecticism up to that moment.Modernism: A style present in buildings of great heritage value that make the center of the district a unique architectural complex in all of Europe.Modernist architecture mixed the new techniques and materials of the moment with the use of resources provided by the various traditional decorative techniques: stucco, sgraffito, leaded stained glass, wrought iron.The work of the artisans was put at the service of the design and conception of modernist architects.A new architecture and a new concept of space that collected the old techniques of tradition and the most innovative, all in a harmony at the service of creative freedom, which year after year attracts the eyes of visitors from all over the world. La Derecha del Eixample is an opulent neighborhood defined by Antoni Gaudí's iconic architecture, with Casa Batlló, La Pedrera, and its wide avenues lined with modernist apartment blocks.Passeig de Gràcia and Rambla de Catalunya are full of international boutiques.

description: 126 m2 apartment in the best area of Poblenou in Barcelona, totally exterior, afternoon sun, very bright, living room with direct access to the 16m2 terrace. Of the 4 rooms available in the rest area, 3 are double (1 of which is a suite with bathroom and dressing room) and one individual in the form of an office, the kitchen is an office and has access to the terrace. It has 2 complete bathrooms. Included in the price is 1 parking space for a large car and motorcycle and a storage room. Very commercial area with public transport 20 meters walk away, schools and playgrounds throughout the environment. Old factories and industrial warehouses, event rooms, design schools, coworkings and office buildings. But also little houses and parks that could well belong to a town stuck in time. Technology and brick. Craft beers and "lifelong" bars. A present full of a past that, hopefully, will remain. What was once known as the "Catalan Manchester" today is more similar to the county version of New York's Williamsburg, but beyond the emerging hipsterism that has taken over the neighborhood, Poblenou he continues to be proud of his “village” soul. However, they suffer from the problem of gentrification, and life has become more expensive in this old working-class neighborhood. The consequences of fashions.. . The main recommendation to enjoy the Poblenou neighborhood is to walk among its streets and buildings, with your eyes wide open to every detail. Because the neighborhood is constantly changing, and what yesterday seemed like a place in ruins today has become a trendy cafeteria, or where there was a mural there is now a startup building. Rambla del PoblenouIt is the main artery of the neighborhood, the most lively, full of restaurants, bars, terraces and buildings with monumental facades. In an environment of mechanical workshops, industries, and fashion venues, this charming street is a bubble where tradition is preserved despite changes.

description: Beautiful and quiet refurbished apartment in a regal estate building in Gracia. This beautifully refurbished property is located in the upper part of the Gracia neighbourhood, one of the most special areas of Barcelona and an ideal place to live or move into for a few months in the city. Therefore, it can also be an investment option with potential for short and medium term stays. The flat has been refurbished with high quality materials and excellent style, maintaining the beautiful original features such as the mosaic floors, the fresco on the ceiling of the dining room and the carpentry. It's located on the first floor of a century-old building with a lift and is very quiet, as it overlooks an interior courtyard and receives no noise from the street. The property has 97 built interior sqm according to the Land Registry. The living room is spacious and gives access to a pleasant and bright gallery, which allows to create a differentiated atmosphere. This, in turn, has access to a fairly large balcony. From the living room we enter the dining area and the open plan kitchen, which is fully equipped. The night area has an en-suite bedroom with dressing room and its own bathroom, which also gives access to the aforementioned gallery, a double bedroom and a separate bathroom. The property has all the charming places of Gracia, neighbourhood shops, bars and restaurants, squares and the metro stops Lesseps and Fontana in the surrounding area. It is also close to the district of Sant Gervasi and green areas such as the Turó del Putxet Park. The flat is equipped with ducted hot/cold air conditioning and heating radiators. Moreover, it can be bought furnished. Do not hesitate to arrange a viewing with Bcn Advisors to discover this flat.

description: Flat for sale in the Gothic quarter, Barcelona. Apartment in the Gothic quarter, completely renovated and very well located, with a built area of 82 m2, according to cadastre.  The house is distributed in a spacious central living room with access to a balcony, and an open kitchen with a dining room. It consists of two double rooms with access to the outside. Bathroom with shower.  Apartment on a third floor with parquet floors, vaulted ceilings with beams, exposed wooden windows and stone walls. Located in one of the most charming streets that best reflects the history of the Gothic, very close to Ferran street.  Area very close to shops, restaurants and well connected by public transport.  With Walter Haus SAFE VISIT you will be able to continue renting and selling your apartment with total security. Our homes and the visits we make are free of Covid-19 thanks to the protocol we have developed:  •Virtual Tours  •Ozone disinfection  •Security kit  •Digital signature  Everything so that you can continue renting and selling your flat with total normality.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Gòtic, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de la Volta del Remei

description: Renovated intern apartment in Sant Gervasi- La Bonanova, Barcelona Exclusive renovated intern apartment of 281m² built according to cadastre and a 16m² terrace in a stately estate with counseling.  The house is distributed in a spacious and bright living room in two rooms of 60m2.  Office kitchen with island, fully equipped with all appliances. Separate laundry area.  4 bedrooms; an incredible master suite with bathroom and dressing room, another complete bathroom with bathtub and shower that serves 2 double rooms. Another large suite-type room (previously the service room). A courtesy toilet.  One last multipurpose room, right now as an office.  It is sold with a storage room included and an OPTIONAL parking space.  The property has fitted wardrobes throughout the house, parquet floors, split air conditioning and radiator heating.  It has a service entrance.  Royal estate from 1963 with a Catalan vault and concierge service.  In an unbeatable location, 10 minutes walk from the Putxet park, close to all services, leisure and restaurant areas, parks and gardens and very well connected by public transport.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Putxet i el Farró, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de Balmes

description: Amazing brand new refurbished penthouse with terrace in the centre of Barcelona. This fantastic penthouse with 65 built interior sqm a 30 sqm terrace enjoys a privileged location right in the centre of Barcelona, a few steps away from Plaza Catalunya, La Rambla and Paseo de Gracia. The area combines the historical and cultural charm of the city with a wide range of services, shops, luxury boutiques, shopping centres and public transport in the surrounding area. This brand new refurbished penthouse has a layout that makes the most of the space. The living-dining room is cosy and exterior. It has an open plan kitchen with breakfast bar. The main double bedroom is also exterior to the street and there is a second medium sized bedroom that looks out onto the interior courtyard of the building. The bathroom is independent. The property has a 30 sqm terrace for private use on the rooftop of the building, which is the perfect place to rest and take a breath of fresh air under the Barcelona sky and its pleasant climate all year round. A unique oasis in the midst of the hustle and bustle of the big city. The property is equipped with high quality finishes, parquet floors, double glazed windows, ducted hot/cold air conditioning in all rooms and TV sockets in the bedrooms. In addition, original features such as the exposed brick walls have been maintained. This penthouse is located in a historic building dating back to 1885, completely refurbished in 2014 with a lift and video surveillance in the lobby. Original features were recovered and the structure is reinforced with iron beams in all floors. Do not hesitate to contact Bcn Advisors to request a visit to this penthouse.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Gòtic, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle de la Canuda

description: Magnificent renovated penthouse in l'Eixample Dreta, Barcelona Spectacular renovated 175m² built penthouse, with 3 terraces of different orientations that add up to a total of 67m² outdoors.  You can access the house through 2 entrances, the main one and one in service.  Distributed in a bright living-dining room with several rooms, high ceilings with the traditional Catalan volta and exit to the incredible 51m² terrace through large windows that allow natural light to enter the entire room. Clear views. A beautiful glass fireplace on the wall that divides the terrace from the living room, being able to enjoy it both inside and outside.  Impeccable fully equipped independent kitchen with laundry area.  A wide hallway leads to 3 double bedrooms; the main master suite with dressing room and access to a pleasant 11m² private terrace. Another full bathroom on the same floor.  Through the service elevator you access a higher floor where there is a last independent room; It is double en suite and has access to a terrace with views of the city. Possibility of being used as a room for guests or for service personnel.  Opposite the main entrance is an office with sliding wooden doors.  The main terrace has a 5m² storage room.  Parquet floors, air conditioning and heating, high ceilings with Catalan volta in several rooms, fitted wardrobes and aluminum carpentry.  The property has been completely renovated with high quality materials and detailed finishes.  Finca from 1940, it is completely restored and preserves all the original elements of the time in detail. It has a porter's office and two elevators.  In an unbeatable location, located in the heart of l'Eixample Dret and the Quadrat d'Or, near Plaça Catalunya de Passeig de Gracia. Close to all services, leisure and restaurant areas, parks and gardens and very well connected with public transport.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Dreta de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: This truly spectacular duplex penthouse is located in the heart of the Olympic Village in a very exclusive resort area. With a large balcony, it has a tourist license for ten people. Spacious and elegant, it is also very comfortable. It has a fully equipped and functional kitchen. The spacious living/dining room is tastefully decorated and opens onto the terrace, with its views. As for the bedrooms, there are 5 in total. There are two with double beds, two with twin beds and one single room. All of them are cozy and impeccably decorated. The apartment also has two modern and comfortable bathrooms and a guest toilet. And best of all is the communal swimming pool, the communal basketball court and the spectacular terrace, with its views of the city. It is located very close to the Olympic port area and Icaria beach. Not far away is the Parque de la Ciudadela, a natural oasis in the heart of the city and home to the Barcelona Zoo. You can also visit the Olympic Port, where you will find the Mapfre Towers and the Hotel Arts, with its fabulous goldfish sculpture designed by architect Frank O. Gehry. With an exceptional location in front of the sea, this neighborhood is one of the best valued among Barcelona's people to live in. It is relatively new, a product of the project carried out for the Barcelona '92 Olympics. Later, the Olympic Village was conditioned to be a residential neighborhood. Despite being young, it has its own personality, with spaces for nightlife and leisure in the Olympic Port, well differentiated from residential spaces. The neighborhood is very close to the center and also well connected by bus, streetcar and subway. It is ideal for families as it has all the services and equipment. The type of housing you can get are diverse: blocks of apartments of various formats, open blocks and two-storey houses with terrace. The constructions are of recent construction and medium-high quality. The most valued points are the location in front of the sea, the tranquility of the residential area, the proximity to the Parc de la Citadella, its facilities and connections with the rest of the city. The Vila Olímpica can be a very interesting option if you are looking to acquire a property, either as a regular residence or as an investment for rent, since rental prices in this area are quite high.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Vila Olímpica del Poblenou, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de Llull

description: This property is very special because of its features and its location, as living in a house in the Eixample district, in a semi-pedestrian street next to Paseo Sant Joan, is a real privilege. Comfort and privacy come together in the heart of the city, just a few steps away from all the services, shops, restaurants and public transport options you can imagine. This house has 180 built interior sqm, a 17 sqm patio and a 40 sqm rooftop solarium terrace. The main floor is the day area, on 2 levels with a mezzanine, which allows to differentiate the living and dining rooms. The open-plan kitchen has access to the 17 sqm patio, where there's a storage room. It's the perfect place to have lunch, dinner or just relax in the open air. There's also a toilet. The 2nd floor is the night area and has 2 en-suite bedrooms with their own bathroom, which are exterior and bright. The master suite has a large wardrobe. On the top floor, we find the washroom and the solarium terrace, where you can enjoy the sun all day long. The basement floor has a 69 sqm multipurpose and open-plan space where you could create a bedroom and a bathroom, or use it as a small guest apartment, a games room or a cinema room, etc. It has an automated ventilation system and skylight from the patio. Refurbished in 2020, the property preserves the Catalan vault and an exposed brick wall of the original house from 1900. It's equipped with top quality finishes, ducted hot/cold air conditioning, microcement flooring in the day area and parquet in the night area, and natural gas installation for the kitchen. It is possible to purchase an optional parking space for 50.000 €.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Dreta de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Terraced house

description: Wonderful 174 sqm apartment with a 5 sqm terrace, totally refurbished, very close to Rambla Catalunya, Paseo de Gracia and Enrique Granados street. It's located in a gorgeous modernist building from the beginning of the 20th century with lift and concierge. The area is one of the best in Barcelona, with a great variety of services, shops, restaurants, leisure activities and public transport. The property has 174 interior built sqm and has a double north-south orientation. It's very bright, as it's located on a real fourth floor. The day area is a spacious living-dining room with a semi-open kitchen, equipped with home appliances. It's very quiet, as it's oriented towards the inner block courtyard, and has access to a 5 sqm terrace with space for a table and 2 chairs. The night area is composed of 3 double bedrooms (2 of them are exterior), a single bedroom which is currently used as an office and 2 complete bathrooms, one of them with laundry area. The 2 exterior rooms lead to an open space that can be used as desired. The flat is in perfect condition to move into and, with high quality finishings, it also maintains original elements such as carpentry in perfect condition. It's equipped with parquet floors, ducted hot/cold air conditioning, natural gas heating by radiators and double glazed windows. Its interior design creates a contemporary and elegant atmosphere.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: L'Antiga Esquerra de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Apartment for sale in Eixample Dreta, Barcelona Magnificent 182m2 apartment built according to cadastre, in a typical royal estate in l'Eixample, near Paseo de Gracia, next to the Ramón Montaner Palace.  It is distributed in a bright living-dining room with access to 2 pleasant balconies overlooking the street, its large windows allow plenty of natural light to enter.  Independent kitchen fully equipped with high-end appliances and a large utility area.  It has 4 rooms; the main one en-suite with a dressing room and an interior terrace with pleasant views of the block patio, another double with access to a balcony and two single rooms.  It has air conditioning, heating and parquet floors.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Dreta de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Located on Passeig de Gracia, this lovely apartment can be found on the third floor of a charming period building with a lift and concierge service. It has retained some of its original features such as the original building façade and 5m high ceilings whilst having a modern style interior. Despite being on a busy street, the apartment is very quiet as it is on the inside of the building overlooking the lovely interior patio.  The property itself was completely renovated in 2018 and consists of two levels: on the first floor you will find a cosy and spacious living room, an open plan, fully-equipped kitchen, with plenty of natural light from the large windows, as well as one of the large bedrooms and a bathroom. Upstairs, on the mezzanine floor, is the 30 m² master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom.  This apartment benefits from high quality finishes such as wooden flooring and boasts high ceilings, in the typical Catalan vaulted style. The property is for sale furnished and fully-equipped (including air conditioning, double glazing, fridge, washing machine, dishwasher etc. ).  A beautiful property in the heart of Barcelona, ideal as a pied-a-terre, or for retirees and second homers.

description: Fabulous semi-detached house in the heart of Sant Andreu, in a semi-pedestrian street. The property consists of 145 m2 built and is distributed as follows: Floor 0: - Hall hall - 1 exterior double bedroom - Living room with fireplace - Large kitchen with direct access to the rear terrace Floor 1: - 2 exterior double bedrooms (1 with access to terrace) - 1 full bathroom Floor 2: - 1 multipurpose room with double exit to terraces The villa has good finishes and is ready to move into. Unbeatable area, very close to the new future AVE station in La Sagrera. Very quiet and lots of light (oriented East / West).

description: Magnificent new construction property on C/Ràfols in the Sarrià - Sant Gervasi district. Located in a privileged and very quiet environment, next to the Joan Reventós Park and the Sagrat Cor de Sarrià Institute. Just 100m from the entrance and exit of the Ronda de Dalt de Sarrià. It is a second floor of 134m² built, with excellent finishes and totally exterior. It is oriented to the Southwest, allowing the entry of sun throughout the day. The day area is made up of a spacious 27m² living room with large windows. Very comfortable island and integrated kitchen, with large storage capacity and equipped with top brand appliances (refrigerator, paneled and separate freezer, dishwasher, microwave, oven, all from the Gaggenhau brand). The night area is made up of three large bedrooms (17m², 15m² and 10m²), exterior and with a built-in wardrobe. The master bedroom suite with shower tray and cabinets and ceilings lined with wood. Another complete bathroom with a bathtub very close to the two bedrooms. This property is assigned three large parking spaces for cars, three motorcycle spaces and a large storage room in the same building. Not included in the price, consult. Outdoor area with community pool. On the -1 floor of the building, it has a large multipurpose room, with a large flat-screen TV, audio, an office area with a kitchen for celebrations, a ping pong table and a gym with a bathroom and shower, for exclusive use. of the community. Excellent finishes, underfloor heating, hot/cold air conditioning through ducts, independent temperature settings in all rooms, Class A Energy Efficiency and solar panels in the building. Very quiet farm with few neighbors, concierge service and 24 hour security. Do not hesitate to contact Inforyatrica to coordinate a visit, we are the trusted consultancy of the medical community.

Excellent finishes, underfloor heating, hot/cold air conditioning through ducts, independent temperature settings in all rooms, Class A Energy Efficiency and solar panels in the building. Excellent finishes, underfloor heating, hot/cold air conditioning through ducts, independent temperature settings in all rooms, Class A Energy Efficiency and solar panels in the building. description: Lucas Fox presents exclusively a brand new apartment on Enric Granados, one of the most coveted streets of Barcelona.  The property is delivered newly renovated and measures 173.21 m2 distributed as a large hall, a day area with a semi-open kitchen in the living-dining room, facing the street and the night area has 4 double bedrooms, one of them en-suite, and 2 bathrooms.  This brand new apartment is equipped with parquet floors, double glazing, fitted closets, Santos brand kitchen, air conditioning ducts and heating with gas radiators, among others.  The apartment is located in a building with a lift from 1919 in very good condition and is within walking distance of Avinguda Diagonal and other coveted streets such as Rambla de Catalunya and Passeig de Gracia.  It has all kinds of services, stores, restaurants, leisure and public transport in its surroundings.  Please contact us to arrange a visit.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: L'Antiga Esquerra de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle d'Enric Granados

description: This house is located on Portal del Ángel avenue, one of the most central and iconic avenues located in the heart of Barcelona. The apartment, which is located on a high floor, has been renovated a few years ago and has a good distribution with five bedrooms and two bathrooms. The property is located in a building dating from 1960, is in good condition and has a communal terrace from which you can enjoy wonderful views of the city and the most emblematic buildings of Barcelona.  Upon entering the house, we find a hall in the center that partially divides the night area and the day area. Next to the hall there is a room that is now used as an office. To the right of the hall there are two large bedrooms: one of them with a private bathroom and both with access to an interior gallery of the patio of lights that provides a lot of light.  To the left of the hall there is a corridor in which we find a complete bathroom, a water area with the boiler and two single bedrooms that could be joined in a large double bedroom. Finally, we find the large living-dining room next to the kitchen. The kitchen is fully equipped and has a lot of light thanks to a large window and a double sliding door that leads to the dining room. The living room has beautiful views of the Puerta del Ángel avenue, with a magnificent southwest orientation.  The property has a large community terrace, from which you can see beautiful views of the city.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Gòtic, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: This large home is located in one of the classic estates of Pedralbes with few neighbors and a large communal pool, with a total living area of 328.3 m2 according to the floor plans. Distributed into two floors with two separate entrances. On the second floor a huge living room that can be divided into different environments, such as living-dining room, reading area and TV area. Spacious master bedroom with a bathroom with bathtub and a dressing area. Fully equipped kitchen with a large island in the middle; access to one of the private terraces to enjoy breakfast overlooking the communal pool and garden, completely exterior and very bright. Machinery area and laundry room on the same level. Going down the stairs we'll find the night area with a multipurpose diaphanous area, which could be used as an office, play area or simply as a rest area. Two double bedrooms with direct access to the communal garden with a pool, a bathroom with a shower and a toilet. Another large bedroom with a bathroom and views to the private garden. From each of the levels we have access to a large and cozy private garden where you can sunbathe, barbecue with family and friends or simply relax. Two parking spaces with a wide access, several parking spaces for motorcycles and a 10m2 storage room are attached to the house. A great house in one of the best communities of Pedralbes, as well as being close to the Diagonal avenue and all schools. A fantastic opportunity for those who are looking for a spacious and bright home in a prestigious area of Barcelona. This district is distinguished by the characteristic elegance of the upper part of Barcelona. It is composed of three districts: Les Corts, La Maternidad i Sant Ramón and Pedralbes, full of gardens, parks and squares, as well as quiet and extensive residential areas. Les Corts is perfect if you want to live in one of the quietest and most elegant areas of Barcelona, away from the tourist hustle and bustle. Within the district is the North Campus of the University of Barcelona, several private schools, such as the French Lycée, the famous Camp Nou, several bars, clubs and discos. It is a very safe district full of parks and gardens to get lost in. This district also has an abundance of stores and malls, such as L'Illa Diagonal, the Pedralbes Center or the Corte Inglés, as well as stores and commerce on the street, including luxury brand stores.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Pedralbes, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Duplex in Avenida de Pedralbes

description: In Avenida Diagonal in Barcelona we find this spectacular duplex penthouse. Completely exterior floor, which stands out for its great luminosity during the day and evening and for its terraces, two of them on each level and a large terrace on the rooftop. On the floor that welcomes us, we find a large living room as soon as we enter, with an intimate section for TV room (and with access to terrace). Just on the other side of this same floor, we find another large living room with exit to terrace, totally diaphanous that can serve as a dining room, since it is right next to the kitchen. The kitchen is fully equipped with the best appliances. On this floor we also find a double guest room (with bathroom) as well as a guest toilet and a room with bathroom for the service. On the second floor we find the bedroom area, all of them of large dimensions. On one side we have the master suite, which integrates in the same room a dressing room, as well as a bathroom and bathtub. The master suite also has access to a terrace that also connects to the rooftop. On the other side of this floor, we also find two bedrooms all with bathroom, shower and dressing room. Finally, on the rooftop we can enjoy a wonderful space of more than 136m2 divided into two spaces one of them with kitchen / barbecue ideal for meetings of friends and family. Undoubtedly, one of the best penthouses available in Barcelona. Sant Gervasi -Galvany, in the northwest of Barcelona, is one of the six neighborhoods that make up the district of Sarrià-Sant Gervasi. Its limits are: La Ronda del General Mitre, Balmes Street, Via Augusta, Avinguda Diagonal and Doctor Fleming Street. It is a neighborhood that has inherited its character of upper class from its beginnings as a residential and summer neighborhood of the Catalan bourgeoisie. This neighborhood is characterized by its green areas and gardens, such as Turó Park, Tibidabo, Can Ferrer gardens or Collserola mountain. It is one of the most exclusive neighborhoods of the city, quiet and safe, where the price of housing is one of the most expensive in Barcelona. This garden neighborhood has one of the most emblematic markets of the city, good educational services with more than 50 schools and well connected to the whole city through public transport. Sant Gervasi – Galvany is your ideal area if you have children or if you are looking for a neighborhood where you can enjoy nature, with many green areas, in one of the most exclusive areas, with excellent educational centers, a remarkable daytime commercial life towards the Av. diagonal and an attractive nightlife, with restaurants, cafes and entertainment venues.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Gervasi - Galvany, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Plaza de Francesc Macià

description: Sotheby's International Realty is pleased to present this fantastic apartment in one of the most sought after streets of Barcelona. The apartment was completely renovated with the highest qualities of the market; all its components were thought to the smallest detail. Its wabi-sabi style gives the apartment a unique feeling of warmth and peacefulness. Thanks to its location on the sixth floor, the apartment is characterized by being extremely quiet, despite being in the heart of Barcelona. At the same time, it enjoys natural light throughout the day as it faces both sides of the building. The apartment has three bedrooms, one of which is a suite, with closet, desk and bathroom. The other two bedrooms are also doubles, one of which also has its own bathroom. A third bathroom completes the night area. The day area has an open kitchen with Siemens appliances, dining room and living room. This portion of the property overlooks the heart of the block, being extremely quiet and diaphanous. In turn, the apartment has a quiet balcony from which you can see the Sagrada Familia. If you are interested in this wonderful apartment, do not hesitate to contact us for more information or to arrange a visit. The old Esquerra de l’Eixample is, together with La Dreta de L’Eixample, one of the first areas of the city to be urbanized. It is located in the heart of the city, between Avinguda Diagonal, Balmes street, Gran Via de les Corts Catalanes and Comte d’Urgell street. This neighborhood with a long history is home to some of the most important facilities since the beginning of the urbanization of the city, such as the University of Barcelona, the Hospital Clínic and the emblematic Mercat del Ninot. The numerous regal, classical and modernist estates that fill streets like Aribau, Muntaner, the pedestrian Enric Granados among others, are an example of the Eixample designed by Cerdà. You can find apartments that are beautiful modernist jewels of medium or large size and buildings that have been completely renovated. A good part of the life of the neighborhood happens in the island interiors and the premises of first floors that occupy small new and traditional stores, many restaurants, places of leisure and night clubs. As the nerve center of Barcelona, its communication with the rest of the neighborhoods is excellent by public transport, and if you have a car you should know that it is very desirable to locate one of the few parking spaces with the purchase of your home. You should have Antiga Esquerra de l’Eixample on your list if you want to live in the neighborhood with one of the widest gastronomic offers in the city, with the most emblematic facilities, with a lot of nightlife and if you want to feel the cosmopolitan spirit of the Barcelona neighborhood par excellence.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: L'Antiga Esquerra de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle d'Enric Granados

description: Bright apartment with terrace for sale in Eixample Esquerra, Barcelona This magnificent apartment is located in one of the best areas in the center of Barcelona, a few meters from Rambla Catalunya and Paseo de Gracia.  It is a flat with two winds with a fantastic terrace facing the sea and a pleasant balcony facing the street.  The original elements have been preserved, such as the Catalan vaulted ceilings and hydraulic floors, combined with modern materials such as natural wood floors.  A large hall divides the house into two comfortable areas;  The day area consists of a bright living-dining room through which we access the sunny chill-out terrace and a large semi-open kitchen with large storage space and work surface.  In the night area we find 3 double rooms, 2 of them exterior with balcony and a dressing room.  Located in an unbeatable location, close to all services, leisure and restaurant areas, parks and gardens and very well connected to public transport.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Dreta de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

address: subdistrict La Vila Olímpica del Poblenou
description: Lucas Fox is pleased to present this property with lots of natural light, thanks to its sunny aspect, for sale in Vila Olímpica, Barcelona, an exclusive location.  It is an apartment that consists of three bedrooms, two of them with private bathrooms, a guest toilet and a living-dining room with an open-plan kitchen.  The property is recently renovated. To the right of the entrance hall, we find a practical utility area and a guest toilet; To the left, we can access a double bedroom that is currently used as an office. Next, we go to a spacious living-dining room that receives abundant natural light, thanks to its large windows and its south-facing position. In addition, there is an open kitchen fully equipped with Bosch brand appliances. On the other hand, the apartment has two large bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and their private bathrooms.  The apartment has great features, such as ceramic and floor heating, which makes it very elegant  The property has two parking spaces in the same building for greater comfort.  Please contact us for more information or to arrange a visit.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Vila Olímpica del Poblenou, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: This impressive 309 m² house is located on the main floor of a fine listed property with a lift in the heart of Barcelona's Gothic Quarter. It is an old palace that preserves the original architectural elements in perfect condition.  The main floor flat has a separate entrance. It is distributed as five bedrooms, three complete bathrooms, a toilet, an independent kitchen and two large living rooms, one with access to a balcony and the other along with the kitchen. One of the living rooms, the kitchen and another of the bedrooms have access to a patio of about 90 m². Two of the bedrooms face the main street and have balconies.  The property has original period elements in perfect condition such as the ceilings of more than three and a half meters high, the original carpentry, the wooden beams and the mosaic floor. In one of the bathrooms, on the ceiling we find a fresco in perfect condition together with a typical stained-glass window of the time.  The private terrace-patio will make this house an oasis in the middle of the city. Finally, it has a storage room on the terrace.  There is a communal terrace on the roof of the building with beautiful views of the old town.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Gòtic, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Amazing new property in the heart of Barcelona. This flat is part of a new building with 10 flats, just a few metres from Plaza Catalunya, Plaza Universitat, Las Ramblas and Ronda Sant Antoni. It enjoys an enviable location in the centre of Barcelona, with all kinds of shops, services and public transport services in the surrounding area. This flat is on the second floor of the building and has 65 built interior sqm and the private use of 9 sqm on the terrace of the building. The living-dining room is spacious and bright, with an open-plan kitchen. The sleeping area consists of a double bedroom and a single bedroom, both exterior, and a bathroom. The second bedroom can be a support to the living-dining room, or can be converted into a more private space for reading, working, music, dressing room.. . The living room and the bedrooms have large floor to ceiling windows that give spaciousness and let in natural light. The property has an aerothermal system to produce domestic hot water, underfloor heating and ducted hot/cold air conditioning controlled by domotics, with the visualisation of energy consumption on a touch screen that also serves as a video intercom). The kitchen is equipped with Bosch appliances, including an integrated washer-dryer. It includes a 10.36 sqm storage room in the basement of the building. The building has a lift, exterior control cameras on the roof and façade, and a communal rooftop solarium. * The pictures correspond to the flat with the same layout on the 4th floor.

description: This bright apartment is located on the third floor of a fully refurbished property with a direct lift to the building. It is ready to move into, since it is in perfect condition and fully equipped thanks to its recent renovation.  The layout of the property differentiates the day area from the night zone. On the one hand, the day room consists of a large living room dining room with an open kitchen and views over the gardens of the University of Barcelona, which thanks to a large window with sliding doors, we can get a balcony.  The kitchen of the house is fully integrated into the living room by mechanical folding doors.  On the other hand, the night area houses two double bedrooms, both with bathroom en suite, dressing room and orientation to the pleasant and quiet island patio. The central area of the apartment, spacious and multifunctional, could be used as an office or as a leisure area.  In addition, the apartment has a practical laundry area and a guest toilet.  The design renovation of both the building and this property was carried out by a prestigious high-quality international architecture studio. It is characterized by Boffi kitchens, Miele appliances, natural wood floors, ducted air conditioning, aluminum windows with double glazing and exterior sliding lattices, among other elements.

description: Lucas Fox presents in exclusive this 94m2 apartment in Eixample Left. On the 4th floor of a stunning modernist building we find this fully renovated gem composed of 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms.  Upon entering the apartment we walk into a cozy hallway that divides the day area from the night area. On the right handside we find a spacious living and dining room that connects with a modern open plan fully equipped kitchen. The day area leads out to a balcony overlooking the street. The dual aspects allows optimal natural lighting throughout the day as well as great cross ventilation.  The night area is composed of two double bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms. Currently, one of the bedrooms is so spacious that it has an office space and a sleeping area. During the renovation the project for a third bedroom was planned ahead, so it would be easy to turn the 2 bedroom into a 3 bedroom apartment as it is prepared to do so.  It must be pointed out that only high quality materials were used during the renovation and the current owners paid close attention to every single detail. Bathco sinks, Bosch appliances and the best aerothermal system are just a few examples of the list of specs. There is also a water softener and osmosis system. The apartment is a beautiful blend of modern and traditional, with original period features such as the original vaulted ceilings.  Another thing to point out is that, optionally, a large parking place at just 40 meters from the property can be purchased separately.   Price on demand.    The apartment is located in a privileged area of Eixample left, right across El Mercat del Ninot. There are countless bars, restaurants, local shops and leisure activity options in the area. The connection by public transportation is great, so overall it's a great option as both 1st and 2nd residence. What are you waiting for? Book your viewing and see it for yourself.

description: Lucas Fox presents this newly renovated and fully furnished apartment for sale, ready to move into, in a Prime location in Barcelona, between Passeig de Gracia and Rambla Catalunya.  It is located on the top floor of a stately building from 1890 with a lift, which has passed the Technical Building Inspection.  All the rooms in this property are spacious and enjoy abundant natural light. Upon entering, on the left hand side we find the day area consisting of the living-dining room with a balcony facing the street and a bioethanol fireplace. This is followed by the elegant kitchen of the Italian firm Modulnova, equipped with a wine cellar and branded appliances.  A wide corridor with built-in wardrobes, we access the night area consisting of two double bedrooms, one of them with a private bathroom. Both bedrooms have large built-in wardrobes and access to a south-east facing terrace. This area is completed with a bathroom with a shower.  The apartment is equipped with heating by gas radiators (which can be controlled via Wifi), air conditioning by ducts with a pump for cold and heat, parquet floors and also has a storage room on the roof of the building.  The renovation has been carried out by a renowned interior architecture studio, with great qualities and creating elegant, warm and characterful environments.  Contact us for more information or to arrange a visit.

description: Completely renovated apartment with two bedrooms, one in suite style, in the historic heart of Barcelona. Located in El Gótico, this regal property is in the heart of the historical soul of Barcelona, a short walk from the beach and Port Vell. An area full of charming corners that transport you back to Roman times. The apartment integrates original elements such as high ceilings with wooden beams and antique paintings with the modernity of high resistance solid oak parquet, lacquered furniture and built-in wardrobes and chrome finishes in the kitchen office. The unit also has soundproof windows with double insulation, sanitary porcelain in the bathrooms, heating and air conditioning for your comfort. It is the oldest district, number 1, the embryo of the city, where all its history begins from the original Barcino, where Roman ruins and medieval Gothic coexist. This district is made up of four neighborhoods, the Gothic, Sant Pere, Santa Caterina, El Born and La Ribera, and Barceloneta, each one more interesting than the other for tourists, since it is the most touristic area of the city, as well as residents. Despite its name, it is one of the most dynamic areas, full of history, art and culture, diversity and very cosmopolitan. Its two markets are especially interesting, La Boquería and Santa Caterina have everything you need from anywhere in the world. The buildings are quite old and many are very well preserved. The floors are generally medium to small, and fantastic historical jewels can be found, such as floors with medieval or Roman walls. So if you are a lover of the city's millenary history, culture, heritage, the most varied gastronomy, the beach, and entertainment, and you want to make a good investment, in this district you can find your ideal neighborhood.

description: Completely refurbished flat with high quality finishes.  Contemporary in style, this property enjoys an excellent location, in a legendary building in the heart of Paseo de Gracia. It enjoys a beautiful natural light that, added to the completely new led and designer lighting, manages to generate a very cosy atmosphere.  At the entrance, we find a double door that separates the hall from the rest of the flat. In this space, we can appreciate the quality lacquered wood details, with a very cozy hall to leave clothes and shoes at the entrance. To the right, also with lacquered slatted doors, we find a utility room with washing machine, brand new tumble dryer in an integrated wall cupboard space. Next, we have the kitchen made up of two different and very practical areas: the sink and worktop area with dishwasher, integrated tap and osmosis device for water for personal consumption and fridge area, freezer and small integrated wine fridge, with niche for electrical appliances; and the breakfast and work area.  We continue through to the living room that faces the facade where there is a bed that folds away into a wall cupboard, a built-in lacquered furniture in the same colour as the whole floor, with handles milled from the same wood that allows to have a sleeping area for guests and its own wardrobe. The living room also has an installation with antenna for tv, WIFI and fibre-optic, in operation.  The living room has a door that leads to the en-suite bedroom, with complete bathroom, double washbasin, integrated mirror with light and demister, separate toilet and shower area. There is a large walk-in wardrobe in the bathroom. The second door gives access from the living room to the bathroom, being separated from the suite. This property has high quality details: bookcase in the living room and under windows up to the suite, tropical wood parquet treated with ecological anti-stain oil, adjustable wooden slatted blinds, electric blinds for the night and a cooling system with very discreet and contemporary linear diffusers. It also has complete lacquered wardrobes integrated into the wall and in the hallway with large hanging and folding capacity, with milled handles on the doors themselves.  The property has been refurbished respecting the energy of the colours chosen to harmonise the spaces in the flat. All this attention to detail gives the flat a special elegance. A flat that inspires quietness and peace in one of the many emblematic buildings of the most prestigious avenue in the city of Barcelona. description: Habita Brcelona exclusively presents this magnificent apartment located on the top floor of Casa Francesc Farreras, a wonderful listed royal estate of Catalan modernism from the early 20th century, the work of the architect Antoni Millàs i Figuerola. The house has several elements of the architecture of the time, such as the colorful hydraulic floors, the stained glass windows and the original mosaics that add color and character, making it a true jewel of modernism. It has a total of 170m2 built (according to cadastre 185m2). The day area enjoys a large space of about 40m2 of living-dining room and a beautiful gallery, with large windows, facing south. It also has a room (about 9m2). The large kitchen retains the original old economy kitchen and a pantry area. The night area has four bedrooms (one with a dressing room), two of them with access to the balcony with beautiful and unobstructed views of Gran Vía, one inside with views of the magnificent modernist staircase and two more that open onto an interior patio with lots of light since it is located on a fifth floor. It has a full bathroom and a toilet that is currently a laundry room. An additional bathroom could easily be made. In the community terrace there is a comfortable storage room. description: Stylish and bright refurbished apartment with terrace and parking in uptown. Beautiful flat recently refurbished brand new, with refined taste and enhancing the diaphanous spaces full of natural light. It's located in uptown Barcelona, close to Turó Park and surrounded by services, shops, restaurants, international schools, private medical centres and perfect communication by road and public transport. The apartment has 125 built interior sqm and a 6 sqm terrace. The price includes a parking space in the same building and the furniture. It's located on the first floor of a corner building, so it's almost completely exterior and very bright. The entrance leads us directly to the day area, a spacious rectangular living-dining room with a lot of length, incredibly bright thanks to its magnificent south orientation and the large windows. It has access to a cosy terrace with space for table and chairs, the perfect place to relax over breakfast or a drink. The kitchen is open plan, equipped with appliances and has a central island. The night area has a versatile layout and iscurrently separated into 2 rooms by a modern glass door. The master bedroom has an en-suite bathroom and is also exterior and therefore bright. The other room is interior and can be used as a single bedroom or as an annex to the master bedroom. In addition, there's a separate bathroom and a utility room. The interior design of this property is spectacular, with high quality materials and finishings that create a contemporary and elegant ambience. The flat is equipped with parquet floors and ducted hot/cold air conditioning. The building has a concierge.
