description: High floor, fantastically located in the heart of the city. Just two blocks from Paseo de Gracia, stands this emblematic nine-storey building, built in 1954 and completely renovated in 2017. The building has in its common areas a gym exclusively for residents, as well as a spa, in a clear commitment to personal enjoyment and quality of life. The apartment distributed in two double bedrooms and two bathrooms, spacious living room and open kitchen. The community has a concierge and security cameras. Ideal for investors or someone looking for a pied-à-terre in Barcelona. La Dreta de L’Eixample begins in Plaça de Catalunya and its central axis revolves around the Passeig de Gràcia and the Cuadrat d’Or. It is delimited from the busy Calle Balmes to the renovated Passeig de Sant Joan and from the commercial Ronda Sant Pere to the convenient Avinguda Diagonal. It is one of the most expensive and exclusive neighborhoods in Barcelona, along with Pedralbes and Sarrià-Sant Gervasi. It is impossible not to make reference to the luxury of Passeig de Gràcia, with the boutiques of the most exclusive brands in the world, or to the stores on La Rambla de Catalunya. However, the rest of its streets are as or more interesting. In them resided part of the Catalan textile bourgeoisie of the early twentieth century, which has left its mark on the spectacular royal estates and modernist houses designed by the most famous architects of the time, as the Pedrera or Casa Batlló of the great Antoni Gaudí. As a result, the characteristic homes of this neighborhood are spacious apartments with high ceilings, moldings, elaborate flooring and balconies. Many buildings and apartments preserve this original architectural heritage and it is possible to find recently remodeled apartments, penthouses, lofts and even studios, which revive these elements, as well as apartments with a lot of potential to be reformed. This side of L’Eixample is equipped with all kinds of services and stores, as well as educational centers, mainly state-subsidized and private schools. You will find it very easy to move around on foot or through the public transport connections to the most expensive stores and restaurants in the city. The Eixample Dreta is the best neighborhood if you want to admire and live in the noble zone of the fascinating Catalan modernism, to reside in one of its characteristic regal estates, and to coexist in perfect balance with the vibrant and luxurious commercial life. It is ideal if you want to walk every day through its wide and tidy streets, with easy transport connections, have all kinds of services and facilities available, including arranged or private schools, and enjoy the most chic, cultural and cosmopolitan atmosphere in Barcelona.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Dreta de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Paseo de Gràcia

neighborhood: Sant Pere - Santa Caterina i la Ribera
description: This property is located in the heart of the Born, the economic centre of Barcelona between the 13th and 15th centuries and one of the most emblematic areas of the city. Just a few streets from the Basilica of Santa Maria del Mar and the Ciutadella Park. The apartment of about 140 m2 built, an elegant and bright top floor. The property has been completely renovated with solid materials of the highest quality. The interior distribution of the flat is made up of a spacious living room, dining room, American kitchen, three double bedrooms and three complete bathrooms. The apartment has four balconies overlooking the street. This property represents the architectural heritage of Barcelona, while the modern design of the house reflects the style and comfort of this contemporary city. An ideal apartment for those seeking an oasis of peace in the heart of the city. It is the oldest district, number 1, the embryo of the city, where all its history begins from the original Barcino, where Roman ruins and medieval Gothic coexist. This district is made up of four neighborhoods, the Gothic, Sant Pere, Santa Caterina, El Born and La Ribera, and Barceloneta, each one more interesting than the other for tourists, since it is the most touristic area of the city, as well as residents. Despite its name, it is one of the most dynamic areas, full of history, art and culture, diversity and very cosmopolitan. Its two markets are especially interesting, La Boquería and Santa Caterina have everything you need from anywhere in the world. The buildings are quite old and many are very well preserved. The floors are generally medium to small, and fantastic historical jewels can be found, such as floors with medieval or Roman walls. So if you are a lover of the city's millenary history, culture, heritage, the most varied gastronomy, the beach, and entertainment, and you want to make a good investment, in this district you can find your ideal neighborhood.

description: Fabulous townhouse for sale, located in a quiet passage with hardly any car traffic, right next to Passeig de Sant Joan, which is a beautiful avenue with wide pedestrian sidewalks, plenty of good restaurants and terraces to enjoy the outdoors. The house is located in a middle point between Passeig de Gracia, Arc de Triomf and Sagrada Familia, so it is very close to all the important destinations of the city, besides being very well connected to the metro station of Tetuan and the central bus station. This type of property is really difficult to find, since in this area there are only apartments, so it is a unique opportunity to buy a property that has no neighbors, neither upstairs nor downstairs, to ensure tranquility and privacy. The day area of the house is distributed on several open levels, which gives a feeling of spaciousness and allows light to pass through the different rooms. From the kitchen, which is fully equipped with quality appliances, there is access to a beautiful inner courtyard of about 17 m2 where you can enjoy the summer evenings, and going up one floor, you access the living room overlooking the whole. Below the level of the kitchen and living room, there is a large space that can be used in many different ways, either as a third bedroom, as a study, as a play area for children or simply as additional storage. The sleeping area is located on the upper floor, and consists of 2 double bedrooms with fitted closets, both with their own en-suite bathrooms and plenty of natural light. Going up to the roof floor, you will find the large laundry room and the sensational 40m2 terrace where you can install a barbecue or sunbathe in the midday sun. The house, which was completely renovated in 2020, comes fully furnished with wonderful designer furniture, matching lamps and fully equipped with quality appliances. There is also the possibility to buy a storage room and a parking space with space for a car and several motorcycles, for 50,000 €, which is only 2-3 minutes walk from the house. The Eixample district is the most emblematic of Barcelona since the nineteenth century. Of a renowned model urban planning devised by the engineer Ildefons Cerdá, Eixample marks the epicenter of the city from its main streets: The luxurious Passeig de Gràcia, the commercial Rambla de Catalunya and the updated Passeig de Sant Joan, housing the majority of the modernist architectural icons, such as La Sagrada Familia, La Pedrera or La Casa Batlló of the great Antoni Gaudí. It is a large, quiet but exciting  residential area with extremely convenient commercial activity, designed to respect the privacy of the homes. The Catalan modernist architecture so characteristic of stately airs, but with great cosmopolitan touches, extends throughout the neighborhood to the delight of those who wish to live modernism from within, since it is possible to acquire homes within regal estates with valuable original architectural elements, period pieces and even historical and protected.

neighborhood: Sant Pere - Santa Caterina i la Ribera
description: This exciting and renovated apartment is located on one of the oldest streets of El Born, where the developers have paid utmost attention to details, functionality and design combined with original features that symbolized the traditional style and attraction of Barcelona. The apartment enjoys a very open distribution, where the entrance welcomes you to the first guest bathroom and a large and elegant open kitchen, all covered in natural wood combined with beautiful ceramic floor tiles. The kitchen is fully equipped, offers a lot of storage space and even leads to a hidden laundry room where there is storage space available together with a washer together and a dryer. The living area offers high ceilings with traditional Catalan vaults and three exterior balcony doors to the street. Movable shelves offer the surprising possibility of creating a second bedroom, together with other options in the flat that truly takes functionality to new levels. The master bedroom offers likewise a lot of wardrobe space and enjoys a spacious private bathroom. Throughout the apartment itself is air conditioning available for both cooling and heating to ensure comfort thru the year. An exciting designer apartment in the heart of El Born that will offer you that little extra. If there is a trendy place for both tourists and locals, it is the dynamic neighborhood of El Born with its particular market, now converted into a museum, after getting some fantastic Roman ruins during its remodeling. It is home to artists, craftsmen and bohemians, with an infinite number of curious and unique stores, which we probably wouldn't have enough time to get to know all of them in years. Even more famous are its restaurants with so much variety to discover a new one every day. The Santa Caterina market with its ceiling inspired by the dragon skin of Sant Jordi is in itself a work of art to be admired. The Basilica of Santa Maria del Mar, the Palau de la Música, and the green lung of La Ciutadella are some of the important landmarks of this neighborhood. It is a neighborhood to live in and to know. Its buildings continue the irregular pattern of the Gothic Quarter, and its streets, although at times more uncluttered, are also narrow. In the basement of the buildings you can find bars of author, art galleries, workshops of craftsmen and stop counting. Sant Pere, Santa Catarina and the Born are interesting neighborhoods for you if you like the bohemian lifestyle, living with multiple artisans, the tapas and good food, living in a neighborhood that surprises you with new stores and corners to discover every time, and an excellent location to invest in a pied-à-terre.

Distributed in a bright and elegant living-dining room with large windows that allow a lot of natural light to enter, these give access to a pleasant balcony with unobstructed views.  The kitchen is open to the living room, comes fully equipped with high-end appliances and has an island that provides greater comfort. One of its particularities is the option to hide it, perfect for receiving visitors.  The night area consists of 3 rooms; the main double en suite, another double and a single en suite. Another full bathroom.  The property has air conditioning and heating ducts, soundproof aluminum windows, underfloor heating in all rooms and double glazing.  All the details of the reform have been taken care of, achieving a modern and contemporary style.  It is located on a royal fifth floor in a rehabilitated royal estate, with elevator and concierge service. Close to all services, leisure and restaurant areas, parks and gardens and very well connected with public transport.

description: This apartment is located on the sought-after Rambla Catalunya, in a fantastic building from the beginning of the 20th century, in which an extension of 4 luxury homes was carried out on the last 2 floors of the building in 2016.  The property that Lucas Fox is pleased to sell is located on the fifth floor of this building. It is a perfectly designed home, with spacious, illuminated and fully soundproofed spaces using the best materials on the market.  When entering the home, we realize that the day and night areas are perfectly differentiated. The day area, facing the interior of the block patio, is formed by a large living-dining room with an open kitchen of more than 70 m². This space is perfectly illuminated thanks to the large windows that cover the entire façade and that lead to a spacious semi-covered terrace of more than 18 m². It is a fully equipped area to enjoy the outdoors and tranquility in the centre of Barcelona.  Returning inside and heading towards the night area, just in front of the main entrance, we find a bright covered patio with access from the corridor through a large glass window. It is in this space where we find the facilities and laundry area of the house.  In the night area we find 3 double bedrooms, two of them facing the Rambla Catalunya and a third facing the bright interior patio of the building. All bedrooms have fitted wardrobes and one of them also has a private bathroom. A second complete bathroom, equipped with both a shower and a bathtub, serves the rest of the bedrooms.  The price of the property includes a parking space in a neighbouring building.  Please get in touch for more information.

description: Apartment with Tourist License in Paseo de Gracia, Barcelona Magnificent 80m2 apartment built according to cadastre, located on the emblematic Paseo de Gracia.  The property is distributed in a cozy and bright living room with a large window that allows plenty of natural light to enter.  Impeccable independent kitchen fully equipped with high-end appliances.  A large double bedroom with the possibility of opening it to the living room or leaving it private. A full bathroom with shower and double sink.  Installation of heating and air conditioning through ducts, double glazing, parquet floors and comes fully furnished.  It is in perfect condition to move into and has a Tourist License.  It is located on the eighth floor of a building with an elevator and concierge service. Close to all services, leisure and restaurant areas, parks and gardens and very well connected with public transport.

description: Fully renovated, furnished apartment of 109 m² located on the third floor of a fully renovated building on Portal del Angel, with its entrance on Passatge Patriarca. It is at the heart of the Gothic neighbourhood, on one of the most popular shopping streets in the city. What's more, the building boasts a fabulous communal rooftop swimming pool, a 24-hour concierge service, security cameras and a gym.  The property offers a huge 60 m² living room with a 65´ TV and designer furniture, a spectacular modern kitchen diner that is in perfect condition and is equipped with a fridge, dishwasher, oven, vitroceramic hob and extractor hood, 2 double bedrooms (1 with an en-suite bathroom and dressing room), 2 complete bathrooms (1 with a bathtub and the other with a shower and a utility area in one of the bathrooms with the water heater and a washer-dryer.  Air conditioning, heating, double glazed windows, led lighting and fitted wardrobes are just some of the additional features of this high-end residence with fabulous communal facilities in a prime Barcelona location.

description: This apartment is located on a high floor and measures approximately 252 m² plus 27 m² of terrace, located in a 1960s brick building with terraces, a spacious lobby with a spectacular staircase and a concierge service, as well as a separate entrance for the service staff. The building has two lifts, the one on the left accesses the main entrance of the apartment. It is located in the elegant and exclusive Turó Park neighbourhood, very well connected and close to international schools and all services.  The apartment was renovated in 2020 and stands out for its spectacular views of the sea and its abundant natural light. It has wooden floors in all rooms, wooden doors, motorized blinds, air conditioning with ducted heat pump (adjustable by rooms) and individual heating by radiators.  Upon entering, a spacious hall leads to a spacious living room with two rooms with a fireplace and original recovered wood panelling, facing south east with beautiful views of the sea and level access to the 27 m² terrace. Next to it is a formal dining room that can be closed by means of sliding doors and that connects to the spacious kitchen diner through glass doors. The modern kitchen features a central island, Doka cabinets that stand out from the original vintage mosaic floor, panelled appliances and a Barazza gas hob. The house also offers a gallery with a utility area and an adjoining service bedroom.  The night area is clearly differentiated. It houses a master suite with a wardrobe area, an elegant bathroom with a shower and a spacious double bedroom with an area for a private lounge or office. This part of the home is completed by a hall with wardrobes, a complete bathroom with a bathtub, a guest toilet and two double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes.  This excellent property also offers a large parking space and two motorcycle spaces, as well as a storage room, all in the same building.  It is an excellent opportunity for families looking for a bright, functional and comfortable apartment, in addition to being well located and with excellent views.  Please contact us for more information or to arrange a visit.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Gervasi - Galvany, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: This impressive property to renovate has an area of 269 m², and currently has seven double bedrooms, including the main bedroom, three bathrooms and an office with access to the interior gallery, but the layout can be transformed to adapt to the buyer's lifestyle and personal requirements.  The property occupies the entire floor with high ceilings and is organised with the day area, where we find a 62 m² living and dining room with a fireplace facing north, and access to the kitchen, office, one of the bathrooms and the two smaller bedrooms (10 m²each).  On the other side of the apartment we have the night area with two medium bedrooms (13 m² each), two larger bedrooms (15 m² and 16 m²), the master room (23 m²) with built-in wardrobe and the other two bathrooms. The three larger bedrooms all have windows facing south, bringing in lots of natural light.  It is in a prime location in the centre of the city, situated next to Enric Granados. It is located more specifically on the second floor in a classic building with a lift and concierge service, overlooking the square with views over the trees. In the neighbourhood you have a great location of some of the best bars and restaurants in Barcelona, and only a five-minute walk from Passeig de Grácia.  This apartment would be ideal for a client looking to design their own home from scratch, choosing all the finishes and details to create a personalised dream home, but can also be divided into two apartments making it a great investment opportunity.  Feel free to contact us for more information about this great opportunity.

description: This 19th century building has been rehabilitated respecting the original grandeur, recovering the mural marks and highlighting its entrance for carriages and a large courtyard. The lift was installed in a way that did not alter the aesthetics of the building, inside a glass structure at the end of the central patio.  This property is unique for its style and the spectacular renovation. It consists of about 100 m 2 and has 4-meter ceilings, a hydraulic system in perfect condition and recently renovated insulating closures. It has an intelligent layout: two bedrooms, two full bathrooms and a large day area. Here, we find the large dining room living room and open kitchen, both rooms with a balcony overlooking the street. One of the rooms has gas heating and ducted air conditioning. The apartment consists of an open kitchen integrated into a spacious dining room living room, whose hydraulic mosaic floors are still preserved, two very spacious and quiet double bedrooms (one of them with a private bathroom) and a complete bathroom for general use.

description: Apartment in a royal estate next to Paseo de Gracia of 214 m2 built according to cadastre.  The useful floor area is 189'10 m2.  The house is distributed in a large hall through which we access a living room, separate kitchen, 4 double bedrooms and one single, a full bathroom and a second bathroom with two separate toilets. The rooms are distributed along a corridor 30 meters long and 1.40 meters wide.  The location of the hall, with access from the stairwell and the elevator, allows the division of the apartment into two areas, one for housing and the other for a professional office.  The floor preserves the original pavement from the beginning of the 20th century, with hydraulic tiles.  The ceilings of all the rooms have geometric pattern plaster moldings. Ceiling height: 3'20 m.  Freshly painted, with walls and ceilings in very good condition.  The apartment has the services of water, natural gas (boiler for AC and heating), and electricity.  The apartment has a community elevator and a second elevator directly inside the apartment. The access to the farm has video surveillance cameras and a concierge from Monday to Friday.  The farm is located at the end of Paseo de Gracia, that is, at the beginning of Gran de Gracia street and therefore located in front of the Hotel Casa Fuster, 5 * great luxury. Farm with 12 neighbors. Less than a minute's walk from the farm there is a SABA car park, bus and metro.  With Walter Haus SAFE VISIT you will be able to continue renting and selling your apartment with total security. Our homes and the visits we make are free of Covid-19 thanks to the protocol we have developed:  •Virtual Tours  •Ozone disinfection  •Security kit  •Digital signature  Everything so that you can continue renting and selling your flat with total normality.

description: Renovated apartment with parking for sale in Via Laietana Wonderful renovated apartment on a fourth real floor with elevator, it is very quiet because it is inside and overlooks the block patio facing southwest, in a building completely rehabilitated at the end of the nineties, maintaining its façade from the year 1840.  It has a constructed area of 88m², distributed in a bright living-dining room with large windows that allow plenty of natural light to enter. Integrated open kitchen, equipped with good quality appliances.  The night area is made up of three rooms; two doubles and one single, both with built-in wardrobes, two bathrooms, one of them en suite. The floors are parquet, there is air conditioning and heating ducts. All windows have double glass to ensure sound insulation.  The price includes a parking space on the farm.  Its location is strategic, in front of the Palau de la Música, very close to Plaza Urquinaona, Plaza Catalunya, Paseo del Angel, Paseo de Gracia and Las Ramblas, it is between the Gothic Quarter and El Borne. Surrounded by bars, restaurants, shops, theaters, boutiques, Santa Caterina market, and much more.  Do not miss the opportunity to meet him!

description: This wonderful exterior refurbished flat has a 342 sqm surface according to the Land Registry (328 sqm of housing and 14 sqm of common elements). It's a jewel in the heart of the historic centre of Barcelona, very close to the sea. It's located on the 2nd real floor of a classic mid-19th century building with a lift. The property stands out for its spacious, multi-purpose, well-distributed and open-plan spaces, which allow them to be adapted to almost any use. In addition, it's very bright, as it's corner and practically exterior in its whole, with 7 balconies that have the best orientation (south and east) and offer incredible views of the surroundings of the Gothic Quarter. The apartment features a large entrance hall, a living-dining room, a study area, a very big kitchen with a 3-metre island and integrated high-end home appliances, which has access to a cosy interior terrace, and a laundry room. The night area consists of 4 double bedrooms (3 of them are exterior), dressing rooms, 2 large bathrooms with shower tray and a guest toilet. This property can be segregated into 2 or 3 apartments, which makes it a very profitable investment. It's equipped with parquet floors and natural gas heating. The great location of this flat will allow you to enjoy every day the charm of the streets and corners full of history of Barcelona, with all the cafes, restaurants, services and public transport in the area.

description: Awesome apartment with terrace and beautiful sea and city views in Poblenou. This exceptional flat stands out for its fantastic terrace and its incredible panoramic views of the sea and the city of Barcelona, which can also be enjoyed from the rooms. It's located on the 13th floor of a modern building on the seafront, with a parking space included in the price, in the Poblenou neighbourhood, just a few steps from the Mar Bella beach. The proeprty, with 113 built interior sqm and a 19 sqm terrace, is exterior in all its rooms and extremely bright. The living-dining room is spacious and has access to the terrace, a perfect place to relax looking at the sea. The kitchen, equipped with home appliances, has space for a small table where you can have breakfast or a quick snack. The night area features 3 bedrooms: a suite with its own bathroom, a double bedroom and a medium-sized bedroom, as well as a separate bathroom. From the two large bedrooms, there's an outstanding panoramic view of the sea, the city and the mountains, while the other offers sea views. All bedrooms have built-in wardrobes. The property has parquet floors and ducted air conditioning and heating. The building has a lift and concierge. The flat is very close to the Park and the Rambla del Poblenou, in a relaxed and quiet environment with many services, shops, proximity to Diagonal Mar and its shopping mall, and metro stop at 10 minutes walking distance. Do not hesitate to contact Bcn Advisors to visit this apartment.

description: Apartment for sale with community pool, parking and storage room in Villa Olímpica, Barcelona 143 m2 apartment built with terraces and common areas, in one of the most splendid communities of the Olympic Village, with 24-hour security. The community area has an area of 5,000 m2 that includes green areas with pergolas, a large swimming pool and a children's area.  Very bright apartment of 109 m2 useful between housing and terrace, is distributed in a living room and kitchen with access to the terrace, 4 bedrooms (1 suite, 2 doubles and 1 single) and 2 bathrooms. All rooms and bathrooms have a window to the outside.  Gas heating, solar panels and accumulator for sanitary water, ducted air conditioning and parquet floors.  It offers a parking space included in the price and a 10m2 storage room with 3m high ceilings, with a large storage capacity for cabinets, shelves, bicycles and sporting goods. description: With spectacular 270º sea and mountain views we present in the beautiful town of Alella this unique villa whose architecture comes from the influences of the famous New York architect Robert Stern where he managed to merge the beauty of a Catalan farmhouse with the ingenious contemporary lines that characterize him so much. Its design has motivated different decoration - architecture magazines to make reports about it. Built on a plot of 2.300m2 where privacy is one of its greatest added values, we find this villa of 2 floors with about 450 m2. From the main floor we access the house and only by opening the front door we already have the view of the pool, the garden and the sea in the distance. This floor is dominated by a large living room full of natural light with access to the garden and pool that will make most of the time we will spend in this area of the house; We also find on this floor the current kitchen of the house, a room adjacent to the living room to watch TV, a guest bathroom and finally the service area. We access the upper floor through a beautiful and wide marble staircase where we will find all the rooms of the house with stunning sea views and a common terrace for all of them from where we can appreciate from sunrise in the morning to almost sunset in the afternoon. The villa is surrounded by a well-kept garden integrating the swimming pool into it, giving this space a unique added value to the property. Through the access ramp to the villa we will find a closed garage for 3 cars and with the possibility of parking several more cars uncovered. From Sotheby's International Realty we will be happy to give you all the extra information you need about this wonderful villa that we put at your disposal. We are waiting for your call! Alella, located only 18 kilometers from Barcelona, is a small millennial town full of life, surrounded by vineyards, flower plantations and the mountains of the Serralada Litoral Park. It offers a unique environment to enjoy the most authentic Mediterranean lifestyle, being one of the most beautiful villages on the coast of El Maresme. It is crossed by two rivers, has dolmens, Iberian remains, hermitages, castles and fountains, and has a long tradition of wine production with the Alella Designation of Origin. Its proximity to the sea and Barcelona, its tranquility and its wonderful natural environment have attracted many Catalan families since the 19th century. Hence, its landscape is dotted with historic farmhouses, modernist manor houses, and luxurious villas. In recent years Alella has grown as a residential center of quiet and private urbanizations, with beautiful and spacious houses to four winds, gardens and swimming pools. Alella can be your ideal location to acquire an excellent house in an extremely charming village surrounded by mountains, vineyards and the Mediterranean, just minutes away and well connected to the center of Barcelona.

description: In a Prime location in Barcelona, Lucas Fox presents a fantastic penthouse for sale located on Enric Granados St. It is located on the top floor of a building in perfect condition, dating back to 1919, with a lift.  The property has been renovated and furnished by a renowned architecture and interior design studio in Barcelona, with great attention down to the smallest detail.  It has three double bedrooms, two of them en-suite, and three bathrooms with a shower.  Upon entering the apartment, we find a large hallway that leads us, on the left-hand side, to the social area of the apartment, which offers a spacious living-dining room with access to a small terrace, the gallery and the semi-open kitchen from the Italian brand Modulnova, fully equipped with brand name appliances.  We also find a double bedroom en-suite with fitted closets, as well as a bathroom with shower in the hallway.  On the right-hand side of the entrance of the apartment, we find two exterior-facing ouble bedrooms with fitted closets, one of them en-suite.  We also find a multipurpose area and the laundry room.  The apartment is equipped with gas radiator heating, ducted air conditioning with hot and cold pump, parquet floors, double-glazed windows, among others.  Please contact us to arrange a visit.

The home has a convenient layout with a well differentiated day and night area, as well as a sunny terrace and garden attached to the spacious living room.    The duplex enjoys plenty of direct sunlight and the garden is ideal for installing a swimming pool. description: Fantastic 160 m² penthouse for sale on Gran Via de les Corts Catalanes, in the Eixample Left. It is located in a building from 1900 with a nice facade. The property enjoys plenty of natural light throughout the day.  On entering the property, we find a hall that distinguishes the living area and the night area. In the central part is the fully equipped kitchen. Next to it, we find the living room with direct access to a south-facing terrace with privileged views of Barcelona and Montjuic, enjoying direct sun most of the day.  In the other wing of the apartment we find the night area. It is made up of four bedrooms, three doubles and one single. The master bedroom has a large full bathroom en suite. The other two double bedrooms are exterior and, like the terrace, enjoy completely open views over Barcelona, being able to see Tibidabo. The fourth bedroom is a single and overlooks a block patio. A second large full bathroom is available for the other three bedrooms.  The property enjoys air conditioning and heating by ducts, as well as gas heating by radiators.  The property is completed by a guest toilet and a utility area.  The penthouse is made up of two separately registered entities, allowing it to be segregated into two dwellings.  Do not hesitate to contact us for more information on this penthouse with great renovation potential.

It consists of four bedrooms (one suite), a large living room with a fireplace open to a 17 m2 terrace with afternoon sun and four bedrooms plus an office.  A small hall gives us access to the central area of the house and a spacious living room that leaves the separate kitchen and a utility room behind. This living room has high vaulted ceilings, access to a beautiful terrace of almost 20 m2 and is dominated by a stylish fireplace finished in marble. Here, we find a staircase that leads to the first floor of the property: the night area. This part consists of four bedrooms, a full bathroom, access to a second terrace of more than 40 m2 and a comfortable laundry room equipped with a washer and dryer.

description: This 130 m² apartment is a true gem in the heart of the Gothic Quarter. Located at the third and last floor with a lift, to the left from the entrance you will find a living room full of natural light, a balcony overlooking Plaza dels Traginers and access to the first smaller bedroom (17 m²). On the other side, the first bathroom, a spacious storage room and the dining room that leads into the other two larger bedrooms (18.80 m² and 23.52 m²) and the fully equipped kitchen with a wooden bench.  Every room in the property is spacious and has a lot of natural light coming in. The apartment is also equipped with an additional storage room and a second bathroom with a bathtub, which can be connected to the largest bedroom to make a stylish ensuite.  In renovating the apartment, the new owner will also enjoy the possibility to play with the distributions in order to create a luxury property within an historical building in Barcelona which built in 1863 in full modernist architecture.  Lastly, on the northeast side of the apartment you have an astonishing view over the Roman walls from the balconies, dated from the III-IV century. This point is of interest as it is a ruin from the ancient circular tower that defended one of the corners of the fortification.  Do not miss the opportunity to live in a historic part of Barcelona while being surrounded by everything that the Gothic Quarters has to offer.  Please contact us to visit this unique apartment.

description: This impressive contemporary apartment is located on the twenty-first floor of a modern building (2008) on the seafront in Diagonal Mar. It enjoys direct sea and city views from its fabulous 85 m² wrap-around terrace, is just a few metres from the excellent Diagonal Mar shopping centre and the beach and only 30 minutes from the airport.  The building boasts outstanding communal facilities such as 4 lifts, a service lift direct from the garage and a communal garden with 2 swimming pools, dressing rooms, sauna, gym and padel tennis courts, making this the ideal lifestyle property with the beach and city on the doorstep. Furthermore, there is a 24-hour security service and one spacious parking space and a large storage room are included in the price.  The apartment is arranged over two floors.  The current owners have completely renovated the apartment, engaging leading architectural design practice Collett-Zarzycki to design the interiors and furniture and it's conversion from 3 to 2 bedrooms.    On entering, we find the superb, bright living room with direct access to the terrace which includes a private swimming pool. Next to this is the fully equipped kitchen-diner, also with access to an outside dining area. On the upper floor, the master bedroom benefits from its own dressing area and bathroom, while the other bedroom, on the lower floor, has a second complete bathroom.  The property is presented in excellent condition and stands out for the quality of its finishes, wonderful views, communal facilities and enviable location. Ideal for families and as a secondary residence.

description: We find this wonderful new property on the principal floor of an ultra-modern building with properties designed by prestigious architect firm GCA Architects, combining new technology with a cutting-edge design. This is reflected in the exceptionally high quality finishes and materials used, including: Natural oak parquet flooring Modern, luxury Bulthaup kitchens, fully equipped with high-end appliances (oven, induction hob, microwave, fridge freezer, dishwasher) and white marble countertops and splash backs Utility area with washer/dryer Double glazed windows Energy efficient installations including aerothermal heating and air conditioning systems This spacious apartment measures 258 m² and benefits from high ceilings and large windows, ensuring abundant natural light. It offers an open-plan living – dining room and kitchen and 4 double bedrooms and 4 bathrooms. What's more, there is a sensational private terrace of some 120 m² which is ideal for relaxing with friends, sunbathing and dining al fresco.    A concierge service, along with 24-hour security, a parking space and storage room, make this brand new property an enviable home or an excellent investment at the heart of Barcelona.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Dreta de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Lucas Fox presents this exceptional detached house in Pedralbes, surrounded by private gardens and trees in the heart of Catalan capital.  The property, from 1989 and with a functional design, is divided into four floors and stands out for the luminosity and tranquility of its spacious rooms. In addition, it offers exclusive amenities, such as a 330 m² front garden with swimming pool, jacuzzi and barbecue area; another 96 m² garden; a master suite suite with dressing room, terrace and sea views; access to the communal area with swimming pool and tennis court, and a garage with capacity for four cars and motorcycles. The house is included within a private compound with several houses, which we access through a 24-hour security control.  If we come by car, we enter through a ramp to the private underground garage of the enclosure after passing the access control, which has 81 m², two folding doors and capacity for four cars and motorcycles. From the garage, there is easy access to the lift and the stairs, which communicate with all the floors. The rest of the floor consists of a cellar- dining room wine cellar, a pantry, a utility room with a bathroom and a gym.  For its part, pedestrian access is direct from the street. After crossing a well-kept and pleasant 96 m² garden, we find the main entrance and the service entrance. The ground floor, located at garden level, houses an elegant lobby that gives access to all rooms. In this area, we also see a presidential staircase, lift and a guest toilet. Next, we find a spacious and sunny living room with two rooms facing south, with large windows to the garden and a balcony to the porch with sofas.  Sliding doors allow the living room to be joined with the spacious formal dining room, which connects with the kitchen and the porch. The kitchen, with a square floor, is spacious and bright. In addition, it has renovation options, an office area and a small courtyard. Next to it, we find the service access and its bedroom with bathroom.  We access the first floor from the lobby, where we find a central hall. On this floor, we have the spacious master suite suite with two full bathrooms, which has a dressing room and access to the 7.50 m² terrace with sea views. Next to it, we have a double room, which is currently used as an office. The floor is completed by a large double bedroom en suite with a dressing room and a full bathroom.  Next, we access the second floor, a single space under the sloping roof with two double rooms with a mezzanine and access to a 16 m² terrace with sea views.  Among its exclusive finishes, we highlight the travertine marble and solid parquet floors, materials that provide a warm touch to the rooms, and the beautiful white brick facades on the green of the garden. Likewise, it is equipped with air conditioning, radiator heating, double-glazed windows and alarm, which guarantees your maximum comfort at any time.  In short, it is an extraordinary luxury property with a large garden and community pool in one of the best neighborhoods in Barcelona.  Do not hesitate to contact us to visit this magnificent property.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Pedralbes, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: House

description: Lucas Fox exclusively presents this beautiful south-facing corner property, located in a modernist building from 1930 located on Gran Via de les Corts Catalanes, very close to Plaça Monumental and the metro station.  This 170 m² home with beautiful period features, high coffered ceilings, mosaic tiled flooring and original carpentry, exudes all the charm of modernist Barcelona.  Upon entering, there is a hall with restored old stairs that lead to the lower floor, where there is a bedroom or office, a guest toilet and windows that overlook the interior courtyard of the building.  The main floor has a kitchen with dining area, a semi-open living-dining room with a balcony and an attractive gallery with a living room, with majestic columns from floor to ceiling. This floor offers 2 double bedrooms, a full bathroom, and the master bedroom with its own bathroom.  According to the plans, the property has dimensions of 170 m² in total (148 m² appear in the Nota Simple). In addition, it has a storage room.  An exquisite period property with typical Eixample architectural elements, abundant natural light and a very practical layout.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Fort Pienc, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: This fantastic dual aspect property has a surface area of 183 m², with 3 bedrooms, a stufy and 2 bathrooms. It enjoys a privileged location in the city centre, on the same block as Gaudí's La Pedrera, on Carrer Pau Claris, next to Carrer Provença and Passeig de Gracia. It has privileged views of a beautiful inner courtyard of the Eixample and unbeatable lighting.  The property is located on the sixth floor of a beautiful historic building from 1897. The building, which has a beautiful entrance with marble finishes and a classic-style lift, is in a perfect condition, as are the facades and the inner courtyards.  Upon entering the home, we find the central living area to the right of the entrance. We find a magnificent living-dining room, which opens onto a beautiful gallery that gives the home a lot of light thanks to the height of the windows. This in turn serves as a terrace, since opening the windows gives us the feeling of being outside. The large kitchen, fully equipped and adjoining the dining room, has an opening for a serving hatch. In front, we find a storage room. Returning to the centre of the home, we find to one side the water room and a complete bathroom. On the other side we find a single bedroom.  Continuing down the corridor, we find the office, a generously sized double bedroom and finally, the majestic master suite. This suite is made up of a sleeping area, a separate dressing room and a complete bathroom. Both the bedroom and the dressing room have double balcony doors through which we access the balcony overlooking Carrer Pau Claris and which protects the home from street noise.  The property was completely renovated around 2005, and we can see how original elements have been preserved and restored, such as mouldings, doors, frames, windows and balcony doors, in addition to the Catalan vaulted ceilings that could be recovered. The entire home has natural wood parquet flooring, except for the kitchen and bathrooms. Heating and air conditioning are provided by a centralized system with distribution through ducts.  Contact us to visit this exclusive home in a privileged location.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Dreta de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: This property is located in the heart of Poblenou, a few steps from the market. It is newly renovated with Scandinavian touches, excellent qualities and a unique proposal. It consists of three fully independent floors and two commercial premises at street level (one of 22 m 2 and another of 77 m 2 built), as well as a large terrace of almost 160 m 2.  On the ground floor, in addition to the premises mentioned above, we find the first residential unit. This apartment has a total of 136 m 2 distributed between the living room - dining room with an open kitchen, a complete bathroom with access to an 18 m 2 terrace and a 49 m 2 mezzanine with a bedroom and complete bathroom.  On the second floor, which we access by a beautiful exposed brick staircase, we find the other two floors sharing a landing: the largest has almost 100 m2 built and is access through the living room. In turn, it gives us access to the rest of the apartment, passing through a semi-open kitchen and a hall that leads to a complete bathroom, two double rooms and a single room. For its part, the other unit, of almost 73 m 2 built, has its access through the living room with open kitchen. Likewise, a small and large hall (which can be used as a work area) leads us to the night area, which consists of a suite with a full bathroom and dressing room.  Finally, we highlight a huge terrace at the top, with a covered area, barbecue and full kitchen.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Poblenou, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: House

description: Upon entering the property, we are greeted by a generous and stately hall with a beautiful custom-made wardrobe. To your left and in the background, we find the large dining room living room. This room generates a great feeling of spaciousness thanks to the construction by pillars that gives the property very open spaces. From this room, there is access to a balcony with an excellent orientation and size. Going back, we find a semi-open kitchen in the dining room, large and fully equipped with appliances from the best brands, a wine cellar and even two different areas. In addition, it has a large surface for cooking and access to a gallery with a patio.  From the living room, we can access the main room en suite, which is majestic due to its dimensions or its exterior layout. Here, we find a study area, built-in wardrobes and a bathroom with a hydromassage bathtub, shower and double sink.  To the right of the entrance hall, we have the rest of the rooms, where we highlight the second room en suite. This room has the same configuration as the main one: study area, exterior orientation and lots of light, as well as built-in wardrobes and an en-suite bathroom with a bathtub. Next to this room, we find two other double rooms with a shared bathroom with shower.  The property has been recently renovated with a particular design, using the best materials and with exquisite finishes. Two combined types of marble have been used for the communal areas, such as the entrance hall, kitchen and dining room living room, and another type of marble for the bathrooms. For their part, the bedrooms have natural oak parquet. Several rooms have been overthrown with designer wallpaper on the walls and all the exterior enclosures are of high quality, made of aluminum and with double glazing. We also have heating by radiators and air conditioning and heating by ducts.  The building, with an exposed brick façade from the 70s, is in very good condition and has a concierge service, two elevators and a garage on the building, so it offers the possibility of acquiring the property with the parking space. garage included.

description: Spectacular completely renovated apartment of 180 m² located in a regal and classic building in the Eixample.  The housing building is a classic building in perfect condition, located in the noble area of the city of Barcelona.  This apartment, which was renovated in 2017, is on a fourth floor. It has both the natural light of a high floor and the majesty of a classic Eixample apartment and its original architectural details.  When accessing the apartment through the hall, we find ourselves right in front of the initial distributor with access to the courtesy bathroom. The kitchen is very spacious, fully equipped and has a bar. Next, we find the dining area, which is also connected to a large dining room. This one has large windows that face the street and that provide a lot of natural light.  From the dining room, we access a new distributor, in this case from the night area, which connects us with three spectacular bedrooms. All bedrooms have a walk-in closet and full bathroom, making them perfect for everyone to have the space and privacy they so desire.  It is a unique opportunity that we recommend you visit.

description: Apartment of more than 210 square metres on a third floor of a stately building in the heart of Passeig de Gràcia, magnificently oriented to have direct sun and light in abundance, completely open-plan and ready to be fully renovated, presided over by large windows with incredible views of top works of Catalan modernist architecture.  Entering the apartment, following the classic floor plan of the early 20th century, we find the living area to the left of the hall, opposite a large hall that guides us to the night area, with the possibility of building a suite with a complete bathroom and dressing room, taking advantage of the light of a beautiful back gallery that can be opened again as an outdoor space.  The property doesn't have a certificate of occupancy but once the refurbishment is done, it can be obtained.

description: This exclusive historic apartment is located in a Modernista building where wonderful historical elements meet modern elegance through carefully planned design and luxury finishes. The apartment has been fully renovated, maintaining the original Modernista essence of the property, as can be seen in the ceilings.  The apartment has a total area of 154 m² with 2 bedrooms, one of which is a suite with a private bathroom and an inbuilt 5-door closet. The other double bedroom has a second complete bathroom in the corridor and there is a third bathroom for guests.  There is a fully equipped kitchen including a dining area and a convenient laundry area. The generous size living room with lofty ceilings is located next to the kitchen and offers views of the typical Eixample block courtyard. The property also enjoys views of Antoni Gaudí's building Casa Calvet.  An idyllic new property in a historical Barcelona building.

It offers an area of about 106m2, distributed in 3 bedrooms (two doubles and one medium), 2 full bathrooms, a spacious living-dining room of approximately 35m2 with access to a 12m2 terrace with unobstructed views over the street. The house enjoys a lot of sun all morning and noon (southeast orientation) and is in need of updating. Apartment with great potential and endless possibilities. Fantastic location, very well connected by public transport, close to prestigious schools in the area, hospitals and other points of interest.

description: Beautiful apartment for sale in the heart of Eixample Right just around the corner of the elegant Rambla Catalunya.  The apartment consists of a spacious and bright living room with access to a very enjoyable south-facing terrace, a fully equipped kitchen, a very practical laundry room with a guest toilet, a double ensuite bedroom with a walk-in closet and with access to the terrace, and another single bedroom with its own bathroom.  The apartment not only has high-end finishes such as wooden floors, fitted closets, wooden panelling on walls, high quality wallpapers, osmosis system but also still boasts original architectural features of the period, such as high ceilings, the original fireplace and decorative frames.    The property is located in a stately building dating back to 1900, with a completely renovated entrance and a new lift, and also has an excellent concierge service.  Please contact us for more information about this property and to arrange a viewing.

address: subdistrict La Nova Esquerra de l'Eixample
description: Lucas Fox offers this large duplex penthouse for sale in l'Eixample, central Barcelona.  The price includes two parking spaces on the farm.  On the first floor, we find the hall and four double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes. Two of them with a full bathroom en suite, one with a full bathroom next to it and another for service with a bathroom en suite.  In the center of the floor, we have the dining room next to the large kitchen and the service area. It is an open space with large exterior windows, thus allowing natural light to enter.  At the top, we find access to the large terrace. To the left, there is a large double bedroom with fitted wardrobes and a full bathroom. For its part, to the right and next to the terrace, there is a quiet and pleasant secondary room to watch television, listen to music or simply relax with a good coffee.  Next, we find the large main double bedroom of the house, with a huge dressing room and a complete bathroom en suite. On the other hand, the two bedrooms on the upper floor are located on both sides of the stairs.  All rooms on the second floor have access to the large terrace that surrounds the house, which offers panoramic views, planters with automatic irrigation and east orientation.  All bedrooms are exceptionally spacious, with generous custom closets and full-size bathrooms.  Contact us to arrange a visit.

description: This beautiful property, located in the heart of Badalona, next to the Calle del Mar and one block from the beach, will offer you everything you need to enjoy in detail the life in the city with beach and harbor 5 minutes walk. The house has entrance from two streets, in one we find the private parking with room for 8 cars and the other, by a pedestrian street the main entrance of the house, this marks the elegant and spacious style offered by the property, a large marble staircase and a beautiful chandelier welcome you to the house. The house has a lift from the parking area to the main floor. On the main floor a large living room with fireplace opens onto the garden and lets in lots of light through the large windows that surround the great room, from there we access the open kitchen with office and large peninsula from which communicates with the living room and dining room. On the same floor we find the master suite with dressing room and bathroom with jacuzzi. And through a huge distributor, oval with natural light we find 3 more bedrooms, all doubles and two of them doubles also in height where a curious and nice staircase separates the sleeping area from the rest of the room. All these bedrooms share a complete bathroom. There is also another courtesy bathroom. On the upper floor the whole area is attic and diaphanous with a terrace that surrounds it and from which we have views of the city. It is currently used as a games room and cinema room but could perfectly be used as a private apartment or two more rooms could be built. The Poblenou neighborhood is one of the most personal neighborhoods in Barcelona. Located in the maritime sector of Sant Martí, still retains its essence of popular neighborhood that formerly also housed factories, especially textiles, which with new times have become home to new technology companies. The charm of its Rambla full of life, commerce and tapas is the nerve center of neighborhood life where you eat very well, and leads the way to the beaches of Bogatell. In the neighborhood one breathes airs of art, culture and creativity in its museums like the Diseny Hub, its galleries, workshops and the Palo Alto Market. Its streets combine cafes and restaurants of all kinds, in a neighborhood that does not lose the soul of a town by the sea where people greet each other as they pass. In the neighborhood you can find apartments to invest, small houses and industrial buildings converted into fantastic lofts. It is an ideal neighborhood for families as well as for friendly and cosmopolitan people. El Poblenou can be the ideal neighborhood to live in if you are willing to be part of a quiet and friendly community to live in. It can also be a profitable neighborhood for a good investment. If your dream is to live in a warehouse converted into lofts with industrial airs, this is your ideal place, but also if you want to live a step away from the beach with a lifestyle attached to it, where you can eat very well and discover a new place every day.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Centre, Badalona
suggestedTexts.title: Terraced house in Calle de Lleó, 98

description: UNMATCHED DUPLEX PENTHOUSE COMPLETELY REFURBISHED WITH THE HIGHEST QUALITY MATERIALS, UNIQUE IN THE AREA. It is delivered brand new before May 2023. The ground floor consists of a spacious living room - dining room and kitchen with an island, integrated into a single 60m2 space. The kitchen is fully equipped with high-end appliances (LG American fridge, Siemens, Neolith Calacatta Luxe Ultrasoft countertop) and plenty of storage. Wood-burning fireplace in the living room to make winter nights warmer. Through two large windows there is access to a fantastic 32m2 terrace with wooden floors and maximum privacy. A courtesy toilet serves this area of the house. The master suite is also on the same floor. With an area of 25m2 distributed in a bedroom and a large dressing room from the prestigious TENUEE house and its well-designed full bathroom. The suite has direct access to a second 26m2 terrace with wooden floors and a shower to cool off on hot summer days. Through some elegant stairs we access the second floor, we are greeted by an open space with sloping ceilings and for multipurpose use (play area, reading. ). It has three bedrooms, two of them double (one en suite) and one single. A complete bathroom serves this floor. The house also has a large storage room inside it and a water area. All the rooms enjoy a lot of light thanks to their double southeast and southwest orientation. The house also has ducted air conditioning and high-quality materials, such as QUICK STEP MAJESTIC ROBLE laminated parquet, RUNTAL radiators, LED lighting, etc. that have been used in its reform. Two parking spaces in the same building are included in the price. Privileged location next to Mandri street, in one of the best residential areas of Barcelona, surrounded by all kinds of services and excellent communication. Do not hesitate to contact us for a visit without obligation.

description: Beautiful minimalist house for sale in the town of Alella. It consists of 457m2 built, distributed in only two comfortable floors, being able to move both by elevator and by stairs, and on a private plot of 1,283 m2. Located in one of the most sought-after and well-known urbanizations in Alella, in a residential area, but not far from the town center, just a 10-minute walk away and with a very good connection to the motorway towards Barcelona and Girona. Upon entering the house, on this first floor is the night area, with two double bedrooms and a large suite of more than 40 m2, with a double dressing room and a modern bathroom integrated into the room, it has a shower with tempered glass partitions and designer bathtub. From the room you can enjoy good views of the garden and the mountains. On the ground floor is the day area, the living-dining room with an open kitchen, separated by a modern glass door that visibly connects both areas. From both rooms there is access to the porch and the garden. Going out to the outdoor area we find a pleasant porch that leads us to the garden surrounded by nature and with a beautiful saline water pool. In the other part of the garden we find a large 40 m2 gym, a space that could also be converted into a guest house since it has all the necessary connections and services to make a bathroom and several rooms. The property has high insulation and great energy efficiency, thanks to the quality materials with which it has been built. It has a covered garage for 3 cars, plus the possibility of parking more cars uncovered. Extras to highlight: Aerothermal energy, integrated and perimeter alarm with video surveillance cameras, air conditioning, porcelain floors...

description: Great duplex with pool in Badalona in the Bufalá area. The house is distributed in 170m2 useful. On the lower floor, we find a spacious and bright living room that leads to a large 193m2 terrace, it has an area with a pool and barbecue and another with a glass-enclosed outdoor lounge and chill-out area, ideal for summer days. On the upper floor, which can be accessed by private elevator or by stairs, we find the night area together with a large office, which can also be used as a living room. The entire house is exterior, you can enjoy natural sunlight throughout the day. It has a basement of about 20m2 with direct and private access to the parking lot, with capacity for 2 cars, and to the house, it can be used as a storage room. description: Spectacular and exclusive property located in one of the best residential areas in the Marianao neighborhood. With the possibility of installing the elevator (it has a space already prepared for it). The house has 840m2 built on a 1,220m2 plot, where we find the garden area of the house with a pool and barbecue area. The house is distributed over 2 floors plus a basement with a parking area, wine cellar, gym and another multipurpose room. On the main floor is the day area that consists of a spacious hall with access to a stately living-dining room with fireplace, kitchen with utility area and pantry and a second dining room accompanied by a rest area. For lovers of reading, on the same floor there is a spectacular office-library along with a spacious room and a full bathroom. Each of the rooms has an exit to the outside that provides a lot of light to its entire interior. The upper floor, which is the night floor, has four bright and spacious bedrooms, one of them en suite with access to the terrace. It also has two full bathrooms. In the basement, we find the garage with capacity for 4-5 cars. It also has a large gym room with a sauna, a complete bathroom, two storage rooms and a cellar area. The house has heating, aluminum windows and armored glass. It is close to the center of Sant Boi, which has high-level schools and a huge shopping area. Very close to El Prat airport. description: Renovated penthouse next to Paseo de Gracia, Barcelona Magnificent brand new renovated 65m² penthouse with a 30m² terrace, located in an exceptional location in the heart of Barcelona, next to Paseo de Gracia and Plaza Catalunya.  Distributed in a cozy living-dining room with an open kitchen fully equipped with high-end appliances.  Private terrace of 30m² with laminated flooring and unobstructed views, which is accessed by stairs that are on the landing.  The property consists of 2 rooms; the main double and a second single.  A modern full bathroom with quality finishes.  Details such as ceilings decorated with wooden beams, exposed brick walls, hydraulic or parquet floors, and double-glazed windows.  It has heating and air conditioning ducts in all rooms.  Located on the fifth floor of a historic building from 1885, completely renovated in 2014 with an elevator and video surveillance in the lobby. description: Beautiful corner penthouse with three winds, completely exterior and with a 25sqm terrace.  This large property has a built area of 583sqm, of which 437sqm is usable accommodation, and is distributed in a living area and a clearly differentiated sleeping area.  In the living area there is a bright living-dining room divided into three rooms with access to a large terrace with unobstructed views, a fully equipped kitchen with pantry and utility room, and a guest toilet.    In the sleeping area there is a double bedroom en-suite with bathroom, dressing room and office; another double bedroom with exterior bathroom and a master suite with dressing room and complete bathroom. All the rooms are exterior with natural light, parquet flooring, ducted air conditioning and central heating by radiators and built-in wardrobes.  There is a service entrance with bedroom and bathroom.  The property has a concierge service and 24-hour security, and a communal garden area.    Its location is excellent. In the upper area of Barcelona, a residential neighbourhood surrounded by all kinds of services. Les Tres Torres stands out for its high quality of life and its proximity to the city's main avenues and streets. Just a stone's throw from the Tres Torres train station and a few metres from the main bus lines that connect with the whole of Barcelona.   *Three parking spaces included in the price. description: Beautiful farmhouse of 1606 cataloged located in the center of the village of Tiana just 15 minutes from Barcelona and 5 minutes walk from the shops of the village. You have a built area of 610 m2 and the land of almost 5000 meters. On the ground floor we find an entrance hall, kitchen-office, large living room with fireplace from where we can access the outside to a very pleasant rest area, surrounded by nature, on this same floor we have a large space that once was dedicated to wine cellar, where we find press and space to tread the grapes. At the back we find a swimming pool, surrounded by natural grass, from where we can access the area of fields and orchards. On the first floor we find a multipurpose room, 4 large bedrooms (one en suite) and an office. The house has two complete bathrooms, a farmhouse to move into! Tiana is a small municipality at the foot of the Serralada de Marina, a protected natural area, a privileged Mediterranean natural environment ideal for walking and sports in the middle of nature. Only 15 km from Barcelona, well connected, this town offers a quiet, relaxed and healthy life of coastal town and vineyards. Of scarce urban land and with a careful constructive typology, the municipality has maintained a slow and sustainable growth rate. It is also known for the high socioeconomic level of its population, which has mostly sought to establish its residence within the metropolitan area of Barcelona, in many cases for work, but with the advantages offered by the distance from the capital and the natural characteristics of Tiana. It is still poor to get some exclusive plots with sea views, as well as fantastic historic mentions and villas, modern design houses of new construction usually on generous plots with terraces, lawns and swimming pools. Tiana will be a perfect option if you want a home to live or vacation surrounded by protected nature, just a step from Barcelona city and prestigious schools, in beautiful new buildings or take a fantastic traditional farmhouse in the area.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Tiana
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle Ferré Vidal

description: We find this property in the best residential area in the center of the town of Sant Cugat, 12 minutes walking from the railway station, and surrounded by the golf course. Now you can live with the tranquility and exclusivity offered by that small hill, being 20 minutes by car from the city of Barcelona. The advantages of living in Sant Cugat are immeasurable: pure air, lots of nature, international schools, commerce, culture where the Auditórium stands out with high-level performances, several cinemas, leisure, top-level sports centers, markets, hospitals, as well as good communication and proximity to Barcelona. The house of almost 600 m2 built on a plot of 1,700 m2 with private pool. It has a timeless style with bricks on the facade, and it consists of 7 rooms (4 suites plus service room, loft with bathroom and shower) with a total of 6 bathrooms and 1 guest toilet. All details have been thoughtfully designed for comfort. There are: a laundry, 2 lounges, the second of which can be used as a multipurpose room, playground, gym, etc. The property has an elevator currently in disuse and a garage with capacity for 2 large cars, plus easy parking in the street. South orientation and open views to nature make it a very good option for families wishing to live in a quiet environment close to everything in one of the best urbanizations in Catalonia. Sant Cugat del Vallés has built itself the image of a quiet, green, safe, and very well communicated city that is located only 10km from Barcelona. This is why many of its inhabitants, quite young and familiar, move easily to the center of Barcelona every day. It is also one of the richest cities in Spain with the third highest income per capita in Spain, and an excellent quality of life. It has the tranquility of a small town but a stone's throw from the big city, surrounded by the Collserola Natural Park, which offers direct contact with nature. It has all the services among which schools and institutes of quality stand out, a commercial fabric of first level, including the Mercantic (market of antiques) one of the attractions of the city. You will find a variety of recently built homes, from exclusive houses with generous plots of land to contemporary design apartments. Sant Cugat is your city if you have in mind a house between Barcelona and the mountain nature, very well communicated, with services and high level schools, whether you want to invest in a house or a quality apartment.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Golf, Sant Cugat del Vallès
suggestedTexts.title: Terraced house in Calle Pinyer

description: Fabulous property of 563m2 built and 2.135m2 of totally flat plot in private urbanization with 24h surveillance. We highlight of the house, the large garden of 2.135m2 completely flat that surrounds the house giving a lot of privacy, a large swimming pool overlooking the sea, huge terrace with outdoor dining, chill out and barbecue area. From the house we marvel at its spaciousness, brightness and good accessibility, a unique architectural style, very practical and timeless, this property with high quality finishes and design, is built on a flat plot of 2,000 m2. The whole house is designed to be able to live on one floor although it consists of 3 floors. We open the house and a distributor with double height ceiling gives access to the attic area, day and night area, parking and basement area. On the same main floor there is a spacious living room with sea views, fireplace and large sliding doors strategically well designed (hidden in the wall and not seen) open to the garden, terrace and summer dining room, a separate dining room with access to the kitchen very functional. On this same floor we have the sleeping area with three bedrooms, two doubles sharing a bathroom and master suite with bathroom and dressing room. We also find the garage for two cars, bathroom and laundry room. On the second floor attic type are located; a multipurpose space (now used as a living room), fireplace, a large terrace with fantastic sea views, a double bedroom, a bathroom with shower and an office. The beautiful and millenary Badalona is one of the cities of the Metropolitan Area of Barcelona that offers an excellent quality of life, with a relaxed and calm atmosphere and with all the services. At a very short distance and well connected to Barcelona, its fantastic location between the sea and the mountains allows for a multitude of green areas and beaches along its 5 km of coastline, making it a family and child-friendly city with both public and private schools. It is a rich and diverse city, with interesting corners like its old town with Roman history, and walking areas like the Rambla and Calle del Mar. But its symbol par excellence is the Pont del Petroli, an old dock that goes 210 meters into the sea. The great Parc Fluvial de Besós, the varied gastronomic offer and the big commercial surfaces complete a city that lacks nothing. Many of the houses in the area are recently built with good services and added values such as garden, storage room or parking in the same buildings and the price per square meter and municipal expenses are lower than in Barcelona, which can be very interesting when considering your investment in housing. Badalona is an excellent option if you prefer to escape from the noise and congestion of Barcelona, enjoy an excellent quality of life near the beach without giving up any services, and invest in excellent housing at a lower price than in the center of Barcelona.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Mas Ram, Badalona
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Avenida Mas-Ram

description: This fantastic property is located in one of the estates that has been completely rehabilitated and has a modern look. Its wonderful location allows you to enjoy all the comforts that Pedralbes has to offer, such as the proximity to the Royal Polo Club, the Tennis Club, the fantastic Pedralbes Gardens, as well as the international schools and teaching centres. At the same time, being very close to Avenida Diagonal, we have all its shopping centres, such as the Illa or the Corte Ingles. The façade has a lot of glass and the floor holds all the natural light thanks to its southwest orientation. It is a triplex with a very comfortable distribution for a family as well as for a couple or a modern single. The apartment offers 330 m2 according to the registered note and terraces on different levels and private pool. Entering we find a staircase that descends giving way to the ground floor where we find a double room with its full bathroom and exit to the terrace, which is currently used as a music room. On the main floor you will find the living and dining room with views of the city, the fully equipped kitchen and a laundry. This floor also has the master bedroom with its dressing room, the guest room, and the service bedroom, each with its own bathroom. The upper floor has the living room with direct access to a large terrace of 100 m2, the summer dining room, the bar and the private swimming pool. The apartment has a parking space and a storage room. The property has a concierge service. This district is distinguished by the characteristic elegance of the upper part of Barcelona. It is composed of three districts: Les Corts, La Maternidad i Sant Ramón and Pedralbes, full of gardens, parks and squares, as well as quiet and extensive residential areas. Les Corts is perfect if you want to live in one of the quietest and most elegant areas of Barcelona, away from the tourist hustle and bustle. Within the district is the North Campus of the University of Barcelona, several private schools, such as the French Lycée, the famous Camp Nou, several bars, clubs and discos. It is a very safe district full of parks and gardens to get lost in. This district also has an abundance of stores and malls, such as L'Illa Diagonal, the Pedralbes Center or the Corte Inglés, as well as stores and commerce on the street, including luxury brand stores.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Pedralbes, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle de Bosch i Gimpera

description: Bright apartment located a few minutes from the beach, Diagonal Mar shopping center and metro. Bright 65m2 apartment in POBLENOU very well connected and with 2 balconies The apartment is distributed: In an American kitchen with access to your balcony, 2 sunny double rooms with exits to the large balcony. One of the bedrooms has its dressing room, full bathroom with shower, large hall. Roofs can be rehabilitated with Catalan volta. Right now it is to reform, it looks as it will be. Apartment in Poblenou, in a very well connected area, bus 1 min away, metro 6 min walk, 2 min diagonally. Beach is less than 10 min walk! There are all kinds of services (schools, supermarkets, parks, gardens and restaurants) Open to the street on both sides! There is conditioned air It is a real first without elevator! The exterior façade is rehabilitated. The IT IS kind of PASSED. Now I have put together costs to do some repairs to the farm. Community fees are 30 euro/month Ivi 400 euro/year 2 neighbors per landing Do not hesitate to visit it!

description: Fantastic house in the center of the town of Teià, close to all services, schools, shopping area.. . An ideal location. It is a property on a completely flat plot of 700 m2 and 525 m2 built distributed over two comfortable floors. On the ground floor we find the magnificent living room with fireplace and direct access to the porch. Next to it, the large kitchen and a totally independent laundry and ironing area; On the same floor there is a large double bedroom with its bathroom and another room currently occupied by an office and a courtesy bathroom. By some beautiful stairs we reach the night area, here there are three double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and a bathroom that serves them and with access to a large terrace, the master suite, with its large bathroom and access to a second terrace and another large room, currently used as a games room. Outside the house we find a beautiful pool, a summer porch, the barbecue area and several garden areas with vegetation. Finally, in the basement another large room has been arranged as a cellar, also with a fireplace, a kitchen area and a large closed garage with capacity for four cars. Extras to highlight: air conditioning, aluminum carpentry, integrated and perimeter alarm, natural gas heating, marble floors.. . Enjoy Thea. Teia is known for its magnificent climate and its high standard of living, it is part of the charming towns that make up the coast of the COAST OF BARCELONA, the center of Barcelona is 20 minutes away and the international airport 35 minutes. Its proximity to the sea offers beautiful views from any point of its territory, the beach and the marina are a 10-minute drive away, it has a great wine and gastronomic tradition. There are several public and private schools very close, a fantastic place of residence.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Teià
