description: Gorgeous and bright refurbished apartment with Catalan vault in Eixample. This recently refurbished flat is located next to Passeig Sant Joan, in the best area of the Eixample: "Quadrat d'Or" ("Golden Square"). The area has all the shops and services necessary for day to day life, as well as excellent transport links via the Girona metro station and the bus, just a few streets away from Paseo de Gracia, Avenida Diagonal and Gran Via. The property is located on the 2nd real floor and has 77 built interior sqm. It's very bright, as it is completely exterior, enjoys an excellent south-east orientation and is located close to one of the typical Eixample chamfers. The complete refurbishment has maintained and restored the beautiful Catalan vaulted ceiling, which is 3.4 metres high, creating an ideal and very cosy atmosphere in which natural light is the protagonist. The living-dining room is spacious and has a balcony facing the street. The open-plan kitchen is integrated into the space, is fully equipped with home appliances and has a breakfast bar with stools. From the living room we access the cosy bedroom, which also has a balcony overlooking the street. Finally, at the entrance, there's the bathroom with a big shower. The carpentry throughout the property is new and guarantees excellent acoustic and thermal insulation, as the windows have 4 panes of glass. Furthermore, the flat is equipped with ducted hot/cold air conditioning and parquet flooring. It's located in a century-old regal estate building with a lift. Do not hesitate to contact Bcn Advisors to request a visit to this apartment.

description: Coldwell Banker Eminent Real Estate presents this exclusive, brand new 149m2 ground floor with a 42m2 terrace, in a classic building dating from 1886. The building is completely rehabilitated with only 4 neighbors. Located in one of the most famous neighborhoods in Barcelona, the Ensanche Izquierdo, on Calle Diputación near Plaza Universidad and a few minutes from Calle Enrique Granados, Rambla de Catalunya and Paseo de Gracia. A commercial area with all kinds of services and very well connected by public transport, buses, train and metro. In the reform of the house, the best materials have been used with a very elegant design, creating modern and cozy spaces with rooms distributed as follows: Receiver. Living room of about 26m2 independent and exterior to the street. Separate kitchen closed with sliding doors Laundry area. 1 courtesy toilets. Night area with two bedrooms, both double and en-suite 42m2 interior terrace Parquet and marble floors. TO. TO. Radiating floor. We have more apartments for sale on the same property: Main of 149m2 + terrace of 41m2 to 848. € 000 1st from 149m2 to 768. € 000 2nd from 149m2 to 816. € 000 Premises of 172m2 at €576,000 The photographs belong to a sample of all the floors and common areas.

description: Lucas Fox presents this new-build exterior-facing penthouse in a renovated stately building from the end of the 19th century.  The property is currently being renovated and its delivery is estimated for the first quarter of 2023. The new owner will be able to take advantage of the off-plan purchase to customise the finishes and layout of the home.  The property covers the entire top floor of the building. Upon entering, we find a hall with a small reception room. Next, there is the living area with access to the terrace of about 59 m² facing south that will also have a small pool. A reading area connects us with the open kitchen with a large island and integrated dining room. In this area of the home, we will also find a laundry room and a guest bathroom. Finally, we enter the night area of the house, facing a quiet block patio. The night area can be configured with three or four bedrooms, depending on the client's needs, and two of them will have a private bathroom.  Please get in touch for more information.

description: Coldwell Banker Eminent presents this EXCLUSIVE property, a charming penthouse RECENTLY RENOVATED TO NEW, with an 18m2 terrace located in the heart of the Les Corts neighborhood and in front of the Illa Diagonal shopping center. Its distribution consists of a double room en suite with access to a gallery, and another single room, a full bathroom and a high-end open-plan kitchen equipped with an oven, microwave, fridge, ceramic hob, extractor hood and dishwasher, all integrated. The doors are solid lacquered. High quality laminated AC 5 parquet. It has air conditioning with cold and heat pump through ducts. The aluminum carpentry and new blinds, gallery with water area to patio lights. Electrical installation, water. The farm has a concierge and is in a very good state of conservation. The elevator goes directly to the floor. Thanks to the low height of the building in front, the house is filled with natural light and enjoys very clear views facing West. The Barrio de Les Corts with its quiet squares where life goes by slowly and calmly, far from the tourist chaos of the city center but just a few minutes away by public transport, Les Corts has the best of both worlds: a life and relaxed, with luxury and comfort.

description: Exclusive new construction apartment finished. Modern and exclusive brand new 130m2 apartment, with excellent quality finishes and design. It has high ceilings, large openings thanks to the large windows with a balcony that overlooks the listed Enrique Granados street. The farm has been completely rehabilitated. It is located a few meters from Av. Diagonal and Passeig de Gràcia, the two quintessential arteries of Barcelona. The distribution is very comfortable and modern, we access from the entrance to a very large living room with two large windows with a balcony overlooking the street. It has a Bulthaup kitchen equipped with an oven, microwave, extractor hood, freezer and refrigerator, all from the NEFF brand. The house is completed by two spacious and bright rooms with en-suite bathroom and fitted wardrobes + a courtesy toilet. Air conditioning and underfloor heating. The houses are delivered with a storage room in the same building. Located in a high-class residential neighborhood, perfectly connected to the rest of the city. It also has very good schools, hospitals and health centers, shopping centers, parks and green areas, metro stations, train and bus stops. It is a perfect area for first residence as well as for investment. There is availability on the 2nd, 3rd and 4th floor.

description: In one of the quietest and most tree-lined streets of Barcelona is this magnificent property. From the entrance we appreciate a large living room with fireplace, totally square and exterior, with access to a large sunny terrace facing south and overlooking the street. The kitchen is very spacious and exterior offers the possibility of an island and an office. then we find the laundry area and a large service room with bathroom. In the bedroom area we have a large suite with a fireplace and access to a balcony and windows with lots of light, the bathroom is very spacious with both a bathtub and a shower. Next to the main bedroom there is another exterior room, which could become the suite's dressing room. Next we find another three exterior double rooms that share two other bathrooms.

description: Splendid brand new refurbished luxury apartment in a Modernist building. This brand new refurbished luxury flat is located in the most privileged area of the Eixample, the "Quadrat d'Or" ("Golden Square"), the best example of modernism in Barcelona. Just 3 streets away from Paseo de Gracia and Paseo Sant Joan, the area has countless attractions, services, the best shops, proximity to the city centre and excellent communication with the rest of the city. The property is located on the 3rd floor of a regal building dating back to 1910 with a lift and enjoys a double orientation: the day area facing the inner courtyard and the night area facing the street. It has an interior built surface area of 223 sqm and an exterior surface area of 12 sqm. The spacious living-dining room offers the ideal environment for day-to-day living. It has access to a gallery, ideal for creating a different atmosphere in which to relax with views of the quiet inner courtyard, and to a terrace of almost 8 sqm in which to enjoy the outdoors eating at the table or relaxing on a deckchair. The eat-in kitchen with central island and breakfast bar has a double entrance from the living-dining room or from the hallway. It is made to measure in stained wood with Neolith worktop and equipped with top-of-the-range home appliances: induction hob with integrated extractor hood, assembled fridge-freezer, oven, microwave and dishwasher. The night area is composed of 3 spectacular en-suite bedrooms with dressing room, tailor-made wardrobes and private bathrooms. The master suite has a bathtub and shower, and has a balcony overlooking the street. Another suite is also exterior with a balcony and the third is interior, but receives light through a lightwell. Finally, there's a guest toilet and a water area. The integral refurbishment is being carried out with the highest quality materials and finishings to obtain the best comfort and, at the same time, preserve the classic charm of the original elements. It has restored hydraulic floors in the day area, natural oak parquet in the night area, ceilings with original mouldings, wooden interior doors, bronze finish handles and taps and bathrooms equipped with the best brands. Do not hesitate to contact us to get to know this spectacular luxury flat. * The refurbishment is expected to be completed by March 2023.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Dreta de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Located in Plaza Tetuan, this apartment represents an incredible opportunity for the future buyer. Its privileged location, places it 5 minutes walk from the Arc de Triomf and 10' from the Sagrada Familia, besides being surrounded by numerous leisure options; bars and restaurants. Upon entering the apartment there is a hall that gives access to the bedrooms on one side and to the living-dining room on the other. The living room is characterized by its diaphanousness and visual amplitude. It is connected to the dining room and the integrated kitchen. The apartment has four double bedrooms and one suite with its own bathroom and dressing room. One of the rooms has its own balcony overlooking the lung of the block and abundant natural light from just after noon until late in the day. In addition to the en-suite bathroom, there are two other full bathrooms. In addition, the apartment has a laundry space. The house has natural light both in the morning, in the living room and kitchen area, and in the afternoon, in the rooms facing the block's lung. Finally, mention that it can be divided into two parts and thus obtain two different floors, being a unique opportunity for investors seeking profitability in Eixample Derecho. If you notice the opportunity that this apartment represents, both for investors and for families who want to move in, do not hesitate to contact us to arrange a visit. The Eixample district is the most emblematic of Barcelona since the nineteenth century. Of a renowned model urban planning devised by the engineer Ildefons Cerdá, Eixample marks the epicenter of the city from its main streets: The luxurious Passeig de Gràcia, the commercial Rambla de Catalunya and the updated Passeig de Sant Joan, housing the majority of the modernist architectural icons, such as La Sagrada Familia, La Pedrera or La Casa Batlló of the great Antoni Gaudí. It is a large, quiet but exciting  residential area with extremely convenient commercial activity, designed to respect the privacy of the homes. The Catalan modernist architecture so characteristic of stately airs, but with great cosmopolitan touches, extends throughout the neighborhood to the delight of those who wish to live modernism from within, since it is possible to acquire homes within regal estates with valuable original architectural elements, period pieces and even historical and protected. Schools, squares, wadis, parks, stores and restaurants give dynamism to the area that differentiates the Right from the Left, both with wide uniform streets, octagonal islands and wide island interiors that mark the internal distribution of buildings and homes. You will mostly find buildings of strong bricks, floors of generally wide dimensions, medium or high ceilings, with balconies that give to the wide streets or the inner patios of the Cerdá Plan. Keep in mind this living in the Eixample district, if you are looking for a neighborhood where you can have everything within walking distance or very well connected to public transport, both basic and luxury stores, trendy restaurants or even your workplace among the many offices and stores, this could be your neighborhood. If you want to walk among the iconic monuments of the city, with the comfort of equal distance to any other point or neighborhood in the city. Consider Eixample if you are a lover of modernist, stately and typical Catalan architecture and a high street feeling. If you want to live in the vital and cultural epicenter of Barcelona, where everything happens.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Dreta de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

The farm has a concierge service.

The apartment has 125 sqm and a terrace with impressive panoramic views of Barcelona and the sea that surrounds the property. South east orientation. It is distributed in a bright living room with large windows and access to the terrace. Independent kitchen with access to the outside. The night area consists of 3 bedrooms, the main one en suite with fitted wardrobes, and the individual room has been configured as a dressing room. There is a second bathroom that serves the rest of the flat. Laundry room. The apartment has top quality finishes. Air conditioning and heating. Reinforced door. description: Renovated apartment for sale in Pedralbes, Barcelona Luxurious 105m2 house, completely renovated in the quiet area of Pedralbes, Barcelona.  Distributed in a spacious living room, very bright thanks to its large windows that allow natural light to enter. Open kitchen, fully equipped with all appliances.  It has two large rooms, the main one en suite. Another full bathroom with a shower tray, with glossy black marble and wood walls, and mirrors with built-in LEDs.  Herringbone parquet floors, air conditioning and heating ducts.  Located in one of the best neighborhoods in Barcelona, thanks to its tranquility and its proximity to leisure and restaurant areas, schools, supermarkets, medical centers and children's areas. A 5-minute walk from the Villa Cecilia Gardens. Very well connected with public transport.

description: This beautiful 224m2 apartment with a terrace has a spacious living room, a fully equipped kitchen, 2 double bedrooms, 3 bathrooms (1 guest bedroom and 2 full bathrooms), a large study and an underground cellar. The interior of the house is completely renovated with top quality finishes maintaining its history as a historical landmark dating back 700 years. This flat is fully furnished. It has wooden beamed ceilings, central heating and air conditioning. The living room has a Hi-Fi surround sound system and projection screen, perfect for movie nights with family and friends. The kitchen has a center with Roman ruins. *Location* Located in the center of the Barri Gotic and in the Jewish quarter, Casa Xemuel is just a 4-minute walk from Barcelona Cathedral and a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya. There is no doubt that the location of Casa Xemuel is enviable in every way, living here you would be perfectly located in the center of the beautiful city of Barcelona.

Immediate availability!

description: Apartments with terrace, a two-minute walk from the beach and all essential services BestMaresme presents this magnificent second floor apartment of 140 m2 built and with a fantastic 33 m2 terrace. This apartment will also have another 22.12 m2 terrace for private use on the roof of the building, with panoramic views of the sea. In Montgat, on the second line of the sea that will allow you to enjoy the sun and the Mediterranean throughout the year. 5 minutes from the train station and 15 minutes from downtown Barcelona. Easy connectivity with the main road arteries. It is an exterior flat, bright and designed to make the most of the space. You will be surrounded by beautiful and green common areas, which will add to the privilege of living a few meters from the beach in an area in the midst of a process of urban transformation that makes it highly attractive as an investment. It will have a swimming pool, solarium, playground, and is equipped with the highest qualities, such as: Porcelanosa bathrooms and kitchens, Carré Carpentry and ecological equipment inside the homes and in the residential, such as: aerothermal energy, underfloor heating, waste management, parking with electric charge, among many other aspects. You will be able to live with quality and tranquility, breathing the Mediterranean, without sacrificing the practicality of being just a few minutes from Barcelona! Enjoy Montgat. Montgat is part of the region of the charming towns that make up the coast of the COAST OF BARCELONA. The name of Montgat comes from Roman times and is located between the sea and the mountains, just 15 minutes from the center of Barcelona. There are many points of interest that the municipality offers to the visitor, its beaches, the Old Quarter or the fishermen's quarter, its train station, its gastronomy.

description: Magnificent high standing property for rent, in the town of Montgat. On a segregated double plot, with a total of 933 m2 and 503 m2 built of housing. The house is distributed over three comfortable floors, all connected by an elevator. Entering the house, we are welcomed by a large entrance hall that leads to the spectacular living-dining room together with the kitchen, all open and in a single space. The kitchen has a very comfortable large island and high-end appliances. It has large windows with sliding doors that give it a lot of depth and natural light, and that give way to the exterior porch and the garden. On this same floor we find a double room and a courtesy toilet. Going up to the second floor through some fabulous stairs with custom-made glass we reach the night area. Here are four spectacular rooms, all of them suite-type with full bathrooms with showers and one of them also with a hydromassage bathtub. Two of the rooms have a terrace with panoramic views of the sea and all have built-in wardrobes as a dressing room. On the top floor there is a large solarium terrace, a beautiful space where you can enjoy spectacular panoramic views of the sea, the mountains and Barcelona. On the ground floor is the garage, with capacity for more than 4 cars, the laundry area, machine room, a storage room and a storage area with cabinets. The outside of the house is an ideal place, it has everything. On the one hand, we find the barbecue area, together with a glass-enclosed outdoor gym, which can be automatically and easily opened in its entirety and used as a summer dining room or simply to be able to do sports in the open air. The beautiful infinity pool with saline water and a relaxation area where you can take a good bath in summer or after finishing sports. In addition, it also has a cellar, storage room and a bathroom for the use of the pool. The location of the house is great, very well connected to the entrance and exit to the highway, two steps from the Hamelin international school and close to essential services. Extras to highlight: Integrated and perimeter alarm, video surveillance system, pre-installation of solar panels, central air conditioning, underfloor heating, built-in barbecue with connections, armored door, ceramic and parquet floors, designer fireplace, mosquito nets, home automation. remote control, aluminum carpentry with double glazing….

description: Fantastic high standing property for sale in the town of Teià, very close to the town and all essential services. The house was completely renovated in 2019, it consists of 1,020 m2 built on a 6,200 m2 plot of land which is surrounded by nature and which, thanks to its perfect location, offers us beautiful and unobstructed views of the sea and the mountains, enjoying privacy. absolute. The entire house is practically distributed on one floor, which makes it a very practical and functional house to live in. We enter the house through a large security door that leads us to the completely open hall, from here we access the main floor where we find 4 en-suite bedrooms each with their respective bathrooms, a large double-height living room with fireplace, the dining room with large windows which makes the house have a lot of light throughout the day, an office-style kitchen with a large central island and direct access to the porch giving way to the summer dining room, a secret cellar, a multipurpose room that is currently used as an office and games area, fully equipped gym with heated indoor pool with shower and bathroom.On this same floor but away from all these rooms, we have a suite with a full bathroom for house staff or guests. Going up from the living room by natural wood stairs, we access the first floor where the master suite is located with a large dressing area, a full double bathroom and a solarium terrace with good views.This room has several additional security systems.On this same floor and which accompanies the master suite, an open office overlooking the living room with a large interior bookcase or storage area. The house has a garage with capacity for 6 cars or more, one part is completely closed and the other is open covered by a brick porch, with a total of 228m2. In the garden, the beautiful views predominate, a large saltwater pool equipped with a jacuzzi, gardening, lighting and an exterior design environment, a panoramic paddle tennis court with all the equipment, a large chill-out area and the forest area that provides great privacy to the house. Extras to highlight: underfloor heating, sloping ceilings, aluminum carpentry with double glazing, high security locks and systems and video surveillance, domotized... Enjoy Thea. Teia is known for its magnificent climate and its high standard of living, it is part of the charming towns that make up the coast of the COAST OF BARCELONA, the center of Barcelona is 20 minutes away and the international airport is 35 minutes away Its proximity to the sea offers beautiful views from any point of its territory, the beach and the marina are a 10-minute drive away, it has a great wine and gastronomic tradition There are several public and private schools very close, a fantastic place of residence.

description: Beautiful 45m2 apartment, recently renovated, brand new, in the heart of Vila de Gràcia. It consists of a living room with an open kitchen and access to a balcony with views of the street and lots of light; Main room, also exterior and with access to the balcony.  Comfortable bathroom with shower that also enjoys good ventilation and natural light. It has a second single bedroom, interior, and a laundry room. The finishes are of quality, with parquet floors; air conditioning/heat pump; original wooden carpentry restored with double chamber glass and thermal insulation; designer taps and kitchen equipped with Bosch appliances. Apartment on the third floor (fourth floor) in a building without elevator, located in a very quiet street, a short distance from the Verdi cinemas, the Plaza de la Virreina and the Joanic metro station. Very well connected, surrounded by a wide range of restaurants and bars, as well as a wide variety of shops and services.

description: New construction development made up of 12 multi-family homes located on Calle Major de Sarrià, made up of types of between 2 and 5 bedrooms with terraces, penthouses with terraces and solariums, and parking spaces. In its exclusive Common Spaces there is a community pool on a covered floor surrounded by a solarium area, and a Cardioprotected Space. The two pillars on which this project stands are the large size of the houses and the delicate landscape and environmental harmony that has been pursued from the beginning, considering the common garden areas as an extension of the natural environment that surrounds it. It is located in a privileged location, merging with the nature of the Joan Reventós park, and next to one of the most important arteries in and out of the city of Barcelona. Connected to El Prat airport in just 12 minutes thanks to access to the Ronda de Dalt (B-20) and connection to the most prominent roads and highways that connect the city with the rest of the territory, such as the B-23 (Avenida Diagonal ), the C-16 (connects with the towns of Vallès through the Vallvidrera Tunnels), the C-17, the C-33, the C-58, the A-2 and the AP-7, towards Tarragona- Lleida and Girona-France. On the other hand, it allows easy access to the main streets of the city, such as Paseo de la Bonanova, Ronda General Miter or Calle Balmes, through Calle Vía Augusta, located just 200 meters from the development.

description: Spectacular and exclusive house in the Maresme, with 24 hour security. Housing with two totally independent houses. The house of 815m2 built on a plot of 1.740m2 with garden and pool. It has three floors and consists of 6 bedrooms, 6 bathrooms and private garage. On the main floor we find the stately hall that gives us access to the large living-dining room and the kitchen-office with fireplace, sea and garden views. From the kitchen, we have a fully covered winter dining room with retractable roof. On this floor there are also two bedrooms and a bathroom. On the second floor, we find the majestic master suite with dressing room and bathroom. From the suite, there is access to a spectacular terrace overlooking the sea and the city. On this same level there are two double bedrooms with bathroom. On the lower floor is the relaxation and disconnection area with a sauna, jacuzzi, Turkish bath, gym, two multipurpose rooms, two bathrooms, a large living room and parking. This wonderful property has an independent guest house with a beautiful living-dining room with open kitchen, double bedroom and bathroom. The beautiful garden, with great privacy and a wonderful infinity pool with saline water with two large cascading jets and a large sunbathing area. This majestic and exclusive property is located in the municipality of Teià, in Sant Berger, one of the best developments with private security of the entire Maresme coast and just 5 minutes walk from the town center. Teià is a municipality located on the slope of the Sierra de Marina, surrounded by lush forests and crossed by its stream, an ideal environment to enjoy nature. In Roman times it was an important center of wine production which is currently produced with the designation of origin of its neighbor Alella. Of course, this wine culture makes an excellent combination with the local gastronomy, especially with its star dish: apple stew filled with meat. In the last few years Teià has grown its offer of new homes in urbanizations organized with very modern houses and villas. You will also find estates with large new or renovated plots, farmhouses and wine estates around the village. There is also a very well known tennis and golf club, and one of Maresme’s most exclusive neighborhoods, Sant Berger. Teià can be your ideal location to purchase a home in a quiet area, with options to get a new house or to renovate near the mountain nature, a step from Barcelona and the Maresme coast.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Teià
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: We present this fantastic property located in an environment of nature and privacy. Designed with high quality materials, a house practically on the ground floor to provide comfort and take advantage of its orientation and natural light. It is located in the area of Montornés del Valles, 10 minutes from Vallromanes Golf. Surrounded by a large garden that provides privacy and oriented towards beautiful views of the coastal mountain range. The original design of the property separates different areas to provide privacy in each one of them. We are welcomed by a hall that leads us to the living-dining room of 2 heights and presided over by a beautiful fireplace. There is also direct access to the large kitchen with a comfortable office area. On the other side, we find an open office, a bedroom and the access to the night area. Here we find 3 double bedrooms with a designer bathroom that serves them. Finally we find the master suite with its own bathroom and dressing area. A staircase integrated in the hall leads us to a large open-plan room connected to the living room at the top. A large space to be used as a games room, library or multipurpose area. On the lower floor, where the garage and gym area are located, together with a complete bathroom and access to the swimming pool area. There is a beautiful and rustic wine cellar area with a comfortable room with a fireplace and a practical kitchen. This area can be fitted out as an independent flat, as it also gives access to the garden and swimming pool. We invite you to discover the privacy of this fantastic property. The beautiful and millenary Badalona is one of the cities of the Metropolitan Area of Barcelona that offers an excellent quality of life, with a relaxed and calm atmosphere and with all the services. At a very short distance and well connected to Barcelona, its fantastic location between the sea and the mountains allows for a multitude of green areas and beaches along its 5 km of coastline, making it a family and child-friendly city with both public and private schools. It is a rich and diverse city, with interesting corners like its old town with Roman history, and walking areas like the Rambla and Calle del Mar. But its symbol par excellence is the Pont del Petroli, an old dock that goes 210 meters into the sea. The great Parc Fluvial de Besós, the varied gastronomic offer and the big commercial surfaces complete a city that lacks nothing. Many of the houses in the area are recently built with good services and added values such as garden, storage room or parking in the same buildings and the price per square meter and municipal expenses are lower than in Barcelona, which can be very interesting when considering your investment in housing. Badalona is an excellent option if you prefer to escape from the noise and congestion of Barcelona, enjoy an excellent quality of life near the beach without giving up any services, and invest in excellent housing at a lower price than in the center of Barcelona.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Montornès del Vallès
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: Beautiful semi-detached house, which is within the catalog of protection of the Historical and Artistic Heritage of the Generalitat de Catalunya. It is located in the center of the old town of Premia de Mar. The house of 332m2 built on a plot of 250m2 with garden. It has 6 bedrooms and 5 bathrooms. On the main floor, we find a living room, the stately dining room with outside exit and the fully equipped kitchen also with outside exit. There is the magnificent floral garden with a well at the back. On the first and second floor we find the sleeping area with three bedrooms on each floor and their respective bathrooms. There is also a beautiful terrace with panoramic views. On the third floor there is a multipurpose room that could be used as a games room, office, music studio or a guest bedroom. The balconies and terraces are located on the main facade of the building facing south and with panoramic sea views; thanks to the orientation it has plenty of natural light. It also has a parking space, not included in the price. It is an elegant town house, maintaining the old style of the house, but without giving up the modern design and distribution, making it a unique home. It is located in a very exclusive pedestrian area, where you can enjoy the silence relaxing in your garden, a few steps from the beach. Near the house is the parish of Sant Cristòfol and the town hall of Premia de Mar. Premia de Mar is served by a regular bus line that connects with Mataró and Barcelona. Barcelona International Airport is 35 minutes away via the B-20 freeway. Premià de Mar is a town on the Maresme coast, only 25 minutes from Barcelona by car or train. This town of seafaring and wine tradition has a typical Mediterranean old town with white houses and pleasant little streets and an extensive promenade. Its proximity to the coastal mountain range also allows you to enjoy getting lost in the forest taking long walks in the open air. In addition, it has beautiful beaches, stores and restaurants that together with easy access to Barcelona, the airport and international schools, offers its inhabitants an excellent quality of life away from the hustle and bustle of the big city. Other great advantages offered by Premià de Mar to those who choose to live here are the marina with moorings and access for superstores and large sailing boats, a golf course, and a wide range of sports, cultural and leisure activities. The types of homes you can choose from in Premià de Mar include 4-way houses and villas, townhouses or apartments in communities with all the amenities and wonderful views of the coast. Premià de Mar can be the perfect place to live if you want easy access to Barcelona, the airport and private schools, but with the tranquility of a quiet coastal town with all services, stores and facilities, both basic and recreational and leisure.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Centre, Premiá de Mar
suggestedTexts.title: Terraced house

description: Beautiful villa for sale in the town of Tiana. Spacious and bright house with a large garden area, porch and pool. On the main floor, we find a magnificent living-dining room, a bedroom and a guest toilet, an impeccable fully equipped office kitchen with access to the garden with barbecue, wood oven and an outdoor bathroom. This space is completed by a beautiful orchard with irrigation. On the second floor, we find 4 double bedrooms, all with fitted closets, one of them is the master suite with air conditioning, exit to large terrace overlooking the sea. The bedroom suite has a bathroom with bathtub and shower. The attic is a leisure space, with plenty of space and light. It has wooden ceilings and large windows that provide plenty of natural light to the room. It also has another practical bathroom. On the first floor, we find the garage, cellar / pantry, large multipurpose room and bathroom. This floor has direct access to the garden where the pool area is located. The whole house has electric blinds and aluminum enclosures. Tiana is a small municipality at the foot of the Serralada de Marina, a protected natural area, a privileged Mediterranean natural environment ideal for walking and sports in the middle of nature. Only 15 km from Barcelona, well connected, this town offers a quiet, relaxed and healthy life of coastal town and vineyards. Of scarce urban land and with a careful constructive typology, the municipality has maintained a slow and sustainable growth rate. It is also known for the high socioeconomic level of its population, which has mostly sought to establish its residence within the metropolitan area of Barcelona, in many cases for work, but with the advantages offered by the distance from the capital and the natural characteristics of Tiana. It is still poor to get some exclusive plots with sea views, as well as fantastic historic mentions and villas, modern design houses of new construction usually on generous plots with terraces, lawns and swimming pools. Tiana will be a perfect option if you want a home to live or vacation surrounded by protected nature, just a step from Barcelona city and prestigious schools, in beautiful new buildings or take a fantastic traditional farmhouse in the area.

description: Detached house with four winds in the residential area of Alella Parc. The house is oriented east-south so it receives sunlight practically all day. The area where the house is located is an area with neighbors who live all year round. The house consists of 2 floors and an apartment in the lower part with separate entrance with a total of 370 m2 built and on a total of 480 m2 of plot. We enter the house on the main floor where we find a very spacious living room and full of light thanks to its direct orientation to the chill out area by the pool. On the same floor we find the spacious kitchen with central cooking island and equipped with all kinds of avant-garde appliances and that together with the views make it one of the most important spaces of the house also with direct access to the outside area. A courtesy bathroom and a cozy double bedroom complete this main floor. Climbing a comfortable staircase illuminated with indirect lighting leed access to the sleeping area of the house where we find 3 spacious double bedrooms of which we highlight the master suite with access to terrace from where we can enjoy stunning views, an elegant dressing room and a complete bathroom minimalist style accompany this spectacular room. As we have advanced previously on this same floor we have 2 more rooms of good dimensions being able to catalog them one of them as a suite as well. To finish the spaces on this floor we find a large area, currently used as a professional office with direct access to the outside of the house without having to hinder the privacy of the house. Finally and on the lower floor of the house we have an apartment totally independent of the upper floors of the house consisting of a large living room with built-in kitchen Scandinavian style with access to an outdoor garden of 45 m2 rectangular artificial turf and shower area and barbecue. The sleeping area of the apartment consists of 3 spacious bedrooms and 2 complete bathrooms with the same minimalist style as those found in the rest of the house. As a particularity and mimicking the Scandinavian style of the apartment, the architect designed an interior window from where we can observe the depth of the pool as an aquarium that gives an extra plus of elegance. To finish in the outside area of the house we will find covered parking for 2 vehicles and additional space in the ramp.  and additional space in the interior ramp with space for one more vehicle. We could not overlook that the energy rating of the house is category B (consumption of 44 kph / m2 year) and category A (emissions of 7 km CO2 / m2) all due to cutting-edge systems Aerotermia, underfloor heating, air conditioning duct, double glazing doors and windows, high quality enclosure system with which the house has and that make it a very good choice of housing. From Sotheby's we are at your disposal to arrange a visit to the house and thus clear any doubts you may have. We are waiting for you! Alella, located only 18 kilometers from Barcelona, is a small millennial town full of life, surrounded by vineyards, flower plantations and the mountains of the Serralada Litoral Park. It offers a unique environment to enjoy the most authentic Mediterranean lifestyle, being one of the most beautiful villages on the coast of El Maresme. It is crossed by two rivers, has dolmens, Iberian remains, hermitages, castles and fountains, and has a long tradition of wine production with the Alella Designation of Origin. Its proximity to the sea and Barcelona, its tranquility and its wonderful natural environment have attracted many Catalan families since the 19th century. Hence, its landscape is dotted with historic farmhouses, modernist manor houses, and luxurious villas. In recent years Alella has grown as a residential center of quiet and private urbanizations, with beautiful and spacious houses to four winds, gardens and swimming pools. Alella can be your ideal location to.

There is also a very well known tennis and golf club, and one of Maresme’s most exclusive neighborhoods, Sant Berger. description: Property built in 1910, renovated, with a built area of 69 m2 and a large terrace (70 m2), first floor (real), few meters away from Soho House in the Gothic Quarter of Barcelona.    It has 2 bedrooms, a living-dining room with access to a terrace / patio with views, hall, hallway, kitchen, 1 bathroom. The 2 rooms are double. The kitchen is integrated into the living room. The pavement is tiled and maintains parts of the original. The ceilings are high with wooden beams and some parts maintain the original paint between the beams.    The building is in good condition, both in the patios, stairs and facade. Currently there is no elevator. The building has an accessible roof terrace on the top floor.    The location of the property is good, located in the Plaza del Duc de Medinaceli, very close to the Moll de la Fusta, Paseo Colón, La Rambla, Port Vell and the Born and Barceloneta neighborhoods. Communications from here are good by public transport: bus, metro (green line 3 – Drassanes) and with easy access to the port and the Ronda Litoral.

description: An alluring blend of character, modern luxury and slick design, The Olivier is a high-end home ideally situated at the heart of contemporary Barcelona’s most sought-after district. Comprising some 170m2 of interior space including 2 bathrooms and 2 bedrooms, this apartment offers plenty of room, making for a light and airy feeling oasis right in the middle of the bustling city centre. Finished to the highest specifications, everything from the dark marble work surfaces to the minimalist-chic bathroom tiling radiates quality and luxury. Indeed, the kitchen is a brand new designer Bulthaup effort installed only this year with Gaggenau and Bora appliances. The furniture comes via Italy, whilst the terrace with smart home and Sonos sound system (which functions both inside & outside) matches the apartment’s Alexa voice control. Ultra HD TV features in both the bedroom and living room, whilst modern amenities such as the automated watering system, air conditioning, high end Occhio lighting system and a security system are all of the highest quality. Yet the true jewel in the crown of this home has to be the terrace. With 100m2 of room for entertaining, relaxing and contemplating the sumptuous views across Barcelona, there is an outdoor lounge area, dining table, kitchen by Weber and shower facilities and furniture courtesy of designer brand Kettal. As a result, you will have everything you need to soak up the Mediterranean climes of the city in truly local style. Overall, this natural-light filled home in which every element of life has been considered carefully by designers, represents a unique opportunity to own a stunning luxury apartment in one of Europe’s most vibrant and exciting cities. Modern yet packed with local flair, The Olivier is a high-end dream just waiting to be lived. EIXAMPLE: LOCATION AND SURROUNDINGS OF THIS PROPERTY This property is situated in an unbeatable setting in the heart of Barcelona’s desirable Eixample district, which is rich in culture and history. Living in this apartment means you’re just walking distance from some of the city’s most popular bars and Michelin-starred restaurants! This property is situated in an unbeatable setting in the heart of Barcelona’s desirable Eixample district, which is rich in culture and history. Living in this apartment means you’re just walking distance from some of the city’s most popular bars and Michelin-starred restaurants! Take a stroll through Barcelona’s Old Town, or enjoy the enchantment of the nearby Born neighborhood. Other close landmarks include Passeig de Gracias, Las Ramblas, La Palau de la Música, La Boqueria Market, the Passeig de Sant Joan, and the Parc de la Ciutadella, amongst others. Make the most of Barcelona’s stunning beaches and the newly renovated OneOcean Port Vell, only a walk away. At Sebur, you are at the center of it all and you’ll never have to go far to access the city’s best cafes, decor shops, art galleries, boutiques, and so much more!

description: – For rent unfurnished – Spectacular 3 level loft flat next to the Sagrada Familia, with a 5-year-old refurbishment by the prestigious architect Juan Antonio Rizos.  This designer flat has an kitchen with an island a laundry area, with integrated and panelled AEG appliances, including a water softener. It has access to a small patio.  The living room is very spacious with high ceilings and connects to another en-suite bedroom with an exit to a charming sunny patio full of natural plants. On the same floor there is an en-suite bedroom with built-in wardrobes and a bathroom with shower and bathtub. All refurbished with high quality materials.  The stairs from the living room give access to a small bright office and on the top floor there is another bedroom with built-in wardrobes and bathroom. From here you have access to a wonderful terrace with sun all day long. The price includes maintenance service for the gardening. Available at the end of July 2022. There is the possibility to rent a parking space nearby. This neighbourhood is named after Gaudí’s most prestigious monument and one of the most visited in Spain, known all over the world. It has other modernist monuments such as the Hospital Sant Pau and beautiful parks to relax in. This area has an excellent public transport network. *It is rented unfurnished although it is easy to leave curtains and lamps. description: Located in a privileged and quiet area of Barcelona's Gothic Quarter, next to the city's old synagogue, one of the oldest in Europe, dating back to 1314. The apartment is located in a property that was completely renovated in 2017 and is only a 5 minute walk from El Born, with its wide variety of shops, bars and restaurants. At the same time very close to the beach and Plaza Catalunya. The floor enjoys natural light that houses all its spaces thanks to the height of about 4 meters from the ceilings. Two double bedrooms and two bathrooms, built-in wardrobes and storage space in the upper part of the rooms. A fantastic living room with the American kitchen space that has 4 windows to the outside. On the roof of the finca there is a fantastic community area to enjoy dinner with friends or sunbathing on hot days. A real gem in the city's most historic district. It is the oldest district, number 1, the embryo of the city, where all its history begins from the original Barcino, where Roman ruins and medieval Gothic coexist. This district is made up of four neighborhoods, the Gothic, Sant Pere, Santa Caterina, El Born and La Ribera, and Barceloneta, each one more interesting than the other for tourists, since it is the most touristic area of the city, as well as residents. Despite its name, it is one of the most dynamic areas, full of history, art and culture, diversity and very cosmopolitan. Its two markets are especially interesting, La Boquería and Santa Caterina have everything you need from anywhere in the world. The buildings are quite old and many are very well preserved. The floors are generally medium to small, and fantastic historical jewels can be found, such as floors with medieval or Roman walls. So if you are a lover of the city's millenary history, culture, heritage, the most varied gastronomy, the beach, and entertainment, and you want to make a good investment, in this district you can find your ideal neighborhood.

description: Sotheby's International Realty is proud to present this exceptional new development on Rambla de Catalunya, a truly unique opportunity on one of Barcelona's most desirable streets and in the heart of the "Golden Square" of the Eixample. The refurbishment of this beautiful building from 1871 will offer a distribution of four different apartments per floor and two stunning penthouses with private terraces and plenty of outdoor space. Taking into account that it is a corner building, the apartments will offer a very functional distribution in which all spaces are wisely used and will offer several exterior balconies that will allow a lot of natural light and amazing views. All apartments will be between 98 and 130 m2 and will offer 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms plus a fourth typology that will offer a unique and contemporary loft concept with very open spaces and features that stand out from the typical Eixample apartment. The fully equipped and modern kitchen will be open plan with the living area and most of the apartments will enjoy exposed wooden beams on the ceilings which will also give a certain character to the property. The floors will be of waterproof oak laminate parquet and there will be A/C ducts for both hot and cold. The two penthouses of the building will be of contemporary design and will offer a sensational exterior exposure and outdoor space that allows views of one of the most sought after pedestrian streets in the city; Rambla de Catalunya. The location of this project needs no further introduction, as Rambla de Catalunya is synonymous with prime location in Barcelona and is located in the heart of the "Golden Square" that historically made Barcelona world famous for its beautiful and revolutionary Art Nouveau architecture. Right on the doorstep is Paseo de Gracia, Plaza Catalunya and some of the best gastronomy and shopping this magnificent city has to offer. The Eixample district is the most emblematic of Barcelona since the nineteenth century. Of a renowned model urban planning devised by the engineer Ildefons Cerdá, Eixample marks the epicenter of the city from its main streets: The luxurious Passeig de Gràcia, the commercial Rambla de Catalunya and the updated Passeig de Sant Joan, housing the majority of the modernist architectural icons, such as La Sagrada Familia, La Pedrera or La Casa Batlló of the great Antoni Gaudí. It is a large, quiet but exciting  residential area with extremely convenient commercial activity, designed to respect the privacy of the homes. The Catalan modernist architecture so characteristic of stately airs, but with great cosmopolitan touches, extends throughout the neighborhood to the delight of those who wish to live modernism from within, since it is possible to acquire homes within regal estates with valuable original architectural elements, period pieces and even historical and protected. Schools, squares, wadis, parks, stores and restaurants give dynamism to the area that differentiates the Right from the Left, both with wide uniform streets, octagonal islands and wide island interiors that mark the internal distribution of buildings and homes. You will mostly find buildings of strong bricks, floors of generally wide dimensions, medium or high ceilings, with balconies that give to the wide streets or the inner patios of the Cerdá Plan. Keep in mind this living in the Eixample district, if you are looking for a neighborhood where you can have everything within walking distance or very well connected to public transport, both basic and luxury stores, trendy restaurants or even your workplace among the many offices and stores, this could be your neighborhood. If you want to walk among the iconic monuments of the city, with the comfort of equal distance to any other point or neighborhood in the city. Consider Eixample if you are a lover of modernist, stately and typical Catalan architecture and a high street feeling. If you want to live in the.

The entrance to the two garages is made by the same ramp. The construction will be delivered finished and with high-end materials, we have the quality memory of all the services and finishes if you wish. Enjoy Thea. Teia is known for its magnificent climate and its high standard of living, it is part of the charming towns that make up the coast of the COAST OF BARCELONA, the center of Barcelona is 20 minutes away and the international airport is 35 minutes away Its proximity to the sea offers beautiful views from any point of its territory, the beach and the marina are a 10-minute drive away, it has a great wine and gastronomic tradition There are several public and private schools very close, a fantastic place of residence.

suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Emporda

description: Fantastic luxury house for sale in the Sant Berger Urbanization, in the town of Teià, with private security every day of the year and 24 hours a day. Both in its exteriors and interiors, all kinds of details have been planned, making it a unique house in the area and ahead of its time. The best materials, the best study and development to take advantage of spaces and energy, state-of-the-art home automation, alarm with video surveillance system, etc.. . Distributed over two floors, plus the semi-basement, which, thanks to the great use of the plot, becomes a spacious, bright place full of natural light through the large glazing. On the main floor, a double-height hall with designer flown stairs, the living-dining room with spectacular views of the sea and the golf course, a courtesy toilet, the office-style kitchen with high-end appliances, with an extractor fan. Pando brand ventilation among many other extras, a large suite room with a full bathroom complements this floor. On the first floor, the master suite with a large dressing room and a full bathroom with a shower tray open to the room, and with access to the terrace where we find a beautiful Jacuzzi with incredible views of the sea, on this same floor two more bedrooms separated by a sliding door that share a full bath. The semi-basement floor has a large fully equipped cinema room, service room with full bathroom, security room, full gym, laundry area, exclusively designed parking with capacity for two cars, a pantry area and storage room. big. The spectacular views of the sea are in all the rooms inside the house and from the garden through the infinity pool are a unique pleasure. Next to the pool, outdoor jacuzzi, solarium area and designer fireplace. Extras to highlight: Design elevator, external and internal video surveillance system, panic room, centralized vacuum system, water and air purification system…. Enjoy Thea. Teia is known for its magnificent climate and its high standard of living, it is part of the charming towns that make up the coast of the COAST OF BARCELONA, the center of Barcelona is 20 minutes away and the international airport is 35 minutes away Its proximity to the sea offers beautiful views from any point of its territory, the beach and the marina are a 10-minute drive away, it has a great wine and gastronomic tradition There are several public and private schools very close, a fantastic place of residence.

description: Beautiful property for sale, in one of the most private areas of Alella, located in a quiet residential street. Totally exterior, with large windows. The plot is an area of 1,287 m2. The house consists of four floors, all of them connected by a panoramic elevator, and with a fantastic garden with sea views and an impeccable pool. On the main floor we find a large living-dining room with large windows that give access to a large terrace with spectacular views of the sea. On the same floor kitchen and courtesy toilet, from it we access the upper floor where we find the two suites plus the office on two levels. On the lower floor is the second dining room with large windows that give access to the garden, another large kitchen with large windows. On the same floor is the fourth bedroom plus a bathroom. In the basement we find the service area and the garage which is accessed through a tunnel. The house has electric shutters, two water wells, a hydromassage bathtub, a panoramic elevator, automatic awnings and an armored door in the main room. Enjoy Alella! Alella has the name of wine, white wine, young, fruity... A wine that combines with any dish and can be drunk at any time. Alella, like the wine that bears its name, is a town full of energy and tradition, forming part of the charming towns that make up the BARCELONA COAST, which is 15 minutes away, between the Mediterranean Sea and the Parc de la Serralada Litoral. Alella stands out, in addition to the homonymous DO, for its wide gastronomic and cultural offer. Alella is an ideal place to live.

description: Grupo Dolça Llar presents, in the heart of Poblenou, this modern 95-meter second-hand apartment, 2 minutes from the beach. It consists of a modern distribution with a spacious living room, 3 bedrooms, two bathrooms (one en suite), large kitchen, laundry room. Fully exterior. It has a variety of services, schools and supermarkets around it, a few meters from the Rambla del Poblenou. The published prices do not include taxes (ITP / VAT or AJD) and real estate expenses of the sale. Request detailed information on the characteristics of the property, taxes and expenses of the operation, we will be happy to assist you. Do not hesitate to schedule a visit!

description: Fantastic property for sale of more than 900 m2 built in the town of Alella. The house is currently distributed in 4 houses, all of them independently. If desired, it could be unified again and make only one house. The main house consists of a large entrance hall, a double living-dining room with fantastic views of the sea, an office-style kitchen. On this same floor, a large suite-type room, 2 double rooms with a full bathroom and access to a solarium terrace and one more full bathroom. From this same house we have stairs where we can access the house above and with the possibility of reopening access to the two houses below. The second house that would be at the top is the one that is most updated and renovated. It is distributed as follows: entering the house, a nice hall with a dressing room to leave coats and shoes, a courtesy bathroom, an office-style kitchen with a pantry completely open to the dining room with access to the outside, next to this There is a large living room with a fireplace and a large library. Going up to the upper area is the night area, made up of 3 very large rooms, all of them with their own full bathroom and dressing room, a master suite with an office and access to the terrace with spectacular views. On this same floor is the laundry area and a large solarium terrace with its chill-out area. On the outside there is a large porch with a summer dining room and a storage area. The other two houses are currently summer and weekend homes, both with completely independent entrances, each house has a living-dining room, a fully equipped kitchen, 3-4 bedrooms with full bathrooms and an outdoor area. All homes have air conditioning, radiator heating, fitted wardrobes... Its large outdoor plot is ideal and very important to highlight. A large pool with sea views, summer porch and green space for entertainment. A squash court. If you wanted you could make a helipad, stables for horses, agricultural area... Extras to highlight: automatic blinds, air conditioning in all rooms, radiators in all houses, ceramic and parquet floors, alarm... Enjoy Alella. description: Enjoy your home, an oasis in which to spend time feeling that you live surrounded by nature, a possible dream in this historic rustic farmhouse dating from the 18th century, completely renovated, practical, current and located a short walk from the center of town. beautiful town of Tiana and only 15 minutes by car to the center of Barcelona, with a constructed area of 846 m² and a total of 11 hectares of arable land. On the ground floor of this farmhouse for sale, we find a large hall with access to the garden with sea views, kitchen with dining room and large living room in two rooms with fireplace; on the same floor, courtesy toilet and a majestic cellar that preserves the original wine presses and boots, one of them the oldest in Tiana. On the first floor, hall-living room, three double bedrooms, all with dressing room and their own bathroom. In the attic, a huge open space with a spectacular ceiling with wooden beams. Attached to the house there is a masonry with a living room, kitchen, 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The farm has space to create a magnificent garden with views of the sea and swimming pool (old irrigation pond), it also has several private wells and a water mine for irrigation. At the back we find a cover for several cars and a separate laundry room. Enjoy Tiana! Just 15 kilometers from Barcelona is Tiana, it is part of the charming towns that make up the coast of the COAST OF BARCELONA, this proximity to the Catalan capital explains why a large part of its inhabitants are Barcelonans who moved their residence here looking for tranquility and quality of life. The municipality of Tiana is surrounded by the gentle undulations of low mountains that protect it from the north winds. The height of the town allows the views to be impressive and the Mediterranean to be enjoyed from many corners of the town. Walking through the streets of Tiana, with its abundant unevenness, allows you to discover the long history of the town that, like so many others in the region, began in the time of the Iberians.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Tiana
suggestedTexts.title: Masía in Calle Gosch

description: Spectacular neoclassical style villa in Tiana for sale, built in 1850 and totally restored for almost four years, finishing in 2014. The architectural interest of this neoclassical villa falls especially on the main façade, with a central body a little more advanced than the sides.The main entrance is located behind the semicircular columns.It is also worth noting the large double-sided staircase that leads to a terrace at the height of the first floor, in front of the main entrance (the circular steps at the bottom of the stairs are especially interesting, which give the whole a certain movement).Other neoclassical architectural elements are: balustrades, hydrias, ornamental garlands, small panels with sculptures, or sculptural groups like the one that crowns the building. This fantastic neoclassical villa for sale, located in the center of Tiana, provides the sensation of rising haughtily above the town, with views of the old part, the church and the sea in the background.On a plot of 3,125 m2 and a constructed area of 892 m2. For its restoration, respect for the original elements has been taken into account, the frescoes on the walls and the spectacular dome have been painted by hand, marbles from India, Italy and Brazil were commissioned, the floor combines oak wood with hydraulic tiles, original wooden beams, etc. On the main floor of this villa, a charming hall leads us to the spectacular living room with an impressive central dome that reflects light throughout the room and distributes light to the different rooms.In the left wing we find the master suite with fireplace and access to a private terrace, bathroom, large dressing room and reading room also with fireplace.On the right side, another bedroom en suite, and a living room with large windows and a fireplace specially designed for this space.This floor has access to the back of the garden where the summer porch is located, surrounded by rose bushes from all over the world. On the lower floor, a dining room for 26 people stands out, with walls specially designed by its owners, with wood panels combining American pine, mahogany, maple and teak.A heated cellar, pantry with a wood-burning oven, and a spectacular industrial kitchen with continuous high-resistance flooring, this space contrasts with the predominance of steel that blends with the original elements of the villa, equipped with a professional hot plate, drinks fridge, separate freezer and tepanyaki among others. It has a service area with three bedrooms and two bathrooms. The upper part of the villa is occupied by a large open-plan room, with sloping wooden ceilings, three bedrooms and a full bathroom. From there you can access the roof of the property, where you can enjoy wonderful views of the sea and the entire town of Tiana. Its extras include hot/cold air conditioning, Fontini switches, Duravit toilets, Samuel Heath and Dornbracht faucets, service bell in all rooms, etc. There is the possibility of acquiring the property fully equipped and furnished, with pieces purchased at auctions and antique dealers from around the world.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Tiana
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Avenida Joan Garí

description: Spectacular house with four winds for sale in Urbanization Mas Ram (Badalona), in a privileged area, near a private school and tennis club. The Urbanization has private surveillance 24 hours a day.The 1,150 m2 plot, 375 m2 built, is distributed over three spacious and bright floors plus a beautiful loft with sea views. The house has a beautiful pool with a waterfall and a splendid garden, completely flat, with fruit trees and an orchard. On the main floor, there is a spacious hall, which leads to the living-dining room with two well-differentiated rooms and a fireplace.It has a kitchen with an office area and a pleasant terrace with sea views.On this same floor and for great comfort, there is a double bedroom and a complete bathroom. On the first floor, we find 3 bedrooms (1 suite, 2 doubles) and 2 full bathrooms. The attic is a pleasant space with wooden ceilings and lots of light, a space that has been reserved for leisure and study area. On the ground floor of the house we find a large cellar, the laundry area and the garage with capacity for two cars. It has gas heating, air conditioning, water softener and a toilet in the pool. Perfect location just 200 meters from the entrance to the B-20 and 5 minutes from Barcelona. Enjoy Badalona! Badalona, a Mediterranean city located to the north of the mouth of the Besòs river and is one of the oldest cities with the greatest history in Catalonia, forming part of the COAST OF BARCELONA, it is located just 10 km from the capital Barcelona, it has a sub-humid climate, with slightly cold winters and dry summers. Just 28 km from El Prat airport, Badalona is well connected with the neighboring municipalities and with the capital Barcelona. It extends from the sea to the Cordillera de Marina, the green lung of the city where you can find a wide variety of vegetation and an interesting heritage and historical legacy, such as its old farmhouses.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Mas Ram, Badalona
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Salze

description: BestMaresme presents this exceptional 162 m2 built penthouse for sale with a spectacular 94.63 m2 terrace. Located in Montgat, on the second line of the sea, it will allow you to enjoy the sun and the Mediterranean throughout the year. 5 minutes from the train station and 15 minutes from downtown Barcelona. Easy connectivity with the main road arteries. It is a comfortable, exterior, bright penthouse designed to make the most of the space, surrounded by beautiful and green common areas, which will add to the privilege of living a few meters from the beach in an area in the process of urban transformation which makes it highly attractive as an investment. It has a swimming pool, solarium, playground, and is equipped with the highest qualities, such as: Porcelanosa bathrooms and kitchens, Carré carpentry and ecological equipment inside the homes and in the residential, such as: aerothermal energy, underfloor heating, waste management, parking with electric charge, among many other aspects. You will be able to live with quality and tranquility, breathing the Mediterranean, without sacrificing the practicality of being just a few minutes from Barcelona! Enjoy Montgat. Montgat is part of the region of the charming towns that make up the coast of the COAST OF BARCELONA. The name of Montgat comes from Roman times and is located between the sea and the mountains, just 15 minutes from the center of Barcelona. There are many points of interest that the municipality offers to the visitor, its beaches, the Old Quarter or the fishermen's quarter, its train station, its gastronomy.

description: We present this exclusive property for sale in the private urbanization Mas Ram in Badalona, with a privileged location, very well connected, close to Barcelona and international schools. The house is divided into two comfortable and spacious floors dedicated to housing and another basement. With a very unique architectural style, as well as timeless, this property with high-quality finishes is built on a flat 2,000 m2 plot. Its unbeatable outdoor area has a large pool, perfect for cooling off on the hottest days, it has a beautiful chill-out terrace, barbecue area and a privileged garden that surrounds the house. We access the interior of the house. Here we are greeted by a majestic hall that leads us to the living room with fireplace and exit to the outside, separate dining room, very functional kitchen and garage for two cars with bathroom and laundry room. On this same floor we find the night area with three bedrooms, two doubles that share a bathroom and a master suite with bathroom and dressing room. On the second attic-type floor are located; a living room with a large terrace with fantastic views of the sea, a double bedroom, a complete bathroom with a shower and an office. In the basement we find a fantastic games room with a fireplace, a gym with a sauna, a Jacuzzi for four people and a shower. Also on this floor is the machine room and warehouse. It has quality finishes such as marble floors, aluminum carpentry with centralized automatic blinds, gas heating and air conditioning in bedrooms. Enjoy Badalona! On the first floor we find a large multipurpose room and night area with 3 double bedrooms that share a full bathroom plus the master bedroom suite with its own bathroom. All of them with closets and lots of natural light. It has a garage for two cars, with space also for storage. They have a 10,000L water tank. collection of rainwater for irrigation. The main features of this house with soul are its strategic entrances of light, intimacy, sophistication in its shape, large windows, its high-end finishes and top-quality materials, which transmit an incredible sensation of well-being and harmony in all its environments. This creation has been distributed only in three comfortable floors with open and diaphanous rooms, establishing a peripheral view of the sea from any point.The floors are connected by the wide stately staircase and elevator. At the level of the main entrance we find; Large hall, office, toilet, service area with en-suite bedroom and separate laundry room.Also on this floor we have a garage for three cars. On the main floor we find a spacious and bright living-dining room with a fireplace.The living room has access to a fabulous outdoor area with a fantastic terrace and the garden where there is a large swimming pool with a rest area and a well-kept porch with a summer kitchen area, a summer dining room and a chill-out area, ideal for enjoying of the outdoorsNext to the pool, there is a changing room with a complete bathroom and an adjoining building where the game room with a ping-pong and billiards table is located.On this same floor we find the fully equipped and furnished kitchen. description: Very close to the Gran Teatre del Liceu and Las Ramblas, in a pedestrian and very quiet street is this apartment so special and charming. It is about a cosy one bedroom apartment, located on the first floor of a building typical of 19th century Barcelona. The distribution of the property is very square so the space is optimized in the best way, accessing it is on the left the open kitchen forming a single living space very spacious and bright. Right next to the kitchen and the entrance, there is the access door to the bathroom, it is complete, with shower tray and electric heating. The living room, communicates through a large sliding door with the only bedroom on the floor, being this very spacious, bright and with a large built-in wardrobe to take better advantage of the space. Finally, at the end of the living room, there is a semi-covered terrace in which the direct sunlight starts at 12 noon. This terrace of about 10 square meters, is very quiet as it is oriented to the interior of the block so it is really like a small oasis of peace and tranquility right in the center of Barcelona. In addition, in this balcony-terrace, there is a small room for laundry. The total surface is around 52 square meters plus the small terrace, it has woode parquet floors, equipped kitchen and appliances, international cable television, aluminum exterior carpentry with double insulating glass, fitted wardrobes, there is the possibility be furnished, so the apartment is ready to move into. The whole building is very well maintained and with a very good atmosphere among all the neighbors, it is a construction of 1885 according to cadastral data, but in a very good state of conservation since several maintenance tasks have been carried out. It has a Fichet security door, the facade is protected and fully restored. The location is ideal, just in a street behind the Liceu, so it could not be more central, 1 minute from the Ramblas, very close to the emblematic market of La Boqueria and 15 minutes from the beach. The communication is very good, a few minutes from the Liceu Metro stop (Line 3) and also communicated by several urban bus lines. The price does not include furniture, taxes or notary and registration fees.
