description: Spectacular neoclassical style villa in Tiana for sale, built in 1850 and totally restored for almost four years, finishing in 2014. The architectural interest of this neoclassical villa falls especially on the main façade, with a central body a little more advanced than the sides.The main entrance is located behind the semicircular columns.It is also worth noting the large double-sided staircase that leads to a terrace at the height of the first floor, in front of the main entrance (the circular steps at the bottom of the stairs are especially interesting, which give the whole a certain movement).Other neoclassical architectural elements are: balustrades, hydrias, ornamental garlands, small panels with sculptures, or sculptural groups like the one that crowns the building. This fantastic neoclassical villa for sale, located in the center of Tiana, provides the sensation of rising haughtily above the town, with views of the old part, the church and the sea in the background.On a plot of 3,125 m2 and a constructed area of 892 m2. For its restoration, respect for the original elements has been taken into account, the frescoes on the walls and the spectacular dome have been painted by hand, marbles from India, Italy and Brazil were commissioned, the floor combines oak wood with hydraulic tiles, original wooden beams, etc. On the main floor of this villa, a charming hall leads us to the spectacular living room with an impressive central dome that reflects light throughout the room and distributes light to the different rooms.In the left wing we find the master suite with fireplace and access to a private terrace, bathroom, large dressing room and reading room also with fireplace.On the right side, another bedroom en suite, and a living room with large windows and a fireplace specially designed for this space.This floor has access to the back of the garden where the summer porch is located, surrounded by rose bushes from all over the world. On the lower floor, a dining room for 26 people stands out, with walls specially designed by its owners, with wood panels combining American pine, mahogany, maple and teak.A heated cellar, pantry with a wood-burning oven, and a spectacular industrial kitchen with continuous high-resistance flooring, this space contrasts with the predominance of steel that blends with the original elements of the villa, equipped with a professional hot plate, drinks fridge, separate freezer and tepanyaki among others. It has a service area with three bedrooms and two bathrooms. The upper part of the villa is occupied by a large open-plan room, with sloping wooden ceilings, three bedrooms and a full bathroom. From there you can access the roof of the property, where you can enjoy wonderful views of the sea and the entire town of Tiana. Its extras include hot/cold air conditioning, Fontini switches, Duravit toilets, Samuel Heath and Dornbracht faucets, service bell in all rooms, etc. There is the possibility of acquiring the property fully equipped and furnished, with pieces purchased at auctions and antique dealers from around the world. Enjoy Tiana. Just 15 kilometers from Barcelona is Tiana, it is part of the charming towns that make up the coast of the COAST OF BARCELONA, this proximity to the Catalan capital explains why a large part of its inhabitants are Barcelonans who moved their residence here looking for tranquility and quality of life.The municipality of Tiana is surrounded by the gentle undulations of low mountains that protect it from the north winds. The height of the town allows the views to be impressive and the Mediterranean to be enjoyed from many corners of the town.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Tiana
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle de Montalegre

description: BestMaresme presents this exceptional 139.39 m2 built apartment on the sixth floor for sale with a spectacular 32.88 m2 terrace Located in Montgat, on the second line of the sea, it will allow you to enjoy the sun and the Mediterranean throughout the year. 5 minutes from the train station and 15 minutes from downtown Barcelona. Easy connectivity with the main road arteries. It is an apartment with a terrace, comfortable, exterior, bright and designed to make the most of the space, surrounded by beautiful and green common areas, which will add to the privilege of living a few meters from the beach in an area in the process of urban transformation that gives it a great attraction as an investment. It has a swimming pool, solarium, playground, and is equipped with the highest qualities, such as: Porcelanosa bathrooms and kitchens, Carré carpentry and ecological equipment inside the homes and in the residential, such as: aerothermal energy, underfloor heating, waste management, parking with electric charge, among many other aspects. You will be able to live with quality and tranquility, breathing the Mediterranean, without sacrificing the practicality of being just a few minutes from Barcelona! Enjoy Montgat. Montgat is part of the region of the charming towns that make up the coast of the COAST OF BARCELONA. The name of Montgat comes from Roman times and is located between the sea and the mountains, just 15 minutes from the center of Barcelona. There are many points of interest that the municipality offers to the visitor, its beaches, the Old Quarter or the fishermen's quarter, its train station, its gastronomy.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Montgat
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle Arno Jager

description: Beautiful house for sale in Tiana, 500m2 on a large 780m2 plot, with views of the sea and the mountains. The house is distributed over three large floors plus a large attic. On the main floor, a magnificent living-dining room with air conditioning, a bedroom on the ground floor, a courtesy toilet and a large kitchen with an office with access to a terrace-garden where we find a porch area for pleasant summer meals with a barbecue, wood-burning oven and a full outdoor bathroom. Complete this space an orchard with irrigation. Going up to the second floor we find 4 double bedrooms, all with fitted wardrobes, one of them is the master suite with air conditioning, access to a large terrace with sea views. The suite room has a bathroom with a bathtub and shower. The attic is a large leisure space, with wooden-lined ceilings and large windows that provide plenty of light and another full bathroom. On the ground floor, a garage for 2 vehicles, a cellar/pantry, a large 200m2 multipurpose room and a bathroom. This floor has direct access to the garden where the pool area is located. The whole house has electric shutters and aluminum frames. Well connected with Barcelona, close to the international school. Enjoy Tiana! Just 15 kilometers from Barcelona is Tiana, it is part of the charming towns that make up the coast of the COAST OF BARCELONA, this proximity to the Catalan capital explains why a large part of its inhabitants are Barcelonans who moved their residence here looking for tranquility and quality of life. The municipality of Tiana is surrounded by the gentle undulations of low mountains that protect it from the north winds. The height of the town allows the views to be impressive and the Mediterranean to be enjoyed from many corners of the town. Walking through the streets of Tiana, with its abundant unevenness, allows you to discover the long history of the town that, like so many others in the region, began in the time of the Iberians.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Tiana
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Rossello

description: House for sale in Badalona, 610 m2 built on a flat plot, with garden and pool. A very special property, with an architecture of straight lines and exposed manual work that make it a very contemporary house. It has 610m2 built, distributed over 3 floors. Very well located, on a completely flat corner plot of 943m2 with a garden and pool, in a private urbanization in Badalona. Very good communication with Barcelona, which can be reached in 15 minutes. Large spaces and well distributed. On the main floor is the hall, a living room with large windows that communicate with the outside garden, the kitchen with an office area and pantry and an office. On the first floor, we find the night area, with 5 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms. Highlight the large master suite with dressing room and bathroom with shower and semicircular bathtub. This room has access to a pleasant private terrace. On the second floor, a bright open-plan room, to work from home, games room or study for children, etc. From there we access a large terrace with truly spectacular views of the sea. A very private space as a chillout area or solarium. In the basement, we find a large garage for more than 4 cars and a room converted into a gym with a sauna. Among its extras, it should be noted that it is equipped with built-in halogen lighting, solid oak interior carpentry and PVC Climalit exterior, gas heating, fireplace, alarm system, built-in wardrobes, wooden doors, etc. A garden designed to enjoy the warm climate of Maresme, have outdoor barbecues next to the large outdoor pool and a summer porch area. The urbanization has a private security service and is close to public transport, a private school, the Hamelin-Laie international school and a tennis club. Enjoy Badalona Badalona, a Mediterranean city located to the north of the mouth of the Besòs river and is one of the oldest cities with the greatest history in Catalonia, forming part of the COAST OF BARCELONA, it is located just 10 km from the capital Barcelona, it has a sub-humid climate, with slightly cold winters and dry summers. Just 28 km from El Prat airport, Badalona is well connected with the neighboring municipalities and with the capital Barcelona. It extends from the sea to the Cordillera de Marina, the green lung of the city where you can find a wide variety of vegetation and an interesting heritage and historical legacy, such as its old farmhouses.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Mas Ram, Badalona
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Paseo del salze

description: We present you this spectacular design penthouse located in the center of Barcelona. This house with perfect architectural lines has design as a common denominator, but always keeping comfort in mind. Housing where you enjoy the luxury of the space, natural light, and the practicality of all its corners, designed to enjoy each and every one of its spaces. It has a spacious main room, a dressing room, a large living area, a kitchen-dining room and a spectacular bathroom, all top brands. Access to a big community terrace. Riereta street, in Raval, is a quiet street located near the Ronda de Sant Antoni and Rambla del Raval, in which there are plenty of artisan shops, coworkings and charming bars, so there is a lot of gastronomic offer in the area, cultural and leisure of all kinds. The house is in turn, a hundred meters from the Ronda de Sant Antoni, that is to say, very central and touching one of the most fashionable neighborhoods of the city. Communication is very good, close to the Universitat (Line 1) and Sant Antoni (Line 2) Metro stops, as well as with various urban and interurban bus lines.   The price includes design furniture (contact us for more details). Does not include taxes or notary and registration fees.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Raval, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle de la Riereta

address: Calle de la Vinya del Rei
description: We present a fantastic and functional house for sale in the best area of Alella close to all services, schools and commerce. The house has 388m2 built distributed over two floors on a 1063m2 plot. The farm offers privacy and a lot of tranquility, it gets the sun practically all day. On the ground floor, there is a large living-dining room with direct access to the porch and garden with swimming pool with fantastic views of the mountains and the vineyards of Alella, a large kitchen with a dining area, it also has a separate laundry room, a double room with wardrobes built-in, full bathroom with shower and a cellar. On the first floor we find a large multipurpose room and night area with 3 double bedrooms that share a full bathroom plus the master bedroom suite with its own bathroom. All of them with closets and lots of natural light. It has a garage for two cars, with space also for storage. They have a 10,000L water tank. collection of rainwater for irrigation. In the well-kept garden, we find a large pool, which also has a practical bathroom with shower and changing room. Enjoy Alella! Alella has the name of wine, white wine, young, fruity... A wine that combines with any dish and can be drunk at any time. Alella, like the wine that bears its name, is a town full of energy and tradition, forming part of the charming towns that make up the BARCELONA COAST, which is 15 minutes away, between the Mediterranean Sea and the Parc de la Serralada Litoral. Alella stands out, in addition to the homonymous DO, for its wide gastronomic and cultural offer. Alella is an ideal place to live.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Centre, Alella
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle de la Vinya del Rei

description: Manor house, Catalan farmhouse style, built in the year 1590, on a flat plot of 1,600 m2. With 1,000 m2 of useful area, distributed on the ground floor and first floor. It maintains the original elements, ceilings with the typical “volta catalana” construction, wooden beams on the ceilings, terrazzo floors, etc. The ground floor consists of a large central entrance, a large and spacious living room with an adjoining room with billiards, another room currently accommodated as a living room, on the same floor we find the kitchen with fireplace, laundry area and pantries, more room and bathroom. On the first floor, a large distributor that gives access to the remaining six rooms, plus two bathrooms. One of the rooms with access to a large terrace. Fantastic garden with different rooms, plus an orchard. Located in the center of the town of Premià de Dalt, on the Costa de Maresme, with services, shops and schools. 30 minutes from the center of Barcelona and 5 minutes from the beach. Good connections. Enjoy Dalt Award! Premià de Dalt has everything, services, commerce, schools, library, markets, nature, tranquility.. . It is a town flanked by pine and holm oak forests on one side and with the Mediterranean horizon on the other, it is part of the charming towns that make up the coastline of the BARCELONA COAST, just 30 minutes from the city center. In Premià de Dalt the sea is very present, although the municipality does not have its own beach, from many corners of the term there are beautiful views of the sea, in addition the very nature that surrounds the town invites you to walk or run along its paths. Undoubtedly an excellent population to establish your residence.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Premià de Dalt
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle llarg

description: In an impressive building in Barcelona's Eixample, located on the first floor, we find this impressive 146 sqm property according to cadastre. The property stands out for its high ceilings of great beauty, since they are coffered, and for its natural light, since on one side has views over Aribau street, and on the other side to the impressive 36 sqm terrace for private use. We enter the house through a big hall, on the left side is the spacious main bedroom with access to the large balcony that leads to the main façade of the building, and another bedroom that is currently used as a work/study area. On the other side of the hall, on the right hand, we find distributed through a long corridor the bathrooms, another double room, a dressing room, and a modern kitchen. At the end of the corridor we have the spacious living-dining room that enjoys great natural light since it is located next to a huge gallery with access to the large 36 sqm terrace with views over the inner courtyard of the block. The terrace also has a storage room for private use. The house is immaculate, with parquet floors in all its rooms except bathrooms and kitchen, and new aluminium carpentry. On the enjoyable roof terrace of the building, with views over all Barcelona, there is also a private storage room. The magnificent building, built in 1906, stands out for its architectural beauty that we can appreciate in all its details. An impressive building that, thanks to its good state of maintenance, allows you to admire its majesty. If you are looking for an impressive and unique property in which the architectural elements of modernism and at the same time the functional design come together, contact us for more information. The price does not include taxes or sales expenses.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: L'Antiga Esquerra de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Aribau

description: We present this exclusive property for sale in the private urbanization Mas Ram in Badalona, with a privileged location, very well connected, close to Barcelona and international schools. The house is divided into two comfortable and spacious floors dedicated to housing and another basement. With a very unique architectural style, as well as timeless, this property with high-quality finishes is built on a flat 2,000 m2 plot. Its unbeatable outdoor area has a large pool, perfect for cooling off on the hottest days, it has a beautiful chill-out terrace, barbecue area and a privileged garden that surrounds the house. We access the interior of the house. Here we are greeted by a majestic hall that leads us to the living room with fireplace and exit to the outside, separate dining room, very functional kitchen and garage for two cars with bathroom and laundry room. On this same floor we find the night area with three bedrooms, two doubles that share a bathroom and a master suite with bathroom and dressing room. On the second attic-type floor are located; a living room with a large terrace with fantastic views of the sea, a double bedroom, a complete bathroom with a shower and an office. In the basement we find a fantastic games room with a fireplace, a gym with a sauna, a Jacuzzi for four people and a shower. Also on this floor is the machine room and warehouse. It has quality finishes such as marble floors, aluminum carpentry with centralized automatic blinds, gas heating and air conditioning in bedrooms. Enjoy Badalona! Just 28 km from El Prat airport, Badalona is well connected with the neighboring municipalities and with the capital Barcelona. It extends from the sea to the Cordillera de Marina, the green lung of the city where you can find a wide variety of vegetation and an interesting heritage and historical legacy, such as its old farmhouses.

description: New construction single-family house, in an unbeatable location, in the very center of the town, close to all services. These are two single-family homes of 280 m2 on plots of approximately 400 m2 each, with a garden and saline pool. They will be distributed over two floors plus the basement, connected by a wide staircase and with the possibility of installing an elevator. The day area will be on the ground floor, here we will find a comfortable and spacious hall that will give way to a large open area where we will find the living-dining room next to the open kitchen, with unobstructed views of the outdoor porch and the garden thanks to its large windows. On this same floor there will be a full bathroom and a laundry area. The night area will be located on the first floor, here there will be 4 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms, one of them a suite, large in size and with a dressing room. Three of the bedrooms have access to the outside. In the basement is the garage, with capacity for three cars. In addition, it will also have a cellar area and a storage room. The entrance to the two garages is made by the same ramp. The construction will be delivered finished and with high-end materials, we have the quality memory of all the services and finishes if you wish. Enjoy Thea. Located on flat land with which the exterior spaces are fully used and next to Can Teixidor, 5 minutes from the beach and all the services offered by the population. Developed on 3 floors: -On the main floor is the living room with large glazing that allows you to view the pool area and the front porch, kitchen with office area and direct access to the summer dining area, where we find another pleasant porch in the area North of the garden and 1 courtesy toilet. -On the first floor, the master suite with dressing room, bathroom with hydromassage bathtub and shower and private terrace, another suite, a double room and another complete bathroom. The attic area is a large space distributed in an office area, a study area, a bedroom, a dressing room and a complete bathroom. This area also has a solarium-type terrace with sea views. -In the basement area with the entrance of natural light, the entire leisure part is located with a wine cellar with Catalan vaulted ceilings, a large winter dining room with fireplace and kitchen and the relaxation area with a gym and Jacuzzi for six people and direct access to the outdoor saline water pool area. Among the extras of the property, it is worth highlighting: Marble floors and stairs, parquet and micro-cement, intercoms throughout the house, alarm, television and satellite antennas, piped music in all rooms, underfloor heating and ducted air conditioning, automatic sprinkler irrigation, water softener, garage for two cars with automatic door and large storage room, etc. Enjoy Alella! On the main floor we find a spacious hall that leads to a bright living-dining room with access to a terrace with a beautiful covered porch, a spacious fully equipped kitchen with direct access to the garden, laundry area, an office that had been giving the use of a room on the ground floor and a full bathroom. On the upper floor is the night area made up of four bedrooms, one of them en-suite with a dressing room and a full bathroom and another bathroom with a shower and bathtub that is shared by the other three rooms. The outdoor area completely surrounded by beautiful trees and plants, offers a large garden with a swimming pool, a pleasant porch area for rest and a barbecue area. It has a closed garage with capacity for up to five vehicles and a large storage room, as well as a wonderful rainwater collection system with tanks with a capacity of up to 6000 liters. It was built with high-quality materials such as marble floors, heating, armored door, double-glazed windows, aluminum exterior carpentry, cherry interior carpentry, air conditioning, central vacuum, electric shutters, alarm.. . in addition to having pre-installation done in case would like to become home automation. The property is located a few minutes from downtown, in a quiet environment surrounded by nature. Well connected with the C-32 motorway, just 20 minutes from the center of the city of Barcelona. Both in its exteriors and interiors, all kinds of details have been planned, making it a unique house in the area and ahead of its time. The semi-basement floor has a large fully equipped cinema room, service room with full bathroom, security room, full gym, laundry area, exclusively designed parking with capacity for two cars, a pantry area and storage room. big. description: Exclusive project for sale in the town of Premià de Dalt.The goal is to build an absolutely personalized home. The location chosen this time is in the La Cisa de Premià de Dalt Urbanization, on a 2-level plot with panoramic views of the sea.A privileged environment in the heart of Maresme, a place chosen for decades by renowned Barcelona businessmen to set up their residences. A unique home that stands out for the incredible views of the sea, sustainability, quality, for its unique design and for its habitability.The proposal is based on a base of extreme quality with a fully customizable interior layout.The design is exclusive and unique to its new owners. This isolated single-family house is going to be built on a practically flat plot of almost 700m2, facing East, in a dominant position over Premià de Dalt and with panoramic views over the town with the Mediterranean Sea in the background. In order to get the most out of the land, an interior distribution in 2 unique levels is proposed. The one we present here has a total of more than 365 m2 built. – The main floor of almost 183 m2 would be the access floor to the house.It would comprise 3 double bedrooms, two full bathrooms, a master suite with dressing room and bathroom, a large office, and a parking area with a storage room. – The lower floor, open to the sea, measuring 183 m2, will be used for the day area and made up of an equipped office kitchen, a living-dining room with direct access to the pool with a beautiful porch area with a chill-out area. out, a double room and a complete service bathroom.On this floor we also find a laundry area, another courtesy bathroom and the facilities room. The outdoor areas are planned as leisure spaces for relaxation and made up of large terraces with easy access, an infinity pool of 13.2 x 6m2 and 2 independent garden areas with easy-to-maintain Mediterranean landscaping. Extras to highlight: aerothermal energy, aluminum exterior carpentry, white lacquered wood interior carpentry, porcelain stoneware floors and park... Enjoy Dalt Award! Premià de Dalt has everything, services, commerce, schools, library, markets, nature, tranquility... It is a town flanked by pine and holm oak forests on one side and with the Mediterranean horizon on the other, it is part of the charming towns that make up the coastline of the BARCELONA COAST, just 30 minutes from the city center. In Premià de Dalt the sea is very present, although the municipality does not have its own beach, from many corners of the term there are beautiful views of the sea, in addition the very nature that surrounds the town invites you to walk or run along its paths. Undoubtedly an excellent population to establish your residence.

The day area consists of a large open living room next to a large office-type kitchen; From the living room we have access to a pleasant patio, a fantastic and cool chill-out area. On this same floor there is also a complete bathroom with a fantastic stone shower. Going up to the first floor is the night area, here we find 4 double bedrooms, two of them with access to a terrace with fabulous views of the sea, and a large bathroom with double shower and double WC that they share between them. The top floor is an attic, this area has been given the use of a double bedroom thanks to its dimensions, it has the possibility of having its private bathroom since it has all the connections. Highlight the sea views also from this area. In the outdoor area it has another independent space which has been used as a storage room and laundry area. All the floors preserve all the details of the original design of the house, both in its finishes and in its decoration. To enter to live, perfectly maintained inside and out. Extras: underfloor heating on the ground floor, and radiator heating in the bedroom, natural wood floors in bedrooms, solar panels, integrated alarm. Enjoy Montgat. Montgat is part of the region of the charming towns that make up the coast of the COAST OF BARCELONA. The name of Montgat comes from Roman times and is located between the sea and the mountains, just 15 minutes from the center of Barcelona. There are many points of interest that the municipality offers to the visitor, its beaches, the Old Quarter or the fishermen's quarter, its train station, its gastronomy.

description: Spectacular house for sale of 433 m2 built on a 600m2 plot located in the town of Premià de Dalt The house is distributed over three large floors. On the main floor we find a spacious hall that leads to a bright living-dining room with access to a terrace with a beautiful covered porch, a spacious fully equipped kitchen with direct access to the garden, laundry area, an office that had been giving the use of a room on the ground floor and a full bathroom. On the upper floor is the night area made up of four bedrooms, one of them en-suite with a dressing room and a full bathroom and another bathroom with a shower and bathtub that is shared by the other three rooms. The outdoor area completely surrounded by beautiful trees and plants, offers a large garden with a swimming pool, a pleasant porch area for rest and a barbecue area. It has a closed garage with capacity for up to five vehicles and a large storage room, as well as a wonderful rainwater collection system with tanks with a capacity of up to 6000 liters. It was built with high-quality materials such as marble floors, heating, armored door, double-glazed windows, aluminum exterior carpentry, cherry interior carpentry, air conditioning, central vacuum, electric shutters, alarm.. . in addition to having pre-installation done in case would like to become home automation. The property is located a few minutes from downtown, in a quiet environment surrounded by nature. Well connected with the C-32 motorway, just 20 minutes from the center of the city of Barcelona. Enjoy Dalt Award! Premià de Dalt has everything, services, commerce, schools, library, markets, nature, tranquility.. . It is a town flanked by pine and holm oak forests on one side and with the Mediterranean horizon on the other, it is part of the charming towns that make up the coastline of the BARCELONA COAST, just 30 minutes from the city center. In Premià de Dalt the sea is very present, although the municipality does not have its own beach, from many corners of the term there are beautiful views of the sea, in addition the very nature that surrounds the town invites you to walk or run along its paths. Undoubtedly an excellent population to establish your residence.

description: Welcome to this spectacular penthouse in the heart of Barcelona with a private rooftop terrace. The neighborhood is one of Barcelona's most artistic quarters and is the home of several of the most important cultural sites in the city. It is known for its restaurants, bars, and small boutiques. This property has been renovated with a Scandinavian air and has a modern and spacious feeling which is highlighted by the light flowing in from the big windows in different orientations. As you enter the apartment, which is located on the last floor in a building from the year 1800, we are welcomed by a hallway with wooden floors and painted walls. The hallway leads us to the spacious living-room with an open kitchen in an elegant black color, and plenty of space for cooking dinner with fresh foods from the several food markets nearby. The living-room has space for a large dining table as well as a sofa group for you to watch TV in the evenings you feel like staying in. Here we also find the access to the spectacular roof-top terrace of 21 sqm, measured by the official registry, where you can enjoy lazy afternoons in the sunny climate together with friends and family. The views over the rooftops and the city brings a romantic atmosphere, and you can put up some lights for dinners on the terrace. It is like having a second living-room! By the entrance you will find the calm bedroom with a large window and a practical bathroom. Here you have space for a double bed, which makes the apartment ideal for one person or a couple. There is also a wardrobe with plenty of storage space. The apartment is in total 47 sqm according to the registry.  The neighborhood Raval is a bohemian quarter with plenty of restaurants, bars, and cultural sites, which offers the advantage of being within walking distance from most of the city's key points. You can walk to Plaza Cataluña, Passeig de Grácia and Las Ramblas in only a few minutes, and you have the ocean nearby within a 15 minutes’ walk. This neighborhood is also home to several museums such as MACBA (Museu d'Art Contemporani de Barcelona) and CCCB (El Centro de Cultura Contemporánea), as well as the opera Gran Teatre del Liceu and the cinema La Filmoteca, which shows classics and new independent movies. There are several grocery shops nearby, such as Carrefour, LIDL and Veritas, but you can also shop at the famous markets Mercat de Sant Antoni and La Boquería with their exquisite range of fruits, vegetables and cheeses. You have three metro stations nearby: Universitat, Sant Antoni and Liceu, as well as several bus lines. The price does not include furniture, taxes or notary and registry fees.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Raval, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Cardona

description: Fantastic house from the four winds located in the center of the town of Vallromanes, very close to all essential services and the prestigious Vallromanes Golf Club. On a large, totally flat plot of 796 m2 and which has a total of 370 m2 built distributed over two comfortable floors plus a large multipurpose area in the basement. On the first floor is the day area, it consists of a double bedroom with a full bathroom with shower and a large dressing room, an office-style kitchen with a separate laundry room, an open living-dining room with a beautiful wooden ceiling and a porch glass open to the garden. Going up to the second floor, here we find the night area, it consists of a master suite with a complete bathroom and dressing room and 2 more double rooms that share a complete bathroom with a shower. The basement is a large open-plan room with a large room and a complete bathroom that offers various possibilities in terms of its use. The outdoor area of the garden is spectacular, a very comfortable and completely flat area where we find a large saltwater pool, the built-in barbecue area with a summer porch, an area of vegetation and the pool rest area. This area has been recently renovated with high quality materials. The closed garage is for a large car, being able to park more cars privately at the entrance. Extras to highlight: Stoneware and parquet floors, wooden ceilings in the living room, underfloor heating and radiators, aluminum carpentry with double glazing, integrated alarm, security door, fitted wardrobes in all rooms. Its location is great, as it is very close to public transport, the Bressol de Vallromanes school, the school, all essential services and only 30 minutes from Barcelona. Enjoy Vallromanes! Vallromanes is an ideal place to lead a quiet life surrounded by nature, between the sea and the mountains, just 25 km from Barcelona, a charming town, well connected to the city and with all the services to have a fantastic quality of life. life. It has many well-preserved natural spaces of singular beauty, one of the best golf courses in Catalonia, horse riding clubs and a wide gastronomic offer.

description: Fantastic single-family house for sale in Premia de Dalt, 211 m2 built and distributed over 2 floors plus basement, located in La Floresta, a residential area near the center of town. The house has very good connections to Barcelona. Located on a 386 m2 plot, in a very quiet place 30 km from Barcelona, where you can walk in a healthy and unbeatable environment. On the main floor of the house, we find the very bright living-dining room with a fireplace. On the same floor there is a spacious, bright and practical kitchen with an office area, a double bedroom and a complete bathroom with a shower, very comfortable to be able to live on one floor. The second floor offers 2 double bedrooms and the master suite with a large multipurpose space that is currently used as an office and library but could be a large dressing room. All the rooms are exterior, very bright and two of them enjoy views of the sea. A full bathroom complements this floor. In the lower part of the house, there are two large spaces, one of them was the closed garage that turned it into an independent apartment, it has a bedroom area, a full bathroom, a small kitchen and a rest and games area. The other space has been converted into a gym room. Both areas are communicated and the apartment could be made even larger if desired. Finally, comment on the outdoor area, a part has been left for parking a vehicle uncovered, another part that has been used for a small orchard, a beautiful summer porch and the large area where the saline water pool is located. Extras: Integrated alarm, pool area and porch, aluminum enclosures, heating, solar panels.. . Enjoy Dalt Award. The town of Premia de Dalt is located in the Maresme region, an area with an exceptional microclimate all year round, warm winters and cool summers. Premià de Dalt has everything, services, commerce, schools, library, markets, nature, tranquility.. . It is a town flanked by pine and holm oak forests on one side and with the Mediterranean horizon on the other, it is part of the charming towns that make up the coastline of the BARCELONA COAST, just 30 minutes from the city center. In Premià de Dalt the sea is very present, although the municipality does not have its own beach, from many corners of the term there are beautiful views of the sea, in addition the very nature that surrounds the town invites you to walk or run along its paths. Undoubtedly an excellent population to establish your residence.

Facing southwest, this apartment has three bedrooms, one with a very large dressing room, 1 en-suite bathroom, one courtesy bathroom, two well-lit living rooms, a dining room, a comfortable laundry room, an equipped kitchen, a large hall and a stately gatehouse typical of a royal estate in the area. description: A luxury apartment completely renovated turning 3 rooms into a huge living room and a very spacious en-suite bedroom. The location is really privileged - the property is on the 13th floor of the residential complex "Illa del Mar" on the first line of the sea. The apartment has a huge 70m2 terrace surrounding the property and offering stunning views of the sea and beautiful Barcelona from every point! The day area has a living (dining) room and an open kitchen, made to measure, and equipped with high-end appliances: the fridge, the freezer and the wine rack by Liebherr. The induction hob and the oven - by Gaggenau. The night area includes a large double bedroom en-suite with a spacious bathroom offering a bathtub and shower and a large dressing room. An exclusive apartment with latest technologies for maximum comfort and quality of life, as well as luxury finishes and furniture of the highest quality. It has home automation system in each area controlling light, motorized blinds, sound system with integrated speakers, underfloor heating, air conditioning and overall heating. The apartment has a total area of 139m2 including 70m2 of the completely glazed terrace. The complex offers perfect communal areas with private swimming pool, garden, gym, paddle tennis courts, 24-hour security and concierge service. Illa del Mar is located in the Diagonal Mar neighborhood – the newest neighborhood in Barcelona, which is still in the process of formation and consolidation. Once an industrial area, it has now been transformed into an area full of luxury residential complexes, high-end hotels, office blocks, congress centers, a vast park, a huge shopping center and the city's newest beach. Upper-middle-class people live here. Diagonal Mar is well connected to the city center by public transport. People are fascinated by its wide streets, the attractions of Parc Diagonal Mar - a work that combines nature and architecture - and the proximity to the sea.

description: Exclusive Penthouse in Barcelona with sea views in the heart of the city- This exclusive home offers the owner and those who live with him a unique life experience. The house is located on the top floor of the tallest and most important skyscraper of the "Dreta de l'Eixample" located in the heart of the city, with its spectacular views of the sea with sunrise and sunset with the sun setting in the Tibidabo. Our house is differentiated into a day area with an independent kitchen with access to the water area, a drying room, a room equipped with a washing machine and a dryer. Large living room with fireplace. Toilet and hall. And night area, three double bedrooms with large windows, full wardrobe and custom desks. Full bathroom with shower and toilet. Aluminum enclosures, natural park floors, sliding doors, air conditioning and heating. Silestone kitchen fully equipped with all its high quality furniture, formica drawer doors, oven, integrated microwave, all top brand appliances. The balcony was integrated into the house, gaining a transition zone throughout the house, there is the possibility of recovering part or all of it. Building made by pillars there is a possibility of redistribution. There is no main wall. Country estate from 1973 with elevator, concierge service, parking and swimming pool in communal areas. Parking is not included.

description: Exclusive and elegant flat located in Pedralbes one of the most sought-after areas of Barcelona, known for its gardens and large green spaces, as well as its international schools and universities. This property, located on the 6th floor, stands out for its wide-open views facing the sea and its great luminosity.  The property has a built area of 252sqm, of which 204sqm is usable accommodation, and two terraces with a total of 32sqm. The property has only one flat per floor, which allows us to reach the entrance hall directly with the main lift, which has a security system with exclusive access to the flat.  Through the entrance hall, we access the spacious living-dining room with fireplace and direct access to a 22 sqm terrace with spectacular views of the city and the sea.  From the dining room, we reach the fully equipped kitchen-diner with its breakfast corner, a laundry room and a large service area with a bathroom and a room currently used as an ironing area. The kitchen is accessed directly through a service entrance with its own lift. The sleeping area has 4 double bedrooms, all very bright, one of them with access to a covered terrace of 12m2, and two complete bathrooms. The property has two parking spaces included in the price, and a storage room of about 10 m2. The building has a porter service and a large communal area with garden and swimming pool. This property, located close to Diagonal and the Sarria neighbourhood, offers a real opportunity to live in a prestigious area surrounded by greenery without being far from a wide range of shops, shopping centres and restaurants. Excellent communication with the city’s public transport network.      "WITHFOR is the first B Corp certified premium ethical real estate company. We meet the highest standards of social and environmental impact and base our work on trust, transparency and a commitment to improving society and our relationship with the environment".

description: ALBIUM introduces this impressive 125 m² home in the heart of the Gothic quarter. Just entering the house you can already appreciate the history of the space, with a large hall and a first view of the Roman wall built in the time of Augustus (3rd century) and which gave rise to Barcino. Through the distributor there is access to the spacious living room with kitchen with island access to the patio. The house has 4 bedrooms (one of them type suite) and 3 bathrooms. Two of these rooms with access to a balcony to the street, from where you can enjoy the busy commercial activity in the alleys of the Gothic quarter of Barcelona.   The house is equipped with parquet flooring, gas heating by radiators and wooden windows with double glazing. High ceilings and wooden beams complete a house that breathes history on all four sides. It is a royal estate built in 1850, with 2 apartments per floor, currently it does not have an elevator. The house is sold without the furniture that appears in the photographs.   From this central corner of the neighborhood, you can walk to Plaza del Pi, Plaza de Sant Felip Neri, the Cathedral, Plaza Sant Jaume or the Santa Caterina Market. The area has all kinds of shops (very close to Portaferrissa, Carrer del Pi and Portal de l'Angel) and restaurants where you can taste any type of cuisine. Communications from here are optimal by public transport:  Bus: 47, 120, N8, N28, V15, 59, N9, V13 and Bicing  Metro: Line 3 (Liceu) and Line 4 (Jaume I)    Call us for more information!    WE DO NOT CHARGE FEES TO THE BUYER.    The purchasing party must pay, in addition to the advertised price, 10% for property transfer tax (5% if you are 32 years old or younger, use the property as your habitual residence and meet certain income conditions) as well as the costs of notary and property registry.

description: UNIQUE PRODUCT IN AREA! With a terrace for private use, we present two exclusive properties in the area, located on the 4th floor of a renovated Modernist building with elevator in the heart of the Gòtic. One of the 82m² useful penthouses is distributed in a spacious living room with access to a balcony, a semi-open kitchen, fully furnished and equipped, located in front of the dining area. It has 2 exterior double bedrooms equipped with fitted wardrobes and has 1 French-style bathroom with shower. The next penthouse, the largest, has 101m² distributed in a spacious and bright outdoor living room with access to a balcony, which also has an office area. The kitchen is open and is located in the same space as the dining area, providing the comfort that this entails. The house has 3 exterior double bedrooms, one of them with a balcony and an en-suite bathroom with a shower. Both houses are completely renovated and have parquet floors, high ceilings with wooden beams, heating and air conditioning ducts, and climalit wooden windows that surround both houses and provide plenty of light to them. The total perimeter of the terrace is 170m², where you can enjoy all the possibilities offered by the space, perfect for playing sports, sunbathing, enjoying lunch and dinner outdoors. and many more options! Both properties have a private storage room at terrace level as well as another storage room each, in the lobby area of the property, ideal for storing objects and/or storing bicycles. The beautiful stately estate is hand-painted with floral motifs. The name of Còdols street in the Gothic Quarter of Barcelona originates from the time when it was a stream that ran down from Collserola towards the sea. The stones that were deposited baptized it as ''carrer dels Còdols''. Transport: Metro: (L3) Drassanes, (L4) Jaume 1 (8 minutes on foot), Barceloneta (10 minutes on foot) Bus: 120, N0, 59, D20, H14, V13 HIGH PROFITABILITY! Call us for more information! description: ALBIUM introduces this impressive 125 m² home in the heart of the Gothic quarter. Just entering the house you can already appreciate the history of the space, with a large hall and a first view of the Roman wall built in the time of Augustus (3rd century) and which gave rise to Barcino. Through the distributor there is access to the spacious living room with kitchen with island access to the patio. The house has 4 bedrooms (one of them type suite) and 3 bathrooms. Two of these rooms with access to a balcony to the street, from where you can enjoy the busy commercial activity in the alleys of the Gothic quarter of Barcelona.   The house is equipped with parquet flooring, gas heating by radiators and wooden windows with double glazing. High ceilings and wooden beams complete a house that breathes history on all four sides. It is a royal estate built in 1850, with 2 apartments per floor, currently it does not have an elevator. The house is sold without the furniture that appears in the photographs.   From this central corner of the neighborhood, you can walk to Plaza del Pi, Plaza de Sant Felip Neri, the Cathedral, Plaza Sant Jaume or the Santa Caterina Market. The area has all kinds of shops (very close to Portaferrissa, Carrer del Pi and Portal de l'Angel) and restaurants where you can taste any type of cuisine. Communications from here are optimal by public transport:  Bus: 47, 120, N8, N28, V15, 59, N9, V13 and Bicing  Metro: Line 3 (Liceu) and Line 4 (Jaume I)    Call us for more information!    WE DO NOT CHARGE FEES TO THE BUYER.    The purchasing party must pay, in addition to the advertised price, 10% for property transfer tax (5% if you are 32 years old or younger, use the property as your habitual residence and meet certain income conditions) as well as the costs of notary and property registry.

description: Albium presents exclusively this cozy and bright penthouse in the Gothic Quarter, in the heart of Ciutat Vella. Housing in spectacular Finca Regia, for sale IN OUR OWNERSHIP (the current owner will remain in the house, taking care of community fees, IBI and spills that may arise in the building during its usufruct). Ideal Investors. This small palace consists of 36 m² of useful housing, which are distributed in 1 double bedroom, bathroom, living room and kitchen. But wait, because it is complemented by a spacious terrace for private use of 53 m², where you can enjoy countless possible activities: delicious dinners with friends outdoors and with totally serene views, cultivate your own green space or urban vegetable garden, do some yoga at sunrise or just dance under the moonlight with the whole city as a witness. Can you imagine? The property also has 2 huge communal roof terraces. Located a few meters from the Ramblas, the Wax Museum and the Port, invites you to stroll through the passage of architectural and historical interest where it is located and enjoy the area, which includes all kinds of cultural events around or go to the beach doing a lie down. Very well connected by all kinds of public transport. description: On a flat plot of 1330 m2 is this charming house on one level! It is a house designed by a renowned architect, it is to be reformed to your liking but with many possibilities! Spacious rooms, all of them exterior and facing the porch, garden and pool. Surrounded by a natural environment and privacy that make you completely disconnect from the exterior of the plot. An exclusive area, the so-called golden mile, where you can make your home with all the comforts. LOCATION: Located in the Pineda de Castelldefels, a step away from the beach, and with easy access to the highway, which means that in 20 minutes you can be in Barcelona or in less than 10m. in the airport. Close to public transport and international schools. DISTRIBUTION: The useful area of the house is distributed on one floor, which makes it very practical and comfortable; It consists of a large living room with a fireplace, through which you directly access the porch that becomes a summer dining room; In the east wing are the three double bedrooms, each with a bathroom and dressing room and also with access to the large main porch of the house. At the back is the kitchen, with a pantry, a laundry area, a bedroom, a toilet and an additional bedroom. From the distributor corridor there are the stairs that take us to a beautiful attic, a space to be arranged as preferred and that has another bathroom. In the basement we find the garage for two cars with another bedroom. With the best south orientation, all the rooms overlook the pool and the large garden, where we find a barbecue area and a shed. An enviable outdoor area for its peace and privacy. It also offers the possibility of increasing the building up to 665m2, or it would allow the construction of a hotel or aparthotel. We love this piece for many reasons: its type of construction and distribution, unique in these times, its location, near the sea and well connected to Barcelona and the airport, its calm and privacy, and its various possibilities. Do not stay with the desire to see it in person?. With Inedith you will enjoy a guide from which you will leave with all the information you need, as well as its surroundings, services, leisure and other advantages that it offers you. We will wait for you! T. 667390959/ 722190434.

description: The Trias Team were welcomed at this special property by Greg, half English and half Spaniard, who has lived in Ibiza, London, Tuscany and travelled around the world where he met his wife Lee, a German from Düsseldorf who grew up in Goa (India) and in Pakistan. This couple’s adventurous history gives me goose bumps and they have decided to resume the wonderful world of renovating apartments with soul and exclusivity for today, in Barcelona. The international character of its creators combines with the elegance and strengths of the property and will not leave you indifferent with its high standard finishes and a few charmingly, daring elements.    I would highlight the thick oak wooden floors, the beautiful recovered beams in the over 3 meter high ceilings, the practical and well-functioning distribution and impeccable lighting. The spaciousness of any of its rooms extend the international feeling to the balcony, overlooking the emblematic and vibrant Ferran Street in the Gothic quarter of Barcelona. Call us to come and see this piece and if it is your choice, from Trias Barcelona we will be happy to accompany you in the buying process! Summary: Newly renovated. Large balcony. High ceilings. 2nd story without elevator. 2 bedrooms. + 1 on suite master room with bathroom. 1 cortesy  bathroom. Fully- equipped kitchen. high standing materials and finishing. Location: The Gothic Quarter, or Barri Gòtic, is a charming district with narrow medieval alleys lined with trendy bars, pubs and Fancy restaurants. Remains of the Roman city are on display at the Museu d'Història de Barcelona. Artisans sell leather goods and rhinestones in the Barcelona Cathedral durroundings, and flowers and food stalls crowd the busy Rambla. In the Plaza del Pi, named after the Gothic church attached to it, an art market is set up every weekend and there is also the Plaza Real as a spot where you will lose track of time grabbing something at any time.

description: PLAZA MARAGALL 10 Y INMO MARAGALL 10 PRESENTAN EN EXCLUSIVA. HOLA VECINOS. ESTÁIS PENSANDO EN LA POSIBILIDAD DE CAMBIAR DE VIVIENDA? AL VER ESTA VIVIENDA ÚNICA EN LA ZONA, TAN BIEN COMUNICADA, SOÑAIS CON DISFRUTAR DE VUESTRA FAMILIA EN ELLA? HACEMOS POSIBLES VUESTROS SUEÑOS.¡  Casa de 556 m2. construidos + 64 de jardín y terrazas, consta de 5 plantas con ascensor, parking,sala de juegos y bodega. Esta fantástica vivienda es muy luminosa gracias a su doble orientación. Situada en un barrio tranquilo y residencial de nuestra ciudad, cerca de Plaza Maragall, perfectamente comunicada y de fácil acceso. Al entrar en la vivienda nos encontramos con una amplia y majestuosa escalera, la cual da acceso en la primera planta a un apartamento de 80 m2, con entrada independiente y compuesto de 2 habitaciones, 1 baño, cocina y comedor, también se puede acceder directamente desde el parking con el ascensor. Siguiendo la escalera llegamos al segundo piso donde entramos a la vivienda principal. En la primera planta tiene un espectacular comedor salón de 70 m2. con chimenea, balcón, 1 patio inglés que da luz a todas las estancias, 1 aseo de cortesía y amplia cocina independiente con zona para comer y estar, desde la que accedemos al jardín con piscina privada. En la segunda planta está la zona de noche que está compuesta por 4 habitaciones dobles, una de ella en suite con jacuzzi y 1 baño Siguiendo la escalera accedemos a la tercera planta en la cual hay una estancia muy luminosa y abuhardillada que se puede utilizar como habitación de servicio o zona de trabajo. En esta misma planta hay una espectacular y soleada terraza de 70 m2. La planta baja tiene acceso directo al parking, mediante puerta automática, también se puede acceder por una puerta pequeña para peatones, tiene un tamaño de 175 m2. con cabida para 3 vehículos,y varias motos, también hay una sala polivalente en la cual en la actualidad hay una oficina, 1 baño completo, 1 trastero, 1 sala de juegos y zona de almacenaje. Desde esta misma planta tenemos el acceso a la bodega-cava de 65 m2., adecuada como tal, para la perfecta conservación de vinos y disfrutar de comidas, cenas con amigos o familiares, ya que dispone de vitrocerámica, nevera, barbacoa, horno de leña, mesa grande, sofá, TV, y renovación de aire automático. Toda la vivienda tiene instalada calefacción por radiadores, aire acondicionado, sistema de alarma, y ascensor con acceso en todas las plantas. Es una casa construida en el año 1998 por el mismo propietario y utilizó para ello materiales de alta gama, cerramientos de Technal, suelos de mármol en varias zonas, etc., Muy bien comunicada por BUS 117-191-19-47-D50-V25-N1-N4 y METRO L1-L5 Maragall, escuelas como, Escola Guinardó, Institut l'Alzina, Ebm Guinardó, Escola Pompeu Fabra, etc. Rodeado de parques y jardines, CAP Guinardó, Hospital de Sant Pau, DIR Maragall y junto al eje comercial de Paseo Maragall. Luminosa, espaciosa, espectacular, es una opción para una gran familia,  Características básicas Chalet adosado 5 plantas 620 m² construidos 6 habitaciones 4 baños Terraza Balcón Plaza de garaje incluida en el precio Segunda mano/buen estado Trastero Construido en 1998 Calefacción central Equipamiento Aire acondicionado Piscina Jardín Certificado energético Consumo: 107 kWh/m² año Emisiones: 21 kg CO2/m² año Ver etiqueta de calificación energética. precio del vado anual 590.

description: WHAT YOU SHOULD KNOW ABOUT THIS PROPERTY Bedrooms 2 – Bathrooms 2 Total Surface Area 87 m2 Furnished Video Available Upon Request SPECIAL FEATURES OF THIS APARTMENT A light-filled property in one of Barcelona's most atmospheric districts, this two bedroom, two bathroom offering boasts stunning sea views. Measuring a total of 87m2, this apartment has been recently renovated to extremely high specifications, offering you the chance to enjoy luxury living in the center of the city. With that said, the building is packed with character and unique flourishes, a reminder that you are in one of Barcelona's most historic areas, a short walk from the port. Fully equipped with everything you could need to make a comfortable life in the city, this apartment is ideal for a couple or family with its spacious double and twin bedrooms, each with its own independent bathroom. In the master bedroom, a small balcony looks out onto the bustling streets below, stretching off into the Mediterranean. EL BORN: LOCATION AND SURROUNDINGS OF THIS PROPERTY One of Barcelona's most desirable districts, El Born forms part of the city's oldest area. Teeming with hipster boutiques and restaurants, this neighborhood blends the charms of old Barcelona with the convenience of a short trip to both the bustling Eixample and the tranquility of the port and beach areas. El Born is surely one of the city’s prettiest neighborhoods – all narrow alleyways and medieval churches perched upon pretty, sunsoaked squares. Although close to the city's major tourist attractions, El Born offers a true taste of authentic Barcelona city living.

description: Noa Properties presents this exclusive High Standing Apartment in the Diagonal Mar neighborhood with views of the Sea and Barcelona, Spain. A spacious property, with quality materials and great taste. A great opportunity to invest and live all year in the cosmopolitan city of Barcelona. PROPERTY DETAILS Exclusive high standing home located on the sixteenth floor of the building in an excellent location in Diagonal Mar and with panoramic views of Barcelona. It is a modern apartment designed to enjoy all its bright rooms. At the entrance we find a distributor that takes us to our right to the spacious living room with access to our large terrace, the living room area is very bright due to its large window. Next to the large living room we find a very modern kitchen equipped with all high-quality appliances. In the distributor on the left we have access to a comfortable laundry room or water area. The night area is made up of three spacious rooms with fitted wardrobes and large windows providing them with a lot of clarity and light. The main room is a suite. The night area is complemented by a complete bathroom. The fantastic apartment is surrounded by a wonderful terrace with views of the majestic Barcelona and the Mediterranean Sea. The community area has an adult pool with salt water, a children's pool, a gym, a sauna, a paddle tennis court, ping pong, a community leisure room, a garden area. Concierge and surveillance 24 hours. A parking space with surveillance and storage room is included. Call us and we will organize a visit without any commitment on your part, you will not regret it LOCATION Barcelona, the cosmopolitan capital of the Catalonia region of Spain, is known for its art and architecture. The fantastic church of the Sagrada Familia and other modernist landmarks designed by Antoni Gaudí grace the city. The Picasso Museum and the Joan Miró Foundation show the modern art of the artists that give rise to their names. The Barcelona History Museum (MUHBA) includes several Roman archaeological sites.

description: Incredible.A luxury.Speechless. You've seen the photos, now pay attention. Yes yes, it is a house with a magnificent patio of 40m2.And in Poblenou! Two streets from La Rambla, in a very quiet area. "Just what I'm looking for."I thought the same thing when I entered the flat and visually connected with its outer space.A single environment, a superlative in-out connection.Something special and different. I quickly observed a mixture of industrial style, with very modern touches but which at the same time kept the soul of a 1935 apartment. The first thing I did, go to the terrace.Wow! Plants, tree, small table... summer lunches and dinners... endless ideas. I went in and walked through those 100m2; I felt that they were more.Its distribution, making the most of the surface, made it seem even bigger.Surely the visual sensation of spaciousness provided by the high ceilings of more than 4 meters helped.Or those beams and typical brick of the time.Or perhaps it was the shades of the materials used in the reform.Or all together, but I thought it was bigger. Living room-dining room-kitchen.All this integrated.And a nexus: that island that I like so much with so many possibilities as part of a fully equipped kitchen (and that you don't discover until you open modules and doors). An exterior room, two exterior rooms… three exterior rooms.Two of them double, one single.The suite, with its own bathroom.Of course, another additional one also complete (children, guests….Hmmmm) Aerothermal system, underfloor heating, insulation, well-studied lighting….Everything in “maximum efficiency” mode. Marble finishes, premium taps, polished cement floors... what details. With habitability certificate (housing).One of the most special and typical pieces of Poblenou. You have to see it.You must see it.

description: WHAT YOU SHOULD KNOW ABOUT THIS PROPERTY Bedroom 2 – Bathrooms 2 Total Surface Area 130 m2 Communal area, swimming pool, balconies, gym SPECIAL FEATURES OF THIS APARTMENT Slick, modern and yet extremely liveable, Portal has all the makings of a central Barcelona hideaway. With large, light rooms throughout and a deep focus on comfort, this spot enjoys prime position in a modernista building that is distinctly Catalan in its character. The south-facing balcony at Portal means catching some rays from the famous Barcelona sunshine is possible even from the comfort of your own homes, while natural light fills the airy rooms for much of the day. The apartment is also blessed with high-end finishing and appliances throughout, for that every moment becomes imbued with a sense of luxury and mindfulness. Boasting three heating and air conditioning units, both summer and winter temperatures can be controlled to make for super-comfortable living. Add to this access to a rooftop pool terrace and a luxury gym and it's clear that this is far from your average city apartment. The addition of a private balcony and a concierge service only add to the exclusive, choice ambience that prevails throughout what is a superlative property. EIXAMPLE DISTRICT: LOCATION AND SURROUNDINGS OF THIS PROPERTY This property is situated in an unbeatable setting in the heart of Barcelona's desirable Eixample district, which is rich in culture and history. Living in this apartment means you're just walking distance from some of the city's most popular bars and Michelin-starred restaurants! Take a stroll through Barcelona's Old Town, or enjoy the enchantment of the nearby Born neighborhood. Other close landmarks include Passeig de Gracias, Las Ramblas, La Palau de la Música, La Boqueria Market, the Passeig de Sant Joan, and the Parc de la Ciutadella, among others. Make the most of Barcelona's stunning beaches and the newly renovated OneOcean Port Vell, only a walk away. At Sebur, you are at the center of it all and you'll never have to go far to access the city's best cafes, decor shops, art galleries, boutiques, and so much more!

With bare bricks and traditional Spanish tiling contrasting with contemporary surface materials, light fixtures, works of art and more, Ruby is truly one of a kind. A tranquil, ambient escape at the heart of luxury Barcelona, Ruby is an exceptionally well-designed apartment whose enormous outdoor space is ideal for both relaxation and entertaining. Deeply tasteful and with an identity all of its own, this opulent yet modern apartment makes a lasting impression. This property is situated in an unbeatable setting in the heart of Barcelona’s desirable Eixample district, which is rich in culture and history. description: We present this magnificent newly built semi-detached house in the heart of Sant Just Desvern, with excellent top quality finishes. Unbeatable location, very close to the shopping area, the municipal market, the Town Hall and the Church. Modern construction and with maximum energy efficiency A, to offer maximum comfort and performance with less consumption, large spaces flooded with light and sun and with a distribution on 4 levels to provide maximum comfort are some of the strong points of the edification. Direct access from the street through the garage with capacity for one car. This same floor has been used for the day area, with a spacious 35m living-dining room and a modern open-plan island kitchen. We have a view and direct access to a wonderful 25m garden, sunny and quiet where you can enjoy lunch and dinner with friends and family, ideal for outdoor celebrations and enjoying the good weather. On this same floor we have a full bathroom with a shower and a laundry room. To highlight the sun and the light that floods the entire house. On the first floor that we access through the stairs, we find a second 25m multipurpose space with access to a 7m balcony. It can be used according to your needs; office for teleworking / second living room / game room for the little ones or even use it as another large bedroom. On the second floor, the night area has been set aside, consisting of two individual bedrooms facing the street. In the distributor a large dressing room has been made and we have another bathroom with a shower tray. On the third floor, the master bedroom with en-suite and dressing area has been allocated. large window with lots of natural light. On the upper floor there is another multipurpose space that can be used as a study and with access to a magnificent solarium terrace. This property has been built with excellent finishes, top quality, white lacquered hardwood interior carpentry, exterior carpentry with double glazing and insulation with thermal bridge, electric shutters, radiator and floor heating, splits a. to mitsubishi, kitchen equipped with high-end appliances. description: Beautiful house cataloged at three winds from the year 1923 of noucentista inspiration called Casa Petit. WATCH OUR VIDEO WITH A REFORM PROPOSAL IN THE MULTIMEDIA PRESENTATION TAB It consists of a parking area on the ground floor, ground floor and first floor crowned with a viewpoint flanked by square pilasters and columns with Ionic capital. The roof is tile supported by wooden corbels. It crowns the upper part of Dolors Modolell street, considered an icon of the town, together with the semi-detached house of the same architectural style. Due to its characteristics it was cataloged in 1987 as architectural heritage of Catalonia It is distributed in hall, courtesy bathroom, living room with fireplace, kitchen with access to terrace and garden. On the first floor there are four bedrooms and two full bathrooms. On the upper floor is the viewpoint flanked by pilasters and in the back there is a small room with a laundry room. From the terrace we access the back of the garden, the plot being about 370 m2. From the terrace we access the lower floor where we find a garage for one car and a storage room. The house has three orientations so it has a lot of light. Another peculiarity is that it has very high ceilings and exposed beams that can be restored and form a unique home. The house requires a major update in terms of facilities and finishes. Housing situation: Housing located in the town of Sant Just Desvern, on Esglèsia street. The area where the house is located is one of the most sought after in the population. Communication with public transport is very good since it is close to the main bus lines to Barcelona and neighboring towns. It is located in a residential environment with first homes and shops, as well as all the services and shops of Sant Just Desvern, a few meters from the Town Hall and Can Ginestar, supermarkets, bakeries, pharmacies, primary care center, municipal nursery and numerous parks. like the Millernari or Can Freixes. Ideal for those families who wish to go to both national and international schools such as the American School, the German School, the Highlands School and the La Miranda Institution, since they are located just a few minutes away. [IW].

description: I am very fans of this property because my son's godmother lived there during his childhood and adolescence together with her large family until she moved to another district but I really do keep very good memories of hours and hours playing dolls and later, putting make up and trying clothes. Under professional criteria, it is the most practical and functional area of Pedralbes because you don't have to take the car for the daily "must do" tasks of the house. You have everything nearby including the Corte Ingles and a 24 hours supermarket in Capitan Arenas. The building is from 67´ and is correct and also has Maria Teresa, the concierge. It also has an elevator. The spot here is the apartment itself and its finishes. The windows all the way down with views to the treetops is so inspiring and the brightness and the combination of materials of the refurbishment, have stolen my heart. It is a space that accepts a fairly wide range of decoration without going to the extreme of classic but the basis is sober and elegant giving large range of decoration options from the most minimalist decoration to the most daring decoration. It also has 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms all very spacious being the profile of property with more output in Barcelona and then, the living room is huge since they have joined the beautiful kitchen that is only separated by a beautiful island very "in" that will make the cooker of the family to feel accompanied. Please call us to check it out! Summary: Concierge. high floor. bright. brand new. good reform finishes. aluminum carpentry. energy efficient. Location: The leafy neighborhood of Pedralbes is the quintessential residential area of Barcelona. It is famous for its elegant villas and the Pabellones Güell, Antoni Gaudí's ornate gates at the entrance to the Pedralbes Gardens. The Pedralbes Monastery is a Gothic complex with fragrant gardens surrounded by cobblestone streets. In the vicinity of Les Corts is the Camp Nou, the emblematic stadium of FC Barcelona.

description: Impressive and sunny villa, built on a large plot of more than 2,000 m2. Its comfortable distribution on one floor, the splendid and well-kept garden and the wonderful pool of crystal clear water, with a built-in fountain, stand out. The interior of the house is divided into two areas: day and night. In the day area, which is accessed from a hall with views of the pool, we find a very large and open-plan living room on two levels, with large glass doors that lead to the porch and the garden. The living room has a fireplace and access to a large loft space, ideal for conditioning as a study or gym. Next to the living room we find a large fully equipped kitchen, with an office area and access to the terrace. The night area consists of four double and exterior bedrooms, one of which has an en-suite bathroom and a dressing room; two additional full bathrooms, a study room, a laundry room and separate staff quarters consisting of a bedroom and a bathroom with a shower. The floor is completed by a very large garage with capacity for 4 cars, which is easily accessed from the street. On a lower level there is a large space built with natural stone, consisting of a well-cared cellar, a winter dining room, ideal for organizing meetings with friends and family, a games room and a large pantry equipped with an industrial refrigerator. The exterior of the house is a wonderful totally private green nature space, on two levels. At the level of the house there is a large porch facing the pool and a large covered barbecue area, with space to eat and a bathroom with shower. The lower level is a large flat garden, with fruit trees, an orchard area and a wide variety of flowers. The house is built with the highest quality materials: treated wood, natural stone, Arabic tiles, aluminum carpentry, safety glass and thermal insulation throughout the house. It is located in one of the best urbanizations in Corbera de Llobregat, and surrounded by nature. It is very close to the city center and several schools -among them the Anne Sullivan International School- as well as sports clubs, shops and medical centers. Do not miss the opportunity to visit this fantastic property, unique in the area for its privacy and its large area of land.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Corbera de Llobregat
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: We offer this spectacular BRAND NEW apartment!. In Mallorca street with Viladomat. Reform in which quality raw materials and design were used. Ready to furnish and live in the heart of Eixample. Completely renovated house, 3 double bedrooms (2 of them with en-suite bathrooms), fully equipped independent kitchen with high-quality Bosch brand appliances, fridge and dishwasher built into the furniture with white lacquered doors, spacious and bright living-dining room, all the Rooms have aluminum carpentry with climalit windows. It also has a third bathroom, all of them have design details such as marble cladding, mirrors with led light technology and furniture chosen with great taste. The apartment has heating and air conditioning through ducts, parquet throughout the house and an armored entrance door, all the doors of the house are lacquered white. The property has a lift. For more information contact 611 56 98 28.

description: This fantastic apartment is a dream come true for those who value high standards, comfort, complete privacy and exclusivity. (Whatsapp +34597685734) Located on Paseo García Faria, in one of the most prestigious urbanizations in the area, this wonderful and exclusive apartment offers a large terrace and impressive sea views from the first line. The spectacular common areas include a swimming pool, gym, paddle tennis court, sauna and much more. The 70m2 terrace wraps around the perimeter of the façade, giving the apartment a magnificent and useful area and making it very bright. All three bedrooms, the living room and the kitchen have access to the terrace, and there are two good size bathrooms, one of which is en-suite to the master bedroom. Thanks to its orientation, the apartment enjoys direct light most of the day and enjoys incredible open views over the sea and Barcelona. This unique and exclusive residential complex also offers 24-hour security, concierge service and a large communal area with an outdoor pool, gym, sauna, paddle tennis court, children's area and garden. The building is perfect for people who love and value exclusivity and total privacy, and who want to enjoy the proximity to the beach without giving up the comforts of an incredible city like Barcelona. This fantastic apartment meets all the requirements of a dream apartment on the seafront in the city of Barcelona. The location of the apartment is excellent, with proximity to the sea and easy access to the Ronda Litoral and public transport networks, including metro, buses and trams. In addition, the apartment is conveniently located near one of the largest shopping centers in the city, Diagonal Mar, making it an ideal place to live. The apartment is sold as is, with furniture and all appliances, including oven, microwave, dishwasher, washing machine, refrigerator and much more. Please let us know if you would like to visit us and we will be more than happy to accommodate and assist you at every step. You can call us on our landline, send a message through idealista or send a WhatsApp to.

description: AGNOOR – CRISHE consultores presents a renovated duplex penthouse in the heart of the city of Mollet. With Elevator. Community of few neighbors. The house is made up of two floors with a total of 230 m2 built plus 90 m2 of private terraces (one of 80 m2 and another of 10 m2, with fantastic views. This penthouse stands out for its privacy, since family life takes place on the main floor, while the bedrooms and private area take place on the lower floor. On the main floor we have a hall space, a large living room, dining room and kitchen with utility room, all connected to a large south-facing terrace, providing natural light throughout the year and spectacular views of the city. It also has, on the same floor, a complete bathroom with shower and a room with great light. Going down the stairs in the hall, we reach the ground floor where it communicates with 4 large rooms, two of them with a shower included (suite). Radial heating, and radiators, air conditioning throughout the house. Heating with Radiators in the ground floor. It is an attic for families who want to be independent within the city, it has an elevator. Get informed.

description: Welcome to your dream apartment on Avenida d'Eduard Maristany. (Whatsapp +34597685734) This impressive space comes fully furnished with high-quality pieces that exude luxury and comfort. Upon entering, you'll be greeted by three bright and spacious bedrooms, perfect for relaxing after a long day. Two modern bathrooms with bathtubs ensure that you have everything you need to unwind and recharge. But what really stands out here is the spacious terrace, which offers stunning views of the ocean and the surrounding area. You can enjoy these views from every room in the apartment, making it a unique space of its kind. The apartment is located in a brand new building, with an infinity pool and amazing common areas. Whether you're looking to entertain friends or just kick back in style, this space has it all. And the best part? The neighborhood is quiet and well connected, offering the perfect balance between tranquility and convenience. Thank you for considering this amazing apartment for your next home. Contact us now via WhatsApp at to schedule a visit.
