description: In the Sants district, this 77 m2 apartment with a 55m2 private terrace is perfect for those who dream of the perfect private terrace.  Completely renovated by a developer 2 years ago, the building has been refurbished while keeping the old charm. The developer has been able to highlight all the typical charm of the buildings   of Barcelona: ceramic floors, exposed brick walls and the famous Catalan ceiling. The white tones of the walls and ceiling gives the apartment a special feeling combining modernity and authenticity. The main living space with its open plan design faces directly south.  A long corridor leads to the three bedrooms, including a very bright suite opening onto a wide view of the Tibidado which overlooks Barcelona. The two main bedrooms have parquet floors. In addition to the bathroom of the suite, the apartment has a second bathroom.  The third smaller bedroom has been made inside the main living space area and can therefore, as needed, be opened to enlarge it. Just above the apartment, walking up by a beautiful staircase, you reach the highlight of this apartment: a private terrace of 55 m2 with panoramic views of Barcelona.  On the north side, the Serra de Collserola mountain range with its highest point at 512 meters, Mount Tibidabo. South side, a vast view of the hill of Montjuic culminating at 185 meters. The Sants district is full of very peaceful squares, starting with the one at the end of the street, the charming Plaza de Iberia and not far from there, the largest Plaza de Osca. For lovers of good food and organic food, the covered market of Sants is a must. This jewel of modernist architecture, built in 1913, offers more than fifty stalls selling fresh produce, many of which are organic. In the street, a supermarket is open 7 days a week and on weekends the main artery of Carrer de Sants is closed to traffic. The metro is a stone's throw away (red and blue line), the airport 20 minutes and Castelldefels 35 minutes by train.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sants, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle de Cros

description: Welcome to this wonderful apartment located on Avenida Eduard Maristany, in one of the most exclusive and desired areas of the city. (Whatsapp +34597685734) With stunning sea views and a large terrace, this apartment is perfect for those looking for the perfect combination of Mediterranean lifestyle and modern luxury. Upon entering the apartment, you will be greeted with a spacious, light-filled living room that opens directly onto the large terrace, creating a stunning indoor-outdoor living space. The kitchen is sleek and modern, equipped with all the appliances you need to cook delicious meals, including an oven, microwave, dishwasher, washing machine, and refrigerator. The apartment has four bedrooms and two bathrooms, one of which is en-suite. Built-in wardrobes in each room offer ample storage space for clothes and other personal items. In addition, the apartment has heating to keep you comfortable all year long. This luxury building has an elevator for greater comfort, an outdoor pool to enjoy a refreshing swim on summer days, a storage room to store additional items, a garage to park your vehicle safely and a gym room to keep yourself fit without having to leave home. The location of this apartment is simply stunning, with panoramic sea views that will take your breath away. Avenida Eduard Maristany is one of the most exclusive areas of the city, with luxury shops, elegant restaurants and a large number of cultural and leisure activities. Additionally, the apartment is close to a wide variety of public transportation options, making it easy to get around the city. In short, this luxury apartment is the perfect place for those looking for a unique combination of Mediterranean lifestyle and modern luxury. With stunning views of the sea, a spacious terrace, swimming pool, gym and much more, this apartment has everything you need to enjoy a life full of comfort and luxury in Barcelona. Please let us know if you would like to visit us and we will be more than happy to accommodate and assist you at every step. description: CASAGIRONA. COM Penthouse in Baix Guinardó in front of the Parc de les Aigües and on the corner of Pi i Margall street. Family area with local shops and all services in its immediate surroundings. A total area of 190m² that includes 1 balcony and 2 terraces in opposite orientations and 2 facades on the street. Excellent distribution with a clear day area and night area made up of spacious rooms with 2 access doors to the house; one of them with direct elevator to the interior. The day area offers a large living room with a semi-open kitchen (insulated by sliding doors) of design and office type with discreet paneled space for electrical appliances and water area. In the night area, 3 bright double bedrooms; 1 of them suite type with bathroom and dressing room, a second bathroom and 1 courtesy toilet. Through a large glass door that allows its complete opening, the main living room can be integrated into a cozy 10m² terrace facing SW on the street. Balcony and terrace facing North East. At the comfort level, enjoy a heating system by radiators, heated towel rails, air conditioning, natural wood parquet, lacquered wood interior carpentry, aluminum exterior carpentry with high thermal and acoustic insulation glass, security door. A home that will surprise you with its spacious and comfortable spaces a few meters from the Sardenya Sports Center, the Mercado de la Estrella and the Parque de las Aguas. [IW].

description: We present a magnificent unique property of modern design with extraordinary high-end quality finishes in Alella. It is located in an unbeatable "super TOP" environment surrounded by luxury houses, in one of the best places on the coast closest to Barcelona city. It has a plot of more than 1000m2 with a careful mature garden where we find a large saline water pool with a relaxation and enjoyment area. This property has incredible and unobstructed views of the sea, with a privileged location very close to the sea and with the center of Barcelona just 15 minutes away, which makes it an ideal property as a first residence. It is a very practical and comfortable house since it only has 2 very well differentiated floors. On the main floor we have the day area with very pleasant and spacious spaces, the dining room, the latest design kitchen, a very elegant entrance hall with double height ceilings and the service area. It also has a gym with a sauna, fully integrated with the exterior through large glass doors. On this level we also find a spacious garage with two independent doors and room for 4 cars. It has a power outlet for electric vehicles. On the upper floor there is a large hall that leads to an incredible master suite with a fireplace and a private terrace, as well as a dressing room and a bathroom with a shower and bathtub from where you can enjoy a relaxing bath with sea views. It also has another 2 large bedroom suites with bathroom, fitted wardrobes and large windows. Undoubtedly a great property to enjoy with an exceptional location with convenient and fast access by motorway and Nacional II with easy access to all services and close to the best Intentional schools in the area and in the city of Barcelona.

description: Magnificent house with incomparable views, a few minutes from the center of Sarria, with good connections, Barri bus stop in front of the house. It has been the subject of a thorough but complete reform with a perfect fusion between the rationality of the spaces and the typical characteristics of Art Nouveau architecture. It has an elevator for four people that connects with all the floors of the house. At the entrance we have a distributor that leads us to the stairs (or the elevator) to the first floor, where the service area with its bedroom and bathroom is located, as well as a door that opens directly to the garage. On the upper floor, we find the main floor of the house, where we have a large dining room, its space and height stand out, as well as the staircase that presides over the room. The office kitchen is fully equipped, pantry room and with access to the garden and water area. A suite with dressing room and terrace. From the dining room there is access to the magnificent garden and pool surrounded by one of the best views of the city. The upper floor consists of two en-suite bedrooms with a dressing room and terrace and a multipurpose room, study-living room type.

suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: This XV century mansion, residence to the most aristocratic families in town along the years, irradiates history in all its senses. Delicately and tastefully refurbished in the year 2000, the building offers a central quiet courtyard for private access. This magnificent penthouse invites you to a bright and spacious living area with an open kitchen and huge windows towards the courtyard. One of the bedrooms has its own bathroom, the 2 others share another one.  From the 23m2 terrace one can enjoy views of rooftops and historical surrounding and buildings.  All materials used, of best qualities, are exquisitely chosen and displayed. There is underfloor heating and air conditioning.  The building offers porter service, a common storage room and parking space for both motorbikes and bicycles. This jewel is located at walking distance to the beach, surrounded by history, the famous Ramblas and its ‘Boqueria’ market, Plaza Real and a large etc, apart from commerce and restaurants. Contact us for a viewing!
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Gòtic, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle dels Lledó no number

description: The current Tres Torres neighborhood, a neighborhood that is the result of the union of three small territories: the outskirts of old Sarrià, the Nena Cases estate and the Can Ràbia suburb The three sectors began to urbanize between the late nineteenth and early twentieth centuries. Among the large houses that were populating it, the Three imposing Towers that would end up baptizing the new residential area stood out above all. We present one of them. Therefore it is a listed house. It has an exquisite reform, preserving original details and structures, such as the Catalan volta, a traditional construction technique of the time. The property has about 265m2 built, currently it consists of two rooms en suite, (previously three). Two entrances, main and service. The house has three floors, which are distributed as follows: First floor: Hall below we find a spacious living room with large windows, which allow natural light to enter all rooms, a courtesy toilet and access to the kitchen. From the kitchen we go out to the patio and / or garage and to the second service and water area. Second floor; Two suites with dressing rooms, both with balconies facing the street. And a multipurpose room, currently a cinema room - study, with the possibility of becoming one or two bedrooms. Third floor: a large roof terrace with magnificent views. It should be noted its perfect location, a stone's throw from the Turo Parc surrounded by shops, international schools and access to the Ronda del Mig.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Les Tres Torres, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Terraced house

description: Located in the prestigious residential area of Mas Ram, in Badalona (Barcelona), we are surprised by this imposing property of 563 m2 built on a flat plot of 2,135 m2. Its immense outdoor area enjoys incomparable unobstructed views and is presented with a dream pool surrounded by a pristine garden. Upon entering, on the main floor, we are greeted by a spacious and bright living room with a fireplace from which we can access the garden and a fantastic terrace where we can enjoy the summer dining room and the chill out area with barbecue. Following the living room, we find the large kitchen-office with access to an elegant separate dining room. On the same level, the night area is located, consisting of a spectacular master suite (with bathroom and dressing room) and two double rooms with a shared bathroom. Going up, on the first floor, we are surprised by an impressive attic where we can enjoy a multipurpose room with a fireplace and access to a large terrace. All this, together with two double bedrooms and a complete bathroom. In addition, as icing on the cake, we discover a garage with capacity for two vehicles, another living room and a relaxing spa area with a sauna, Jacuzzi and a full bathroom in the basement. Peace and exclusivity just 15 minutes from downtown Barcelona.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Mas Ram, Badalona
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: TWO BEDROOM AND TWO BATHROOM APARTMENT WITH 2 BALCONIES IN GOTHIC QUARTER OF BARCELONA Being located in the iconic Gothic quarter of Barcelona just 5 minutes walking from Cataluña square there is a two bedroom apartment with 2 bathrooms and balconies. This flat for sale in Barcelona centre has 88m2 distributed between a spacios living room with balcony that has nice views to a park and quite Barcelona street. From here a new owner of this apartment gets to a doble bedroom with builtin wardrobe and the access to the cute balcony with park and city views. Passing through the living room of this apartment for sale in Barcelona you get a dining area which shares the space between of dining room and fully equipped kitchen.  A corridor from this part of apartment in Barcelona centre leads to the entrance hall area with builtin wardrobes two bathrooms one of which is a lavatory and the second one is a big bathroom with jacuzzi bath, shower and all necessary sanitary ware.  The master bedroom is a spacious and full of light room with built in wardrobes and lounge area.  This two bedrooms apartment in Barcelona is located in a classical Regia style building and has high ceilings that gives a lot of space to the whole apartment.  The area of this apartment for sale has a lot of advantages:  Barcelona centre location. Historic centre with lots of city sights of Gothic Quarter. Just 5 minutes walking from Plaza Catalunya and 1 minute to La Rambla - one of the most iconic street of BCN.  A quite street with a park and tranquil green area.  Public transport connection all over Barcelona and its suburbs by bus and metro. Bars, restaurants and shops.  The building and the apartment is equipped with:  Adopted for wheelchair  Elevator Air conditioning and heating system  Fully equipped kitchen with all appliances. 2 balconies External rooms. Thanks to its location the purchase of this 2 bedroom apartment in Barcelona can be considered as an investment for short and medium rent term.  Please contact us in  watsapp +34679 454697 to arrange the viewing of this two bedroom and teo bathroom apartment for sale in Gothic Quarter of Barcelona.

Restored in a modern and polished way, this building has a collection of apartments all with balconies with one or two rooms, an impressive ground floor facing south with a dream terrace and two penthouses with spectacular terraces. description: Sant Andreu de la Barca: Unique opportunity in the best area of Sant Andreu de la Barca! We present this beautiful 249 m2 house located in La Colonia. It is a house converted into two independent houses ideal for two families. We enter through the main door, where we find a large, well-kept garden. On the first floor, we find the first house. Just entering, we find a large hall, on the right, the first room, the double room with bathroom en suite. It has a double window and is very bright. We continue down the corridor and find a bathroom with a shower, another room used as a laundry room and another double room. In front, the large kitchen so cozy that it makes you want to cook a thousand recipes in it. Last but not least, the dining room. bright, spacious and very functional. From the dining room there is access to the garden, it can also be accessed from the kitchen. We go up to the second floor, we go to the second house. We find a beautiful hall that contains four doors that lead to four different rooms. A large room as a laundry room, a double room to be able to put an office and a bathroom. The fourth door leads to the immense living room with exposed stairs that will take us to the top floor. In the dining room we have an access door to the beautiful kitchen where you can do your day to day with your family. Both from the kitchen and from the dining room you can access a terrace where you can have great meals in summer with friends or family. We go to the third floor of the same house, we find a room that separates three more rooms, two doubles and one single. We also find a large bathroom. We do not forget the basement since it is one of the rooms that you will like the most. It is perfect for celebrating events since you have everything you need. Kitchen, dining room and bathroom. The parking is for three places and also has a storage room. The house is four winds and has a barbecue. Isn't it perfect? It is a spectacular house to move into and for two different family units. description: Do you want your own cinema or music room at home? On the second floor are the bedrooms with fitted closets, the main one is the suite with two dressing rooms, one of them in the room corresponding to the bathroom of the suite. The property, located in one of the mountain urbanizations of Alella, Mas Coll, is a house made to measure for its owners. In addition to a terraced garden with excellent possibilities for growing a vegetable garden. description: Great flat with terrace in Gothic to renovate Magnificent apartment to reform in a farm dating from the s. VIII in one of the best streets of the Gothic Quarter. Located on a second real floor without elevator, but in the process of being approved for its installation, this 162m2 built apartment is a piece with great potential due to its original elements that could be rescued, such as stone walls or very high ceilings with wooden beams. and five meters high. It currently has 4 rooms. At the back and facing south there is a balcony that connects with a terrace of approximately 20m2. and in a quiet block patio. It is a unique piece in the Gothic. The property is located in one of the most prestigious streets of the Gothic Quarter. The street has its origin in the Roman Barcino and during the Middle Ages it was one of the three most sought-after streets in Barcelona. The street has a great commercial activity thanks to its art and design shops, the renowned restaurants located on it, as well as the famous Hotel Mercer and the Palacio Pallejá, of medieval origin. In the Gothic Quarter of Barcelona there are still remains of Roman history from more than 2000 years ago. Including parts of the ancient Roman wall dating back to the 4th century and underground Roman ruins. Located in the heart of the historic center, in this neighborhood we find prestigious buildings, cultural monuments such as the Barcelona Cathedral, a magnificent example of Catalan Gothic architecture. The Gothic Quarter is very well connected to the city's public transport network and you can easily walk through the charming little streets to reach the new luxury marina, restaurants and tapas bars. Five minutes away we find the picturesque Born district. The main avenues of Barcelona, such as Rambla de Catalunya and Passeig de Gràcia are no more than a 20-minute pleasant walk away.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Gòtic, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Penthouse in traditional building in Eixample This luxury penthouse has been completely renovated, located in the heart of Eixample Dret, it has an area of 172 sqm and 3 terraces totaling 67 sqm It is located in a beautiful modernist building on Gran Vía de les Corts Catalanes with Rambla Catalunya. The entrance hall has a 6 meter high ceiling, beautiful wall paintings, 2 elevators and a concierge. The apartment has 2 entrance doors (one for service). It is completely renovated with high quality materials and ready to move into. A large corridor gives access to 3 double bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms (1 of them en suite), the main room also has a private terrace of 11m², a fully equipped kitchen with a water area and views of the terrace. It consists of a spectacular living room with several rooms and original Catalan volta ceilings, a glass fireplace with views of the spectacular terrace. In front of the main access we find an office that can be separated from the corridor with a large sliding wooden door. On the 51 m² terrace with light all day and direct access from the living room, we also find a storage room and a full courtesy bathroom with shower, as well as wonderful views of Tibidabo. On the terrace of the suite we have urban views of the city On the upper floor there is an independent room of 11 m², with a complete bathroom en suite and a 5 m² terrace with views of the entire city, with the possibility of being used as a guest room or for service personnel. All facilities are new and of the highest quality. This property is located in the heart of Eixample Dret and the Quadrat d'Or, a few meters from Plaça Catalunya, the nerve center of the city, and Passeig de Gràcia. Another advantage of this apartment is its unbeatable location with respect to public transport: Plaça Catalunya buses, metro lines L1, L2, L3 and L4, the Generalitat railways, Renfe trains, are just a few meters from this property. Its privileged location is completed by a wide cultural offer. Nearby we find the Museum of Contemporary Art of Barcelona (MACBA), the CCCB cultural center, the Palau de la Música and monuments such as Casa Batlló and the Barcelona Cathedral among others. We also highlight the wide range of gyms, restaurants and bars, cinemas, El Triangle shopping center and El Corte Inglés that are just a few meters from the property.

description: Magnificant attic with a 32m2 terrace Engel & Voelkers introduces this exclusive apartment located in the upper area of Sants near Josep Taradellas and Les Corts. It is a perfectly maintained building with a porter where our apartment is the top floor with breathtaking views of the skyline of Barcelona. The apartment is divided into two very well delimited areas where on the right you will find the night area and on the left the day area. When you enter the apartment you will find on your right a large living room and a small space to set up your office. Opposite you have large windows that can be folded and thus access a spectacular terrace of 32m2 facing south where the sun shines all day and with views of the city and a tranquility that does not give the feeling of being in the center of Barcelona. In the living room to your left you will find an open kitchen with all Bosch high-end appliances and a Kyron island countertop. Past the kitchen you will enter the hallway door that leads you to the night area, where on your left you will find a high end full bathroom, and then the master bedroom with the designer en-suite bathroom. The master bedroom has access to a small balcony of 2m2 with views of the Tibidabo mountain. At the end of the hallway we have the last large room divided with a sliding door into two multipurpose spaces, where it can be used for a dressing room, studio etc. The neighborhood is a residential area in the Sants area, very close to Les Corts and Diagonal, where you will find the L'iila shopping center that has a wide range of stores and restaurants. It is a quiet, family area, just a few minutes walk from Sants station, which is the most important station in the city with connections to the whole country. The airport is only 15-20 minutes away by car. There are several gyms like the Viva gym and some more prestigious ones like the Metropolitan. The neighborhood is very well-connected by public transport with the metro stop of Plaza Centro and Sants and several bus stops that take you in all directions of the city.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sants, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle de Berlín

description: Location, views, corner flat plot Opportunity to acquire a home in the best area of Ciudad Diagonal, Esplugues de Llobregat, next to international schools, transport and shops. It has private security 24 hours. The house is to be completely reformed, being able to preserve the volumetry, or increase it considerably. It currently has a good garden that surrounds the house, and two garage entrances for each of the streets that it faces. On the ground floor, living room with very high ceilings and access to the porch, kitchen, laundry room, courtesy toilet and bedroom on the ground floor. On the first floor, a master suite with a full bathroom and two bedrooms that share another bathroom. On this floor there is a very large terrace with views, which could be incorporated as more housing. On the second floor, a large multipurpose space, terrace and bathroom. This floor also enjoys fantastic views and high ceilings. If you want to do a new project, you can build up to 75% above ground (539m2 + garage), occupying a maximum of 30% of the plot (215m2).

description: Duplex with spectacular terrace of 72m2 Cozy duplex ready to receive its new owners. The building is modern, with a few neighbors and located on a quiet street. On the first floor we find a practical entrance, the kitchen on the left, modern and equipped and on the right the living area where an elegant natural wood parquet stands out. Climbing the staircase we discover a beautiful suite, bathed in light with its three windows. It has a large dressing room and a private bathroom with a bathtub. On the same floor there is a second bedroom and a second bathroom, which gives a lot of comfort to the night space for everyone. Following the staircase we access a spectacular terrace for its size and for the details of wood design. They are more than 70m2 divided between a lounge-style space for rest and a covered space ideal for barbecues, lunches and dinners in the open space. We are in an ideal neighborhood for living in familly as the area has all the services such as schools, libraries, parks, leisure and health. Thanks to the characteristics of its streets, all new, old town streets style and in many cases pedestrian, the traffic level is reduced, so the area results completely stressless. One of the attractions of the area is undoubtedly to belong to one of the best communicated areas of Barcelona. For travel within the city of Barcelona we have two metro stations (L5 Badal and L1 Mercat Nou) and multiple bus lines. Near Sants Station, we have trains to all Spain and to all the surroundings.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sants - Badal, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Duplex in Calle de l'Escultor Canet

description: Beautiful flat in Rambla Catalunya Engel & Völkers presents this wonderful apartment located on Rambla Catalunya and next to Consell de cent, one of the new green axes in the city center. The apartment is located on the fourth floor of an elegant and well-kept royal estate. It stands out for its perfectly preserved original elements: nolla floors, wooden carpentry and its coffered ceilings. The ceilings are really high with more than four meters, an unusual fact on the upper floors of this type of property, and thanks to which you can breathe a great feeling of spaciousness. Entering to the right we find the day area composed of a large living room with access to a beautiful gallery with open views, a kitchen with a pantry area and a laundry room in a mezzanine area above the pantry. In front of the kitchen there’s a bedroom, where was also create a mezzanine to increase the space. A powder room with shower completes this part of the unit. On the other side of the hall, we have three double bedrooms, two of them with balcony overlooking Rambla Catalunya, and a four one interior with window facing the interior patio, now fitted out as a dressing room. Finally we have a complete bathroom with double access from one of the bedrooms and from the corridor. It is a beautiful home that breathes light and charm in all its rooms. The property is located in one of the most prestigious ways in the city, Rambla Catalunya. It’s one of Barcelona’s most centric and prestigious streets, and a main commercial axis. With a nice 5 minutes’ walk you arrive to Plaça Catalunya. Other important architectural and touristic places nearby are La Pedrera and Casa Batlló in Passeig de Gràcia, just one block away. The best offer in culture, shopping and leisure is just downstairs.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Dreta de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Rambla de Catalunya

description: Family flat with parking and balcony in Aribau This property is located in a building dating from the 1980s, near Plaça Universitat. This practical and comfortable flat, ready to move in, stands out for its functionality and its privileged location in the heart of the Eixample district. The apartment is distributed on a rectangular layout facing the quiet inner courtyard of the block and consists of four bedrooms, making it ideal for a family. Upon entering the flat, the entrance hall gives access to the left to a bedroom and also connects to the hallway. From the hallway there is access on the left hand side to a second bedroom, to the kitchen with access to the laundry area and to a toilet. At the front is the living-dining room with access to the balcony overlooking the courtyard. From the living room another small hallway leads to the double bedroom with exterior window, to the fourth bedroom and to a complete bathroom. The property has central heating by radiators and split air conditioning in the main rooms.  In the same building there is a parking space with direct lift included in the price.   All these qualities make this flat an ideal option for families, investors, or those who want a pied-à-terre to enjoy the centre of Barcelona. This property is located in the heart of the Eixample Esquerra, on Aribau street, a step away from Enric Granados and Consell de Cent, which will become a new green pedestrian axis of the city within the urban plan of the Eixample Superblock. The Eixample Esquerra district perfectly combines its residential function with the best leisure, culture and commercial offer (cinemas, restaurants, museums, University of Barcelona and a diversity of commercial stores and supermarkets). The apartment is well connected to public transport and just a few minutes walk from Plaça Universitat and Universitat metro station (L1/L2) or several bus stops. With a pleasant walk you can reach Plaça Catalunya or Passeig de Gràcia, or in the opposite direction to Plaça Espanya, neuralgic centers of the city with an unbeatable communication.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: L'Antiga Esquerra de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle d'Aribau

address: Gran Via de les Corts Catalanes
description: Amazing and spacious penthouse with a sunny terrace in Eixample. This sensational penthouse has an excellent location close to the centre of Barcelona, which makes it an oasis in the heart of the city, with a pleasant terrace at the foot of the living room that receives sunlight almost all day long, to enjoy the fresh air and its fantastic views of Barcelona and Montjuïc. This property has 150 built interior sqm, a 20 sqm terrace and 12 sqm of common elements according to the Cadastre. The penthouse, extremely bright and quiet, has double orientation. A spacious hall distributes the day and night areas at both ends. The living-dining room is large and has direct access to the south-east facing terrace. It's the perfect place to relax and enjoy the pleasant climate of Barcelona. The kitchen is separate, fully equipped with home appliances and has space for a small breakfast table. The night area features 3 bedrooms. The master suite with its own bathroom is pleasant, quiet and receives light through a lightwell. The other 2 double bedrooms are oriented towards the inner courtyard of the block. In addition, there's a separate bathroom, a guest toilet, a storage room and a laundry room along the hallway. The penthouse is very well maintained and was refurbished 15 years ago. It's equipped with solid parquet flooring, ducted hot/cold air conditioning, gas heating by radiators and aluminium exterior carpentry with double glazing. It maintains original elements such as mouldings and ceiling rosettes. It's made up of two registry entities, which allows it to be divided into two apartments and also makes it a good investment opportunity. This property is very close to the Urgell metro station and only 15 minutes away from Plaza Catalunya, so it's perfectly communicated with the rest of the city and the metropolitan area. The surrounding area offers numerous services, neighbourhood shops, bars, restaurants, schools, shopping malls and luxury boutiques. Do not hesitate to contact Bcn Advisors for a visit to this penthouse.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: L'Antiga Esquerra de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Gran Via de les Corts Catalanes

description: Elegant single-family tower of 450m2 on only two floors! Privileged location in a quiet and residential area, with very good communication and close to the Collserola Natural Park. Intimate plot of 845m2 on 2 levels, with panoramic views and a beautiful private garden. The house is comfortably distributed in an inverted way on only 2 floors, with clearly differentiated day and night areas. On the ground floor we have a large dining room in various environments and with direct access to the garden and pool. Next we find a spectacular kitchen-office, a courtesy toilet and a service area with a laundry room and a suite room. On this same floor we have the garage, pantry and cellar. On the first floor we have the night area with 5 bedrooms, an open study and 2 full bathrooms. The main room is a beautiful suite with a dressing room, a full bathroom and a large private terrace. Finally, we have a semi-basement floor of 75m2, destined for a multi-purpose room, fully conditioned. Housing is in very good condition and is unique in its category!

description: This property to be refurbished is located on the 5th floor of a listed and renovated building, which has preserved its classical elements. It's located in the Galvany neighbourhood, a few metres from the market and the Muntaner FGC railway station, and close to the Turó Park. It's one of the most prestigious areas of Barcelona, with a wide range of services, shops, facilities, green areas and international schools. The apartment has a total of 202 sqm, including a 4,5 sqm terrace, a 6,8 sqm gallery that could be opened and connected to the terrace extending it to 11 sqm, and a 2,6 sqm balcony that overlooks the street. It has a double orientation to the street (north, in the day area) and to the inner block courtyard (south, in the day area). It can be segregated according to the community statutes. The apartment offers large spaces and many possibilities for refurbishment. Currently distributed in living room with fireplace and dining room with exit to terrace, gallery and laundry room; independent kitchen, one bedroom en suite, 4 double bedrooms (2 of them are very big), one single bedroom, 2 complete bathrooms and a toilet. The building has a lift, concierge service and video entry phone. This is a fantastic opportunity to design a home to your taste in one of the best and quietest residential areas of the city.

description: Elegant duplex penthouse in Golf Can Trabal In one of the most exclusive and prestigious areas of Sant Cugat, Golf-Can Trabal, is located this elegant and bright duplex penthouse with a South-East orientation, 285m2 and a 21m2 terrace. We are welcomed by a beautiful hall, which distributes the day area to the right, the rest area to the left and leaves independent access to the upper floor that consists of a diaphanous multipurpose room of almost 60m2. The day area consists of a large living room with access to the 21m2 terrace facing East, a kitchen-office, which also accesses the beautiful and quiet terrace. The rest area consists of five bedrooms; a master suite with a complete bathroom and dressing room, a second suite with a complete bathroom, two double rooms with a shared bathroom, and the service room or ironing area with a complete bathroom. The property has two parking spaces for large vehicles equipped with connection for electric cars and a 12.5m2 storage room. As facilities, it has gas heating by radiators, A/C through ducts on the first floor and splits on the second floor. Motorized blinds and awning. Fiber optic and alarm. We invite you to visit this exclusive property. We are sure that you will love and enjoy its beauty and spaces. This property is located in one of the most exclusive areas of Sant Cugat del Vallés, the Golf/ Can Trabal area. Made up of single-family houses in a privileged environment, close to the Collserola Natural Park and only 15 minutes from Barcelona. 5 minutes by car from the train station, and next to the bus stop.  Very close to the services area, schools of recognised prestige, wide gastronomic and leisure offer, restaurants, cinemas, shops,.. . and connected by a natural itinerary with the Golf Club de Sant Jordi de Collserola and connected by a natural route to the Sant Cugat Golf Club.

description: Apartment with terrace for sale in Les Corts, Barcelona. Magnificent home perfect to move into, with an area of 116m² and a wonderful and sunny terrace of 50m². The night area consists of 3 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, all of them exterior and very bright. A second complete bathroom that serves the rooms. description: Very good apartment to move into in Balmes Galvany It is a fourth floor of 110m2 to move in with some upgrades. It is well distributed, with clear delimitation of day and night area. It has three bedrooms, two doubles and a large single. The rooms are exterior minus one of the doubles. It has two bathrooms and a small terrace at the foot of the living room facing Tarragona. The heating is by radiators and has 2 splts of air conditioning. The building has parking but the apartment does not have it. Possibility to rent a large farm next door. Concierge service and the apartment has a mezzanine. This property is located in one of the best areas of Barcelona, the prestigious neighborhood of Galvany, close to all kinds of service, public transport and a variety of shops, as well as a lot of gastronomic offer. It consists of two spacious rooms, one of them en suite and with a dressing room, and with large windows to receive natural light all day. Upon entering we find an open hall, towards the kitchen and dining room, super spacious and with wonderful views towards the Plaza María Cristina, facing South, with enveloping light and sun all day. The farm has a pool area, renovated and very beautiful, with plants and a parking lot on the farm The apartment that we present to you is located very close to public transport as well as the main communication routes to and from the city. Upon entering the Finca, we find a magnificent, very spacious hall with a concierge service. From there we already visualize the community area, with three swimming pools, a playground and space for bikes and scooters. Upon reaching the apartment we find a good hall that leads us to the dining room and the terrace, the views are very remarkable since the feeling is of being in an attic. Next, from the dining room, we go through a corridor with closets, to the rooms and bathrooms, all of them exterior and with large windows. The flat is distributed in a living room, fully equipped kitchen, double bedroom, complete bathroom and an office. Les Corts is basically a residential district that provide all basic services and has a wide range of gastronomic, leisure and shopping options with commercial centers such as El Corte Inglés and La Illa. description: House a few metres from the beach Engel & Völkers presents this exclusive house in a quiet residential area of Premià de Mar, just a few metres from the Barcelona train stop, schools and tennis club with swimming pool. The house is divided into four floors. On the first floor there is a living-dining room with direct access to the garden, kitchen and guest toilet. On the first floor, we find the rest area, a double bedroom en suite, two double bedrooms and a single bedroom. Complete bathroom for the bedrooms. On the top floor we have access to the solarium. In the basement, laundry room and single garage for two cars. The house is south facing. The sun enters the kitchen-dining room-rooms in the morning and as the sun turns it continues with the dining room and the rest of the rooms. The dining room has sun all day long. Each of the rows in the urbanisation is constituted as a community of owners. Not all the communities have taken the same care to maintain the common facade. And recently the exterior walls have been repaired and updated. Two minutes from the beach, in an unbeatable setting, ideal for families with children due to its proximity to schools, sports area and parks. One of the most sought-after areas of Premià de Mar. Premià de Mar is the second most populated city in the Maresme, it is located 23 kilometers from the center of Barcelona. The N-II highway runs along the coastal strip. It has extensive beaches with a large volume of sand. Next to them there are some walks, equipped with various exercises for athletes, with great width for walking and cycling. Premiá de Mar has a Mediterranean climate, summers are warm and winters are mild. Ideal to live!

description: First floor for sale with two terraces in Les Tres Torres  Fantastic first floor in Tres Torres totally to reform, in one of the best streets of the city. In an exclusive environment and in an area of excellent stores and services, is this very special property totally surrounded by terraces and with a private and very enjoyable backyard garden.    The house of 150 m2 built is very well distributed with a day area and a night area clearly differentiated. From the entrance hall there is access to the day area which consists of a large living room, with three large glass windows that provide plenty of light, a large kitchen and a service room, formerly with easily recoverable service bathroom, with direct access to the water area.    From the living room there is access to the front terrace of 55m2, for private use, currently to be closed.    The night area has 4 double bedrooms, all exterior and with large fitted closets in each of them. Also in this area are the two full bathrooms of the house, which can easily be converted into 3 bathrooms.    The rear area of the house gives access to a large landscaped courtyard of 45 m2 that provides a pleasant feeling of tranquility.    The property is completed with a fixed parking space, a rotating parking space and a storage room in the same building, all included in the price.    Fantastic opportunity to have an exterior home with garden in one of the quietest streets of Tres Torres, a premium area of the city!

description: Bright flat with 3 bedrooms and balcony in Eixample Pleasant and bright apartment with 3 exterior rooms with balcony Engel and Völkers exclusively presents this bright 75 sqm apartment with 8sqm of balconies. It is located in the pleasant neighbourhood of Nova Esquerra de l'Eixample. It has 3 double rooms, 2 bathrooms and two balconies of 6 sqm and 2 sqm The apartment is situated on the fourth floor of a 1970 building with elevator, in perfect condition, and located in one of the most thriving areas of Barcelona, surrounded by all services and very well connected. We enter the hall that leads to 2 double rooms facing the street. One of them has a 2 sqm balcony. We follow the corridor and find 2 bathrooms with shower and the family kitchen in good condition. A living room with access to the 6 sqm balcony and a third double bedroom with a fitted wardrobes complete this pleasant apartment. It should be noted its optimal distribution, perfect for a family or a young couple ready to start one. The apartment is equipped with split air conditioning, gas heating in the bathrooms, double-glazed windows for acoustic and thermal insulation, and electric awnings. La Nova Esquerra de l'Eixample is a residential and family neighbourhood that has all the essential services. Local shops such as the Ninot market, public and private schools, cultural and sporting entities. Here we find restaurants for all tastes and an unbeatable public transport service (L5 metro and bus lines). Very well connected area, 10 minutes from the city center and with easy access to get out and enter the city. Excellent location near Avinguda de Roma and Sants train station. Perfect for a family or as an investment.

description: Wonderful and unique refurbished triplex property in Gracia. This unique property in the area will make you feel at home in the heart of the city, very close to Avenida Diagonal and Paseo de Gracia. It's a recently refurbished triplex apartment with independent entrance from the street, a quiet semi-pedestrian street in the Gracia neighbourhood. The property is distributed over 3 floors. The main floor has a living-dining room that is on the corner and receives natural light from the street through large windows, a semi-open kitchen equipped with home appliances, a single bedroom with a built-in wardrobe and a complete bathroom with bathtub. The upper floor has a large office space and library, which takes advantage of the corridor that serves as a walkway above the main floor, which also incorporates a glass ground part that favours the entry of light to the floor below. The en-suite master bedroom has its own bathroom with shower. This floor is bright, as it overlooks the street. Finally, the lower floor is an open-plan, multi-purpose space that can be adapted to almost any use: cinema room, games room, large study, bedroom.. . It also has a full bathroom with shower and a laundry room. The property is very quiet and peaceful and is equipped with high quality materials and finishings: reinforced door, Jatoba wood parquet floors, air conditioning hot/cold by independent ducts on each floor, LED lights, Technal aluminium carpentry and motorised foscurit blinds. The property is situated in a building constructed in 2008. It's possible to buy or rent a parking space in the same building. This is a unique opportunity to live or invest in Gracia, with its charming and lively neighbourhood life in its streets, squares, bars and restaurants; services, shops and a wide range of public transport. Do not hesitate to contact Bcn Advisors to see this 3-storey apartment.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Vila de Gràcia, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Duplex in Calle D'Abdó Terradas

description: Beautiful house really to enjoy, an exclusive piece with unbeatable finishes, with all the comforts you can dream of, a luxury home with a pioneering design and in a dream location for any family. In the middle of the center of S.Cugat del Vallés with all the services on foot and with the best communications one minute away, such as the FFGC station in the center or the best schools on foot.Exclusive housing that is designed every inch with elegance and comfort. It was a whole new building with flats, but it was finally rebuilt and renovated to make all the flats a single dwelling. The exterior facade is a modern building combined with very modern and beautiful gray steel balconies, with excellent orientation. The house has been designed by a renowned architecture studio and interior designers.We access the house through a large, high-security design stately door. This door leads to a corridor with high double ceilings that offers an entrance on the left to a large luxury garage for up to 3 cars with lighting details and exquisite taste that Take advantage of every centimeter of space by making the part of the loft a large storage room. The garage area has a large portal and an automatic access door with easy access from the street and electric chargers for two cars. Continuing along the corridor that gives access to the stairs to go up to the upper floors, we also find the elevator on the left and next to it, under the stairs, a spectacular glass cellar decorated as an exhibition for hundreds of bottles. When accessing the stairs we can see the detail of the high finishes, how the stairs are lined with natural fiber and the baseboards of the entire house made of white lacquered natural wood with natural wood parquet floors. Throughout the house there are countless closets, on the first floor we find hidden closets on both sides, lacquered and with high-quality finishes.To your left a beautiful full bathroom.Following it is the first room with a large built-in wardrobe and two hidden beds in a wall cabinet. Next to it, the second room also with more built-in wardrobes and lots of light, followed by the master suite room with a large dressing room and spectacular bathroom with luxury ceramic finishes, good taste and high quality. On the second floor, the entire left wall, like the rest of the house, hides multiple storage spaces for a pantry and a laundry area with electrical appliances, as well as a large courtesy toilet.To the right is an imposing and spacious open kitchen with Brazilian marble countertops extracted from under the sea with exceptional quality and robustness.We also access the elegant dining room, which stands out for its original glass mirror ceiling, which provides spaciousness and light to the dining room and living room. On the upper floor, another courtesy toilet, and a study that is currently used as a chill-out area, but can also be ideal for many other uses.This gives access to a large solarium with barbecue and structurally prepared for the installation of a swimming pool if desired.This gives access to a large solarium with barbecue and structurally prepared for the installation of a swimming pool if desired. This exclusive home is located in the heart of S.Cugat del Vallés, a few meters from Calle Santa María, the most central and commercial street of Sant Cugat with an incalculable value. The street of the house is surrounded by shops, any service, pharmacies, health centers, close to the Catalan railways, with quick access to highways, schools on foot, and everything you may need one step away, but at the same time it has the great luck of being located in a quiet street with very little noise and traffic.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Centre - Estació, Sant Cugat del Vallès
suggestedTexts.title: Terraced house

description: Exclusive duplex apartment near Tibidabo Av. Fantastic duplex apartment with excellent constructive qualities and excellent state of conservation, ready to move into inmediately. The building has a community garden area with pool and concierge service. With a built area of 234 m2, it has an interior distribution that is divided into two floors: on the ground floor we find a master suite with a double bathroom, a spacious multi-purpose room with a gym and service area. On the first floor we find another suite, a spacious living room, dining room with large windows and a fully equipped kitchen. On this floor along the entire facade there is an outside terrace that allows you to enjoy the views over the green area. The property includes two spacious parking spaces and a storage room. Located next to the Tibidabo Avenue, one of the most emblematic and elegant areas of Barcelona. The location allows quick access to both the Ronda de Dalt and the districts of Sant Gervasi and La Bonanova. On the other hand, the nearby Collserola natural park is easily accessible by foot or bicycle.

suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: This newly renovated and high-quality-furnished exclusive 100m2 apartment is located on the 3rd floor in the heart of the city in a historical and maintained Gothic building with a community roof terrace. This splendid property has been completely renovated this year with the highest quality finishes and is a perfect example of a residence that offers all modern luxuries while maintaining its heritage. The spacious day area consists of an impressive 30m2 living room with a dining and lounge area and opens to a designer kitchen, custom-made and fully equipped with appliances. It has an additional breakfast area for a smaller group or a space that could be used as a working area. The night area consists of double 2 bedrooms with wardrobes, both facing a quiet inner courtyard and an additional family bathroom. Both, day and night areas, are flooded with natural light due to the layout and orientation of the property. This excellent family home features all-new utilities and installations: plumbing, gas, electricity, ventilation, ducted air conditioning, and a custom-made kitchen. The building has a large communal terrace. Located in a classical building in the highly sought-after Gothic neighborhood on a pedestrian street 5 minutes walk from Plaza Catalunya and Passeig de Gracia. Many restaurants and shopping facilities including PicassoŽs favorite iconic place, Els Quatre Gats, are close by. This key-ready and spacious property is a perfect home for your family to enjoy the best of life that Barcelona has to offer and SothebyŽs Barcelona team will be happy to arrange a visit for you. The Gothic Quarter is the oldest and most interesting part of the city. It is bounded by Las Ramblas, Via Laietana, Paseo Colón and Plaza de Catalunya, each of these points alone has its own importance and history. With its narrow streets and irregular structure, several of its buildings have been built on the Romanesque remains of the city, so you can get an apartment with at least one wall dating back to Roman times. It is the tourist district par excellence so it represents an assured investment, especially if you are near one of its attractions such as the Cathedral, the Plaza Sant Jaume with the City Hall and the Palace of the Generalitat, the Plaza Real, the famous Rambas, and the Museum of History of the city. The Gothic Quarter could be your neighborhood if you are looking to make a profitable investment or acquire an excellent pied-à-terre in an iconic and storied neighborhood with great history, private buildings, tourism and with all kinds of businesses at hand such as bars, restaurants, libraries, and many magical corners to discover and tour.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Gòtic, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de Montsió

address: subdistrict El Putxet i el Farró
description: Duplex penthouse with 4 terraces in Sant Gervasi Exceptional duplex penthouse all exterior and sunny, located in a quiet area of Putxet, near Plaza Kennedy and Barcino Tennis It is a seventh floor in a building from the 70s, with a spacious lobby with a concierge and elevator. The access floor consists of an extraordinary living-dining room with access to a 35m2 terrace, a very complete kitchen-office, two bathrooms with shower and four bedrooms, three of which are doubles (one of them with access to a 15m2 terrace) and one individual or service. A comfortable and bright staircase leads us to the upper floor, made up of a master bedroom with a dressing room and en-suite bathroom and access to a 25m2 terrace, from where you can enjoy phenomenal views of the city of Barcelona. This floor is complemented by three more bedrooms (two doubles and one single) and a complete bathroom with a bathtub. These three bedrooms have access to a 20m2 terrace with views of Collserola. It should be noted that, in addition, we can also enjoy the more than 100m2 terrace-solarium, communal but for exclusive use, which is accessed by the common staircase of the building, with 360º panoramic views of all of Barcelona In general, the apartment is in good condition, although it needs some updates. It has attics for storage, fitted wardrobes, heating with radiators and air conditioning splits. As a complement to this magnificent property, we will say that it has two parking spaces on the same property, with direct access from the elevator and two storage rooms. In short, a unique property in the area that cannot be missed. Very close to Plaza John F. Kennedy, La Rotonda building, Av. Tibidabo (with the Tramvia Blau) Hospitals, Cosmocaixa, unique restaurants, and the best schools in Barcelona, Barcino Tennis, Tamarita park, Balmes multiplexes, the municipal market of Sant Gervasi or several supermarkets. It also has 24-hour pharmacies and a gym less than 300m away (below La Rotonda). It is also very close to the Turó del Putxet Gardens, gas stations or the Corachán Clinic. With the Ferrocarriles de la Generalitat de Catalunya metro ('Tibidabo' station) you can reach Plaza Cataluña in 10 minutes, and soon the L9 metro line will arrive, which will cross all the other Barcelona metro lines in the form of an orbital collector. directly accessing the University Zone and the airport. The access time by car to the center of Barcelona is less than 10 minutes going down Balmes street, 5 minutes to the Vallvidrera Tunnel or 3 minutes to the Ronda de Dalt. The area is ideal for families with children or for people looking for a haven of peace without having to sacrifice accessibility to services/shops/parks and to the nerve centers of the city when necessary.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Putxet i el Farró, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: Magnificent semi-detached house for sale with private pool in Pedralbes (Barcelona) This magnificent semi-detached house of 675m2 built on a 1,000m2 plot, facing southeast, is located in Pedralbes, the most exclusive residential neighborhood in Barcelona. In the upper part of Barcelona and with good access, this premium area concentrates internationally renowned colleges and universities, is surrounded by nature and houses the most distinguished sports and social clubs. In addition, the neighborhood with Sarriá, offers the possibility of enjoying its numerous services and traditional establishments, to those who reside in this privileged setting of the city.   The house is integrated into a unique residential complex with a garden area, community pool and paddle tennis. It has two pleasant private gardens, one at the main entrance and the other inside -very intimate- with abundant vegetation, a heated swimming pool, Jacuzzi, a built-in barbecue and a wooden pergola for summer meals. There is also a large open porch and another with aluminum enclosure and air conditioning.   The ground floor, very bright, enjoys a noble area with four-meter-high ceilings and large windows, in several well-differentiated environments; a comfortable living room, a spacious lounge for watching television, a very enjoyable mezzanine for reading and, divided by imposing oak doors, a delightful dining room with fitted wardrobes and views of the garden. There is also a courtesy bathroom. Adjacent, the service area, consists of a fully equipped 30m2 kitchen, laundry, gallery and a service room en suite.   The night area, located on floors one and two, includes a master suite and three suites. In the first, the main room, it is made up of a spacious bedroom with a home cinema, a terrace facing the sea and views of the city, an office and two complete bathrooms. The other suite on the same floor faces the mountains. While the second and third suites on the second floor, facing the sea, have a loft and share a terrace.   In the 225m2 built basement, there is a garage with space for four cars and other smaller vehicles, a courtesy bathroom, pantry, gym, storage room and a multipurpose room with a full bathroom, as well as a leisure area with a wine cellar, bar with beer shooter and dining room. All floors communicate with each other, through an internal staircase and there is also a hydraulic elevator.   It has a concierge and surveillance service 24/7.

neighborhood: El Camp de l'Arpa del Clot
description: 3-bedroom duplex apartment in Camp de l'Arpa Located in the Camp de l'Arpa area, near the Sagrada Familia, the Sant Pau hospital grounds and the new rehabilitated area of Glories, in one of the most sought-after streets in the area, we find this spacious apartment of about 112 m2 in a corner building, totally exterior and lots of light. The apartment is located on the third floor of this farm from the year 2000. Its current layout, on the first floor, consists of a hall, a courtesy toilet, a spacious living-dining room with access to a balcony, an independent kitchen also with access to a balcony. On the second floor, we find a double bedroom with access to a balcony, an exterior single bedroom, an exterior en-suite double bedroom with access to a balcony and a complete bathroom with a shower. The house enjoys a lot of natural light, cross ventilation and the balconies face west. The property has porcelain stoneware floors, split air conditioning and individual gas heating. The apartment has aluminum carpentry with double glazing and electric shutters. The farm is equipped with an automatic intercom, elevator and a community terrace.

description: Modern house with private pool in the putxet Exceptional house distributed on the ground floor, two floors and attic floor, all joined by an elegant and comfortable staircase covered with wood.  Basement formed by a large open room with kitchen for all types of family events. The gym is located on a mezzanine connected to the basement and the garage on the ground floor, with capacity for two vehicles and several motorcycles, as well as a laundry room, storage cabinets and a toilet. On this ground floor we find the main access to the house, through an elegant hall and staircase that goes up to the noblest area of the house. First floor distributed in a comfortable living room with fireplace and exit to a terrace of about 35m2 with pool, oriented to quiet and wooded interior patio. On the other side, if you place a toilet and dining room, connected by sliding with the kitchen, both with access to balcony. The second floor, formed by a master bedroom with fireplace, dressing room and bathroom plus two single rooms with access to balcony, both sharing a bathroom with shower. Finally, we arrive at the attic floor with 2 double bedrooms, bathroom with bathtub and play area or office connected to a room with attached facilities. A large central skylight illuminates the staircase in all its breadth and height The house was built by the same owner and used first quality materials. Perfectly heated with air ducts with cold and heat system, central vacuum, fitted wardrobes, aluminium windows with double glazing and solid wood flooring throughout the house except for wet areas. In the district of El Putxet with all amenities, shops, restaurants, food, schools, cinemas, etc. Putxet is a small mountain in Sant Gervasi. This neighbourhood was originally a core mainly summer but with the arrival of the railroad Sarrià, metro and trams became a place of habitual residence. Very close to the gardens of Turó del Putxet, Municipal Market of Sant Gervasi, Tennis Barcino, Balmes Multiplexes Club. Very well connected to the city centre through the Ferrocarriles de la Generalitat de Catalunya with the stations El Putxet and Av. Tibidabo. Connecting with many bus routes. Tram Blau that leads to the foot of the Tibidabo Funicular, and only 6 minutes to access the Ronda de Dalt, where we can easily go in all directions.

description: Fantastic duplex penthouse with terrace in Les Corts Engel & Völkers presents this magnificent duplex penthouse in Les Corts. The property consists of 110m2 divided into two floors, we access the apartment through the hall and continuing we find the very spacious and bright living-dining room with access to the 20m2 terrace with spectacular views and very private due to the characteristics it has. We continue and enter the main room with its own bathroom, the room is exterior with views of the terrace and on the same floor we have the fully equipped and very spacious kitchen with a window to the outside. We go upstairs and find 2 bedrooms, one of them is double and with a dressing room, also on this floor there is a full bathroom. Throughout the apartment we have parquet flooring and all the windows are double glazed. It is a very cozy penthouse, do not hesitate to organize a visit! Les Corts, is one of the best neighborhoods in Barcelona, quiet, familiar, well connected, with all the services and equipment, with areas and important shopping centers. The apartment is next to the Market and the Metro stop. Next to Travesera de Les Corts and Gran Vía Carles III, it preserves the tranquility of the best residential areas of Les Corts, at the same time it has all the services and shops. Heading north, the pedestrian boulevard of Gran Vía Carles III brings us closer to the Corte Inglés in a few minutes and very close to the L'Illa Center. Nearby you can also enjoy walking through the Maternitat Gardens (7.68 hectares), among whose large green spaces are various buildings of valuable modernist architectural heritage. The area has a Library and municipal civic center. The diagonal university campus and the Camp Nou sports facilities (museum, ice rink) are nearby. Excellently communicated both by public transport, close to the railway station (high speed, suburban... ) and by private vehicle, very close to the accesses through Diagonal, Ronda del Mig, Gran Vía and 15 minutes from the Airport.

description: Magnificent House in Sant Muç Magnificent house located in Sant Muç, sunny and bright, spacious and comfortable. It has a large garden in which you can build a pool, summer dining room and barbecue, laundry room, storage room and garage for two cars. The house has two floors, each of them has a kitchen, living-dining room, bathroom, bedrooms and an independent entrance, so it can also be used as two houses for two families. The ground floor has a large open kitchen, living room, a double bedroom and a bathroom. On the upper floor we have a kitchen, living room with fireplace, three double bedrooms and a bathroom. The heating is gasoil and the living room on the upper floor has A/A. Sant Muç is a residential neighborhood in the municipality of Rubí, where you could feel calm, privacy and nature. Directly communicated with the center of the municipality 10 minutes away by car or with the neighboring towns of Sant Cugat 15 minutes away or Terrassa. Barcelona city is only 25 minutes away by car by the C-16. It is 3 km from the FGC Rubí station, which communicates with Plaza Cataluña in Barcelona in 30 min. It also has a municipal bus service, with a stop near the house. Nearby there are schools, health centers and a good commercial offer for everyday life.

description: Spectacular duplex with parking in Vila de Gràcia Engel & Volkers brings you exclusively this spectacular duplex, in the heart of Vila de Gracia. It is part of an old textile factory rehabilitated with the highest qualities and taste. It consists of 72 meters on the first floor as a day area, it includes a beautiful living room illuminated by large windows with an English garden that gives the most natural touch of this space, next to a semi-open kitchen, functional and fully equipped, a toilet and finally a practical dining room. By a modern industrial style staircase we access the night floor, a total of 64 meters, currently the spaces include a large dressing room, washer and dryer area, a bathroom, an office  and a large room, however with a two partitions we can have in this space 3 rooms, all exterior.  The rehabilitation of the building in 2002 and the property in 2019, recovered industrial structural elements that give it a very elegant style, in which we find brick walls, iron beams. It is a high standing property, modern architecture, with quality features and finishes, with few neighbors, quiet, with concierge service and parking. The price includes a parking space. Request a visit and let us show you all its charms. Vila de Gracia is undoubtedly the most emblematic neighborhood of Barcelona, located in one of the main streets of Vila de Gracia is this charming property ideal for couples, investors and families.  Located near the Plaça del Nord, Rovira y Trias and the Jardins del Mestre Balcells, where the artistic, gastronomic and cultural richness of the city can be found in its most leisurely and reflective rhythm. Its location means access to all types of public transport, equidistant between the Lesseps and Joanic metro stations and endless shopping options.

description: GREAT PROPERTY WITH A LARGE TERRACE IN BONANOVA In the residential neighbourhood of La Bonanova, next to Avda. Tibidabo and Plaza Kennedy we find this exclusive property in a in a quiet complex with few residents, built with the high quality materials in 1997, a guarantee of exclusivity, privacy, comfort and security. The property, a first floor of 180sqm, also offers a spacious garden-terrace of 68 m2 facing the Jardines de la Tamarita, with morning sun and a private swimming pool. heated swimming pool. Orientated to an quiet street, the flat has another 12m2 terrace with evening sun, accessible from the bedrooms. With its double orientation E/O the appartment clearly differentiates clearly divides the day and night areas. All the rooms are exterior with large windows, including the kitchen with direct access to the terrace. We enter through a large entrance hall to a leading to a spacious living-dining room in three ambiances with direct access to the garden terrace and pool, as well as to the kitchen-office with its ironing room, a toilet and laundry area. To the left of the entrance there is the distributor of the night area with the junior suite to the left, then the 2 symmetrical bedrooms and a bathroom, and to the right we find the master suite. All bedrooms have access to the second veranda. The property is well kept, to be updated if desired. It has A/C by pipes, gas heating and built-in wardrobes. The building has two lifts, a comfortable entrance, concierge service and 24h security. It is completed by two double parking spots and 1 storeroom, included in the price. All in all, an exclusive property in a premium location in the upper area of the city. The Bonanova neighbourhood is one of the most privileged and exclusive residential areas located in the upper side of Barcelona. It is highly requested by those who look for a safe and quiet enviroment in which families enjoy their beautiful apartments, houses and classic villas, many of them with a courtyard or a garden or nice and enjoyable terraces with pool, but at the same time want to live in a urban and dynamic neighbourhood Here we also find an extraordinary selection of private schools of excellent international reputation such as Benjamin Franklin School, St.Pauls, St. Peters, Liceo Francés …. Additionally, located at Bonanova, you may find all International private universities like ESADE, UIC, Abat Oliva, IGS and La Salle Ramón Llull. Many families from all over the world choose to live here also because they have the most prestigious sport clubs nearby, for example, the Metropolitan Iradier, the Arsenal or the Bonasport Club, but also because Bonanova is located next to the most important private medical centers and hospitals like the Teknon, the Quirón or the IMO. And the proximity to the Cience Museum or the various offer of grocery stores nearby make Bonanova a highly exclusive and demanded area of Barcelona. Bonanova is a residencial area that perfectly combines a familiar, comfortable, quiet and safe surrounding of villas with a garden, appartments or penthouses with a wonderful view of the city, with an excellent infrastructures and connectivity to all public transportation facilities, to the main highways that surround Barcelona like the Ronda de Dalt and at only 20 minutes from the Barcelona International Airport.

description: Big flat in La Dreta de l'Eixample Apartment on the second floor of a building from 1984 on Valencia street. next to the prestigious Passeig Sant Joan The flat has been kept in optimums shape along its years and offers numerous possibilities to reform it to adjust and customized it according to your tastes and needs. As we enter it, from the lobby, two well-differentiated areas can be seen. First, to the left we have two quiet bedrooms with a full bathroom. Next we find the kitchen, very spacious, of square shape and with a comfortable outside laundry room. Then we find the day area, with a bright living room and access to an enjoyable balcony with pleasant views of Valencia street. Next to the day area we find the master bedroom, a second bathroom in suite, and the fourth bedroom - dressing room. This property is a great alternative for those looking to create their own home in one of the best neighbourhoods of Barcelona’s downtown. Strategically located near to two of the most emblematic streets of L'Eixample Dret, the renovated Passeig Sant Joan and the Avinguda Diagonal, and only ten minutes away to Passeig de Gràcia. The area is constantly improving, thanks to the cutting-edge urban plans that have been carried out and its excellent communication options. It is of great interest to families and young professionals due to the wide range of shops, educational centers, medical centers, playgrounds, and quality restaurants. Ideal for those who want to live in an authentic, cosmopolitan and quiet neighborhood in the center of Barcelona.

description: Spectacular refurbished apartment in El gòtic Spectacular newly renovated main apartment with high ceilings and a 137sqm, located in a royal building in perfect condition on a second real floor of one of the most emblematic streets of the historic center. This magnificent home has been restored highlighting the original elements such as the natural colored wooden beams and also uses current design elements, such as natural wood flooring or geometric design tiles. Upon entering the house, the first thing we see is a large hall lined on its vertical walls in a beautiful wavy natural wood. To the right of this hall we find the spacious living room, with large windows and a front balcony facing the main street. Oriented to the south east and being a wide street it is quite bright. Opposite the entrance is one of the three toilets in the house, the courtesy one, with space for the washer and dryer. To the left of the hall, a sliding door of the same wavy material leads us to the large kitchen, with space for a family room, a built-in fridge and a marble countertop in a beautiful green color, which fits well with the shades of the mint green tiles. used in the other two bathrooms in the house. Going through the kitchen, a corridor leads us to the last night area, on the left side there are two double bedrooms that share a complete bathroom between them and the third en-suite bedroom at the end of the corridor, large, with a dressing room made custom and spacious four-piece bathroom, walk-in shower and classic-style claw-foot tub in silver. It is a house where great attention has been paid to the details and above all, the distribution is extremely functional, which can flow through its large spaces but at the same time it is pity to compartmentalize to be used in different ways. In short, a unique piece ready to move into. The house is located in the heart of the Gothic Quarter of Barcelona. The Gothic Quarter is one of the most emblematic and charismatic neighborhoods of the Catalan capital, with a large number of museums, shops and restaurants where you can enjoy the dynamic life of the neighborhood. The many facets of the neighborhood allow us to enjoy a large number of attractions, such as religious buildings such as the Barcelona Cathedral or the Iglesia del Pi, shopping areas such as Portal de l'Àngel or Portaferrissa, cultural reference centers such as l'Ateneu Barcelonés and places with history such as the Roman Temple of Augustus, 'Els 4 Gats' or Plaça de Sant Jaume. In this way, the Gothic Quarter becomes the neuralgic, commercial, cultural and tourist center of the city of Barcelona without ceasing to be what it has always been, the oldest neighborhood with the most history in the city of Barcelona.

description: This 210 built sqm property to be refurbished is located on the 4th floor of a regal 1950's building with a lift, in the heart of the "Quadrat d'Or" (Golden Square) in Barcelona's Eixample district. It's one of the best areas of the city, 3 streets away from Paseo de Gracia, with a wide range of services, shops, restaurants and public transport in the surrounding area. The day area consists of a large living room with fireplace and a separate dining room, which have access to 3 balconies totalling 6 sqm. The separate kitchen is large and has a large laundry area and a pantry. It currently consists of 5 bedrooms, 2 of which are exterior suites facing the street (one with a large adjoining room that could be used as a dressing room) and 3 are single. The flat is equipped with radiator heating. The property is sold in its current state, but there's a renovation project designed by LUV Project (not included in the price) that would turn it into a high-end apartment, in which the 2 large en-suite bedrooms with bathrooms and dressing rooms, a spacious living room of 60 m2 and the kitchen with service and guest area would stand out. This property can be divided into 2 flats. It has 2 entrances and its distribution is square, so it offers a lot of possibilities and represents a great opportunity with a lot of potential.
