description: Exclusive apartment in the Eixample of Barcelona. "Luxury must be comfortable, otherwise it is not luxury" those were the words of the French designer Coco Chanel, which could easily be applied to this home. A property in which practicality was merged with design, comfort with good taste, a unique home in the entire neighborhood, not only for its distribution and benefits but also for its positive energy in every corner. With a modern, youthful and elegant design, this apartment offers us two floors. In the first, when entering the house, we will find a large hall that allows us to go directly to the living room or branch our path directly to the kitchen or bathroom, if we go directly to the living-dining room we will find a large double-height room, diaphanous that integrates the kitchen in the same space and with direct access to a beautiful patio ideal for summer dinners or autumn breakfasts. Regarding the kitchen, it was designed for those true lovers of cooking, because it is ideal for preparing our best culinary works, as it has a kitchen with a ceramic hob, teriyaki grill, and a compartment for steaming integrated into the countertop. On this floor we also find a full bathroom. On the second floor, the night area of the property, there are two double bedrooms, one of them with a spacious integrated bathroom, with a hydromassage bathtub and a shower tray, for the comfort of the users of the suite and also this suite itself. It has a beautiful dressing room. This area has a lot of clarity and natural light thanks to the huge windows in the living room, since being a second floor open to the living room creates a very comfortable space where all the rooms are linked to each other, turning this apartment into a real home. Finally, we invite you to see in person all the characteristics of this property, however it should be noted that it has air conditioning, elevator, community pool, natural gas heating with independent radiators in all rooms, aluminum windows with double glazing, alarm with video surveillance, video intercom, etc. We invite you to make an appointment with us or call us to clarify any questions you may have without obligation.

description: Interesting property to refurbish with terrace and views of the Turó Park. This remarkable property to be refurbished is located in a street close to Turó Park, one of the most exclusive residential areas of Barcelona. It also has numerous services, shops, restaurants, international schools and prestigious entities in the surrounding area. It has fantastic communication with the rest of the city through the connections of the Plaça Francesc Macià. The apartment has a surface area of 118 sqm according to the Cadastre (including common elements), with an interior built area of 111 sqm and a 6 sqm terrace. The living-dining room is very bright and has direct access to a terrace with beautiful views to Turó Park, which has enough space to put a table for 4 people. The kitchen is independent and has an office area, which used to be the maid's room, and a separate utility room. The property currently has 3 bedrooms, the main one en suite with private bathroom and views to the Turó Park. There are also 2 independent bathrooms. The flat needs a refurbishment, but has good installation of individual gas heating and air conditioning in all rooms. The building has concierge service and possibility of renting parking spaces in the same building.

description: We introduce you to this exclusive luxury house located in the prestigious neighborhood of Can Trabal Golf & Vilallonga, near the Collserola Natural Park, just 20 minutes from Barcelona. It has 612 m2 built on a flat and sunny plot of 918 m2. The property offers various outdoor relaxation areas, as well as numerous indoor amenities for your enjoyment. The exterior part stands out for a wonderful porch allowing you to enjoy the views, nature and fresh air. There is also a beautiful pool, along with a jacuzzi to relax. Inside you can enjoy a large living room with a fireplace to spend special moments with family and friends, with a modern decorative design endowed with great natural light thanks to its large windows. On the first floor we are welcomed by a multipurpose room that leads to four large bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and their complete bathrooms with bathtubs and showers. The kitchen is fully equipped with the most modern appliances, assembled with top quality materials, with a pantry and separate laundry room. The house offers a garage to accommodate three cars with connection for electric vehicles. It has two fully furnished independent apartments with comfortable kitchens and bathrooms. This exclusive house is a paradise surrounded by tranquility, surrounded by nature, just 20 minutes from the center of Barcelona. An ideal place to relax, enjoy the natural beauty and enjoy life to the fullest.

suggestedTexts.title: Flat in arbucies

description: Exclusive property with excellent orientation. Brightness, comfort, good finishes, unobstructed views, silence, are some of the characteristics that represent this house. An apartment located in the Volpalleres neighborhood on one of the most important roads not only in the area but in all of Sant Cugat del Valles. As we enter the house, we are greeted by a spacious hall that divides the day area and the night area of the apartment. To our right we find the living-dining room with direct access to a 24m2 terrace that runs through almost the entire floor. , this terrace can also be accessed from the kitchen, an area that adjoins the living room and that also communicates with it. Regarding the night area, it is made up of 3 bedrooms, one of which is double and with a private bathroom, another very spacious bedroom and a third single. It also has a large distributor where the full bathroom for common use is located. This house stands out above all for being on the corner, facing south and having a great height above the other buildings thanks to the fact that it is in one of the areas with the highest land in Volpalleres, it is also worth noting that it has one of the garden areas and most valued pool in the neighborhood, for its tranquility and good orientation. Regarding some of the main characteristics of the apartment, we will highlight that it has a ceramic hob, Silestone countertop, natural parquet in perfect condition, aluminum windows with top-of-the-range thermal break from the K-line house, specially designed to reduce noise and installed in 2021 significantly improving the energy efficiency of the property, heating through domotic ducts and powered by natural gas. It also has awnings installed on the terrace and a 100-liter hot water tank with solar panels for ACS. Regarding its location, it should be noted that just 50 steps from the building we have the Lidl, Esclat and Aldi supermarkets, a 5-minute walk away, the Sant Cugat shopping center, a 15-minute walk away is the Mercat de Vollpalleres and the FGC station. Just 3 minutes by car we find the exit to the Vallvidrera Tunnels and only 2 minutes by car the exit to the C58 and AP7. Without a doubt, this home represents a unique opportunity to live in one of the youngest and most consolidated neighborhoods of Sant Cugat del Valles.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Volpelleres, Sant Cugat del Vallès
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Via Augusta

description: Exclusive detached house for sale, Bellaterra This exclusive and comfortable single-family house is located in the eastern part of Bellaterra, adjacent to the forest area, with ample views of the horizon, enjoying tranquillity and intimacy.  Well preserved, with an English design and quality finishes, taking care of the details. To emphasize its amplitude and luminosity.  Entering through the main door, we find a cozy hall, which gives way to a bright living room and library with access to the porch and views of the garden. Connected to the dining room, a spacious and equipped kitchen, annexed to the service area. On the same floor there is a toilet, two rooms that share a bathroom and the suite, all of them receiving sunlight. We access by the stairs to the upper floor in which are distributed a room with its bath and a spacious attic with its chimney. We continue along the stairs to the basement where is located the cellar, a large multipurpose room and the garage of three. The house has gas heating and alarm. The garden has a swimming pool and children's area. It has additional parking space for several vehicles at the entrance ramp. It has a plot of 1,800 m2 most of it landscaped. Bellaterra is one of the most exclusive areas for having a privileged natural environment and being only 18 km from Barcelona, that is, 25 'by car. It is perfectly connected to the main highways (C-58, AP-7, C-16). It also has an FGC station. It has several shopping centers very close and is located between the municipalities of Sabadell, Cerdanyola and Sant Cugat del Vallès. Close to the most prestigious international schools: Ágora, La Vall, Waldorf School, Europa International School, University Campus of the Autonomous University of Barcelona (UAB), ESADE, School of Architecture of Vallés (ETSAV-UPC). It also has excellent golf clubs, tennis and aeronautics nearby as well as the prestigious High Performance Center for athletes, CAR Sant Cugat.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Bellaterra, Cerdanyola del Vallès
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: Beautiful detached house 4 winds in the Mirasol area, in Sant Cugat del Vallès. Surface of 126m2 according to cadastre, 80m2 useful housing, on a plot of 361m2. Totally exterior, with pool, barbecue and garden. The house has a single floor distributed in 3 bedrooms, one of them a suite, another office-dressing room and 1 single, 2 bathrooms, kitchen and a large dining room-living room with access to the garden. The house has heating and air conditioning, stoneware floors. Very well connected, FCG de mirasol station and Vallvidrera tunnels. Ideal for families looking for tranquility in an environment surrounded by nature and 10 minutes by car from Barcelona. Feel free to contact us for more information.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Mirasol, Sant Cugat del Vallès
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in basconia

description: Excellent design house, created by the prestigious JEEV Ejarque architecture studio in Sant Cugat del Valles. It is a unique home, with high-standing construction and decorative qualities. On the ground floor, we are greeted by an immense open room with glass walls, which offers us an entrance of light and a unique connection with the exterior. Next to this we have the kitchen that thanks to a large sliding door we can both make it independent and also make it serve as a kitchenette.Also with direct access to the garden and windows on almost all sides. Conceived with a practical, functional design, but at the same time elegant and cozy, it presents us with a corian countertop.This mineral and acrylic polymer finish allows us easy cleaning, a pleasant touch and its absence of joints, absolute hygiene. Embedded in its walls and central island are a very discreet steam oven, another type of grill, another conventional pyrolytic, central extractor hood, ceramic hob among other appliances.Continuing on this floor we will have a beautiful suite with a full bathroom and a toilet for common use. To go to floor 1 we can take the elevator or go up the stairs through its noble glass steps, a multipurpose central room will serve as a reception and distributor to go to any of the 4 bedrooms with bathroom on this floor, as well as to be able to go out to one of its two terraces with spectacular views. The spectacularity of the 2nd floor is worth seeing in person, it is a floor created by and for the comfort, relaxation and well-being of the inhabitants.Divided into an office of about 20m2, a magnificent dressing room and a majestic suite with 2 of its walls completely made of glass with a lot of privacy and views of Collserola and Sant Cugat. The bathroom of this suite is worthy of being classified almost as a Spa, since it has a shower area and a bathtub that "floats" on a pond that begins its torrent inside the room itself, and leads out onto a terrace-solarium of approximately 70m2. From the elevator we go down to floor -1, where there is another area designed for recreation, it is a brand new large indoor heated pool, which has a space for relaxation and a full bathroom. On this floor there is also a laundry area-storage room and a garage for three cars.Regarding the exterior, we are talking about a true jewel, with a garden area, a terrace area for barbecue and summer kitchen with direct access from the living room and an imposing decorative waterfall that puts the icing on the cake to a dream garden to spend long afternoons and summer nights. Some of the main qualities are: porcelain floors, parquet, central air conditioning, underfloor heating by natural gas, Schneider elevator, technal aluminum windows, double-glazed windows with thermal break, half-height designer fireplace embedded in the wall, taps and Roca toilets in their highest range, with all suspended toilets, white lacquered doors, built-in wardrobes, built-in downlight lighting.Regarding the location, it is worth noting its proximity to the FGC Mirasol, as well as the quick exits to the main highways and highways of the city.From the house you will have a direct connection with Barcelona in just 15 minutes through the Vallvidrera tunnels.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Arxius, Sant Cugat del Vallès
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle jaume i

description: Exclusive apartment in one of the best neighborhoods of Sant Cugat del Valles. Located in one of the neighborhood communities with the best community spaces and surroundings of Vullpalleres is this apartment that perfectly combines comfort, warmth, excellent qualities and the convenience of being 300 meters from the Vullpalleres FGC station and the center commercial Vulpalleres. Composed of 3 bedrooms, 1 of them double and with a private bathroom, a large living-dining room with access to a terrace with unobstructed views and the pool area, ideal for summer lunches and dinners, a spacious, comfortable and bright kitchen and complete bathroom for common use. The house has a double orientation, so it has cross ventilation, giving one area of the apartment to the community area and the other to Ramon Más street itself. This house is in excellent condition, as can be seen in the photographs, you can move into without having to carry out works. With the sale of the apartment 2 parking spaces and two storage rooms are included. One of them of more than 11m2. Being almost new, the farm has an elevator, a large community recreation space with green areas, a playground and a swimming pool. From the first moment you enter the portal, you can see all the very careful details from the moment of its construction, because those of us who know the area know of the high construction quality that this building has had. Individual heating by natural gas with radiators in all its rooms, (heating through ducts in addition to radiators), ducted air conditioning, aluminum windows with double glazing, parquet floors, aluminum carpentry, ceramic hob, oven and extractor hood are some of the finishes that this property offers us. Regarding its location, it is worth noting its proximity to the Vallvidrera tunnels (only 3 minutes by car) or the exit to the c58-ap7, just 5 minutes by car.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Volpelleres, Sant Cugat del Vallès
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in mare de deu del roser

description: Reference: BEAUTIFUL APARTMENT FOR SALE IN CALLE MUNTANER AND CALLE VALENCIA The Finca is from the year 1900, has an elevator and is a first floor real height. Fantastic 66 m2 built apartment, it consists of a living-dining room with access to an area currently used as an office, an independent kitchen, it has 2 bedrooms, one of them double, both with wardrobes and 1 bathroom. We find parquet flooring, gas heating and ceiling fans in all rooms. Very well located near the Hospital Clínic, the Mercat del Ninot and all kinds of services and shops. The nearest metro is L5 - Hospital Clínic; Bus: 20-54-59-63-66-H10-N3-N7-N8-V13; Railways: L6/L7 - Provence. Do not hesitate to contact SH Barcelona for more information or to arrange a visit. '.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: L'Antiga Esquerra de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de Muntaner

description: Spectacular detached house in Penitents Engel & Völkers presents this wonderful property, just a few steps from the most privileged natural environment of Barcelona and at the same time very close to all the necessary services. It is a house to four winds of 1950 with more than 300 meters built and 240 meters of garden and terraces with swimming pool. The house is distributed in a very rational way, from a hall we access to the right, a large kitchen and dining room with access to the courtyard, to the left of the hall we find a living room and a bedroom. Going down the middle level we find a day floor with various spaces, a library, a study and another living room ideal for reading. At this same level we find a storage room. Through the stairs we ascend to the night area, where we will find 3 bedrooms all exterior and two bathrooms, one of the en suite rooms facing south. On the top level we find a large room with sea views, ideal for work area or a bedroom. At this level we have a washing area with solarium for laying. The property is in good condition, has gas heating, water softener, osmosis treatment, storage room, garage for 3 cars and everything you may need a family you want to live with in a village, but very close to all services of Barcelona. We will be happy to show you this fantastic house. Perfect location both close to the most emblematic mountain in Barcelona and the city, the Collserola National Park is the place of choice for athletes and nature lovers. Vallcarca and Penitents, especially above the Ronda del dalt, allows you to live with the quality of life that is a quiet environment and overlooking the landscape, the area is perfectly connected as it is next to exit 6 of the Ronda from Dalt, 10 minutes walk from the green metro line and a few meters from the bus stop. The area is characterized by its proximity to schools, kindergartens, a few minutes walk from the hospital Pere Virgili, one of the best public health centers in the city, the Quirón Hospital or the Delphi Clinic, among the reference private health centers, sports facilities, the emblematic Tibidabo Avenue.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Vallcarca i els Penitents, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: Beautiful appartment next to Passeig de Gràcia The useful area of the apartment is 189'10 m2 (constructed area of 210'85 m2). The apartment has a community elevator on the stair landing and a freight elevator with direct access to the interior of the apartment. The access to the farm has video surveillance cameras. It consists of the following current living spaces: hall, living room, gallery-dining room, master bedroom (21'20m2), 4 double bedrooms and 1 single bedroom ((7'95m2), a 2nd gallery attached to the dining room, 1 main bathroom (9'25m2), a toilet with two separate toilets, a kitchen with attached pantry (10'90m2), 1 storage room (3'50m2) with water connections and drain for washing machine, and a central corridor of 1.40 m wide. The situation of the hall, with access from the stairwell and the elevator, allows the division of the apartment into two areas, one for housing and the other for professional office, as has already been done in other floors of the same building. The apartment has a main facade to Gran de Gracia street (east facade) and a rear facade to Riera de San Miguel street (west facade). The apartment has the services of water, natural gas (boiler for AC and heating), electricity and telephone. The entire floor, except the kitchen, the main bathroom and the two galleries, has the original flooring from the beginning of the 20th century, with small-format hydraulic tiles, making colored drawings, different for each space. Ceilings in all rooms with geometric pattern plaster moldings. Ceiling height: 3'20 m. The entire apartment is freshly painted, with the walls and ceilings in very good condition. The apartment has the corresponding Certificate of Habitability and the relevant Energy Certificate. The farm has the mandatory ITE. Building located at the end of Paseo de Gracia, that is, at the beginning of Gran de Gracia street and therefore located in front of the Hotel Casa Fuster, 5 * great luxury. Farm with 12 neighbors and located 50m from the SABA public parking, bus and metro.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Vila de Gràcia, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Bright and spacious flat with community area In the residential and exclusive neighborhood of Pedralbes, in the upper area of Barcelona, we find this magnificent property, surrounded by nature, top-level sports clubs, and prestigious international schools and training centers. We must also take into account the easy communication with the center of Barcelona and the airport, a fact that makes this neighborhood idyllic for families and people who want to enjoy the tranquility without neglecting the comforts of the city. A sophisticated stately entrance gives us access to the house, from where we are welcomed by a large hall with a wardrobe, currently used as a living room. Next we find ourselves in the majestic living room, divided into two spaces that are separated by two noble rows of wooden bookcases. Presiding over this unique room we have a fireplace that gives it even more warmth and a feeling of comfort. The living room is a very bright space thanks to the windows that lead you out to the magnificent and large terrace. Through an elegant corridor we reach the night area, made up of two enviable master suites, with full bathrooms, spectacular and unobstructed views of the mountain, and one of them with its own fireplace. Completing this area we have a full bathroom, and a third bedroom, large and with a private terrace with views of the renowned Pedralbes monastery. The house has a service area, with a separate entrance, its own bathroom and a spacious room. It also consists of the kitchen, functional and large, the pantry and the private water area. The property has as an added value a large and enjoyable garden area, a community pool, two storage rooms and two parking spaces in the same building. The privileged district of Pedralbes is a residential area very demanded for who seeks security and tranquility, and be surrounded of areas green, with all type of public transport. Here we find all the schools of international renown such as St Peter ́s, St. Paul ́s, Zürich Schule, Benjamin Franklin, and the Lycée Français among others and likewise public and private universities such as UB, UPC, ESADE and IESE. At the same time at the level of leisure are here located the exclusive the Royal Polo Club and the Royal Tenis Club of Barcelona.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Pedralbes, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Spectacular flat in the centre Engel&Volkers is pleased to present this beautiful property in the heart of the city centre. Upon entering, a large and bright entrance hall divides the day area from the night area. To the right a guest toilet, to the left, a beautiful kitchen, very bright, with large windows and direct access to the balcony, has space for table and chairs, for the day to day. In front of the hall, a large door separates us from a large living room very bright, thanks to its large windows, which give access to the large balcony. The night area is to the left of the entrance hall, a hallway leads us first to a bedroom on our left, followed by a room that is used as a laundry area, and then a large bathroom with bathtub. To the left, a large bedroom with access to the balcony, and finally a bedroom suite, with a large bathroom and also with access to the balcony. A 2002 building, parquet floor, high quality materials, with 2 parking spaces, between the Central Market and La Rambla. All this makes it a unique and exclusive property. Do not miss the opportunity to visit it. Between the Central Market and the emblematic Rambla, this property has the privilege of being in a privileged location in the city. Just a stone's throw from the Town Hall square and all public transport. Shops, cafés, restaurants and all kinds of leisure facilities are to be found in this area, as well as schools and medical centres. Living with all the comforts of being in the centre of a city like Sabadell, a city very well communicated with Barcelona by train, bus or road.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Centre, Sabadell
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Spacious and bright apartment in Sant Gervasi Engel & Völkers presents this wonderful property in perfect condition to move into, which enjoys wide spaces, great light and double orientation in a well-kept building with a landscaped entrance. Generous hall that leads to a spacious living room with access to the terrace currently about 7m2. The other half of the terrace was covered to incorporate it into the bedroom. This part of the house is oriented to South-East. In the night area we find three bedrooms. The main room has an en-suite bathroom with a shower and a fantastic dressing room -previously it was a fourth room that could be recovered- in an independent area with views of Tibidabo. The other two bedrooms, one of them very spacious and exterior and the other facing the interior patio, share a comfortable bathroom with a bathtub. On the other side of the apartment and with views of Tibidabo there is a complete kitchen-office and service area with its own bathroom (now unused). It also has a practical laundry room. All rooms are exterior to a pleasant block patio. Farm with elevator and freight elevator. Service entry. Well located, quiet and with all the necessary services and communications in a magnificent area of Barcelona. he location of this property is privileged, in the neighborhood of Sant Gervasi-La Bonanova, one of the best areas of Barcelona where we can find a multitude of shops, both local and high standing, as well as a wide gastronomic and leisure offer from quality. In the vicinity of the apartment there are several prestigious colleges and universities, as well as top-level sports centers. As for communications by car, its proximity to important roads in the city makes it easy to enter and leave Barcelona, as well as moving from one part of the city to another. It also has very good connections by public transport, with the Catalan Railways and various bus lines.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Gervasi - La Bonanova, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Great renovated apartment in Turo Parc Located in one of the most prestigious streets in the area, we find this magnificent house of 300 m2 facing south, very bright and sunny. High floor, and renovated where its large day area stands out, with a library-dining room in 2 rooms with access to a large terrace. Large kitchen with the possibility of opening to the living / dining room thanks to a glass door. The kitchen also has a utility room and bathroom. In the night area, we find 3 rooms. The main one, whose views are the same as the living room, is completed with a large bathroom and built-in dressing room. The two remaining bedrooms, double and with built-in wardrobes, with a common bathroom and toilet, are located on the side of the apartment, on the other side of the large entrance hall. A parking space and storage room are included on the farm. Building built by the prestigious architect Mitjans. The properties of the Turó Parc district represent a perfect synthesis between elegance, prestige and comfort. It is about of one of the most demanded and exclusive areas of the city, by the set of buildings, shops and services it offers. The Turó Parc is the essence of the most sophisticated city of Barcelona, without losing at the same time purest dimension and the warmth of the neighborhood.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Gervasi - Galvany, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

address: Calle de la Mare de Déu de Núria
description: Spectacular 293m2 penthouse divided into two floors, completely exterior to 3 winds and beautiful views in Sarriá plane. It is a property that could perfectly be a tower. But it is an incredible penthouse in the heart of Sarriá with a beautiful day area with very high, double-height wooden ceilings and large windows with views of the entire city, Collserola and Tibidabo. The house has a first floor of 200m2 plus a 12m2 terrace at the foot of the living room. On this floor we find the day area made up of a large living room with a fireplace, a beautiful dining room with views of the city, a large hall, a kitchen with an office area and an outdoor utility area, 4 bedrooms (one of them en suite) and 3 bathrooms. The upper floor consists of 90m2 plus a 10m2 terrace where we find a living room, the main master-suite, a loft and the terrace. The property is completely exterior to three winds and enjoys incredible views of all of Barcelona, from Collserola and Tibidabo to the sea and the southern part of the city. It has a really warm light and is very calm, a practical and functional distribution and noble and very elegant finishes. An ideal complex for those looking for a spacious home, located in one of the most sought-after districts and perfectly connected to the city center and its exit. The farm is from 1980 of exposed brick and has parking; two seats included in the price plus two optional. Do not hesitate to contact us for more information or to arrange your visit!
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sarrià, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle de la Mare de Déu de Núria

description: COZY BEACH APARTMENT AT GAVA In the magnificent residential area of Gava Mar, just 80 meters from the beach, Engel&Volkers offers this modern and charming two-bedroom apartment recently renovated to create an open and light-filled space with a sunny south-facing terrace with views of the the swimming pool and the garden of a residential complex full of services: tennis, paddle tennis, soccer and basketball courts, ping-pong room, children's area and barbecue. Once we enter through the parking or the pedestrian access, an elevator takes us comfortably to the first floor, where this magnificent apartment is located, when we open the door we find the impressive view of the exterior garden full of trees and green areas and a large and modern day space, highlighting its modern office kitchen with a cheerful and colorful design where you can enjoy comforting moments with family and friends, inside the living room or on the large terrace where the sea breeze creates a very pleasant atmosphere. In the rest area we have two rooms, one of them large and exterior with access to the terrace and the other medium and perfect for children or guests. In addition, its possible to have a tourist license, which can be an interesting investment alternative. Whether as an investment, a second residence or a permanent beach home, this is a magnificent option for those who want to be near the sea and in one of the most sought-after areas of the Barcelona coast, close to the airport and well connected to all kinds of services. Gava Mar has traditionally been a place of residence and rest for successful national and foreign businessmen, artists and athletes. Due to its strategic location between Barcelona and Sitges, it is a perfect area to enjoy the best of the Catalan capital, living in a Mediterranean, sophisticated and very quiet environment, with an unbeatable quality of life. Gava Mar is the ideal place to enjoy the essence of Mediterranean life - informal but sophisticated - near the center of Barcelona, and at the same time in a paradise of lush nature and a mild climate, unbeatable views of the sea, pine forests and spectacular beaches. of golden sands. The distance to the center of Barcelona is about 20 minutes, through the C-32 motorway or the C-31 motorway. The Barcelona-El Prat International Airport is 10 minutes away. Prestigious international schools are located in the area, such as The British School of Barcelona, The British College of Gavà and the Lycée Français de Gavà and Bon Soleil, among others. We also find famous academies, such as the Sánchez Casal and Andrés Gimeno Tennis Schools, top-level sports facilities and gyms such as "David Lloyds", and we can enjoy numerous cultural events, exclusive restaurants and attractive shopping centers that complete the extensive offer of leisure and city services. Also fans of water sports will find their paradise in neighboring Castelldefels, equipped with the best locations for surfing, kite and windsurfing. For lovers of sailing, speed boating or yachting, the Port Ginesta and C.N. Garraf host all kinds of regattas and offer moorings with all the services to make your stay a luxurious break.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Gavà Mar, Gavà
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: The apartment is on the second floor of a historic building in the city of Barcelona that dates back to the late 1800's.  This 19th century building has been completely renovated, respecting the original grandeur, recovering wall markings and highlighting its entrance for carriages and a spacious interior courtyard. The lift was installed so that it does not alter the aesthetics of the building, inside a glazed structure at the back of the central courtyard.  The apartment is composed of a large living room - dining room that leads out to two balconies overlooking the street. In the sunny day area we find mosaic tile flooring, high ceilings and a semi-open plan kitchen linking directly to the living room. The apartment is equipped with central heating via gas radiators and air conditioning via air ducts.  In the night area, we find 2 spacious and quiet bedrooms with exposed wooden beams that make the space cosier and more welcoming. An en-suite bathroom, and a complete separate bathroom completes the layout of this apartment.  This would make a wonderful home for a single professional, a couple or a small family looking to enjoy Barcelona from a strategic location and live in a building with plenty of historic charm.  Please contact us today for further details or to arrange a viewing.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Gòtic, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Beautiful family apartment, approx. 200m2, spacious and in the heart of Sant Gervasi (between Galvany and Trestorres), located on a quiet street and on the 1st floor of a warm, very nice building with concierge service and parking. The property has about 200m2 and is made up of a square floor plan, with a practical and very comfortable distribution where the day and night areas are differentiated. The day area has a spacious living room with a fireplace and large windows that overlook a quiet street, facing south. The kitchen is spacious and is connected to the dining room. In the night area we find 4 bedrooms, two of which are en-suite with a large dressing room and full bathroom. One of them also has access to a pleasant and quiet balcony. The two double bedrooms open onto a block patio and are north facing. The other two bedrooms are individual and open onto a patio. The house has a spacious, elegant and comfortable entrance hall that distributes and articulates the two areas for day and night. The property also has a second service access. The farm is beautiful, it is very well cared for and it is really warm. It has a concierge service and a very nice and comfortable entrance. It has two parking spaces that are not included in the price, for a value of €60,000. The area is ideal for families, quiet and at the same time with all services nearby, schools and well connected to the center, access to the city and all the emblematic green areas of the upper part of the city. We also have a parking space of very large dimensions which can be given different uses, such as family gatherings and games room and a staircase that connects us to the garden. The house is oriented towards the sea which gives us plenty of natural light and gives us spectacular views of most of the city. Excellent location in the residential area Albarrosa. description: Dream house a few minutes from Barcelona Engel & Voelkers presents this spectacular 347sqm house with a 1159sqm plot, completely renovated in 2022. This magnificent property has 3 double bedrooms on the first floor, a full bathroom with shower and bathtub in a modern style and high-quality finishes in microcement and with LED lighting through home automation. On the same floor we find the American kitchen with (new) Miele appliances integrated in the kitchen, with osmosis and softened water, with a microcement finish and natural wood parquet flooring; the breakfast section hidden among the built-in furniture is striking. The large adjoining room will delight the cohabitants, since it is very spacious and ends in a corner with an exclusive spacious circular dining room closing this space. We can go out to the garden area with a table and a saline pool both from the dining room and from the central corridor through the climalit-type aluminum doors. All doors and windows have integrated mosquito nets. Going up the modernist-style stairs, we access the Master Suite on one side with a bathroom and dressing room integrated in it, whose design and luminosity make this room break with the straight finishes, embellishing the room even more if possible. Then we access another multifunctional room with a groundbreaking design, which can serve both as a room with a dressing room in the back, as well as an office with storage space, etc. On the ground floor of the building, accessible from the main entrance, we find a large garage, and a space as large as the dining room on the first floor, where we can establish from a cinema room, a gym or a cellar where we can celebrate parties with friends. and relatives. In the interior garage there is room for 3 cars and in the interior patio of the house 2 more cars. This fantastic property has 4 different garden spaces that surround the entire house and whose maintenance and care is very easy to carry out, since it is high quality artificial grass. This magnificent house is located 5 minutes by car from the town of Corbera, it also has a bus stop a few minutes from the property. Access to the main highways and ring roads (A2, B-23, B-24) is about 18 minutes away, so in just over 30 minutes you can access the city of Barcelona, the airport or the nearby beaches. with the advantage of living in a dream house, surrounded by nature and fresh air. Corbera de Llobregat, in the Baix Llobregat region, is known for attracting numerous families from all over the world every year at Christmas to enjoy the emblematic living nativity scene in the middle of nature. This population is well communicated and various routes can be taken through the nature that surrounds it. Do not miss the opportunity to see this incredible property!

Included in the price are a small storage room and two parking spaces that can accommodate up to three cars. It is worth mentioning that the garage has direct access to the property via a private lift, which leads to all floors, and through a cosy private entrance hall. The house is in an excellent and unbeatable state of conservation, as it has been completely refurbished with high quality finishes and an exquisite and warm style. The carpentry is aluminium, with double glazing, parquet floors, air conditioning and gas heating. The property's blinds and exterior awnings are motorized and there is a complete alarm system. address: subdistrict La Nova Esquerra de l'Eixample
description: Cozy apartment sited near to Francesc Macià In the Eixample neighbourhood and a few minutes from Plaça Francesc Macià, we find this cozy two-bedroom apartment. It is located in an enviable location, surrounded by essential shops, multiple leisure and gastronomic leisure options, several public transport options, and very close to the famous La Illa Diagonal shopping center.  Its location makes it easy for us to get out of Barcelona as it is very close to one of the main road arteries of the city and, at the same time, it also allows us to enjoy various green areas such as Turó Parc. We place this splendid apartment in a royal building with an elevator. This is composed of a large hall that perfectly separates the night area from the day area. We find a functional open kitchen with all panelled appliances, making it a very elegant space. Next we come to the living-dining room, very open and with lots of natural light thanks to the large windows overlooking the wide Sarrià avenue. On the other hand, the night area is made up of a complete bathroom with a shower tray, a single room with an exterior window to a patio, and a large double room which has an exit to a charming gallery open to block patio currently enabled as a water area. Eixample symbolizes the elegance of Barcelona. Its network of octagonal blocks is considered a masterpiece of urban planning. In addition, it is said that its designer, Ildefons Cerdà, is the father of urbanism. Some of the most outstanding architectural works of Gaudí's Catalan modernism and its contemporaries are found in these tree-lined residential streets.  However, until the end of the 19th century, this area was full of fields, factories and mills. Barcelona was a city overcrowded and drowned between walls. When these walls fell, the Eixample was born. The old industrial areas were demolished as the city grew. The few structures that survived were redesigned and reconverted. Sharing the patio with this outstanding residential project, is a restored original flour mill that has become a classic example of brick architecture of the time. Barcelona elites began to build their wonderful buildings in the right part of the Eixample district at the end of the 19th century. Today, the rehabilitation of this area is in full swing with new pedestrian areas, new shops and new life.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Nova Esquerra de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Spectacular Blue Infinity Villa in Teia Elegance, privacy and comfort are combined with wonderful panoramic views of the sea in this magnificent home. We access this fantastic Villa at 4 winds through a majestic entrance door, giving us access to the bright living room with direct access to the porch, which through its motorized glass wall, merges interior and exterior, giving space to outdoor life and the fantastic microclimate of the Maresme. The living room also has a dining area, which leads to an elegant designer kitchen with a central island, double oven and high-quality materials. On this floor we also find a courtesy toilet, a suite and a room / office. A beautiful staircase with a glazed side, leads us to the night area, where the master suite is located, with a dressing room, an integrated bathroom with a shower and access to a large terrace with a Jacuzzi. Two more bedrooms, currently separated by a sliding door, and a bathroom are also part of this second floor. The basement has: cinema room, service room with bathroom, panic room, gym, laundry and ironing room, machine room, large storage room / pantry, and designer parking with space for two cars. The outdoor area has an infinity pool, Jacuzzi and a fireplace at ground level, so that even the cooler nights do not prevent you from enjoying that moment of relaxation. It should be noted that the house has an elevator, external and internal surveillance system, centralized aspiration system, water and air purification system, among other exclusive features. For more information, contact us now! Located in the municipality of Teià, this extraordinary villa is placed in Sant Berger, one of the best urbanizations with private surveillance of the entire Maresme coast and only 5 minutes walk from the town center. In the same Urbanization we have the Barcelona-Teià Tennis Club, with tennis, paddle and pitch & putt facilities. If you like outdoor activities and breathe fresh air in the mountains, you can enjoy the Serrelada of the Litoral Park, for horse riding, hiking or just doing sports in pure nature. If you prefer the beach, you can enjoy the beautiful beaches of El Masnou or Premià de Mar and its marinas. Teià is very well connected 25 minutes from the center of Barcelona by car on the C-32 or the N-II, by train with a stop at Ocata station - Line R1 of Rodalies and by Bus Line C-8 Teià- Barcelona.

On the upper level, the open space at the top of the stairs is ideal for locating a reading or office area, being flooded with natural light and enjoying views out to sea. description: HOME ADVISORS offers you this exclusive FULLY RENOVATED PENTHOUSE IN FINCA REGIA in Barcelona, specifically in l'Antiga Esquerra de l'Eixample. The house has 130m² built on a sixth exterior floor, with magnificent views of Carrer Enric Granados and Carrer València and plenty of natural light. This is distributed in a spacious living-dining room, a modern equipped American kitchen open to the dining room, 2 double bedrooms with a dressing room and a complete en-suite bathroom with a shower, a single room that can be used as an office as it is glazed and is very bright. , a full bathroom with a bathtub and a toilet. The apartment also has balconies with magnificent views. It has air conditioning throughout the house through ducts with a hot and cold pump. The materials that have been used in the reform of the apartment are of the highest quality and the finishes are luxurious (parquet flooring, double-glazed aluminum windows, wooden doors, electrical appliances, taps, toilets,. ). The building has a large terrace for the use of the neighbors. The house does not have a parking space, but a few meters from the farm there is the possibility of acquiring a parking space. Plaça Francesc Macià is a few minutes walk away. Nearby we find a diversity of transport such as metro stations (L5 Hospital Clínic), buses (TMB, AEROBUS), a multitude of services such as hospitals (Clínic de Barcelona and Sagrat Cor), schools, universities, children's areas, shops and gyms. L'Antiga Esquerra de l'Eixample is a residential area with a high concentration of services that is characterized by a great commercial dynamism, activities and leisure. The neighborhood consists of large city facilities such as the Clinical Hospital and the University of Barcelona. Other points of attraction are "El Mercat del Ninot" and the quiet street "Enrique Granados" with a wide range of restaurants. In addition, this neighborhood adjoins the Dreta de l'Eixample where the main shopping streets of Barcelona are located, such as La Rambla, Paseo de Gracia and Plaza Universidad. Take advantage of this opportunity.

One of the walls maintains the original stone, which gives the property a rustic and cozy touch.  The property has two exterior and bright double bedrooms: the main room with an en-suite bathroom and a bedroom with two single beds.  The kitchen and dining room are a very important space in the house and are located in the central part. The kitchen is semi open to the living room and integrated into the dining room. description: Lucas Fox presents this 87m2 apartment in Eixample Right. On the 3rd floor of a well maintained building we find this fully renovated gem composed of 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, an open plan fully equipped kitchen and a spacious living/dining room.  Upon entering the apartment we walk into a cozy hallway that separates the night area on the left, from the day area on the right. The night area is composed of 3 bedrooms, 2 overlooking the street and 1 facing an interior courtyard. In the apartment there is a total of two bathrooms, one of them en-suite.  If we continue down the hallway we reach a modern open plan fully equipped kitchen. The day area is very spacious and bright. It leads to a gallery area with floor to ceiling windows that allow optimal natural light into the space throughout the day. This is the perfect place to enjoy a nice coffee in the morning or a nice dinner with friends or family at night.  The apartment is equipped with air conditioning and heating via airducts.  A practical laundry room completes the property. It must be pointed out that only high quality materials were used during the renovation and the current owners paid close attention to every single detail. Wooden flooring, fully equipped kitchen, modern minimalistic style and, most importantly, the preservation of original features such as exposed wooden beams, catalan vaulted ceilings and exposed brick walls. The apartment is definitely a beautiful blend of modern and homey.

description: Cozy single-family house in Sant Cugat del Vallès, in the Floresta neighborhood, located near Barcelona and the Collserola Natural Park. This house is a perfect place to escape from the hectic city life and enjoy the tranquility and natural calm that trees offer. From its magnificent location, you will enjoy the most beautiful views; nature and silence will be your companions every day. It has 4 bedrooms, a bright living room with a fireplace, this is the perfect house to gather family and friends. The burning fireplace illuminates the living room that connects to the kitchen, 2 bathrooms and an open kitchen that will make you feel like you are the master of ceremonies in your own home. If you are looking for tranquility and comfort when you get home, this is the best choice you can make. From the window of your room you can observe the natural beauty of the landscape with its forests. This house is a dream come true for those looking for a quiet place. The outdoor space is ideal for enjoying delicious meals outdoors: it also has an outdoor laundry room and a closed garage. With its silence and its trees, this house will become your little oasis every time you come home.

description: If you want to escape from the city, but without giving up first class finishes, comfort and excellent communication with the capital of Barcelona, this is your opportunity. With a design that provides a feeling of spaciousness and light in every corner and its large open spaces, this house offers us a functional and avant-garde design in the midst of a natural environment. On the access floor from the street, we have a large multipurpose room with access to a large terrace, also a courtesy bathroom and communication with the garage with capacity for three cars. At garden level, what would be the -1 floor seen from the street, we find a designer kitchen together with a living-dining room from which we can go directly to the pool and a beautiful recreational space with artificial grass, Teak, and views of the forest. On this floor we also have three double bedrooms, two full bathrooms and an exclusive suite with a dressing area and a full bathroom. The lower floor is divided into two large multipurpose rooms of 112 m² and 78 m² respectively, which could be a games room, a music studio, a home cinema or a GYM, for example. This spectacular house is located a few minutes by car from both Sant Cugat and Barcelona. The neighborhood is located in a residential area within the Sierra de Collserola natural park. It is a very quiet area, surrounded by tranquility and nature and at the same time very well connected with two important urban centers: Sant Cugat and Barcelona. Both towns can be reached in less than 10 minutes by car and the FGC train station in 5 minutes.

It is a unique house on the ground floor, so they take the opportunity to store motorcycles and scooters inside the house. The entire space is without walls, but it has 3 easy-to-use sliding doors to convert the spaces into bedrooms, and in addition, the 2 entrances, from 2 different streets, allow the space to be distributed and changed at the whim of the owner. It is a versatile apartment, which is still a house with open spaces that surround a central axis, where there is a full bathroom with a bathtub, fitted wardrobes, and another toilet. All the rest is intelligently distributed on the four walls as boundaries, where the kitchen is, with high-end appliances and a high daily dining table with stool. Without losing the line, next to it there is a table that is used as a workplace. On the other side, we have the dining room, the library, and the living room, which is upstairs, taking advantage of the elevation of the bedroom, which is accessed by wooden stairs. Therefore, it has 3 levels, which take the flat out of monotony, and turn it into a dynamic and attractive space. The architectural elements of this house, renovated in 2021, have recovered hydraulic mosaic floors with beautiful drawings, high exposed brick ceilings with Catalan volta, with elements of an industrial nature, double windows, each with double glazing and a air. The solutions to have a chillout sofa in the middle of the living room, which in a flash turns into a hydromassage bathtub. The hooks on the ceiling to store bicycles, and more surprises. All these unique decorative elements, appliances, televisions, lamps, all this exceptional furniture,.. . Everything is included in the sale price! description: Unique property in the eixample of Sant Cugat del Vallès. Talking about the Eixample de Sant Cugat is talking about tranquility, quality of life, and for many people it is talking about the best neighborhood in town. Without a doubt, these qualifications have been earned for having a strategic location within the communication of Sant Cugat, also for having a perfect combination between urban planning, green spaces and commercial life. And above all for a quality and constructive aesthetics in its buildings that over the years continues to be at the forefront. On this occasion we are pleased to present a house of almost 120m2, consisting of 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a large hall, separate laundry room and kitchen, and a spacious living-dining room with access to a terrace with enough space to set up a table for 8 people. The house has an elevator, parking space and a beautiful community area with a pool. Undoubtedly unique, a unique opportunity to live on a ground floor and in a privileged and quiet enclave. Do not hesitate to contact our real estate agents to receive more information about this property.

description: Spectacular house in Can Mates - Central Park - Colonia Oller One of the most unknown jewels for many in Sant Cugat is hidden in plain sight, we are talking about Colonia Oller, a residential neighborhood bordering Central Park, Can Matas and Arxiu. Outstanding for its open spaces, intimacy, tranquility and above all its beautiful houses, this neighborhood offers us to be close to the center of Sant Cugat without giving up a quiet environment. Just about 100 meters from the beginning of the Parc Central neighborhood is this house, a four-story house built at the beginning of the new millennium in which no detail was spared. With 490m2 of housing built on a plot of 650m2, this property offers us 6 double bedrooms, one of them with a beautiful en suite design bathroom and another bathroom for private use for the other two bedrooms, independent kitchen, office with central peninsula and breakfast room, with independent laundry room, and a huge living room of 60m2 with direct access to the garden that surrounds the entire property, completely flat and with a beautiful swimming pool in perfect condition and functioning. It also has a large garage with capacity for 3 covered cars and as many uncovered, a multi-purpose room ideal for a cinema room, games room or any other purpose of use and finally in this basement floor we have a room ideal for use as a storage room, or cellar. To mention all the qualities of this house would be endless in this description but some that could be highlighted are: natural gas heating with radiators in all rooms, aluminum windows with double glazing, ceramic and marble floors, electric blinds in some rooms, completely renovated kitchen, design suite bathroom, much energy saving thanks to its great orientation that makes it a warm house in winter and cool in summer. Last but not least, on the 2nd floor we only have one room, but it is really impressive as it is completely diaphanous from end to end, and has a lot of light, spectacular views, a very intimate sun terrace and having a floor medio with the living room and kitchen (the most social part of the house) makes this attic area very quiet and peaceful, ideal for telecommuting or setting up an office. With regard to the location, its proximity to the Mirasol FGC, as well as the quick exits to the main highways and freeways of the regional city, should be noted.From the house you will have a direct connection with Barcelona in just 15 minutes through the tunnels of Vallvidrera.

description: Unique and exclusive opportunity in Volpalleres. The "Masía Can Bellet" development in Culmia was undoubtedly one of the most prestigious buildings in the Volpalleres neighbourhood, providing quality, excellent finishes, comfort without sacrificing proximity to all services, since it was built in one of the few Plots available 200 meters from the FGC Volpalleres station. Therefore, we consider that, after its sales success in the past that very few were able to take advantage of, the presentation of this house with only months of use represents an opportunity to get hold of one of the most coveted apartments in Sant Cugat del Valles. As we enter we are greeted by a spacious hall that perfectly divides the night area from the day area, locating to our left the corner part of the apartment where the living-dining room is located with direct access to the terrace with views of Av. can bellet and we also find a fully equipped independent kitchen with double access, both from the living room and from the hall. In the distributor of the night area we will find the accesses to the 3 bedrooms, all exterior and one of them double with a private bathroom and there is also a bathroom for common use. Naming the qualities of this apartment would be impossible in a simple text, it really is one of those homes that are worth seeing and enjoying every detail such as its intensive use laminate flooring with an oak finish, double-glazed windows with thermal break, carpentry solid wood interior, natural gas heating with radiators in all rooms and ventilation by heat recovery, this allows the house to be ventilated without losing heat very efficiently, in addition the gas boiler is supported by solar thermal so that it does not consume as much gas and be more ecological, these details are the ones that got the A label on their energy efficiency certificate. It also has a cold and heat pump through a conduit. It also has smart, high-security mailboxes for parcel reception and access doors to the community linked to the my home app, to be able to open and close them from the mobile application. Regarding its location, it is worth noting its proximity not only to the FGC of Volpalleres but also to the Vallvidrera tunnels (only 3 minutes by car) or to the exit to the C58-AP7 which are only 5 minutes by car.

description: property m² house located in a brick building from 1962 with a garden area at street level, a spacious lobby and concierge service, as well as a separate entrance for the service. It is located in the elegant neighbourhood of Tres Torres, which is very well connected and close to international schools and all amenities.  The apartment, renovated in 2009, has an elegant and modern wide-slat natural oak floor throughout the property, lacquered doors, motorized blinds in the day area, hot-cold air conditioning by split, heating by radiators with boiler individual, kitchen with original furniture, office area and Gaggenau appliances.  A spacious entrance hall with a wardrobe welcomes us at the entrance, which opens onto the spacious and very sunny living room - dining room with three rooms. The cozy 46 m 2 living room, with a fireplace, is divided into two rooms: one more social for meetings in the sofa area and another with a desk. For its part, the spacious dining room has access to the 12 m 2 terrace with sofas, ideal for enjoying a coffee with exterior views thanks to its southeast orientation. On the other hand, the large kitchen is partially renovated, preserving the original wooden furniture. It has an office area and a semi-open area for ironing and pantry. Next to the kitchen, we find the exterior gallery for the utility area and facilities. In addition, the service entrance is parallel to the main access.  The day area and night areas are clearly divided. A corridor and a hall with a built-in wardrobe leads to three exterior double bedrooms. First, we find two exterior double bedrooms with built-in built-in wardrobes that share a complete bathroom with a shower; Then, the master suite, which has a generous wardrobe and a full bathroom with a bathtub and shower.  A rotating parking space on the building and a storage room in the basement complete this magnificent property, making it an excellent opportunity for families who want a spacious, functional and comfortable apartment with a charming outdoor space. Contact us for more information or to arrange a visit.

description: Spectacular apartment in one of the best neighborhoods of Sant Cugat del Valles. Coll Favá is in Sant Cugat the perfect representation of living in the center of town but without giving up modern buildings, with good finishes and modern comforts. On this occasion we exclusively present you a 4-bedroom home, without a doubt, the most sought-after type of property today, ideal for those who telework and want to set up an office at home. It also has a spacious living-dining room with direct access to a balcony and unobstructed views that will never be covered. As for the kitchen, it is totally independent, with enough space to install a table and use it as an office kitchen. There are two bathrooms, both complete and in perfect condition. One of the most relevant characteristics of this house is undoubtedly its luminosity, since throughout the day it is bright, which gives it a lot of comfort and provides great energy savings and during a large part of the day it is also directly exposed to the sun, giving it a lot of energy. warmth. Naming all the characteristics of this house would be as difficult as unfair in a text, since it would be best to discover them in person, however some of them should be highlighted, such as that it has natural gas heating with individual radiators in all rooms, not It has air conditioning since, thanks to its orientation and distribution, cross ventilation is generated that provides an ideal temperature all year round, the interior carpentry is made of solid wood and the aluminum windows with climalit double glazing, the floors have been changed recently and are made of parquet with intense use. The house has a double parking space for 2 cars and a motorcycle included in the price. Regarding its location, we have the Sant Cugat Renfe station just 2 minutes walk away, the Sant Cugat FGC station just 10 minutes away and the Vollpalleres station 5 minutes away. Also for those who use private transport, 5 minutes away is the exit to the Vallvidrera tunnels and the C-58 and AP7. description: Lucas Fox is pleased to present this magnificent 610 m² detached house. The property consists of four floors.  We access the ground floor from the porch and we find a large entrance hall that leads to the living room with a fireplace and large windows that give a lot of natural light and give us access to the terrace. From the living room we access the living-dining room that also has large windows that give us access to the terrace. From the living-dining room, we can access a large fully equipped kitchen diner connected to a corridor that leads to a double bedroom with a full bathroom and returns to the main entrance hall.  From the main entrance hall, there is a large fully glazed staircase that leads to the first floor that houses the night area. From a large entrance hall with access to a large terrace, we access the first wing consisting of the master suite with a dressing room and a complete bathroom with a hydromassage bathtub and access to the terrace. The entrance hall also leads to the second wing consisting of a corridor that leads to two bedrooms that share a large bathroom with a hydromassage bathtub.  From the entrance hall on the first floor, we access a 62 m² loft, consisting of a large living room/library with access to a terrace and a bedroom with a full bathroom.  From the ground floor, going down the stairs, we find a large entrance hall on the lower ground floor. From the entrance hall we can access a complete bathroom, a machine room, a laundry and ironing room, a large living room with a fireplace and a wine cellar and an 81 m² garage with storage space and parking for four cars.  All floors are connected by an lift.  The property has a swimming pool, illuminated gardens and automatic irrigation.  The property was built with the highest quality materials in 1999. It has gas heating by radiators and has split air conditioning in the living room, master suite and attic.  Contact us for further information. We will be happy to coordinate a visit.

It has adapted access to the entire floor of the house, where we find: the porch, the hall, a large kitchen with access to the pool, a living-dining room with large windows, a bathroom with a shower and four bedrooms (one of them en-suite with full bathroom), all with impeccable quality and taste. The entire plant has gas heating and air conditioning. On the first floor we find a genuine apartment with independent access, with sloping ceilings and full of architectural elements worthy of the best craftsman. We have an open-plan à la carte day area, with kitchen and bathroom; and in the night area a double bedroom, dressing room and semi-open shower tiled with modernist paving from Paseo de Gracia. Our three-storey four-way tower, for multipurpose use, with the best views of Montserrat, Mola, Montseny, Tibidabo and the Garraf mountain range. Place, housing and views of a unique home of great category.

The building has a communal chailout area with a barbecue for the use and enjoyment of the neighbors with a view of Barcelona. The loft is on the first floor with an area of 300 m2 made up of four different and differentiated spaces. The first space that we find as soon as we enter is the night area made up of a large 50 m2 dining room where we find the living room with a large movie screen and a dining area with a large table to eat with friends and guests with details such as ceilings more than 5 meters high with preserved wooden beams and all the windows where they face the street, the American kitchen with a large space with a small bar to be able to have small breakfasts or chats as the guests while cooking. From the dining room there is access to a corridor where we find a complete bathroom for the guests and the secondary room and a large laundry space as an area for machines and space to store things, continuing down the corridor we find the second room and the main room with its bathroom, from the corridor you can access the study and vogue area or you can also access from the main hall of the building to the study of a 40 m2 space from where you go down some stairs and find the choco or cellar a space to have dinners or meetings and also a small courtesy bathroom. It is a modern loft full of spaces and details such as a window where you can see a well-kept Romanesque staircase. Live and work in the center of the city of Barcelona in the heart of the Gothic.

description: In the Sant Gervasi-Galvany area we present this property of 124m2 built according to cadastre, of which 98 m2 belong to the house. The house is located on a fourth real floor, highlighting its distribution, where the day area differs from the night area and its luminosity, since it overlooks the street and a large block patio. In the day area we find a large, very bright living-dining room with access to a south-facing balcony, an independent equipped kitchen and utility area, and in the night area, three bedrooms, two doubles, one single and two bathrooms, one with a bathtub and the other with a shower tray. It has heating by radiators, air conditioning, parquet flooring, fitted wardrobes and aluminum exterior carpentry with double climalit glazing. The farm offers a lift and porter service. The neighborhood offers all kinds of services; restaurants, shops and housing is close to the FFCG de Gracia stop and Plaça Gal·la Placidia.

description: Fantastic renovated apartment in Sagrada Família This fantastic flat, sober and elegant, in the central district of the Sagrada Familia, is located next to Av. Gaudí, one of the best streets in Barcelona. It is a house of 108 sqm built, approx. 10 sqm of balcony, completely renovated with high-end materials in 2018. The property is very spacious, facing southeast, one of the sunniest, and consists of three double rooms and two bathrooms. The master bedroom is a fantastic ensuite with a very well designed fitted wardrobe, the other double bedroom has access to a very complete walking wardrobe room and the third bedroom is also generous in size. An open kitchen equipped with integrated Siemens brand appliances serves as a prelude to the spacious living room and dining room where we also have a small office table. Beautiful high-quality PORCELANOSA porcelain floor, heating by designer decorative radiators, German WOLF boiler, split air conditioning, ROCA bathrooms, high-quality PVC CORTIZO enclosures, complete closet as a washing and drying area, with sink included, indirect led light in the whole flat and it's dimmable in the living room and the dinner room which make life more comfortable and convenient in this special and unique home. Modern building from 1980 with elevator, facade and entrance hall rehabilitated with a parking space in the same building which is accessed through the same elevator (Big parking space not included in the purchase price valued at €30,000). The Sagrada Família is part of the Eixample district of Barcelona, with all the proximity services. Public transport, educational and hospital centers, commerce and environment. A highly valued, comfortable and central area.

description: FANTASTIC FLOOR 3 IN MANDRI We present this beautiful and stately home located in one of the most prestigious streets in the upper area, Mandri street. In a beautiful exposed brick building in perfect condition with a landscaped entrance, and with two large elevators. Upon entering we find a large hall that distributes the apartment into its two large areas. The day room, with a living room with three rooms, a living area, a reading/office area with a fireplace, and a dining room. It has access to a large terrace well oriented to the south, so light and sun can be enjoyed all year round. Next, a magnificent fully equipped kitchen next to its service area to attend to domestic tasks, and its toilet. In the night area, we find a first room, currently converted into a living area, two spacious individual rooms with their built-in wardrobes, one of them en suite, and the master suite, of considerable dimensions and very well distributed, has a dressing area, and with a large bathroom, as well as exterior views. It offers high-quality finishes, as well as new double-glazed aluminum enclosures, individual heating, new electrical installation, hardwood parquet, a large number of closets in all its rooms. , air conditioning and ceiling fans. It is sold with a large parking space and has a morning porter service from Monday to Friday. Undoubtedly, a great opportunity offered by Singular Properties, in this well-known Barcelona street in the upper area.

description: In the Pedralbes area near the Real Club Barcelona tennis we present this beautiful exclusive apartment near Cervantes parks as well as the Palacio Real gardens. With large windows where a wonderful light enters and with access to its elongated 30 m3 terrace, from the living room we can go to a small office or directly through a corridor to the kitchen area with a service area with its bathroom and laundry room. kitchen, In the access corridor to the night area we find a courtesy toilet and a complete bathroom for two double rooms and one of them with a dressing room and double window, the main suite room has a dressing room, its own bathroom and an exit to a small terrace. The apartment has 2 parking spaces and two more optional and a garden area and a game or meeting room and a storage room. description: Magnificent apartment in Paseo Manuel Girona It is the first estate in Pedralbes, with a magnificent and large entrance hall with a circular space for car entry. The apartment that we present to you is a second floor, all renovated with excellent qualities, ready to move into with all kinds of details. It consists of 166m2 and a large, spacious and sunny terrace where you can distribute the rest area and table with 4 or 6 chairs. The floor is all exterior since it faces both sides. As for the finishes we have on the one hand the day area with a large hall with built-in wardrobes and very bright that leads us to the living room and dining room and from there direct to the kitchen, this is perfectly equipped with a 90 oven, Pando extractor, integrated Nespreso, paneled microwave and dishwasher with separate service door, all of high quality and comfort. In the next door there is a space for the water and ironing area, ideal for having the kitchen always collected. From the entrance on the left we go to the night area, just separated by a door would be the three spacious bedrooms, two of them en suite and the third with the bathroom opposite, also a space used for an office. The rooms apart from the spaciousness are very bright and with good views since the buildings are sufficiently separated. The entire apartment has natural parquet solid matt oak, as well as 2 parking spaces and a large storage room on the same building Located in a residential area with all services and within walking distance of the main accesses. Perfect location not only for the comfort 5' of Diagonal, but also for the proximity of international schools, the family life of the neighborhood, and the number of parks and shops that envelop the floor.

description: Completely renovated modern apartment In one of the most sought-after streets in Barcelona, next to Plaça Francesc Macià, this fantastic, completely renovated apartment is located. It is a very well preserved building with a large hall, two elevators and a concierge. The apartment consists of a large living room with an integrated kitchen and 3 bedrooms, one en suite, a double room and a single room. In addition to the two bathrooms, it has a laundry-storage area where there is a gas boiler and the connection provided for a washer and dryer. From the hall to the front we reach a bright living room with large windows and access to a very sunny balcony. A custom-made sofa has been placed in the living room. The room is semi open to the kitchen space. The distribution of the kitchen is an L, very spacious and has a large dining table integrated that extends to communicate with the living room. A very modern and very functional concept. The lighting has been very careful with beautiful sconces and indirect lights The house has been completely renovated with high quality materials and all new facilities. The flooring is natural oak parquet in all spaces except in the wet areas where porcelain stoneware has been installed. The kitchen cabinets are custom made and the countertops are white marble. The two large bedrooms also have custom built closets. The kitchen is fully equipped with fridge - freezer, oven, microwave, induction hob, extractor hood and built-in dishwasher. The windows are textured white aluminum and double glazed with a chamber. The main room has an adjustable blind. The apartment has two air conditioning systems, gas heating by radiators and hot/cold air conditioning in all rooms through ducts. Turó Parc it is one of the most demanded and exclusive areas of the city, for the set of buildings, shops and services it offers. The Turó ParK is the essence of the most sophisticated spirit, elegance, prestige and comfort of Barcelona, without losing at the same time the purest dimension and the warmth of the neighborhood. Very close to public transport and a few meters from Avenida Diagonal.

description: Beautiful apartment in Vallcarca Between Plaza Lesseps and Plaza Alfonso Comín, in a residential area with a community garden and pool, we find this beautiful property built in the seventies for those who wanted to live a few minutes from the city center but with the tranquility and advantages of a urbanization. Entering from the community area, we access the block in question, the building has an elevator and a spacious hall. Entering the apartment we find a distributor from which we access the very spacious living room on the right and with access to a beautiful terrace that has the perfect measurements to enjoy it and be able to eat outside. Returning to the hall, a wide corridor leads us to the four bedrooms, two doubles and two singles, one of which has a small terrace, the two bathrooms and at the end of it the kitchen with office and utility area. A beautiful property, very quiet and with a lot of privacy. Apartment located in a Community of Owners in the area of Vallcarca i Penitents in front of the Delfos Hospital. Very well connected to the commercial area of Gracia and schools. METRO: Line 3 (Vallcarca) BUS: 22.27, H2, H4, V17.
