description: Nice house in El Coll / Vallcarca Engel & Volkers presents the ideal house to move into, in the neighborhood of El Coll / Vallcarca, Gracia district. Upon entering the house we have the hall that gives us access to the office with windows to the street, and built-in shelves. Then we have a spiral staircase that leads to the cellar, (basement) which could also be a workshop or a fitness room with window to the street. After the hall we have a corridor that leads to the kitchen, fully equipped, with windows to the street and office area. Next we have a courtesy bathroom and in front, a single room with a large wooden closet and windows to the street. Then the large living room also with windows to the street and interior staircase, which gives access to the upper floor and parking for two cars and a motorcycle that has a bathroom and storage room. After the living room we have the suite with fitted closets, also windows to the street and a large bathroom with Jacuzzi and shower, with excellent marble finishes and in perfect condition. Through the stairs we access to the second floor, in the distributor there is a large wall with glass bricks that gives a lot of light to the house, on that floor there are two double bedrooms and a bathroom with bathtub, and a small room for storage. We also have on the same floor a living room with large window facing south that has natural light all day, and a nice terrace of 45 sqm with barbecue and a room for refrigerator. The whole house has aluminum carpentry very well preserved, and the bathrooms have excellent marble finish in perfect condition. The house is sold furnished. The property is located in the neighborhood El Coll / Vallcarca, on the hill of Coll at about 150 meters from sea level, is located on the corner of Tirso street with Font del Coll street, which belongs to the district of Gracia. A very nice and bright neighborhood due to the height that is located. The house is located at the foot of the Virolai School, and has very close to the metro station L5, El Coll, (approx 200 meters) also has buses lines 22 / 87 / 129. You can walk to one of the most important parks of Barcelona, work of Antoni Gaudi, Park Güell, one of the green lungs of Barcelona, and also has very close to the park of Creueta del Coll. El Coll is a quiet and pleasant neighborhood to live, very close to the property is the Church of Our Lady of Coll, from the eleventh century, which retains the central body and the bell tower. The neighborhood has all the services and stores, schools and kindergartens.

description: Exclusive duplex penthouse of 240m2 (including terraces), unique in the area, impeccable to move into, just two blocks from the Illa de Barcelona shopping center, as well as Avda. Diagonal. It is a perfect location, in a very quiet street with no traffic, with gardens, no noise and close to all kinds of public transport. A booming area surrounded by the best shops, services and restaurant and leisure offers. The property is built on the top floor of a building with an elevator, with a bright orientation. And it is distributed on two floors. On the ground floor we find a cozy hall, the dining room distributed in three rooms with large windows that overlook a quiet and bright Eixample-style block patio. A renovated office kitchen, with high-end appliances and a separate laundry area. And on this same floor we also find the main double room with a dressing room, a second large room with fitted wardrobes and two updated bathrooms with a shower. The upper floor, which is accessed through an internal staircase, consists of two spacious bedrooms with wardrobes, one of them with sloping ceilings, which share a charming sunny 8 m2 terrace, a complete bathroom also updated with a shower and a large Multi-purpose room such as living room, bedroom and/or playroom, totally exterior and bright, from which you can access the magnificent 35 m2 terrace of the house. The apartment has qualities such as parquet, air conditioning with a hot and cold pump, radiator heating, white lacquered interior carpentry, aluminum windows with double glazing, parquet and porcelain floors, a fully equipped designer kitchen and a parking space in the same building. Without a doubt, the perfect apartment to move into and enjoy with the family. ! Ask us for more information.

description: Duplex penthouse for sale with pool and terraces in Ripollet aProperties is pleased to market exclusively, this magnificent home that we present today. Spacious and bright duplex penthouse of 131 m2 and two sunny terraces (15m2 and 16m2) and with unobstructed views, totally exterior and south facing, located in one of the best areas of Ripollet and in a wonderful communal area with swimming pool and playground. We begin our tour on the second floor, finding the hall that separates the night area of the day, and shared in the same with a fantastic bathroom. The night area consists of two double and exterior bedrooms, one of them with fitted closets, and if we go to the day area first we find a spacious living room and dining room, from which we go out to the terrace where we will enjoy the sun all day. This same communicates with the modern, practical and fully equipped kitchen. Going up to the upper floor we find again two areas, on the one hand, we have the suite, which has a dressing room, space for a desk and a large integrated bathroom. And, on the other hand, we find an ideal space as a multipurpose room, family room, office or even with the option of adding a room and from which we go out to a nice terrace / solarium from which we can see the communal area. The property is in perfect condition, has high quality finishes, gas heating radiators, air conditioning ducts, aluminum exterior carpentry with double glazing, security door and mosquito nets. The property includes two large parking spaces and a storage room in the same building. LOCATION: Located in a very quiet area, characterized by its proximity to an infinite number of services, schools, stores, health centers, bus stops.. . and very well located, it has excellent communications with the main access roads to Barcelona and surroundings. Do not hesitate to contact the expert team of aProperties Real Estate for the search of your new home, always efficient, close and professional.  .

Nice house with patio-garden at the entrance and 2 terraces facing the sea, very sunny.   The house is accessed from a very quiet pedestrian street as it is located in a private community of several houses.   The house is divided into three floors, on the ground floor we find an open-plan living-dining room, a large kitchen with a laundry area and a courtesy toilet.   On the second floor we have three bedrooms, one double and two singles, all with fitted wardrobes, as well as a full bathroom and the smallest of the 2 terraces.   On the third floor is the fourth bedroom with a full bathroom and a large level terrace from where you can see the sunrise.   The house is in good condition and has gas heating. This magnificent home is located in the best area of the Villa Olímpica, in a community where there are only semi-detached houses and pedestrian streets. description: Fabulous property located in the heart of the Gothic Quarter, on the emblematic Calle Petritxol, a few meters from Plaza del Pi and Las Ramblas. It is an elegant exterior apartment of 90 m2 located in a royal estate from the year 1780.    The property has been completely renovated maintaining and respecting original elements such as the wooden beams on the ceilings and the original mosaic floors combined with wooden parquet and polished concrete in the kitchen and bathrooms.    The result is an elegant, modern and cozy home. The building, which has a recently installed elevator, dates from 1780. It has passed the ITE (technical inspection of the building) and has been recently rehabilitated.    Open kitchen with high-quality electrical appliances, integrated next to the very pleasant living-dining room that enjoys two large balconies facing Petritxol street.    It is an ideal apartment both to live and to invest, since rented, it has a high profitability.  The apartment, thanks to its comprehensive rehabilitation of the entire building, combines the advantages of a new construction with original elements, which undoubtedly make this home a unique piece.    A great opportunity to acquire a unique home with spacious rooms and lots of light in one of the most popular areas of the Gothic quarter.    The area enjoys all the services, schools, markets such as La Boquería or Santa Catalina, shops and entertainment venues. The area is also very well connected by public transport, close to the L1 and L3 metro lines, and bus lines that cross the city.

description: Exclusive house for sale, in the Martinique-Ateneu neighborhood of Cerdanyola del Vallès. It is a 171m2 semi-detached house, built in 1985, with three winds, and distributed over three floors. The main floor consists of an independent kitchen, fully equipped and furnished, renovated a few years ago; of a toilet; and a 25 m2 living room with access to a 72m2 patio, where you can enjoy gatherings and barbecues with family and friends. The first floor consists of three double rooms, two of them with access to two terraces, one facing the front of the house and the other facing the back, all are exterior, very spacious and bright. And a newly renovated full bathroom. The ground floor consists of an open space of 55m2, which is currently used as a laundry area, gym, living room and parking. This space has exterior windows and can be adapted for multiple uses. It has a garden that starts at the front and runs around the left side to the rear. The house has ceramic floors, wooden windows, individual air conditioning, heating by natural gas radiators, and a large fireplace in the living room. The Martinique-Ateneu neighborhood is an exclusive residential neighborhood in Cerdanyola, very quiet, but close to access roads by car, public transport, educational centers, the Autonomous University of Barcelona, green spaces and parks, five minutes from La Collserola Natural Park and close to different shops. It is located near the Technology Park. If you are looking to live in a house 10 minutes from the city, but in a very quiet environment, call me and come visit it!

description: Beautiful single-family house, four-way corner, with garden, garage and pool, in the Mirasol area. The house, of 194 m2 built on a 404 m2 plot, is distributed over two floors, and has a total of 4 bedrooms (1 en suite, 2 doubles and one single), 2 full bathrooms, living room, kitchen with access to to the garden, storage room and a large garage independent of the main house, of 24 m2. The house is located in one of the quietest areas of Sant Cugat, 3 min from the AP-7 and 5 min from the General Hospital of Catalonia. It has motorized blinds, heating by gas radiators, air conditioning on both floors, and a beautiful 200 m2 garden with a beautiful pool.

description: Wonderful house with garden and pool in Pedralbes At the prestigious neighborhood of Pedralbes, the most exclusive residential area of Barcelona, and very close to international colleges, this wonderful house is located with an spacious garden and swimming pool in Barcelona. Built on a plot of more than 1,000 m² plot, counts with a floor area of 951 m² on four floors communicated through stairs and interior elevator. It has a lounge, dining room, nine bedrooms, eight bathrooms, two dressing rooms, kitchen, games room, 8 bathrooms, garage, cellar and zone qualified as disco. Marble floors, bathrooms with coatings of natural stone and completely equipped, furniture of kitchen, air conditioned, radiant heating, fireplace in the living room and alarm system. Located between the mountains of Collserola, just above Diagonal, and to the west of the city we can find the exclusive neighbourhood of Pedralbes. Its name derives from the historic Catalan words, "Pedres Albes" or white stones, which refers to the unique white stones from the Medieval Monastery. The atmosphere of the monastery seems to have infected the rest of the neighbourhood and its quiet streets. Pedralbes is a quiet residential neighbourhood without any high rise buildings. It is the area chosen by people looking for a quiet lifestyle whilst being as near to the city as possible. Numerous families choose this neighbourhood because of its proximity to the international schools in the city.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Pedralbes, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: BEAUTIFUL REFORMED VILLAGE HOUSE Engel & Völkers exclusively presents a unique semi-detached townhouse in Premià de Mar. This property was recently refurbished with excellent materials and finishes.  The house situated in a cul-de-sac street where one enjoys a fabulous tranquility has a garden of 80 m2 at the front with tiled floor and has a modern fence and gate. The entrance to the house is through an elongated entrance hall typical of village houses, and to the left is a very large bedroom and to the right is the lounge/dining room. To the left we then enter a hallway where we find the staircase leading up to the first floor, a complete bathroom and a storeroom, taking advantage of the stairwell. The kitchen is accessed from the dining room. At the back and with two entrances, one from the dining room and the other from the kitchen, there is a patio of about 30 m2 ideal for our summer dining room. On the first floor, to which we go up some very rustic stairs, there are three bedrooms, all of them very big. Also on this floor there is a bathroom, a laundry area and the access to a roof terrace which, due to its dimensions, can only be used as a storage room. The corridor of the first floor is wide, it is central and has a balcony and a large terrace with entrance at the end of this same corridor where the clothes are hung to dry. The house has high ceilings, gas heating, aluminium frames, white tiled floors. Premià de Mar is the second most populated city in the Maresme, it is located 23 kilometers from the center of Barcelona. The N-II highway runs along the coastal strip. It has extensive beaches with a large volume of sand. Next to them there are some walks, equipped with various exercises for athletes, with great width for walking and cycling. Premiá de Mar has a Mediterranean climate, summers are warm and winters are mild. Ideal to live!

description: Nice house for sale, Mirador of Sant Quirze Splendid house in the Mirador area in Sant Quirze, ready to enjoy with unbeatable views and built in 2007. The house has four floors with elevator access to all of them. It is surrounded by a beautiful patio with pool, barbecue, and terrace with awnings to enjoy a pleasant outdoor space. The ground floor is located at street level, has a hall that gives access to the kitchen and living room that has plenty of natural light and has access to the pool and barbecue area. The kitchen is very spacious with a table for the day to day, it is fully equipped and with access to the terrace. On the same floor, we find a courtesy toilet. On the first floor there are four double bedrooms and a small storage room in the hall, in addition there is a bathroom with tub and double sink. On the second floor, it is composed of a terrace on both sides and a complete suite with a dressing room, a very spacious bathroom with a bathtub and marble finishes. On the floor minus one we have a large garage for three cars, laundry area and storage room. Additionally the house has facilities such as fiber optic, disqualifier, gas heating and heat pump (cold / heat), marble floors, high security aluminum electric shutters, alarm system and all white lacquered doors, in addition to piped music. House very conveniently situated in a very quiet and private neighborhood, few minutes from the local downtown, away from the Railroad of the Generalitat de Catalunya and from the Parc de les Morisques. Close to all main services such as shopping centers (Alcampo), Cap, Bus Stops, Schools and easy access to AP7 and C58 freeways. Close to Sabadell and Sant Cugat.

description: Beautiful renovated house with great taste that invites you to relax with a wonderful 120m terrace perfect for enjoying the great climate of Barcelona. This property consists of 280m2 plus 120 terraces distributed in 3 heights and a basement, oriented to 4 winds. The main floor is very bright, it consists of an entrance hall, courtesy bathroom, large living room dining room with access to the terrace with wonderful views of Barcelona and the sea of 60 m2, and a splendid fully equipped kitchen open to the living room. On the first floor of 75 m2 there is a very bright double room facing south with beautiful views and a private bathroom and 2 double bedrooms that share a complete bathroom. All the bedrooms are exterior with lots of natural light. On the second floor is the 40 m2 master suite with a full bathroom and access to an impressive 60 m2 terrace with exceptional views of the sea and the city. The basement is a large garage and service room with bathroom, utility room and iron.

description: Great semi-detached house with 6 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, exterior, very bright, with quality and an annex apartment, located in the central area of Sant Felíu de Llobregat near the CAP, parks and gardens, schools, the municipal swimming pool and all public transport access.The The house is located on a residential street through which circulation is practically local and is distributed over three floors. The ground floor consists of a garage with an automated door and space for two cars, motorcycles and bicycles, as well as additional useful space, with the original Catalan vaulted ceiling and original exposed brick walls, a splendid patio made up of a garden fountain and plants, with capacity for a "chillout" area, family table, etc.In addition to a second home attached to the house by a wooden walkway and the outdoor patio itself, on this floor we also have a toilet, a pantry and a room.Through a staircase we access the second floor with parquet flooring, except the bathroom and kitchen with ceramic flooring, a hall and a large living-dining room with an aluminum window and home automation blinds with access to the apartment from the catwalk annex, a double room, kitchen-office with perfectly preserved wood finishes and with access to an exterior balcony, finally, a bathroom with shower.Following the stairs, the top floor offers us a double bedroom, a suite with an en-suite bathroom and a room with access to a beautiful outdoor balcony with capacity for a table for four, sun loungers, etc.Finally, the house attached to the house offers us two floors, currently used as a large room and an ideal room for visitors with ceramic floors.The house stands out for the great light it offers us, air conditioning in all rooms, duct ventilation and radiators.The excellent finishes of the construction together with the original curved windows and the privileged area in which it is located give us a magnificent house in Sant Feliu. description: Magnificent property with great privacy Engel & Völkers presents this fantastic property located in an environment of nature and privacy. Designed and built with high quality materials, a house practically on the ground to provide comfort and take advantage of its orientation and natural light. The original design of the property separates us from different areas to provide each of them with privacy. We are received by a large distributor with access to different areas of the house. On the left it leads to the 2-storey dining room and chaired by a beautiful fireplace. surrounded by large windows that connect with the terraces that surround the house. Also a direct access to the large kitchen with a comfortable office area and exit to the outside where we find the barbecue area. In the other area, it has an open office, a room and access to the night area. Where we find 3 double rooms together with a designer bathroom that gives them service. Finally we find the main Suite with its own bathroom and dressing area. A staircase integrated into the distributor leads to a large open room connected to the living room from the top. A large space to be used as a games room, bookstore or multipurpose area. On the lower floor, where the garage and gym area are located, along with a full bathroom and access to the pool area. We find a beautiful and rustic cellar area with a comfortable living room with a fireplace and a practical kitchen. This area can be set up as a separate apartment, as it also gives access to the garden and pool. We invite you to discover the privacy of this fantastic property. The property is located in the Valles Oriental, in the Montornés del Valles area, 10 minutes from the Golf de Vallromanes. A privileged enclave since we easily access the Maresme and its beaches in 15 min. and 7km away we find Granollers, capital of the Valles Oriental. It is well communicated by different roads and accesses. Close to different golf courses and also to the La Roca Village shopping center. It has views of the Sierra de Matas and surrounded by rivers that lead to the Besos. It consists of all the necessary services and international schools in nearby towns. An area with great quality of life, nature where you can enjoy all kinds of outdoor sports.

description: Incredible house with 6 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms, exterior to the four winds, very bright, with quality finishes and wonderful views, facing south to all the rooms of the house exposed to the mountain slope, which gives it a exceptional brightness.Located in the Fontpineda-Pallejà urbanization, a beautiful urbanization with all the high-care facilities, parks and gardens, schools and with all public transport access and a quick exit to the highway. It also has air conditioning and heating in all rooms through duct ventilation, a security system and surveillance cameras, both exterior and interior, osmotic water, automatic light sensors, and spaces for the installation of solar panels.The excellent construction finishes along with the large windows. description: In one of the best neighborhoods of Barcelona, Sant Gervasi-Galvany.And in one of the most prestigious streets, next to Turo Park, we find this cosy, quiet and sunny duplex penthouse facing the sea. This street is full of small shops, cafes and terraces that are full of life and movement and invite you to sit down and enjoy an aperitif in the sun.It has a total area of 168m plus two terraces of 14m and 18m. We enter the house, through the distributor that gives us access to a bright living space, the spacious living room that is distributed in two rooms and is the heart of the house.Its large windows open onto the calm and quiet terrace. The terrace, at the living room level, invites us during the day to rest and relax in the sun and at dusk, giving way to enjoying dinners and evenings under the stars.Next to the dining room is the comfortable fully equipped kitchen with an office area. On this same floor we find a quiet suite with a spacious full bathroom. Through a comfortable staircase, we access the upper floor, which is distributed in two other very spacious and bright suites that share a bathroom.Said bathroom could be distributed in two.They share a terrace type solarium. The apartment is very well preserved, but the house could be redistributed and turned into a house to suit everyone. Observations: Very well preserved property, gas heating, fitted wardrobes, parquet floors, concierge service.Service entrance. 1 storage room on the upper terrace.PK for rent on the farm with direct access from the elevator. Sant Gervasi-Galvany is the neighborhood in the upper area closest to the center of Barcelona, and that is why it is so lively.Next to the Vila de Gràcia neighbourhood, Ronda del Mig and Avenida Diagonal, it offers a thousand and one gastronomic establishments, a large number of shops, markets and stores.Unbeatable, communications, rail, bus and main roads that make entering and leaving Barcelona by car quick.In short, an excellent quality of life makes the area the perfect place for those who want to establish their habitual residence in the urban center. The name of Galvany became popular when the area's municipal market adopted it, recovering that of the former owner of the surrounding land, Josep Castelló y Galvany.The urbanization of Camp d'en Galvany began in 1866.It was a piece of land next to the Turó Park amusement park, later converted into gardens in 1934.Turó Park owes its name to the old amusement park that existed on the land of the Bertrand-Girona family until 1929.Following an agreement between this family and the City Council, Nicolau M.Rubió i Tudurí, director of the Barcelona park service at the time, proposed the construction of Turó Park on these estates, as it is known today. The space, dedicated to the poet Eduard Marquina, is a secluded and elegant place that has a good part of its original trees, such as a centenary carob tree, laurels, poplars, holm oaks, etc.One of the most remarkable spaces in the park is the pond, surrounded by trees and covered with water lilies that bloom in spring.Currently, it consists of a pleasant kiosk where you can sit down to have a drink and contemplate the landscaping. This garden, together with the Monterols garden and the small Moragues park, are the green islands of a neighborhood with a marked residential character, combined with an important commercial and tertiary activity, especially in the sector closest to Diagonal and on the axis Muntaner street vertical.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Gervasi - Galvany, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle de Johann Sebastian Bach

description: On Girona street, in front of the Mercat de la Concepcio, we have this flat that admits multiple solutions.It is a classic apartment in the Eixample in a rehabilitated royal estate. From the hall we access the living room and kitchen area with two balconies that allow us to see beautiful views of the Mercat.Large windows that make the apartment sunny and bright. Also from the lobby we access the room area.It has in this area two rooms that open onto a rear balcony and a quiet block interior.With morning sun.The apartment has a bathroom and a toilet. It is important to note that the ceilings were lowered at the time but the Catalan vault ceilings can be recovered. Girona Street is currently under construction since it is part of the conversion project into semi-pedestrian streets. The most privileged area of the Eixample, the Quadrat d'Or (Barcelona's Golden Mile), is bounded by Aribau street and Sant Joan promenade, Sant Pere, Sant Pau and Universitat roundabouts and Diagonal avenue.The Quadrat d'Or is considered an open-air museum with works by Antoni Gaudí, Domènech i Montaner and Puig i Cadafalch, among others. The consolidation of the Eixample as the bourgeois center of Barcelona, produced during the last decade of the 19th century and the first of the 20th, coincided with the appearance and spread of Modernism, so that this unique space became the center of modernist Barcelona. A walk through the Quadrat d'Or will allow us to admire an immense number of architectural gems, the result of the displacement of the bourgeois residence from the old city to the central Eixample, around 1900.Among the most outstanding buildings are: Casa Batlló, Casa Amatller, Casa Lleó i Morera, Casa Milà known as La Pedrera, Casa Terrades also known as Casa de les Punxes or the old Editorial Montaner i Simón, which currently houses the headquarters of the Antoni Tàpies Foundation.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Dreta de l'Eixample, Barcelona

description: In the Sant Gervasi area, very close to Plaza Kennedy, this 220m Duplex Penthouse + 15m terrace is located, on the ground floor and on the upper floor we find the spectacular terrace with views of Collserola, Tibidabo and the city. Very sunny and bright and above all very quiet, located on a ninth and tenth floor facing Tarragona. On the first floor, we find the entrance hall that gives us access to the spacious living-dining room with fireplace and access to a pleasant and quiet 15m terrace with afternoon sun and incredible views. The kitchen stands out for its spaciousness, with an office area, utility room and service room with bathroom. The room area is made up of the main room, and another generous single room, both with afternoon sun, and which could be unified and make a huge dressing room or expand the living room. It consists of two full bathrooms in the same area. Also on the same floor there is another very large double room that opens onto a light patio. The upper floor has a hall, two double bedrooms and a full bathroom, and access to the fantastic and incredible terrace-solarium with barbecue, facing Tarragona with sun all day that invites you to rest and relax in the sun and sunset to incomparable sunsets giving way to the enjoyment of dinners and evenings under the stars with the city at your feet. With views of Barcelona and Tibidabo. Observations: Built-in wardrobes, community heating and hot water, 1 large pk spaces in the same building, and the possibility of two more optional spaces and storage room. Concierge service. Farm in perfect condition. It has 3 elevators. In short, an excellent quality of life, unbeatable communications and a wide range of services make the area the perfect place for those who want to establish their habitual residence in the urban center. Very well connected area, with all services, market, shops and restaurants. Next to the Ronda de Dalt, next to the railway station and various bus lines. description: Beautiful house with a lot of charm next to one of the most prestigious neighborhoods in the city of Barcelona, La Bonanova. The house is distributed over four floors.On the ground floor there is the day area, a large living room with access to a terrace, a kitchen and a courtesy bathroom.Spacious and very bright rooms. The first floor is distributed with four bedrooms, two of them en suite and exit to the terrace.The other two rooms share a full bathroom and also have access to a balcony. The attic is a spacious and diaphanous space with a library and access to a spectacular terrace. In the basement we find a multipurpose room and parking for two cars. The terrace is very spacious and with a landscaped air, making it a pleasant, quiet and very sunny space. The house has centralized air conditioning and heating. Sant Gervasi-Galvany is a neighborhood in the Sarriá-San Gervasi district of the city of Barcelona.The name of the neighborhood refers to San Gervasio, since it was the lower part of this municipality to which it belonged until its annexation to Barcelona, and to the Camp d'en Galvany, the urbanization of which its owner, Josep Castelló and Galvany, who with his other surname also gave name to the Plaza de Castelló.The Galvany name became popular when it was adopted by the Galvany market, located in the center of the neighborhood between Santaló, Calaf, Amigó and Madrazo streets.

description: For sale, a spectacular 170 m2 flat, in a classic building with an elevator, built in 1940, located in the Sant Antoni neighborhood in l'Esquerra de l'Eixample, and characterized by a beautiful façade.    The apartment was refurbished a few years ago and we find a distribution that optimizes the space to the maximum, upon entering we are greeted by a spectacular distributor, which differentiates the day area from the night area. In the day area we have a large living room of 27 m2 and two huge original windows with molding columns, a dining area with access to a small terrace with views of the leafy trees, an exterior double room that can be used as a study and the master suite with dressing room, full bathroom and access to a cozy terrace.    The hallway is wide and bright and leads us to the kitchen, which is in good condition, a full bathroom and three double bedrooms, all of them with lots of light.    Undoubtedly a flat that will not leave you indifferent, not only because of its spaciousness, light and elegance, but also because the area is more booming than ever, large pedestrian areas have been created around it and it concentrates a large number of restaurants, The area also enjoys all kinds of local shops. It also has very good communication with public transport, the metro and bus lines that connect with the entire city.    Without a doubt a unique opportunity.    Live where you deserve to live.

It has a nice communal area, with a private pediment court and circular entrance/exit access to the interior of the farm. According to cadastre data, it occupies a total constructed area of 291m² (255m² housing + 36m² common elements). It is a house with 3 winds and with all its very spacious and exterior rooms. Very good location in one of the best neighborhoods of the town, a few minutes from the center and only 16 minutes from FGC. The house is located in a semi-pedestrian street and has a garden at the front; so there is a lot of privacy and intimacy. On the ground floor we access the day area, where we have a large living-dining room with access to the garden, kitchen and courtesy toilet. On the first floor we have the night area, with 4 bedrooms, one of them en suite; and 2 full bathrooms. On the top floor we have the diaphanous attic with access to the solarium terrace. In the basement, garage for 2 cars and separate laundry room. Ideal house for families looking for a quiet and residential neighborhood, next to the center and with very good communication.

description: At the confluence of Aribau street with Madrazo street we have this beautiful and comfortable duplex penthouse of 250m2 built, plus 100m2 distributed in several terraces and parking space included, in a 1968 farm with good presence. The penthouse is distributed as follows: ENTRANCE FLOOR: We find a large 20m2 hall-distributor from which an elegant staircase leads to the upper floor. Entering, to the left, we have a large sliding glass door that gives us access to a beautiful and spacious 40m2 living-dining room in 2 rooms, a living room with a gas fireplace. From the living room there is access to a large 25 m2 terrace facing southwest. From the hall, to the right, we find a large kitchen-diner, a service-ironing room-laundry room with a toilet and, then, we have a 35 m2 master suite with a dressing room. The suite room is exterior, overlooking a quiet block patio with a 5m2 balcony. UPPER FLOOR: From the hall there is access to a suite room with a dressing room and bathroom. With its own 14m2 terrace facing southwest. From the same distributor, on the right hand side, there is access to a full bathroom and 2 bedrooms (one single and one double). From both rooms there is access to a 35m2 panoramic terrace with teak wood and a built-in barbecue and a beautiful exterior spiral staircase that leads to an independent 35m2 glass-enclosed studio with a full bathroom and auxiliary kitchen, as well as another 15m2 terrace facing to south, Penthouse with high quality finishes, treated wood floors on floor 1, climalit exterior walls, white lacquered interior carpentry, air conditioning through ducts and fully sectorized, gas heating, kitchen and bathrooms with quality porcelain, shower trays at level, terraces with marbled pavements and lined with teak wood, piped music, herringbone oak parquet, beautiful and elegant staircase with large glazing that gives it plenty of light. Parking space in the same building with direct access from the elevator. Area with all kinds of services and communications, very close to access roads and exits from Barcelona.

description: This spacious apartment is located on the first floor of an exclusive building in Eixample Right in Barcelona´s golden mile. The location is exceptional between Passeig de Gracia and Passeig San Joan with a wide range of stores, restaurants and public transport.  The entrance is very spacious, in the living area we find a spacious and elegant living / dining room with abundant natural light, totally exterior and south facing with large double glass doors that open onto a balcony running the facade. The elegant flooring has light colored natural wood. The ceilings are very high, typical of the main floor apartments of Eixample with large designer radiators. Connected to the dining room, we find the tastefully designed semi-open kitchen with elegant countertops and designer storage.  In the hall, we find on one side two double bedrooms with bathroom, one of which also has a fantastic dressing room with shelves and closets, and both rooms have access to a small and cosy private terrace with space for a table and chairs; the ideal place to enjoy your morning coffee. On the other side of the hall we find another bedroom with separate bathroom. This apartment is presented in an immaculate condition, with elegant finishes and top quality materials used throughout.  Please do not hesitate to contact Max Ricart Luxury Properties for more information or to arrange a visit.

description: Exclusive luxury property located in the prestigious town of Premià de Dalt, it enjoys unbeatable views of the Mediterranean Sea and has all the services just a few minutes'' walk away. It offers a constructed area of 507 m² on a plot of 498 m². It is distributed in two comfortable floors plus a basement. On the main floor we have a hall, a courtesy toilet, an equipped kitchen, a double room with a full bathroom next to it, a laundry room and a large living room with large windows and access to the garden with a private saline pool. The first floor has a night area with bedrooms (4 doubles, 1 suite) and 3 full bathrooms. The elevator connects any of the floors of the property, in this way you avoid climbing stairs, even from the street, thus making it very comfortable for people with reduced mobility. In the basement, we have a garage for 2 cars with direct access to the property, 1 large multipurpose room with a bar and kitchen, a full bathroom with a shower, a storage room and a room that is currently used as a gym. The exterior offers you a changing room with a full bathroom in the pool area. Premià de Dalt is a town in the Maresme region with an area of 6.5 km² at an altitude of 142 metres. It is located on the southern slope of the Sierra de Marina between Premià de Mar, Vilassar de Dalt and Teià. 20 km from Barcelona very well connected by public transport.

description: Exceptional totally exterior penthouse, with spectacular views over Barcelona, which has 65m2 of housing and two terraces of 16m2 and 14m2.Completely renovated, with an elegant design and impeccable top quality finishes, brand new. This property has an ideal distribution, taking advantage of all the meters of the house, as well as all the views, the sun and the light that completely bathe this beautiful penthouse and that make it unique. It has a main living room, dining room and kitchen, fully equipped with oven, ceramic hob, extraction system, fridge and integrated dishwasher, all brand new.This 36m2 room extends through a sliding glass wall to a fantastic sunny terrace, facing south, with great privacy, tranquility and privileged views of the entire city, up to the sea, Montjuic, Sagrada Familia, etc. By opening the glass slider, the living room and terrace set, with a total of 50m2, forms a dream space, at the foot of which the city and the sea that bathes it spread out, and where the hours pass peacefully before the panoramic view. postcard of the city, its light changes throughout the day and the seasons of the year, and with its infinite points of light at night. Also, this penthouse has two bedrooms, one double and one single.The main one of 14m2, with a large built-in wardrobe and a full bathroom, has direct access to another private terrace with afternoon sun. All the housing facilities are new (water, electricity, heating, ACS, air conditioning and internet).Aluminum exterior carpentry with low-emission double glazing and motorized blind.Laundry room and space to hang out in the open air.Doors, cabinets and lacquered walls or with old exposed brick.Wood finished ceramic floor.Decked terraces.LED lighting throughout the apartment.Air conditioning and heating by Panasonic aerothermal energy.Armored door with intercom. Sixth floor with elevator, in a well-maintained building and a very quiet pedestrian street, in the heart of Villa de Gràcia.It has an ideal location, a few meters from the heart of one of the most emblematic neighborhoods of the city.It is very well connected by metro (L3) and bus.Public garage around the corner, in the same block.Near the house you will find a wide range of leisure and restaurants, all shops, schools and all services, which makes it one of the most attractive and fashionable neighborhoods in Barcelona. The old quarter of the neighborhood that gives it its name has never ceased to proudly claim its past as an independent municipality (it was added to the city in 1897), and the new map of neighborhoods recognizes it by making the place name Vila de Gràcia official to name this unit. of almost 50,000 inhabitants, small and bustling streets and numerous squares.In the north, the other nerve center of the district, Vallcarca, adds to the traditional name the place name of the Penitents area, due to the historical link between the two territories.On the contrary, the Coll gains its own entity as a neighborhood and is separated from Vallcarca.The other two neighborhoods in the district are Camp d'en Grassot i Gràcia Nova, a more recent sector and, for this reason, autonomous from Vila, and La Salut.

It is special because: · The house has an elevator that reaches all floors of the house. · It has installed solar panels on the roof, heating and air conditioning through the conduit through the aerothermal system. · Tilt-and-turn windows with double air chambers that insulate acoustically and thermally, porcelain stoneware floors, automatic irrigation in the garden, automatic door for access to the house by car.

The house, completely renovated brand new, has an aerothermal system, radial heating, air conditioning (hot and cold) in all rooms distributed through ducts, high-quality porcelain stoneware floors and exterior carpentry with thermal and acoustic insulation. description: Detached house, renovated and with garden, for sale in Bellaterra GREAT OPPORTUNITY. Beautiful and very practical house of 212m2 built, on a plot of 1.154m2, completely renovated in 2006 and with excellent location and excellent communications. The house currently has 3 double bedrooms - although it could easily be adapted for a 4th bedroom 2 bathrooms and a small house of about 45m2, at the end of the garden, loft type with its own kitchen and bathroom and independent access. On the main floor of the house we find an exceptionally large and beautiful living room, dining room and kitchen of more than 70 m2, with access to 2 porches, one to the north and one to the south, and to the garden, a bedroom and a bathroom. On the upper floor with attic roof, 2 more double bedrooms and a bathroom. In front of the front porch, under the back porch, the house also has a large water or laundry area of 36m2 with full bathroom and directly accessible from the garden. The 1954 house was completely renovated in 2006, including water, electricity and electricity installations, drains, the house and roof were insulated, all the carpentry was restored, Deluxe windows were added in the ceiling of the upstairs rooms, solid oak parquet, gaggenau kitchen with surface extractor, etc. In addition to the air conditioning and heating, in the large living room there is a large wood-burning fireplace with integrated oven of very good quality that allows you to heat the house without having to plug in the heating. At the main entrance there is parking space for 2 vehicles. Bellaterra is a small oasis in the metropolitan area of Barcelona. It is a quiet town, surrounded by nature and with a privileged location, annexed to Sant Cugat del Vallès and with excellent communications. It is 20 km from the center of Barcelona, 5 km from the center of Sant Cugat del Vallès and Sabadell and 11 km from Terrassa. Excellently communicated by train (FGC and RENFE), road and highways (A-P7/B-30, C-58, C-16). It has stores, schools, universities, music, sports clubs and 10 minutes drive from business parks, hospitals, golf clubs and public and private universities of the highest international prestige, and large shopping centers. Do not hesitate to contact the expert team of aProperties Real Estate to visit this fantastic house!

On the top floor we find a large multipurpose room with access to another terrace, where you can enjoy the sunsets and with a lot of storage space in the cupboards under cover. On the ground floor we find the service area, with kitchen, bedroom and a bathroom with shower. The house has a large private garage to comfortably park three or four vehicles and a large storage area with a wine cellar. The house is bordered by an outdoor area divided into several rooms. Sant Just Desvern is one of the best places to live, very close to Barcelona and with an enviable natural area, the Collserola Natural Park, which has a first-class sports centre, horse riding, tennis clubs and all kinds of services. description: Bright loft in Camp de l'Arpa In the heart of Camp de l'Arpa, emblematic neighborhood next to the Eixample, 10 minutes from the Sagrada Familia and the Glories, we find this wonderful loft with lots of natural light. It is located on the first floor of an old factory with its original brick facade.  It consists of a spacious living-dining room and open kitchen of 63m, characterized by high ceilings, 3 high windows that give light all day, authentic wooden beams and a beautiful steel column. It also has 2 double bedrooms, one exterior with Catalan vault which is reached by a staircase. The master bedroom is interior with a high window, and with enough space for a walk-in closet. The bathroom has 2 sinks and a shower.  It is being renovated, but it can be sold fully refurbished, or as is. The current owner could adapt the reform to the client.  Currently it does not have the certificate of habitability, but it is possible to change the use and obtain the certificate. The Camp de l'Arpa neighborhood of Barcelona is part of the Sant Martí district and is one of the most charming residential areas of Barcelona. It is a neighborhood wedged between the Sagrada Familia, the Guinardó and the Meridiana, where the old low houses are mixed with large residential buildings or old factories transformed into facilities. Rogent street, a small pedestrian street with its stores and restaurants, is the backbone of the whole area and gives it personality: this is where neighborhood life flourishes.  Likewise, the area is ideal if you want to live near the center of Barcelona as well as the epicenter of innovation, being adjacent to the Sagrada Familia neighborhood and 5 minutes from the @22 district. Camp de l'Arpa is well connected by public transport to the rest of the city, either by metro, the numerous bus lines, or the suburban train. In addition, it will allow you to enter and leave the city very quickly through the Meridiana, Aragon or Gran Via and Diagonal.  Camp de l'Arpa has a variety of stores and supermarkets, as well as schools and kindergartens, and is very close to the municipal market and the Glories shopping center. It is a neighborhood in which the city council is investing a lot and which enjoys green areas. It will gain a green area of about 5,000 square meters facing the Meridiana between the streets of Nació, Degà Bahí and Tomàs Padró.

description: House with garden to enter to live  We present this beautiful house of unique style. The house was completely renovated in 2015 and remains in very good condition. Just entering you can perceive the great luminosity that the whole house enjoys. It combines ceramic parquet floors with some terracotta areas. The convertible glass roof with remote control covers the main area of the house and allows you to enjoy the open sky from the inside. Before reaching the main part of the house, on the right hand side there is a double bedroom en suite with a large window overlooking the garden. From the entrance we can go to the second floor where the night area is located or access the main living room which is open to the large kitchen, newly remodeled, with central island equipped with top of the line appliances and direct exit to the garden. On this same floor, we enjoy two different environments, the living room that connects to the kitchen and a second living room with direct access to the garden and enjoying a fireplace. From this floor we have access to the water area, the storage room and a full bathroom that serves as a courtesy room. Upstairs are the three double bedrooms, all exterior with large windows that allow natural light all day. Two bedrooms share a complete bathroom and the third is a master suite with access to the solarium terrace overlooking the sea and Tibidabo. As an original detail of the house, the entire second floor overlooks the central open space of the house. Spectacular! To the covered outdoor parking area in porch, we access through a motorized door from the street (up to 3 cars). An area perfectly enabled as a barbecue and summer dining pergola, allows us to enjoy the main part of the garden. The house is located in the urbanization Mas Falcó, two minutes from the Viaduct of Vallcarca, a very quiet area, surrounded by other houses and at the same time close to different means of transport and all kinds of stores. If you are looking for a house with personality, natural light and large interior spaces, this could be the house of your dreams! Request a visit with us as soon as possible.    .

description: Flat with three winds and community area in Tres Torres Are you looking for an excellent property in one of the best locations in the Tres Torres - La Bonanova neighborhood? If so, this property in an exposed brick farm with a recently restored facade could be your option. The property, of approx 302m2. and three winds, it has a pleasant day area oriented to S. E. This area is composed of a large space in three well-defined environments, in which we would highlight its great luminosity, distribution and tranquility. In addition, a magnificent level and square terrace to make life. Next to it, a large kitchen with office area, water area and service. In the night area, a quiet and spectacular master suite, which has a fireplace and a private balcony. Next to it, four more bedrooms that share two full bathrooms. It should be mentioned that the bedroom adjoining the suite would be an excellent dressing room with natural light. On the ground floor of the farm, a large parking space for three vehicles and two storage rooms in the same area. Finally and as a cherry, a large community area that has a club room for meetings or events, a gym with fitness equipment, a sauna and a practical indoor pool. In the vicinity of the farm, a great option in terms of schools, services and transportation. Really, one of the best options in the area to carry out a magnificent family project. The Sarrià-Sant Gervasi neighborhood is the fifth district of Barcelona. It has an extension of 20.09 km2 and a population of 148,172 inhabitants. It is one of the greenest districts in the city and, together with Horta-Guinardó, the gateway to the Sierra de Collserola natural park, the most important lung in Barcelona. This proximity marks its status as a residential and affluent area, with numerous parks and green areas, combined with prestigious educational and health centers. The district is the sum of old municipalities added to Barcelona, such as that of Sarrià (1921), Vallvidrera-Les Planes (annexed to Sarrià in 1890) and Sant Gervasi de Cassoles (1897). Sarrià maintains the unity of the old town, although this nucleus is separated from the Tres Torres due to its homogeneous urban characteristics and the high degree of recognition it has from its inhabitants. Sarrià-Sant Gervasi is a nucleus with a village stop, made up of the neighborhoods of Sarrià, Tres Torres, Sant Gervasi-la Bonanova, Sant Gervasi-Galvany, Vallvidrera, Tibidabo i les Planes and Putxet i el Farró.

description: This property to refurbish with the possibility of segregation is located in a charming renovated mid-19th century building with a lift. In the heart of Barcelona's historic centre and close to the sea, it's an excellent opportunity to design a home to suit you and enjoy all the tradition and charm of the Gothic Quarter. The property, which is located on a real third floor, offers a large built area of 181 sqm and balconies overlooking the street. The large 38 sqm living room offers the perfect space for day-to-day living, allowing you to create different ambiences. It's also bright because it has 2 balconies. The kitchen is separate and could have a small dining area next to it. Meanwhile, one of the central interior rooms can be used as a study or office. As for the night area, the renovation proposals offer two options: 4 or 3 bedrooms. In both cases, we find an en-suite bedroom with bathroom, which is interior facing the lightwell, and 2 exterior bedrooms with balcony. The fourth bedroom would be interior, facing the lightwell. There's also a second complete bathroom. The property can be segregated, as established in the statutes of the owners association. It has original features such as hydraulic floors, wooden beams in the ceilings and wooden interior and exterior carpentry. Keeping and restoring them in the refurbishment would give the property an exceptional look. The property has in the surroundings all the services for the day to day life, the traditional shops of the area, numerous cafes and restaurants and connection by metro and bus with the rest of the city.

description: Sensational brand new flat in a refurbished historic building in El Born. This flat with access to the communal rooftop terrace of the building is unique for its location in a fantastic fully restored building in the heart of Barcelona that was built more than 400 years ago. It's an upscale development that offers the highest quality of finishes and equipment, in El Born neighbourhood, close to the Ciutadella Park. The flat, with 50 built interior sqm, has a perfect layout. It's located on the 1st floor and is bright. The living-dining room with built-in Santos kitchen has a balcony. The details such as the wooden beams and the brick walls give a lot of charm to the ambience. The night area consists of an exterior double bedroom, an interior medium-sized bedroom and a separate bathroom. The property features parquet floors, central air conditioning, double glazed Climalit windows, armoured doors and high ceilings. Electrical appliances are included. The property includes a wine cupboard on the ground floor of the building. It's possible to optionally purchase a storage room (15.000 €) with lighting, electricity and enough space to park e-bikes or scooters. The lift takes you up to the communal rooftop terrace of the building, with wonderful views of the historic centre of Barcelona. The building, located next to a medieval arch, represents a part of the city's history. In the lobby and the lounge area, modern design meets a wealth of historical elements, including some archaeological remains found during the refurbishment. The beautiful façade has been completely renovated. In the surrounding area, the oldest and most emblematic part of Barcelona, the narrow and charming streets hide bars, restaurants and lively squares. Public transport links are excellent. Here, the city's nightlife is combined with an interesting cultural, artistic and museum offer.

description: Exclusive 81m² furnished flat for sale in Sant Gervasi-La Bonanova neigbourhood. The flat is part of the luxury building development for sale at 433 Balmes Street, next to Kennedy Square and Tibidabo Avenue, one of the most prestigious residential areas of Barcelona, The flat has a spacious and bright living-dining room with large windows, two double bedrooms (one on suite, ) and one single, all of them with fitted wardrobes. Modern equipped kitchen (oven-microwave, extractor hood and dishwasher, from Bosch brand) and two full bathrooms. Excellent distribution making the most of the space and allowing natural light. It has exterior carpentry with double glazing with high thermal and acoustic performance with motorized aluminum blinds. Aerothermal system for air conditioning (hot and cold air pump) and sanitary water, with an A energy rating. As well as laminated floor with large-format sheets, high-resistance class AC4, PORCELANOSA bathroom ceramics, GROHE taps (kitchen and bathrooms) The building, protected by the Historical-Artistic Architectural Heritage of the City of Barcelona, has been rehabilitated, enhancing its original style, with an imposing white marble entrance that leads to the two elevators for access to the flats and direct elevator to the underground floors of the parking lot. It has solarium area and a swimming pool with fabulous views of the city and Tibidabo Mountain on the roof. Three underground parking floors, with parking spaces for cars (some of them with electric chargers) and motorcycles, with direct elevator on the ground floor. Concierge service and Wi-Fi in all common areas and parking. Optional parking spaces and storage. Excellent connections by public and private transport. Close to the Tibidabo railway Station, excellent bus connections and just 5 minutes from the Ronda de Dalt Street.

description: English style in Bonanova Charming house to renovate in a renowned private passage of the Bonanova. This 1936 construction of solid structure, wide spaces, high ceilings and square floor, make this property one of the best options to live in a house, protected by its architectural value, with all the facilities and benefits of living in the main street of one of the most requested neighborhoods. The access to the house is through a large hall that leads to four dining room spaces that move around two patios that illuminate and give life to this area of the house. From the same entrance hall, you can also access the kitchen, with a laundry area and access to a small cellar. Back to the main entrance, there is the elegant staircase that leads to the first floor of the house, distributed in two suite bedrooms with dressing room, one of them with access to a private terrace. The second floor distributed in three double suits, two of them with dressing room. On the third floor, there are two multifunctional spaces, one of them currently with sauna and full bathroom, from where you can access a very enjoyable terrace with a pool-Jacuzzi, with clear views of the Güell Passage and great privacy, facing south. To all this it is possible to emphasize the great comfort of having an elevator that connects the different plants. The property includes an exterior parking space inside the passage, and a large parking space in a near building. Optionally you can acquire for an additional value, a third small parking space in Mandri Street. The set of houses is closed and has private security. As Sarria and Sant Gervasi, the neighborhood of the Bonanova has its origin at the end of the 18th century as a zone of summer vacation of the wealthy families of Barcelona. Although it would not be radically different from the development of the other two neighborhoods, the district of La Bonanova began its own trajectory marked by the private initiatives of urbanization and by the construction of villas destined to the bourgeoisie of Barcelona.  In 1890, the Passeig de la Bonanova was urbanized and along its route began to rise luxurious manor estates that have since then impregnated this neighborhood with the essence of the exclusive. Today this area is recognized by the locals as one of the preferred options for its generous configuration, the spaciousness and magnificence of the spaces that make up some of the best schools, gyms or clinics that enjoy facilities full of history and which provide the neighborhood with essential services. This property is located within an exclusive closed set of houses in a small passage on the same promenade. It is one of the most appreciated locations for its good road connection, and its proximity to all kinds of shops that provide the area.

description: Stunning flat in Floridablanca street Sant Antoni In a classic building in the district of Sant Antoni, close to the Plaça Universitat and a 10 minute walk from the Plaça Catalunya, we find this impressive apartment. The property consists of one floor of a constructed area of approximately 117 sqm, the entrance of the floor is made by the center of the house, where we find a cozy hall. On the right is a gallery at the end of which we find an amazing living room that overlooks two balconies with view to the trees of Floridablanca street. On the way back to the hall, on the left hand side, there are two bedrooms, a double one and a single one that is currently used as a desk, following a fully renovated kitchen with quality finishes, imported directly from Sweden. Following in the hallway to the left a first complete bathroom with shower and a second spacious bathroom with bathtub. To complete this impressive apartment, in a diaphanous space, the third room with its lounge gallery were you can enjoy your free time reading a book or just relax, this beautiful gallery has view to a quiet inner courtyard. This apartment is ideal for those who love the details that this house offers, finca Regia, high ceilings decorated with mouldings preserved in a part of the flat, as well as Catalan turns, floors with hydraulic mosaic that brings a very special charm to this apartment. All these features make this house a spectacular opportunity for families, investors and for those who would like to have a pied-à-terre in the heart of Barcelona. In the heart of Sant Antoni you can discover its market, the largest in the city of Barcelona, with more than 12,000 sqm. The market was completely renovated and reopened in 2017. The market of Sant Antoni is undoubtedly one of the architectural jewels of the city, to see absolutely, you can find a variety of shops with fresh products, such as fish, meats, cheeses, vegetables and fresh fruits, as well as clothes and shoes. The neighbourhood has a large number of schools, 11 private schools, 9 public, 8 aggregates, language schools, music, library (Sant Antoni Joan Oliver), cinema Renoir, rue Floridablanca, with 7 rooms specialized in auteur films and films in original version. Every Sunday, The Sant Antoni market changes face and transforms, giving way to the world of collectors. In the Sunday market you can find second-hand books, comics, video games, CDs, vinyls, albums, stamps,... The neighbourhood is very well commuted with public transport ( metro: L1,L2 and L3) or various bus stops. In the last 10 years, a large number of shops, bars and entertainment places have opened in the neighbourhood of Sant Antoni, which has made it one of the liveliest places in the city of Barcelona, is a trendy neighbourhood, and is a very good place to have a drink with friends or family! If what you are looking for is to live a neighbourhood life in a city, Sant Antoni is made for you.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Antoni, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de Floridablanca

description: Sunny house with garden in Sant Andreu Charming house from 1866 in the old town of Sant Andreu with garaje and garden, Completely renovated and ready to move into. Quality renovation that combines the original character of the house (high ceilings and large glazed wooden doors) with comfort and modern design (parquet, gas heating throughout the house and fully equipped bathrooms and kitchen) The house consists of 151 m2, 60 m2 garden, 13 m2 roof terrace and 15 m2 garage. On the first floor we find an exterior double bedroom with a bathroom with a shower, a spacious living-dining room with a fireplace and a kitchen with an office area, both with access to the porch and garden. At the bottom of the garden is the garage with capacity for a car, two motorcycles and storage space. On the second floor there are 3 bedrooms (two singles and one double, with two full bathrooms). On the roof there is a solarium where you can sunbathe with absolute privacy. The house you have always dreamed of in the heart of Sant Andreu! Located in Sant Andreu, next to shops, businesses and restaurants. Five minutes walk from Plaça Orfila. Very well connected by metro, bus and train.

description: Magnificent brand new semi-detached house in Gràcia Engel & Völkers presents this fantastic property, a renovated house, brand new with parking and multiple outdoor spaces. We find a house of 130 mts on two floors plus roof terrace, on the first floor a large living room with open kitchen and at the back a bathroom and a double room ideal for office or bedroom, under the stairs a storage space. The living room leads to a large porch and parking, facing south east.  The staircase leads to the second floor, establishing the sleeping area, three bedrooms with fitted closets in 2 and one of them en suite with access to a terrace facing north-west, plus a bathroom. The roof terrace is an ideal place to establish with wooden flooring a terrace with double orientation of more than 50 meters.  The property has new appliances, hot and cold air conditioning ducts, double carpentry, with energy certificate and certificate of occupancy. The rehabilitation will be finished very soon, undoubtedly an ideal place for any family wishing to live in a quiet street of grace.  It will be a pleasure for our consultants to show you all the charm of this special property, ask for a visit. In the most emblematic neighborhood of Barcelona, located in a quiet street of Vila de Gràcia is this charming house ideal for families.  Located between Escorial and Torrent de les Flors streets, this small street has very little traffic of vehicles and accessible to all kinds of schools, restaurants, stores and public and private medical services. Its location means access to all types of public transport, equidistant between the Lesseps and Joanic metro stations and endless shopping options.
