description: Excellent location! 57 m² apartment distributed in a living-dining room, a bedroom, a kitchen, a bathroom and a hall. It has wooden floors and stoneware, wooden windows, sapele interior doors... It requires reform to enter to live, but offers many possibilities. It is a 4th floor in a block with an elevator. Good communications by road (C-31) and public transport. A few minutes from the 'Passeig de Gracia' metro station and next to several bus stops. Excellent location in the heart of Barcelona and next to all kinds of services and infrastructures.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Dreta de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

address: Paseo de la Reina Elisenda de Montcada
description: Bright flat of 93sqm located in Sarrià, one of the best areas of Barcelona. It has a living-dining room with access to a nice and spacious 11m2 terrace, with spectacular views to the sea and the mountain, which makes it a very special property. The kitchen, of large dimensions, is independent and has an office area. The property has three bedrooms, one double and two singles. There is also a complete bathroom with shower and a modern guest toilet. All the rooms enjoy plenty of natural light. The property has good finishes such as parquet floors, air conditioning and heating. Optional parking space in the building in front of the property. We are located in the upper area of Barcelona. It has in its surroundings prestigious schools such as Sant George School and all the necessary services to live, as well as an excellent communication by public transport and a short distance to nature. In the surrounding area, we also have beautiful green areas such as El Parc del Castell de l'Oreneta. AREA: Sarrià - Sant Gervasi - Sarrià. PUBLIC TRANSPORT: Metro (L12 - Reina Elisenda) FGC - Sarrià, Bus and Bicing.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sarrià, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Paseo de la Reina Elisenda de Montcada

description: Construction of 2005 with good finishes and a very functional distribution. Quiet and residential neighborhood, on a semi-pedestrian street. On the ground floor, a large living room and kitchen, both rooms with direct access to the garden. On the second floor three bedrooms, one of them a suite, and two full bathrooms. On the top floor, a spectacular attic used as a multipurpose room, with a custom-made fireplace and access to a solarium terrace. Garage for 3 cars and storage area. Ideal home for families looking for a quality home to move into!
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Quirze Parc-Vallsuau-Castellet, Sant Quirze del Vallès
suggestedTexts.title: Terraced house

neighborhood: Diagonal Mar i el Front Marítim del Poblenou
description: FOR SALE WITH TENANT. IDEAL FOR INVESTORS. Located in the district of "diagonal mar", one of the areas of Barcelona with more growth in recent years, next to the 'Passeig de Garcia Fària' we find this magnificent apartment of 90m2 with terrace with panoramic sea views. Located in a modern building of recent construction with elevator, communal pool, parking, storage room (included) and perfect communications of public transport with the rest of the city. The property is distributed in a spacious and bright living-dining room with access to a terrace, a separate kitchen equipped with oven and microwave, an exterior suite with bathroom, an exterior double bedroom, a single bedroom and another bathroom. It has top quality finishes such as parquet floors, double glazing in the windows for better insulation, and aluminum exterior carpentry, among others. In addition, it has ducted hot/cold air conditioning system and gas heating to ensure maximum comfort. A unique opportunity to enjoy one of the trendiest neighborhoods of the city and enjoy the magnificent views of the Barcelona coast. East facing. Bright, impeccable and surrounded by services. AREA: Sant Martí - Diagonal Mar and Front Marítim del Poblenou. PUBLIC TRANSPORT: Metro- Poblenou (L4), Bus and Bicing.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Diagonal Mar i el Front Marítim del Poblenou, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle del Perelló, 11

description: Flat for sale with terrace in Eixample Esquerra (Barcelona) This apartment is located on Calle Aribau, near Diagonal and Enric Granados. It is a ground floor, 63m2 built, has an excellent location in a classic building that preserves the original elements of the time, with elevator and community terrace. The day area consists of a spacious living-dining room with access to a 14m2 terrace, very enjoyable, sunny and quiet. It has two cabinets for a washing machine and a dryer. Independent equipped kitchen, with the possibility of opening to the living room. The night area has a main bedroom and a complete bathroom en suite, a second bedroom / attached office, with access to the terrace. It also has a full bathroom with shower. Parquet floors, air conditioning (hot / cold), heating, water storage, large wardrobe equipment, electric awning. ITE approved.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: L'Antiga Esquerra de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle d'Aribau

description: Penthouse in Via Augusta Located a few steps from the prestigious meeting point between the Diagonal, Paseo de Gracia and Rambla Catalunya, on the sixth floor of a design building from the 60's we find a magnificent property of 338m2 of covered area and 2 terraces covered by pergolas of 37m2 on a single floor overlooking the entire city. The 1968 building, designed by architect Mitjans, has a splendid designer staircase, concierge, elevator and freight elevator. The apartment, to reform and segregable, currently consists of two entrances (one main and one service), 2 living rooms (one with fireplace), 4 bedrooms (one en suite), 4 bathrooms, service room en suite, a guest toilet, kitchen with office and water area. All the rooms are very spacious, bright and characterized by period design details. The reinforced concrete structure and pillar construction allows an infinite number of new distributions.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Vila de Gràcia, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Via Augusta

neighborhood: Sant Pere - Santa Caterina i la Ribera
description: Flat for sale with terrace in El Born This loft is located in Born, in an original building from 1870, it had been a former convent and was completely renovated in 1997. At the entrance of the building there is a large hall that gives access to the staircase and the elevator. On the first floor we find a central landscaped communal area where it was located in the old cloister, which gives access to the property. The house is all exterior, with large windows to the quiet and silent central space of the building. The loft was renovated about 13 years ago and maintains that bohemian charm so characteristic of the area. At the entrance we find the hall open to the spacious living room with open kitchen. It is surrounded by large windows with lots of light. It has access to a large terrace of 40m2, a very quiet and bright area. On the same floor there is a double bedroom with a complete bathroom and in the mezzanine area (deeded floor) is the second bedroom open to the living room space, it also has a complete bathroom en suite. The ceiling is 4.50m high and has beautiful wooden beams, the floor is solid park (it will be polished to the taste of the buyer). In addition, the house has screens, air conditioning hot and cold by Split and individual heating by radiators. The property does not have parking on the building, but there is the possibility of renting a parking space in the area.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Pere - Santa Caterina i la Ribera, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de les Jonqueres

description: Luxury apartment for sale in Rambla Catalunya In Rambla Catalunya, one of the most exclusive streets of the city, we find this magnificent flat in a beautiful royal estate with concierge service and lift. The flat has 110sqm and thanks to its height and orientation, it enjoys a lot of tranquillity in spite of its central location. Upon entering, a spacious hallway with exposed brick wall leads to a double bedroom with built-in wardrobe and access to a small terrace. Its glass doors give the flat a wonderful feeling of space and light. In the adjoining room is the laundry room with built-in wardrobe and opposite is a bathroom with shower. Next is the modern kitchen/diner, equipped with top of the range appliances and with space for a table for 6 people. Next, we access to the spacious living room that thanks to its large windows and orientation to a nice courtyard enjoys plenty of natural light. The second bedroom is the master bedroom, facing outwards, with fitted wardrobes and a complete bathroom with shower and hydro-massage bathtub en suite. The flat has parquet floors, heating by radiators, ducted air conditioning and double glazed windows. Contact us today to visit this unique property in the most exclusive area of L'Eixample!
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Dreta de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Rambla de Catalunya

description: Apartment for sale with commercial premises in Vila de Gràcia We present a unique opportunity to acquire a house of 52 m2 plus 4m2 of inner courtyard, with certificate of occupancy connected inside to a commercial space of 18m2 with a courtesy toilet, in a semi-pedestrian street in the triangle of Gal-la Placídia, Diagonal and Jardinets de Gràcia. Entrance both by the local direct from the street and by interior staircase of the building. The property offers two bedrooms, a bathroom and a dressing area. Dining room in two rooms and fully equipped kitchen open to dining room. All this part of the house enjoys the inner courtyard of the building, where the water area is located in addition to a toilet. Ceilings with wooden beams and ceramic parquet floors. Air-conditioned by split system. It is the perfect apartment to combine housing with commerce, office or workshop, as well as for investors, since when it has been rented it has always obtained a profitability above 4%. We invite you to visit it and check that it is what you are looking for, call us and make an appointment!
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Vila de Gràcia, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de Vic

description: Flat for sale with views in Les Corts (Barcelona) In Travessera de Les Corts next to Gran Vía de Carlos III, we present this fantastic refurbished three-floor flat of 150 m2 built that allows you to move in.   Close to Ronda del Mig, Avda Diagonal, El Corte Inglés shopping centre, Mercat de Les Corts, health services and surrounded by public transport. Once we access to the flat through a large hall we find on the right hand side the day area with a large living-dining room with three double windows facing south and with access to the balcony, from the living-dining room we can also access to the large kitchen-office and to its spacious water area facing east, completing this day area we have a courtesy bathroom. And on the left hand side we access to the night area which consists of four bedrooms, one of them en-suite with built-in wardrobes and a balcony, two double bedrooms, one of them with a balcony and an interior room to the water area which receives a lot of natural light as it is a corner and a complete bathroom. The property has been refurbished with quality elements as can be seen in the aluminium carpentry with double glazing, parquet floors in the bedrooms, stoneware in bathrooms and kitchen-office and marble in the living-dining room, oak doors. It has air conditioning by Split in the living-dining room and individual gas heating in all the rooms. There is the possibility of acquiring parking in the same property (direct access from the lift) or in adjoining properties.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Les Corts, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Travesía de les Corts

description: Extraordinary apartment for sale in privileged surroundings in Pedralbes, Barcelona This extraordinary 263m2 apartment is located in the upper part of Barcelona. In the quiet neighborhood of Pedralbes, the most exclusive residential area and one of the most elegant in the city. Surrounded by green areas and nature, it is home to the most prestigious international school and university training activities, as well as the best sports clubs. Well connected, the neighborhood with Sarriá also offers the possibility of enjoying its numerous services and traditional shops. The house, located in a privileged environment, occupies one floor per floor and is accessed through a private hall through the main elevator. Next, the hall gives way to a dining room distributed in three rooms, spacious and very bright. The elegant living room and the living room have large windows with direct access to the terrace while, to access the large dining room, there is a sliding door. From there, we reach a spacious kitchen with a pantry. The night area, made up of four bedrooms and three bathrooms, is also very bright and is separated by a corridor that is accessed through a door, thus guaranteeing maximum privacy. Next to this entrance, we have a courtesy toilet. The master suite overlooks the garden and has a spacious bathroom with shower and bathtub. There is a junior suite and two other double rooms that share a bathroom. All rooms have fitted wardrobes. The apartment also has a full service room, a practical water area, air conditioning, a storage room and four parking spaces. Finally, the property has a communal garden area with a tennis court, a soccer field and a swimming pool for adults, plus another for children.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Pedralbes, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Plaza d'Eusebi Güell

description: Renovated apartment for sale near Enric Granados A few meters from the sought-after Enrique Granados street and very close to the prestigious Rambla Catalunya, we find this refurbished and elegant 178m² apartment ready to move in. Located in a beautiful royal estate, completely renovated in 2004 and with the option of a parking space in the same building. The property is regal and has retained all the elements that characterize it, such as a large hall with high ceilings, marble floors and its characteristic iron elevator. The property consists of a living-dining room with southwest orientation, a fully equipped kitchen, office area, 3 bedrooms distributed in 1 master suite, 1 suite and 1 double bedroom; as well as 3 complete bathrooms.   In the day area we find a spacious and bright living room, southwest facing, with two large windows that have direct access to the balconies, then we find the fully equipped kitchen and office area with wine cellar. The night area consists of 1 majestic master suite very bright, with a total of 47m2 which includes a dressing room, reading area, work area and a bathroom with sauna. Then we have 1 suite of 17m2 which incorporates a full bathroom and finally we have a third bedroom. The property has 3 complete bathrooms, two integrated in the suites and a third bathroom in the common area. In the rehabilitation of the house has been taken care to the smallest detail, using high quality materials, keeping the rooms and common areas of high ceilings and moldings typical of the royal estates of Barcelona's Eixample. The property has parquet flooring, aluminum carpentry and wooden windows with double glazing, gas heating and air conditioning, fitted closets and complete throughout the house. This property meets all the conditions of an exclusive home, location in Enrique Granados area, Regia estate, a renovated property with high standing materials and the possibility of acquiring parking space in the same building.   Do not miss this opportunity!
suggestedTexts.subtitle: L'Antiga Esquerra de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de València

description: Bright and spacious family home in La VILLA OLÍMPICA, a few meters from the beach. With all exterior rooms and a spectacular terrace and patio of 100 m2 for private use where you can enjoy pleasant evenings. With enough space where you can create different environments. With a comfortable distribution well differentiated day and night area. It consists of a spacious 35m2 living-dining room, a fully equipped independent kitchen and a room that could be used as an office or play area for the little ones in the family. Within this space we find a small storage room / dressing room. The night area is divided into 3 bedrooms, all exterior, one of them a 17m2 suite with a dressing room and a full bathroom and the other two medium-sized ones with built-in wardrobes. There is a second full bathroom. It has heating, air conditioning, parquet floors and windows with thermal break. A parking space on the same property is included in the price. Magnificent location where you can enjoy the tranquility of a residential area, without giving up the intense activity that is generated a short distance from the beach. In addition, you have at your disposal all kinds of services, as well as very good communications with the rest of Barcelona.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Vila Olímpica del Poblenou, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de l'Arquitecte Sert

description: DUPLEX FOR SALE IN POBLENOU Flat duplex in perfect conditions in Poblenou. The duplex is located on the fifth floor of a property from 2008 in perfect condition and has an area of 143sqm constructed and 112.75sqm useful, with living room, separate kitchen, 4 bedrooms, 2 complete bathrooms and 1 courtesy toilet. This is a fantastic duplex divided into two floors: - on the ground floor we find a large and spacious dining room, independent equipped kitchen (with options to open it), courtesy toilet and storage room (built in under the access stairs to the upper floor) - Upper floor with 4 completely exterior bedrooms, two doubles (the suite has a dressing room) and two singles, 1 full bathroom and another bathroom located in the suite room. All the rooms are exterior and very quiet, away from the noise. The house has a beautiful parquet floor and is equipped with gas heating for radiators and air pump for AA with independent control on the ground floor and upper floor. Large parking space included in the sale price, with capacity for a car and two motorbikes, located on the same property. The building has a community rooftop of responsible use, with a shower and wooden finishes, where you can enjoy while sunbathing or a refreshment in your moments of rest. It also has a community storage room for all the residents to store bikes. Poblenou is one of the most fashionable neighborhoods in Barcelona for its fantastic location next to the city's beaches. It is a cosmopolitan, familiar, and modern neighborhood with all services, shops, restaurants and schools. It is very well connected by both public and private transport to access the rounds. Don't miss the opportunity to get to know this large apartment with many options!
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Provençals del Poblenou, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Duplex in Avenida Diagonal

description: Apartment for sale in l'Antiga Esquerra de l'Eixample Located in the heart of Barcelona's Quadrat D'Or in a classic building from 1936 and a step away from Diagonal Avenue and Plaza Francesc Macia, we find this exclusive apartment recently renovated and very bright due to its height. We access directly to the house through a large hall with a large window that separates the day area from the night area. To the right we find a large single room with window to patio lights and frontally with the master bedroom with access to a balcony and overlooking the street. From this room there is direct access to a dressing room with a large window and views to the street that could be converted into the third bedroom. Returning to the hall to the left we find the day area composed on the sides of the corridor by two bathrooms, one with bathtub and the other with shower, and a kitchen with office. At the back is located the spacious living room of about 30 m2 with a closed gallery of about 5.50 m2 that has large windows typical of royal property that allow the entry of light and that the room is very bright. The renovation has been carried out respecting all the details of the period with high ceilings of three meters high and with moldings. The house is equipped with gas heating, two splits of air conditioning and heat pump in the living room and another in the master bedroom. It is sold with two storage rooms (one on the roof and one with access from the portal). The building has an elevator and a communal roof terrace. Can you imagine living here? Do not hesitate to call us.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: L'Antiga Esquerra de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de París

description: Flat for sale with Terrace in El Poblenou (Barcelona) Aproperties presents this fantastic design apartment completely renovated, with the highest quality materials, located on the ground floor of a classic 1935 building in perfect condition. The house has 3 bedrooms, two doubles (one of them en suite) and one single. Two complete bathrooms (one of them in the suite), kitchen open to the living room from which we access a pleasant 40m2 patio. We highlight the 4m high ceilings, the original elements such as the wooden beams, the exposed Catalan volta, the polished cement floors, which give it that industrial character so in demand in the neighborhood. The modern and current design finishes are of the highest quality. We have underfloor heating and ducted air conditioning (supplied through an aerothermal system), direct and indirect led lighting, double-thick windows, motorized blinds, Siemens brand appliances, marble countertops, black taps, built-in wardrobes.. . The location of the property is unbeatable, on Roc Boronat street, two streets from Rambla del Poblenou and a 5-minute walk from the beach. Close to all services, restaurants and very well connected with public transport. The Poblenou area is very dynamic with a lot of neighborhood life and highly demanded by both local and international families. Do not miss the opportunity to visit this fantastic apartment!
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Poblenou, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de Roc Boronat

description: Flat for sale in Eixample Esquerra (Barcelona) In Avda. de Sarrià at the intersection with Diagonal, we find this mezzanine (real height 1st floor), exterior corner. On entering the property the sensation is very pleasant, as both the day area and the 2 double bedrooms are all exterior with large windows on the whole façade, providing a lot of light and warmth. The floors are parquet in the living room and bedrooms, and ceramic tiles in the kitchen and bathroom. The kitchen is open to the living room and is fully equipped, in the same area is the washing machine. The two bedrooms are double and in the master bedroom there is a large made to measure wardrobe. A third bedroom could easily be added. The whole property is air-conditioned with Split for heating and cold air. The property has a concierge and there is the possibility of renting or buying a parking space in the same building, not included in the purchase price. You can't miss this opportunity! Ask your advisor for a visit.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Les Corts, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Avenida de Sarrià

description: Refurbished apartment for sale in Rocafort street, Eixample Esquerra Fantastic apartment completely renovated in 2023, very sunny in a building facing south east, renovated porter's lodge with concierge all day and 2 elevators. Located two steps from Josep Tarradellas street and surrounded by all kinds of stores and services.   Spacious apartment of 92m2 with very good distribution. The living room facing Tarragona has very open and unobstructed views overlooking a huge courtyard. It has an independent kitchen fully equipped with high-end appliances and an integrated laundry room. The sleeping area consists of 2 large double bedrooms, one of them interior and one overlooking the courtyard with lots of light. It has 2 bathrooms with shower very complete and an interior single room ideal for office. The best thing about this apartment is its height for the light that enters and the silence.  .
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Nova Esquerra de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de Rocafort

description: Flat for sale with Terrace in Sant Gervasi - Galvany (Barcelona) This fabulous and unique property is located in one of the most exclusive areas of the city centre, surrounded by excellent shops, services and restaurants, just a few metres from the streets of Via Augusta and Balmes.     It is an exceptional and unique piece due to its interior design, the conception of the space, and an incredible garden terrace of more than 100m2.    The property is located in a fabulous regal building with lift and concierge and has 192 m2, plus 130 m2 of garden terrace, all with a very practical and original distribution.   The entrance hall, located in the centre of the property, perfectly distributes the different spaces. On the one hand, in the day area, there is a large living room with three areas: dining room, living room and office, with access to the jewel of the house: the large garden terrace. Also in the day area is the kitchen, with a beautiful central island and fully equipped with Gaggenau appliances. Finally, a storage/service room completes this area, together with a guest toilet.   In the night area are the two bedroom suites. With the current layout, a third double bedroom could easily be added.    The master suite has a dressing room with access to the suite, a large wooden and marble bathroom with bathtub and shower and a beautifully decorated double bedroom.    The second suite is a comfortable double bedroom with full bathroom.   The garden terrace with three areas completes this fabulous property: on the one hand, there is the summer dining area, with an automatic awning that provides total privacy; then there is the solarium area and thirdly, at the end of the garden, there is a covered jacuzzi with changing room, which can be enjoyed at any time of the year.   The property offers a parking space for rent for a large car and two motorbikes in a nearby estate.   Undoubtedly an exceptional jewel of design created by a renowned interior designer and perfectly located, not to be missed.   .
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Vila de Gràcia, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Rambla de Prat

description: Apartment for sale in Les Corts Ten minutes walk from the Plaza Francesc Macia and Turó Park surrounded by all kinds of services, stores and transport, we find this house of 151 m2 built on three sides in a building with a current comprehensive reform with high quality materials achieving a serene and quiet atmosphere. We access from the elevator to the house through a small distributor with quick-step parquet floor with water-repellent treatment that will accompany us through all the rooms of the apartment. Once inside the house we find a large square living room with open kitchen SANTOS integrated L-shaped with large work surface, presiding over the large living room by two large windows with aluminum frames with double glazing with thermal break and watertight closure, electric blinds, electric curtains, LED lights adjustable in intensity. Following the route we access a small distributor with built-in closets integrated with double push system, leads to the sleeping area where we find the Master Suite with dressing area with large windows and en suite bathroom. An exterior single double bedroom, a second exterior double bedroom with fitted closets and a bathroom with window. Housing equipped with air conditioning ducts, gas heating, LED lights adjustable in intensity and temperature. All regulated by individual panels in each room and can also be operated and programmed by App, with an electrical panel worthy of technology sybarites.  .
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Maternitat i Sant Ramon, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de Sabino Arana

description: Apartment for sale next to Plaça Reial  Apartment for sale to update, located a few meters from Plaça Reila, in a classic building from 1900 in good condition with elevator and concierge. Apartment TEMPORARILY RENTED, until May 27th 2023. Surface of 80m2 according to registry, distributed in a large living room, kitchen, 1 large double room (bedroom + study), 3 exterior balconies, and 1 bathroom with bathtub. Parquet floors, high ceilings, heating by gas radiators, 2 splits heat pump, heater and gas stove. The location is strategic, a few meters from Plaza Real, La Rambla, surrounded by stores, restaurants, hotels, very well connected by metro Liceu green line and bus stops. Very good investment opportunity, come and see it!  .
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Gòtic, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle del Vidre

address: Calle de la Mare de Déu de la Salut
description: Beautiful 137sqm designer triplex as a three-storey house, totally refurbished in a modern and contemporary style. It is located in the highest part of Gracia, in a quiet and pleasant street, very close to the prestigious La Salut Tennis Club and a few minutes away from Park Güell. Ideal for those looking for a home with its own character. The property is distributed over three comfortable floors. At street level, we find the day area composed of an open-plan kitchen with an office area, a guest toilet and a bright living-dining room with direct access to a small communal area that can optionally serve as rear access. On the upper level is the night area, which welcomes us in the hallway with a beautiful designer walk-in wardrobe, leading to a corner double bedroom with fitted wardrobes and very bright thanks to its windows to two winds, another single bedroom also exterior, and a complete bathroom with bathtub. On the lower level, the semi-basement floor, there is a small water area with storage room and another large multipurpose area that houses a leisure area, with a cinema room and bar, and a restroom which also works as a master suite with a full bathroom with shower. The property has high quality finishes such as natural wood parquet floors, windows with aluminium interior carpentry and double glazing, ducted hot and cold air conditioning, natural gas heating and intercom on all levels. In the same property we have a parking space of 14m2 included in the price, very easy to manoeuvre, and in which we can park a car and a motorbike. There is also the possibility of acquiring the adjoining parking space as an option, where you can also park a car and a motorbike. AREA: Gràcia - La Salut. PUBLIC TRANSPORT: Underground (Alfons X - L4), Bus, Bicing.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Salut, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: House in Calle de la Mare de Déu de la Salut

description: Excellent penthouse duplex with views in Eixample Engel & Völkers presents a duplex with two terraces in excellent condition.  On entering you find a large entrance hall, to your right the first bedroom, a few steps further on from the entrance door you find a large kitchen with space for a pantry, then a spacious and bright living room with access to the first terrace, next to it a bedroom en suite. You go up the broad stairs and on the first floor you can find a second bathroom and three bedrooms, two of which have access to the second terrace where you can enjoy the views of the Sagrada Familia and the mountains. These are some of the details of this beautiful and unique two-storey penthouse. If you would like more information and/or a visit, we will be delighted to assist you. The area captivates you with its emblematic church, the Sagrada Familia, the Catalan modernist architecture and its good transport communication. Located in a residential area and near to a beautiful touristic zone.  It is also close to the Gran Clariana park, a few metres from the Glòries open-air shopping centre. Perfectly communicated by bus and Metro service (L2 and L5). In the area there are a variety of businesses, shops, supermarkets, restaurants, service stations, two hospitals and schools.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Sagrada Família, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle de València

description: Great apartment of 122m2 built according to cadastre, of which 118 are useful, located in a building from the beginning of the century on Calle Aribau, in the heart of the Antiga Esquerra de l'Eixample.  Housing distributed in a spacious and bright living room with unobstructed views, separate kitchen equipped with oven. It has 4 rooms, 1 medium and 3 doubles; one en suite with bathtub and one with dressing room. Another full bathroom with shower.  Laundry room, parquet floors, air conditioning and heating ducts.  Ready to move into, in a quiet area, facing Southwest and a block patio. It is a high floor in a building with an elevator.  With Walter Haus SAFE VISIT you will be able to continue renting and selling your apartment with total security. Our homes and the visits we make are free of Covid-19 thanks to the protocol we have developed:  •Virtual Tours  •Ozone disinfection  •Security kit  •Digital signature  Everything so that you can continue renting and selling your flat with total normality.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: L'Antiga Esquerra de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle d'Aribau

description: This 95 sqm flat preserves the charm of the traditional elements of Catalan architecture, such as the hydraulic floors, the Catalan vault and the wooden beams on the ceiling. It's located on the top floor of the building, so it is bright and quiet, in a very central area, 15 minutes walking from Plaza Catalunya. The living-dining room has tiled floors and a window facing the inner courtyard, but as it is on the top floor it receives a lot of natural light. This area communicates directly with the independent kitchen, equipped with electrical appliances. It also has an adjoining utility room. The sleeping area consists of 3 bedrooms with Catalan vaulted ceilings and parquet floors. The master bedroom is very spacious and allows to place a large wardrobe, in addition to the built-in wardrobe before entering, and even to create a space for the computer and teleworking. It has a balcony facing the street. Its brick wall gives it a lot of charm. Next to the living room there is a medium sized bedroom with a small dressing room, which could be transformed into a bathroom by taking advantage of the downspouts to make a suite. The third bedroom has space for a double bed. Both of them are facing the inner courtyard and have windows. From the living room there is access to the bathroom with shower. There's also a toilet. The flat has air conditioning by splits. It's on the fifth and last floor of a building with a communal terrace. It does not have a lift. This property will allow you to enjoy the charm of the historic centre of Barcelona, with its monuments such as the Barcelona Cathedral just 5 minutes away, and all the public transport connections to get around the city. The area offers a large number of local shops and large malls, restaurants and services.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Gòtic, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle del Regomir

description: Surrounded by all the history of Barcelona, this fantastic fully refurbished loft will allow you to enjoy all the modern comforts in the middle of the monuments and places of interest of the Gothic Quarter, its charming streets and lively squares. The flat is just a few steps from the Port Vell and the Maremàgnum and only a 15 minute walk from Plaza Cataluña. The area has numerous services, restaurants and public transport. This loft has a surface area of 77 sqm in an open space that receives light thanks to an original and beautiful semi-arched window. The main space is occupied by the living room and the bedroom, which can be separated by a semi-transparent mobile partition that gives a very contemporary touch to the ambiance. The night area features a large built-in wardrobe with mirrored doors. The bathroom has a shower tray. The distribution creates a small corridor through which we access a huge open-plan kitchen equipped with electrical appliances, which occupies an area well differentiated from the previous ones and is characterised by its design with industrial touches. The refurbishment has maintained the Catalan vault on the ceiling throughout the flat, one of the hallmarks of the city's architecture, and the electricity and water installations are new. The property is equipped with parquet and tiled floors, and air conditioning by splits. It's located on the real first floor of a unique 19th century building that has been renovated and has a lift. This loft is perfect for having all the possibilities of such a cosmopolitan city as Barcelona at your fingertips, by living in an environment that is very close to the urban lifestyle and, at the same time, linked to the city's history.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Gòtic, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle Ample

description: Exclusive penthouse with pool overlooking the sea In the prestigious neighborhood of Gavà Mar, we find this fantastic duplex penthouse of 90sqm (plans) and 25sqm on the upper floor with terraces and private pool. We access a large living room with two rooms of more than 40sqm, a large kitchen, with a large laundry area with the possibility of incorporating into the kitchen. From the bright living room we have access to the stairs that lead to the upper floor of the terraces, to the chill out, barbecue area.. . with stunning views of the sea and the entire pine forest, 360 degree view from where you can see the sea and the mountain. The night area on the main floor consists of an en-suite bedroom, two large bedrooms that share a bathroom. The property includes two parking spaces, communal area, storage room, gas heating, new installation of water and electricity, air conditioning, osmosis and descaling system, has aluminum marquetry with double glass. The community has renewed the roofs, the facade and the electrical connection. With elevator and gardening service. The monthly expenses are 130€ and the annual IBI 766€. The most prestigious international schools in Barcelona are in this area or are easily accessible by the school bus. The British School of Barcelona and the Lycée Français de Gavà Bon Soleil are two of the most prestigious international schools in Barcelona and close to the beach. We also have famous tennis academies such as the Sánchez-Casal Academy. Numerous cultural events, restaurants and attractive shopping centers complete the range of facilities that the Castelldefels - Gavà beaches have to offer. Water sports fans will also find their paradise here. Some of the best spots in Spain for surfing, kite surfing and windsurfing are on the beaches of Castelldefels-Gavà. For lovers of sailing, speedboat or yacht, our two ports (Port Ginesta and C. N. Garraf) are the ones that host all kinds of regattas and offer moorings with all the services to make your stay a luxurious rest.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Gavà Mar, Gavà
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle dels Tellinaires

description: Single-family home with pool and views Spectacular single-family home of 306sqm on a plot of 430sqm in the best area of La Miranda, next to the international schools. It is a four-way house with access from two streets that is distributed over four comfortable floors; On the main floor it has a large living room of 47sqm, a large equipped office-style kitchen with access to the terrace and barbecue area, a bedroom and a courtesy toilet. On the first floor we find the master suite with access to a balcony and a full bathroom, two double bedrooms and another full bathroom. On the -1 floor it has two large multipurpose rooms, a laundry room and a terrace. On the -2 floor there is a large bedroom with a full bathroom and access to the pool and garden area. At street level is the garage with capacity for three vehicles. The property has gas heating by radiators, Split air conditioning, stoneware floors, built-in wardrobes and storage room. The house has lots of natural light and clear views. Excellent location; very close to services, shops and transport in the area.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Miranda - Ciutat Diagonal, Esplugues de Llobregat
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle de Santa Anna

description: Unique duplex penthouse next to Francesc Macià Engel & Völkers presents a spectacular and unique renovated duplex penthouse, next to Francesc Macià and 360º views. This duplex penthouse consists of 381m2 of housing and 200m2 of terraces in all areas of the house. It has 4 terraces and 5 suite rooms (4 of them totally exterior and with a dressing room included, and the 5th for the service). In total, this penthouse has 7 bathrooms. On the first floor we find the day area and two of the suites (one with a dressing room and the other for the service). In addition, two rooms, one for the day and the other for the night, both with terraces facing Diagonal or Tibidabo and Montjuic. In addition, an kitchen with the highest quality appliances and materials. The second floor would be the night area with 3 large suites with a dressing room and a large terrace of about 46m2 where you can access the upper terrace of approximately 150m2 with panoramic views of all of Barcelona. A dream place in the best area of Barcelona. Located in a quiet and charming area of Les Corts next to the emblematic Plaza de la Concordia. Ideal for people looking for the best of the city without giving up the tranquility and walks through the many gardens and squares of Les Corts. The Les Corts neighborhood is a highly sought after neighborhood as it has all the facilities for transportation, schools, a variety of supermarkets and shops, as well as proximity to large stores such as El Corte Inglés and the Illa Shopping Center. Diagonal. The Diagonal University Campus and the Camp Nou sports facilities (museum, ice rink) are also just a few minutes away. The proximity of Avenida Diagonal, and the multiple existing means of transport (Tram, Metro and buses) make the neighborhood one of the most sought after by Barcelonans. Also a few minutes from the Sants Station (AVE and suburban trains). It is the perfect choice for a quiet and organized life in the middle of the city.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Les Corts, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: House with garden and garage in Vila de Gràcia On a plot of 234sqm this beautiful house is located on three levels with several terraces, a garden and a huge garage, highly valued elements in the center of Gràcia. At street level is the entrance hall to the house and the garage of approximately 100 sqm. Given its size, in addition to parking cars, a workshop or gym could be installed, for example, since there is a small toilet at the back. The first floor houses a large living-dining room with a beautiful 35 sqm porch, from which the central stairs leading to the garden descend. A fully equipped kitchen with gallery, a courtesy toilet, an ironing room and the main room with an en-suite bathroom, dressing room and balcony facing the street. On the second floor there is a large office with a 26 m2 terrace facing south, two double bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms and one with a 12 m2 terrace. The house has all the comforts: parquet, gas heating and ducted air conditioning and a fireplace in the living room that makes it even more welcoming. A corner of tranquility in the center of Gracia to enjoy with the family! Located next to Plaça Joanic, in an unbeatable area of Gracia, close to all public transport, metro line 4 and buses, Vila de Gràcia leisure areas, shops, supermarkets, etc...
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Vila de Gràcia, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: This property to refurbish is an excellent opportunity in the heart of Barcelona, just 5 minutes away from Plaza Catalunya. The area has a large number of services, local shops, luxury boutiques, a shopping mall and public transport connection with the rest of the city and the metropolitan area. The property has 117 sqm of interior built surface area according to the Cadastre and a 18 sqm terrace that faces the back of the building. It's located on the first floor of a beautiful classical building in perfect condition with lift. The distribution clearly divides the day and night areas from the entrance. The living-dining room is spacious and allows to differentiate the 2 ambiences. It has 2 openings to the fantastic terrace, which is a great place to enjoy outdoor meals and meetings with friends and family. The kitchen is large, has space for table and chairs, offers plenty of storage space and is fitted with natural gas connection. The night area consists of 2 double bedrooms, each one with a balcony facing the street, a medium sized bedroom with access to an inner courtyard and a single bedroom with access to another courtyard. All of them have made-to-measure wardrobes. There's also a refurbished bathroom and a guest toilet. The flat has heating by natural gas radiators in all the rooms.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Raval, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

address: subdistrict Sant Pere - Santa Caterina i la Ribera
neighborhood: Sant Pere - Santa Caterina i la Ribera
description: Sensational high floor apartment to refurbish in a central location. This property to refurbish is a great opportunity very close to the city centre, between the Gothic Quarter and El Born, just 10 minutes away from Plaza Catalunya. The surrounding area has all of Barcelona's historical attractions, services, shops, restaurants and public transport connections. The flat has a built area of 143 sqm, is on the 6th real floor and occupies the entire length of the building, with double orientation to the street and to the interior. Its great height gives it tranquillity, silence, brightness and amazing views of the Cathedral of Barcelona from the living room. Currently, the flat has an excellent layout. The entrance hall enjoys plenty of natural light, as it overlooks the staircase courtyard. The spacious living-dining room is very bright and faces the street, while the kitchen is separate. There are 4 bedrooms (2 double ones and 2 single ones), a full bathroom and an interior terrace as laundry room. The property allows an easy refurbishment, without making big changes, which could create a new layout: an open plan living room, 3 bedrooms (one en-suite, one double and one single or office) and kitchen with laundry. It's also possible to recover the Catalan vault above the false ceilings. It's equipped with air conditioning by splits and heating by radiators. The building has a lift and a concierge service.

description: Impressive terraced house in Sant Just Desvern with communal area and pool. This wonderful terraced house built in 2019 stands out for its high quality materials and finishings, which offer all the modern conveniences you need to live in total comfort. It's located in a community with swimming pool, green areas and swings, perfect for families, in a very quiet residential area of Sant Just Desvern. The house is practically brand new and has 262 built interior sqm. It's totally exterior and the natural light fills all the spaces. Its excellent energy efficiency A, with aerotermia and underfloor heating through electricity, guarantee the best performance with very low expenses in light and heating. The house has a very good distribution and is divided into ground floor, upper floor and roof terrace, as well as a garage in the semi-basement. The entrance from the street leads to a first terrace of 20 sqm which serves as a porch, before passing to the main door. The living-dining room is large and extremely bright, thanks to the large windows that open onto a 32 sqm terrace with artificial grass. From this terrace, there's direct access to the communal garden. If we go back inside, the amazing kitchen equipped with home appliances, decalcification and osmosis system will delight you for its ample size and its brightness, as it has access to the terrace at the entrance. On this floor, there's also a complete bathroom. The upper floor is the night area, with 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The master bedroom en suite with its own bathroom has a 7 sqm balcony overlooking the communal area. The other 3 bedrooms are double and also exterior. On the roof top floor there are 2 terraces of 30 and 29 sqm with views to the mountain, perfect for sunbathing or meetings, and a laundry room. In the semi-basement there are 2 large parking spaces for 2 cars and 2 motorbikes (another parking space can be purchased for 25.000 €), a multipurpose room with natural light and a storeroom. The house is prepared for the installation of a lift if required.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Mas Lluí - Els Miralls, Sant Just Desvern
suggestedTexts.title: Terraced house

description: Apartment to reform in the Quadrat d'Or, Dreta de l'Eixample, Barcelona Apartment with great reform potential of 164m³ built according to cadastre, located in the emblematic Quadrat d'Or area, in l'Eixample Dreta.  The house is distributed in a spacious and bright living-dining room with large windows that allow plenty of natural light to enter and an original marble fireplace. These large windows also give access to two pleasant French balconies facing the street.  Large kitchen with dining room and vebtana that overlooks the patio. Independent water area.  They consist of a total of 4 rooms; 1 of them adjoins the living room with its own balcony, and next to it is a single one. The other two are on the other side of the hall, a double room with two rooms with a balcony overlooking the block patio and another double en suite.  Another courtesy full bathroom.  With a number of distribution and reform proposals. In addition, it preserves the style of the time, such as coffered ceilings and hydraulic floors.  Located on the top floor of a beautiful royal estate from the year 1900, very well preserved and recently restored.  Southeast orientation.  Great opportunity for investors and reformers!
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Dreta de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: This property is located in the upper part of Gracia, one of the most attractive neighbourhoods in Barcelona. The area offers a wide variety of shops and services for day to day life, public transport, large green areas, lively streets and squares and a charming range of leisure activities, bars and restaurants. This flat has 93 built interior sqm and a 7 sqm terrace. It's located on the 4th and last floor of a building with only 5 apartments. The building has a large and sunny communal terrace with sensational views of the whole city. The living-dining room is cosy and very bright, thanks to its perfect south orientation. It has access to the 7 m2 terrace, a perfect place to eat or relax outdoors. The kitchen is open to the day area and is equipped with induction hob, extractor hood and oven. The night area features 3 double bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The master bedroom en suite with its own bathroom and another one leads to the back of the building, while next to the living room there is a bedroom with exit to the terrace. The property is equipped with parquet floors, aerothermal system for hot/cold air conditioning by conducts and hot water, and aluminium exterior carpentry with thermal break and double glazing with air chamber. The building has a lift, video entry phone and low consumption LED lighting in communal areas. This is an exceptional opportunity to buy a flat with 3 bedrooms for this price in Barcelona, perfect to get the Golden Visa residency. Do not hesitate to contact Bcn Advisors to visit this penthouse and see the other properties available in the building. * Handover of the keys is planned for May/June 2023.

description: We present this property in the Les Corts neighborhood. Very well connected, with metro line 3, and the tram that runs along Avenida Diagonal. Neighborhood with parks and green areas that make it a quiet and elegant residential area. With several places of interest such as the Camp Nou, the Maternitat gardens, the Royal Monastery, the Pedralbes Palace with its wonderful gardens and the Cervantes park. Its commercial area stands out with centers such as L'Illa Diagonal, El Corte Inglés, as well as a great diversity of small shops and restaurants. This fabulous apartment is located in an unbeatable location, on Avenida Sarriá together with Diagonal. The building in which the apartment is located is from 1973, it has an elevator and porter service. The totally exterior apartment has 97 square meters built in which we find a hall, a large open and diaphanous living room with large windows that provide a lot of light to the room, a semi-open kitchen, two bedrooms, one single and one double, very bright thanks also to the large windows and a full bathroom. It has parquet floors and heating and air conditioning by splits. There is the possibility of buying or renting a parking space on the same property. It is a unique opportunity due to its exceptional condition and location. A perfect home to move into that offers many possibilities. We will be happy to assist you with any questions you may have regarding this property. We will offer you personalized advice and we will assist you without any commitment.

suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Avenida de Sarrià, 69

description: Sunny penthouse at Les Corts Engel & Völkers presents this fantastic penthouse with terrace facing southwest in a building with an elevator on Lluça street. It is a comprehensive reform with high-end qualities. The 75m2 propery has 3 bedrooms, two large singles with space for a wardrobe and a desk and one double with access to the terrace. Entering the property we find a charming hall from where we give way to the distributor hall; At our right the kitchen, fully equipped with integrated and paneled Teka appliances. Continuing down the corridor, the first bedroom with a window to the bright interior patio since we are on the top floor of the flat. The dining-living room is very sunny and with direct access to the terrace. From this room we access the second single bedroom and the master bedroom. The entire reform is carried out with high quality materials, AC5 laminated parquet, waterproof, lacquered doors of solid wood, aluminum carpentry with double glazing and blinds, installation of air conditioning and heating ducts. This area of Les Corts has all the services and facilities of the main arteries such as Gran Vía Carlos III and the Travessera de les Corts, while retaining the tranquility of the best residential areas of les Corts close to Plaça del Sòl de Baix and his gardens and Plaça Concordia. Heading north, the pedestrian boulevard of Gran Via Carlos III brings us in a few minutes one of the most exclusive shopping centers in Barcelona; Pedralbes Centre and El Corte Inglés, and very close to L'Illa too. You can enjoy walking, walks in the gardens of the Maternitat (7.68 hectares), whose extensive green spaces include several valuable buildings with modernist architectural heritage. The area features a library and municipal civic center. The campus of the Diagonal, and sports facilities of Camp Nou (Museum, ice rink) are next. Both well connected, near the train station (high speed, commuter... ) public transport and private car, near the entrances to the Diagonal, the Mig-round, Gran Via, and 15 minutes far from the airport.

description: This magnificent home is located in Montornès del Vallès, a municipality in the eastern Vallès region, located 32 km from the city of Barcelona. The mountains of Parc de la Serralada Litoral on the left and Turó de les Tres Creus on the right keep this quiet town, which offers attractive routes for hiking and to admire the splendor of the vegetation on the banks of the Mogent River.   This impressive 542 square meter villa is built on a large flat plot of 4.911 square meters. This large garden area has a swimming pool from which you can enjoy beautiful panoramic views of the mountains and the city.   The property is distributed in two floors. We enter the house through a comfortable hall that leads us into the areas of common use: a large living room of 62 square meters and fireplace, the office-style kitchen and a toilet. The spacious kitchen is fully equipped and has an integrated dining room and an island, with the added bonus of large storage space. The rest area consists of three double bedrooms and one single, in addition to the incredible suite with dressing room and full bathroom with bathtub and shower. The bedrooms have fitted wardrobes, air conditioning and heating. This plant also has a study.   On the second floor we find a large open space currently used as a living area with a reading room and a pool table.   The house also has a basement. We find in this area a pleasant living room and a wine cellar, ideal to enjoy moments with family and friends, as well as the garage with capacity for four cars. The house has high quality finishes, solid wood exterior and interior carpentry, wooden floors and armored door.   Another outstanding feature of this house is that it has a separate entrance to the garden area with pool, so you can hold events without having to enter the house.   We will be happy to assist you to help you with any questions you may have regarding this magnificent property. We will offer you personalized advice and teach it to you without any obligation.

suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle del Molí, 18

description: Splendid house with large garden and swimming pool Splendid house completely refurbished in July 2022. Located in the neighbourhood of Can Corominas in Sant Fost de Campsentelles, it is very well located in flat land. It has a constructed surface of 477 m2, plot of approx 1.306 m2 and large parking for 4 vehicles. From the street we access to the big garden which has a nice swimming pool partially surrounded by wooden floor.  We enter the house and on the ground floor, through a spacious hall, we access to the large living room with fireplace and to the dining room, next to the large kitchen. From here we go out onto a porched terrace where we find a summer dining room, the barbecue area, the laundry room and direct access to the garden and the swimming pool. On this floor, there is also a complete bathroom with shower, a bedroom and access to the garage and the multi-purpose room below it. The staircase leads up to the first floor where the sleeping area consists of a double bedroom with en-suite bathroom and three more double bedrooms sharing a full bathroom. All of them have built-in wardrobes. Between them there is a hallway leading to a large terrace. From the back of the garden there is access to the parking area and to a building which can be used as a tool shed or as an annexe to the main house. The finishes are of very good quality, new parquet flooring, the three bathrooms with a modern style and a large and spacious brand new kitchen, and has a perimeter alarm.  The whole house is exterior, with lots of light and we invite you to visit it because you will be captivated by it. Sant Fost de Campsentelles is located on the Vallès side of the Coastal Mountain Range, in the Vallès Oriental region and on the border with Maresme and Barcelonès. It is very easy to reach Granollers (capital of the region) and it is also 25 km away from the centre of Barcelona, 30 km from El Prat airport and 10 km from the beach (Tiana and Mongat). It is very well connected by public transport, 4 km from the train station (R2 Mollet-Sant Fost) and with the private roads AP-7, C-17 and C-33 in the direction of both Barcelona and Girona.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Fost de Campsentelles
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: Luxury 4-bedroom and 2-bathroom flat, with parking space included, located in a property with concierge service and elevator in the upper area. It is located next to 'Els Jardins del Turó del Putxet' and 'Passeig de Sant Gervasi', with hospitals, schools, and sports centers nearby, in one of the most exclusive areas of Barcelona. The house consists of a large living-dining room, fully equipped separate induction kitchen (with oven, fridge, dishwasher, microwave and washing machine) and a total of 4 bedrooms: one suite, 2 singles, and a medium sized room, currently used as an office. It counts with 2 full luxury bathrooms, one of them in-suite. It also has a 14sq m covered gallery that serves as a laundry room. The purchase price includes a parking space and storage room in the same property. The house is modern and up-to-date, and has excellent materials that guarantee an unbeatable finish, such as wood floors, lacquered woodwork, double glazing, etc. Natural gas. Parking space and storage room included. Property with porter's lodge and elevator. East facing and overlooking the street. AREA: Sarrià - Sant Gervasi - Sant Gervasi - Galvany. TRANSPORT: Metro-Vallcarca (L3), FGC-Av. Tibidabo, El Putxet, bus and Bicing.

description: Amazing property in Eixample Esquerra Engel & Völkers is pleased to present this magnificent property in one of the most exclusive areas of Eixample Esquerra.  It is a classic residence of 270 sqm, ideal for an excellent reform. Currently, the distribution of the house is perfectly divided into day zone and night zone. Entering from the spacious hall, on the right we have a huge living room of more than 60 sqm, with fireplace and 4 exterior windows, this connects with the large kitchen, followed by an office with gallery, which has access to the hall, and is attached to one of the bedrooms with bathroom, perfectly designed as a service area. In this wing we also have a second room raised as an office. And from the hall, on the left, we have the night area with 5 double bedrooms and two bathrooms, three of the rooms overlook a quiet interior patio facing south, so they are very bright. The building of 1950, is renovated and has a lift and concierge service. This property is located in one of the most pleasant stretches of Enric Granados, with garden area, an area with personality and charm in which to relax and enjoy the city, walking or sitting on a bench or on the terraces of its bars and restaurants. It is very well connected by public transport and a few minutes walk from Plaça Universitat and the Universitat metro station (L1-L2), also from several bus stops. The Eixample Esquerra district perfectly combines its residential function with the best leisure, culture and commerce (cinemas, restaurants, museums, University of Barcelona and a diversity of commercial shops and supermarkets). With a pleasant walk you reach Plaça Catalunya or Passeig de Gràcia, the nerve center of the city with an unbeatable communication.

The apartment consists of 83m2 built, living room - dining room, with access to a very bright balcony and unobstructed views, 2 double bedrooms and an office, independent kitchen and gallery, 1 bathroom, laundry room. Located close to shopping area, restaurants, theaters and shops. Connected to the rest of the city by public transport, with the Mercat Nou (L1) and Santa Eulalia (L1) metro stops.     Do not hesitate to contact SH Barcelona for more information or to arrange a visit. '.

description: This 125sqm flat is located in the area of Vallcarca i els Penitents, in the district of Gràcia. It is close to the Plaça d'Alfonso Comín, a few steps away from the metro stop Penitents, and surrounded by several green areas and parks such as Els Jardins del Turó del Putget. It is an area easily accessible by car via La Ronda de Dalt. As for its facilities, it has small shops, supermarkets, schools, libraries, a GP, the Quirón Clinic and the Vall d'Hebron Hospital. It is, in short, a privileged area that also has some examples of Catalan modernism, such as La Casa Marsans or La Casa Comes d'Argemir. The property is located in a building with a lift, concierge service and a communal swimming pool located on the roof terrace from where you can enjoy impressive views over the city of Barcelona and the sea. Inside the property, the entrance hall leads us to a spacious and bright living-dining room, with access to a magnificent and sunny terrace. Its orientation allows us to enjoy as much natural light as possible throughout the day. The kitchen is independent with an office design, with space for an auxiliary dining room. It also has direct access to the terrace and comes equipped with electrical appliances. The main entrance hall also leads us to the night area, where we will find a total of three bedrooms and two bathrooms. The master bedroom is en-suite, with built-in wardrobes and a private bathroom with hydro-massage bathtub. Next to this suite, there is a double bedroom and a single bedroom. It is worth mentioning that all the rooms are exterior and very bright. Finally, in front of the independent bathroom, we find a space destined to be used as a utility room for a washing machine, a dryer and boiler equipment, which can also be used as storage space or pantry. The flat comes with a parking space (not included in the price) and the possibility of acquiring another parking space. Moreover, it also has chargers pre-installation for electric cars. Excellent opportunity for a spacious and bright flat in a quiet and well communicated area. AREA: Gràcia - Vallcarca i els Penitents. PUBLIC TRANSPORT: Metro (L3 - Penitents), Bus, Bicing.

description: Chance! Spacious and bright 112 m² apartment distributed in a living-dining room, three bedrooms, an independent kitchen, two bathrooms, a terrace and a hall. It has wooden floors and stoneware, aluminum windows, PVC shutters, equipped kitchen, natural gas heating installation... All in good condition. Ideal for families. It is a 1st floor in a recently built block with an elevator. Good road communications (BP-1503) and public transport. Next to several bus stops. Close to all kinds of services and infrastructure such as educational centers (Instituto La Serreta), shops, supermarkets, restaurants, pharmacies, banks, green areas (Plaza de Can Oriol)...

description: Independent single-family house consisting of three floors, consisting of seven bedrooms, two bathrooms and a toilet. It is located in the town of Corbera de Llobregat, in the province of Barcelona. The house has three floors. The main floor has a living-dining room, access to a balcony/terrace, toilet, kitchen, two bedrooms and a hall. The basement is a space for storage and garage. The upper floor has five bedrooms, a toilet and a bathroom. It is surrounded by a large garden with a barbecue area and two independent storage rooms. In addition, there is a small house in the garden area that has a living room, kitchen and a bathroom. It has stoneware floors, fitted wardrobes... It requires reform to enter to live, but offers many possibilities. The property is located in a quiet area, surrounded by residential homes with similar characteristics. Good communications by road (N-II) and public transport. Located 1.3 kilometers from the center of Sant Andreu de la Barca and about 5 kilometers from Corbera de Llobregat, where it is possible to find all kinds of services such as health centers, educational centers, shops, supermarkets, shops...

description: Sophisticated penthouse of 135 m2 is located in one of the most beautiful buildings of the skyline of Barcelona. The distribution is structured in living room and kitchen, partially integrated by sliding doors, and bathroom. The exterior beauty is part of this great social space, thanks to the glazing system that gives access to a terrace of 30 m2. This unique outdoor space has been designed in a “L” shape to make the most of the unbeatable location. The views are panoramic, where the Mediterranean Sea merges into the perfect Barcelona. The night area is composed of the master bedroom suite, a double bedroom and a bathroom. The finishes are modern and the equipment is high-end and exquisite taste. The property is in perfect condition, since it has been renovated in 2017. The estate has modern style, where discretion and elegance are the keys. It has a concierge service and 24-hour security. The property has two underground parking spaces in the same building and a storage space. The Poblenou neighborhood is one of the most personal neighborhoods in Barcelona. Located in the maritime sector of Sant Martí, still retains its essence of popular neighborhood that formerly also housed factories, especially textiles, which with new times have become home to new technology companies. The charm of its Rambla full of life, commerce and tapas is the nerve center of neighborhood life where you eat very well, and leads the way to the beaches of Bogatell. In the neighborhood one breathes airs of art, culture and creativity in its museums like the Diseny Hub, its galleries, workshops and the Palo Alto Market. Its streets combine cafes and restaurants of all kinds, in a neighborhood that does not lose the soul of a town by the sea where people greet each other as they pass. In the neighborhood you can find apartments to invest, small houses and industrial buildings converted into fantastic lofts. It is an ideal neighborhood for families as well as for friendly and cosmopolitan people. El Poblenou can be the ideal neighborhood to live in if you are willing to be part of a quiet and friendly community to live in. It can also be a profitable neighborhood for a good investment. If your dream is to live in a warehouse converted into lofts with industrial airs, this is your ideal place, but also if you want to live a step away from the beach with a lifestyle attached to it, where you can eat very well and discover a new place every day.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Poblenou, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: Modernist house near the Park Güell Wonderful family house that has 175 sqm of constructed area; it was built in 1898 and was completely renovated in 2009. This is a classic summer house of the Barcelona bourgeoisie adapted to current needs and with a magnificent top floor with spacious terraces to enjoy the sun all year. The generous ground floor that preserves the original "voltes catalanes" is almost totally diaphanous and contains the entry, the living room, the dining room and an open kitchen. The living room accedes to a private patio with a lush bougainvillea that can be a pleasant summer dining. This ground floor is completed by a large double bedroom and a bathroom with shower. Furthermore, it's possible to add one or two new bedrooms because the wide avalaible space. A staircase in "L" from the living room leads to the upper floor which lands directly in the spacious master bedroom en suite, dressing room and with huge terraces that surround it, giving extraordinary visual amplitude. It's also possible to add a new room. Due to its strategic location, this house can also present a great investment opportunity to capitalize on the tourism that transits to and from Park Güell. We have a project for tourist exploitation and commerce at street level on the ground floor. Contact us for more information. The building is 250 meters from the entrance of Park Güell, in an area which schools (2 public and 2 half public), sports facilities ("La Salut" tennis club or "Natación Cataluña" swim club) and health care (Hope Hospital or Mutuam Guell). Public transport is guaranteed by the 116 bus, which stops just 25 meters from the house and takes us to the Lesseps metro, accessible after a short 15 minutes walk (L3 Lesseps).

description: Fantastic property with parking and pool Exclusive property that combines two registration entities, housing and office, in the same community area, exposed work from the year 2000 perfectly preserved with garden and pool. Includes 2 parking spaces and storage room. Additionally it has 2 more parking spaces. The fantastic apartment currently has two double rooms, one of them en suite, the other double room used to be two and they were put together. Two bathrooms, one of them in the suite. All exterior and three winds. Parquet floors, qualities and high-end brands. With an S-O orientation. Located on the first floor. Spacious and bright living room and an open kitchen, utility area, all with a N-E orientation. Large and quiet terrace. A spacious multipurpose room located on the lower floor, which has access from the living room, can serve as a third bedroom. It is currently a games room and home cinema. We access the property through the community area as well as the vehicles to reach the parking lot, a few meters from the entrance and already within the same enclosure we find the commercial premises, of more than one hundred square meters and which is perfectly suitable for a consultation medical or an office for any profession. One of the walls adjoins the lower floor of the house described, so it could be perfectly communicated, although the convenience of this property is having it independent and separate. Next to it we will find the entrance door to the lobby of the three-storey building where we will access the house or the parking lot with 2 elevators. Concierge service. Sensor alarm, video intercom, CCTV. Virtual-tour:  The property is located a stone's throw from the emblematic and charming neighborhood of Sarriá, on Paseo Bonanova, in one of the most exclusive residential areas with the most tradition and history in the Zona Alta of Barcelona, the Bonanova neighborhood, in a privileged enclave. Very well connected by rail, bus and direct exits to the main access roads to Barcelona such as the Vía Augusta and the Ronda de Dalt that allow you to reach the airport. A few meters from shops and services. Very close to the most prestigious international schools and sports clubs in the city, as well as the prestigious Teknon and Quirón clinics.

description: Extraordinary main floor to renovate of 270 m2 of housing overlooking the Port Vell in a regal estate in the Gothic Quarter. The wonderful high ceilings with wooden beams and volta catalana, the hydraulic floors in good condition, the wooden doors of the beautiful balconies overlooking the Passeig de Colom and the Port Vell, and the original walls intact, architectural elements typical of the constructions of the beginning of the last century of the Ciutat Comtal, which deserve to be rescued in an exquisite and spectacular reform that will be characterized by the spaciousness and brightness of the spaces naturally illuminated by the 7 balconies that surround the corner property. It currently has five large bedrooms and three bathrooms, and three balconies overlooking the Passeig de Colom. The space could be segregated into two properties, in whose existing project there would be two houses, one of 209 m2 and the other of 94 m2 built. The property has the project to install the elevator, which makes this property an excellent investment opportunity and to be able to revalue it in the near future. The Gothic Quarter is the oldest and most interesting part of the city. It is bounded by Las Ramblas, Via Laietana, Paseo Colón and Plaza de Catalunya, each of these points alone has its own importance and history. With its narrow streets and irregular structure, several of its buildings have been built on the Romanesque remains of the city, so you can get an apartment with at least one wall dating back to Roman times. It is the tourist district par excellence so it represents an assured investment, especially if you are near one of its attractions such as the Cathedral, the Plaza Sant Jaume with the City Hall and the Palace of the Generalitat, the Plaza Real, the famous Rambas, and the Museum of History of the city. The Gothic Quarter could be your neighborhood if you are looking to make a profitable investment or acquire an excellent pied-à-terre in an iconic and storied neighborhood with great history, private buildings, tourism and with all kinds of businesses at hand such as bars, restaurants, libraries, and many magical corners to discover and tour.
