description: This charming apartment of almost 200m2 has been completely renovated inspired by the majestic Parisian flats, taking advantage of the generous height of 3.70m of its ceilings, its large windows, and the open view of the corner flats of Eixample. One of its strong points is its optimal and fluid distribution without corridors that takes advantage of each of its square meters. An unburdened entrance hall of 15.50m2 divides the day and night area, and is the anteroom to a multipurpose space converted into a loft from where you can admire the elegant kitchen with first class finishes. Beautiful custom-designed Verrièrres frame this area leading to the 25m2 living room and the large dining room with seating for 8 people. The master suite can be accessed from the entrance hall or from the day area, connected to a living room that integrates conveniently with the suite or the dining room through imposing sliding doors. Without adding this multipurpose space, the suite adds almost 30m2 including a dressing room with fitted wardrobes and a large bathroom with Neolith finishes. The spacious secondary bedrooms are 21m2 and 15m2 and have en-suite bathrooms and fitted wardrobes. The natural oak parquet floors in herringbone, moldings, Neolith finishes and Smeg appliances demonstrate the quality and care with which this apartment of Art Deco-inspired elegance was created. La Dreta de L’Eixample begins in Plaça de Catalunya and its central axis revolves around the Passeig de Gràcia and the Cuadrat d’Or. It is delimited from the busy Calle Balmes to the renovated Passeig de Sant Joan and from the commercial Ronda Sant Pere to the convenient Avinguda Diagonal. It is one of the most expensive and exclusive neighborhoods in Barcelona, along with Pedralbes and Sarrià-Sant Gervasi. It is impossible not to make reference to the luxury of Passeig de Gràcia, with the boutiques of the most exclusive brands in the world, or to the stores on La Rambla de Catalunya. However, the rest of its streets are as or more interesting. In them resided part of the Catalan textile bourgeoisie of the early twentieth century, which has left its mark on the spectacular royal estates and modernist houses designed by the most famous architects of the time, as the Pedrera or Casa Batlló of the great Antoni Gaudí. As a result, the characteristic homes of this neighborhood are spacious apartments with high ceilings, moldings, elaborate flooring and balconies. Many buildings and apartments preserve this original architectural heritage and it is possible to find recently remodeled apartments, penthouses, lofts and even studios, which revive these elements, as well as apartments with a lot of potential to be reformed. This side of L’Eixample is equipped with all kinds of services and stores, as well as educational centers, mainly state-subsidized and private schools. You will find it very easy to move around on foot or through the public transport connections to the most expensive stores and restaurants in the city. The Eixample Dreta is the best neighborhood if you want to admire and live in the noble zone of the fascinating Catalan modernism, to reside in one of its characteristic regal estates, and to coexist in perfect balance with the vibrant and luxurious commercial life. It is ideal if you want to walk every day through its wide and tidy streets, with easy transport connections, have all kinds of services and facilities available, including arranged or private schools, and enjoy the most chic, cultural and cosmopolitan atmosphere in Barcelona.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Dreta de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Renovated finca regia near Passeig de Gracia We are delighted to offer this stunning 2 bedroom flat in a fully renovated historical building with 10 immaculate flats located just off Barcelona’s renowned shopping avenue of Passeig de Gracia.  Each home has been expertly designed in both style and functionality. While classical Barcelona architectural features have been restored in order to impart the essence of the building’s history as a ‘finca regia’. Contemporary design features convey both calmness and tranquility while coinciding alongside the traditional architectural aspects.  A glass foyer welcomes you into the home before entering into the contemporary designed kitchen that opens onto the living room. Featuring two balconies, this home is well luminated and has a sense of connection with the city as all rooms face exterior.  Separate day and night zones impart spaciousness and privacy, and at the rear of the flat we find the master suite. Wide plank oak wood floors lengthen the space. Wardrobes are cleverly integrated throughout. Spacious bathrooms are outfitted with premium fixtures.  Restored architectural details include the building’s facades, Catalan vaulted ceilings, the building’s entrance and staircase, in addition to integrating original hydraulic floors in the bathrooms.  The property features premium brands and construction materials for maximizing comfort: Miele appliances, Mitsubishi aerothermia, Bulthaup kitchens, Duravit appliances, and more. Specific measures have been undertaken for maximizing privacy and sound control, such as new double glazed windows and reinforced floor substrates. The elegant neighbourhood of Eixample is characterized by its visionary Modernista architecture, independent shops, chic boutiques and café culture.  The property is situated in the heart of Eixample’s ‘Quadrat d’Or’ (‘Golden Square’), just one block from the tree-lined shopping avenue of Passeig de Gràcia. Barcelona has transformed since the Olympic Games in 1992, and the Catalan capital has become a mecca for creatives and entrepreneurs from all over the world thanks to its growing reputation as a major hub for start-ups and technological innovation. Spain’s second city continues to lead the way in cutting-edge, international cuisine and currently is home to more than 30 Michelin starred restaurants. One of Europe’s leading ‘Smart’ cities, its credentials include 500 kilometres of optical fibre, free WiFi via its street lighting and sensors to monitor air quality. Property is in high demand, particularly in the prime districts of Barcelona Old Town and Eixample, the city’s vibrant, cultural core. In the 1900s this coveted neighbourhood was built by Barcelona’s bourgeoisie, who competed to create the most aesthetically refined homes. In recent years this area has undergone a major revival and has become a magnet for international buyers, especially with the concentration of a number of luxury developments.

description: It is a fantastic property in a magnificent location in the center of the city, on Consell de Cent street, one of the streets chosen as the green axis of the city. The house stands out for the amplitude in all its spaces, it has a very good distribution, with the day area and the night area well differentiated. Entering it, a large hall welcomes us and gives us access, on its right, to the day area consisting of the kitchen, a large living-dining room with access to the balcony and a courtesy bathroom. To the left of the entrance is the night area, with two single rooms and the master bedroom, with a dressing room and a complete bathroom en suite. - Large living room - Kitchen - 2 full bathrooms (one of them en suite) - 3 bedrooms, one of them suite * Beautiful royal estate * Elevator * Mercadona just 1 minute walk * Close to public transport (Rocafort metro red line) * Very close to Plaza España.

description: Big and bright flat in classic Eixample building Between Passeig de Gràcia and Passeig Sant Joan in a modernist building with a spectacular entrance, we find this magnificent 175 sqm apartment with currently four bedrooms. In the apartment you can recover the original ceiling that reaches about 3.5 meters in height and possibly other period features such as the mosaic floors.  Upon entering we find ourselves in a generous reception hall that clearly marks the functional layout of the property with the day and night areas well separated. To the left of the entrance we have the day area with a large kitchen with access to a gallery where the laundry area is located. Right in front of the kitchen we have a built-in wardrobe and a single bedroom. We then move on to the living room, which with its three huge windows and balconies that overlook the street, receives plenty of natural light throughout the day.  To the right of the apartment entrance we have the night area with three double bedrooms and another built-in wardrobe. In this area we also have a bathroom of about 14 m2 that can easily be divided into two full bathrooms one of which could also be turned into an en-suite bathroom. Each of the two double bedrooms facing the inner court patio has its own gallery.  This is an apartment with an unmatched potential to become a luxury home in the heart of the city, a home that offers large and bright spaces, a very central yet quiet location and the possibility of recovering elements such as very high ceilings. All that right in the heart of Barcelona. This property is located literally in the heart of Eixample Dreta and the so-called Quadrat d’Or, right on the emlematic Passeig Sant Joan and next to Plaça Catalunya, the core city center of Barcelona, the luxury shops of Passeig de Gràcia, the trendy neighborhood of Born, the Ciutadella park and the Arc del Triomf. Another advantage of this property is its unbeatable location in relation to the means of transportation: the bus lines of Plaza Cataluña, the metro lines L1, L2 and L3, the railways of the Generalitat, Renfe trains and the bus line to the airport are a few meters away from this magnificent property.  Its privileged location is completed by a wide cultural offer. Nearby we have the Museum of Contemporary Art of Barcelona (MACBA), the CCCB Cultural Center, and monuments such as Casa Battló, the Palau de Música concert hall and the Barcelona Cathedral among others. We also emphasize the great offer of fitness centers, theaters, restaurants and bars, movie theaters, the El Triangle shopping center and the department store El Corte Inglés in Plaza Cataluña.

description: Splendid four-bedroom apartment in Maragall We enter the promotion where we are received by a large hall giving way to the elevator. The building has 4 floors, one floor per floor, and a duplex ground floor with 2 rooms. Upon entering the apartment on the right hand side we find the spacious kitchen with a large window through which it receives a lot of light, it is equipped with high and low cabinets, fully extractable drawers with self-brake, hinges with retention and integrated LED in high cabinets. Silestone worktop and fronts with a single stainless steel sink and single-lever faucet. Equipped with class A+ appliances (induction hob, oven and microwave). Next we have two double rooms that share a complete bathroom with a bathtub. To the left of the hall, we find the spacious 26m2 living room with access to a large terrace of about 15m2; just to the left we find a single room with access to the terrace. On the other side of the living room is the main room, with its full bathroom with shower. This apartment is completed with the communal area on the ground floor with a swimming pool. This sunny development of 5 homes is located in the Baix Guinardó, in a street next to the metro stop Maragall on line L5. It is a very well connected area and full of services which, at the same time, is sheltered from the noisy going and coming from tourists from the nearby Sagrada Familia. In its surroundings we can enjoy the gardens of the Doctor Pla i Armengol, from the Municipal Sports Center Guinardó and of course the well-kept parks of the imposing enclosure of the Hospital de Sant Pau. Considered the most important modernist complex in Europe, declared World Heritage by UNESCO. It is now the headquarters of European Forest Institute, the Global University Network for Innovation or the Institute of the University of Nations Nations on Globalization, Culture and Mobility, among others.

The property is distributed in a bright living room with large windows that allow a lot of natural light to enter and give access to the pleasant terrace with views of Tibidabo that surrounds the apartment.  Independent kitchen fully equipped with high-end appliances.  It has 3 rooms; 1 double en-suite with access to the terrace and dressing room, 1 single en-suite with full bathroom and a very spacious double room. The two doubles are exterior and the single one is interior.  It is located on a totally exterior corner 3rd floor on a farm with a concierge service.  New plumbing and electrical installation, parquet floors, fitted wardrobes, aluminum windows with air chamber, air conditioning and heating.  Large storage room included in the price and parking space for rent next to the house.  Located in an unbeatable area, a quiet neighborhood close to all services, leisure and restaurant areas, parks and gardens and very well connected to public transport.

Continuing we find a big kitchen that fits a big dining table. At the end of the hallway we have the living area with access to a big balcony. The room is very bright due to the big vindues facing the street.  From the living room we have access to the last two rooms and bathroom. One room is facing the street and the other interior. This apartment was renovated only a few years ago and is in a great state ready to move in. The flat has a parking spot in the same building which is included in the price. description: This recently renovated 116 m² apartment is located on the main floor of a well-preserved building on Carrer Sepúlveda, in the Barcelona neighbourhood of Sant Antoni.  The apartment enjoys high ceilings of more than 3 metres and has been renovated in a beautiful style, with wooden floors, porcelain tiles in the bathrooms, led lighting, heating and air conditioning.  Upon entering, we find the open kitchen, fully equipped with the best qualities and a bar. To the side is the spacious living-dining room, with two exits to a continuous balcony of 3.5 m² with views of the street. In front of the living room, there is a small room that could be used as a single bedroom.  Returning to the spacious hall, we find a storage area with a window that overlooks the interior patio, which belongs to this house. On the right-hand side, there is a small double bedroom, with access to another private interior patio. Right in front there is a study area and then we come to the laundry room, the area for the boiler and a bathroom, which serves the entire home.  Finally, we find the master bedroom with its own complete bathroom, a large dressing area and a terrace of about 13 m².  The renovation has painstakingly restored the original woodwork and exposed brick walls, adding charm and character to this beautiful home.  Contact us for more information about this attractive renovated apartment in an excellent neighbourhood of Barcelona.

description: Bright duplex in Provençals del Poblenou 139 square meter duplex in perfect condition, ready to move in. Located in a 2008 building with elevator and 24 hour surveillance. The apartment has 4 bedrooms, 2 doubles and 2 singles. and 3 bathrooms. Large windows that overlook a very quiet block with lots of light. Gas heating throughout the apartment and cold air through ducts. A spacious parking space located in the same building which is included in the price. The apartment is located in Provençals de Poblenou, just a 15-minute walk from the beach and a few steps from the metro, tram and bus stations. A 10-minute walk from the Diagonal Mar shopping center and 15 minutes from the Plaza de Glories. Restaurants, parks and supermarkets less than 200m away.

suggestedTexts.title: Duplex

description: Modern house with views for sale Valldoreix Elegant and bright house with privileged views of Montserrat and La Mola, with approx. 150 m2 of construction and located on a plot of approx. 1,000 m2. It was completely renovated in 2014. Its urbanistic qualification is 20ª/10, so it can be extended up to 500 m2 approx. Modern and functional design with 4 bedrooms, 3 complete bathrooms, 1 storage room, 1 machine room, 2 terraces, swimming pool, garden and 6 parking spaces (outside). Very well located 800 meters from the FGC, close to all kinds of services, 10 minutes from the village, easy access to the AP7 and C-16. It is distributed in 2 independent floors. The ground floor has 1 multipurpose room of 40 m2 approx. , with lots of light, 1 bathroom, 1 closet and 1 storage room. On the first floor, as soon as you enter the house, the landscape is striking with views that can be enjoyed from the dining room, living room, kitchen and terrace. The designer kitchen, Santos, is open to the American style dining room, giving a feeling of spaciousness. The laundry area with window, consists of sink and pantry cabinet. We also find 1 full bathroom, 2 double bedrooms, and a third suite with its own bathroom, all bathrooms with windows. Two of the rooms have access to the garden. All the enclosures are very efficient, Thecnal brand. At the top of the plot you can appreciate even more spectacular views and dreamy sunsets, where you can enjoy a beautiful wooden terrace with large south facing pool that enjoys the sun all day. Your house ready to move in! The property is located in the quiet and private urbanization of Valldoreix, a few minutes walk from the railroad station, close to all kinds of services and with easy access to the C-16 road that leads directly to Barcelona in a few minutes.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Valldoreix, Sant Cugat del Vallès
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house

description: Nice house very well located in Sant Cugat Nice house divided in two floors, conveniently located between the train stations of Sant Cugat, Valldoreix and Mirasol. The house is made of bricks, surrounded by a garden with lawn and pool facing south, with a small wooden house of 4m x 4m, barbecue area and spacious entrance to park in the days requested, up to 7 cars. On the ground floor is the large kitchen brand Santos Island in the middle, a table for 6 people and fully equipped with all integrated appliances and two ovens, one professional Smeg. From the kitchen you access the living room by sliding door which has openings at the north and south, to go directly to the porch and pool. On this floor, we have a double room facing south, a large bathroom and a storeroom. Arriving at the first floor by the stairs, we found a large distributor with wardrobes from where we have access to the rooms. On this floor are 3 bedrooms, a bathroom and a suite with bathroom and large dressing room. All rooms are large and bright. Noting that the two floors are connected by 3-seat lift, and the whole house is designed so that it can move smoothly a wheelchair. In addition, all windows have mosquito nets and electric shutters with double glazed PVC 6 + 3 and that the house has an alarm and smoke detector. Arxius area is one of the top residential area of the city. You will enjoy of a strategic location that allows quick access to Barcelona through the Vallvidrera tunnels or A-2, C-58 and AP-7 motorways. The property is near from the train station and just a few minutes to the Sant Cugat city center. A lot of international families are living here, so there is a cool, dynamic and cosmopolitan atmosphere.

description: This magnificent property is located on the fifth royal floor of a rehabilitated period building, with an lift and concierge service. It is a completely renovated property, with all the comforts and ready to move into.    The property consists of a large and luxurious living room - dining room with an open kitchen and access to two beautiful balconies facing Paseo de Gracia. In the night area, we find three double bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, two of them with en-suite bathroom. We also have a third full bathroom that serves the rest of the space.    The apartment was renovated taking care of all the details and achieving an elegant and contemporary style, according to a property like this. description: Town house in Montmeló Engel & Völkers presents this exclusive home in the center of Montmeló. The property dates from 1900, it has seven rooms, all double and one single, two bathrooms, garden, backyard and terrace. Entering the house we are welcomed by a hall, where at the bottom of it, we find the first room and the only individual room in the house. We continue entering and we arrive at the extraordinary staircase, on the right hand side we find the equipped kitchen and in front, the living-dining room with access to the garden and a fireplace. Continuing through the day area, we find a bathroom with a shower, a double room with access to the backyard and the old pantry of the house. Going up the stairs, we find architectural details, such as the three arches, which welcome us to the night area. In front of the stairs we find two of the five double rooms, with windows that open onto a large terrace and views of the garden. Continuing to the right, we find another double room, the bathroom equipped with a bathtub on the upper floor, and two more rooms. All rooms have fitted wardrobes. The house maintains the original facade, has heating and natural gas. We invite you to visit this property. The municipality of Montmeló has an area of 4.11 km2 and is located in the Vallés Oriental just 20 km from Barcelona. Montmeló has almost 9,000 inhabitants and is a municipality basically residential that has been characterized by having a very orderly urban growth, with many areas of Low density of houses, wide spaces and green areas. In 1911 the Circuit de Catalunya was inaugurated, built mostly in the municipality of Montmeló, and that has made the name of the municipality known throughout the world. The municipality preserves an archaeological heritage important, mainly due to the period deposits Republican Roman, among which stand out the Roman villa of Can Massot, in the urban center and the site of Can Taco on the mount of the Tres Creus. This last one is declared a Cultural Asset of National Interest in the category of archaeological zone. The population has a wide range of activities cultural, sports, educational and leisure events that take place in the different municipal facilities: Music School, library, cultural center, multipurpose room, schools of primary and secondary, kindergarten, sports hall, field soccer fields, swimming pools, sports courts, training centers for adults, home for the elderly, training center occupational, museum and primary care center. It should be noted that the municipality is a town with very good communication both by public transport (Station of train and buses) as well as on the road where we highlight the AP7, one of the main communication routes with the rest of Europe, the C17 (Barcelona-Vic) and the C33.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Montmeló
suggestedTexts.title: Terraced house

description: Magnificent home in a stately building, located on one of the most iconic avenues in Barcelona (Avenida Diagonal). It is located a few meters from Pau Claris Street and Paseo de Gracia. The property is located on the first floor of the building with access to a large private terrace and storage room.  It is located in a building from 1930 that is in a very good state of conservation, which is accessed from Avinguda Diagonal. It has a stately entrance of classic architecture and has a main elevator and freight elevator through which the kitchen is accessed privately. The building also has a communal terrace.  Upon entering the property, we find a spacious hall that distributes the right-hand part of the house with a nice and a double bedroom with generous wardrobes that overlook Diagonal Avenue. On the same entrance landing there is a courtesy toilet. To the left and from the entrance, we find a corridor that leads us to a double bedroom with a private bathroom that has access to an interior patio. Opposite, and with double access from the hallway, is a large kitchen. It can also be accessed by a service access using the forklift. Continuing along the corridor, we find a distributor that organizes on the right a magnificent double bedroom with a generous dressing room that has access to an interior patio, and access to the terrace at the back of the bedroom. Opposite this bedroom, we find another room and a full bathroom to the right. Finally, past the distributor, we have a beautiful living room used as an office, with an incredible window that provides a lot of light to the house. From this room, as well as from another room, we access the large private terrace, which has an area of 120 m², with a generously sized storage room at the back.  The entire house has gas heating, as well as air conditioning with a split system in part of the property. In addition, it has wooden floors, a fully equipped kitchen and double Climalit PVC windows.  The house is located in the center of Diagonal Avenue, in the heart of Barcelona, next to Paseo de Gracia and Pau Claris Street and very close to the Casa de los Pinchos. The area is very well connected, close to the best shops in the city.  Contact Lucas Fox for more information.

description: Exclusive homes for sale of 169m² plus 114m² private garden in Kennedy Square. The flat is part of the promotion of luxury homes for sale on Balmes 443 Street. It has a spacious and bright living room with direct access to the terrace and the garden, facing the gardens of Pasaje Maluquer Street. Modern independent kitchen with dinning area with Bulthaup furniture and Neff appliances (induction hob, oven, microwave, extractor hood and dishwasher). 3 bedrooms (2 on suite). All rooms have fitted, lacquered and lined wardrobes and the suites have dressing room. 3 full bathrooms with Porcelanosa ceramics and Hansgrohe taps. Floors are floating parquet finished in natural oak herringbone wood and Porcelanosa porcelain stoneware in the kitchen and bathrooms. Underfloor heating and cold and air conditioning by aerothermal. It has exterior aluminum carpentry with high thermal and acoustic performance glass and motorized blinds. Control of the main functions of the flat through home automation. Excellent finishes with high quality materials. Without furniture. Building with video surveillance service, concierge service and community area with pool, solarium area and incredible views of the city, the sea and Tibidabo mountain. Possibility of acquiring storage rooms and parking spaces. Balmes 443 is a historic building, listed, restored and renovated with exquisite taste. The rehabilitation project has contemplated the restoration of the facades and the conservation of the most iconic elements such as balconies, staircase, marble floor, wrought iron main door and wooden doors of the flats. Kennedy Residencial is a promotion of luxury homes in the heart of the Sant Gervasi district, one of the most select residential areas in Barcelona. "Contact us to ask for more information or visit the property".

description: Excellent renovated and bright apartment in Gotic Fantastic renovated apartment in the Gothic Quarter, 105m2 on a second real floor and with three double bedrooms. The original elements such as windows and doors, hydraulic floors and crafted ceilings with wooden beams have been preserved. The distribution is fantastic, taking advantage of both facades both facing Ataúlf street, where there are two of the three rooms, each with a balcony to the outside, and on the inside, the large living room and third room facing a quiet and beautiful block patio full of trees and flooding the house with lots of light. It has been recently renovated, having a spacious and central kitchen that acts as a connector for the house. A very unique piece in the neighborhood. In the Gothic Quarter of Barcelona there are still remains of the Roman history of more than 2000 years ago. Including parts of the ancient Roman wall dating back to the 4th century and subway Roman ruins. Located in the heart of the historic center, in this neighborhood we find prestigious buildings, cultural monuments such as the cathedral of Barcelona, a magnificent example of Catalan Gothic architecture. The Gothic Quarter is very well connected to the city's public transport network and you can easily walk through the charming little streets to reach the new luxury marina, restaurants and tapas bars. The picturesque Born district is just five minutes away. The main avenues of Barcelona, such as the Rambla de Catalunya and Passeig de Gràcia are no more than a twenty minute stroll away.

The social area has a living-dining room with large windows that provide light and sun, and a semi-integrated kitchen. The night area consists of 3 bedrooms (two exterior doubles and one single) and 2 bathrooms. There is a space that has been left for a "home office", but it could become a fourth room. The flat is completed by a small gallery that functions as a water area. The renovation of the apartment, in charge of a prestigious interior designer, has resulted in an elegant and contemporary space with a very careful design and with all the current comfort elements. Located next to Avda. Diagonal, and very close to the Barrio de Gràcia, the flat is surrounded by landmark buildings of modernism era such as La Sagrada Familia, La Casa de les Punxes or El Palau Macaya. On the second floor in day area, we find, kitchen, laundry-machine room, bathroom with shower, living room with access to the terrace. In attic floor we find a multipurpose room of about 30m2 where to locate another bedroom, games room, gym. and with access to a solarium terrace overlooking the sea.  Electric gate, hot water and gas heating, fitted closets, fireplace, air conditioning.

description: Wonderful house to enjoy in Corbera de Llobregat Welcome to a simply and excellent property. It has 568 m2 of construction on a plot of nearly 1700 m2. Oriented so that the Sun is present throughout the day both in the home and garden area. Construction of the year 1986 with permanent updates which makes a home than us and notice the passage of time. Entering and passing through the receiver awaits the large lounge with fireplace, bright, airy and with exit to the garden and swimming pool area. On the same floor office, kitchen with exit to the garden and modern. Pantry, laundry room, bathroom, a bedroom and a room used as a study complete plant. On the top floor the rest area with the master suite with bathroom full further three bedrooms, all doubles and foreign, at the end, another room that at the moment it is a reading room. Abroad, everything from low-maintenance, artificial grass and stones, the magnificent swimming pool and good taste for plants and flowers make it truly unique. It is interesting to note that the House possesses certificate of energy C thanks to its solar panels, propane gas, insulation and especially the brightness. A House for demanding people who appreciate quality, good taste and want to fulfill your dream of having a lovely home. Visit! The House is located in Can Margarit P1, an attractive estate of Corbera de Llobregat, which combines the taste of the neighborhood, the convenience of access and the benefit of all services, mainly the student. It is 20 minutes from Barcelona by car and is accessed by the A-2, B-24, B-2421 Also has all the services of Corbera de Llobregat, La Palma de Cervelló and Pallejà, unless of 5 minutes, which are complete.

description: Exclusive corner flat in Mas Durán, St Quirze EXCEPTIONAL HOME - UNIQUE IN THE AREA Exclusive and spacious home with great views of the Morisca's Parc, in the heart of the highest valued area in Sant Quirze, due to its excellent level of services and communications. A cozy home, completely renovated in 2020, which impresses with the quality of the building (only six neighbors) and the warmth and elegance of its decoration. The access door opens into a spacious hall that gives way to the kitchen on the left and the attractive corner living-dining room, with large windows to the southeast and plenty of natural light. A pleasant 16 m² terrace surrounds the living room, with views of the wide street and the park. Very spacious and bright, the kitchen has high-end furniture, with a central island with a bar for four people, ideal as an informal dining room, directly connected to the living room. With air conditioning and radiators, the comfort temperature is guaranteed all year round. The polished parquet and the neutral finishes create a diaphanous, comfortable and very warm space. From the hall, a distributor gives access to the four rooms of the house, the laundry and linen room and a full bathroom; there are two large single bedrooms, one double and a spacious suite with its integrated bathroom and dressing room. Three are oriented to the south, to a wide and extremely quiet street. It includes a parking space for two cars in line and a double storage room in the basement of the building, with exclusive access to neighbours from the elevator. In summary, an exceptional home, ideal to enjoy wide spaces, natural light and green views in an environment with all services at hand and with excellent communication. A house with a privileged location, in one of the most residential areas of Sant Quirze, with all kinds of services in its immediate surroundings: shops, restaurants, parks, medical centers, schools.. . Just 2 minutes on foot from the Sant Quirze station of the Ferrocarriles de la Generalitat and 5 minutes by car from the access to the C-58 and the Vallvidrera tunnels. An ideal situation for those who want to live in an urban but quiet area, with all services at hand, a stone's throw from the center and with very good communications.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Mas Duran, Sant Quirze del Vallès
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

neighborhood: Sant Pere - Santa Caterina i la Ribera
description: This spectacular designer loft is located on a quieta street, in a former textile factory converted into lofts with exclusive access by walkway of private use, between Eixample and Born areas. The property is 314 sqm, L-shaped, with open and semi-open spaces, which makes it an ideal property to live. It features a beautiful lounge - chill out area with fireplace and small swing, dining area and kitchen as well as other small living area with studio space. It also has two huge suites, each one with large closets and their own bathrooms, one very large with sitting area and bath brick. The place has pretty high ceilings preserving its original structure (Catalan vault and iron beams) which give a true New Yorker loft environment. The property has solid wood parquet flooring, natural gas heating, air conditioning and carpentry. Ideally located, you can enjoy both the near Plaza Catalunya and the beautiful neighborhood of Born area and the Ciutadella Park.

description: Exclusive Penthouse in Poblenou This exclusive Penthouse of 150m2 located on the first line of the sea in Poblenou. It has an unbeatable southeast-southwest orientation, which allows us to enjoy all of the solar hours. The same is distributed in 120m2 of housing and 30m2 of terrace. When accessing it, the hall leads us to an interesting open space that acts as a linvig-lounge, on our left, the open kitchen fully equipped with high-end appliances and service door. Both from the kitchen and from the living room we can access the terrace, from where we enjoy privileged views of the Playa de la Marbella, the Municipal Nautical Base, the Sea Bella Center Esportiu and the entire Barcelona coastline. The floors of the attic are dark parquet. Heating and air conditioning through ducts. At the other end of the apartment we have the night area, which is composed of a simple bedroom, a bathroom, a toilet, and an impressive suite with a bathroom of interesting dimensions provided with shower, jacuzzi and dressing room. Likewise, the attic has two parking spaces and a storage room in the same building. The property is completely exterior and its walls have been perfectly achieved with aluminum double glazed enclosures, allowing us to enjoy the views of the entire City of Barcelona from any point of the residence. This penthouse is an exclusive home for those who want to reside in an unrepeatable apartment or enjoy a perfect second luxury residence. Located in Poblenou, a neighborhood of industrial tradition in the process of reconversion. Its location facing the sea and its excellent communication with the main urban roads and with the public transport network make it one of the most appreciated and chosen neighborhoods to reside in Barcelona. Poblenou is undergoing a transformation to a technological district where the rehabilitation of emblematic factories and the construction of buildings with modern lines enrich the architecture of the urban landscape and revalue housing in a neighborhood that is also improving at the level of infrastructures and services of the residential fabric. At one end of Poblenou, where the charm of the neighborhood's most genuine buildings is still preserved and in front of the largest and most modern Skate Park in the city, this unique penthouse is projected for those who wish to indulge themselves in all hours solar and an immeasurable views. Spacious spaces, modern finishes and quality, in short, architecture designed to live in full comfort.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Poblenou, Barcelona

description: Magnificent modern house with views and pool Engel & Völkers is pleased to present this spectacular design house in Vallirana, a special and unique property, in a privileged area with views and sun, with very good communication and close to the centre of the town. House with ample spaces and elegant pool area with privacy. The house is prepared for the installation of a lift. A luxury. The charming house of 378 m2 built on a plot of 800 m2 is structured in three floors, has three very spacious and luminous rooms and there is the possibility of a fourth one. The distribution is practical and rational. On the lower floor there is a spacious garage for three cars. There is also a good sized "machine room" which could be used as a storage room or other possibilities. A nice entrance hall leads us through the stairs to the first floor, which has an entrance from the outside. This floor is the sleeping area. Here we enjoy the three bedrooms, a complete bathroom and a multi-purpose room which could be closed off as a fourth bedroom. The master bedroom is en suite with a dressing room and a beautifully designed bathroom with hydro-massage bathtub. The upper or main floor is completed with a large and luminous living-dining room, the kitchen open to views and to the interior area and a courtesy bathroom. From the living room and kitchen there is access to a quiet terrace of about 30 m2 with direct access to the garden, barbecue and swimming pool. It is difficult to achieve more beauty and comfort. The house has solar panels, electric heating and ducted air conditioning. Aesthetics, very high qualities, spaciousness, communication and beautiful views. A dream house. Do not miss it! Vallirana is a beautiful town with the privilege of being located about 20 minutes away from Barcelona but surrounded by nature. It also adds the quality of life that comes from living in a quiet environment. It is perfectly communicated since it is next to the B-24 highway that gives access to the airport and the main exits from Barcelona by road. The house is located a few minutes away from the urban center of Vallirana and has all the basic services nearby, such as medical centers, public and private schools, shops or sports facilities, all within walking distance. From our house, just a few minutes away by car, we find different shopping centers and supermarkets, cinemas, restaurants and a variety of stores. Vallirana invites you to fully experience life here, enjoying a great quality of life, tranquility and nature. You cannot ask for more. Do not miss this great opportunity...!

description: Fantastic unique duplex penthouse in the area. Very bright and quiet thanks to its southwest orientation and location. The day area is made up of a spacious living-dining room, in two different environments, with an area of 45m2 and direct access through large windows to a wonderful 40m2 terrace. The terrace has a semi-covered chill-out area with an enclosure and teak latticework, and enough space to recreate different environments. Fully conditioned with drip irrigation, water outlet, direct and indirect lighting, awnings, etc... In short, a place to enjoy the company of friends and family. The kitchen next to the dining room has the possibility of being integrated into it or being independent thanks to sliding glass doors. Fully equipped and with large storage capacity. Attached to the kitchen is a large independent water area. The night area is distributed in 4 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes. On the main floor there are two rooms, one of which is currently used as a large dressing room but could easily be converted into a bedroom. A complete bathroom serves this floor. Some wooden stairs give access to the upper floor, next to them, we find a large open office that enjoys great light thanks to a large window. The upper floor consists of a large hall that can be used for many purposes and two spacious rooms, with an area of 25m2 and 15m2 respectively, and large Velux windows that flood them with natural light. A large bathroom with a bathtub serves this floor. The house offers parquet floors, ducted air conditioning (differentiated on both floors), gas heating, adjustable and motorized GRADERMETIC blinds, climalit enclosures, tilt-and-turn windows, security door, on the upper floor a large storage room, fitted wardrobes and mezzanines in all rooms. The house would allow for its distribution to have up to 5 bedrooms and three bathrooms. Concierge service and possibility of one or more parking spaces for sale or rent. Located next to a quiet park and surrounded by all kinds of shops and services. Well connected with public transport. Located next to a quiet park and surrounded by all kinds of shops and services. Well connected with public transport.

description: NOUCENTISTA PALACE IN THE CENTRE OF MONTMELO ENGEL & VÖLKERS presents this unique property in the centre of Montmeló, a noucentista mansion surrounded by gardens and with total privacy from the outside. Passing through the entrance gates and crossing the garden we find a door with columns that gives access to the main floor where we find a living-dining room with very well preserved colonial furniture as well as the reading room and a kitchen with attached cleaning room and exit to the back of the gardens, The property also has a very spacious bathroom and a bedroom on the ground floor, then we access by stairs to the upper floor where we find 3 double bedrooms, two of them en suite and another complete toilet, plus a dressing room, all rooms are exterior and overlooking the gardens surrounding the house, this property and the gardens that surround it are located next to all services and public transport which can be accessed walking in just 10 minutes. The municipality of Montmeló has a surface area of 4.11 km2 and is located in the Vallés Oriental region, just 20 km from Barcelona. Montmeló has almost 9,000 habitants and is a basically residential municipality that has been characterized by a very orderly urban growth, with many areas of low-density housing, wide spaces and green areas. In 1911 the Circuit de Catalunya was inaugurated, built mostly in the municipality of Montmeló, which has made the name of the municipality known all over the world. The municipality conserves an important archaeological heritage, mainly due to the sites from the Roman Republican period, including the Roman villa of Can Massot, in the town center, and the site of Can Tacó on the Tres Creus mountain. The latter has been declared a Cultural Asset of National Interest in the category of archaeological site. The town has a wide range of cultural, sporting, educational and leisure activities that take place in the different municipal facilities: music school, library, cultural centers, multi-purpose hall, primary and secondary schools, nursery, sports pavilion, football pitch, swimming pools, sports courts, adult education centers, center for the elderly, occupational training centers, museum and primary care centers. It should be noted that the municipality is a town with very good public transport links (train and bus station) as well as by road where we highlight the AP-7, one of the main communication routes with the rest of Europe, the C17 (Barcelona-Vic) and the C33.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Montmeló

description: Duplex penthouse for sale with pool and terraces with panoramic views in El Golf - Can Trabal aProperties Real Estate presents this magnificent property that we present today: Design, luxury and exclusivity, are the best adjectives that describe this spectacular duplex penthouse of 304 m2 with private terrace unique in its area with SOUTH orientation. Located in a privileged area of Sant Cugat, it has a spacious and comfortable communal area for only 8 neighbors, beautiful and intimate swimming pool with garden area and multipurpose room. Located in the prestigious neighborhood of El Golf-Can Trabal, 15 minutes walk from the Sant Cugat railway station and close to all kinds of services, stores, gyms, restaurants and direct bus connection to many points of interest. The property is distributed on 2 floors, on the first floor we find a spacious living room that thanks to its large windows allows us to go outside with a unique privacy. We also find a large kitchen office of the best qualities, fully equipped with the most exclusive appliances of the PREMIUM brands on the market, as well as a cozy entrance hall with courtesy closets. The sleeping area has 4 double bedrooms, all exterior and with fitted closets, two of them en suite with full bathroom. There is also a maid's room with full bathroom, as well as a separate laundry area (both inside and outside). Thanks to a beautiful staircase from the lobby we access a large multipurpose room / attic area with endless possibilities and has large storage spaces. The property has 2 parking spaces in the same building (one of them with electric car charger) and a large storage room of 12.5 m2. QUALITY FINISHES: parquet floors, individual gas heating radiators, ducted air conditioning (hot and cold pump) and splits, exterior carpentry with double glazing of the highest quality, interior woodwork lacquered in white, blinds, motorized awnings, storage room, and many more. LOCATION: Located in a privileged and exclusive area of El Golf-Can Trabal, it has excellent communications with the main roads with unbeatable access to Barcelona and surroundings. The area of El Golf - Can Trabal stands out for its quiet residential areas and characterized by its proximity to a wide range of services, stores and medical services just a few minutes away. Do not hesitate to contact the expert team of aProperties Real Estate for the search of your new home, always efficient, close and professional.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Golf, Sant Cugat del Vallès
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle Maria Benlliure

description: Luxury 151 m² apartment with 2 balconies in a listed building dating back to 1900, very close to Carrer d'Enric Granados and Passeig de Gràcia. As the property is on the fourth floor and backed by the Gardens of the University of Barcelona, it enjoys lovely green views and sunlight all day; a rarity in the heart of the city.  A beautiful entrance hall leads us into the large living- dining room with balconies overlooking the university gardens. Next to the dining area is the fully fitted kitchen.  The living and sleeping areas are clearly differentiated. The sleeping area offers 4 bedrooms in total, one is currently used as a study. There are 2 bathrooms, one of which is particularly spacious and has a bath and the other has a modern shower. To the rear of the property we find an enclosed gallery overlooking the courtyard.  This period apartment has been tastefully renovated and now boasts high quality modern finishes, complimented by well-maintained original features such as high ceilings with intricate mouldings and many Art Deco elements including the stained glass window panes.  Residents can enjoy a communal terrace and private storage room on the rooftop.    A fantastic opportunity to acquire a renovated home in a listed building with historic charm, green views and an enviable central location.  Note that the built size of the property is 163m² but it is registered as measuring 151m².
suggestedTexts.subtitle: L'Antiga Esquerra de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Detached house with pool and views for sale in Bellaterra Magnificent detached house with excellent views to north and south, 600m2 built on a 1,623m2 plot, 15 minutes walk from the train station (FGC - Bellaterra) and the town center. Quality construction and intelligent, practical and functional structure, designed to make life on a single floor: the ground floor, 300m2, with access to a porch and flat garden with fantastic views and swimming pool. On this floor we find the day, night, guest and service areas well differentiated, all of which are accessible from the beautiful entrance hall, with a high ceiling, with wardrobes and a guest bathroom. The house has private access by car to the entrance door, which leads to the stately ground floor. Ground flor. In front of the hall we find the 3 magnificent rooms of the day area facing south and with large windows with views: the beautiful 40m2 living room with fireplace and access to the porch and garden, the 35m2 dining room with access to the porch, garden and kitchen, and 24m2 library with fireplace. The 3 rooms of the day area are linked by large and spacious doors, in such a way that they can be configured as a unique room of 15 meters in length and 100m2 square, plus the attached 40m2 porch and the garden. On the left hand side of the hall we find the night area with 3 large double rooms, one of them a suite with its own bathroom and the other 2 rooms with a shared bathroom. On the right, the service area, with its own room and bathroom, laundry room, large ironing or games room with access to the side patio and garden, and a large kitchen with access to the dining room. First floor. Additional floor, designed as a guest, work, study or similar area. It has a room open to the hall as a reading, music or similar area, a double room, a full bathroom and an office or study with a fireplace and views. Basement. Cellar, large multipurpose room, 2 rooms for soundproofed installations, indoor parking for 2 cars (with the possibility of expanding to 6 or more parking places by converting the multipurpose room). The house also has a sectorized alarm, anti-riot glass, a hole to join the basement and the ground floor by elevator, sprinkler and zone irrigation, basketball court, etc. Bellaterra is a quiet town, surrounded by nature and with a privileged location. It is less than 20 km from the center of Barcelona, 6 km from Sabadell and 5 km from Sant Cugat del Vallès. Excellently communicated by train (FGC and RENFE), road and highways (A-P7 / B-30, C-58, C-16). It has shops, schools, universities, musicals, sports clubs and very close to golf clubs and large shopping centers and business parks.

description: Lucas Fox presents this renovated property located a few steps from Avenida Diagonal and Plaza de Francesc Macià.   It is located on the main floor of the building, so it has high ceilings.   In the day area, we find a fully equipped Open kitchen. The dining room is exterior and has a small balcony where you can place a table and two chairs to enjoy the afternoon sun. In addition, it has hydraulic floors and a beautiful exposed brick wall on one of its sides.   On the other hand, a small corridor leads to the other part of the property. Here, we see the master suite equipped with a wardrobe and a toilet and a second double bedroom with a very spacious wardrobe. Both bedrooms are interior, so they are very quiet. Finally, between the bedrooms we find the main bathroom with shower. The apartment has some very practical attics that can be used for storage, air conditioning, heating ducts and parquet floors in part of the house and hydraulics in another. Likewise, the residents of the building can enjoy the community terrace.   Contact us to arrange a visit.

description: Impeccable property, renovated three years ago with excellent qualities and located in Sarriá, one of the most sought after areas of the city. Specifically, it is located just a few minutes' walk from the Santa Amèlia park. In addition, it is located on a 1980 building, an exposed work built by the renowned architect José Antonio Coderch, with a concierge service and in a very good state of conservation.    The floor is square, so it makes the most of its spaces, with well-defined and distributed day and night areas. The living room has two large rooms, natural light and access to a pleasant terrace. The kitchen is spacious and has a well-used office area and a very practical utility area. For its part, the night area houses five bedrooms and three full bathrooms. There are two spacious double en-suite bedrooms and three exterior single bedrooms, with lots of natural light and built-in built-in wardrobes that share a full bathroom. The property includes two parking spaces and a storage room with direct access from the lift.

description: On the main floor of a fully restored 1900 building with a valid  ITE (technical inspection) certificate, we find this fantastic home to renovate, ideal for creating a new home with large spaces and a 60 m² south-facing terrace according to the plans.  Currently, the apartment has four good-sized bedrooms, two bathrooms, a spacious living-dining room, separate kitchen, utility room and a large room with access to two balconies that overlook Carrer Girona. From the living-dining room, we have access to a south-facing terrace of approximately 50 m² and on it, we find a storage room.  It has air conditioning and radiator heating. According to the Nota Simple, the property measures 180 m², or 193 m² according to the plans.

description: This fabulous duplex located in Pedralbes has been fully renovated in October 2017 with the very best quality materials and is presented in brand new condition in a 4-storey building with 2 duplex properties and 2 underground floors for parking spaces and storage rooms.  This elegant, luxury property offers a spacious glassed-in living room - dining room which leads to a sunny 102 m² garden which, in turn, leads to a communal area and pool. The living room connects to a fantastic kitchen which is fully-equipped with Gaggenau appliances. The sleeping quarters on the main floor include 2 double bedrooms - one which is a master suite with a dressing room and the other has a private bathroom, both of which give access to a pleasant garden.  On the ground floor we find an immense multi-purpose room which can be used as a TV room, playroom or guest room and another bedroom suite. The property also has a handy utility room.  The property includes 2 large, comfortable parking spaces, a storage room and there is a concierge service in the building.  The location is unbeatable, with the best houses, restaurants, international schools and clubs such as the Royal Tennis Club of Barcelona and Polo Club. The area offers easy access to the city centre and the airport via bus, train and metro.

address: subdistrict El Putxet i el Farró
description: Beautiful semi- semi-detached house located in the beautiful and cozy neighbourhood of Putxet el Farró.  This wonderful five-story house with a private lift is located in a very quiet street next to the Putxet railway station.  On the street level we find a welcome hall, the connection to the private garage, a double room with a floor -in wardrobe and a large bathroom with a shower.  In the floor there is a multipurpose room that can be converted into a cinema, a game space or even an area for guests. On this same floor, we also find the utility area and the machine room.  On the first floor we have the noble area, a large dining room living room outside and the kitchen diner, both with windows that allow natural light to enter, which provides a lot of light.  On the second floor, we find the master room, with a large dressing room, relaxation area, and a full bathroom with two sinks. Another single room with built-in wardrobes complements this floor.  On the third and last floor, we can see two double rooms, one of them a library-office with a natural skylight. Another double room, both exterior to the terrace. Large solarium-type terrace, with two different chill-out areas and a summer dining room.  The whole house has an lift, the garage has capacity for two cars and a motorcycle, it works with a lifting platform.  It has a fire alarm and water.  On each floor there is a suction system to connect the vacuum tube and collect all the dirt in a central deposit.  All the blinds are motorized, the floors are made of cherry wood and the windows are made of brown aluminum. Bathrooms finished in marble.  Awning with air sensor. Kitchen equipped with Bosch appliances, LG fridge and Fagor ceramic hob.

description: This apartment is located in the heart of Pedralbes, in a 1975 building with a concierge service and communal area with pool and parking.  The beautiful apartment is completely exterior facing and its large windows allow light to enter all day. When the renovation works were carried out, priority was given to the day area by opening up the living-dining room and kitchen spaces to the maximum, unifying it in a single space to offer wonderful views of Avinguda Diagonal.  In the living room we have a fireplace, a library space and an office. The wooden kitchen with natural stone walls is equipped with all panelled appliances and with access to the laundry room. The kitchen has a sliding door to make it separate from the living room.  In the night area we find a complete bathroom with a large shower, with porcelain floors and walls and a screen and a radiator, located next to the shower. The toilet is wall hung with the built-in cistern. Next, we find 2 exterior-facing double bedrooms. The main bedroom has a dressing room and private bathroom, made to measure, with two spaces, on one side the double sink and on the other the toilet and shower. The second bedroom has walnut wood cabinets and is a quiet, spacious and bright space.  All the renovation materials have been selected so that the design of the entire apartment is harmonious. It includes oak wood floors, aluminium window frames with an air chamber for acoustic and thermal insulation and gas heating, with designer radiators.  Previously, the apartment had an outdoor space, although it was closed during the renovation.  The apartment is completed with a parking space in the same building included in the price.

description: Unique, elegant property in the heart of Pedralbes. This generous apartment is located in a building constructed in 1967 and perfectly maintained by the community. Floor-to-ceiling windows overlook a wide and peaceful street, full of sunshine and trees.  With minimal corridors and maximum open spaces, the property stands out for its almost 50 m² living room with open kitchen. The kitchen has a sophisticated marble finishing, high-end kitchen appliances, lots of storage space and a well-planned design.  The master bedroom of 14 m² enjoys a spacious ensuite bathroom, featuring a designer bathtub. The second bedroom is of a similar size and has access to the second bathroom that will also be used by guests.  The living room and the master bedroom have access to a long balcony, that will become a perfect place for exotic flowers and plants. The apartment also enjoys a utility room, accessible from the second bedroom.  Being located in a quiet, but dynamic neighbourhood, the property is surrounded by all kinds of infrastructure, shops, gyms, social clubs, schools, shopping centres and restaurant. Perfectly connected to other areas of the town, with airport, Costa Dorada and Costa Brava by public transport as well as speedy roads. Several parking options are available just a moment away.  A unique opportunity for a stylish lifestyle in Barcelona.

description: Exclusive penthouse located in one of the most prestigious areas of Barcelona, a few steps from Avinguda Diagonal, Passeig de Gracia and Rambla Catalunya. The apartment has 360 mtrs + 38 mtrs of terraces, currently covered, with the option to open them up.  Built in the 60s and deigned by the renowned architect Francesc Mitjans Miró, the building has a concierge service, lift, forklift and storage room. The apartment is located on the seventh floor with views of the entire city. The property is characterized by its spacious and bright spaces, with great potential to rearrange the space to suit the taste and needs of the buyer.  The day area has a spacious and bright living-dining room with a fireplace, a 38 square metre covered terrace, a spacious kitchen with a pantry, a laundry room and a service lift; In addition to a multipurpose room.  The night area consists of 5 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms. One of them, the master suite with dressing room and bathroom. All spacious bedrooms, exterior facing and with wonderful views of the city.  Please contact us for further information.

description: Luminous Penthouse close to Riera Blanca Engel & Volkers presents this beautiful and bright penthouse in Torrasa. We enter a nice hall and just to the left we find the marble kitchen and wooden cabinets with access to the balcony. Leaving the hall we enter the large and bright dining room also with access to the balcony. From there we go out to the hallway and go to the night area with the bedrooms, 2 toilets and a laundry room. All the bedrooms are exterior and the big one has the bathroom en suite. The bathrooms and the laundry room are interior. To go to the terrace we leave the apartment and go up the communal stairs to a communal terrace where from there the different private terraces are separated with door and key each. In our terrace we have 43m2 distributed in L. Located close to Riera Blanca street, it is very well communicated to enter and exit well communicated to get in and out of Barcelona by Diagonal and Ronda de Dalt. Sants station is just a few minutes away. The nearest metro station is "Collblanc". well connected by bus with other areas of Hospitalet and Barcelona. You can walk to the area of universities and universities and Camp Nou. The Granvia 2 shopping center is just a few minutes away by car. In terms of commerce, the Collblanc Market is very close by and nearby and in the surroundings supermarkets, local commerce, sports centers, hardware stores, hairdressers, stationers, pharmacies etc. Nearby there are three large facilities: the facilities of FC Barcelona (which includes the Camp Nou, the mini Estadi mini Estadi, the Barça sports city, the Palau Blaugrana, the FC Barcelona museum, the Palau de Gel and the old Masía).

description: The property dates from 1997 and has high-end finishes that are still well maintained.  The apartment measures 180 sqm and its layout defines the day and night areas well. It also has a fabulous 69 sqm garden with a pleasant pool that is accessed from the living room and kitchen.  Thanks to its easterly aspect, it offers a pleasant morning sun. Its night area is oriented to the west and to a quiet and clear street, so it receives the afternoon sun. The four bedrooms, doubles and all exterior facing, have large windows with access to a bright 12 sqm terrace.  The apartment comes with four parking spaces and a spacious storage unit included in price.  .

description: The property is located in a modern building from 1995, the work of the architect Carlos Ferrater, which has two elevators, a concierge service and community areas, as well as a garage on the same building, storage rooms and rooms for common use.    The property, which needs some small renovation, has a spacious and bright living room with large windows and access to a wonderful terrace with beautiful unobstructed views. The kitchen, now independent and with a laundry area, could be integrated into the living- dining room living room space to achieve a 75 m 2 area that is completely open-plan and bright.  The night area consists of four double bedrooms with large built-in built-in wardrobes. For its part, the main room has an en-suite bathroom with shower and bathtub. Likewise, we find another complete bathroom to serve the other rooms.  The property has wooden floors in all rooms, except in the kitchen and bathrooms, hot-cold air conditioning through ducts (heat pump) and a thermos for hot water.  The price of the property includes three parking spaces in the same building (accessible from the same lift) and a large storage room for private use.   Lucas Fox manages this property exclusively, so you can contact us if you need more information or if you wish to arrange a visit.

description: HOUSE WITH THREE WINDS IN TRES TORRES, LA BONANOVA EXCELLENT FAMILY PROJECT IN APARTMENT OF 302 M2 APPROXIMATELY Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices LARVIA, consultancy specialized in the commercialization of exclusive, luxury properties in the best areas of Barcelona, offers you this spacious apartment of 302 meters approx. to reform in one of the best streets in the Tres Torres neighborhood - La Bonanova. Are you looking for an excellent property in one of the best enclaves of the Tres Torres neighborhood - La Bonanova? If so, this property in a brick building with a recently renovated facade, could be your option. The property, of 302m2 approx. and at three winds, it has a pleasant day area oriented to S.E. This area is made up of a large space in three well-defined environments, in which we would highlight its great luminosity, distribution and tranquility. In addition, a magnificent level and square terrace to make life. Next to it, a large kitchen with an office area, a water area and a service area. In the night area, a quiet and spectacular master suite, which has a fireplace and a private balcony. Next to it, four more bedrooms that share two full bathrooms. It is worth mentioning that the bedroom adjoining the suite would be an excellent dressing room with natural light. On the ground floor of the farm, a large parking space for three vehicles and two storage rooms in the same area. Finally and as icing on the cake, a large community area that has a club room for meetings or events, a gym with fitness equipment, a sauna and a practical indoor pool. In the vicinity of the farm, a great option in terms of schools, services and transport. Truly, one of the best options in the area to carry out a magnificent family project. Location description The Sarrià-Sant Gervasi neighborhood is the fifth district of Barcelona. It has an area of 20.09 km2 and a population of 148,172 inhabitants. It is one of the greenest districts of the city and, together with Horta-Guinardó, the gateway to the Sierra de Collserola natural park, the most important lung in Barcelona. This proximity marks its status as a residential and affluent area, with numerous parks and green areas, combined with prestigious educational and health centers. The district is the sum of old municipalities added to Barcelona, such as Sarrià (1921), Vallvidrera-Les Planes (annexed to Sarrià in 1890) and Sant Gervasi de Cassoles (1897). Sarrià maintains the unity of the old town, although this nucleus is separated from the Three Towers due to its homogeneous urban characteristics and the high degree of recognition it has by its inhabitants. Sarrià-Sant Gervasi is a nucleus with a town feel, made up of the neighborhoods of Sarrià, Las Tres Torres, Sant Gervasi-la Bonanova, Sant Gervasi-Galvany, Vallvidrera, Tibidabo i les Planes and Putxet i el Farró.

Situated from the living room, on the left-hand side of the flat and through a corridor where there are extra built-in wardrobes, are two double bedrooms, one en-suite with dressing room and access to the terrace, and the second double bedroom with a complete bathroom in between. The third single room is situated on the left side of the dining room, closed by a glass window allowing the light to pass through and thought as a work space or as a bedroom. description: Nice apartment in Aribau street This property located in a royal estate in Eixample, offers a pleasant entrance keeping the original elements of that times. It has an elevator at street level with an accessible way to the unit. Entering the property, we find on the right side a first double bedroom with a window to the inner patio of the building. Then we have a very functional kitchen that was renovated a few years ago. If we follow the corridor we have the bathroom also renovated. Before reaching the living room, we find a second double bedroom, very quiet and with a window to the same inner patio. Finally we arrive into the dining and living room with two balconies overlooking Aribau street. It is located in Barcelona city center, in the emblematic left side of Eixample. This charismatic neighbourhood was planned by Ildefons Cerdà and is designed on a grid, which makes it very easy to get around. The inner residential courtyards of these blocks are sometimes gardens open to the public. Well connected by multiple bus and underground lines. In an area with services, local shops, supermarkets, pharmacies, restaurants and all kinds of commercial premises.

description: HOUSE WITH THREE WINDS IN TRES TORRES, LA BONANOVA EXCELLENT FAMILY PROJECT IN APARTMENT OF 302 M2 APPROXIMATELY Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices LARVIA, consultancy specialized in the commercialization of exclusive, luxury properties in the best areas of Barcelona, offers you this spacious apartment of 302 meters approx. to reform in one of the best streets in the Tres Torres neighborhood - La Bonanova. Are you looking for an excellent property in one of the best enclaves of the Tres Torres neighborhood - La Bonanova? If so, this property in a brick building with a recently renovated facade, could be your option. The property, of 302m2 approx. and at three winds, it has a pleasant day area oriented to S.E. This area is made up of a large space in three well-defined environments, in which we would highlight its great luminosity, distribution and tranquility. In addition, a magnificent level and square terrace to make life. Next to it, a large kitchen with an office area, a water area and a service area. In the night area, a quiet and spectacular master suite, which has a fireplace and a private balcony. Next to it, four more bedrooms that share two full bathrooms. It is worth mentioning that the bedroom adjoining the suite would be an excellent dressing room with natural light. On the ground floor of the farm, a large parking space for three vehicles and two storage rooms in the same area. Finally and as icing on the cake, a large community area that has a club room for meetings or events, a gym with fitness equipment, a sauna and a practical indoor pool. In the vicinity of the farm, a great option in terms of schools, services and transport. Truly, one of the best options in the area to carry out a magnificent family project. Location description The Sarrià-Sant Gervasi neighborhood is the fifth district of Barcelona. It has an area of 20.09 km2 and a population of 148,172 inhabitants. It is one of the greenest districts of the city and, together with Horta-Guinardó, the gateway to the Sierra de Collserola natural park, the most important lung in Barcelona. This proximity marks its status as a residential and affluent area, with numerous parks and green areas, combined with prestigious educational and health centers. The district is the sum of old municipalities added to Barcelona, such as Sarrià (1921), Vallvidrera-Les Planes (annexed to Sarrià in 1890) and Sant Gervasi de Cassoles (1897). Sarrià maintains the unity of the old town, although this nucleus is separated from the Three Towers due to its homogeneous urban characteristics and the high degree of recognition it has by its inhabitants. Sarrià-Sant Gervasi is a nucleus with a town feel, made up of the neighborhoods of Sarrià, Las Tres Torres, Sant Gervasi-la Bonanova, Sant Gervasi-Galvany, Vallvidrera, Tibidabo i les Planes and Putxet i el Farró.

description: Spectacular apartment, completely renovated, a step away from the beach, for sale, in Gavá Mar. The apartment is located in an exclusive and privileged area, in a quiet and relaxing environment.  This apartment originally consisted of 4 bedrooms, prior to the renovation. Thanks to the renovation, the apartment creates wide and open spaces.  From the entrance, we find on the left the kitchen, fully equipped and recently renovated, with unobstructed views. The kitchen is separated from the living-dining room, creating a cozy and open space. The living-dining room has unobstructed views over the communal area and views over the green areas. The living-dining room has direct access to the large terrace, where you can also appreciate the tranquility and enjoy lunch and dinner outdoors throughout the year. Thanks to the good south-facing of the apartment, it is very bright and welcoming.  Crossing the corridor, we find the guest toilet on the left. The apartment has a spacious bedroom suite, with access to the terrace and unobstructed views over the communal area. The bedroom has large large closets for enough storage space. From the suite we access the spacious full bathroom with unobstructed views. The apartment has a second double bedroom, very spacious and with large closets.  The apartment has heating, air conditioning and an lift with direct access from the psio to the covered parking. The apartment includes 2 parking spaces, as well as access to all the facilities in the communal area, such as the large swimming pool, tennis court and children's area.  In this apartment you can enjoy absolute tranquility and calm, thanks to the few neighbors that make up this community.  From the apartment you can walk to the beach in 5 minutes, as well as to the Carrefour supermarket and it is close to the best international schools in Barcelona, such as the British School of Barcelona and the Lycée International Bon Soleil de Barcelona. From the location you can easily access the highway to reach the airport in 7 minutes and Barcelona in 15 minutes.

description: This excellent family house enjoys a great location in the reputable La Pineda neighbourhood of Castelldefels and is walking distance from the beach.  On the main floor of this meticulously maintained house, we find the 2-car garage, a large kitchen, and a living room – dining room with a fireplace. Both the kitchen and the living room enjoy direct access to the very well maintained garden with its swimming pool and barbecue. A guest bedroom and a bathroom complete this level of the home.  Going up the attractive curved staircase to the first floor, there are 2 large bedrooms a complete bathroom and the master bedroom with its ensuite bathroom, private terrace and large dressing room.  On the second floor we find another bedroom suite with a private terrace, ensuite bathroom and large storage area.  Contact us today to arrange a viewing of this magnificent family home in La Pineda.  The property is available for viewings from July 6th 2022.

description: Villa measuring 480 m² in a quiet residential area, opposite a protected area where building is prohibited and surrounded by green space. It is 6 minutes by car from restaurants and supermarkets, and 13 minutes from the airport and the British School.  The house is built using high quality materials such as marble floors. It offers large private spaces, as well as common areas perfect for the family to enjoy throughout the year. The villa is distributed across several mezzanine floors and all rooms benefit from natural light and beautiful views.  Access is on the ground floor with the living room on the left and another living room with a fireplace on the right, fully separate. We descend half a floor and find a spacious dining room with large windows that overlook the balcony, as well as a large kitchen with access to a terrace and a bathroom.  Another half floor down has 2 double bedrooms (1 with en-suite bathroom), access to the wine cellar and a split-level games room. The lower floor offers an Ibiza-style summer lounge with fireplace and access to a large porch, barbecue area and a chill-out area with sun loungers. This level also gives access to the garage, currently adapted as a gym, as well as the garden and the pool.  Returning to the ground floor, we go up one half floor and find the master bedroom with 2 dressing rooms and en-suite bathroom with bathtub, and a further double bedroom. On the next level up there are 2 double bedrooms and a full bathroom, and on the second floor there are 2 more double bedrooms (one of which is used as a laundry room). Finally, on the upper floor there are 2 large terraces with beautiful views.  An excellent opportunity for families as a first or second residence thanks to its large size and excellent location. Contact us for more information or to arrange a viewing.

suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Carretera de la Sentiu
