description: House renovated in 1993, consisting of.. . Low level: Living-dining room (31m²) with direct access to the patio/garden (26m²) and private garage (27m²) with direct access from Baliarda street, kitchen (12m²), and courtesy bathroom. First floor: Terrace (12m²) with access from bedroom suite (15m²) and bathroom (5m²), bedroom (10m²), bedroom (6m²) and bathroom (3.70m²). Attic floor plan: Multifunctional space of 25m² (bedroom, office, …) Radiator heating, air conditioning, city gas, aluminum frames, and armored door. Communications and Services: Metro: L1 Sant Andreu Bus: 11, 62, 96, 97, 104, 126, 127, 133, H4, V31, N3 and N9. Fabra i Puig bus station (regional and national departures) Renfe stations: Sant Andreu Comtal, lines R2 and R11 and Sant Andreu Arenal R3, R4, R7 and R12. Perfectly communicated by road, at the foot of the Meridiana, the Ronda de Dalt B-20, Ronda de Litoral B-10, the C58 (Valles Occidental), C33-AP7 (Valles Oriental), C32 (Maresme) and the national C17 (Osona). A few minutes from the Municipal Centers of Can Drago and Bon Pastor. Heron City shopping center, La Maquinista, Mercat de Sant Andreu. And primary care health centers. The neighborhood: The district of Sant Andreu, of agricultural origin, industrial evolution and a long commercial tradition. The changes improve the old industrial spaces and integrate them into the traditional Sant Andreu, the one in Plaza del Mercadal or the church of Sant Andreu de Palomar. A district where the most modern and innovative character of Barcelona blends with the presence of an old quarter that is oblivious to so many changes, where commercial and cultural life, the legacy of a working-class and highly demanding neighborhood, offers entertainment of all kinds to the neighborhood and the visitors. The arrival of the high-speed train (AVE) to Sant Andreu, where it will have one of the two stops in Barcelona at the new Sagrera station, will mean a before and after for the district.

description: Apartment with private pool, large terrace and parking in El Putxet, located on Bertran street. This spacious apartment has 259 sqm built and 25 sqm of terrace plus 105 sqm of garden with private pool.  The apartment is distributed in a spacious and cozy dining room, from which we can access a bright and quiet terrace with views of the Barcino Tennis Club from which we find some stairs that take us to another garden space, with a private pool.  Large office-type kitchen equipped with all necessary appliances.  It has five double bedrooms, one of them type suite, exterior and with lots of light as it opens onto the terrace.  The other four bedrooms are interior and do not have natural light. There is the possibility of modifying and being able to change the entire distribution since everything is partition. Previously, a part of the house was a local that was joined and a change of use was made.  Ideal to be able to make a study, cinema room, games room or use it as a gym, a little depending on the needs and that it is not necessary to have a lot of light.  It also has a private garage, with direct access to the house, with space for two cars and several motorcycles, a room with a utility area, a toilet and another room with a large storage space. As it is a partition, it could be pulled and the parking area expanded.  The Putxet neighborhood stands out for its tranquility and at the same time for its proximity to all parts of the city. It preserves the roots of other times when it was a summer town near Barcelona. It is still a quiet, quiet and familiar neighborhood. Surrounded by green areas and also by shops, supermarkets, schools, restaurants. Excellent road and public transport communications.  If you have always wanted to live in an apartment with your own pool, this will be your home.    Chrysol Value.

description: Excellent renovated 90 sqm apartment in Sant Antoni with a 6 sqm balcony located in a classic building with elevator, very well maintained and in an unbeatable location. This house that exudes tranquility has a very functional and comfortable distribution, the living room is very spacious and sunny and invites you to relax and enjoy the light that enters from the pleasant and sunny balcony. The independent office-style kitchen is very large and spacious, with a spacious dining room, where you can enjoy family moments. Fully equipped with all Siemens integrated appliances, with access to a separate laundry room for washer and dryer. It has 2 double rooms, with the possibility of making another bedroom since there were originally 3 rooms. The largest room, which had previously been two rooms, is very sunny and overlooks the block patio, it has a spacious closet-dressing room, next to it we find a spacious bathroom with shower. The hall has a built-in wardrobe and a complete bathroom with a shower, the space serves as a distributor between the day and night areas, which are completely separated. The house has sliding shutters, parquet floors, fitted wardrobes, double glazing, air conditioning and heating. The entire house is in perfect condition, with good finishes. The area is excellently communicated with all means of transport, offers all kinds of services, leisure and commerce, schools, restaurants, bars, gyms.. . APIALIA Product Chrysol Value.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Antoni, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Avenida del Paral·lel

description: Apartment with terrace for sale next to Passeig de Gràcia In an unbeatable location, in Provença street, next to Passeig de Gràcia and La Pedrera, on the second floor of a restored royal estate, we find this beautiful apartment with a large terrace and balcony, with many possibilities. The property has an area of 176m2, a balcony of 5m2 overlooking Provença street and a magnificent terrace of 44 m2. Original carpentry, high ceilings, moldings and the possibility of recovering the original hydraulic floors. It currently consists of a living room with balcony at street level, four bedrooms (one en suite with dressing room, office and gallery with access to the terrace), kitchen, two bathrooms and a toilet. The property has concierge service and is perfectly located in the most prestigious area of Barcelona, surrounded by the most emblematic buildings of the city, restaurants and stores. Magnificent opportunity to reform it or as an investment to segregate it into two floors.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Dreta de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de Provença

description: In the center of Barcelona, a few meters from Av. Diagonal, Gal·la Placídia square and the emblematic Passeig de Gràcia, we find this spectacular duplex on the ground floor with views of Julia Romea street, and which consists of 2 bedrooms doubles and 2 bathrooms, and with access to a spacious terrace of 28 m2. The house is characterized by its spaciousness, luminosity and a minimalist and elegant design in which white, gray and wood tones predominate. It has top quality accessories and finishes, underfloor heating with compatible parquet, a fully equipped Bulthaup kitchen with Bosch appliances and white marble floors, Mitsubishi aerothermal air conditioning ducts, and LED lighting. It is worth noting the home automation system to guarantee your maximum comfort. In addition, the building has common areas, a terrace-solarium with a community pool, and a wellness or meeting room. It also has 2 lifts, and parking and storage rooms in the basement and concierge service. Sant Gervasi, an enviable location close to the best areas of the city, with all the services at your fingertips and with an excellent transport connection. If what you are looking for is luxury and exclusivity, in a privileged area of Barcelona, this is your opportunity. Various units available. Optional parking. Chrysol Value.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Gervasi - Galvany, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Duplex in Via Augusta

description: We love sunny floors, just entering this little girl in Guinardó we imagine breakfast on a Saturday at the Terracita with a sunny morning of these that Barcelona usually gives us even February. On this floor you have everything at hand you are not lacking in anything because the spaces are very generous. Dining room with terrace, large bedroom with bathroom also with terrace exit, so the whole floor is sunny. The kitchen is closed like those before, so if you are cooked or have not had time to fix it before your guests come close the door and nobody finds out. Another very good thing of this floor is the rear gallery, there the pantry, the bicycle and a lot of more things fit. The floor is in very good condition on a fairly new farm and in a great area of Guinardó, near the market, the Paseo Maragall and the Round of the Guinardó, with everything you need around and very well communicated. This floor is ideal for couples, singles or investors and if you do not run because it is one of those floors that are sold in a periquete. Chrysol Value.

suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle del Xiprer

description: Plaza Molina has been revitalized lately, a lot of super nice bars and restaurants have opened and renovated, a few meters from the square is Calle Santjoanistes, a haven of pedestrian peace within the hustle and bustle of Calle Balmes. You will love this main one, brand new renovated, three bedrooms; two doubles and one single, two full bathrooms, a tiny but super practical and charming kitchen with a large office and a beautiful living room. It also has a balcony in the back. The apartment is super quiet, the finishes are excellent: parquet floors, aluminum carpentry, gas heating. Don't let it get away. Chrysol Value.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Putxet i el Farró, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de les Santjoanistes

description: This beautiful penthouse was conceived by the mind of an architect who wanted to wake up surrounded by light and beautiful views. If you are looking for a semi-open space with large windows and feel in the clouds, this is your apartment. We are talking about a beautiful penthouse with two bedrooms, a bathroom, an open kitchen with appliances and a spacious living room. The terraces were integrated into the floor to gain space and the large windows give it a lot of light.  The apartment is completely renovated, consists of parquet, aluminum carpentry, air conditioning, electric blinds. It also has a double garage space and a storage room in the same building.  The building is in the quiet neighborhood of Tres Torres, you enter through a pleasant interior garden in which there is a play area and a beautiful patio.  It has an elevator, concierge and has passed the ITE.    Chrysol Value .
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Les Tres Torres, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse in Calle d'Anglí

description: Spectacular 214 m2 fully renovated apartment Spacious and bright with a large terrace, excellent orientation with a spacious and bright living-dining room. South orientation. The apartment has access to the terrace; Different environments, all very bright, American kitchen of modern design with high-end appliances, with an office area and a storage area. Full laundry room. The Night Area has a large master bedroom suite with a full bathroom and dressing room The second room is also spacious, with access to the terrace, equipped with a large closet with a full bathroom en suite. Currently the apartment has 3 bedrooms but with the possibility of adding 1 or 2 more bedrooms, as it was before the reform. Individual heating and air conditioning blinds mechanization Garage for two vehicles on the same farm Located in the upper area of Barcelona, unbeatable location. SPECIFIC AND PERSONALIZED FINANCING IS ALSO MANAGED FOR THIS PROPERTY IF YOU NEED IT WITH A VERY AFFORDABLE FIXED INTEREST. The information can only be expanded in person and if the client has 50% cash Get in touch and we will organize a visit.

neighborhood: El Camp de l'Arpa del Clot
description: From private to private. No commissions. Call us and visit this house. Located on the fifth floor (real 6th) with elevator. It consists of a living-dining room, a fully equipped integrated kitchen with views of the Agbar Tower, three bedrooms, one double and two singles. Its distribution means that, in the area where we have the double room and one of the single rooms, you can choose between a suite with bathroom and dressing room or a large double exterior room, a bathroom and a single room, two complete bathrooms and a large balcony. The house is in a completely new state, furnished and brand new. In the reform, a Nordic decoration design has been opted for. Light-colored environments where white and toasted tones are the protagonists. For some of the doors a light turquoise blue has been chosen, which gives personality to the environment. The floors are AC 6 parquet for the entire floor except the bathrooms, where porcelain tiles have been installed. The apartment has air conditioning and heating ducts. On a technical level, all the installations, both electrical, plumbing and air conditioning, are completely new. The farm has been recently rehabilitated, with a garage and a space for storage rooms. The property is located in the neighborhood of El Clot, in the District of Sant Martí. One step away from the new 22@ business district and the future Parque de las Glòries. The new Avenida Meridiana is characterized for being an area in which traffic has been pacified to favor green areas and make it one of the largest civic spaces in the city. The Clot neighborhood stands out for being one of the traditional neighborhoods of Barcelona and has one of the most important railway communication axes in the city. In the area surrounding the farm, we find endless shops and services. The Hospital de Sant Pau 9 minutes by car. h1o3u6s2e4l7l.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Camp de l'Arpa del Clot, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Avenida Meridiana

description: Fantastic and elegant renovated apartment on Mandri street. Located in an unbeatable area, in the heart of the Bonanova neighborhood, surrounded by all kinds of shops, garden areas, restaurants and the best national and international schools. The day area consists of a spacious living-dining room with access to a pleasant terrace, a beautiful kitchen with a utility room and a practical courtesy toilet. The night area consists of three bedrooms, one of which is a very spacious suite, with large closets and a large full bathroom. The other two bedrooms, both doubles, one of them with a full bathroom. Currently in the night area we find a living room which was previously a double bedroom, (it could be recovered). This beautiful apartment was renovated in 2016 with great taste using very good quality materials. It has parquet floors, individual heating, air conditioning and multiple closets. The farm with concierge service is in perfect condition. With parking space and storage room included in the price. Great opportunity to acquire a home in the Bonanova neighborhood to move into. Chrysol Value.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Gervasi - La Bonanova, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle de Mandri

description: Lucas Fox Sant Cugat is pleased to present this magnificent apartment, stately as well as modern.  This magnificent duplex penthouse has an area of 304 m2 divided into 227 m2 on the ground floor with a 21 m2 private terrace facing SOUTH and a magnificent 56 m2 loft.  Located in one of the best and most sought after areas of Sant Cugat, this community of only 8 neighbors has a beautiful community area and multipurpose room. This property shares tranquility and exclusivity. Just 15 minutes walk from the Sant Cugat railway station and close to all kinds of services, shops, gyms, restaurants.  This penthouse is distributed over 2 floors, on the ground floor we find a large hall with courtesy cabinets, which lead directly to a large kitchen with the best finishes and qualities, fully equipped with the most current PREMIUM brand appliances on the market. Next we access a spacious living room with large windows that flood the room with natural light and allow us to go directly to the terrace from where we can enjoy the tranquility and views of the area.  The night area has 4 double rooms, all exterior and with fitted wardrobes, two in suite format with a complete bathroom and one of them with a dressing area. The house also has an extra service room with a complete bathroom, as well as a fully equipped and independent laundry area.  From the hall we access directly through some stairs to a large multipurpose room / attic area, currently divided into two spaces, a relaxation area to enjoy “homecinema” moments with the family on its large sofa and another as an office library.  The house also has 2 very large parking spaces (two large cars fit) on the same property (one of them with an electric car charger) and a large storage room of 12.5 m2.  All the details of this exclusive home have top quality finishes: parquet floors, individual gas heating by radiators, ducted air conditioning (cold and heat pump) and splits in the attic area, exterior carpentry with double glazing of the maximum quality, white lacquered wood interior carpentry, electric shutters, motorized awnings and electric shutters that close automatically when it rains in the attic area.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Golf, Sant Cugat del Vallès

description: Fabulous ground floor duplex of 86 m2, very bright, with a sunny patio of 59m2. The house is distributed on the ground floor (hall, courtesy toilet, open kitchen, living room with access to the 59m2 patio) and first floor (2 bedrooms with a patio and 2 bathrooms). Building with elevator and with a privileged location. We have parking spaces in the same building, as well as other flats at different heights. Our homes are located on Calle Carrera, just in front of the Walter Benjamin Gardens and Plaça de les Drassanes, opposite the Port of Barcelona. Right next to the famous Avda del Paral. lel with its theaters and all kinds of shops. One step away from the Mirador del Poble Sec, enjoy walks around Montjuïc and its large garden areas, ideal for doing outdoor sports. Take advantage of the good weather in our city on the surrounding beaches. Very well connected with the entire city with Metro lines and buses. outdoor sports. Take advantage of the good weather in our city on the surrounding beaches. Very well connected with the entire city with Metro lines and buses.

description: NOVAFINQUES sells a spacious home in Eix Macia, a step away from Parque Catalunya. The house has stoneware floors, cedar interior carpentry, aluminum windows with double glazing, natural gas heating, intercom and armored door. description: We have a good 65 m2 apartment located in a central area next to Avda Generalitat It is distributed in 3 bedrooms, two of them facing the main street, a renovated kitchen with a laundry room, a bathroom in good condition, with 4 pieces and a shower, a spacious, sunny and bright outdoor living-dining room with unobstructed views of the city. description: You have finally found it! Its perfect location, perfectly communicated by metro and buses, together with the proximity of the Ronda del Guinardo, will allow you to travel to any part of the city in a few minutes. The house consists of a pleasant, very bright outdoor living-dining room, a double room, also exterior, with access to a balcony, two large single rooms, a practical kitchen with large storage capacity and access to a gallery, and a bathroom. The perfect distribution of the house allows you to make the most of your footage. This is completed with parquet floors and air conditioning. address: Calle de la Palma de Sant Genís
description: Beautiful 320 m2 house in one of the quietest and safest areas of the city, the Sant Gervasi neighborhood. This spectacular property has great lighting and a large constructed area of 320 m2. The house enjoys great light and a very intelligent distribution of space, thanks to the high-quality reform to which it has recently been subjected. It has 5 spacious rooms (two suites with private bathrooms and three single rooms) and three modern full bathrooms, as well as a courtesy toilet. In addition to this, the house has numerous interior common areas, ideal for a relaxed and welcoming atmosphere and for receiving visitors. It also has a beautiful outdoor area, which includes a luxurious private pool and a covered space equipped with a table, high-end armchairs and table football. In addition, it also has a garden with automatic irrigation and a solarium. Among the numerous common areas, it is worth highlighting the beautiful kitchen, equipped with high-end appliances and exterior views through a window. The studio is located on the second floor and has a desk, library and beautiful views of the Barcelona skyline. The house includes heating service in all areas of the house and a fireplace, as well as automatic doors, parking and a gym. If you are interested in housing, do not hesitate to contact!

description: Fantastic brick tower of 415m2 in a quiet and residential area, next to all services. 560m2 plot with beautiful panoramic views and a large patio with a masonry barbecue (possibility of building a pool). On the first floor of 158m2 we have in the day area: a large living-dining room with large French-style windows and a 14m2 kitchen-diner with access to the laundry room and the garden. On the same floor we also have the night area with 4 spacious rooms, one of them en suite; and full bathroom and toilet. On the second floor we have a 66m2 multipurpose room with access to a 20m2 solarium terrace. At the source of access we have the garage, with capacity for 8 cars and a room for a cellar. description: Penthouse elegant and modern in Sant Gervasi Historic building, listed, restored and renovated with exquisite taste, where the most iconic elements have been preserved, such as the balconies, the main staircase, the marble floor, the wrought iron main door and the wooden doors of the apartments. Two new elevators have been installed, that can go up to the roof where the pool is located, with incredible views of Barcelona. We enter the apartment and see the majesty of the house, a spacious hall with high ceilings, all white combined with the herringbone oak parquet that reflects an extraordinary warmth. On the right we first find a double room, with a big wardrobe and a large window; then we find the master suite with a generous double dressing room and the spacious fully equipped bathroom. To the left of the hall we have a complete bathroom with a shower, and next to it a double room with its closet. Opposite we enter the large fully equipped kitchen, with Bulthaup furniture, Neff appliances and a space reserved as a water area. This kitchen is completed with an office area for quick and informal meals, and is connected with the stupendous living room. In the dining room we have space for a big table for 8 or 10 people and a large window, connected to the living room with a spectacular Tribune with a spectacular glass area, with very pleasant views of the gardens of Pasaje Maluquer. Right next to it we find a second suite, with a closets and a full bathroom. This penthouse has a splendid terrace for private use that can be reached with the elevator and in which a jacuzzi is included to enjoy wonderful moments. This apartment has a linked storage room of 3.56m2, not included in the price. We have parking spaces that are located next to the building, not included in the price. In the heart of the Sant Gervasi district, in one of the most select residential areas in Barcelona, is this development. A historic building, catalogued, restored and renovated with exquisite taste. The district of Sant Gervasi retains all the charm, quiet and stately, place where summer palaces and modernist houses were installed at the beginning of the century. Today it is the residential area of Barcelona par excellence. Located in the upper part of the city and surrounded by green spaces, it enjoys excellent communications with the city centre. A quiet and family neighbourhood, next to the great natural park of Barcelona, Collserola, and with a wide range of exclusive restaurants, gyms, and local shops, as well as prestigious medical centres and the best national and international schools.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Sant Gervasi - La Bonanova, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Magnificent principal in the Barri Gòtic Magnificent master of approximately 230 meters plus 90 meters of terrace, in the most stately listed building of the Gòtic. Building with elevator. Old mansion that preserves the original architectural elements in perfect condition. Entrance through a flight of marble stairs that takes us to another time, it needs some updating. It is distributed in five bedrooms, three bathrooms, a toilet, a separate kitchen and two large living rooms, one with access to a balcony and the other next to the kitchen.  One of the living rooms, the kitchen and another of the bedrooms benefit from access to a patio of about 90 m². Two of the bedrooms overlook the main street and have balconies. The house has original period features in perfect condition such as ceilings over three and a half meters high, original woodwork, wooden beams and hydraulic and mosaic floors. In one of the bathrooms, on the ceiling there is a fresco in a perfect state of preservation along with a typical stained glass window of the time. The terrace-patio for private use allows us to be in the center of Barcelona enjoying a unique open and sunny space. It also has a small storage room of about 12 meters. Communal terrace on the roof of the building with beautiful views of the old town. Exceptional location next to Plaza Real and Las Ramblas. Its particular location makes this apartment an unbeatable option to invest in the best location and finishes in the center of Barcelona. Excellent communications with public transport with the rest of the city.

description: Penthouse with great terraces and sea views This fabulous brand new development has 2 to 4-bedroom apartments available, distributed in 5 staircases that make up a fantastic new construction complex that integrates into the city with large green areas. It has a communal area with a swimming pool, parking lot, and storage rooms, as well as commercial premises with the necessary services such as a cafeteria, convenience store, and gym. This superb 3-bedroom penthouse is spread over an interior space of 77 m2. As soon as you enter you will find a small entrance hall with fitted wardrobes. On one side of the floor is the sleeping area with a double bedroom with fitted wardrobes and a single bedroom, a full bathroom, and finally a fantastic double bedroom with an en-suite bathroom. All bedrooms have access to the terrace. In the living area, there is a modern open kitchen that integrates into the living room making a very nice and functional space with great sliding doors from floor to ceiling that gives great light and spaciousness to the space. From the living room there is access to a large terrace of 35 m2 and on the roof has a 2nd terrace of 44 m2 to enjoy fantastic sea views. This promotion has excellent qualities and finishes to give the greatest comfort to its users. It has kitchens with high and low cabinets of large capacity, with SILESTONE countertop or similar. Includes parking space and storage room in the price. If you would like to know more about the flats that are available, do not hesitate to contact your Engel & Volkers real estate consultant. This great new development is located just 15 km from the center of Barcelona and 250 meters from the mediterranean sea. Where you can enjoy an excellent quality of life and be well connected with the most important urban centers in a short time. Just 2 minutes walk you get to the Renfe station that connects you with Plaza Cataluña and Sants Estación in 30 minutes, or you can get around by car connecting quickly with the C-31 or B-20. In this wonderful city near Barcelona you will find all the necessary services, as well as great schools and recreational spaces, not to mention great beaches 5 minutes away on foot.

description: Central flat in Sabadell E&V markets this spectacular flat in the centre of Sabadell. The property has been built with top quality materials and finishes: parquet floors, air conditioning and heat pump by ducts and electric blinds; giving the flat a Premium rating. On entering the property we find a hallway that gives access to the different areas of the house. The glass door in front of the entrance welcomes us to the day area and to a large and bright dining room with large wall-to-wall windows and access to the long balcony. To the right, presided over by a large window with unobstructed views of Tibidabo, we find the kitchen, which also gives access to the balcony, which has a larger area with space for a table and chairs, where you can enjoy the marvellous views. To the left we find the night area, also connected to the dining room by a corridor with built-in wardrobes ideal for storage. This area is distributed in a two double bedrooms, one single bedroom, a complete bathroom and an en-suite bathroom.  The property has 2 optional parking spaces 20.000eu each Located between Plaça Major and Gran Via, this property provides us with an unbeatable location and communication both on foot, by car or public transport. The property is less than 5 minutes away from the Rambla and the Town Hall, which allows us to find all kinds of shops, restaurants, libraries, schools and medical centres very close. A perfect place to live in the heart of the city.

Last but not least, we have 2 full bathrooms and a courtesy bathroom next to the hall. -The farm has a doorman -Optional parking: €30,000 In reference to the reform, tell you that the house is on a rectangular property, therefore, it is much easier to carry out any redistribution that you wish to do, also inform you that we have a reform service that you can contact us for any questions you may have. Emphasize the excellent location of the house, in one of the best neighborhoods in Barcelona and in one of the quietest streets in the area. In its vicinity it has all kinds of services: Hospitals, nurseries, schools, public transport: bus, railways, countless restaurants, parks, etc. In short, a unique opportunity to create your home from scratch in an unbeatable area, we look forward to seeing you soon!

description: Spacious flat in Poblesec 93m2 Flat with an excellent location in Poble-sec, located on Poeta Cabanyes street a few meters from Paral-lel, a few meters from the metro station that connects with lines L2 and L3, minutes from the sea and Plaza España and at the foot of Montjuic. It is a mezzanine that has 7 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms and a large kitchen. It has a gallery with a southeast location through which good morning and noon light enters. The apartment can be intended both for people who want to buy it to reform as well as for large families and for investors who want to continue renting the rooms since it has very good profitability. Poble Sec is one of the most booming neighborhoods in Barcelona due to its privileged location, halfway between the Sant Antoni neighborhood and the Montjuïc Park, between the sea and the Plaza de España. It is an area very well connected to the city center, Sants Station and the airport by public and private transport and with all the basic services within reach. It is a neighborhood with a great offer of leisure and restaurants. Its location also allows quick entry and exit from the city as it is located very close to Gran Vía, one of the main access roads to Barcelona.

description: Who has dreamed of designing and distributing their penthouse in the heart of Galvany? This beautiful flat, which more than a flat seems like we are in a single-family house, calm and quiet, offers you this opportunity. Being of origin and having practically all the walls in brick, we can reorganize the spaces as we please and adapt them to our needs. It currently has three bedrooms, two doubles, one single, a full bathroom, a living-dining room with a fireplace and an individual kitchen. The apartment, unique on the ground floor, has two wonderful terraces: one facing the sea, open to a block patio, with unobstructed views, with sun until late afternoon; and the other, facing northwest, also with very clear views of Tibidabo, pleasant and sunny all afternoon. Two annexes were built on both terraces more than 40 years ago, which today have already prescribed and are also deeded in the 100 m² of floor. These annexes were used as living rooms, one for adults, the other for children and both with access to each of the terraces. These two rooms integrated into the floor offer us a lot of play when it comes to redesigning spaces. It is a very unique piece. Located in the Galvany neighbourhood, it offers us all the commercial, health and entertainment services that we can look for. Strategically located. We are two minutes walk from Plaza Molina and five minutes from Turó Park. Very well connected with public transport, metro, FFCC and buses. Close to prestigious national and international schools. Do not hesitate to visit it, you can make it a lovely home for you and your family.

description: Single-family tower of 140m2 in a unique and privileged environment! Plot of 935m2 on two levels surrounded by protected green area, with beautiful garden and large private pool. Fantastic location in a residential environment and just 12 minutes' walk from FGC de Valldoreix. House comfortably distributed on a single floor of 116m2 plus a semi-basement floor of 24m2 garage and/or storage room. The house has, in the daytime area, a 30m2 living-dining room with fireplace and kitchen, all with direct access to the garden. In the night area we have 4 rooms, 3 double and 1 single; and 1 full bathroom. Semi-basement floor intended for garage or storage room. Housing in very good condition and easily expandable, with many possibilities!

description: This apartment is located in the upper part of Gracia, one of the most charming zones of Barcelona. The surrounding area has a wide variety of shops and services for day-to-day living, public transport, large green areas, lively streets and squares and an attractive range of leisure activities, bars and restaurants. The property has 88 built interior sqm and a 7 sqm terrace. It's located on the first floor of a building with only 5 apartments. The building has a large and sunny communal terrace with wonderful views of the whole city. The living-dining room is cosy and very bright, thanks to its excellent south orientation. It has access to the 7 sqm terrace, a perfect place to eat or relax in the open air. The kitchen is open-plan in the day area and is equipped with induction hob, extractor hood and oven. The night area has a total of 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The master bedroom en suite with its own bathroom and a single one lead out to the back of the building, while next to the living room there's a double bedroom with access to the terrace. The property is equipped with parquet floors, aerothermal energy system for ducted air conditioning/heating and hot water, and aluminium exterior carpentry with thermal bridge break and double glazing with air chamber. The building has a lift, video entry phone and low consumption LED lighting in communal areas. This is an excellent opportunity to acquire a new property with 3 bedrooms for this price in Barcelona, great to get the Golden Visa. Do not hesitate to contact Bcn Advisors to visit this property and find out about the other flats available in the building. * The handover of the keys is planned for May/June 2023.

address: subdistrict El Putxet i el Farró
description: Apartment overlooking the Barcino Tennis court Exceptional 167m2 built apartment and 12m2 open balcony with phenomenal views of Collserola and Barcino Tennis. It has a functional distribution, with a clear differentiation between the day area and the night area separated by a large hall at the entrance to the apartment. The day area is made up of a bright and sunny 45m2 living-dining room-kitchen open to the balcony facing the Barcino Tennis Court. The fully equipped kitchen has a practical and functional central island. The same kitchen communicates with a pantry area and interior laundry room. Next, next to the kitchen, is the service area made up of a single bedroom and its bathroom. The night area is made up of 3 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, one of them exterior with a balcony facing the street and the other two facing the interior patio, which share a full bathroom. The main bedroom, also facing the street, has a dressing room and a full bathroom. The general pavement is wooden flooring except for the bathrooms and service area, which is made of ceramic tiles. Gas heating with radiators in all rooms. As a complement, the property has a large parking space, not included in the price, located in the basement of the same building and accessed by elevator. In the district of El Putxet with all amenities, shops, restaurants, food, schools, cinemas... The Putxet is a small mountain in Sant Gervasi. This neighborhood was originally a core mainly summer but with the arrival of the railroad Sarria, metro and trams became a place of habitual residence. Very close to the gardens of Turó del Putxet. Municipal Market of Sant Gervasi. Tennis Barcino. Balmes multiplexes Club. Very well connected to the city center through the Ferrocarriles de la Generalitat de Catalunya with the stations 'El Putxet' and 'Av. Tibidabo'. Connecting with many bus routes. Tram Blau, that leads to the foot of the Tibidabo Funicular. A 6 minutes to access the Ronda de Dalt, where we can easily go in all directions.

description: Fantastic family apartment Engel & Völkers presents this fantastic family apartment in the best area of Sants district. The flat of approx. 80sqm built has four bedrooms, a bathroom, a toilet and a very bright living room with a balcony with excellent orientation. The access is through a foyer where you will find a single room on your left. In front there is the distribution corridor, in which we have another single room, a medium-sized room, the kitchen and the toilet completely refurbished. Following along the corridor brings you to the entrance of a bright living room, which also has access to a balcony. On the left side of the living room is the night area with a double bedroom, a fully refurbished bathroom and another single bedroom Sants’s district is in a privileged location, very well connected by public transport, with metro (L3, L1 & L5) and several bus lines. It also has the main railroad station of Barcelona, which communicates with the airport (20 minutes), Sitges, Madrid (AVE), etc. The entrance and exit accesses are the Ronda del Mig and the N340 road. It is a charming neighborhood, with its own style, which preserves its tradition and at the same time, it is cosmopolitan. Ideal for families and tourists. It has a charming modernist market, an important commercial area, a varied and interesting gastronomic and leisure offer. It has a good structure of services such as schools, institutes, and kindergartens, a library, sports facilities, parks with playgrounds for children and green spaces. The famous Camp Nou is 10 minutes away from the apartment.

description: Unifamiliar a cuatro vientos con piscina en l'Arxiu Practicidad, amplitud y cercanía, son los mejores adjetivos que describen a esta espectacular vivienda a 4 vientos de 303 m2 en una parcela llana, orientada totalmente al SUR de 664 m2, reformada cuidando el más mínimo detalle en toda la vivienda. Ubicada en una parcela amplia y ajardinada con piscina privada, goza de una ubicación fantástica e inmejorable. Ubicada en la zona más exclusiva y tranquila de Sant Cugat, concretamente, en el Arxiu. Una zona residencial que goza de la máxima tranquilidad, además la vivienda se sitúa, cerca de paradas de autobús, andando de estaciones de FFCC y del centro de la ciudad. Así mismo, cercana a infinitud de clubs deportivos con transporte particular. La vivienda se distribuye en 2 plantas, intercomunicadas entre sí por ascensor, cuenta con todas las comodidades y acabados de calidad. En la planta baja encontramos un amplio y espacioso hall de entrada que nos conduce a un espectacular salón comedor que gracias a sus grandes ventanales nos permite salir al espacio exterior compuesto por zona de porche / chill out, zona ajardinada y piscina privada. Encontramos además una espaciosa cocina office con isla central totalmente equipada con electrodomésticos, zona de lavandería con despensa, habitación doble y baño completo. Gracias a unas bonitas escaleras desde el vestíbulo accedemos a la zona de noche, compuesta por 5 habitaciones todas ellas exteriores con armarios empotrados, amplias y exteriores. La habitación master suite goza de unas preciosas vistas, vestidor y baño completo, así como otra habitación integrada en la estancia. ACABADOS DE CALIDAD: suelos de parqué, carpintería interior de madera, carpintería exterior con doble cristal, aire acondicionado, calefacción individual a través de radiadores y alarma. UBICACIÓN: Ubicada en una zona privilegiada y exclusiva de l'Arxiu, cuenta con excelentes comunicaciones con las principales carreteras con acceso inmejorables a Barcelona y alrededores. La zona de l'Arxiu destaca por sus zonas residenciales tranquilas y caracterizadas por su proximidad a infinitud de servicios, comercios y servicios médicos a escasos minutos. No dude en contactar con el equipo experto de aProperties Real Estate.

Wonderful property in a Catalan traditional building, 2 bedrooms unit with a spacious living room that offers patio views that avoids annoying noise from the street. Upon entering the property we find a large hall that gives us access to a large distributor that allows us to directly access the suite, equipped with fitted wardrobes and its private bathroom. Further on, we find the large bathroom that serves the next beautiful double room. The day area has an American kitchen equipped with an island and followed by a large table with 8 people capacity, connected to the beautiful and bright living room with access through 2 exits to a 7m2 terrace. description: Beautiful property in the "Quadrat d'Or", to restore, exterior, on a fourth floor, with views to emblematic buildings on Paseo de Gracia. The distribution of this property is the classic fan, it is a unique piece due to its height, natural light and the exterior distribution of all the rooms, and with high ceilings and the original architectural elements. At the entrance, we find a splendid hall and a double room that overlooks a patio facing west, with afternoon sun. The curved corridor, with windows on the left side and the kitchen and a bathroom on the right, leads to the front of the house, with four rooms with balconies facing the typical corner of l'Eixample, and a bathroom. It is a unique piece in a most desirable neighborhood in Barcelona to transform into an exclusive apartment with the characteristic charm of the Eixample estates in Barcelona.

address: Calle de la Miranda del Vallès
description: Exclusive detached house with private pool in l’Arxiu aProperties sells this unbeatable home that we present to you today. Design, luxury and exclusivity are the best adjectives that describe this spectacular 750 m2 villa distributed in the best way, taking care of the smallest detail throughout the house. Located on a large and landscaped plot, it has a fantastic and unbeatable location on its 1060 m2 plot. Located in the most exclusive and quiet area of Sant Cugat, specifically, in l’Arxiu. A residential area that enjoys maximum tranquility, in addition the house is located, close to bus stops, walking distance from railway stations and the city center. Likewise, close to an infinity of sports clubs with private transport. The house is distributed over 3 floors, has all the comforts that the house deserves. On the ground floor we find a spacious and spacious entrance hall that leads to a spectacular dining room that, thanks to its large windows, allows us to go out into the outdoor space, all of it facing SOUTH. We also find an office kitchen with a central island of the best qualities, fully equipped with the most exclusive appliances from the PREMIUM brands on the market, as well as a spacious dining room. Following our tour we find a spectacular library / multipurpose room at two heights, a master suite room with a private terrace with a dressing area and a full bathroom and a courtesy toilet. Thanks to some beautiful stairs from the hall we access the night area, composed of 3 rooms, all of them exterior with built-in wardrobes, one of them in a suite format with an intimate and private balcony / solarium with a complete bathroom, we also find another complete bathroom to give service to the other rooms. On the lower floor we find a large chill out room with tropical wood flooring with heated indoor pool, direct access to the garden thanks to beautiful windows, gym, wet sauna with dressing room and bathroom, courtesy toilet, heated cellar, garage for 3- 4 cars and motorcycles (in addition to having outside space to park), storage room and engine room. QUALITY FINISHES: parquet and marble floors, white wood interior carpentry, perimeter and interior alarm, exterior carpentry with double glazing, heating, video surveillance through security cameras, air conditioning ducts (hot and cold pump), etc. LOCATION: Located in a privileged and exclusive area of l’Arxiu, it has excellent communications with the main roads with unbeatable access to Barcelona and its surroundings. The l’Arxiu area stands out for its quiet residential areas characterized by its proximity to an infinite number of services, shops and medical services within a few minutes. Do not hesitate to contact the expert team of aProperties Real Estate Sant Cugat.

suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle de la Miranda del Vallès

description: Amazing apartment with terrace in the prestigious Rambla Catalunya, one of the most privilege areas of Barcelona and the Eixample, the modernist and gastronomic heart of the city, surrounded by period buildings, luxury shops, bars, restaurants and is also perfectly connected to public transport. Its privileged location is completed by a wide cultural offer, we are one street from the famous Paseo de Gracia with famous monuments such as Casa Batlló, La Pedrera, among others. The property is located on the penultimate floor of a fantastic building from the beginning of the 20th century in which it was expanded with 4 luxury homes on the last 2 floors of the building in 2016. This property offers luxury and comfort combined with a warm personal touch. The property has double orientation, you can enjoy the sun all day. In the day part we have a large living-dining room with a fully equipped American-style open kitchen, with De Dietrich appliances, all in a single space of more than 70 m², completely exterior with large windows that give way to a magnificent terrace of about 20 m². In the night area we find three double bedrooms, two of them with balconies overlooking Rambla Catalunya, all with built-in wardrobes, and one of them ensuite, we have a second full bathroom, equipped with both a shower and a bathtub, and provides service to the rest of the bedrooms. The intermediate area is illuminated by a water area that overlooks a large interior patio, with a cellar underneath, which provides a lot of light and ventilation to the house. It is a perfectly designed home, with spacious, illuminated spaces, fully soundproofed and insulated with the best materials on the market, with an air-heater installation from Hitachi, and aluminum windows that isolate the home from the outside. Its location is privileged, perfect both for living and for investment, since it is an area with high demand. The price of the house includes a parking space in a neighbor building. For more information please contact Max Ricart.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Dreta de l'Eixample, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Rambla de Catalunya

description: Colibree presents this penthouse for sale that will leave you speechless. It is located in the heart of Barcelona, in the Sarrià-Sant Gervasi area, a few meters from Plaza Lesseps. It is a true luxury home with all the comforts you can imagine. This penthouse has a constructed area of 87.00 m2 and a useful area of 78.00 m2. But the most impressive are its 65.00 m2 terrace, an authentic marvel with views of Tibidabo and Montjuic This apartment has 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, so you will have enough space for you and whoever you want. And don't worry about the inconvenience of having to climb stairs, since it has an elevator. As soon as you enter, you will find the living room, a spacious and bright space that will make you feel at home from the first moment. In addition, it is equipped with air conditioning, which makes it perfect for the summer months. In the living room you will also find a kitchen furnished with all the appliances you need to cook your favorite dishes. It has built-in cabinets to store your utensils and food and a nice laundry room. The rooms are also an absolute joy. Both are doubles, which will allow you to have one of them as the main room and the other as an office or guest room. All rooms are equipped with built-in wardrobes, perfect for keeping your clothes and other personal belongings organized. But if there is something that really stands out about this penthouse, it is its impressive terrace. The 65.00 m2 of outdoor space will allow you to enjoy the sun, the sea breeze and the spectacular views of the city. It will be a perfect place for your dinners, your breakfasts, your readings and your conversations with friends. And not only the penthouse is spectacular, but also its surroundings. It is located in one of the most exclusive areas of Barcelona, where you can find everything you need just a few steps away. You will have shops, restaurants, bars, parks, schools and health centers close at hand. In addition, communication with the rest of the city is excellent, with several metro and bus lines that will take you to any corner in a short time. The farm is classic and is listed.

description: STUNNING PROPERTY WITH VIEWS TO THE MEDITERRANEAN SEA Magnificent 176 m² property, 3 bedrooms, two full bathrooms and two parking spaces. Located in Diagonal Mar, on the 10th. floor of the exclusive Illa del Bosc Building, with high quality finishes, facing the Mediterranean, in one of the newest areas of Barcelona. Surrounded by spectacular landscapes, views of the sea and the city, nestled in a modern area with excellent cuisine. Exclusivity and versatility are the hallmark of this impressive property built in 2004. The rooms are oriented towards the sea to enjoy the views of the landscape. It has spaces flooded with light. The entrance to the property comprises a hall that leads to a distributor, from where you access the bedroom area or the day area. The bedrooms are peaceful rooms, highlighting the main en-suite room and its spaces: dressing room, bathroom with bathtub, direct exit to the terrace and views of the sea. The generous Great Living-Dining room with direct access to a large terrace with teak floor of 20 m² is appreciated to enjoy its comfort and views of the Mediterranean and Barcelona. The property benefits from an extensive community area exclusively for residents with: Several Pools, Garden, Paddle Courts, Gym, Children's Playground and 24-hour surveillance. Enjoy the proximity to La Nova Mar Bella Beach - just 5 minutes walk - and a varied local network of Services; Supermarkets, Schools, Medical Centers, Restaurants, Gas Stations, Sports Equipment-Circuits, Convention Centers and much more. The property is in excellent condition, it has all the attributes to be considered one of the best properties to live in Barcelona, by the sea. Price: €1.390. 000€ - Only €3,669/monthly Call me or write me to arrange a Visit!

description: APARTMENT FOR SALE IN EL PUTXET / SANT GERVASI REMAX exclusively presents this apartment in the upper area of the city, it is a fantastic opportunity to buy an excellent property in the neighborhood of Sant Gervasi i el Putxet, one of the best areas of Barcelona. YOU WANT TO LIVE IN THIS FARM, why? It is a 4th floor of 94m2 in a building in excellent condition, with 2 elevators Optionally it is sold with a parking space in the same building, not included in the price. It has a concierge service and parking on the same property with direct access from the house through one of the elevators. Building located at the corner of Vallirana and Padua streets, almost, Rda.General Mitre, without the noise of this artery. orientation no.OR. THIS APARTMENT WILL BE YOUR NEXT HOME Why? The farm dates from 1971, but it is in excellent condition, and has been renovated in the kitchen and recent ones in the bathroom and kitchen. One of the rooms is connected to the kitchen and with this we have a circular path of the floor, being able to access from the kitchen to the living room, or to the rooms directly, being able to reach the living room through the night area. The dining room has a large window overlooking Padua street. The independent kitchen is generous in size and provides us with numerous cabinets and workspaces, as well as a comfortable corner where you can place a table and chairs. The night area has 4 bedrooms, 2 large and 2 individual, among which is the one connected to the kitchen, already mentioned, which was used as the workplace of the professional who lived on the property. We have a full bathroom and courtesy toilet. It has Natural Gas heating by radiators, aluminum exterior carpentry and armored access door among many other quality details. The farm has a large community terrace with impressive views of the entire city. YOU WILL CHOOSE THIS NEIGHBORHOOD TO LIVE Why? The neighborhood of '"Putxet Sant Gervasi" has all kinds of services, shops, restaurants, food, schools, cinemas. Originally it was mainly a summer resort, but with the arrival of the Sarrià railway, the metro and trams it became a habitual place of residence Very well connected to the center of Barcelona by means of the Green line metro (L3) in Plaza Lesseps (400 m away) and the Generalitat de Catalunya Railway with the FGC Padua station (350 m away). Being next to the Rda.General Mitre., we have access to the Ronda de Dalt, through the Rovira Tunnel, and through Pza.Lesseps/Av.Vallcarca. Medical Services at Hospital Plató (700 m away), Clínica El Pilar (850 m away) Leisure, Barcino Tennis (1000 m) and Balmes Club Multicines (850 m) Municipal Market of Sant Gervasi (750 m) The neighborhood also has a large number of Institutes and Schools, such as Menendez y Pelayo, Montserrat, Colegio Jesuitas Infante Jesús, etc. YOU WANT TO SEE IT, RIGHT? Call us and we will make a visit quickly.

description: Spacious apartment with unique and direct views over Gaudi’s masterpiece "La Pedrera" and views down to the sea located in the most exclusive stretch of Paseo de Gràcia near Diagonal in the heart of Barcelona.  The apartment is located on the seventh floor of the building with abundant natural light.  The building was built in 1850 and was completely renovated in 2003 while maintaining all the historical features.  Upon entering we find a large entrance hall and to the right a large living room with a spacious balcony that runs across the entire facade with stunning views of Passeig de Gràcia and the Pedrera off the living room we find a fully equipped kitchen and service room with a full bathroom. There is a guest toilet in the hallway. On the other side of the apartment there are a total of three bedrooms. Two spacious double bedrooms that share a full bathroom and the master suite with a full bathroom.  This is a spacious and bright apartment, with the classic style that characterizes the apartments of Paseo de Gràcia in the heart of Barcelona Please contact Max Ricart Luxury Properties to arrange a visit.

description: Great opportunity to acquire a beautiful penthouse in the sought after area of Sant Gervasi - el Putxet in Barcelona! This magnificent penthouse has an area of about 75 m2, which includes a hall, a dining room, a fully equipped kitchen, three bedrooms, two doubles and one single, a complete bathroom, a toilet, a laundry room and a perfect balcony to enjoy from the sunny climate of the city and have views of the large patio and private garden of the community where you can sunbathe, relax or take a walk. It also has its own storage room under cover, of about 15 m2, where you can leave everything that is in season without taking up living space, being a great relief. Some reforms and updates have been made to make it ready to move into and or finish giving it your personal touch. Everything has been designed to provide maximum comfort and convenience in each of its rooms. In addition, together with the apartment, an independent parking space is included, located on the same street, about 30 meters from the building. This is an unparalleled advantage, since you won't have to worry about finding parking on the street. There is the possibility of selling without the parking space. The apartment is in an excellent location, surrounded by green parks, and less than 5 minutes from all services and public transport. Everything you need is at your fingertips! Do not miss the opportunity to live in one of the most coveted neighborhoods in Barcelona. Come visit this property and fall in love with its details and location!

description: In the beautiful village of Vallromanes, known for its golf course and exquisite gastronomic offer, we present a new development of two semi-detached houses with private garden just built. The property is characterized by the quality of the materials and finishes, the luminosity, its suitable orientation, its location in a quiet and sunny area of Vallromanes, very close to the center and, being in front of the golf course, no new constructions will be developed in front of it, so the views are guaranteed.  With a comfortable and functional distribution, the house has: First floor: access to a large entrance hall, guest bathroom, kitchen-office and living-dining room with access to the porch. Useful meters 79m2 and built 92m2. Porches 92m2 and built 105m2. First floor: 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, one of them en suite, with a large changing area. Useful meters 63m2 and built 76m2. Basement floor: garage for 3 cars, bathroom, bedroom and machine room. Useful meters 110m2 and built 125m2. Optionally you can build a private pool in the garden with an additional cost of approx 25.000€. The house, ready to move in, is delivered with the project, plans and quality specifications. It stands out the Technal aluminum carpentry anodized anthracite gray and with thermal cut and "Climalit" glass; the use of top quality satin plastic paint, locksmithing with double layer of epoxy paint for its antioxidant protection and finished with enamel, PORCELANOSA ceramic flooring in all rooms, stoneware flooring in wet areas, concrete in the rest of the garage and ceramic flooring on the first floor terrace. The kitchen furniture is Nollte Küchen, with doors and shelves covered with synthetic laminate on all sides and edges, and DE DIETRICH appliances. Built-in electric oven, with glass front and electric programmer. Stainless steel extractor hood integrated with furniture. Electric hob. Built-in microwave oven with glass front. LIEBHERR refrigerator. The bathrooms have white DURAVIT sanitary ware, combined with lacquered wood furniture and PIEDRA ceramic pavement, forming a set with the vertical walls. All kitchen and bathroom faucets are TRES mixer taps. The house is very energy efficient, with ducted aerothermal heating in all rooms. The air conditioning by two devices, one for the first floor and one for the second floor, and the air ducts go through the false ceiling. Ask us for a visit and do not miss this opportunity!

description: Nice ground floor with terrace in La Salut Welcome to the home of your dreams! This practical apartment located in a quiet residential area of the Salut neighborhood is the perfect place to live comfortably. Imagine waking up every morning to the fresh air of Park Güell and the vibrant life of Vila de Gracia just a few steps away. This 72 m2 ground floor has been designed in a very practical and functional way with a fully equipped kitchen, perfect for enjoying your favorite dishes. In addition, it has a 5mt2 patio, a single room and a spacious and comfortable bathroom. The exterior double main room is the ideal space to relax after a long day, with a cozy and quiet atmosphere to enjoy your nights. And for those moments of meeting with friends and family, you can enjoy a large living room with access to a beautiful terrace of approximately 13mt2. And do not worry about the weather, since the entire house has gas heating with radiators and does not need air conditioning, which guarantees a comfortable environment throughout the year. What are you waiting for? Come visit and fall in love with your new home! La Salut is a family and quiet neighborhood in the district of Gracia, with spectacular views of Barcelona very close to Lesseps square with all the necessary communications to move around the city and is 10 minutes walk from the heart of the neighborhood thanks and all the commercial activity and nightlife offered by this district, The neighborhood has one of the most important urban elements of the city and a World Heritage Site: the Parc Güell by Gaudí. In the neighborhood, there is a large network of public and private schools, the Hospital de l’Esperança, the Mercat de Lesseps, The Jaume Fuster Library and the Monastery of Sant Josep de la Muntanya. The closest commercial activity is concentrated in the Avenida de Vallcarca and in the Travessera de Dalt where you can find a variety of shops.

description: Modernist semi-detached house of 413 sqm of registered built area on a 742 sqm plot, designed by the architect Albert Juan Torner at the beginning of the 20th century, restored based on the French and English country houses of the nobility and high bourgeoisie, with 6 bedrooms, 5 bathrooms and a garage.  In the construction it is necessary to highlight elements of special interest such as the sgraffito on the doors and windows, the carved stone elements, the moldings and stuccos in the rooms, the exceptional fireplaces or its precious floors; that make this house a unique piece in an environment of singular beauty within a city like Barcelona. The house has four rooms in the form of a Suite, two service rooms, five complete bathrooms and wonderful views of the city of Barcelona and the sea from its beautiful garden. The ground floor or day area, has a spacious hall, a large dining room in three rooms, an office, a courtesy toilet, an independent equipped kitchen with access to the service area. On this same floor we find a spectacular terrace, a summer dining room with a unique pergola, with eight columns that support a centenary wisteria of great beauty, a seating area and a swimming pool with views of Barcelona. The upper floor or night area, has three rooms in the form of a Suite, all with their own bathroom, the main one has two bathrooms, two dressing rooms and direct access to the terrace with views of Barcelona. In the basement, the farm has two individual rooms, currently one of them is a gym and the other is a suite-type room with bathroom, dining room, water area and machine room or cellar. Do miss this opportunity. Sales expenses and taxes not included.

description: Modernist semi-detached house of 413 sqm of registered built area on a 742 sqm plot, designed by the architect Albert Juan Torner at the beginning of the 20th century, restored based on the French and English country houses of the nobility and high bourgeoisie, with 6 bedrooms, 5 bathrooms and a garage.  In the construction it is necessary to highlight elements of special interest such as the sgraffito on the doors and windows, the carved stone elements, the moldings and stuccos in the rooms, the exceptional fireplaces or its precious floors; that make this house a unique piece in an environment of singular beauty within a city like Barcelona. The house has four rooms in the form of a Suite, two service rooms, five complete bathrooms and wonderful views of the city of Barcelona and the sea from its beautiful garden. The ground floor or day area, has a spacious hall, a large dining room in three rooms, an office, a courtesy toilet, an independent equipped kitchen with access to the service area. On this same floor we find a spectacular terrace, a summer dining room with a unique pergola, with eight columns that support a centenary wisteria of great beauty, a seating area and a swimming pool with views of Barcelona. The upper floor or night area, has three rooms in the form of a Suite, all with their own bathroom, the main one has two bathrooms, two dressing rooms and direct access to the terrace with views of Barcelona. In the basement, the farm has two individual rooms, currently one of them is a gym and the other is a suite-type room with bathroom, dining room, water area and machine room or cellar. Do miss this opportunity. Sales expenses and taxes not included.

description: Nice ground floor with terrace in La Salut Welcome to the home of your dreams! This practical apartment located in a quiet residential area of the Salut neighborhood is the perfect place to live comfortably. Imagine waking up every morning to the fresh air of Park Güell and the vibrant life of Vila de Gracia just a few steps away. This 72 m2 ground floor has been designed in a very practical and functional way with a fully equipped kitchen, perfect for enjoying your favorite dishes. In addition, it has a 5mt2 patio, a single room and a spacious and comfortable bathroom. The exterior double main room is the ideal space to relax after a long day, with a cozy and quiet atmosphere to enjoy your nights. And for those moments of meeting with friends and family, you can enjoy a large living room with access to a beautiful terrace of approximately 13mt2. And do not worry about the weather, since the entire house has gas heating with radiators and does not need air conditioning, which guarantees a comfortable environment throughout the year. What are you waiting for? Come visit and fall in love with your new home! La Salut is a family and quiet neighborhood in the district of Gracia, with spectacular views of Barcelona very close to Lesseps square with all the necessary communications to move around the city and is 10 minutes walk from the heart of the neighborhood thanks and all the commercial activity and nightlife offered by this district, The neighborhood has one of the most important urban elements of the city and a World Heritage Site: the Parc Güell by Gaudí. In the neighborhood, there is a large network of public and private schools, the Hospital de l’Esperança, the Mercat de Lesseps, The Jaume Fuster Library and the Monastery of Sant Josep de la Muntanya. The closest commercial activity is concentrated in the Avenida de Vallcarca and in the Travessera de Dalt where you can find a variety of shops.

description: Coldwell Banker Eminent is pleased to present this EXCLUSIVE property, located in the Sant Gervasi-Galvany neighborhood. The apartment has the charm of the royal estates, in this case it dates from 1928, typical of the upper area, where we can appreciate the spaciousness of its rooms and the double circulation that it offers to have balconies facing the street and a totally clear block patio, the top of their ceilings and their decoration. Upon entering the house we find a spacious hall that perfectly distributes each room, and where you can appreciate its quality. The reform that was carried out four years ago used high-end materials to highlight and value every detail. The living room, which is divided into two rooms, is very spacious and has an exit to the balcony. From the dining room there is access to a large fully equipped kitchen, which has double access, from the dining room and from the corridor that leads to the rooms. It has five bedrooms, two full bathrooms and a toilet. Of these five rooms, one is the master-suite with an office area and a bathroom with a sauna. The other two are double, very spacious, and two are individual but generous. In addition, it has air conditioning splits, and built-in wardrobes in most of the rooms to make better use of space. The farm that has been recently rehabilitated, and has a concierge service. Parking spaces are available very close to the building. Due to its geographical location, it is connected by public transport (bus, metro and FGC) with the different points of the city. A few streets away is the famous and stately Mercat Galvany, dating from the 19th century, whose stalls sell fresh produce and top-quality prepared food. It also has a wide variety of shops and services, supermarkets and restaurants.

description: We present a very exclusive property in the heart of the Galvany neighborhood. It is a fantastic 239 m² penthouse, spacious, sunny, with three winds, practically all of its rooms are exterior and with unbeatable views. Located in a stately royal estate, carefully maintained. The apartment was completely renovated by the owner about 15 years ago using high-quality, high-end materials and with exquisite taste. Access to the apartment is through a beautiful and spacious Hall, which leads us on one side to the day area and on the other to the night area. Accessing the day area we find a large dining room with large windows, facing Tarragona. In a corner of the living room, we find a collected library with access to a 10 m² terrace. On the other side of the living room is the kitchen, independent, generous, equipped, with a large Office area and with access to a terrace of identical dimensions to the one mentioned in the living room, also facing Tarragona. In the kitchen we also have a window with views of the park; It is a luxury in Barcelona to cook watching a similar landscape; It is already difficult to find kitchens with exits to the outside, that the fact of having a kitchen with views is unusual. In this area we have an exterior courtesy toilet and also a Junior suite. Previously this room was the service room that could be recovered if necessary. On the other side of the Hall we find the night area, very quiet, very sunny, with incredible views. In this area we have several built-in wardrobes and a couple of deep closets that serve as storage rooms for storing suitcases and other belongings. It also has an additional storage room on the ground floor. Next, we find a distributor that leads to two triple rooms, a double room, a bathroom that serves them, and finally a wonderful suite. All the rooms, exterior, with wardrobes, built-ins and of incredible dimensions, have windows overlooking the Monterols park. Unique location, extraordinary views, absolute silence. To finish livening up this fabulous property on the top floor we find the large community terrace, with views of Barcelona, ideal for celebrating any event. It is a unique apartment in the area. The Galvany neighborhood is a neighborhood full of all kinds of services, shops, public transport, and close to prestigious schools. If you are looking for views, sun, space and silence, this is your apartment, be sure to visit it.

description: Magnificent apartment in the Gràcia Nova neighbourhood (Barcelona), with 184 m² (according to the plan), four luxurious bedrooms and three bathrooms.  It is located on the tenth floor of a beautiful building from the 70s with a concierge service and a private area for the exclusive use of residents inside the patio.  We enter the property from a beautiful gallery with Roman-style columns. From there, we access the spacious dining room living room, the star room of the property. In this same space, we find a marble fireplace with a spacious and cozy living room to rest.  The living room has a balcony along its entire length that enjoys natural light and from where we can enjoy a spectacular view of the city that goes from the port to the mountains.  It has two large double bedrooms en suite with a dressing room and two other double bedrooms that can be used as a study or leisure area.  Likewise, we have a fully equipped kitchen and an exterior part dedicated to the utility area.  On the other hand, we can find a relaxation space that consists of a Finnish sauna and a zen space that invites you to relax after a hard day's work.  The building offers a large private park that covers the block with sports and leisure equipment for the youngest: the ideal space to let children play freely and safely.

description: Located on Calle Aragón, very close to the Glòries Shopping Center, we discovered this surprising 3-bedroom apartment with a fantastic interior terrace.    All exterior, the house is made up of a hall-distributor, 3 exterior rooms (1 double bedroom of 15m² and another of 10m², both with lots of natural light and access to the balcony that overlooks the street and, a third room of 9 m² with window ), a full bathroom and a large room of more than 30 m² with a living room plus a full American kitchen with access to a cozy terrace on the ground floor, with an electric awning, where you can enjoy incredible evenings and the tranquility it offers.    The apartment is very quiet and bright, it is well insulated thermally and acoustically, the perceived quality of materials is high and the finishes are impeccable; to enter to live without making any investment. At the equipment level, it has two A/C-Split, radiator heating (natural gas), wooden floors and carpentry, double-glazed aluminum exterior enclosures, fitted wardrobes, equipped kitchen and hydromassage bathtub.    Located in the Camp de l'Arpa del Clot neighbourhood, at the northern end of l'Eixample, we can find all the necessary services nearby: neighborhood shops, supermarkets, CC Glòries, sports facilities and parks, public transport (buses and metro), educational and health center options, proximity to the Auditori and a wide gastronomic offer. In addition, the proximity of the Meridiana, Gran Via and Rondes ensure a quick connection by road.    Don't miss out on this authentic oasis of peace in Barcelona!

description: This spacious penthouse located in a corner building is a remarkable opportunity for those seeking a luxury home with breathtaking views over the city of Barcelona. The property's location, just three blocks away from Passeig Sant Joan, provides easy access to transportation, making it an ideal choice for city living.  Upon entering the apartment, the large, double-glazed windows in the living room immediately draw attention, filling the space with natural light and providing stunning panoramic views of the city, including the iconic Sagrada Familia, Montjuic, and the Mediterranean Sea. The living room also offers direct access to the private terrace, which spans an impressive 75 m² and faces south, making it an ideal spot for outdoor entertainment. The terrace is equipped with a built-in barbecue, perfect for hosting guests and enjoying it all yea round.  The apartment currently features two bedrooms and a studio, including one large suite with bathtub and sauna, and an interior double bedroom also with its own bathroom, providing ample privacy for residents.    The property's greatest advantage is its potential for renovation, which provides an exciting opportunity for new owners to customize the space according to their needs and preferences. The existing layout can be reconfigured to create an open kitchen with the living room, adding to the home's exclusive and luxurious feel.  Furthermore, the building's amenities, including an elevator and parking available for rent, provide convenient and comfortable living. The building dates back to 1979, adding a sense of character and history to the property.  Overall, this penthouse is an excellent opportunity for anyone seeking a spacious and customizable home with stunning views and convenient city living.
