address: subdistrict Diagonal Mar i el Front Marítim del Poblenou
neighborhood: Diagonal Mar i el Front Marítim del Poblenou
description: This is a duplex penthouse in the exclusive urbanization of Illa de Mar in the neighborhood of Diagonal Mar in Barcelona. The penthouse has a built area of 130m2, plus a terrace of 82m2 completely open to the Mediterranean Sea and with a fantastic jacuzzi. Adjacent to the entrance hall there is a comfortable living-dining room, whose main feature is its fusion with the "L" shaped terrace that surrounds the entire floor. Natural light, privacy and dynamism between the interior and exterior are part of this extraordinary proposal. The kitchen is semi-open and fully equipped. On the upper floor there is an open space, offering a very luminous and pleasant space for work or recreation. The property has two spacious double bedrooms, one of them en suite located on the upper floor with dressing area, jacuzzi and sea views. The other bedroom is also en suite and is located on the first floor. The community area is exclusive and has two swimming pools, green garden, paddle tennis court, gym, sauna and social club. It has 24 hour security and the price includes a parking space and a storage room. If the sea breeze is one of the reasons why you invest in a home in Barcelona, this area of the coast is your ideal place. Depending on your lifestyle, you can choose between the traditional Poblenou, the emblematic Olympic Village of athletes or the ultra-modern Diagonal Mar. Its most recognizable boundaries are between Avenida Diagonal, the Mediterranean Sea with its beaches from Somorrostro to the Forum and Carrer de Bac de Roda. In Poblenou you will enjoy a 21st century village next to the beach where it is still possible to buy single-family houses, apartments in traditional and remodeled buildings, or the highlight of the area: the fantastic lofts created in old industrial buildings. In the Vila Olímpica, created for the 1992 Olympic Games, you will find functional apartments that are very attractive due to their location, just a stone's throw from the sea and from vibrant leisure and gastronomic venues. In Diagonal Mar, on the other hand, the imposing and modern residential buildings with convenient luxury features offer the most desirable open sea views in all of Barcelona. Diagonal Mar, Poblenou and the Vila Olímpica are your best option to really enjoy the privileged location by the sea in the heart of Barcelona. A well communicated area, with all the services, shopping centers, leisure and culture. Where you can live a more traditional, family and bohemian lifestyle, or with the luxury features and wonderful views of the sea.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Diagonal Mar i el Front Marítim del Poblenou, Barcelona
suggestedTexts.title: Penthouse

description: Lucas Fox presents a unique property located in the heart of Barcelona, in the Dreta de l'Eixample.  This 200m2 apartment is located on the 4th floor of a modernist building from 1890 restored in 2007 with an lift.  The high ceilings of 3.70m with beautiful moldings create a feeling of spaciousness throughout the apartment. The property has a spacious 52m2 dining room living room facing the street with access to 3 balconies. In addition, it has a large kitchen diner fully equipped with Bosch and Miele brand appliances.  The apartment has 3 bedrooms, of which 1 is en-suite with a bathroom, dressing room and access to a 6m2 terrace, and 2 interior double bedrooms, as well as a guest toilet, a full bathroom and a utility room room. It also has a practical 10m2 loft.  The apartment has air conditioning by splits and heating by gas radiators.  A unique opportunity to acquire a dream apartment in one of the most exclusive areas of Barcelona!  Contact us to arrange a visit.

The apartment has a large entrance hall that distributes us to the different rooms of the same. It has a large living room-dining room with access to a cozy and very enjoyable terrace. From the dining room we access a fully equipped kitchen-office and overlooking the park. The sleeping area consists of a bedroom en suite with dressing room and bathroom, and three rooms that share a bathroom. It also has a water area. All rooms have fitted wardrobes. The property has heating and air conditioning through air ducts hot / cold, marble floors, electric shutters throughout the house, aluminum frames with double glazing. The sale price includes a large parking space and a storage room located on the same property. There would be the possibility of a second optional parking space. The apartment is part of a community with garden area, pool, gym and two paddle courts. It is an excellent property to enjoy all year round the coast just ten minutes from the city.

description: This impressive ground floor is one of those properties whose historical value is unique and definitely unrepeatable. Located in a quite street in the heart of the Gothic Quarter, there is this property built next to the Main Synagogue -built around 1314- in what used to be the old Jewish quarter of Barcelona, one of the oldest settlements of that community in Europe. Since the 14th century it has been known as the Rabbi's House, although inside it preserves the Roman ruins that give a glimpse of an even older past and which have been left protected but visible in the latest refurbishment. The 290m2 of this apartment are distributed in a grandiose day area within an open space with ceilings that exceed 4m in height where the living room with home cinema, a dining room with a large table and an open kitchen with high quality materials of the Santos house have been arranged. The apartment is accessed through the usual entrance of the building, but also has direct access from the street in this area. It has 3 double bedrooms, 3 bathrooms and a courtesy bathroom, as well as a multipurpose underground space of 30m2 with its own bathroom, which can function as a wine cellar, games room, or even as a spa. Throughout the property there are many details and elements that give it its special character, elegant for its decoration, historic for its original construction elements and comfortable with the materials and designs applied in its most recent refurbishment, such as natural oak wood floors, fitted wardrobes and home automation. A perfect combination that makes this property an ideal retreat in the city centre. The building has also been completely refurbished recently, and offers a communal terrace with chill out area, barbecue and fantastic views over the Gothic Quarter. It is the oldest district, number 1, the embryo of the city, where all its history begins from the original Barcino, where Roman ruins and medieval Gothic coexist. This district is made up of four neighborhoods, the Gothic, Sant Pere, Santa Caterina, El Born and La Ribera, and Barceloneta, each one more interesting than the other for tourists, since it is the most touristic area of the city, as well as residents. Despite its name, it is one of the most dynamic areas, full of history, art and culture, diversity and very cosmopolitan. Its two markets are especially interesting, La Boquería and Santa Caterina have everything you need from anywhere in the world. The buildings are quite old and many are very well preserved. The floors are generally medium to small, and fantastic historical jewels can be found, such as floors with medieval or Roman walls. So if you are a lover of the city's millenary history, culture, heritage, the most varied gastronomy, the beach, and entertainment, and you want to make a good investment, in this district you can find your ideal neighborhood.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: El Gòtic, Barcelona

description: Elegant but practical duplex of 85 m2 with large terrace of 56 m2 with 2 bedrooms ready to move in. You enter the property through the spectacular living - dining room with high ceilings and fully equipped open kitchen. To the left of the living room there is a staircase that leads to the loft where there is a double bed and at the bottom of this is the bathroom with shower recently renovated and a second bedroom with double bed. The property has hot and cold ducted air conditioning, wood laminate floors and double glazed doors and windows. Furniture can be included for an additional price. The Gothic Quarter is the oldest and most interesting part of the city. It is bounded by Las Ramblas, Via Laietana, Paseo Colón and Plaza de Catalunya, each of these points alone has its own importance and history. With its narrow streets and irregular structure, several of its buildings have been built on the Romanesque remains of the city, so you can get an apartment with at least one wall dating back to Roman times. It is the tourist district par excellence so it represents an assured investment, especially if you are near one of its attractions such as the Cathedral, the Plaza Sant Jaume with the City Hall and the Palace of the Generalitat, the Plaza Real, the famous Rambas, and the Museum of History of the city. The Gothic Quarter could be your neighborhood if you are looking to make a profitable investment or acquire an excellent pied-à-terre in an iconic and storied neighborhood with great history, private buildings, tourism and with all kinds of businesses at hand such as bars, restaurants, libraries, and many magical corners to discover and tour.

description: Incredible house with large plot in Pedralbes In the exclusive neighborhood of Pedralbes, the most exclusive residential area of Barcelona, we find this impressive house whose last use has been for office on a wonderful landscaped plot. The property is completely renovated. The property is developed on three floors. On the semi-basement floor we find two full bathrooms, a kitchen, a dining room, and the computer rooms, as well as a large room that was the property's old parking lot. On the ground floor we find the reception and a large area for work tables, a meeting room and several offices around. On the second floor are the management office, the boardroom, two additional offices and a full bathroom. In the garden area, a bungalow with a kitchen, a dining room and a full bathroom is built, overlooking the pleasant garden that surrounds the property. Located between the mountains of Collserola, just above Diagonal, and to the west of the city we can find the exclusive neighbourhood of Pedralbes. Its name derives from the historic Catalan words, "Pedres Albes" or white stones, which refers to the unique white stones from the Medieval Monastery. The atmosphere of the monastery seems to have infected the rest of the neighbourhood and its quiet streets. Pedralbes is a quiet residential neighbourhood without any high rise buildings. It is the area chosen by people looking for a quiet lifestyle whilst being as near to the city as possible. Numerous families choose this neighbourhood because of its proximity to the international schools in the city.

description: HOME ADVISORS offers you this exclusive property in Barcelona, specifically in l'Antiga Esquerra de l'Eixample. The house has 135m² built and has a large entrance of natural light, which provides a feeling of spaciousness. Upon entering we find a spacious and cozy hall that on the one hand gives us access to a large outdoor dining room, 3 double bedrooms (two of them exterior) and a full bathroom. On the other hand, returning to the hall, on the right hand side we find a double room and a complete bathroom. Leaving these two pieces behind, we find the kitchen, accompanied by a large pantry/storage room and a laundry room. It has air conditioning duct with hot and cold pump. It also has heating by natural gas radiators. The house is in excellent condition, with the kitchen and main bathroom recently renovated and is oriented to the northwest with parks in its vicinity. The building has two elevators and a concierge service. The house does not have a parking space, but a few meters from the farm there is the possibility of acquiring a parking space. Plaça Francesc Macià is a few minutes walk away. Nearby we find a diversity of transport such as metro stations (L5 Hospital Clínic), buses (TMB, AEROBUS), a multitude of services such as hospitals (Clínic de Barcelona and Sagrat Cor), schools, universities, children's areas, shops and gyms. L'Antiga Esquerra de l'Eixample is a residential area with a high concentration of services that is characterized by a great commercial dynamism, activities and leisure. The neighborhood consists of large city facilities such as the Clinical Hospital and the University of Barcelona. Other points of attraction are "El Mercat del Ninot" and the quiet street "Enrique Granados" with a wide range of restaurants. In addition, this neighborhood adjoins the Dreta de l'Eixample where the main shopping streets of Barcelona are located, such as La Rambla, Paseo de Gracia and Plaza Universidad. Take advantage of this opportunity.

description: Lucas Fox is pleased to present this wonderful villa of minimalist construction, characterized by having open and airy spaces, glass walls that let in natural light and high quality materials such as stone and wood that give all rooms a touch of warmth.  It is a geometric, functional and intelligent construction villa, built in 2017 under the highest standards of quality and sustainability. It is distributed over two floors: the ground floor and the first floor.  On the first floor we find a large glass façade, completely folding, which connects the interior space with the entire garden area, the pool and the jacuzzi with great fluidity. This floor houses the different daytime environments, such as the living-dining room with a large open kitchen fully equipped with high-quality materials, a glass wine cellar and a large island where we can enjoy with friends and family while cooking. On both sides of this floor we find two main bedrooms: on the left the master suite that consists of two full bathrooms and a beautiful dressing room and on the right, the second bedroom with a dressing room, office and complete bathroom.  On the ground floor, we find a beautiful hall that gives access to the house from the outside. On one side it has three double bedrooms, a multipurpose area used as a play area or office and three full bathrooms. At the other end of the floor, there is an interior garage area with capacity for two large cars, as well as the machinery area.  The garden area that surrounds the house enjoys hundred-year-old trees that offer privacy to the house.  Please get in touch for more information.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Mirasol, Sant Cugat del Vallès
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle de Colòmbia

description: Lucas Fox is pleased to present this magnificent modernist home called La Casa Generalife. It is a building in the town of Sant Cugat del Vallés (Vallès Occidental) included in the Inventory of the Architectural Heritage of Catalonia. It is a summer home of Arabesque style, commissioned to the architect Eduard Maria Balcells in 1919.  This spectacular modernist house has an area of 822 m² on a plot of 1,040 m². It is distributed over five floors and has two completely independent annexes.  We enter the house from a majestic entrance and we find the hall that leads to the landing of the stairs and a guest toilet. On the right, we find a spacious living room of 36 m² that connects with a second living room of 22 m², a study of 14 m², a dining room of 14 m² and a kitchen of 17 m² completely renovated with access to one of the patios. All rooms have plenty of natural light, thanks to their beautiful horseshoe-shaped Neo-Arabic windows.  Going up the stairs, we access the first floor and we find a balcony and to the right, a spacious 32 m² living room with access to the night area. It has two double bedrooms that share a complete bathroom and a master suite with access to the balcony, two dressing rooms and a complete bathroom.  On the rooftop floor we find two storage rooms, a bedroom with a private bathroom and a large, totally separate utility area.  On the top floor, we access a viewpoint with incredible views, covered with a dome.  Outside, the different patios and gardens stand out on two levels with a fabulous Byzantine dome, a 5 x 12 metre saltwater pool area and a chill-out area. From one of the gardens, we access the guest house, which has all the comforts and is distributed in a bedroom with a complete private bathroom, a dressing room and a living-dining room with an integrated kitchen and access to a magnificent balcony. From the garden, we also access the summer dining area, with an outdoor and indoor dining room, with barbecue, fully equipped kitchen, guest toilet, sauna and bathroom with a shower.  The house has a large garage for eight cars, storage rooms, machine rooms and a cellar.  Please contact us for more information or to arrange a visit.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Eixample, Sant Cugat del Vallès
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Calle de Sant Francesc Xavier

description: In the upper part of the Sant Gervasi neighborhood, we have this property, in a 1968 building with elevator and concierge service. 109m2 built apartment plus a pleasant 5m2 east-facing terrace (fits for table and chairs) and that invites you to enjoy it, as it is oriented to a large and semi-gardened courtyard of a very calm and quiet block. The property currently consists of a spacious hall, 4 bedrooms (2 doubles and 2 singles), 1 full bathroom and 1 toilet with shower, living-dining room with access to the terrace, separate 7m2 kitchen and a large dining area. waters. The property requires reforms, and has wide possibilities since all the interior walls are made of partitions. It currently has gas heating and split air conditioning, parquet and carpet floors, wooden carpentry. The area of the property has all kinds of services and communications, very close to the main access road and exit from the city, For many years it was basically a summer neighborhood, but with the passage of time and the arrival of new means of transport it became a place of habitual residence. As was the case simultaneously in Sarrià or La Salut, the hill was populated with towers, some in the modernist style, such as those that survive in the streets of Mulet or Puig-reig. However, from the second half of the 20th century, many of these houses were replaced by flats. The neighborhood is dominated by the park created in 1970 at the top of the hill, on land donated by the Morató family.

description: In the district of Ciutat Vella, in the heart of the Raval district, we offer a development of 10 apartments in a building from 1852, completely renovated and with elevator. In the rehabilitation of the building, ornamental elements of the facade have been respected as well as other elements in wrought iron of its balconies. The building has 4 floors, and apartments with surfaces ranging from 50-150 m², distributed in 1 and 2 bedrooms. On the mezzanine floor there are 4 completely renovated apartments with high quality finishes, perfect to move into. The rest of the apartments have a great potential for use, needing only light renovations. The Raval is a neighborhood full of living history of the city, which can be seen in every street and in every square, full of personality and charm. In the neighborhood you can also enjoy its great commercial and leisure activity, as well as the most emblematic attractions of all Barcelona, such as La Rambla, La Boqueria, the Teatre Liceu and the Museu d'Art Contemporani among others. Living in Barcelona is the perfect destination to make your dreams come true. YOUR HOME OUR GREATEST SUCCESS.

description: Coldwell Banker Llebrenc, your reference real estate agency in the area, offers you this unique property, built by the architect Manel Portaceli, located just below Vallvidrera in the upper part of Peu de Funicular, with spectacular views over the city and the sea. With a built area of 370 m² distributed over 4 floors with several terraces of approximately 120 m², a wonderful pool and garage.  The different floors of the house are accessed by a comfortable elevator or stairs.  The first floor or day area of the property has 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom, with access to a terrace to enjoy the spectacular views of both the mountains and the city that this property offers. The second floor of the house has a spacious living room from where you can continue enjoying the spectacular views of Barcelona, a separate dining room and kitchen with a courtesy toilet and a room with a bathroom that could be converted into a Suite-type bedroom. On the third floor, we find a large suite with a dressing room and a large multipurpose room with spectacular views. Next to the large swimming pool, the estate also has a comfortable courtesy studio or guest apartment of 40 m². On the ground floor with access from the street would be the garage for 2 cars. The property also has solar panels that power the entire property and high-quality finishes with natural stone and parquet. The property also has all the comforts of an exclusive home such as automated doors, alarm, air conditioning or electric blinds. This exclusive single-family home is located in a privileged location above the city from which you can enjoy the tranquility and nature. The whole house has impressive views of Barcelona and the sea.  Located in the upper area of Peu de Funicular, 5 minutes by car from the Ferrocarriles de la Generalitat de Catalunya stop, with high frequency of trains that connect with Plaza Cataluña, Sant Cugat, Sabadell, Terrassa. This exclusive single-family home is located in a privileged location above the city from which you can enjoy the tranquility and nature. The whole house has impressive views of Barcelona and the sea.  Located in the upper area of Peu de Funicular, 5 minutes by car from the Ferrocarriles de la Generalitat de Catalunya stop, with high frequency of trains that connect with Plaza Cataluña, Sant Cugat, Sabadell, Terrassa. It is located in an unbeatable central location, close to Plaça Catalunya, in a neighborhood area surrounded by all kinds of shops, restaurants, services and very inviting bars. The house consists of a total of 88sqm and is distributed in a spacious and bright living-room with an integrated completely equipped kitchen, two bedrooms, of which one is double en suite with fitted wardrobes and with clear and beautiful views to a luminous passage, and a total of two complete bathrooms, one with a large shower and the other with a bathtub. Between the two main rooms there is a comfortable office, ideal to have a zone to work. It has two balconies overlooking the street, and accessed from the living-room and from one of the rooms. In its careful renovation, original characteristics, such as wooden beams and brick walls have been respected. In the living-room the floors are ceramic and in the rest of the house hardwood floors. The bathrooms have micro cement finishes. It has air conditioning and heating through ducts, fitted wardrobes, and double glazed wood carpentry. The apartment is sold completely furnished, ready to enter to live: this certainly gives you a great opportunity in the heart of the Condal City, very interesting also for those looking for the Golden Visa.  .

The two rooms are double, one of them exterior and the other interior, perfect for those looking for a quiet and comfortable space. The full bathroom with a shower tray is in perfect condition for daily use. The east orientation of the house is perfect to enjoy natural light throughout the day, so you can enjoy the morning sun on your balcony while having a coffee and then relax in the afternoon in your cozy living-dining room. In addition, your new house is located IN FRONT OF THE VILAPICINA METRO, which makes it easily accessible from anywhere in the city. Don't worry about the distance when it comes to shopping or finding the services you need, since this location has multiple shops and services, as well as being well connected with metro stops and several bus lines. description: Coldwell Banker Eminent presents this impeccable home located in the Sant Gervasi -Galvany neighborhood, in one of the best-known streets of Barcelona, a few meters from Avenida Diagonal. Surrounded by a multitude of services; bars, restaurants, shops, and with several bus lines very close. The apartment has 284m2 built, and has a large hall that perfectly divides the day area from the night area. The day area has a spacious all-outdoor living room made up of three spaces; a television room, the living room and the dining room that is separated from it by a sliding door. From the dining room there is access to the kitchen, which has a central island and a space to eat, it also has a utility area and an ironing room. The night area has 6 double bedrooms, one of which is en-suite with a complete bathroom that is complemented by a dressing room. In addition, it offers 4 more bathrooms that serve the rest of the house. It has hot/cold air conditioning and duct heating in each of the rooms through a home automation system, which also allows you to regulate the lights in the house. Everything in a perfect state of conservation and maintenance; Natural parquet floors, solid interior carpentry, aluminum carpentry with double-chamber glazing. It has a storage room. The building, which is a very well-maintained Royal Estate, has a porter service from Monday to Friday.

description: Just 100 metres from the beach, with one of the best preserved promenades in the metropolitan area of Barcelona, we find this beautiful semi-detached house, located in one of the most sought-after and central areas of Badalona. Directly connected to the centre of Barcelona, 50 metres from the RENFE train station, 500 metres from the metro station L2 Pompeu Fabra and 100 metres from Carrer del Mar, the city's main shopping street. The street also has different projects of the city council in phase of tender to redevelop the surroundings through the project as the "superilla", and redevelopment of the MOBBA, in order to reduce the circulation of private cars to pedestrianize the area. Inside this 165 sqm property, distributed over 4 floors, we find a spacious living-dining room with access to an exterior balcony. Fully equipped kitchen with food grinder in the drain of the sink, osmotic tap embedded in the marble and with exterior window.  2 complete bathrooms (1 of them en suite with access to another balcony), 3 bedrooms, of which there is one located on the top floor, very spacious and with direct access to a garden terrace area with pergola with vertical and horizontal awning recently installed, where you can enjoy a barbecue and relax in the chill out with the sound of the waves of the sea. The whole house enjoys great luminosity throughout the day as all its rooms are exterior, as well as having beautiful interior finishes that provide great warmth and minimalist design in all its rooms. The whole house has a modern grey floating floor, recently installed, anti-scratch, and waterproofed (with a lifetime warranty guaranteed by Leroy Merlin). In addition to having automated lights with sensors in the garage and entrance door, it has an integral home automation installation from which you can control, via mobile phone and from anywhere, even outside the home: Blinds, Phillips Hue multicolour interior lights, entrance and garage door, temperature of the rooms, integrated video doorbell, switching on and off of devices such as TV, audio equipment and air conditioners among others. One of the advantages of this property is that in addition to its current spaces, it has the right to build up to 2 additional floors in addition to the existing ones, thus having a total of 6 floors. It also has a garage/storage room with direct access from the street, with capacity for 2 cars and 2 motorbikes and with shelves installed on the walls for storage of objects. If you would like to know more about this exclusive property, please contact us and we will be delighted to inform you.

The windows throughout the house are new, made of white lacquered aluminum, with Climalit double glazing and shutters. The interior carpentry in white lacquered wood. The floor is laminated parquet, except for the one in the bathroom, which is stoneware. The electrical installation and the taps are new. The entire floor is painted white. description: Pim Pam Capital exclusively sells this spacious semi-detached house with a communal pool for only 7 neighbors. The property is located in one of the best areas of Sant Fost, with Mercadona 2 minutes away, as well as a pharmacy, bars, hairdressers, schools, etc. The house consists of a basement, ground floor, first floor and attic. It has a small garden at the entrance and two terraces, one on level ground and the other in the attic. Starting with the basement we find a parking lot with capacity for 3 CARS and easy to park as the community has a wide width at the accesses to the parking lots. Also in the basement the house has a 19 m² storage room to store everything you need. Also on this floor is the hole to install an ELEVATOR, since the staircase is designed to fit if desired. On the ground floor we find a very spacious and bright kitchen with space for a table and 4 chairs. Sliding doors have been installed for convenience. Also on this floor we have a LARGE LIVING-DINING ROOM of 36 m² (5.80 x 6.30) with FIREPLACE where you can hold meetings with friends and family without space problems and having a courtesy sink on this same floor. Large sliding doors give light to the dining room and serve as access to a 22 m² TERRACE. From here we access the community area with a fantastic COMMUNITY POOL for only 7 neighbors. On the first floor of the house there are 3 BEDROOMS, all of them spacious and with lots of natural light, as well as a full bathroom for general service and another en suite with access from the double bedroom. Both the rooms and the bathrooms are spacious and the master bedroom also has a DRESSING ROOM with plenty of storage space. In the BUHARDILLA you have a large additional space to make two rooms, an office for teleworking, a games room, a music studio with piano and drums or so that adolescent children can have their own space. It also has an additional terrace of 23 m². The property has natural gas heating, air conditioning, as well as top quality parquet and wooden doors and in perfect condition. The enclosures are all double glazed for perfect sound and thermal insulation. Take advantage of the UNIQUE opportunity to live in a house with a large kitchen and dining room, lots of natural light and a community pool with only 7 neighbors. Request a visit without obligation.

description: Spectacular Penthouse unique in the area on Calàbria street, in the heart of the nova esquerra de l'eixample neighboorhood of Barcelona and next to the Jardins de Montserrat square. The distribution of the house is perfect, not losing almost square meters in the distribution of the rooms, as you can see in the attached plan. It has a hall, 5 bedrooms, 3 of them en suite, 3 bathrooms, a 27 m2 living-dining room, kitchen, utility room, terrace and storage room. The flooring is parquet throughout the house, very well maintained, except in the bathrooms where we find porcelain floors. The kitchen is square and practical located next to the living-dining room. The orientation of the terrace is on the south side, which gives the house a lot of natural light. As it is the last flat of the building, the ventilation is completely exterior. In addition, in terms of climate, it has air conditioning and heating with radiators. It also has contracted the alarm service. The total price includes a car park double space for two cars and others at the first basement.  The community has a concierge service and has an elevator. The lobby is modern and adapted for people with reduced mobility. In the area we find all kinds of neighborhood shops, several supermarkets, schools, sports centers, restaurants, etc. , just a few minutes walk away. In terms of public transport, it is very well connected with the rest of the city through different bus lines whose stops are near the property, as well as the metro with the "Entença" stop on line 5 or blue, which also connects with the airport of Barcelona.

description: This luxurious renovated 1-bed apartment in Via Laietana is part of a newly refurbished building for sale in El Born. This property has a living area of 91m2. It is located in Via Laietana, the avenue that separates the Gothic Quarter and El Born and directs you to la Barceloneta beach, which is very close to the apartment. Plus, it is near to la Catedral de Santa María del Mar and close to El Parc de la Ciutadella. This area has all the services that you will need right next to your home! This renovated 1-bed apartment in Via Laietana, El Born, has 2 bathrooms. It is part of the refurbishment of a whole building and all the apartments have been completely renovated with the best finishes. The building preserves the original facade.  When you enter this apartment, there’s a hall with some space to put a hanger or a shoe cabinet. The first door on the right is the laundry room, with the dryer and washing machine. Then, there’s the principal corridor. The first door on the right is a double bedroom with a built-in cabinet with views of the interior patio. The door in front of this bedroom is the first bathroom, with the best finishes and a shower plate. On the end of the corridor, there is the principal bedroom. We enter the room and find the dressing room, with built-in cabinets. On the left, there is the bathroom en suite. On the right, there is the bedroom that has views of the street. Finally, there is the dining and living room space with the open kitchen. The kitchen is equipped with high-end appliances. The living area is on the corner of the building and has a privileged view of Via Laietana. By the way, the photos of this post belong to the show apartment but all the apartments will have the same design. Find the extraordinary in our selection of properties in Barcelona. El Born Born neighbourhood is part of Barcelona’s old town. It has beautiful narrow streets and plazas everywhere. There are many different shops and boutiques, local and international restaurants and small squares everywhere that make it a neighbourhood with an incredible atmosphere! The area is perfect to take a break from the cosmopolitan parts and Barcelona and relaxing in one of its beautiful squares. Born’s location is central, it adjoins Gothic, Ciutadella Park, Eixample and the port. Its location makes it very easy to access the rest of the city by different bus and metro lines.

description: Cute recently renoveted property, located at the top floor of a fantastic building, with views to Consell de Cent, one of the most important streets of the Eixample area. The refurbishment of the property has been carried out with care and good taste, as evidenced by its restored "volta Catalana" ceilings, and the original studs on the walls duly treated. The flat is located at the confluence of two renowned streets of the Nova Esquerra de l'Eixample: Consell de Cent and Calabria which, as is well known, have less traffic and more pedestrian areas. The building has an elevator. The flat has 70 sqm built according to cadastre, and has a balcony (about 4 sqm) located on the rear façade of the building. As for its rooms, they are distributed in a night area with 2 double bedrooms, both with their own dressing room and one of them with an en-suite bathroom and an office space, a second bathroom, and the day area where we have the living-dining room with open kitchen. Natural wood parquet floors. The kitchen is fully equipped with induction hobs, oven, fridge-freezer and dishwasher, all brand new. It also has a washer-dryer on its balcony on the rear façade. All appliances are brand new. It is interesting to mention that all the exterior carpentry is also double-layered with an air chamber, therefore efficient in terms of energy consumption and the property has 3 air conditioning splits in the main rooms. Access from the same floor where it's located the property to the beautiful and spacious community terrace. The location in the well-known Consell de Cent street, in the section of the street where it is located, allows us to have any service we need and is optimally communicated both by metro (L1) and by a multitude of buses, as well as a bike lane for its users. In short, a central property close to all the services that we may require in one of the most appreciated areas of Barcelona. Expenses and taxes not included in the price.

description: Completely refurbished flat with quality finishes in Sants.   The property has a constructed area of 80 sqm, of which 70 sqm are usable accommodation, and is distributed in a living area and a sleeping area.   The living area consists of a spacious open plan living-dining room and kitchen facing a well-lit patio.    The sleeping area has 2 double bedrooms, both exterior-facing and with access to a small balcony.   The work was carried out with the harmony and functionality of the flat in mind. For this reason, the highest quality finishes were used, such as: Silestone worktops in the kitchen, window carpentry with double glazing, oak parquet flooring, built-in air conditioning and heating conducts, or white lacquered doors. It also has a burglar alarm.   It is worth mentioning that part of the original wall has been recovered, leaving the original treated brickwork exposed and in perfect condition.    Another advantage of this beautiful property is that it only has two neighbours.   Its location is excellent, situated in a quiet street close to Plaça del Centre metro station, Sants station, Mercat de Les Colts and Ronda del Mig.   It is an ideal property for couples or as an investment thanks to the high demand in the area and very good profitability. "WITHFOR is the first premium ethical real estate agency certified B Corp. description: Urbane presents this high floor apartment on the fifth floor of a renovated building without elevator in the Gothic quarter of Barcelona. The building has been created in 1863 and the facade, maintains its original appearance but the interior has been renovated.  The apartment has three bedrooms, a bathroom and a living room with integrated kitchen, very bright and cozy. The floors of the apartment are parquet and original hydraulic floors, high ceilings with wooden beams, and in the main room, the original brick walls that give warmth and personality to the apartment have been maintained. The staircase of the building where this apartment is located has been completely renovated, as well as the communal roof terrace, the building has NO elevator. It is located in a street perfectly located in the Gothic Quarter of Barcelona, very close to Plaza Sant Jaume, Las Ramblas, and Via Laietana. The Gothic Quarter is a collection of small streets composed mainly of bars/restaurants and local stores. It is also only a ten minute walk from any tourist attraction and 20 minutes from the beach. The city is well connected by bus, metro and cabs; and it is easy to go to every area.

description: We at Urbane have a fantastically elegant flat for sale. The apartment has been completely renovated and is located in the Eixample Izquierdo area. The apartment has an exclusive location next to Las Rambla. In this area, you will find many shops, restaurants and bars. All the facilities you need are within walking distance. The apartment is also easy to reach by public transport or by car. The 178m2 apartment has 4 large bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, one of which has a double shower. In addition, the apartment has a living room with a nice balcony. The balcony offers a fantastic view over the courtyard. The living room is connected to a modern semi-open kitchen with high-end appliances. The apartment has a quiet atmosphere and plenty of light from outside. The apartment has double glazed windows and a light parquet floor which gives a comfortable atmosphere. When you enter the apartment, you find yourself in a large entrance hall. It gives access to the kitchen and the living room. If you walk through, you will find the first bedrooms and a laundry room with a washing machine, one of the bedrooms is currently converted into an office. On the other side of the apartment are the additional 2 bedrooms. This is the master bedroom and another large room with a double bed. You will also find the bathroom with a double shower on this side of the apartment. In short, the apartment is decorated in a lovely way and offers the ideal living environment. Neighbourhood – Eixample The neighbourhood has a fantastic location right in the centre of Barcelona. The eixample neighbourhood is the best place to live in Barcelona for many people. This neighbourhood has many places of interest, like the Sagrada Familia, Casa Batlló and Casa Milà. Also, Las Ramblas is within walking distance from this apartment; this offers access to the other neighbourhoods of Barcelona. Furthermore, the neighbourhood is equipped with fantastic restaurants and bars. In addition, it also has a large shopping area.

description: Spectacular property of about 330 m² built, with a lot of charm and designed by the prestigious Catalan architect Lluís Cantallops.  It is built on a plot of about 1,000 m² with very good views of the sea. The property consists of three well-defined areas.  On the ground floor, there is a parking area for two vehicles, with a storage room and a machine room with a rainwater collection tank. The main property houses the day area and night area. First of all, there is a charming living room with access to an idyllic porch to enjoy the views of the sea and the front garden. Next, there is a large fully equipped office kitchen, an ideal bedroom for guests and a guest bathroom that complete the day area.  We access the night area through a long corridor that goes up progressively through very gentle stairs and that leads to the bedrooms on each level. Thus, there are three bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and a complete bathroom that serves them. At the end of the hall, we find the master suite with a small dressing room and a full bathroom. All bedrooms have direct access to the rear garden.  Finally, the property offers us a space of about 62 m² that can be used for different functions, such as an office, multipurpose room, gym or games room, among others. An ideal space for current times. This room is also equipped with a complete bathroom and a spectacular wine cellar.  Do not hesitate to visit this singular and unique property in the Maresme.

Elegance and privacy are the hallmarks of this magnificent property, one of the largest plots available in Sant Just, at 4 winds, it has rest areas, terraces, a garden and an orchard of fruit trees. The entrance to the property includes a well-kept garden, a 40 m² parking area for 2 vehicles, service areas, a 30 m² terrace with direct access to the house. The main rooms are oriented to the sun to enjoy the light and the views of the landscape. The interior has areas flooded with light, kitchen, pantry, bathroom, and a large living-dining room with an access door to the exterior of the house. We find 3 bedrooms, highlighting the Main Room with Wardrobe. The Cottage benefits from a varied local network of Services; Supermarkets, International Schools, Medical Services, Banks, Restaurants, Gas Stations, Equipment-Sports Circuits and much more. The property is in excellent condition, it has all the attributes to consider it one of the best properties to live in Sant Just within the Collserola Park in a splendid natural environment, just 12 minutes from Barcelona. description: A few metres from Barcelona Cathedral and Santa Caterina Market. In the District of La Ribera- Borne is this fabulous house, with a lot of charm, when accessing the house two areas divide the day and night area, in the day area we find a large living room with light and beautiful views of garden terraces, the kitchen communicates with a window that allows the passage with the dining room to share moments with family and friends, in front is the bathroom with shower, a large corridor gives way to the bedrooms (2) double and very sunny, the master bedroom has access to a small balcony overlooking the same street of L'oli, highlight the details as the exposed beams, the counter windows have thermal insulation, heating. The property has an elevator, accessed by climbing a flight of stairs. The building has two terraces for community use with unique views to enjoy the sunsets, on the roof there is also a large storage room for community use. El Born is a trendy neighbourhood characterised by its medieval streets. During the day, you can enjoy cafes and designer boutiques, while cocktail bars and samba star in your evenings. The Basilica of Santa Maria Del Mar exhibits ornamental stained glass windows. Many of the artist's masterpieces are on display in the famous Picasso Museum. The Born Centre de Cultura i Memoria is a multipurpose centre that occupies the building of an old market and preserves an archaeological site inside. El Born is located between Via Laietana and Barceloneta and has a good transport service, with Metro stops Barceloneta and Jaume 1 on the same line. However, Las Ramblas and the city centre can be reached on foot in just 10 minutes. The beach is also about a 10-minute walk away, meaning you can enjoy a beach vacation and unwind from the city at the same time. In addition, El Born is quite close to the Ciutadella Park: a lung of Barcelona, A Quiet Place to relax and stroll. Aincasa A dream a reality.

description: Fantastic apartment fully furnished and brand new, only for those who enjoy and value the high standards of exclusivity, quality, comfort, privacy and security, without giving up the proximity to the beach and the comforts and advantages offered by living in a city as incredible as Barcelona. In the most exclusive and prestigious estate in the area, with spectacular social areas, among which stand out: heated pool, equipped gym, track paddle tennis, sauna, multipurpose room, children's areas and large garden areas. This unique and exclusive residential complex has 24-hour security and a concierge service. This wonderful and exclusive 180 m2 apartment is located in the best corner of the entire Illa de Mar residential complex on Passeig García Faria; on the beachfront, with a huge private terrace of 60 m2 that allows you to enjoy 270º of spectacular views, of which 180º have a direct view of the Mediterranean Sea. The exclusive terrace of the apartment is simply wonderful. Bordering the perimeter of the apartment allows access to it from all rooms, living room and kitchen; which provides abundant light and natural ventilation to the apartment, as well as offering a magnificent useful area to hold family and friends gatherings or to enjoy the sun and your hobbies, with the privacy, tranquility and exceptional views it offers. The apartment has 3 large bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 1 fully equipped kitchen, 1 laundry room, 1 large living room and dining room, 1 large terrace and 1 garage. The Master Suite has 1 large private bathroom with double sink, bathtub/jacuzzi, separate shower, toilet and bidet, as well as a walk-in closet. The apartment has all the services, in addition to air conditioning and central heating throughout the apartment, the parking space is large and easy to park and has security and monitoring 24 hours a day. The location of the building is simply excellent due to its proximity to the sea, to commercial, financial, labor and health centers, for providing immediate access to the Ronda Litoral and quick access to other important communication routes such as Avenida Diagonal and Gran Vía de les Corts Catalanes, in addition to its excellent connection to the public transport network such as the metro, buses and tram; all of which make this Apartment an exclusive place and ideal to live. description: In the most emblematic and fascinating street of Barcelona we find this very spacious and totally exterior property. It consists of a cadastral area of 274 m2, distributed in a spacious 75 m2 living room, an exterior room with natural light to put a large office or reading room with views of Paseo de Gracia itself.   It is located on the fifth floor of a very stately building from 2002, with a majestic entrance, with two elevators and with a concierge and surveillance service 24 hours a day, 7 days a week with a very personalized service. This property has sumptuous spaces, almost all exterior, with large windows facing the street, which provides a very bright home with natural light all day, thanks to its south-west orientation. Of these 274m2 we find two different areas, day area and night area, entering through the door we find the large hall with fitted wardrobes, the kitchen is another of its strong points, fully equipped with high-end appliances, 6 industrial fires, machinery for vacuum packaging, design oven, two-door refrigerator and very large refrigerator for freezer.  It also has a very large laundry area with sinks and an area to hang clothes.  In the night area we have 3 bedrooms, one is a master suite with an incredible bathroom with many mirrors and a hydromassage bathtub, wardrobes surrounding the entire room and windows with natural light where you can feel the sun when you wake up, the other two are doubles and one individual, and 2 complete bathrooms and a toilet. description: Design house near the station Mira-Sol In the unique environment of Sant Cugat, one of the most beautiful villages of Vallés Occidental, in the area of Mira-Sol, just 10 minutes walk from the train station, a small shopping center, including markets, gym, etc. With excellent access to the Vallvidrera tunnels, which lead us to Barcelona in just 15 minutes, we find this modern, new and pristine design house. The house is built on four sides, has a public floor and two private ones. On the first floor, after crossing the beautiful main entrance and its well-kept garden, we access the hall, with its indispensable built-in closets, a small detail that will keep the precious order in your home. After the hall, the huge living room begins to be glimpsed. To the right a small room to use surely as an office, a huge courtesy toilet, the stairs and the elevator leads us to the rooms, but let's continue with the first floor. We arrive at a huge living room, with glazed access to the garden, with its swimming pool, barbecue, and porch. Also the living room communicates us with the kitchen dining room, from which we also have access to the garden, with its large swimming pool, porch and barbecue area. We can also use a second entrance to the house through the parking, with space for two cars, a couple of motorcycles, bicycles and other needs. After the parking, we access the service area, well differentiated by a second circulation specially designed to not interrupt the life of the home. In this area, a service room with bathroom, the water area with exit to the outside and access to the kitchen. Going to the second floor, either by stairs or by elevator, we move to the night area. Here we find two master suites, with splendid, huge and private terraces. The third bedroom of the floor, also of very generous measures and a bathroom that serves it. On the second and last floor, a private living room, surrounded by a four winds terrace, which is accessed by huge glass windows, will allow us to enjoy the 360 views that this bright house offers. Do not hesitate to contact the expert team of aProperties Real Estate Sant Cugat.

description: Beautiful brand new house in Barcelona. It is a comfortable house in the upper area of Barcelona, on a street recognized for its houses. We are talking about a property of 465 m2 built, 460 m2 of garden with an 8x4 swimming-pool. The size of the plot is 600m2. A house with 4 floors with elevator. A property with 5 double bedrooms, 5 bathrooms and a guest toilet. A spacious and comfortable parking with 3 parking spaces. Where also a large storage room stands out. On the -1 floor we find the service area, with a large double room en suite, with laundry, quiet exterior exit, access to the parking and storage room. Three parking spaces with large storage room.  On the main floor, ground floor, we find an elegant courtesy toilet, next to an area with comfortable wardrobes. Large open kitchen, highly luminous thanks to its large windows, which openly communicates with the dining room with views of the well-kept and recently finished garden. The living room is divided into two areas, the area equipped to mount a large television or projector, and another larger area as a living room. On the first floor, we find a large suite with excellent wardrobes with a dressing area, a full bathroom, and excellent views of Barcelona, plus two double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes that share a bathroom. On the second floor, the highest one, an excellent suite, with bathroom and fitted wardrobes, with access to a large terrace-solarium, with excellent views of Barcelona. All the materials used in the house are of high quality, prestigious Italian brands, and the wood used in the staircase from Germany. The property benefits from excellent aerothermal cooling systems, either by heat and cold pump, or by radial flooring. The entire property is equipped with excellent home automation systems, which allow lighting, heating the house in a very comfortable way. The property is equipped with optimal security systems, private video system and doorman with remote access control. A property for sale, outside the standards of new construction, with a higher investment. An ideal house to enjoy Barcelona immediately.

description: Espai center Immobles presents this spectacular renovated apartment in a building with elevator in l'Antiga Esquerra de l'Eixample in Barcelona. If you are looking for an investment opportunity that offers you profitability from day one, you have found it! This magnificent apartment has been designed and planned to maximize profitability for the owner, while offering a high quality of life for the tenants. Carrying out a meticulous reform and rehabilitation to guarantee the comfort and satisfaction of the residents. The property is currently being used as student accommodation, generating a demonstrable return of €4,300/month. A unique investment! The apartment has 5 double rooms with an en-suite bathroom each, it consists of a full bathroom with a shower, air conditioning, a double bed, built-in wardrobes in each of the rooms, as well as a workspace with a desk, and television, so that the tenant feels at home with total independence from the rest of the rooms. It has a common space in the center of the house, where we find a kitchen with an American bar and hydraulic floor, with spacious closets for each tenant, a double fridge, washing machine, dryer, microwave and everything necessary for the comfort and practicality of the apartment. tenant in his day to day. For the privacy of the residents, both the main entrance and the rooms are equipped with electronic locks for greater security. The house has been designed with top quality materials and with all kinds of details, which make it unique! Do not hesitate to contact us for more information and to organize a visit to this excellent property. At Center Immobles we offer you the possibility of putting a Financial Advisor at your disposal to carry out a free feasibility study, offering you the best mortgage conditions.

description: Spectacular brand new house, completely exterior, with a 12-meter terrace facing the sea with lots of sun. The silence, the luminosity, and the perfect balance between the majesty of its original elements and some exquisite reforms, make this property undoubtedly one of the most beautiful and comfortable that have been put up for sale in a long time. The apartment has 197 m² built and 27 m² between terrace and balconies. It is located in a stately chamfered estate, with high ceilings, large doors of precious wood, wide corridors that connect its magnificent exterior rooms, which the reforms have resignified with minimalism and elegance. From the flat you can enjoy a spectacular 45º view from the top, and that reaches up to the University tower. Inside, various light wells direct their huge windows to always capture the sunlight without the windows looking at each other. The property speaks for itself, a living room of 50 m² where the light is captured from all places, a dining room of another 20 m², 5 balconies, 4 double bedrooms, one of them with an en-suite bathroom, 2 bathrooms and a toilet, kitchen open plan with island and highly efficient appliances. It also has 2 thermoaccumulators, laundry and storage room, air conditioning and heat through ducts, parquet, elevator at street level and concierge. The property is located in a perfect enclave, in the neighborhood with the most flow in Barcelona, surrounded by trendy bars, stylish restaurants and cuisines from all over the world, and that urban charm of its shops and stores that are always at the forefront. We invite you to visit this incredible property with QUATRECASES, and enjoy the experience.

Continuing, we will find a utility area and a large semi-professional kitchen, with a wood oven, office area and access to the garden. The ground floor is completed with a toilet and a pantry and laundry area. The first floor has 3 double bedrooms and a wonderful suite with its own dressing room and separate office. The plant is completed with a beautiful terrace. The second and last floor, we find another independent room and a small terrace. All the enclosures in the house are made of aluminum, with double glazing and have been recently updated. The façade has been recently reformed to achieve better thermal insulation. The house has spectacular hydraulic floors and a roof with Arabic tiles. Composed of 3 bedrooms, two doubles and one single, a living-dining room, complete bathroom and kitchen with pantry and utility room. It has 3 bedrooms, two singles and one double, with complete bathroom, kitchen and living-dining room with access to a terrace where there is also the water area.  This house is part of a community of a total of 4 houses that share the entrance door and the stairs that give access to the house.  The house is located in Les Planes de Sant Cugat, close to the Cooperativa Rosalía, the civic centre and the pharmacy. description: These contemporary residences, designed by award-winning architects, are characterized by comfort, functionality and style.  The layout links interior and exterior design, and the quality of finishes and bespoke details come together to create apartments with unique character and style.  Ventilated natural stone facades incorporate vertical windows to maximize natural light, offering views of the 13th century Santa Catalina Convent from the exterior facade, and a pleasant courtyard from the interior. The loft-style interiors have a unique character, with bespoke details and finishes of the highest quality, with a high-end Bulthaup kitchen. All homes have direct access to their own parking space and storage room.  Comfort, style and cleverly integrated storage solutions are some of the standard features in the bedrooms. All elements blend seamlessly with the thoughtful design that flows throughout. The homes have a flexible layout that allows for the addition of an extra bedroom.  The bespoke kitchens have been fitted with furniture from Bulthaup's B-3 range. They feature sleek natural stone countertops, exquisite designer finishes and high-end appliances from Neff and Gaggenau. These open spaces are designed down to the smallest detail to be functional and perfect for gatherings with friends, and can be closed or opened at any time.  The bathrooms feature modern, clean lines, combining exceptional design with comfortable functionality. The walls are finished in natural stone and the bathtub, shower tray and sink are made of Carrara marble made on site. High-end Duravit sanitary ware reinforces the excellent quality of the bathroom. These rooms, carefully designed and finished to perfection, are works of art of contemporary architecture.  The elegant living room, with its integrated details and top-quality finishes, blends comfort and warmth with functionality, creating an ideal space for relaxing or entertaining guests. The open-plan layout maximizes the feeling of spaciousness and sophistication, while floor-to-ceiling windows and glass doors flood the space with light and frame the beautiful views.  The homes feature exceptional finishes with state-of-the-art appliances, combining new technologies with cutting-edge design. Enjoy exceptional comfort, quality and style with total dedication to the finest materials and meticulous attention to detail, both inside and out.  The main apartment occupies the entire second floor of the building. It offers luxurious interiors with the added attraction of 131 m² of outdoor space, including a large private terrace with swimming pool. This oasis of tranquility communicates seamlessly with the spacious living room. GCA Architects designed a unique interior design for the main apartment, further enhancing the quality of the home and setting it apart from others. The layout links the interior and exterior design, and the quality of the finishes and bespoke finishes and bespoke details come together to create an apartment with unique character and style.  Please note that in addition to this, there are several versions available: from the 2nd to the 6th floor, there are 2 exterior and 2 interior apartments, each with 2 bedrooms or 3 bedrooms.    The price includes parking space and storage.        *Location*  Dreta de l'Eixample is a busy neighborhood characterized by wide avenues lined with modernist apartment buildings and landmark buildings by architect Antoni Gaudí, such as the Sagrada Familia, Casa Batlló and La Pedrera. International boutiques and upscale restaurants abound on Passeig de Gràcia and Rambla de Catalunya. In Plaça de Catalunya there are department stores, cafés with terraces and various means of transportation.

On the first floor of the building we find the night area, with 4 double rooms, all with a terrace and natural light. One of them is a large suite with dressing room and bathroom, equipped with hydromassage bathtub and shower. On the upper floor of the house we find a large multipurpose room currently equipped as a living room, a games room and a gym with access to a large solarium terrace. On floor -1 the house has a wonderful and large independent living-dining room, ideal for family gatherings or events connected to the house through an independent access, and a toilet. In this same area of the house is the engine room, the storage room and a large laundry room. Highlight the large garage with capacity for 3 cars inside and 2 more outside and the large 1,000 m² garden that surrounds the house where the pool and barbecue with wood oven and pergola for those who prefer shade are located. High quality finishes such as travertine marble floors, double glazed windows, air conditioning, gas heating. description: Spectacular single-family house with terraces, pool and garden located in the center of Vallvidrera, near the Sierra de Collserola Natural Park, surrounded by nature and with beautiful views of the mountains and Montserrat and, furthermore, well connected to the center of Barcelona and el Vallés, thanks to its proximity to the Vallvidrera Superior funicular station. The farm building has a constructed area of 570 m² and is distributed over four floors and has five bedrooms, a study, a utility room and 6 bathrooms. It also has a terrace of 200 and a garden of approximately 400 m². The basement floor has a constructed area of 122 m² and is used as a garage, with capacity for 3 cars, a cellar and a small 50 m² apartment for staff or guests with 2 bedrooms, an American kitchen, a living-dining room and 2 bathrooms. The ground floor has a constructed area of 122 m² and has a room in the form of a Suite with mountain views, a dressing room, a living room and a terrace. The first floor has a constructed area of 112 m² and is made up of three rooms, one of them type Suite, and a bathroom. And the second floor, on two levels, has a constructed area of 152 m² and has two living rooms, a large dining room, an office-style kitchen with a central island and access to a splendid terrace with a summer dining room and a large swimming pool with a chill-out area. out and an auxiliary room of 21 m². This floor is completed with a spectacular suite with a dressing room and a very large bathroom with a bathtub with panoramic views. Quality finishes characterize this house, marble floors, natural gas radiant heating, air conditioning, elevator that connects all floors, fitted wardrobes, high quality enclosures with double glazing for optimal acoustic and thermal insulation. The farm is well connected to Barcelona and the Vallès (Sant Cugat, Rubí, Terrassa and Sabadell) by the Ferrocarrils de la Generalitat de Catalunya line: the upper Vallvidrera funicular station is a nine-minute walk away, the funiculars pass very frequently and connect with the Peu de Funicular station of Ferrocarriles de la Generalitat de Catalunya. The trains run every 6 minutes and on weekdays you can reach the center of Barcelona (Plaça Catalunya) and Sant Cugat (both stations within AMB transport zone 1) in 15 minutes. Sales expenses and taxes not included.

description: We are pleased to present this beautiful apartment for sale located in Rambla Catalunya, in the heart of the beautiful city of Barcelona. It is a high floor of 171 m2 built with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms and a beautiful and quiet semi-covered terrace of 18 m2. It has a large living room and a modern open kitchen integrated into the space. From this area we access the terrace overlooking a bright inner courtyard.  The 3 bedrooms are double; 2 of them overlook Rambla Catalunya and the third overlooks a bright inner courtyard. All the bedrooms have built-in closets; one of them has an en-suite bathroom. The second bathroom, equipped with both shower and bathtub, serves the rest of the bedrooms. Laundry room located in a semi-covered courtyard of approximately 6 m2, the house is sold equipped with all appliances and we highlight its Yutaki aerothermal system that provides heating, air conditioning and hot water for the whole house. Certified emissions A. The exterior carpentry is of high quality aluminum with soundproofing chamber and thermal bridge. Wooden floor of wide and long slats.  Located in a modernist estate of the early twentieth century. However, the apartment in question was built in 2016, since in that year 2 more floors were erected in the building and thanks to this it was possible to build a total of 4 luxury homes. The price of the apartment includes a parking space in a neighboring estate. Perfectly communicated with all kinds of public transport, stores and everything you need to live comfortably. HIGHLIGHT: - VERY BRIGHT house with unobstructed views - South orientation. - Unbeatable location. - Working fireplace. - Optional parking space on the same property for an amount of 40,000 euros (with charger for electric car) - Building with concierge service and 2 elevators. - Excellent communication with the entire city by public transport. - Radiator heating and air conditioning in the living room. DO NOT HESITATE TO CONTACT US TO MAKE A VISIT AND/OR REQUEST MORE INFORMATION..

The house, a fifth floor with an elevator that originally consisted of two buildings that still maintain their registration entities, consists of four double rooms, one of them large and that includes a dressing room, three bathrooms, two of them en suite, one large kitchen with utility room, a living-dining room of about 50 m2 with herringbone parquet flooring and a gallery with views of the Ciudadela park. As they are two joined properties, all the rooms are much larger than usual. The house has heating by radiators. Opportunity for investors or to carry out an update project.

description: House with four winds with beautiful views in the beautiful town of Alella, well connected just 15 minutes from Barcelona. This 2-storey house is located in a beautiful building from 1998, with an area of approximately 388 m² per floor with a swimming pool, an incredible terrace and a large garden. GENERAL CHARACTERISTICS Total solar area: 1,063 m² Total area of the Villa: 388 m² Ground Floor: 180 m² garage and warehouse/pantry Upper Floor: 140 m² built and 40 m² of terrace Bedrooms: 5 Bathrooms: 3: Alella is a quiet and modern I can only 15 km. of the city of Barcelona. This cozy town has only about 9,954 inhabitants and communication with the outside world is really excellent. Alella has all kinds of schools, near the international school, near the golf course and the Mansou marina. Medical Center account and all the services you may need. In addition, it has a good bus service, highway train with the center of Barcelona AND 5 minutes from the SEA!. A safe, beautiful and strategically located town. THE PROPERTY This farm is located in the privileged area of Nova Alella, which is an urbanization of large plots with single-family homes. This 1,063 m² estate is very well located in one of the corners of the urbanisation. One of the advantages of this farm is its proximity to the town center and the beautiful views. The farm has a water tank to be able to irrigate. This farm is completely fenced and offers the great advantage of having a garden with a swimming pool and a shed to store things in the garden, bathroom and shower. THE HOUSE Plata Baja The ground floor of this beautiful house with 122 m² of surface. The day area, we have a large kitchen, living room with large terraces that go around the house with a large terrace with wonderful views of Alella. and to the mountain Great Porch with Barbecue. laundry room, double room with fitted wardrobes. Full bathroom with shower and a cellar. Upper floor the night area On the upper floor we find 4 large bedrooms, 2. toilets THE KITCHEN This house has a really spacious kitchen, with excellent natural lighting, square A bright kitchen with a wide door that leads to the beautiful terrace. You have to see this kitchen! THE TERRACE Undoubtedly the most desirable and surprising part.

description: Apartment available in the Roquetes area to move into, it has 3 bedrooms, one is double and the other two are singles, a spacious living room with access to a 10-meter terrace, an independent kitchen with access to a gallery, a 3 rooms with shower and screens, parquet flooring, aluminum windows. 150 meters from the L3 "Roquetes" metro stop, and bus lines very close. Nou Barris is a large district that is home to Parc Central, a well-kept park, and routes through white pine forests that cross the Collserola mountain range. The Castle of Torre Baró, located on top of a hill with views of the entire city, is surrounded by aqueducts from centuries ago. The Casa de l'Aigua is an old water treatment plant with a museum dedicated to the city's water supply. In the squares of some neighborhoods on the outskirts there are simple cafeterias and tapas bars.

description: Magnificent stately penthouse located 200 meters from Paseo de Gràcia and Plaza Catalunya, in the Right Eixample of Barcelona. This unique home has been partially renovated over the years, but obviously requires partial modernization. Its interior decoration is classic, using old elements collected from all over the world. The day area includes the spacious living-dining room with a balcony and abundant natural light. This space stands out for its 4-meter-high ceilings, with decorative moldings on the cornices and interior arches. The kitchen is fully equipped and combines wood in warm tones. The different reforms have preserved original architectural elements of the time such as the radiators, the hydraulic floor and the glass doors, in some of the rooms. This formidable duplex penthouse has dimensions of 230 m² on the 5th floor and another 72 m2 on the 6th and last floor of the building. In total more than 300 m2 distributed in 5 bedrooms and an office, 1 double bedroom with private bathroom, 1 single bedroom with private bathroom and 3 more double bedrooms. Two of these bedrooms are located on the upper floor, while those facing the street enjoy access to a sunny balcony. The house has 3 full bathrooms plus a courtesy toilet. Some additional features include a separate entrance for the service and an elevator. It also has a huge community terrace, which nobody usually accesses. The house has a concierge, 2 elevators and a storage room. An impressive home located in Barcelona.

description: JOSEP TARRADELLAS - AVENIDA SARRIA Fantastic property in the Premium area of Barcelona. This fabulous all exterior apartment has two wonderful terraces of 30 m2. The house has enormous potential, due to the fact that its distribution is all partition, which allows for a work design totally to the client's taste. We access the property through a large hall that separates the day and night areas. The dining room with large windows has direct access to one of the terraces facing Tarragona. Next we have the kitchen, very bright with access to the laundry room and terrace. Through a corridor we reach the night area, initially the apartment had four bedrooms. The main room with fitted wardrobes has access to a terrace and afternoon sun. Next there is a single room that also has a built-in wardrobe and access to the second terrace with morning sun. And finally we find a double room also with access to a terrace. In this area we find the two full bathrooms. Two optional parking spaces in the same building complete this wonderful home. The location of the property is exceptional, next to Plaça Francesc Macià and Diagonal Avenue, surrounded by businesses, restaurants, shops, and unbeatable communication by public transport. (The indicated RRP does not include taxes or writing expenses).

description: Coldwell Banker Llebrenc exclusively presents this home located in the heart of the Vallvidrera neighborhood. It is a real first floor, of 77 sqm built. We access the house and find a warm hall. On the right hand side we find the kitchen, with natural gas fires, built-in cabinets that provide it with a good storage capacity. From the kitchen we also access a large laundry room. From the hall we also access the living-dining room, about 20 square meters, exterior, with a view of the Plaza de Vallvidrera, with aluminum frames and double glazing, for optimal acoustic and thermal insulation, as well as electric shutters. From the dining room we access a distributor that leads us to the main room (double), bathroom and the two single rooms (interior). All rooms have fitted wardrobes. The apartment is in good condition, has parquet floors and is very well maintained. It has individual natural gas heating and an alarm system. The house can be sold with furniture and appliances or without, depending on the buyer's choice. The farm is from 1980, and has two elevators. Its magnificent location, a stone's throw from all the shops in the neighbourhood, make this home the ideal place for those who want to be well connected to the center of Barcelona by public transport, but who are also looking for a perfect environment to practice sports and outdoor activities. Located in the center of the Collserola natural park, the Vallvidrera neighborhood is the ideal place for families or sports lovers. Do not miss the opportunity to visit this property. Contact us and we will be happy to answer any questions that may arise. Sales expenses and taxes not included.

description: Extraordinary apartment for sale in Les Corts. Beautiful apartment on Lluça street, completely renovated with quality materials, facing south. The house is located on the fifth floor, with a terrace with lots of light and direct sun. It has an exterior double room, an interior double and a single room, plus a complete bathroom, with natural ventilation. The reform has been carried out with high quality materials, the kitchen is equipped with a fridge, freezer, ceramic hob, extractor hood and dishwasher. Appliances are paneled. The doors are solid lacquered, the parquet is AC5, high quality laminate. It has air conditioning with cold and heat pump through ducts. The carpentry is aluminum, and new blinds. The electrical and water installation are new. Finca with video intercom in good condition, past ITE. Community terrace for use and enjoyment. Due to its excellent geographical location, the apartment is connected by public transport with the different points of the city of Barcelona. Surrounded by shops and shopping, recreation centers, schools and universities.

description: Excellent house of 350 sqm in Valldoreix, located in a fantastic corner plot of 1000 m² with projection to 3 streets, very sunny in all seasons of the year, facing south. It is an ideal house for large families as its perfect distribution and spaciousness, makes that all the members of the family enjoy their own spaces with great comfort. The house has a garden of approx. 1000 sqm, swimming pool, large living-dining room with fireplace, open plan kitchen, 5 double bedrooms, two of them en-suite, wine cellar, 2 offices, store room, garage for 2 cars. It is distributed as follows: Ground floor: We access it through a large hall that leads us to a spacious and very bright living room with access to a magnificent porch equipped with large barbecue area. Large open plan kitchen, with access to the garden, recently renovated and equipped with 90cm worktop, Pando extractor hood, and 80cm Smeg oven, with separate utility room for washing and ironing. From the entrance hall and through a service door you can also access the kitchen. It includes a maid's room and a guest toilet. First floor: Here we find 4 exterior bedrooms (2 of them en-suite). The master bedroom, with beautiful views of the garden and very sunny, also has an exterior dressing room and a renovated bathroom with shower. The other suite has an en-suite bathroom and built-in wardrobe. The other two doubles share a renovated bathroom.   Garage: capacity for two cars with electric charging socket. This floor has several compartmentalised rooms, 1 office with natural light to the English patio, a wine cellar with a large table for 14 people, 1 office and 1 storeroom. Its natural garden has drip irrigation installed and houses an outside room for garden tools and machine room. Features: security main door, PVC windows with PS13 security glass, hardwood carpentry, marble floors and natural Canadian wood parquet, underfloor heating, piped music throughout the house, large swimming pool. Ask us for a visit!

The rest of the ground floor is made up of two bedrooms (one double and one single), a complete bathroom with a shower tray and a very spacious suite with its private bathroom with a bathtub, and access to the second balcony. All rooms have fitted wardrobes. All windows are made of aluminum clad with wood, and electric shutters throughout the house. Radiators and central air conditioning. What more could you wish for.
