description: Lucas Fox presents this magnificent 800 m² built house distributed over four floors, on a 1650 m² plot.  We access the property through the 142 m² ground floor and arrive at a spacious entrance hall that leads to the fully equipped and exterior kitchen with access to the barbecue area and the garden with swimming pool. The open-plan living room is divided into three rooms: the winter area with a fireplace lined with wood, to give the space more warmth; the very bright summer area; and the part of the dining room with capacity for up to 14 diners. This floor also has a beautiful exterior guest toilet with marble finishes.  The first floor of 235 m² houses the night area with a total of four bedrooms. The first 23 m² bedroom has a dressing room and access to a 35 m² terrace and the second 18 m² bedroom with a dressing room. Both rooms could be joined and add a full bathroom to each one. The third bedroom is for guests, while in the fourth we find the laundry and ironing area with access to the terrace with utility room and clothesline. We also have a full bathroom with a bathtub. Finally, we find the 63 m² master suite facing south, which offers a large entrance hall, a large wooden dressing room, a 25 m² independent terrace, a reading area with views of Tibidabo and an 18 m² bathroom with a large round hydromassage bathtub raised on a solid iroko wood deck, bidet and large separate shower.  The 168 m² attic floor consists of a multipurpose room with four winds, attic and lined with wood, as well as a bathroom. It has a fully equipped bar, a large cast iron fireplace and access to a sun terrace. This floor could be used as an independent property consisting of a living room, dining room, separate kitchen, large double bedroom and full bathroom with bathtub and terrace, since this possibility was taken into account when designing it.  Attached to the main construction, there is a bright 11 m² exterior guest house, which has an independent entrance with a 35 m² living-dining room, with a fireplace with access to the porch and garden. In addition, it has a separate kitchen with appliances, the master suite with windows to the garden, as well as a room, ideal as a dressing room and/or office with a bathroom with a bathtub and bidet.  Finally, the 144 m² lower ground floor is available, with a garage for six cars, a storage room- wine cellar and a machinery area.  This villa is built without main walls, which facilitates future reforms, with space for an lift and even with the possibility of separating the attic to turn it into an independent property.  Outside, there is a rainwater tank for irrigation, an old hundred-year-old well and another for perforated water more than 100 meters deep for the pool. The front of the house has several islands of grass, olive trees, mimosas, cypresses, shrubs and a spectacular sica. The pool is surrounded by grass and palm trees and a space paved with rustic stoneware with a chill-out area. The garden offers a tropical wood pergola, a table for 10-12 diners and an Argentinean barbecue. Finally, an independent area is offered, separated by a fence with a sliding door, of 200 m² for an vegetable garden, children's area or extra parking. The circulation of vehicles is carried out comfortably with two straight and asphalted one-way roads.  The property has heating, irrigation, exterior lighting, doors for vehicles, decalcification and a central vacuum system.  Get in touch for more information.

description: 83 m2 loft for sale in the Gothic Quarter of Barcelona, occupies the first floor of a renovated 1840 building. Located on Carrer Ample next to Plaça Duc de Medinacelli and is a step away from the port for pleasure boats, The house is brand new.The reform has been carried out intelligently, accommodating an industrial style, in keeping with the environment and the charm provided by the excellent quality of the materials, the colors used and the chosen decorative lighting. The house makes a transition between the American kitchen - dining room space towards the double bedroom area with a large custom-made wardrobe and the spacious living room, separated by retractable panels with an iron structure and smoked glass.The living room window incorporates a Turkish work bench covered with hydraulic-style tiles, to enjoy the outside. The photographs show the details of the reform and we also add virtual reality images that provide a decorative proposal. The Schmidt kitchen with wall and base units finished in matt black, with integrated appliances (dishwasher, induction hob and oven and the kitchen peninsula with a wood-like finish, as a breakfast area or auxiliary for culinary preparations. The bathroom has been treated with luxury, choosing attractive Saloni ceramic pieces, natural wood sink cabinet, treated for wet spaces, shower with screens on a black aluminum structure, compact wall-hung toilet, with built-in backpack and dual-flush button, and mirror. with backlighting, electric towel radiator and Roca taps. It has an armored door and alarm with video cameras, a large-capacity and highly efficient A++++ electric water heater, hot-cold air conditioning with two black decorative splits at the ends of the house.Laminate floors FAUS ROBLE AC5 waterproof and waterproof.The exterior enclosures have been recovered and double glazing with thermal and acoustic insulation has been added.The wooden beams and the exposed Catalan volta painted white have also been maintained, uniting the entire space, giving a wide view.The new energy certificate is in process. The farm has a ground floor for commercial premises, 6 floors with a total of 13 homes and a large community terrace.Access to the house is only by stairs and to the rest of the upper floors also by elevator. The neighborhood offers local shops, a multitude of services, a wide range of restaurants and excellent communication by public transport. The fees paid by the seller.The sale price does not include taxes or notary fees and management of the sale.Eurofincas International Real Estate | Reference V2479.

description: If you are looking to live a few minutes from the center of Sant Cugat but surrounded by nature, this is your opportunity! We are pleased to exclusively offer you this fantastic 2-storey house with 4 winds in La Floresta, ready to move into, bright and completely exterior, built on a 385m² plot, very well connected. To access the house from the street we have a flight of stairs that takes us directly to the front terrace of about 70m² with a covered porch-type area and completely unobstructed views, ideal for gatherings with family and friends. We enter the house through the hall that leads to the 24m² living-dining room, on this same floor we have 1 courtesy toilet, 1 bedroom and kitchen with direct access to the rear terrace. On the upper floor we have the night area where we find 2 double bedrooms (originally there were 3, but the single bedroom has been converted into a bathroom area with a large shower. On this floor there is also 1 full bathroom and a glazed terrace lined with wood with panoramic views. The house is ready to move into but has many possibilities for expansion and reform of the current rooms. It has stoneware floors, radiator heating in all rooms, gas boiler, garage for 2 cars with automatic door. From the rear terrace, exiting through the kitchen, we find 2 rooms, one of which is currently used as a work area as well as containing the boiler, the other as an annex to the kitchen with a storage room. By a flight of stairs from the rear terrace we access the garden that in total is around 120m² distributed over 2 levels that could be leveled as well as a swimming pool could be installed. Finally, it is worth noting the good communication that the house has, right on the corner we find the bus stop, access to the highway is 2 minutes away by car and it is halfway between the Floresta station and the Valldoreix station, a 10 and 14 minute walk respectively. description: Casanovas-London. This spectacular recently renovated home is the perfect place to live in style and comfort! With 150 M2 of living space + an 18 M2 patio facing the interior of the block facing Tarragona, with afternoon sun to enjoy it every day of the year, it has 4 spacious rooms (two facing the street + two interior facing the farm's patios ) + a 5th single room ideal to use as a dressing room; all of them perfect for creating comfortable and welcoming environments. In addition, it has two modern and elegant bathrooms (one with a bathtub and the other with a shower), so that each member of the family has their own private space. Separate kitchen, large living room in two rooms with access to the terrace. It also has a small space for laundry next to the terrace. The apartment has been renovated with high-quality materials and modern design combined with the typical elements of the Barcelona Ensanche: mosaic floors, high ceilings, wood and PVC carpentry with double glazing, maintaining the original charm of the estate. It has heating by gas radiators throughout the house, and split air conditioning in the living room. Building with elevator, located just below Avenida Diagonal, very close to Plaza Francesc Macià, it has excellent communications by bus, metro or TramBaix. The Eixample is one of the most emblematic and desired neighborhoods in Barcelona, known for its modernist architecture and geometric planning. The area between Plaza Francesc Macià and Diagonal is especially attractive due to its proximity to the main commercial, cultural and leisure areas of the city. You can find a wide variety of luxury shops, high-quality restaurants, bars and clubs in this area. In summary, this area of Eixample is the perfect place for those looking to live in one of the most exclusive and cosmopolitan areas of Barcelona.

description: Lucas Fox presents this incredible house in Ciudad Diagonal that has impressive open-plan and spacious spaces with plenty of natural light. The property sits on a 740 m² flat plot and has an area of 620 m² distributed over three very functional floors. Thanks to its southeast orientation, it enjoys impressive views of the sea and provides natural light throughout the day.  The property has a functional and minimalist layout, with open spaces, high ceilings and little corridor; the most quoted and requested layout today. The large living room opens onto the outdoor garden through large windows, which blends in with the total natural environment. All this makes it a unique house in the prestigious development of Ciudad Diagonal.  The three floors are connected by lift, from the 220 m² private garage. On the semi- lower ground floor, there is a garage with capacity for six cars, a staff bedroom with a complete bathroom, a wine cellar and a multipurpose room.  On the ground floor, we have a large living-dining room with an adjoining room, kitchen, various terraces and access to the garden with pool and to the 50 m² multipurpose room or gym on the lower floor, with two full bathrooms with showers at your disposal. The 300 m² garden has several outdoor recreation areas and barbecue.  On the first floor, there are four bedrooms and a study area. We can highlight the master suite with a spectacular dressing room and 20 m² bathroom with Jacuzzi and private terrace. Finally, from the first floor, we access the fully functional 200 m² terrace with impressive 360º panoramic views of the sea and the mountains.  Few houses in Ciudad Diagonal have an open layout with open spaces and open to the outside areas that make this house a unique opportunity. Get in touch for more information.

description: BRIGHT HOUSE in very good condition. It is distributed in the day area in a large living room with access to a balcony facing Pati d'Illa.The independent kitchen, with an equipped and furnished office area. The night area has three bedrooms, one of them double en suite with a full bathroom and the other two singles.A second bathroom with a shower serves the rest of the property. Parquet floors, air conditioning and the good condition of the property make it a great opportunity. the house is oriented to the south. The farm is in perfect condition and has two elevators, a communal terrace with views and a solarium and a concierge in the morning.The views from the community terrace are incredible.You can see the Sagrada Familia, the sea, the Mapfre Towers, the Hotel Vela. The neighborhood in which the building is located is in La "Dreta de l'Eixample", between the streets of Nápoles and Balmes at the ends and bordering the districts of Gràcia and Ciutat Vella. The dreta de l'Eixample is located in the center of Barcelona.In 1850 Idelfons Cerdà devised an urban plan with 150-meter blocks, each with an internal courtyard and wide streets.The Cerdà plan began with the dreta de l'Eixample (the Passeig de Gràcia divides the dreta de l'Eixample from the esquerra de l'Eixample). In the dreta de l'Eixample you can find all kinds of services to meet your needs, there are medical centers and large hospitals nearby (in l'Esquerra de l'Eixample there are the Hospital Clínic and the Hospital Universitari del Sagrat Cor).There are a large number of schools in the area, especially subsidized (18) and private (16) schools compared to only 5 public schools.Among others, the School of Music on Calle Mallorca (university education) stands out.The area is very commercial, proof of this are Passeig de Gràcia and Rambla de Catalunya (with international designer shops), there are also many bars, restaurants, supermarkets and shops.In this area is the Barcelona Stock Exchange. There are good public transport connections with various metro and bus stations.There are FGC or Renfe trains.In Plaza Catalunya you can take the aerobus to go to the airport.Near this neighborhood is the Estació del Nord (one of the three bus stations in Barcelona, with national and international services).Being a central neighborhood you can walk to many places.Orientation is also very easy around l'Eixample due to the grid layout. The so-called “Quadrat dÓr” is at its limits and Paseo de Gracia is its backbone.The main modernist jewels are concentrated in the neighborhood, such as La Pedrera, Casa Batlló, Casa Amatller, Casa Lleó Morera or Casa Rocamora, next to Plaza Catalunya.Some of the best hotels and also luxury shops are also located, and there are also many offices. Nearby we find a diversity of transport such as subways (L2, L3 L4 Passeig de Gracia, L4 Girona, L1, L4 Urquinaona, L1 Plaza Catalunya), buses (TMB, AEROBUS), train and railways (Plaza Catalunya Station), and a multitude of services such as hospitals, schools (Collège Ferdinand de Lesseps, Sagrat Cor-Diputació, Escola Carlit, Santa Anna-Eixample, C.G.His p.Art Dra Eòlia), universities, children's areas and shops.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: La Dreta de l'Eixample, Barcelona

description: Spectacular design house built in 2013 with a lift and forklifts, it consists of 4 floors, basement, ground floor, first and second + a caisson for installations on the roof. Overflowing with contemporary luxury throughout its 3 stories, this home is built to the highest quality materials, with high ceilings and double glazed windows ensuring a high-end ambience throughout. Floor to ceiling windows throughout the property mean plenty of natural light. The decor is stylishly modern, with lots of wood and marble uplifting the overall ambience. The kitchen is equipped with all the modern appliances you may need with access to one of the terraces to enjoy family barbecues. With several terraces distributed throughout the floors and the rest of the house facing the sea with direct sun With private parking for three cars, freight elevator to the basement or elevator for the house, it is both a cozy family home with good architecture and an enviable location. Total built 476.65 Built basement floor 132.69 Ground floor built 117.95 First floor built 112.95 Second floor built 94.90 Caseton 18.25 Next to Rambla de Fabra i Puig street and 7 min walk from the Can Dragó Park and 9 min walk from the SOM Multiespai Shopping Center (formerly Heron City) Next to Fabra i Puig metro, Col-legi Jesús Maria, Sant Andreu Arenal R3, R4, R7 train station and stop Bus Sant Andreu. *Low level Direct from the street, it has independent access to the upper floors (by stairs or elevator) and on the other side is the entrance to the parking and premises. The surface of the premises is about 50 meters, completely diaphanous, with the possibility of a ford from the street (if you want to use it as parking and 3 cars enter), it has a bathroom and a warehouse of approximately 28 meters, within this they lower some stairs or a forklift to a basement warehouse approx 50 meters (now adapted with shelves) *First floor Going up the stairs or by elevator we reach a large living room - dining room with a large window that lets in the sun and direct light both on the first floor and on the second, this large room has access to a terrace at ideal level to set up a chill out outdoor dining area and games area (with direct sun), fully equipped kitchen furnished in white and aluminum with direct access to this same terrace, courtesy bathroom and separate water and drying area. 1 generously sized double bedroom suite with a private terrace overlooking Calle Pardo, with a 7-door wardrobe and interior mezzanines, plus a beautiful 4-piece bathroom, double sink and double shower tray. * Second floor General room for home cinema or games, 3 double bedrooms, all with access to a private terrace and a 4-piece bathroom with a double shower tray * Third plant Solarium of 40 meters approx and another terrace with shower of 20 meters approx Do not miss the opportunity to make it your home!

description: Enjoying the sea just a few metres from what could be your home is a LUXURY. If you are looking for an excellent investment or a unique place a few meters from the beach of Barceloneta next to the Plaza del Mar and W hotel read on. We present this fantastic refurbished flat ninety metres from the beach. The property is distributed in a living room-kitchen with balcony, a complete bathroom with shower and a double bedroom fully furnished like the rest of the flat. The architect completely modernised the property with designer finishes while maintaining the original elements of the property such as its hydraulic floors, antique melis wood shutters, stripped beams with volta catalana on the ceilings and walls with exposed mahon. The flat is on the first floor, so although there is no lift, there is no difficulty in getting to it and it has plenty of natural light. Regarding the equipment we find in this air conditioning cold-heat, television with Smart Tv, washing machine and fridge (panelled in black as the kitchen furniture), the kitchen has an oven-microwave, induction cooker and extractor hood. The property is located in one of the quietest streets of the Barceloneta neighbourhood in a street parallel to the Paseo de Borbón where there is neither a restaurant nor almost no traffic where you can rest peacefully. A unique opportunity to live in the charm of an old fisherman's building that has been tastefully renovated. Aincasa A dream come true.

description: If you are looking to live a few minutes from the center of Sant Cugat but surrounded by nature, this is your opportunity! We are pleased to exclusively offer you this fantastic 2-storey house with 4 winds in La Floresta, ready to move into, bright and completely exterior, built on a 385m² plot, very well connected. To access the house from the street we have a flight of stairs that takes us directly to the front terrace of about 70m² with a covered porch-type area and completely unobstructed views, ideal for gatherings with family and friends. We enter the house through the hall that leads to the 24m² living-dining room, on this same floor we have 1 courtesy toilet, 1 bedroom and kitchen with direct access to the rear terrace. On the upper floor we have the night area where we find 2 double bedrooms (originally there were 3, but the single bedroom has been converted into a bathroom area with a large shower. On this floor there is also 1 full bathroom and a glazed terrace lined with wood with panoramic views. The house is ready to move into but has many possibilities for expansion and reform of the current rooms. It has stoneware floors, radiator heating in all rooms, gas boiler, garage for 2 cars with automatic door. From the rear terrace, exiting through the kitchen, we find 2 rooms, one of which is currently used as a work area as well as containing the boiler, the other as an annex to the kitchen with a storage room. By a flight of stairs from the rear terrace we access the garden that in total is around 120m² distributed over 2 levels that could be leveled as well as a swimming pool could be installed. Finally, it is worth noting the good communication that the house has, right on the corner we find the bus stop, access to the highway is 2 minutes away by car and it is halfway between the Floresta station and the Valldoreix station, a 10 and 14 minute walk respectively. Do not hesitate to contact for more information and to schedule a visit! description: In Ciudad Diagonal we find this impeccable single- detached house in an ideal location: in a prestigious luxury development that offers great privacy and the best unobstructed views of the sea from an elevated position, in the vicinity of Collserola and 5 minutes from Barcelona.  Within the enclosure we have a private entrance, garden areas, a large swimming pool and 24-hour security. All this next to international schools and 15 minutes from the airport.  The house has 492 m² distributed over four floors connected by a private lift. The views, which are not lacking on any floor, are more spectacular (if possible) as we go up the floor, from all the rooms that are exterior facing the sea. This modern building property has large windows that provide abundant natural light throughout the day.  In the semi- lower ground floor, there is a garage with capacity for five cars, a large pantry/ wine cellar, utility room room and utility area and a staff bedroom with a full bathroom.  On the main floor there is a large living room with high ceilings that connects to a dining room, a large integrated kitchen in stainless steel with a central island, a guest toilet and access to the garden.  On the first floor we have the fantastic master suite facing the sea with a full bathroom and dressing room area, two double bedrooms with access to a balcony with a full bathroom and another bedroom with a separate full bathroom.  The top floor has an 80 m² multipurpose room and a complete bathroom, currently a living room and office, with the possibility of becoming a majestic suite or two more bedrooms. A 30 m² private terrace with totally unobstructed views completes this floor.  It should be noted that it offers the possibility of building a private pool in an area outside the house.  Get in touch for more information.

description: In the center of Barcelona luxury housing development, a dream in Barcelona. Residential complex of apartments, combines classic architecture of nineteenth century Barcelona, historical facade and contemporary interior design, in one of the most representative buildings of the architect Ramón Puig Gairalt located on Via Laietana. Inside, a set of apartments of versatile design. 1 bedroom and 2 bathrooms in 90m2 approx.  A spacious and sunny open space where the living room next to a wonderful kitchen with all the appliances of brands Subzero and Wolf (american Fridge, wine fridge, dishwasher, oven, microwave, induction hob, teppanyaki, wok, cooker hood, washing machine and dryer). Building with concierge service. 1st floor: 90m2 build: 825.000 € 1 beds 2 baths Its geographical location is one of the strengths of this residential proposal. From Via Laietana one of the most important arteries of the city dominates the old town of Ciutat Vella, in the well-known Born District. A walk through its narrow streets is a journey through the history of art and architecture, where there is no shortage of unique shops and contemporary cultural spaces. Its proximity to the sea and its excellent location between the Eixample district, the old town of Ciutat Vella and the port makes Via Laietana a very attractive avenue for those looking for a central place of residence and well connected to the different neighborhoods of the city. A few minutes from the beach of Barceloneta, Port Vell, Basilica of Santa Maria del Mar, Parc de la Ciutadella a green lung of 17 hectares in the center of Barcelona, Estació de França. Very well connected with public transport, metro station L4 Jaume I and by car excellent communication with the Ronda Litoral. Aincasa. A dream a reality.

description: This apartment is located in one of the main arterial roads of Born neighborhood (Vía Laietana), from which there is direct access to Barcelona harbour and beach The city center is just at a few minutes. The apartment is located on the second floor of a beautiful recently restored old building. The property features a 131 square meters area, and offers a splendid distribution. When entering the apartment, please find a large hall, from which there is access to a 36 square meters spacious living room, which provides lots of natural light thanks to its large windows. The kitchen is integrated into the dining room, and is delivered equipped with all the needed electrical appliances. The property offers three bedrooms, -one of them is a double ensuite, one is double with a dressing room, and one single-. These three bedrooms features fitted wardrobes, and are facing outwards, so they offer plenty of natural light. Two large bathrooms complete this flat. Among other improvements, it features herringbone pattern natural parquet flooring, double-glazed exterior carpentry, underfloor heating, aerothermal air conditioning, and home automation and fire-fighting systems. If you are interested in arranging a viewing to this unique property in el Born, do not hesitate to contact Hermes & Mathew Barcelona Real Estate, who will be delighted to assist you.

The second floor is made up of 2 double bedrooms, 1 full bathroom and a 12 m2 terrace. On the top floor or third floor, it has a large open room with direct access to another large terrace of 20 m2. This magnificent semi-detached house is located in Gràcia, one of the best areas of Sabadell, with all services at street level (supermarkets, pharmacies, schools... ), just a 5-minute walk from the Can Feu Gràcia railway station in the direction of Barcelona, a 2-minute walk from the Gràcia civic center and the petanque courts and playground. Within the enclosure we have a private entrance, garden areas, a large swimming pool and 24-hour security. All this next to international schools and 15 minutes from the airport. In the semi- lower ground floor, there is a garage with capacity for five cars, a large pantry/ wine cellar, utility room room and utility area and a staff bedroom with a full bathroom.  On the main floor there is a large living room with high ceilings that connects to a dining room, a large integrated kitchen in stainless steel with a central island, a guest toilet and access to the garden. description: RECENTLY RENOVATED APARTMENT IN VALL D'HEBRON Are you looking for a completely renovated apartment with the comfort of having everything at your fingertips just a few steps away? Well, this is YOUR HOME. Many things stand out from this apartment, but without a doubt, its location is one of its great characteristics; located on Passeig Vall d'Hebrón, just in front of the Vall d'Hebrón Hospital. With this information you can already imagine how well connected it is and everything that is around it; pharmacies, schools, supermarkets, sports clubs... In addition, it has direct access to the Ronda de Dalt and Túnel de La Rovira and to the AP7, C-33 and C-32 motorways. The Montbau metro stop (L3) and the bus stop where the 27, 60, 76, H4, M19, M4 and V21 stop are also on the same street. As for the apartment, you only have to see the photos to realize the quality of the house; spacious, exterior, all recently renovated with excellent qualities and very well distributed, so that you can take advantage of each of its m2. It consists of a living-dining room with access to a large terrace-type balcony with unobstructed views of the mountains, 3 bedrooms (one of them with a built-in wardrobe), an independent equipped kitchen and a complete bathroom with a shower. All this with equipment such as air conditioning, heating, parquet floors, aluminum windows with double glazing and water softener. Finally (and just as important) highlight the great presence that your farm has; Very well maintained (it has a favorable ITE), spacious, stately and with an elevator. Were you looking for such an opportunity? Well, do not hesitate and visit it. At Perfect Home we will be happy to advise you.

description: UNIQUE PIECE WITH TERRACE, GARDEN, SWIMMING POOL AND 3 PARKING SPACES. This property is located on Iradier street a few steps from Paseo de la Bonanova, in the quiet residential area of the upper area of Barcelona. It is an exceptional piece not only for its architectural design, but also for its interior design. The house dates from 1920 and has been completely renovated in 2003. It has 264 m2 with a very practical distribution. The entrance is imposing, full of magic and light, it advances through a wide hallway to the large living room with access to the terrace, then there is the dining room and the fully equipped kitchen with high-end appliances, very cozy office area. It has a laundry area, maid's room and a toilet. The sleeping area is made up of 4 bedrooms, a master suite with access to a multipurpose room overlooking the terrace, three double bedrooms all exterior with closets, sharing a bathroom. The finishes are top quality creating an exquisite and quiet atmosphere. It has underfloor heating and ducted air conditioning. The terrace leads to the communal area which is only shared with two other neighbors where there is a lovely garden with outdoor dining area, barbecue and swimming pool. The property has three parking spaces in the same building.

description: Casanovas-London. This spectacular recently renovated home is the perfect place to live in style and comfort! With 150 M2 of living space + an 18 M2 patio facing the interior of the block facing Tarragona, with afternoon sun to enjoy it every day of the year, it has 4 spacious rooms (two facing the street + two interior facing the farm's patios ) + a 5th single room ideal to use as a dressing room; all of them perfect for creating comfortable and welcoming environments. In addition, it has two modern and elegant bathrooms (one with a bathtub and the other with a shower), so that each member of the family has their own private space. Separate kitchen, large living room in two rooms with access to the terrace. It also has a small space for laundry next to the terrace. The apartment has been renovated with high-quality materials and modern design combined with the typical elements of the Barcelona Ensanche: mosaic floors, high ceilings, wood and PVC carpentry with double glazing, maintaining the original charm of the estate. It has heating by gas radiators throughout the house, and split air conditioning in the living room. Building with elevator, located just below Avenida Diagonal, very close to Plaza Francesc Macià, it has excellent communications by bus, metro or TramBaix. The Eixample is one of the most emblematic and desired neighborhoods in Barcelona, known for its modernist architecture and geometric planning. The area between Plaza Francesc Macià and Diagonal is especially attractive due to its proximity to the main commercial, cultural and leisure areas of the city. You can find a wide variety of luxury shops, high-quality restaurants, bars and clubs in this area. In summary, this area of Eixample is the perfect place for those looking to live in one of the most exclusive and cosmopolitan areas of Barcelona.

description: Spectacular design house built in 2013 with a lift and forklifts, it consists of 4 floors, basement, ground floor, first and second + a caisson for installations on the roof. Overflowing with contemporary luxury throughout its 3 stories, this home is built to the highest quality materials, with high ceilings and double glazed windows ensuring a high-end ambience throughout. Floor to ceiling windows throughout the property mean plenty of natural light. The decor is stylishly modern, with lots of wood and marble uplifting the overall ambience. The kitchen is equipped with all the modern appliances you may need with access to one of the terraces to enjoy family barbecues. With several terraces distributed throughout the floors and the rest of the house facing the sea with direct sun With private parking for three cars, freight elevator to the basement or elevator for the house, it is both a cozy family home with good architecture and an enviable location. Total built 476.65 Built basement floor 132.69 Ground floor built 117.95 First floor built 112.95 Second floor built 94.90 Caseton 18.25 Next to Rambla de Fabra i Puig street and 7 min walk from the Can Dragó Park and 9 min walk from the SOM Multiespai Shopping Center (formerly Heron City) Next to Fabra i Puig metro, Col-legi Jesús Maria, Sant Andreu Arenal R3, R4, R7 train station and stop Bus Sant Andreu. *Low level Direct from the street, it has independent access to the upper floors (by stairs or elevator) and on the other side is the entrance to the parking and premises. The surface of the premises is about 50 meters, completely diaphanous, with the possibility of a ford from the street (if you want to use it as parking and 3 cars enter), it has a bathroom and a warehouse of approximately 28 meters, within this they lower some stairs or a forklift to a basement warehouse approx 50 meters (now adapted with shelves) *First floor Going up the stairs or by elevator we reach a large living room - dining room with a large window that lets in the sun and direct light both on the first floor and on the second, this large room has access to a terrace at ideal level to set up a chill out outdoor dining area and games area (with direct sun), fully equipped kitchen furnished in white and aluminum with direct access to this same terrace, courtesy bathroom and separate water and drying area. 1 generously sized double bedroom suite with a private terrace overlooking Calle Pardo, with a 7-door wardrobe and interior mezzanines, plus a beautiful 4-piece bathroom, double sink and double shower tray. * Second floor General room for home cinema or games, 3 double bedrooms, all with access to a private terrace and a 4-piece bathroom with a double shower tray * Third plant Solarium of 40 meters approx and another terrace with shower of 20 meters approx Do not miss the opportunity to make it your home!

description: Beautiful apartment completely renovated with large terrace in Vila de Gràcia. Corner.      The night area consists of: 2 double bedrooms (one of them master suite with dressing room), 1 single bedroom/study and a complete bathroom.     The day area consists of a large open plan fully fitted kitchen and living-dining room leading to a large private terrace of 45 m2.  Separate laundry room.     Original hydraulic floors, high vaulted ceilings with exposed beams.    *Location*    Elegant Gràcia is known for its 19th century boulevards and pedestrian streets lined with independent boutiques, galleries and arthouse cinemas. Cool bistros and Catalan wine bars surround the historic clock tower in Plaça de la Vila de Gràcia. Antoni Gaudí's art nouveau architecture marks the area, from the neo-Moorish mansion Casa Vicens to the fantastic mosaic-covered estate at Parc Güell, on a hillside above the city.  It is also very accessible to the rest of the city. You can take the metro (Fontana, Lesseps or Diagonal stops), or walk everywhere: the Gothic Quarter is a 30-minute walk along the great Passeig de Gracia, and Barceloneta beach is 50 minutes away with plenty to see along the way.

description: La Sagrera, excellent three-bedroom apartment, all exterior on a pedestrian street. Square and very coherent distribution. Upon entering the house we access a beautiful hall followed by a corridor with a mezzanine and a custom-made and illuminated shoe cabinet, which warns us of the amount of detail that we will find in the house. We access the 20m2 living-dining room, flooded with natural light and bathed in the pleasant morning sun until late in the afternoon. Naturally, from the dining room we enter the large independent kitchen equipped with state-of-the-art appliances, induction hob, Silestone, custom-made acrylic polymer sink and furniture in keeping with the avant-garde aesthetics of the space. To access the night area, we have a discreet distributor, also with a mezzanine, which allows us to enter the three exterior rooms that the property has and the bathroom. The latter, continuing with the good taste of the general decoration, consists of a practical shower tray and a piece of furniture with a new marble addition. Next we find the first single room, with the same orientation as the living room, which translates into luminosity, Sun and exterior to the pedestrian street. Next to this, we find the main bedroom, with a 1.50x2.00m bed and a large custom-made wardrobe, just opposite we access the third room where there is currently a dressing room but it can perfectly be a room for the little one in the family. house, also with the luminosity that characterizes the entire house. The house is completely renovated and is delivered with most of the furniture, practically all of it. The floor is natural parquet, the exterior carpentry of thermo-acoustic aluminum, the interior of Beech. We have air conditioning in the living room and radiators in all rooms. The farm is designed by the prestigious architect Oriol Bohigas, has an elevator and has a very recent certificate of aptitude (ITE) The lobby has a ramp for reduced mobility and is new, including the access door. We are near the gardens of Elche, a small oasis within the neighborhood. The situation is simply spectacular, simply due to the fact that it is very close to La Sagrera station, Barcelona's future main station, with everything that entails, access to the airport in 25 minutes, continuous rental demands in the area, revaluation of the environment in short. We can also enter and leave Barcelona in a matter of minutes by Av. Meridiana (C-33), the main artery of the city. The metro lines are very complete, L-1 L-5 L-9N L-10N, as well as the bus lines. An infinite number of services, both local commerce and shopping centers, complete the environment and the educational offer, both concerted and public, is very interesting and extensive. Apartment ready to move into with all the comforts, either for a couple with or without children or for an investor who can take a short-term look at the entire urban plan that is concentrated in the area and see the possibilities of increasing the cost effectiveness.

description: Spectacular brand new house with pool at 22@ Exquisite brand new house in an area in full transformation as part of 22@ consists of 160m² of built housing plus 95m² of large patio with saltwater pool and porch for outdoor dining, chill out area and barbecue.  Upon entering there is a good sized entrance hall that leads to a large open space with open kitchen with top quality finishes and living room with high ceilings, which ends with glass doors that give access to the large patio on the same level. This second floor is completed by an exterior double room with window to the street, which can be used as an office or bedroom, and a bathroom with shower and ample storage space that can easily be used as a storage room. Going up the stairs we find a hall that connects the other 3 rooms, the first two are 2 exterior double rooms with windows to the street, a bathroom with shower and a large exterior master bedroom with large terrace overlooking the courtyard of the property, also on this terrace we find a room that serves as a water area to install the washer and dryer. The finishes are of very good quality and have been used first class materials such as wood in the kitchen and tiles in the bathrooms. The rooms have split air conditioning and gas heating radiators. The property has an excellent location being less than 15 minutes from the beach, with very good communication and close to the Glorias and Diagonal Mar shopping centers, in addition to the Agbar tower, also very close to the Rambla del Poblenou where you can walk and find all kinds of gastronomic, commercial and cultural offer. The area is excellent, full of contrasts as there are still examples of Barcelona's industrial architecture mixed with the avant-garde of 22@, so it has acquired a great tourist boost and interest from large companies in the technology and financial sector. It has excellent public transport links (metro, buses, railroads and streetcar) and easy access to the Rondes de Barcelona.

description: Charming renovated house near the sea Engel & Völkers presents this house of 260m2 on a plot of 180m2, located in one of the pedestrian streets of the old town of Premià de Mar, a few meters from the beach.  The house is distributed on two floors.  The first floor has a large living room (approx. 30m2) very bright with fireplace, open kitchen with window to the patio, and a toilet. From here we access the large patio of about 60m2 with barbecue area. A staircase leads down to a large pantry. On the second floor of the house is the master bedroom, type suite, of 22m2 with its own bathroom and dressing room, with access to the back terrace. Also another bathroom and another room of 22m2. The attic of 18m2 is enabled as a bedroom and has access to the front terrace solarium of the house (22m2). The house was completely renovated in 2017 (reinforced beams, installation of water, electricity and gas, heating and air conditioning, etc. ) and recently the exterior walls have been repaired and updated. Two minutes from the beach, in an unbeatable environment, ideal for families with children because of its proximity to schools, sports area and parks. One of the most sought after areas of Premià de Mar. Premià de Mar is the second most populated city in the Maresme, it is located 23 kilometers from the center of Barcelona. description: Impressive and luxurious flat in one of the most exclusive urbanisations in the city, in the Torre Vilana complex, built in 2007. This luminous property, equipped with high-end finishes, is ready to move into. Its 141sqm constructed area, of which 136sqm is usable accommodation, are distributed in a living area and a sleeping area. The living area has a spacious living-dining room of 30sqm with direct access to a large terrace of 32sqm, and a fully equipped 18 sqm kitchen, also with access to the terrace. The sleeping area consists of 3 double bedrooms, one of them en-suite, and all of them with access to a second terrace. In this space there are two complete bathrooms. The property stands out for its natural light and the fact that it is completely exterior facing. A very quiet property, with only 6 neighbours per building, located in one of the best areas of Barcelona. The residential complex enjoys great security measures: CCTV, 24-hour surveillance with dogs, restricted access, concierge service per block and alarm systems. It also has a spectacular communal area where you can enjoy large gardens, swimming pool, children’s area, paddle tennis court and basketball court, among other facilities.  Its location is highly privileged. In the upper area of Barcelona, next to the Les Aigües road and just 10 minutes from the city centre. It is the ideal place to escape from the noise of the city and live with all the comforts that make this home an oasis of peace. Very good communication with public transport, as it is close to bus and train lines. *Large storage room included in the price. *3 optional parking spaces. *The car park has an electric vehicle charger. "WITHFOR is the first ethical real estate agency in Barcelona based on trust, transparency and commitment. We are convinced that through our work we can improve society and our relationship with the environment".

On the same floor we have a double room with lots of light and a complete bathroom, a dressing room that can be converted into a fourth bedroom and a pleasant office space next to a comfortable staircase. The upper floor consists of a large hall and two large rooms that share a large bathroom with a bathtub. The apartment has also a laundry room, wooden floors, aluminum carpentry, adjustable electric shutters, fitted wardrobes and shelves, ducted air conditioning and the possibility of several parking spaces on the building. Unique piece in a very good building with concierge. Building located in the upper area of Barcelona in the neighborhood of Sant Gervasi. description: Charming apartment, exterior, renovated and with 2 balconies. Royal estate in the center of Barcelona. Located L'Antiga Esquerra de l'Eixample, Eixample! This property has large spaces and great light, all this due to its high ceilings and large windows typical of the time, which overlook Diputació street. It is located on the third floor of a century-old building from 1922 that has been fully restored. It has 85m2 built. We attach plans with the current distribution of the house. In the update, the living room has been divided into a living room and a master bedroom and a shower tray has been installed in the bathroom. It was completely renovated a few years ago and is in perfect condition. We are updating the apartment, but we can also arrange visits. Distribution: It has a large living room with access to a balcony. Currently 2 bedrooms: one of them double and exterior with access to a balcony and one single. A beautiful high-end independent kitchen from the Bulthaup house, with a laundry area. 1 full 4-piece bathroom with shower. Other details are worth noting, such as the qualities of the reform carried out 10 years ago and which has been updated, heating by gas radiators, ducted air conditioning, well-preserved original carpentry and high-quality parquet floors, among others. Location: very well connected by public transport and a few minutes walk from Plaça Universitat and the Universitat metro station (L1/L2) or various bus stops. The Eixample Esquerra district perfectly combines its residential function with the best leisure, culture and commerce offer (cinemas, restaurants, museums, University of Barcelona and a diversity of commercial stores and supermarkets). With a pleasant walk you will reach Plaça Catalunya or Passeig de Gràcia, or in the opposite direction to Plaça Espanya, the nerve centers of the city with excellent communication. description: Detached house for sale in Bellaterra This traditional house in the middle of nature is located in the eastern part of Bellaterra, bordering the forest area, overlooking the garden, facing south, enjoying peace and privacy. It combines a Mediterranean design with different modern environments, taking care of the details. To emphasize its amplitude and luminosity. The house has two independent houses. The first house consists of a hall, a spacious and comfortable living room overlooking the garden, toilet, kitchen with office and water room. Going out to the garden there is a lovely covered porch and summer dining room. On the same floor, we find two rooms converted into offices. On the first floor, we find the main room and its bathroom and three bedrooms and a bathroom. On the lower floor is the multipurpose room. With external garage covered four seats. Outdoor pool with changing area. The second house consists of a hall, a spacious and comfortable living room overlooking the garden, two bedrooms, kitchen with office, bathroom and bathroom. On the first floor, we find the main room, its bathroom and two rooms next to another bathroom. On the lower floor is the multipurpose room. With external garage covered four seats. Both are completed with gasoil heating, alarm. It has a plot of 2.486 m2 large part of it landscaped. Bellaterra is one of the most exclusive areas for having a privileged natural environment and being only 18 km from Barcelona, that is, 25 'by car. It is perfectly connected to the main highways (C-58, AP-7, C-16). It also has an FGC station. It has several shopping centers very close and is located between the municipalities of Sabadell, Cerdanyola and Sant Cugat del Vallès. Close to the most prestigious international schools: Ágora, La Vall, Waldorf School, Europa International School, University Campus of the Autonomous University of Barcelona (UAB), ESADE, School of Architecture of Vallés (ETSAV-UPC). It also has excellent golf clubs, tennis and aeronautics nearby as well as the prestigious High Performance Center for athletes, CAR Sant Cugat.

description: This house for sale in Barcelona, specifically in the Vilapiscina and Torre Llobeta area, on Felip II street, is a cozy home that is located on the actual sixth floor of a building, which provides it with great light throughout the day.With a total area of 73m², it is distributed in a very functional and comfortable way in different spaces. Upon entering the house, there is a bright living-dining room that has an exit to a balcony, which is currently closed.From there, you can enjoy wonderful panoramic views of the Can Xiringoi Gardens and Tibidabo.The living-dining room is a very welcoming space that can be used for different purposes, from rest and relaxation to entertainment and socializing with family and friends. The house has three exterior rooms, which means that they all have windows that allow the entry of natural light and ventilation.These rooms are divided into a double, a medium and a single, which makes it a perfect home for couples or small families looking for a comfortable and functional space. The kitchen is office type and is also exterior, which allows a large amount of natural light to enter.In addition, it has a gallery where you can install a washing machine and a clothesline to dry clothes. The house has a bathroom with a walk-in shower and a window, which guarantees good ventilation and good natural lighting.This bathroom is very functional and comfortable for day to day. The location of the house is privileged, since it is located in the Nou Barris area, which allows you to enjoy wonderful panoramic views of the Can Xiringoi Gardens and Tibidabo.In addition, the house has a double orientation to east and west, which guarantees great light throughout the day.The area is very well connected thanks to its proximity to the Virrei Amat L5 and Maragall L4 L5 metro stations, as well as various bus lines.It also has multiple local shops, a market, schools, medical centers, supermarkets, gyms and several green areas, which makes the area one of the most complete and convenient in Barcelona. Do not miss the opportunity to visit this beautiful home in Badalona, which will provide you with a comfortable and functional home in one of the most attractive areas of the city. Schedule your appointment today! If you are looking for a home in Barcelona, do not hesitate to contact Yesenia at number She will help you find the house of your dreams and can also advise you on financial issues, thanks to our mortgage department. Also, if you need to sell your current apartment to be able to buy a new property, Yesenia and our team can help you APPRECIATE YOUR HOME for FREE.In this way, you will be able to know the real value of your property and make an informed decision when selling it. *It is important to mention that the notary, agency, registration and agency fees are not included in the sale price of the home.These expenses may vary based on different factors.

Ideal for investment or as a permanent residence. *Location* Hostafrancs is one of the neighbourhoods that make up the Sants-Montjuic district of Barcelona (Spain). The district of Hostafrancs is bordered on the northeast by Carrer de Tarragona, on the southeast by Gran Via de les Corts Catalanes and on the west by Carrer del Moyanés. The tranquillity it harbours is a highly coveted treasure. Its almost village-like character has been maintained to this day, with local trades and businesses.  It is an area very well connected by the main means of transport (train, metro and bus).

description: Magnificent southeast-facing house with sunlight all day located in Vallvidrera, a quiet residential area near Barcelona. This property has a large garden, terraces, private pool and breathtaking views of Barcelona and the sea. Only 2 minutes walking distance from the Funicular Vallvidrera FGC connecting with Barcelona in 20 minutes, and 20 minutes away from the airport by car. Very well connected, the house can be accessed from Barcelona by a private road and from Vallvidrera by a public road. This property has 483 m2 and a 4-floor layout: Ground floor or level -4: summer dining room of 52 m2 that can be used as multipurpose room or study, home cinema, and access to the garden with barbecue and large swimming pool. It has a small study, 1 bathroom with shower, 1 single bedroom, a storage room and machine room. At this level there is a gardened area of approximately 2,000 m2, access for vehicles to the garage. The rest of the plot measures approximately 8,000 m2. First floor or level -3: 40 m2 multipurpose room with magnificent views of Barcelona, which can be used as an office, playing room and 1 single bedroom. Second floor or level -2: 50 m2 living room fireplace, fully equipped 22 m2 open kitchen, guest bathroom, laundry room, and access to 28 m2 covered terrace. Third floor or level -1: 2 en-suite bedrooms, each with its own bathroom, and 30 m2 terrace. Fourth floor or street level: 2 double bedrooms with 1 bathroom, access to a terrace or rooftop of the building of 150 m2 with spectacular views, and chillout area. There is an additional living unit of 2 floors (55 m2 and 28 m2) that can be used for guest accommodation. There is a guest bathroom, changing room and small storage space next to the swimming pool. The property has 2 separate accesses by car. The total area of the plot measures approximately 8,000 m2: one part is intended for residential use and the rest is a forested plot. The house has a hydraulic lift with 4 stops, and can be used as an office, as a private home or can have a mixed used. The whole plot is fenced and has direct access from the city of Barcelona by a private asphalted road. Sales expenses and taxes not included.

address: Gran Via de les Corts Catalanes
description: This beautiful apartment is located on Gran Via Avenue and overlooks the Montjuich mountain, one of the largest green areas of Barcelona. The apartment is located on the 9th floor of the building and has an elevator. The building itself has history, as it was the largest of its time, inaugurated by King Alfonso XIII for the Universal Exhibition of 1929.  Even though the apartment is completely renovated, they made sure to preserve the high ceilings with mouldings and the original carpentry. The apartment is almost 80m2 and consists of a reception hall, a spacious living room, dining room, two double bedrooms, a separate kitchen, and two bathrooms. The kitchen is fully equipped with everything one might need. The first bathroom has a bathtub and the second bathroom has a hydro-massage shower. The apartment is completely furnished with modern and qualitative furniture, which gives the apartment a homely atmosphere.  Both bedrooms have double beds, which both can be separated into two single beds if wanted. The living room has two comfortable leather sofas and an armchair-lounger. So the apartment is move-in ready! Not only is the apartment beautiful, but also its location is amazing. The building is only three blocks away from Plaza España and is well connected by metro and bus. You can easily get to the city centre and beach of Barcelona by public transport. Less than 100 meters away on Gran Via there is a public car park.    Price: 395.000€ .

description: ! La mejor hipoteca hasta el 100%! Se ofrece una atractiva vivienda situada en una zona tranquila pero céntrica, con una orientación óptima que la convierte en una propiedad totalmente exterior, ubicada en la 4ª planta de un edificio con parking privado, ascensor y acceso directo. La propiedad también cuenta con un jardín y una piscina comunitaria, siendo únicamente dos vecinos por planta. La propiedad es inundada por la luz del sol tanto por la mañana, gracias a su orientación en el dormitorio principal, como por la tarde, desde el salón comedor o la terraza, gracias a su orientación suroeste y su fachada a dos vientos, lo que permite disfrutar de unas vistas panorámicas de 270º y una exposición soleada durante todo el día. La vivienda se encuentra rodeada de zonas ajardinadas y parques públicos, con excelentes conexiones de transporte público, como la estación de Renfe y líneas de autobuses, en una zona segura y tranquila que cuenta con comisaría a 5 minutos a pie. Además, la propiedad se encuentra muy bien equipada, con una amplia variedad de servicios a solo 5 minutos a pie, incluyendo escuelas, institutos, bibliotecas, gimnasios, centros comerciales como Baricentro y Parque Comercial Via, e incluso IKEA. Esta propiedad se encuentra totalmente equipada y amueblada, lista para entrar a vivir y disfrutar de sus encantos. Además desde HIHOMIE hacemos el estudio de viabilidad financiera sin ningún coste y te ayudamos a conseguir tu vivienda pudiendo conseguir hasta el 100% de financiación. Estaremos encantados de atenderte! Gracias! Te esperamos.

description: This beautiful apartment is located on Gran Via Avenue and overlooks the Montjuich mountain, one of the largest green areas of Barcelona. The apartment is located on the 9th floor of the building and has an elevator. The building itself has history, as it was the largest of its time, inaugurated by King Alfonso XIII for the Universal Exhibition of 1929.  Even though the apartment is completely renovated, they made sure to preserve the high ceilings with mouldings and the original carpentry. The apartment is almost 80m2 and consists of a reception hall, a spacious living room, dining room, two double bedrooms, a separate kitchen, and two bathrooms. The kitchen is fully equipped with everything one might need. The first bathroom has a bathtub and the second bathroom has a hydro-massage shower. The apartment is completely furnished with modern and qualitative furniture, which gives the apartment a homely atmosphere.  Both bedrooms have double beds, which both can be separated into two single beds if wanted. The living room has two comfortable leather sofas and an armchair-lounger. So the apartment is move-in ready! Not only is the apartment beautiful, but also its location is amazing. The building is only three blocks away from Plaza España and is well connected by metro and bus. You can easily get to the city centre and beach of Barcelona by public transport. Less than 100 meters away on Gran Via there is a public car park.    Price: 395.000€ .

This gives the apartment a relaxed atmosphere, but at the same time also elegance. The apartment has 2 bedrooms one ensuite with large wardrobe. In addition, the apartment has another bathroom with all the ornaments. The living area is also equipped with all facilities; the apartment has a fantastic living room and a brand new fitted kitchen with high-end equipment. Upon entering the apartment, it is located in a hallway that gives access to the living area. Walking forward, you will find yourself in the fitted kitchen. The fitted kitchen has open spaces that connect to the living room. If you leave the living area, you will reach the rest area; you will find the 2 bedrooms and another bathroom. In short, this apartment is equipped with all the qualities, so you can talk about ideal Gothic Quarter life.  Please contact Max Ricart Luxury Properties for further information or to arrange a viewing.

description: We are pleased to present this exclusive property in one of the best areas near Plaza Europa. The house has three floors plus the 100m2 garage floor At the entrance of the house we find a garden that leads us into the house, the spacious and open hall, with a high ceiling, provides clarity to the room, through a distributor where the elevator is located, and which invites us to enter the living room, well distributed and with access to the rear garden. In this one, the chill out area and the dining room with barbecue stand out, in the center an olive tree presides over the garden where the pool takes a special role in the 100 square meters that it has. It is characterized by the versatility of having a summer area or turning it into a covered terrace and closed in winter through a motorized telescopic awning. The ground floor also has a toilet and enjoys a nice kitchen that connects to the dining room through a sliding door. The house is very exclusive, both for its distribution and its design. The first floor has three bedrooms, one of them is a double suite, with a dressing room, access to the terrace and a complete bathroom with a Jacuzzi, which has basalt floors as well as custom-carved stone walls, unique on the market. On the second floor there is a spacious room with a bathroom and a large dressing room. It also has a laundry room and a second private terrace prepared to enjoy it in summer. Finally, the stairs lead us to the 55-square-meter attic, with waterproof parquet, a skylight or skylight located in the ceiling to provide light to the room, and a wall-to-wall closet that takes advantage of the lowest space. Being located on a roof, the lighting is much higher than that of a window. The garage has capacity for two cars and also has a 22-square-meter games room with a pool table, which can be converted into a living-dining room with a fireplace as it has a discreet kitchen. It has natural gas heating and air conditioning with a heat pump through a duct. Aluminum carpentry and “Gradermetic” blinds. Ceramic floor and parquet. Video intercom and alarm. Private elevator. The area is very well connected, near the Gran Vía dos shopping center and the City of Justice, a few meters from the FFCC and several bus stops that take us to the center of Barcelona, it has all the necessary services. Designed to live in it, it is waiting for someone like you to buy it and start enjoying it.

It has a rest area, goal and plant decoration. • Doorman-concierge. • Storage rooms in the basement of the building. The owners own a 6 m2 storage room that is attached to the house. • Elevator: 1. HOUSING QUALITIES: • Exterior carpentry: aluminum with climalit. • Interior carpentry: walnut wood. description: Spacious and Bright Apartment in L'Hospitalet-Centre Engel & Völkers presents, in the heart of L'Hospitalet, and just a few steps from Rambla Just Olivera, this beautiful apartment with lots of natural light. Completely renovated preserving its original elements. The property consists of 99m2 of liveable space. It is located in a well-kept residential building with an elevator, built in 1954. We enter the apartment through a mudroom area which faces an original window with views of the charming interior patio. To the left we find the day area, the jewel of the apartment, a spectacular living-dining room-kitchen space, facing southwest. Thanks to the four large windows and its original Catalan vaulted high ceiling that have been preserved, this lovely bright space conveys a warm and inviting atmosphere. The spacious living-dining room area is equipped for a second bedroom to be added with windows, without compromising the light and warmth of the common areas. (The apartment was originally a two bedroom apartment). The "Bulthaup" kitchen is equipped with high-end appliances. It has a spacious island and it is the perfect hub for gatherings. The washing and drying area is integrated into the kitchen. To the right of the entrance we find a double room with custom-made his and her wardrobes, with a window that is also facing the interior patio. The bathroom covered with ceramic tiles has a bathtub for maximum comfort. Other amenities: Integrated security system, high-end air conditioners and gas boiler. The building residents also have access to a patio located on the first floor and rooftop accessible via elevator or stairs. Hospitalet Center - Sant Josep is one of the best areas in L’Hospitalet de Llobregat due to its location and proximity to Barcelona center through Gran Via and Ronda Del Mig and by public transport via Metro FGC Sant Josep. It's residential neighbourhoods have a lot to offer to those (Families, couples or foreign investors) looking for a location that is in close proximity to schools, institutes, hospitals, parks and green areas, with access to neighbourhood shops just a few steps away, among others such as La Farga, Ikea and supermarkets. Other great advantages of the area is that it´s minutes away from the Airport and Sants-Station with access to the AVE.

description: APIALIA PRODUCT: Do not miss the opportunity to acquire this exclusive house, built in 2014 by a prestigious firm of interior designers, with great design and quality finishes. The house is built to make the most of natural light and have minimal energy consumption, since it is equipped with electricity accumulators for hot water use, heating and cold conditioning. It is very well insulated with laminated and double glass with thermal break and openings that adjust to the millimeter so as not to have any loss of heat or cold. The ventilation of the house, in addition to the classic glass doors and windows, also has windows between the end of the wall and the ceiling, with automatic opening by means of switches, which facilitate air convection and therefore its ventilation. The heating and cooling of cold, is installed under the floor with radiant panels, sectorized to be able to open or close the areas that interest us the most, in addition to being able to have access to possible repairs. This type of installation avoids having to install unsightly radiators and air conditioners. All the wiring installations, heating and refrigerator indicators, are camouflaged behind natural wood panels, all accessible for easy access, which also decorate the walls giving a very elegant, warm and modern appearance, matching the wooden doors, some of them.

The house is accessed directly from the street through a garage of about 25 m2 in which there is enough space for a large car, motorcycles and still be able to have storage space. On the first floor, the one at street level, we have the day area, in which there is a living room open to the dining room and the kitchen area. From this there is access to a beautiful garden on two levels, very sunny, with a barbecue area and a separate laundry area. On the ground floor there is also a toilet, so that during the day you can move on this floor without having to access the upper floor. Returning to the entrance hall, we find a comfortable staircase that leads to the first floor. This floor has two bedrooms and a bathroom. The bedroom facing the street is currently used as a dressing room; The other bedroom, the main one, has access to a super bright exterior studio with glass ceilings, a luxury of space to be able to work all day with natural light. From this study there is access to a terrace of about 12 m2 with views of the garden and from which you can access it. On the second floor we have the same distribution as the first, two exterior bedrooms and a bathroom. The attic part is currently used as a bedroom, but can be used as a study or multipurpose room. description: 08BCN PROPERTIES  DESCRIPTION OF THE PROPERTY Semi-new estate of the year 2008 with mixed facade of work seen in RESIDENTIAL URBANIZATION LA GRANJA GARCIA de Cervelló, house with 3 winds with 120m2 garden, garage for 3 cars and private elevator from basement to attic. DESCRIPTION OF PROPERTY House of 273 m2 built, 160 m2 of useful housing plus 60 m2 of garage on a flat plot of 429 m2, has a private garden of 120 m2 in Residential Development La Granja Garcia de Cervelló with north-east and west orientation and the following distribution: In the basement: Private garage of 60.35 m2, storage room of 10 m2, water area and machine room of the elevator. On the ground floor: It has a Hall of 9.18 m2, an independent living room of 28.66 m2 with access to a terrace of 66.14 m2 and a garden of 120 m2, an office kitchen of 19.59m2 with access to a terrace of 24.47 m2 and toilet of 1.48 m2. On the First Floor: Distributor of 8.07 m2, three bedrooms, main suite room of 16.95 m2 with access to balcony and full bathroom of 4.47 m2, suite room of 11.40 m2 with access to balcony and bathroom 2, 76 m2, suite room of 10.68 m2 and bathroom of 2.76 m2 In the Attic Floor: Room of 15.21 m2 with access to a solarium terrace of 20 m2, double room of 11.80 m2 and a full bathroom of 3.06 m2. FINISHES: Stoneware floors, interior beech carpentry, aluminum exterior carpentry double glazing, radiator heating, air conditioning in attic and master bedroom, motorized blinds, alarm, private elevator, automatic irrigation, fully furnished with appliances. ADDITIONAL INFORMATION - I.B.I.: 1.€ 100 / year - Garbage: € 78 / year DESCRIPTION LOCATION Cervelló is a municipality of Catalonia, Spain.Belonging to the province of Barcelona and located in the Bajo Llobregat district, it is part of the metropolitan area of Barcelona. It is located on the slopes of the Sierra de Ordal, until near the right bank of the Llobregat River.It borders to the north with Corbera de Llobregat and Palma de Cervelló, to the east with Sant Vicenç dels Horts, Torrelles de Llobregat and Vallirana, to the west with Subirats and Gelida (the latter two in the Alt Penedès region).Between Sant Vicençs del Horts and Cervello we find the RESIDENTIAL Zone of LA GRANJA GARCIA where this property is located. The house is located 2 kilometers from the accesses to the A-2, AP-7 and B-23 motorways.The location of the municipality facilitates access to highways such as B-23, A-2, AP-7 to go to Barcelona as well as to any point in Baix Llobregat or Vallés. HOUSE WITH 3 WINDS 10 MINUTES FROM BARCELONA, IN RESIDENTIAL URBANIZATION LA GRANJA GARCIA WITH GARDEN (POSSIBILITY TO MAKE PRIVATE POOL), HAS LIFTING HAS TOURIST LICENSE AND CLIENT PORTFOLIO.

description: PROMOTION OF NEW WORK JUST FINISHED - LAST FLOOR AVAILABLE! TOP QUALITY FINISHES! Nice Promotion located in the emblematic old town of Horta.Newly built building, which respects the environment, developed following strict sustainability criteria, which takes care of every detail in design, quality and finishes to achieve the greatest comfort.Multi-family building where there is only a first floor available and a large optional garage space for €35,000 with its corresponding storage room. The property consists of 85 m2 built with a balcony that has access from the living room and the main room, and also has the exclusive right to a terrace/solarium on the roof of the building with an area of 30 m2. QUALITY MEMORIES: EXTERNAL WOODWORK. PVC carpentry with thermal break. System that reaches the maximum levels of tightness and energy saving and acoustic protection. Low-emissive double glass windows. INTERIOR FINISHES. The flooring will be natural-colored laminated parquet topped with a white lacquered skirting board. The walls will be finished with plastic paint in a natural color that will contrast with the frames, doors and baseboards, which will be white. A laminated plasterboard false ceiling will be placed, also finished in smooth plastic paint, with coves for curtain rods in all openings to the façade.The bedrooms will be equipped with built-in wardrobes in white lacquered wood. All the doors, swing and sliding will be lacquered in white. WOOD CARPENTRY. The access door to the house will be armored.Finished with white lacquer and peephole.The interior doors will be made of solid DM board with a white lacquered finish, they will be folding except for those in the kitchen of the large units, which will be sliding. The cabinets will be white lacquered folding doors. SAINT KITCHENS. It will include: Santos furniture, Silestone countertop. Appliances: BALAY oven, FRANKE sink, BALAY microwave, BALAY induction hob and filter unit. Ceramic pavement floor in resistant stone colors and of the highest quality.In the case of open kitchens, laminated parquet will go. BEDROOMS. Electrical installation for blinds and blinds.Internet and air conditioning in all rooms of the house.Built-in cabinets. HOME AUTOMATION Zennio. Local and remote home control.Phone app to control your needs from anywhere. Controls to choose from: Lighting, air conditioning and blinds. BAXI AIR CONDITIONING. Aerothermal with a unified system to provide a solution to ACS, Heating and AA that unifies the interior machines, ROCA radiators and exterior machines (cover). All the ducts will go through a false ceiling and there will be air conditioning in all the rooms except the bathrooms and corridors.

description: For more than a hundred years, the balconies of Casa Condeminas have been a privileged viewpoint of Barcelona's maritime life. Casa Condeminas is located on the seafront, near Las Ramblas, El Born (where the Gothic basilica of Santa María del Mar is located) and Barceloneta, with its magnificent beaches and restaurants. All the comforts of the 21st century in a magnificent modernist building. Precious wrought iron, stained glass windows, unique hydraulic floors, carved wood, all original, combined with the most modern construction technologies and the most up-to-date equipment. 213 m², 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, spacious and sunny separate living-dining room with a 58 m² terrace. It has a communal roof terrace with swimming pool and solarium area. Delivery scheduled for mid-2023. Contact us for more information.

description: We present this elegant property of 184 m2, with double orientation. The property divides the two main spaces very well, the night and day areas through a large hall. On one side of the house we have a spacious living room with access to an elegant gallery typical of the noble estates of the time. In this same area we have a large recently renovated kitchen, with its own water and storage area. In addition to a double room and a courtesy bathroom. On the other side of the property, we have three double bedrooms, one en-suite and with its own dressing room. Two of the rooms have access to a balcony, and to the back of the house. All rooms have fitted wardrobes. A third bathroom in this same area completes this property. An excellent piece in the eixample with high ceilings. It is a fully equipped house with air conditioning, gas heating. A property which will captivate you for its original elements, such as woodwork and moldings on the ceilings.

description: 08BCN PROPERTIES  DESCRIPTION OF THE PROPERTY Semi-new estate of the year 2008 with mixed facade of work seen in RESIDENTIAL URBANIZATION LA GRANJA GARCIA de Cervelló, house with 3 winds with 120m2 garden, garage for 3 cars and private elevator from basement to attic. DESCRIPTION OF PROPERTY House of 273 m2 built, 160 m2 of useful housing plus 60 m2 of garage on a flat plot of 429 m2, has a private garden of 120 m2 in Residential Development La Granja Garcia de Cervelló with north-east and west orientation and the following distribution: In the basement: Private garage of 60.35 m2, storage room of 10 m2, water area and machine room of the elevator. On the ground floor: It has a Hall of 9.18 m2, an independent living room of 28.66 m2 with access to a terrace of 66.14 m2 and a garden of 120 m2, an office kitchen of 19.59m2 with access to a terrace of 24.47 m2 and toilet of 1.48 m2. On the First Floor: Distributor of 8.07 m2, three bedrooms, main suite room of 16.95 m2 with access to balcony and full bathroom of 4.47 m2, suite room of 11.40 m2 with access to balcony and bathroom 2, 76 m2, suite room of 10.68 m2 and bathroom of 2.76 m2 In the Attic Floor: Room of 15.21 m2 with access to a solarium terrace of 20 m2, double room of 11.80 m2 and a full bathroom of 3.06 m2. FINISHES: Stoneware floors, interior beech carpentry, aluminum exterior carpentry double glazing, radiator heating, air conditioning in attic and master bedroom, motorized blinds, alarm, private elevator, automatic irrigation, fully furnished with appliances. ADDITIONAL INFORMATION - I.B.I.: 1.€ 100 / year - Garbage: € 78 / year DESCRIPTION LOCATION Cervelló is a municipality of Catalonia, Spain.Belonging to the province of Barcelona and located in the Bajo Llobregat district, it is part of the metropolitan area of Barcelona. It is located on the slopes of the Sierra de Ordal, until near the right bank of the Llobregat River.It borders to the north with Corbera de Llobregat and Palma de Cervelló, to the east with Sant Vicenç dels Horts, Torrelles de Llobregat and Vallirana, to the west with Subirats and Gelida (the latter two in the Alt Penedès region).Between Sant Vicençs del Horts and Cervello we find the RESIDENTIAL Zone of LA GRANJA GARCIA where this property is located. The house is located 2 kilometers from the accesses to the A-2, AP-7 and B-23 motorways.The location of the municipality facilitates access to highways such as B-23, A-2, AP-7 to go to Barcelona as well as to any point in Baix Llobregat or Vallés. HOUSE WITH 3 WINDS 10 MINUTES FROM BARCELONA, IN RESIDENTIAL URBANIZATION LA GRANJA GARCIA WITH GARDEN (POSSIBILITY TO MAKE PRIVATE POOL), HAS LIFTING HAS TOURIST LICENSE AND CLIENT PORTFOLIO.
