description: MAGNIFICENT SINGLE-FAMILY HOUSE-IDEAL FOR TWO FAMILIES IN VALLDOREIX-MASIA ROSAS AREA. FELIU FRANQUESA presents this magnificent house for sale, ideal for two families and to enjoy with friends at all times of the year, with the main house on the ground floor and a large independent apartment on the upper floor. The lower floor has a practical distribution, with wide open spaces perfectly connected.Just upon entering, a fantastic glazed interior patio, which provides light while separating rooms, welcomes us and clearly differentiates the day area from the night area, and in which they have known how to combine original elements of rustic style of the house, with others more current and more refined in style. From the hall, we see on the left a wonderful library that communicates with the bright living room with access to the porch and overlooking the garden; Next, a cozy space, completely renovated, in which we find a spacious dining room that acts as a link between a fully updated functional kitchen and a comfortable living room with a fireplace. Returning to the hall, and on the other side of the glazed interior patio, we find the night area.This area is made up of two large double rooms, and a bedroom suite with built-in wardrobes, a bathroom with a shower and a hydromassage bathtub, as well as another complete bathroom with a bathtub that serves the entire floor.All rooms are exterior and very bright thanks to its large windows. On the first floor, which has independent access from outside the house, and also internally by a beautiful staircase, we enter a charming apartment with a spectacular terrace, the protagonist of this floor, where you can enjoy pleasant summer nights or Just take in the spectacular views. The layout of the apartment is very practical and simple.Through the main entrance we access the glazed corridor, through which we see 3 bedrooms, the main one en-suite with built-in wardrobes and an open integrated bathroom, and the other two doubles, as well as a complete bathroom with shower, all exterior, and on the other side of the corridor and through a large window, which provides light and spaciousness, we see the terrace.At the end we find the living area with a nice living room with fireplace and renovated kitchen with direct access to the terrace. The property has a semi-basement floor with parking, a study, multipurpose room and storage space. We cannot forget the beautiful garden with pool that surrounds the house.Last but not least, we have left a terrace on the roof that crowns the entire estate, with unrepeatable 360º views of all of Sant Cugat. The house is located in the heart of Valldoreix, in the valued area of Masía Rosas, a residential and quiet area that in turn has all the services, such as supermarkets, restaurants, schools... as well as very good communication both by road and by road. railway to the center of Barcelona and the center of Sant Cugat. Living in a privileged enclave!

In addition, the apartment includes a 3m2 storage room in the basement and there is the option of acquiring a parking space in the same building. description: Brick2b presents this wonderful apartment in the Barceloneta neighborhood, one of the most popular neighborhoods in Barcelona The building of 57 m² built is located on a farm from 1964 The house is made up of an exterior double room and two single rooms with access to an interior patio Independent natural gas kitchen outdoor living-dining room bathroom with shower water area aluminum carpentry to reform building with elevator close to the beach, services, public transport and road La Barceloneta is a neighborhood of seafaring origins in the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona built during the 18th century and initially designed by the engineer Próspero de Verboom, in 1719, in order to make room for the inhabitants of the La Ribera neighborhood who had lost their homes, ordered to be demolished by Philip V to build the Citadel.But the works did not begin until 1753, under a new project and direction of the military engineer Juan Martín Cermeño at the request of Jaime de Guzmán.The Barceloneta neighborhood owes its existence to the land that was reclaimed from the sea by absorbing the island of Maians.

description: Bright and exclusive duplex apartment in the center of Sabadell.  Upon entering we find the large distributor, on your right is the beautiful kitchen with part of the wall and kitchen area covered by a whole piece of marble, in one part we have the area to cook and in the other a table to enjoy daily meals.  A door with a detail of colored glass leads us to the spacious dining room. The fireplace covered with natural stone and the ample space, as well as the light of the large windows, which give way to a balcony and in the other part a wall partly made of glass, which shows the designer staircase, gives an elegant and at the same time modern atmosphere to this space.  On this same floor we find a toilet, a large laundry room and then one of the double bedrooms. Following the hallway to the left is a large bathroom with a double shower and plenty of natural light coming in through a large window. At the end of the hallway, the second double bedroom with a six-door wardrobe.  On the upper floor, which we access by a wide staircase of glass and steel railings, we reach a multipurpose area, one of the walls of this room is covered with natural stone, from this space we can access a beautiful and large terrace with unobstructed views of the city. On this floor we also find the third double room, with access also to the terrace, a large bathroom, with jacuzzi and shower, a dressing room and a small storage room that complete this floor.  In addition, the apartment has a Box type garage of 76 square meters that can be used as a multipurpose room or in which several vehicles can be parked and which also has a small sink. This garage is inside the community garage, but fully enclosed.  The apartment has high quality details, designer lamps by Artemide, Foscarini and other designers, double glazed double glazed windows, gas heating by radiators, plus hot / cold air conditioning on the ground floor, two air conditioners on the top floor. The floors are made of walnut parquet, the taps are a grohe design brand, fully electric blinds in all windows, high security Fichet entrance door. No noise in the center and with all the comodiinca of few neighbors.  If you are looking for space, excellent location, comfort and elegance do not hesitate to visit it.

About the location, if you choose this neighborhood to live you will have all the essential services you will need for your new life. A few meters away we find: educational centers, health centers, parks, sports facilities and supermarkets, pharmacies, among others. address: Calle de Santa Rosa no number
description: Magnificent flat completely renovated in Gracia Very bright flat of 115 m2/1238 sq. ft. completely renovated in the current trend, has a great asset: a large terrace of 45m2/484 sq. ft. to fully appreciate the Barcelona life and its omnipresent sun. It is located on the first floor of a 1936 building in a quiet, semi-pedestrian street. The renovation allows you to make the most of an interior with all the modern amenities - integrated air conditioning, natural gas heating, integrated LED lighting - in a very local style with, in particular, the authentic Catalan vaulted ceiling in brick and exposed wooden beams perfectly highlighted.  The very functional layout clearly separates the night and day areas on either side of the entrance.  The day area consists of a large room of 33 m2/355 sq. ft. bathed in natural light thanks to four openings, including three French windows. The open kitchen is subtly separated from the living-dining room by an elegant half-height partition.  All in black, the kitchen is fully integrated and equipped with high-end Bosch appliances.  The living room opens onto the large 45 m2/484 sq. ft. terrace. It includes a dining area under a marquee and a 14 m2/151 sq. ft studio.  On the other side of the flat, the night area is divided into three bedrooms, two of which are suites with balconies. As throughout the flat, the light oak floors provide lightness and comfort.  The Gracia district is famous in Barcelona for its village spirit. It has managed to preserve its bohemian independence, escaping the tourist flows that animate Barcelona's old city. A district made up of many squares where soft modes of transport are favored and where the pedestrian is king. Even more so at weekends when cars are not allowed. The building is located next to the main street of Gracia, which has all the necessary local shops, and if that wasn't enough, Calle de Asturias, just below, offers a wide variety of organic shops, clothing boutiques and designers. The market hall, a 5 minute walk away, offers a wide range of fresh quality products. In terms of public transport, the Fontana metro station (green line) it's only at a 100 meters/328 feet away, provides a very quick link to the old city and, 5 minutes away on foot, the Gracia railway, ferrocarrils, (FFGG) station offers a wide inter-city network to Catalonia.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Vila de Gràcia, Barcelona

The house is completely renovated to move into. It has natural gas heating by radiators, aluminum carpentry with double glazing, hydromassage shower, interior carpentry in good condition, ceramic floors, etc. It is located in a very quiet building with few neighbors, in good condition, without elevator.
